verse_text: Jesu Khrist, Abraham Tapa, David Tapa khanggui lehkhabu:
Abraham in Isak ahing a, Isak in Jakob ahing a, Jakob in Juda leh a sanggamte ahing hi.
Juda in Tamar toh Perez leh Zara ahing a, Perez in Hezrom ahing a, Hezrom in Aram ahing hi.
Huleh Aram in Aminadab ahing a, Aminadab in Nasson ahing a, Nasson in Salmon ahing hi.
Salmon in Rahab toh Boaz ahing a, Boaz in Ruth toh Obed ahing a, Obed in Jesse ahing hi.
Huleh Jesse in kumpipa David ahing a, kumpipa David in Uriah ji anahi toh Solomon ahing hi.
Solomon in Rehoboam ahing a, Rehoboam in Abia ahing a, Abia in Asa ahing hi.
Asa in Jehosaphat ahing a, Jehosaphat in Joram ahing a, Joram in Uziah ahing hi.
Uziah in Jotham ahing a, Jotham in Ahaz ahing a, Ahaz in Hezekiah ahing hi.
Hezekiah in Manasseh ahing a, Manasseh in Amon ahing a, Amon in Josia ahing hi.
Babylon gam a puimanga aum laiun Josia in Jekonia leh a sanggamte ahing hi.
Babylon gam a puimang ahih nungun Jekonia in Sheltiel ahing a, Sheltiel in Zerubbabel ahing hi.
Zerubbabel in Abiud ahing a, Abiud in Eliakim ahing a, Eliakim in Azor ahing hi.
Azor in Zadok ahing a, Zadok in Akim ahing a, Akim in Eliud ahing hi.
Eliud in Eleazar ahing a, Eleazar in Mathan ahing a, Mathan in Jakob ahing hi.
Huleh Jakob in Mari pasal Joseph ahing a, hu Mari apatin Khrist kichi Jesu chu ahung piangta hi.

Huchiin Abraham apat David chiang khang zousiah chu khang sawmleli ahi. Huleh David apat Babylon gam a puimang ahih chiang uh khang sawmleli, huleh Babylon gam a puimang ahih vapat Khrist chiang khang sawmleli ahi.
Jesu Khrist pian daan chu hi chi ahi: a nu Mari chu Joseph toh akikhaam nung un, aumkhawm maun, Hagau Siangthou apat gaai chih akihedohta hi.
Hizongleh a pasal Joseph chu midihtat ahi a, zapi heet-a um diing uut louin aguuha khuul atumta hi.
Hizongleh amah in hi thute angaihtuah laiin, a mang in Lalpa angel a kawmah ahung kilaah a, “David tapa Joseph, Mari na ji diinga laah lau sin. Ajiahchu a nau paai hi Hagau Siangthou apat ahi.
Tapa ahung nei diinga huleh a min Jesu na sa diing hi. Ajiahchu Amah in a mite a sualnate vapat ahundam diing hi,” achi hi.
Hi silte zousiah chu Lalpa’n zawlnei kam a hichibanga anasoite ataangtun theihna diingin ahi,
“Ngai un, nungaah siangthou agaai diing a, Tapa anei diing a, huleh a min Immanuel achi diing uh,” huchu, “I kawmah Pathian aum,” chihna ahi.
Huin Joseph chu ihmu athou a, Lalpa angel in thu apiaah banga bawlin, a ji chu akiteenpihta a,
hizongleh Mari in a Tapa masapeen ahung neihkhiah masiah aluppih sih a, huleh amah in a min Jesu asata hi.
Huchiin kumpipa Herod lal laia Judia gam a Bethlehem khua a Jesu ahung pianin, ngai un, suahlam apat mipil aahsi lama siamte Jerusalem ah ahung va,
“Judate Kumpipa hung piang chu khoiah aum ei? Ajiahchu suahlam ah Amah aahsi ka mu va, Amah be diinga hung ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
Kumpipa Herod in huchu ajaah tahin alungdong a, Jerusalem a mi zousiah zong amah toh alungdong uhi.
Siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute zousiah akou khawm a, Khrist pianna diing khoitah ahiai chih adong hi.
Huleh amah un a kawmah, “Judia gam a Bethlehem khua ah, ajiahchu zawlnei in hichibangin anagial hi,
‘Nang, Juda gam a Bethlehem, Juda gamoptute lahah na neupeen hial sih hi. Ajiahchu ka mi Israel veengtu diing nang apatin Optu liantah ahungdoh diing hi,’” achi uhi.
Huin Herod in mipil aahsi lam a siamte aguuh kouh a, aahsi kilat hun adongchianta hi.
Huleh amahuh chu Bethlehem ah asawl a, “Chiah unla, naungeh thu chu chiantahin vakankhia un. Na muh tahchiangun keima’n zong ka hung biahve theihna diingin thu hung hilh kiit un,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un kumpipa thu ajaah zohun akipankheta va, ngai un, suahlam a amuh uh aahsi chu naungeeh umna tung jawn atun a, akhawl masiah a ma vah apai jeel hi.
Amah un aahsi chu amuh tahun nasatahin akipaah uhi.
Huleh inn sungah aluut va, a nu Mari toh um naungeeh chu amu va, abohkhup va, abeta uhi. Huin a goubawmte uh hongin a kawmah silpiaah sana leh begaw leh murrah apia uhi.
Huleh Herod kawma kilehkiit lou diinga a mang va hilha aum jiahun lampi tuam juiin a kho lamvah achiahta uhi.

Huleh amahuh achiah nungun, en un, Lalpa angel chu Joseph kawmah a mang in akilaah a, “Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu pui inla Aigupta gam ah taai in. Huleh ka hung hilh kiit masiah hutah ah um zing in. Ajiahchu Herod in naungeeh chu suhlup diinga hawl pah diing ahi,” achi hi.
Joseph chu athou a, naungeeh leh a nu chu apui a, ajaan ajaanin Aigupta lamah achiahta uhi.
Lalpa’n zawlnei kam a, “Aigupta gam apat ka Tapa ka koudohta,” chia asoi ahung taangtun theihna diingin Herod asih masiah hutah ah aum zing uhi.

Huin Herod in aahsi lam a siamte’n aheem uh chih aheet tahin nasatahin alungthahta hi. Huchiin mi asawl a, aahsi lam a siamte kawma a hun thu adohchian bangtahin Bethlehem leh a kiimveel zousiah a pasal naupang kum nih leh a nuailam zousiah athatta hi.
Zawlnei Jeremia in hichibanga anasoi chu ahung taangtungta hi,
“Rama khua ah thawm akija, numei misi ngaia kap leh maauna nasatah bang, Rachel in a tate akah a, aum nawn louh jiahun koima hamuan diing auut sih hi,” achih chu.
Herod asih phetin, ngai in, Lalpa angel khat Joseph kawmah a mang in Aigupta gam ah akilaah a,
“Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu chu pui inla Israel gam ah chiah in, ajiahchu naungeeh thah tumte asita uhi,” achi hi.
Huin amah chu athou a, naungeeh leh a nu chu apui a, Israel gam ah ahungta hi.
Arkelaos chu Judia gam a a pa Herod mun ah alal hi chih ajaah tahin hu lamah achiah ngamta sih hi. A mang a hilha aum jiahin Galili gam lamah akilehheita hi.
Huleh zawlneite’n, “Amah chu Nazareth mi achi diing uh,” chia asoi uh ataangtun theihna diingin Nazareth kichi khua khat ah ahung tung va, ateengta uhi.
Hu hun laiin Baptistu Johan chu Judia gamdaai ah taangkouin ahung a,
“Kisiih un, ajiahchu vaan lalgam anaita hi,” chia soiin.
Ajiahchu amah ahi zawlnei Isai in, “Gamdaai a mi kikou aw in, ‘LALPA lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un,’ achi hi,” chia anasoipa chu.
Hu Johan in chu sangawngsau mul puan asilh a, a kawng savun kawnggaah in agaah a, huleh a an chu khaukhup leh gam khuaizu ahi.
Huleh Jerusalem leh Judia gam pumpi leh Jordan kiimveel a umte zousiah a kawmah achiah va,
huleh a sualte uh kiphuangin Jordan ah Johan in abaptis hi.
Ama’n Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tampi a kawma baptisma tang diinga hung amuh tahin, a kawmvah, “Guul suante aw! Lungthahna hung tung pah diing taaisan diingin kuan ahung thuhilh ei?
Hujiahin kisiihna toh kituaah gah suang un.
‘Abraham ka pu uh ahi,’ chiin kingaihtuah sih un. Ajiahchu Pathian in hi suangte haw Abraham tate in adingsah thei hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Tuin zong singbul chin ah heita koih ahita hi. Hujiahin singkung gah hoih suang lou photmah chu phuuh ahi a, mei ah paihluutin aum hi.

Ke’n chu kisiihna diingin tui in ka hung baptis ngeei hi. Hizongleh ka nunga hung paipa chu kei saangin aloupijaw a, a keengtophah tawi taah zong ka hi sih hi. Ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou leh mei in nanguh ahung baptis diing hi.
A khut in a pasiseep atawi a, a phual chu ajaap siang tinten diing hi. Huleh a buhte chu a pang ah akoih khawm diing hi. Hizongleh a sii chu mei mittheilou in ahaaltum diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu chu baptisma tang diingin Galili gam apatin Jordan ah Johan kawmah ahung hi.
Hizongleh Johan in, “Kei na hung baptis kiphamoh jaw hi ing a, nang kei kawma hung na hi maw?” chiin Amah anakhaam hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Tuin chu huchih diing lemsa haam in. Ajiahchu huchibang a dihtatna zousiah bawl bukim chu ei diinga poimoh ahi,” achi hi. Huin lem asata hi.
Jesu chu baptisma atan zohin tui apatin apawtdoh pah hi. Huleh ngai un, vaan Amah lamah ahung kihong a, Pathian Hagau chu vakhu banga hung kumsuhin a tunga hung tu chu amu hi.
Huleh ngai un, vaan apatin aw khat ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi a, a tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Hu nungin Jesu chu diabol heema um diingin gamdaai ah Hagau in apuita hi.
Huleh suun sawmli leh jaan sawmli an ngawla aum nungin a gil ahung kialta hi.
Huin heemtu chu a kawmah ahung a, “Pathian Tapa na hih leh, hi suangte tanghou suaah diingin thu pia in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, “‘Mihing tanghou chauhin ahing sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian kam apat thu pawt chin in ahing jaw diing uh,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
Huchiin diabol in Amah chu khopi siangthou ah apuitou a, Pathian biahinn tung sangpeen ah akoih hi.

Huleh a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na hih leh, kekhesuh in, ajiahchu, ‘Ama’n na tungtaang thu ah a angelte thu ape diing,’ huleh ‘A khut un ahung na dom diing uh, huchilou inchu na keeng suang ah na tat kha diing,’ chia gelh ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “‘LALPA na Pathian na je-et louh diing ahi,’ chih gelh ahi jeel hi,” achi hi.
Huleh diabol in Amah chu taang sangpi khat tungah apui kiit a, khovel lalgam zousiah leh a loupina uh aensah hi.
Huleh diabol in a kawmah, “Khupbohin hung be lehchin hite zousiah ka hung pe diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hitah apatin chiah mang in, Setan! ‘LALPA na Pathian chu na biah diing a, Amah nna chauh natoh diing ahi,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
Huzohin diabol in Amah anuseta a, huleh en un, angelte ahung va a nna atohsahta uhi.
Huchiin Johan suangkul ah akhum uh chih Jesu’n ajaah tahin, Galili gam ah achiahta hi.
Huleh Nazareth khua nusiain, Zebulon leh Naphtali gamkaih sunga um diil geia Kapernaum khua ah chiahin avateengta hi,
huchia zawlnei Isai in hichibanga anasoite ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
“Jentelte Galili, Jordan gaal a Diil lampi a um Zebulon gam leh Naphtali gam a:
mial a tou mite’n vaah loupitah amu uh, huleh sihna gam leh liim a toute tungah vaah ahung suaahta hi,” achih chu.
Hu hun apatin Jesu’n, “Kisiih un, ajiahchu vaan lalgam anaita hi,” chiin thusoi apanta hi.
Huleh Jesu’n Galili Diil geia avaah laiin, unau nih Simon kichi Peter leh a sanggampa Andru diil a leensep-a um amu hi, ajiahchu amahuh ngamanmi ahi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hung jui un, mihing mantuin ka hung siam diing,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un a leente uh nusiain Amah ajui pah uhi.
Huleh Amah chu hu apat chiah jeelin, unau dang nih, Zebedi tapate Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan chu a pa uh Zebedi toh kuang sunga a leente uh phoha um amu a, amahuh akou hi.
Huleh amah un a pa uh leh a kuang uh nusiain Amah ajui pahta uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Galili gam pumpi ah avaah lehleh a, sinagogte bang ah thu ahilh a, lalgam tanchinpha soiin mite laha natna chinteng leh damlouhna chinteng asudam jeel hi.
Huleh Syria gam pumpi ah a min athangta hi. Huleh amah un natna chituamtuam a damlou zousiah leh dawi matte, sibup veite leh jengte a kawmah ahung pui va, Ama’n anasudam jeel hi.
Huleh Amah chu Galili, Dekapoli, Jerusalem, Judia leh Jordan gaal lam apat hung mipi nasatahin ajui uhi.
Huin mipite amuhin Amah chu taang ah akal a, huleh atou zohin a nungjuite a kawmah ahung uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kam akaah a, amahuh thu ahilh a:
“Hagau a gentheite ahampha uhi, vaan lalgam amahuh a ahih jiahin.
Lungngaite ahampha uhi, hamuana um diing ahih jiahun.
Thunuaigolhte ahampha uhi, leigou luah diing ahih jiahun.
Dihtatna lam a gilkiala dangtaahte ahampha uhi, taisaha um diing ahih jiahun.
Khotuah theite ahampha uhi, khotuahna tang diing ahih jiahun.
Lungsim siangthoute ahampha uhi, Pathian mu diing ahih jiahun.
Lemna siamtute ahampha uhi, Pathian tate chiha um diing ahih jiahun.
Dihtatna jiaha suhduhdaha umte ahampha uhi, vaan lalgam amahuh a diing ahih jiahin.
“Mi’n keimah jiaha ahung housiat va, ahung suhduhdah va, juau a gilou chinteng a ahung heeh hun chiangun na hampha uhi.
Kipaah unla, nasatahin nuam un, vaan ah na kipaahman diing uh atam ngaala, ajiahchu na ma va zawlnei umte zong hitobangin anasuduhdahta uhi.
“Lei chi na hi uh, hizongleh chi chu data hileh, bangin akisual kiitta diai? Huchia’n a panna aumta sih diing a, paihdoh a, mite totchil diing ahi giapta hi.
“Nanguh khovel mite vaah na hi uh, taang tunga khopi um chu akiphual thei sih hi.
Huleh mi’n thaumei dein loh akhuhkhum ngei sih va, a tunna ah akoih jaw uhi. Huchiin inn sunga mi um zousiah asalhvaah hi.
Hutobangin na vaah uh mi mitmuhin vaah heh, huchiin amah un na natoh hoihte uh amu thei diing va, na Pa uh vaan a um chu apaahtawi diing uhi.
“Daan thu aha, Zawlneite Lehkhabute aha suse diinga hung ka hi chiin hung ngaihtuah sih un. Suse diinga hung ka hi sih a, sutaangtung diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, vaan leh lei aman masiah daan thu a sutvom neucha aha thaivom neuchakhat zong amang sih diing hi, a bawna ataangtun kim masiahin.

Hujiahin koipouh hi thupiaah neupeente laha khat mei zong susia a, hutobanga bawl diinga mite hilh chu vaan lalgam ah mi neupeen ahi diing hi. Hizongleh koipouh in jui a, hutobanga bawl diinga mite hilhtu chu vaan lalgam ah milian chih ahi diing hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, na dihtatna un daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite dihtatna akhuup louh inchu, vaan lalgam ah na luut top sih diing uhi.
“Malai mite kawma, ‘Tual na thah louh diing ahi, huleh koipouh tualthat in chu vaihawmna atuaah diing hi,’ kichi daan na jata uhi.

Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, koipouh ajiah beia a unau tunga lungthah chu vaihawmsahin aum diing hi. Huleh koipouh a unau kawma‚ ‘Raka!’ chitu in chu vaihawmtute vaihawmna atuaah diing hi. Huleh koipouh, ‘Mingol!’ chitu chu gawtmun meidiil a luut theihna lauhhuai ah aum diing hi.
Hujiahin maitaam bul a silpiaah diing tawia na hung laitaha na unau in na tungah lungkimlouhna anei chih na heetdoh leh,
na silpiaah diing chu hu maitaam ma ah nusia inla chiah in. Huleh na unau toh kilem masaphot inla, huzoh chiangin hung inla, na silpiaah diing chu laan in.

Na langpa toh lampi a na chiah laiin kilem zoh in, huchilou inchu na langpa’n vaihawmtu ahung mansah diing a, huleh vaihawmtu’n thuneitulian kawmah ahung pekhe diing a, thuneitulian in suangkul ah ahung khum kha diing hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, paisa san khat tan a na piaah kim masiah hu apatin na pawtdoh het sih diing hi.
“Malai mite kawma, ‘Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi. Koipouh numei enlahtaha entu in a lungsim in amahnu toh aang akawm zouta ahi.
Huleh na mit jiatlam in ahung puuhsah leh kheidoh inla paai mei in. Ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmun a paih ahih saangin na tahsa peeng khat manthaai chu nang diingin ahoihjaw hi.
Huleh na khut jiatlam in ahung kipuuhsah leh saattan inla paai mei in. Ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmun a paih ahih saangin na tahsa peeng khat manthaai chu nang diingin ahoihjaw hi.
“‘Mi koipouh in a ji akhuul leh khuulna lehkha pia heh,’ daan in anachi hi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, koipouh in mi toh lupkhawm jiah hiloua a ji akhuul leh, amahnu chu a-aangkawmsah a, huleh koipouh hu khuulsanu kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi.
“Huchiangleh malai mite kawma, ‘Dihloutahin kihaahsial sih un. Amahvaang na kihaahsialnate Lalpa kawmah taangtun jaw in,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, kihaahsial mawngmawng sih un, vaan louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu Pathian laltouphah ahi.
Huleh lei louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu hichu a keeng ngahna ahi. Huleh Jerusalem louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu hichu Kumpipa loupitah khopi ahi.
Na lutang louin kihaahsial sin, ajiahchu samjang khat zong na kaang sahin na vomsah thei sih hi.
Hizongleh ‘Hi’ na chih uh chu ‘Hi’ hi heh, huleh ‘Hilou’ na chih uh chu ‘Hilou’ hi heh. Ajiahchu hi vaal chu giloupa apat hung pawt ahi.
“‘Mit luanga mit, ha luanga ha,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, migilou chu kikhinpih sih un, koipouh in na ngeiphe jiatlam abeh leh, a lehlam zong doh jaw in.
Huleh mi koipouh in vaihawmna mun a ahung pui a na puannaah laah atup leh, na puannaah tual zong lasah ngaal in.
Mi koipouh meel khat chiah diinga hung phuut photmah kawmah amah toh meel nih chiah khawm un.
Na kawma hung ngeentu chu pia inla, huleh ahung thunglaah uut chu kiheimangsan sin.
“‘Na innveengte lungsiat inla, na meelmate hua in,’ chia anakisoi daan chu na jata uhi.

Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, haamsia hung lohte vangpiaah unla, ahung mudahte diingin sil hoih bawlsah un. Huleh ahung bawlsete leh ahung suduhdahte diingin haamteisah un.
Huchiin na Pa uh vaan a um tate na hi thei diing uhi. Ajiahchu Ama’n migiloute leh mihoihte tungah ni asuaahsah a, huleh midihtatte leh midihtatloute tungah zong guah ajusah hi.
Ajiahchu nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uh leh, kipaahman bang ahiai na muh diing uh? Siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawlve hilou ahi viaimah?
Huleh na unaute uh chauh chibai na buuh uh leh, midang saanga bang ahiai na bawl tam tuan uh? Siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawlve hilou ahi viaimah?
Hujiahin vaan a um na Pa uh ahoih bukim mahbangin nanguh zong hoih bukim un.
“Mi na panpihna va na sil hoih bawlte uh mi muh diinga a ma va bawl lou diingin pilvaang un. Huchilou inchu na Pa uh vaan a um kawmah muh diing kipaahman na nei sih diing uhi.

Hujiahin mi gentheite kawma sil na piaah chiangun milepchiahte’n mi phat aloh theihna diingva sinagogte bang leh kholai kotzingte bang a ahih veu bangun, na ma vah peengkuul muut sih un. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuzouta uhi.
Hujiahin nang chu mi kawma sil na piaah chiangin, na khut jiatlam hih chu na khut veilam hesah sin.
Huchiin na silpiaah chu aguuha pia na hi diing a, huleh na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.

“Huleh na haamtei chiangun milepchiahte bangin na hih diing uh ahi sih. Ajiahchu amah un mi’n amuh theihna diingin sinagogte leh kotzing ningkawite bang a dingin ahaamtei uut sese uhi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuta uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu na haamtei chiangin na pindan sungah luut inla, na kot khaah inla, aguuha um na Pa kawmah haamtei in. Huchiin na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.
Hizongleh na haamtei chiangun Jentelte bangin umjebeiin na soisa uh soi nonnon sih un, ajiahchu amah un chu ahaam tam jiahva jaaha um diingin akingaihtuah uhi.
“Hujiahin amahuh bang sih un, ajiahchu na Pa un a kawma na nget maun bang silte ahiai na mamoh uh ahe hi.
Hujiahin nanguh chu hichibangin haamtei un: ka Pa uh vaan a um, na min kizahtaat heh.
“Na lalgam hung tung heh. Na deihjawng vaan a akibawl bangin lei ah zong kibawl heh.
“Ka niteng neehkhop uh ni chinin hung pia in.
“Ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam bang un, ka batte uh hung ngaidam in.
“Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, huleh giloupa apat hung hunkhe jaw in. Ajiahchu lalgamte, silbawltheihnate, loupinate, kumtuanga nang a ahih jiahin, Amen, chiin.
“Mi a tatsualnate uh na ngaihdam uh leh, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong nanguh ahung ngaihdam diing hi.
Hizongleh mi na ngaihdam louh uh leh vaan a um na Pa un zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaihdam sih diing hi.

“Huleh an na ngawl chiangun milepchiahte bangin ngui meel po sih un. Amah un chu an ngawla akilat theihna diingun a maaisuah uh atuamsah veu uhi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuta uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu an na ngawl chiangin na lu sathau nuh inla, na maai phiat in.
Huchia na Pa aguuha um mitmuh ah loungaal mihing mitmuh a an ngawl na bat louhna diingin; huleh na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaah tahin ahung dit diing hi.
“Leikha leh tuieeh in aneehsiatna ah leh gutate’n akalhsiat va, aguuh theihna uh lei ah gou kikhol sih unla,
hizongleh leikha leh tuieeh in aneehsiat louhna leh gutate’n akalhsiat va, aguuh louhna uh vaan ah gou kikhol jaw un.
Ajiahchu na gou uh umna phot ah na lungsim uh zong aum diing hi.
“Sapum vaahna thaumei chu mit ahi. Hujiahin na mit ahoih chiangin na sapum avaah veh diing hi.
Hizongleh na mit ahoih louh inchu, na sapum avehin amial diing hi. Hujiahin na sunga vaah chu mial hitaleh, hu mial chu nasa namei in chia!
“Mi koima in pu nih nna atong kop thei sih hi, ajiahchu khat huain khat alungsiat diing hi, ahihlouhleh khat gumin khat amusit diing hi. Pathian nna leh sum nna na tong khawm thei sih diing uhi.

“Hujiahin na kawmvah ka hung hilh ahi, bang ahiai ka neeh diing, bang ahiai ka dawn diing, chiin na hinna diingun lunghimoh sih un; bang ahiai ka silh a, ka teen diing, chiin na tahsa uh diingin lunghimoh saam sih un. Neeh diing saangin hinna aluuljaw sih in, huleh silh leh teen saangin tahsa aluuljaw sih eimah?

Tungleeng vate en un, buh atuh sih va, aat zong aat sih va, buhinn ah zong asung luut sih uhi. Ahihvaangin na Pa uh vaan a um in amahuh avaah hi. Nanguh chu amahuh saanga nasataha luuljaw hilou na hi viaimah?
Nanguh lahah koi in ahiai lunghihmoh jiaha a dung tong khat a behlap thei?
“Huleh silhleteen thu a bang diinga lunghimoh na hi viai? Gam a lili paahte khandaan ngaihtuah un, tong lah atonggim sih va, pat zong akheeh sih uhi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Solomon ngeei zong a loupina zousiah a akizepin hi lili paahte khat tuhin zong jepmawi ahi zou sih hi.
Huchia gam a hampa tunia hing a, jiing a meikhuuh a paihluut diing bawn Pathian in ahuchijep leh, Aw nanguh ginna haatloute, Ama’n nanguh hu saangin ahung jeemjaw tham sih diaimah?
“Hujiahin, ‘Bang ahiai i neeh diing?’ ahihlouhleh ‘Bang ahiai i dawn diing?’ ahihlouhleh ‘Bang ahiai i silh diing?’ chiin lunghimoh sih un.
Ajiahchu Jentelte’n hi silte zousiah lawptahin ahawl va, hi silte zousiah na mamoh uh chih na Pa uh vaan a um in ahe hi.
Hizongleh nang un chu Pathian lalgam leh a dihtatna hawl masa un, huleh hi silte zousiah piaahbeh na hi diing uhi.
Hujiahin jiing a diingin lunghimoh sih un. Ajiahchu jiingin amah a diing ahung kingaihtuah tawm diing hi. Ni khat a buaina chu a ni a diingin ahuntawh ahi.
“Demsiata na um louhna diingun mi demse sih un.
Ajiahchu na demsiat bangmah un demsiatin na um diing va, huleh na tehna bangmah un ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi.
Bang diinga na mit a singtum ngaihtuah lou a, na unau mit a niinthem um muthei na hiai?
Ahihlouhleh ngai in, nang mit ngeei ah singtum aum a bangchiin ahiai na unau kawma, ‘Na mit a niinthem hung lakhesah in,’ na chih theih diing?
Nang milepchiah, na mit apat singtum chu lakhe masa in. Huchiin na unau mit a niinthem laahdoh diing chu chiangtahin na mu thei diing hi.

“Uite kawmah silsiangthou pe sih unla, voh ma ah zong na tuikep suang uh paai sih un. Huchilou inchu amah un hute chu a keeng un achilse diing va, huleh hung kiheiin nanguh ahung philjaah kha diing uhi.
“Ngeen un, piaahin na um diing uh; hawl un, na mu diing uh; kiu un, honsahin na um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu angeen taphot in atang va, ahawl taphot in amu va, huleh a kiu taphot chu honsahin aum diing hi.
Huleh na lahvah koi in ahiai a tapa in tanghou ngeen henla hileh, suang pe diing?
Ahihlouhleh nga ngeen henla hileh, guul pe diing?
Huchi ahihleh, nanguh migilou in bawn na tate uh sil hoih piaahnataang na heet uh leh, na Pa uh vaan a um in a kawma ngeente sil hoih naahpiaah tham lou diing ahiai mah!
“Hujiahin sil zousiah mi’n na tungva abawl diing na deih photmah uh, nang un zong hutobangin a tungvah bawl un, ajiahchu huchu Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thuhilh ahi.
“Kot geeng ah luut un, ajiahchu manthaaina lam a paina chu a kot agol a, a lampi zong alian hi. Huleh hutah a luutte chu tam zong atam uhi.
Ajiahchu hinna a chiahna kot chu ageeng a, a lampi zong ahahsa a, huleh a mute zong atawm uhi.
“Zawlnei tahlou, na lahva belaam vun silha hung, hizongleh a sunglam va ngei hangsantah hingaalte lahah pilvaang un.
Amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi. Mi’n lingnoh lahah grep gah alou ngei viai mah, ahihlouhleh lingkung ah zong theipi alou ngei viaimah?
Huchibangmahin singkung hoih photmah in gah hoih asuang jeel a, hizongleh singkung sia photmah in gah hoih lou asuang veu hi.
Singkung hoih in gah hoihlou asuang thei sih a, singkung sia in zong gah hoih asuang thei boh sih hi.
Gah hoih lou suang singkung photmah chu aphuuh va, mei ah apaai uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi.
“‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ hung chi zousiah nazong vaan lalgam ah aluut sih diing uhi. Hizongleh ka Pa vaan a um deihjawng bawlte chu aluut diing uhi.
Hu ni chiangleh mi tampi’n, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa, na min in thu ka soilawh uh hilou ahiaimah? Na min in dawite ka nohdoh un, na min in silmah bawltheihna ka nei uh hilou ahiaimah?’ achi diing uhi.
Huchiangin ke’n a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh bangchihmahin ka hung he ngei sih hi. Nanguh daan poisaloua gamta haw, ka kawm apatin chiah mang un!’ ka chi diing hi.
“Hujiahin koipouh hi ka thusoite ja a, jui chu mipil suangpi tunga inn bawl toh ka tehkhin diing hi.
Guah ahung ju a, tui ahung lian a, huih ahung nung a, hu inn chu haattahin ahung muut hi. Himahleh suangpi tunga leptouh ahih jiahin apuuh sih.
“Huleh mi koipouh hi ka thusoite ja a, juilou photmah chu sehneel tunga inn bawl mingol toh ka tehkhin diing hi.
Guah ahung ju a, tui ahung lian a, huih ahung nung a, hu inn chu haattahin ahung muut a, apuuhta hi. Huleh hu inn apuuhdaan chu anasa ngeel hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hite asoi zohin mipite’n a thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n daanjilsahtute bang hi louin, thuneitah bangin amahuh thu ahilh hi.
Huleh taang apat ahung pai suhin mipi nasatahin Amah ajui uhi.
Huleh en in, mi phaah khat a kawmah ahung a, a ma a bohkhupin chibai abuuh a, “Lalpa, na uut inchu, na hung susiangthou thei hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a khut a zamin amah chu akhoih a, “Ka uut hi, siangthouta in,” achi hi. Huin aphaah chu asiang pah ngaal hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Koimah na hilh louh diing ahi, hizongleh chiah inla siampu vakimusah in, huleh amahuh heetsahna diinga Mosi thupiaah silpiaah lat diing chu valaan in,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu Kapernaum a aluut in, a kawmah sepaih zahoutu khat ahung a, Amah ahung ngeen a,
“Lalpa, ka suaahpa chu jengin inn ah alum a, nasatahin suhnatin aum hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka hung diinga ka sudam diing,” achi hi.
Himahleh sepaih zahoutu’n adawng a, “Lalpa, ka innsung na hung luut diing chu ka chin sih hi. Himahleh thu chauh soi in, huchiin ka suaahpa chu adam mei diing hi.

Ajiahchu kei zong thuneihna nuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte aum uhi. Huleh khat kawmah, ‘Chiah in,’ ka chih leh achiah a, adang kawmah, ‘Hung in,’ ka chih leh ahung hi; huleh ka suaahpa kawmah, ‘Hi bawl in,’ ka chih leh abawl jeel hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n hi thu ajaah tahin limdang asa a, huleh Amah juite kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Israelte lahah zong hichilawma ginna haat ka mu kha sih hi.
Huleh ka hung hilh ahi, suahlam leh tumlam apatin mi tampi ahung diing va, vaan lalgam ah Abraham, Isak leh Jakob toh atou khawm diing uhi.
Hizongleh lalgam tate chu polam mial ah paihdohin aum diing uhi. Hutah ah chu kah leh hagawi aum diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n sepaih zahoutu kawmah, “Chiahta in, na gintaat bangin na tungah hung tungta heh,” achi hi. Huleh a suaahpa chu hu daah mahin adamta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu Peter inn sunga ahung luutin, a sungnu khosih a lum amu hi.
Huin Ama’n amahnu khut akhoih a, huin a khosih in anuseta hi. Huin amahnu chu ahung thou a, a nna uh atohsahta hi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin a kawmah dawipaai tampi ahung pui va, Ama’n thu in dawite anohdoh a, damlou zousiah asudamta hi,
huchia zawlnei Isai in, “Amah ngeei in i haatlouhnate ala a, i natnate apua hi,” chia asoi chu ataangtun theihna diingin.
Huin Jesu’n a kiimveel a mipi nasatah amuhin, diil gaal lehlam a chiah diing thu apia hi.
Huchiin daanjilsahtu khat ahung a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, na chiahna phot ah ka hung jui diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Si-aalte’n kua anei va, tungleeng vate’n bu anei uhi. Hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n a lu ngahna diing mun anei sih,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite laha midang khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, va chiaha ka pa vavui hung phalsah masa phot in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hung jui in, misite’n a misi uh kivui uh heh,” achi hi.
Huleh kuang tunga atuan in, a nungjuite’n Amah ajui uhi.
Huleh ngai in, diil ah huihpi nasatahin anung a, hu tuikinawh in kuang chu ahung tuum a, hizongleh Amah chu a-ihmu hi.
Huin a nungjuite chu a kawma hungin Amah aphawng va, “Lalpa, hung hundoh in! Beimang diing ka hi uh!” achi uhi.
Huin Ama‘n a kawmvah, “Ginna haatloute haw, bang diinga lau na hi viai?” achi hi. Huin athou a, huihpi leh diil chu ataai a, ahung daaikeeita hi.
Huin mite’n chu limdang asa mahmah va, “Huih leh diil nasan in a thu amang uh hi Pa hi bangchibang mi ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huleh diil gaal lehlam Gadara mite gam atunin, dawipaai mi nih haante apat hungin Amah ahung tuaah va, a gilou huaisia mahmah va, hujiahin hu lam chu koimah in atawn thei sih uhi.
Huleh thakhatin amah un, “Jesu, nang Pathian Tapa, keiuh leh nang in bang kizopna i nei viai? Hun chiam tunma a keiuh gawt diinga hitaha hung na hi maw?” chiin akikou uhi.
Huleh a umna vapat gamla sim ah voh hon tampi ataa uhi.
Huchiin dawite’n a kawma ngeenin, “Na hung nohdoh leh, voh hon sunga luut hung phalsah in,” achi uhi.

Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Chiah un,” achi hi. Huchiin amahuh chu ahung doh va voh hon sungah aluut uhi. Huleh thakhatin, hu voh hon chu kawl ah ataai khesuh va diil ah ataai luut va, hu tui ah asigamta uhi.
Huin achingtute ataai va, khopi ah achiah va, sil zousiah leh dawipaai tunga sil hung tungte bang ahilhta uhi.
Huleh ngai un, a kho pumpiun Jesu mu diingin ahung pawt va; huleh Amah amuh tahun, a gam vapat pawt diingin nasatahin angeen uhi.
Huin Amah chu kuang sunga luutin agaalkaai a, Amah ngeei khopi ah aluutta hi.
Huin ngai in, mijeng lupna a lum khat a kawmah ahung jawng uhi. Huleh Jesu’n a ginna uh amuhin jeng a damloupa kawmah, “Tapa, hamuangtahin um in, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Huleh daanjilsahtute khenkhat in a lungsim un, “Hi Pa’n Pathian asoisia hi,” chiin angaihtuah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh chu hein, “Bang diinga na lungtang va silgilou ngaihtuah na hi viai?
Ajiahchu, ‘Na sualte ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh ‘Thou inla, keeng in chiahta in,’ chih khoi abaihlam jaw ei?

Hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna diing thuneihna anei chih na heetna diingun,” achi a, huin jeng a damloupa kawmah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah chiahta in,” achi hi.
Huin amah chu athou a, a inn ah achiahta hi.
Mipite’n huchu amuh tahun thumah asa va, huchibang thuneihna mihingte kawma petu Pathian apaahtawita uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu hu apat apai laiin, mi khat a min Mathai siahdonna mun a toulai amu a, a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi a, huin Mathai chu athou a Amah ajuita hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu chu an ne diinga inn a atou laiin, en in, siahdongtu tampi leh misualte tampi hung in Amah leh a nungjuite toh ankuang auum khawm uhi.
Huleh Pharisaite’n huchu amuh tahun a nungjuite kawmah, “Bang diinga na houtupa un siahdongte leh misualte toh an ne khawm ahiai?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n huchu ajaah tahin a kawmvah, “Mi chidamte’n daktor amamoh sih va, hizongleh damloute’n amamoh uhi.

Hizongleh chiah unla, ‘Kithoihna deihlouin khotuahna ka deih hi,’ chih umjia vajil un. Ajiahchu midihtatte kou diinga hung ka hi sih a, himahleh misualte kisiihsah diinga koua hung ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin Johan nungjuite a kawmah ahung va, “Keiuh leh Pharisaite’n an ngawl ung a, hizongleh bang diinga na nungjuite’n angawl louh uh ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Moupa a kawmva aum laisiah moupuite adah ngei uh maw? Hizongleh moupa a lah vapat a laahmang ni ahung tung diing a, hu chiangin an angawl diing uhi.
Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in aphoh ngei sih uhi. Ajiahchu a phohna thah in puan lui chu akaikeeh diing a, huleh ahung keehjaw seem diing hi.

Mi koimah in uain thah savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih uhi. Huchilou inchu savun thawlte chu apawhkeeh diing a, uain akibo diing a, savun thawlte zong asegawp diing hi. Hujiahin uain thah chu savun thawl thah ah athun jaw va, huchiin anihun abit tuaah hi,” achi hi.

Hi silte Ama’n a kawmva asoi laiin, ngai in, vaihawmtu khat ahung a, a ma a bohkhupin chibai ahung buuh a, “Ka tanu tutahin asi hi, hizongleh hung inla a tungah na khut nga lehchin ahing mei diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu chu athou a, Amah leh a nungjuite’n hu mipa chu ajuita uhi.
Huleh ngai in, numei khat kum sawmlenih sipawt a damlou, a nung ah ahung pai a, a puan mong akhoih hi.
Ajiahchu amahnu’n a lungsim in, “A puan chauh khoih leng, suhdamin ka um mei diing,” chiin angaihtuah hi.
Huin Jesu chu akinunghei a, amahnu amu a, “Tanu, hamuangtahin um in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi,” achi hi. Huleh hu numeinu chu hu daah apat adamta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu vaihawmtupa inn sungah aluut a, theile kimuut leh mipi maau vengvung amu a,
a kawmvah, “Pawtdoh un, ajiahchu naupangnu chu asi ahi sih a, ihmu ahijaw,” achi hi. Huin Amah anuihsan giap uhi.
Mipite sawldoha aum nungin aluut a, huleh amahnu chu a khut in atu a, huchiin naupangnu chu ahung thouta hi.
Huin hi thu chu hu gam pumpi ah athangsuaahta hi.
Huleh Jesu hutah apat apawtin, mittaw nih in ajui va, “David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou uhi.
Huleh inn sunga aluut tahin, hu mittawte chu a kawmah ahung va, huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hikhu bawl theiin na hung gingta uh maw?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Gingta e, Lalpa,” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a mit uh akhoih a, “Na ginna bangun na tungvah tungta heh,” achi hi.
Huleh a mit uh ahung vaahta a, huin Jesu’n, “Koimah hesah sih un,” chiin amahuh naahtahin akhapta hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu apawt va, hu gam pumpi ah a min asoithangta uhi.
Huchia amahuh apawt laiun, en in, mi haam theilou dawipaai khat Amah kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Huleh dawi chu anohdoh tahin, haam theiloupa chu ahung haamta hi. Huin mipite’n thumah asa mahmah va, “Israel gam ah hitobang sil akimu ngei sih,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisaite’n chu, “Amah in dawimangpa jaala dawite anohdoh ahi,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu chu khopi leh khota zousiah ah avaah kiimveel a, sinagogte bang ah thu ahilh a, lalgam tanchinpha chu soiin, damlouhna chinteng leh natna chinteng asudam hi.
Huleh Ama’n mipite amuhin achingtu bei belaam hon banga chau leh kithehdalha aum jiahun alainat mahmah hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Buh laah diing atam mahmah a, hizongleh a natongtute atawm uhi.
Hujiahin a buh la diinga natongtute hung sawldoh diingin buh neitu Lalpa kawmah ngeen un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a nungjui sawmlenihte akouh zohin, a kawmvah hagau niinte nohdoh theihna leh damlouhna chinteng leh natna chinteng suhdam theihna thuneihna apia hi.
Huleh apostol sawmlenihte min chu hite ahi: amasapeenin Peter kichipa Simon leh a sanggampa Andru, Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan,
Philip leh Bartholomai, Thomas leh siahdongtu Mathai, Alphai tapa Jakob leh Lebbai, a min dang chu Thaddai.
Kanaan mi Simon leh Amah mansahtu Juda Iskariot.
Hi sawmlenihte chu Jesu’n hi thu piain asawldoh a, “Jentelte lahah chiah sih unla, Samariate khopi khatmah ah zong luut hial sih un.
Hizongleh Israel innkuan belaam mangte kawmah chiah jaw un.
Na chiah kawm-un, ‘Vaan lalgam anaita hi,’ chiin taangkoupih un.
Damloute sudam unla, phaahte susiang unla, misite kaithou unla, dawite nohdoh un. Athawnin na mu va, athawnin pia un.
Na dangka-ip sung vah, sana, dangka ahihlouhleh sumeng bangma guang sih un.
Na zinna va diingin sakhau aha, puannaah nih aha, keengtophah aha, chiang aha keng sih un, ajiahchu natongtu chu a neeh diing mu taah ahi.
Huleh khopi sung hiin khota sung hitaleh, na luutna phot vah na tunna taah diing uh mi kandoh unla, na chiahkhiah masiah uh hutah ah umzing un.
Huchia inn sung khat a na luut chiangun chibai buuh un.
Hu inn chu na tunna taah uh ahihleh, na hamuanna uh chu a tungah um heh. Himahleh hu inn sung in ataah louh leh, na hamuanna uh chu na kawmvah hung kihkiit hen.
Koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih lou a, na thute uh ngaikhe lou chu hu inn aha, hu khopi aha apat na pawt chiangun, na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin hu khopi thuaah diing saangin Sodom leh Gomorrah thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.
Ngai in, ngei hon laha belaam bangin ka hung sawl ahi. Hujiahin guul bangin pil unla, vakhu banga poikhoihlouin um un.
“Hizongleh mite lahah kiveeng un, ajiahchu amah un vaihawmte kawmah ahung pedoh diing va huleh sinagogte bang ah ahung vosah diing uhi.
Huleh keimah jiahin gamoptute leh kumpipate ma ah, amahuh leh Jentelte ma ah heetpihtu diingin ahung pui diing uhi.
Hizongleh ahung piaahkhiah chiangun bangchi soi diing ahihlouhleh bang soi diing ka hiai, chiin lunghimoh sih un. Ajiahchu na soi diing uh hu huntahin hilh na hi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu a soitu chu nanguh na hi sih diing va, na Pa uh Hagau in nanguh ah asoi jaw diing hi.
Sanggampa in sanggampa, huleh pa in a ta thah diingin apedoh diing a, huleh tate’n zong a nulepate uh adou diing va, athatsah diing uhi.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huat na hi diing uhi. Hizongleh atawp donga thuaah mualsuaah chu hutdamin aum diing uhi.
Hizongleh khopi khat a ahung suhduhdah chiangun, adang ah taailuut un. Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa hung main Israel khopite na tuan suaah sih diing uhi.
Nungjui chu a houtupa tungah aum ngei sih a, suaah zong a pu tungah aum ngei sih hi.
Nungjui chu a houtupa banga ahung um a, huleh suaah chu a pu banga ahung um ahuntawh ahi. Amah un inn neitupa bawn Beelzebul achih uh leh, a innkote chu bangchituhin ahiai achihtaah diing uh!
“Hujiahin amahuh haw lau sih un. Ajiahchu kilang lou diinga kiphual bangma aum sih a, huleh heetlouh diinga iim zong bangmah aum sih hi.
Mial a nanguh ka hung hilh chu vaah ah soi unla, huleh na bil kawmva na jaah uh chu inntungvuumte ah taangkoupih un.
Huleh tahsa that thei a himahleh hagau that theilou haw chu lau sih un. Hizongleh hagau leh tahsa a nih a gawtmun a sumang theitu Amah chu lau jaw un.
Kawlgiit nih paisa khat in akijuaah veu hilou maw? Ahihvaangin a lahva khatmah zong na Pa uh phalna louin ake sih diing hi.
Hizongleh na lutung va samjangte nasan sim veh ahi.
Hujiahin lau sih un, kawlgiit tampi saangin na luuljaw uh ahi.
Hujiahin koipouh mite ma a kei hung gum photmah chu, ke’n zong vaan a um ka Pa ma ah amah ka gum diing hi.
Hizongleh koipouh mite ma a hung kiheetmohbawl chu, ke’n zong vaan a um ka Pa ma ah ka kiheetmohbawl diing hi.
“Leitung a lemna leengsah diinga hung hungsa sih un. Lemna leengsah diinga hung ka hi sih a, naamsau leengsah diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
Ajiahchu ‘tapa in a pa, tanu in a nu, huleh mou in a innpinu dousah diinga’ hung ka hijaw hi;
huleh ‘mi a meelma chu amah innkote ngeei ahi diing hi.’
Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha keimah saanga lungsiat jaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi. A tapa aha, a tanu aha keimah saanga lungsiat jaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi.
Koipouh a kros pua a, hung jui lou chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi.
Koipouh a hinna mu in ataan diing a, huleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in amu diing hi.
“Koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih ahi a, huleh koipouh keimah hung kipaahpih chu kei hung sawlpa kipaahpih ahi.
Koipouh zawlnei chu zawlnei ahih jiaha kipaahpih in zawlnei kipaahman amu diing hi. Huleh midihtat chu midihtat ahih jiaha kipaahpih in midihtat kipaahman amu diing hi.
Huleh chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh nungjuitu khat min a hi mi neute laha khat tuisih nou khat mei chauh zong petu in chu a kipaahman muh diing chu ataan hial sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a nungjui sawmlenihte kawma thu ahilh zohin, a khopite va thuhilh diing leh thusoi diingin achiahdohta hi.
Huin Johan in suangkul sung apat Khrist natohte anajaah tahin, amah nungjuite nih asawl a,
a kawmah, “Ahung diingpa na hiai mah, ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?” avachisah hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chiah unla, na jaah uh leh na muh uh Johan vahilh un:
mittawte mit ahung vaahta a, keengbaite apaitheita va, phaahte ahung siangta va, bilngongte’n khua ajatheita va, misite kaihthohin aumta va, huleh migentheite kawmah tanchinpha soiin aumta hi.
Huleh koipouh keimah a kipalpuuh lou chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amahuh achiah tahun, Jesu’n mipi kawmah Johan tungtaang thu asoi panta a, “Bang en diinga gamdaai a chiahdoh na hi viai? Sialluang huih muut liing maw?
Ahihlouhleh bang en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Puan neem silh mi khat maw? Tahzetin, puan neem silhte chu kumpipate inn ah ahi aum uh.
Ahihlouhleh bangpeen en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Zawlnei en diingin maw? Ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei saanga loupijaw ahi.
Ajiahchu, ‘Ngai in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi asial diing hi,’ chia a tungthu kigial chu amah ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, numei sunga piang lahah Baptistu Johan saanga loupijaw apiang nai sih hi. Ahihvaangin vaan lalgam a mi neupeen chu amah saangin aloupijaw hi.
Huleh Baptistu Johan apat tutanin vaan lalgam in hiamngamna athuaah a, hiamngamte’n thagum in ala uhi.
Ajiahchu Zawlneite Lehkhabute zousiah leh Daan thu in Johan hung um tanphain anasoilawhta hi.
Hi silte nang un na pom nuam uh leh, Johan ngeei chu ahung diing Elijah chu ahi.
Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh.
“Hizongleh hi khang hi bang toh ka tehkaah diai? Hichu naupang dawlmun a toua a lawmte kou a,
‘Theile hung muutsah ung a, lah laam lou uh chin a; huleh kahla sa ung a, lah kapin na hung maau pih sih uh,’ chite bang ahi uh.
Ajiahchu Johan ahung a, nein adawn sih a; huleh amah un, ‘Dawi nei ahi,’ achi uhi.
Mihing Tapa ahung a, anein adawn a, amah un, ‘En un, an haipa leh uain haipa, siahdongte leh misualte lawmpa!’ achi uh. Huleh pilna chu adih ahi chih a natohte’n siam atan hi,” chiin.
Huin akisiih louh jiahun, a silmahbawl tamna peen khopite chu ataaita hi.
“Korazin, na tung agih hi! Bethsaida, na tung agih hi! Ajiahchu nanguh a silmah kibawlte Tura leh Sidon khua a kibawl hileh, sawtin saiip puan silha vut khuhin akisiih zouta diing uhi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin nanguh thuaah diing saangin Tura leh Sidon thuaah diing adaan aum jaw diing hi.
Huleh nang Kapernaum, vaan tan a tawisanga um chu, Misi Khua tan a paihkhiahin na um diing hi, ajiahchu nangmah a silmah kibawlte Sodom a kibawl hileh, tuni tanin aum nalai diing hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin nang thuaah diing saangin Sodom thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing,” achi hi.
Huchihlaiin Jesu’n asoi a, “Pa Aw, lei leh vaan Lalpa, nangma’n mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naupangte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung paahtawi hi.
Ahi, a, huchibang chu na kipaahna mahmah ahi.

Ka Pa’n sil zousiah ka kawmah ahung pekheta hi; huleh Pa chauh louin koima’n Tapa chu ahe sih uhi. Tapa chauh louin koima’n Pa ahe sih a, huleh Tapa’n a kawma aphuan nuamnate loungaal chu koima’n ahe sih hi.
Nanguh tonggim leh puaahgih pote zousiah ka kawmah hung un, keima’n khawldamna ka hung pe diing hi.
Ka ngawngkol pua unla, ka kawmah jil un, ajiahchu jaineemtah leh lungtang a kingaingiamtah ka hi a, huchiin na hagau diingun khawldamna na mu diing uhi.
Ajiahchu ka ngawngkol anuam a, ka puaah zong ajaang hi,” achi hi.
Huchihlaiin Jesu chu Sabbath ni in buhlei lai tawnin achiah hi. Huleh a nungjuite a gil uh akial a, buhvuite asihtan va ane panta uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisaite’n hichu amuhun a kawmah, “En in, na nungjuite’n Sabbath ni in daan in aphallouh abawl uh,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “David in agilkial laia a kawma umte toh asilbawl uh,
huchia Pathian inn a aluut a, amah leh a kawma umte’n daan in aphallouh siampute chauh neeh theih tanghou siah aneeh uh thu sim kha lou na hi viaimah?
Ahihlouhleh Sabbath ni a Pathian biahinn a siampute’n Sabbath ni asuhbuaahun zong siamlouh atang sih uh chih Daanbu ah na sim sih uh maw?
Hizongleh hi mun ah Pathian biahinn saanga loupijaw khat aum hi chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Ahihvaangin nang un, ‘Kithoihna deih louin zahngaihna ka deih,’ chih umjia heta hileh uh chin, mohna neilou chu siamlouhtangsah lou diing hi uh chin a.
Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu Sabbath ni Lalpa ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah chu hutah apatin achiah a, sinagog ah aluut hi.
Huleh en in, hutah ah mi khut jeng khat aum a, huchia amah un aheeh theihna diingun, “Sabbath ni a suhdam asiang ei?” chiin Amah adong uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na lahva kuan ahiai belaam khat nei henla, huleh Sabbath ni in kokhuuh ah keta leh, huchu vatu lou diing leh kaidoh lou diing um?
Huchi ahihchiangin belaam saanga mihing chu bangchitaha luuljaw atai mah? Hujiahin Sabbath ni a sil hoih bawl asiang hi,” achi hi.
Huin hupa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Huchiin azandoh a, a langkhat bangin ahung damta hi.
Huzohin Pharisaite apawt va, Amah suhlup theihna diing ngaihtuahin akihouta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hichu aheetin hu apatin apaidohta hi. Huleh mipi nasatahin Amah ajui va, huleh Ama’n anasudam veh hi.
Huleh Amah koi ahiai chih phuangdoh lou diingin amahuh athuhilh hi.
Huchu zawlnei Isai in hichibanga anasoite ahung taangtun theihna diingin ahi:
“En in, ka suaah ka teel, ka deihtah chu! Amah ah ka lungkim mahmah hi! Ka Hagau a tungah ka koih diing a, Ama’n Jentelte kawmah vaihawmna dih thu asoi diing hi.
Ama’n chu anial sih diing a, kikou zong akikou sih diing hi. Huleh mi koimah in kholai dung ah a aw aja sih diing uh.
Ama’n gualzou diinga vaihawmna dih ahung tut masiah sialluang gawpsa asutan sih diing a, pat meikhu zong asumit sih diing hi.
Huleh Amah min ah Jentelte’n kinepna anei diing uh,” achih chu.
Huin dawipaai, mittaw leh haamtheilou khat Jesu kawmah ahung pui va, Ama’n anasudam a, huchiin haamtheilou chu hung haamtheiin khua ahung muta hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah in thumah asa va, “Hi Pa hi David Tapa ahi diai maw?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisaite’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Hi Pa’n dawimangpa Beelzebul jiah loungaalin dawite anohdoh sih diing,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Lalgam kilangkhena amah leh amah kidou photmah chu amangthaai hi. Huleh khopi aha inn sung aha kilangkhen zong ading thei sih diing hi.
Huleh Setan in Setan mah nohdohta leh, amah leh amah kidoua kikhen ahita hi; ahihleh bangchiin a lalgam adingta diai?
Huleh keima’n Beelzebul jaala dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, na tapate un koi jaala anohdoh uh ahiai? Hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n Pathian Hagau vaanga dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, Pathian lalgam chu na tungvah hung tung ahita hi.
Mi koimah in mihaatpa akaantom masat louhngaal leh, bangchiin mi haatpa inn a luutin a neihlelamte alaahsah thei diai? A kaantom nung chiangin a neihlelamte alaahsah mei diing hi.
Koipouh ka lama pang lou chu ahung dou ahi, huleh koipouh ahung laahkhawmpih lou in asudalh ahi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, mi a sualna zousiah uh leh Pathian asoisiatna zousiah uh ngaihdam ahi diing uhi. Hizongleh Hagau soisia chu ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
Huleh koipouh Mihing Tapa kalha thusoi chu ngaihdam ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu hi hun ah zong, huleh hun hung um kiit diing ah zong ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
“Singkung enkol hoih leh uh chin, a gah zong ahoih diing, ahihlouhleh singkung bawlse leh uh chin, a gah ase diing hi; ajiahchu singkung chu a gah apat heet ahi.
Guul suante haw! Na giitlouh pum-un bangchiin thu hoih na soi thei diviai? Ajiahchu lungtang dolh vaal chu kam in asoi veu hi.
Mi hoih in lungtang goubawm hoih apatin sil hoihte ahung suahkhia hi. Huleh migilou in a lungtang goubawm hoihlou apatin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhe veu hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, mite’n thulimlou asoi photmah uh vaihawm ni chiangin ajiah asoi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu na thusoi in siamtansahin na um diing a, na thusoi mah in siamlouh tansahin na um diing,” achi hi.
Huin Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute hunkhop in adawng va, “Houtupa, nangmah apatin chiamchihna ka mu nuam uh,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Khang gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna ahawl uhi. Hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Jonah suun thum leh jaan thum ngapi gil sunga aum bangin, Mihing Tapa zong suun thum leh jaan thum leigil sungah aum diing hi.

Ninevi khua a mite chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing va amahuh siamlouh atangsah diing uhi, ajiahchu Jonah thusoi jiahin amahuh akisiih uhi. Huleh en un, Jonah saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.

Huleh simlam kumpinu chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing a, hi khang a mite chu siamlouh atangsah diing hi, ajiahchu Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin kawlmong apat ahung hi. Huleh en un, Solomon saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
“Huleh hagau niin chu mi khat sung apat apawtdohin tui um louhna mun chin ah khawlna diing hawlin avaah lehleh a, amu zou sih hi.
Huin ama’n, ‘Ka pawtdohna inn mah ah ka kihkiit mei diing,’ achi hi. Huchia ahung tahin huchu a-awng a, phiatsiang leh zephoihin amu hi.

Huin avachiah a, amah saanga gilou jaw dawi dang sagih ahung pui a, a sungah aluut va, ateengta uhi. Huin hupa umdaan nunung chu amasa saangin asejaw seemta hi. Hi khang giloute zong hutobangin aum diing uh,” achi hi.
Huchia Ama’n mipite kawma thu asoi laiin, ngai in, a nu leh a sanggamte chu Amah houpih nuamin inn pua ah ading uhi.
Huin mi khat in a kawmah, “En in, na nu leh na sanggamte nang hung houpih nuamin inn pua ah ading uh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, Amah hilhpa kawmah, “Ka nu koi hi a huleh ka sanggamte zong koi hi ahiai?” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite lamah a khut ajaah a, “En un, ka nu leh ka sanggamte!
Ajiahchu koipouh vaan a um ka Pa deihjawng bawl taphot chu ka sanggampa leh ka sanggamnu leh ka nu ahi uh,” achi hi.
Hu ni mahin inn apatin Jesu achiahdoh a diil geiah atou hi.
Huleh a kawma mipi nasatah ahung kikhop jiahin Amah chu kuang khat a luutin atou a, mipi zousiah chu luuipiau ah ading uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu tampi asoi a: “Ngai un, haichithehtu khat haichi thehin akuan hi.
Huleh atheh laiin akhen lam geiah atu va, vate hungin atom beita uhi.
Huleh khenkhat suangsilei munte ah atu a, lei asah louh jiahin ahung pou pah uhi.
Hizongleh ni ahung satin nisa in akaang a, zung aneih louh jiahin agawgawpta uhi.
Huleh khenkhat louling lahah atu va, ling chu ahung khanglian a, adeepmangta hi.
Hizongleh adang chu lei hoih ah atu va, khenkhat aleh za bangin, khenkhat aleh sawmguup bangin, huleh khenkhat aleh sawmthum bangin ahung gahta uhi.
Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
Huin nungjuite ahung va, a kawmah, “Bang diinga a kawmva tehkhinthu a na soi ahiai?” achi uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ajiahchu vaan lalgam thukiphualte chu nanguh heet diinga phal ahi a, hizongleh amahuh heet chu phal ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu piaah beh ahi diing a, ahau seem diing hi; hizongleh koipouh anei lou chu aneihsun zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
Hujiahin a kawmvah tehkhinthu in ka soi ahi; ajiahchu amah un mu napiin amu sih va, huleh ja napiin aja sih va, he zong ahesiam ngei sih uhi.

Huleh zawlnei Isai in anasoilawh chu a tungvah ahung taangtungta ahi: ‘Jaah chu na ja ngeei diing va hizongleh na hesiam sih diing uh, huleh muh chu na mu ngeei diing va hizongleh na theisiam sih diing uh.

Ajiahchu hi mite lungtang amo gawpta a, a bil uh angong gawpta a, huleh a mit uh asiingta uhi; huchilou inchu a mit un amu kha diing va, a bil un aja kha diing va, a lungtang un ahung hesiam kha diing va, ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, ke’n amahuh ka na sudam kha diing hi,’ chi a, anachih chu.
Hizongleh nanguh mit chu amuh jiahin ahampha a, huleh na bil uh zong ajaah jiahin ahampha hi.
Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh midihtat tampi’n zong na sil muhte uh muh auut va, ahihvaangin amu sih uh, huleh na jaahte uh zong aja nuam va, hizongleh aja sih uhi.
“Hujiahin haichithehtu tehkhinthu hilhchianna chu ngai un:
koipouh in lalgam thu ajaah a aheetsiam louh leh, migiloupa ahung a, a lungtang a kithehsa chu alaahsah veu hi. Hichu lam geia tupa chu ahi.
Huleh suangsilei laha tupa chu, thu chu ja a, kipaahtaha pom pah ngaalpa ahi.
Ahihvaangin amah a zung aneih louh jiahin, tomkhat chauh aum hi. Huleh thu jiaha gimthuaahna bang, suhduhdahna bang ahung um chiangin apuuh pah veu hi.
Huleh louling laha tupa in thu chu aja a, ahihvaangin hi khovel awlmohna leh hauhsatna heemna in thu chu adeepmangta a, huchiin amah chu gah nei louin ahung umta hi.
Hizongleh lei hoih tunga tupa in chu thu chu aja a, ahesiam pah hi: huchu gah zong agah a, khenkhat aleh za bang, khenkhat aleh sawmguup bang, khenkhat aleh sawmthum bangin apung hi,” achi hi.
Tehkhinthu dang Ama’n a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu lou a chi hoih theh mi khat toh tehkhin ahi.
Huleh mite a-ihmut kaal un a meelmapa chu ahung a, buh lahah buhlem atheh a, achiahmangta hi.
Hizongleh buh chu ahung pou a, ahung vuui a, buhlemte zong ahung kilangta hi.
Huchiin lou neitu suaahte chu ahung va, a kawmah, ‘Pu, na lou a chi hoih theh hilou na hiaimah? Buhlemte khoi apat hung um ahiai?’ achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, ‘Meelmapa khat in anabawl ahi,’ achi hi. A suaahte’n a kawmah, ‘Ahihleh vachiahin hute chu valakhawm leh ung na uut ei?’ achi uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n, ‘Uut lou e, ajiahchu huchi hileh buhlemte na laahkhawmna lam vah buhte zong na botkhawm kha diing uhi.

Buh laah dongin poukhawm uh heh, huleh buh laahhun tahchiangin buh aatte kawmah, “Buhlemte lakhawm masa unla, haal diingin alom lomin gaah un, hizongleh buh chu ka buhpang sungah koih luut un,” ka chi diing,’” achi hi.
Tehkhinthu dang Ama’n a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu ankam tang khat mi’n alaah a, a lou a atheh bang ahi.
Huchu haichi laha neu peenpeen ahi; hizongleh ahung khanlet chiangin, hampa lahah alianpeen a, singkung ahung suaah a, huchiin tungleeng vate ahung va, a baate giahna in anei uhi,” achi hi.
Tehkhinthu dang a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu numei in tol alaah a, taangbuang tehna thum lahah, a bawna athoh veh masiaha aphuum bang ahi,” achi hi.
Hi silte zousiah chu Jesu’n tehkhinthu in mipite kawmah asoi hi; huleh tehkhinthu louin a kawmvah bangmah asoi sih hi,
huchia zawlnei in, “Tehkhinthu in ka kam ka kaah diing a, khovel pianchiil apat sil kilangloute chu ka soi diing hi,” chia asoi chu ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
Huin Jesu’n mipite asawlmang a, inn sungah aluut a, huchiin nungjuite a kawmah ahung va, “Lou a buhlem tehkhinthu chu hung hilhchian in,” achi uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah: “Hu chi hoih thehtu chu Mihing Tapa ahi.
Lou chu khovel ahi, chi hoihte chu lalgam tate ahi va, huleh buhlemte chu giloupa tate ahi uhi.
Meelma buhchi thehtu chu diabol ahi a, buh laahhun chu hun tawpna diing ahi a, huleh a aattute chu angelte ahi uhi.
Huchia buhlemte chu lakhawma mei a akihaal bangin, hi hun tawp hun chiangin aum diing hi.
Mihing Tapa’n a angelte asawlkhe diing a, kipalpuuhna umsah tengteng leh daan poisaloua gamtate zousiah chu a lalgam apatin akhawmdoh diing uhi.
Huleh haaltuina mei ah apaai diing va, hutah ah chu kah leh hagawi aum diing hi.
Huzohchiangin midihtatte chu a Pa uh lalgam ah ni bangin ataang diing uhi. Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh.
“Huleh vaan lalgam chu lou laia gou kiguuh phuum tobang ahi. Huchu mi khat in amudoh a aphual a, huin kipaah jiahin achiah a, a neih zousiah ajuaah a, hu lou alei bang ahi.
Huleh vaan lalgam chu sumkawlvei mi tuikepsuang hoihtah hawl tobang ahi kiit hi.
Ama’n chu tuikepsuang man tamtah khat amu a, achiah a aneih zousiah ajuaah a aleita hi.
Huleh vaan lalgam chu leen tuipi a sep a, nga chinteng huuikhawm tobang ahi.
Huchu adim chiangin luuipiau ah akaidoh va, touin a hoihte chu bawmte ah akhum va, hizongleh ahoihloute chu apaai uhi.
Hun tawp chiangin hutobangin aum diing hi. Angelte chu ahung diing va, migiloute chu midihtatte lah apat akhenkhe diing uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu haaltuina mei ah apaai diing uhi. Hutah ah chu kah leh hagawiin aum diing uh,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hi silte zousiah na hesiam viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa,” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hujiahin daanjilsahtu, vaan lalgam tungtaang thu hilha um photmah chu inn neitu, a goubawm apat a sil lui leh sil thah pholhkhetu bang ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi tehkhinthute asoi zohin hu apatin achiahdohta hi.
Huin Jesu chu Amah khua ngeei ah ahung a, sinagog ah amahuh thu ahilh hi. Huchiin amah un thumah asa mahmah va, “Hi Pa’n hi pilna leh silmah bawltheihna khoia amuh ahiai?
Hi Pa hi sing bawlpa tapa hilou ahiaimah? A nu Mari kichi khu hilou ahiaimah? Huleh a sanggamte chu Jakob, Joseph, Simon leh Juda hilou ahi viaimah?
Huleh a sanggamnute zong i kawmva um veh hilou uh maw? Hu ahihleh Hipa’n khoi apat hite zousiah amuh ahiai?” achi uh.
Huchiin Amah tungah alunghita sih uhi. Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Zawlnei amah gam sung leh amah innsung chihlouh ah zahbawl louhin aum ngei sih hi,” achi hi.
Huleh agintaat louh jiahun Ama’n hutah ah silmah tampi abawl sih hi.
Hu hun laiin gambung vaihawmtu Herod in Jesu tanchin ajaahin,
a suaahte kawmah, “Hichu Baptistu Johan ahi. Amah chu misi lah apat kaihthoha um a, hujiaha hi silmah bawltheihnate’n amah a nna tong ahita ve,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu Herod in a sanggampa Philip ji Herodia jiahin, Johan chu mansahin anakaan a, suangkul ah anakhumta hi.
Ajiahchu Johan in a kawmah, “Amahnu na kiteenpih daan in aphal sih,” achi hi.
Huleh Herod in amah chu thah uut mahleh, mipite alau hi, ajiahchu amah un Johan chu zawlnei chiin agingta uhi.
Hizongleh Herod pian ni ahung tunin, Herodia tanu chu a ma vah alaam a, Herod chu akipaahsahta hi.
Hujiahin amahnu chu anget photmah pe diinga kihaahsialin thu achiamta hi.
Huleh amahnu’n chu a nu thuhilh bangin, “Baptistu Johan lutang kuang khat in hitah ah hung pia in,” achi hi.
Huin kumpipa Herod chu alungdongta a; ahihvaangin a kihaahsialnate leh a ankuang umpihte jiahin, amahnu silnget chu piaah diingin thu apia hi.
Huchiin mi asawl a, suangkul sunga Johan ngawng atansahta hi.
Huleh a lutang chu kuang khat in ahung dom a, naupangnu chu apia va, huleh ama’n a nu kawmah ahung tawita hi.
Huin Johan nungjuite ahung va, a luang chu lain avui va, huleh chiahin Jesu avahilhta uhi.
Jesu’n hu thu ajaah tahin, hu apatin kuang a kitawlin munsip ah achiah tuamta hi. Huleh mipite’n ajaah tahun, khopite apat a keeng va chiahin ajuita uhi.
Huleh Jesu kuang a ahung paikhiah in, mipi nasatah amuhin alainat mahmah a, huin a damloute uh asuhdamsah hi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin a nungjuite a kawmah ahung va, “Hi munsip ahi a, huleh nitaahlam anaihtaah jiahin khuate a chiah a, neeh diing avalei theihna diingun mipite sawlkheta in,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Amahuh achiah mang uh angai sih hi. Nang un neeh diing pia un,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Hitah ah tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh i nei uhi,” achi uhi.
Ama’n, “Hitah ah ka kawmah hung tawi un,” achi hi.

Huin Ama’n mipite chu hampa tunga tou diingin thu apia hi. Huin tanghou beu ngaa leh nga nih chu ala a, vaan lam enin, avangpiaah a, abalkeeh a, tanghoute chu a nungjuite apia a, huleh nungjuite’n mipite kawmah apia uhi.
Huchiin a bawnun ane va, avah chiatta uhi. Huleh a neehvaal uh a neng bawm sawmlenih nungjuite’n aluaahdim uhi.
Huleh a nete chu numei leh naupang simlouhin piching saang ngaa veel ahi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n mipite asawlkhiah kaal a, anachiah a diil gaal lehlam anakaai masa diingin a nungjuite kuang ah kintahin atuangsah hi.
Huleh mipite chu asawlkhiah zohin, haamtei diingin taang ah atuamin achiah tou hi. Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin hutah ah atangin aumta hi.
Hizongleh kuang chu diil lailung ah aum a, huih in alehmuut jiahin tuikinawh in aseep lehleh hi.
Huleh jaanveen lina laiin, Jesu’n chu tuipi tunga paiin a kawmlam uh juanin achiah hi.
Huleh nungjuite’n Amah chu diil tunga apai amuhun, “Siha ahi!” chiin abuaita va, lauin akikouta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh ahung houpih pah a, “Hamuangtahin um un! Keimah ka hi; lau sih un,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in adawng a, “Lalpa, nang na hih leh, tui tunga na kawma hungna diing thu hung pia in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n, “Hung in,” achi hi. Huin Peter chu kuang apatin akum a, Jesu kawma chiah diingin tui tungah keeng in apaita hi.
Hizongleh huih nung chu amuh tahin alau a, tum diingin akisa a, “Lalpa, hung hunkhia in,” chiin akikouta hi.
Huin Jesu’n a khut ladohin azam pah a, a kawmah, “Nang ginna haatloupa, bang diinga ginglel na hiai?” achi hi.
Huleh amahuh kuang sunga atuan tahun huih chu asipta hi.
Huin kuang a umte hungin, “Pathian Tapa tahzet na hi,” chiin Amah abia uhi.
Huleh gaal lehlam akaai tahun, Genesaret gam ahung tungta uhi.
Huleh hu mun a mite’n Amah thu aheet tahun, hu kiim a gam chin ah mi asawl va, damlou zousiah a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Huleh a puanmong beeh khoih theih angeen va, huchiin akhoih photmah adam jeel uhi.
Huin Jerusalem a um daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite Jesu kawmah ahung va,
“Bang diinga na nungjuite upate tawndaan kalha taleeh veu ahi viai? Ajiahchu an aneeh chiangun a khut uh asil ngei sih uhi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nang un zong bang diinga na pulepate tawndaan jiaha Pathian thupiaah a taleeh na hi viai?
Ajiahchu Pathian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ huleh, ‘Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha haamsiat chu suhlupin um heh,’ achi hi.
Hizongleh nang un chu, ‘Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha kawma, “Kei apat panpihna silpiaah na muh diing photmah chu Pathian kawma piaah ahita,” chi photmah in,
a nu ahihlouhleh a pa azah diing ahi sih,’ na chi uhi. Huchibangin na pulepate uh tawndaan jiahin Pathian thupiaah bangmalou na suaahsahta uhi.
Nanguh milepchiahte aw! Isai in na tungtaang thu uh anasoilawh dih ngeel hi:
‘Hu mite’n a kam un ahung naih va, a muuh un ahung zahbawl uhi. Hizongleh a lungtang uh kei apat agamla hi.
Mihing thupiaah chu Pathian thuhilhna banga ahilh jiahun ahung be thawn uhi,’ anachih chu,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n mipite a kawmah akou a, a kawmvah, “Ngai unla, hesiam un:
kam sunga luutin mi asubuaah sih a, hizongleh kam apat pawt, hu ngeei in mi asubuaah ahi,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite ahung va, a kawmah, “Pharisaite’n hi thu ajaah va alunghihlouh uh na he ei?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, “Singkung chin ka Pa vaan a um suan louh chu bohkhiahin aum diing hi.
Hite haw ngaihsah sih un; amahuh chu mittaw lamkaite ahi uhi. Mittaw in mittaw mah apui inchu, kokhuuh ah akekhawm diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “Hi tehkhinthu ka kawmvah hung hilh chian in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n, “Tutan a nanguh zong heetsiamna beia um na hi uh maw?
Kam a luut photmah gil sung ah aluut a, huleh daileenna ah paihkhiahin aum, chih na theisiam nai sih uh maw?
Hizongleh kam apat pawtte chu lungtang apat hung pawt ahi a, hute’n chu mi asubuaah hi.
Ajiahchu lungtang akipatin ngaihtuahna giloute, tualthahnate, aangkawmnate, kingaihna thaanghuaite, guuhtaatnate, heetpihna tahloute, soisiatnate ahung pawt hi.
Hite chu ahi mihing subuaah, hizongleh khut sillouha an neehin mi asubuaah sih,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu hu apatin apawt a, Tura leh Sidon gam lamah achiahta hi.
Huleh ngai in, hu gam mah apatin Kanaan numei khat ahung pawt a, kikouin a kawmah, “Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, hung khotuah in! Ka tanu dawipaaiin agim mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n chu kam khat in zong adawng sih hi. Huin a nungjuite ahung va, a kawmah, “Amahnu hi sawlmang in, ajiahchu i nung ah akikoukou hi,” chiin angeen uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, “Israel nam belaam mangte kawm chauh loungaal ah sawl ka hi sih hi,” achi hi.
Huin amahnu ahung a, “Lalpa, hung panpih in,” chiin abia hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, “Tate tanghou laahsaha uite kawma piaah akilawm sih,” achi hi.
Huin amahnu’n, “Lalpa, hihjaw ahi a, ahihvaangin uite’n zong a pu uh dohkaan apat tanghou them kia ane saam uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Numei, na ginna thupi hina mei e! Na deih bangtahin na tungah um heh,” achi hi. Huchiin a tanu chu hu hun ngeeiin adamta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu hu apatin achiah a, Galili Diil kawm ahung tung a, huin taang ah achiah tou a, hutah ah atouta hi.
Huin mipi nasatah, keengbaite, mittawte, haam theiloute, piangsualte leh midang tampi hung puiin Amah kawmah ahung uhi. Amahuh chu Jesu keengbul ah akoih va, huleh Ama’n anasudam hi.

Huchia haam theiloute ahung haam va, piangsualte ahung bukim va, keengbaite keeng a ahung pai uh leh mittawte’n ahung muhtheihtaah daan uh mipite’n amuh tahun thumah asa va, huchiin Israelte Pathian chu apaahtawita uhi.

Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite a kawmah akou a, “Mipite tuin ka kawmah ni thum umta ahihjiah uh leh neeh diing bangmah nei lou ahihjiahun ka lainat mahmah hi. Huleh amahuh an ngawlin ka sawl kiit uut sih hi, huchilou inchu lamkaal ah asawlsam kha diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Mipi hizah tate vahna thamzet tanghou hu jaatpi gamdaai ah khoi apatin i mu diai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai?” achi hi. Huin amah un, “Beu sagih leh nga tawmtakhat,” achi uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n mipite chu tual a tou diingin thu apia hi.
Huin tanghou beu sagih leh ngate chu lain kipaahthu asoi a, abalkeeh a, a nungjuite kawmah apia a, huin a nungjuite’n mipite kawmah apia uhi.
Huchiin a bawnun ane va, avah chiatta uhi. Huleh aneehvaal uh paalbawm sagih aluaah dim uhi.
Huleh anete chu numei leh naupang sim louhin, piching saang li ahi uhi.
Huin Ama’n mipite chu asawlmang a, kuang ah atuang a, Magdala gam lamah ahungta hi.
Huin Pharisaite leh Sadukaite ahung va, Amah je-etna diingin vaan akipan chiamchihna amahuh ensah diingin angeen uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nitaahlam chiangin, ‘Khua apha diing hiinteh ajiahchu mei san asuaah,’ na chi veu uhi.

Huleh jiingkaal chiangin, ‘Tuni’n khua ase diing hiinteh ajiahchu mei san asuaah a, amial hi,’ na chi veu uhi. Nanguh milepchiahte aw! Vaan umdaan na hesiam va, hizongleh hun chiamchihna na he sih uhi.
Khang gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna ahawl uhi. Hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi,” achi hi. Huleh Ama’n amahuh anusia a, achiahta hi.
Huleh a nungjuite’n diil gaal lehlam atun un, tanghou apo mangngilh uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lahah kiveeng unla pilvaang un,” achi hi.
Huleh amahuh leh amahuh chu, “Tanghou i puaah louh jiahin ahi,” chiin akingaihtuah uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Ginna haatloute aw, tanghou na neih louh jiah uh hia bang diinga kingaihtuah na hi viai?
Mi saang ngaa vaahna tanghou beu ngaa leh bawm bangzah na luaah uh chih tu nasan a hesiam nailoua na lungsim va zong hezing lou na hi viaimah?
Ahihlouhleh mi saang li vaahna tanghou beu sagih leh a neng vaal paalbawm bangzah na luaah uh, chih hezing lou na hi viaimah?
Na kawmvah tanghou thu ka soi sih chih bang diinga hesiamlou na hi viai? Hizongleh Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lahah kiveeng un,” achi hi.
Huin amah un tanghou tolsoh lahah kiveeng un, chi hilouin Pharisaite leh Sadukaite thuhilhna lah a pilvaang diingin ahijaw, chih ahung theita uhi.
Jesu chu Kaisaria Philippi gam ahung tunin a nungjuite kawmah, “Mite’n kei Mihing Tapa hi koi ahi ahung chi viai?” chiin adong hi.
Huleh amah un, “Khenkhat in Baptistu Johan ahi ahung chi va, khenkhat in Elijah, adangte’n Jeremia ahihlouhleh zawlneite laha khat ahi ahung chi uh,” achi uhi.
Ama’n chu a kawmvah, “Ahihleh nang un kei koi ka hi na hung chi viai?” achi hi.
Huin Simon Peter in adawng a, “Khrist, Pathian hing Tapa chu na hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, na hampha hi, ajiahchu mihing tahsa leh sisan in ahung heetsah na hi sih a, vaan a um ka Pa hung heetsah ahijaw hi.
Huleh ke’n zong na kawmah nang Peter na hi, chih ka hung hilh hi. Huleh hi suangpi tungah ka kouhtuam ka lemdoh diing a, huchu Misi Khua kulh kotkhaahte’n bangmah alohbut sih diing hi.
Huleh na kawmah vaan lalgam chabite ka hung pe diing a, lei a na kaan photmah chu vaan ah kaan ahi diing a, huleh lei a na phel photmah chu vaan ah phel ahi diing,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite’n Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih koima hilh lou diingin nguntahin thu apia hi.

Hu nungsiah chu Jesu’n Jerusalem a achiah diing bang, upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute khut apat sil tampi athuaah diing daan bang, thaha aum diing bang, huleh ni thum ni a athohkiit diing bang a nungjuite ahesah panta hi.
Huin Peter in Amah puituamin ataaihilh a, “Lalpa, na tungah hung tung dah hen! Na tungah atung hial sih diing,” achi hi.

Hizongleh Amah chu akihei a Peter kawmah, “Setan, ka nung ah um in! Kei diingin kipalpuuhna na hi, ajiahchu nangma’n Pathian silte na ngaikhawh sih a, hizongleh mihing silte na ngaikhawh jaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin a kros puain hung jui heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in amu diing hi.
Mi’n khovel apumin nei henla, a hinna taanta leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai? Ahihlouhleh mi’n a hinna luangin bang ahiai apiaah diing?
Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu a Pa loupina a kithuamin a angelte toh hung pah diing ahita a, huchiangin mi chin a natoh bangjeelin athuh chiat diing hi.
Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, hia dingte khenkhat chu Mihing Tapa a lalgam a hung amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uhi,” achi hi.
Huin ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter, Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan atonpih a, a tuamin taang sang tung khat ah apuitou hi.
Huleh ama vah a meel ahung limdangta hi. A maai ni bangin ahung taangta a, a puansilhte chu vaah bangin ahung vaam hi.
Huleh en in, Mosi leh Elijah a kawmva hung kilaahin Amah toh akihou uhi.

Huin Peter in Jesu ahoupih a, a kawmah, “Lalpa, eiuh diingin hitaha um ahoih hi. Na uut leh hitah ah puanbuuh thum i bawl diing a, nang a diingin khat, Mosi a diingin khat, huleh Elijah a diingin khat,” achi hi.
Asoi laitahin, en in, meilum vaahtah in amahuh ahung khuhta hi. Huleh en in, hu meilum lah apatin aw khat in, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi, Amah ah ka kipaah mahmah hi. Amah thu ngai un,” achi hi.
Huleh nungjuite’n huchu ajaah un, bohkhupin apuuh va, alau mahmah uhi.
Huin Jesu ahung a, amahuh akhoih a, “Thou unla, lau sih un,” achi hi.
Huleh adaahdoh uh leh Jesu chauh lou chu koima dang amu sih uhi.
Huleh taang apat ahung kumsuh tahun, Jesu’n amahuh thu apia a, “Mihing Tapa misi lah apat athohkiit masangsiah hi na sil muh uh koima hilh sih un,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Ahihleh bang diinga daanjilsahtute’n, Elijah hung masa teeiteei diing ahi, chi ahi viai?” chiin adong uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, “Elijah chu ahung masa ngeei diing a, sil bangkim abawl thah diing hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah chu ahung zouta a, amah ahe sih va, a tungah auut uut un ahih zouta uhi. Huchibangmahin Mihing Tapa in zong a lahvah athuaah pahta diing,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n Baptistu Johan thu a kawmva soi ahi chih ahung heta uhi.
Huleh mipi lah ahung tun un, koiaha mi khat Amah kawmah ahung a, a ma a khuupdinin,
“Lalpa, ka tapa khotuah in, amah hi sibup vei ahi a, agim mahmah hi. Mei lahah apuuh a tui ah ake veu hi.
Huleh na nungjuite kawmah ka hung pui a, hizongleh asudam thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Ginna neilou leh khang paisual aw, bangtan ahiai ka hung umpih diing? Bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Amah chu hitah ah ka kawmah hung pui un,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n dawi chu ataai a, a sung akipatin dawi apawtta hi; huleh naupang chu hu hun ngeeiin adamta hi.
Huin nungjuite chu aguuhin Jesu kawmah ahung va, “Bang diinga kei un nohdoh theilou ka hi viai?” achi uhi.

Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Na ginlouh jiahun ahi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ankam tang khat bang ginna na neih uh leh, hi taang kawmah, ‘Hi apatin hu lamah kituan in,’ na chi diing va, akituan mei diing hi. Nanguh diingin sil bawltheihlouh mawngmawng aum sih diing hi.
Bang hitaleh hichibang jaw haamteina leh an ngawlna loungaalin apawtdoh sih hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Galili gam a aum laiun Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa hi mite khut ah matsahin aum pah diing hi;
huleh Amah chu athat diing va, a ni thum ni’n kaihthohin aum diing,” achi hi. Huin amahuh alungkham mahmahta uhi.
Huleh Kapernaum ahung tunun, biahinn siah dongte Peter kawmah ahung va, “Na Houtupa un biahinn siah pe lou ahi maw?” achi uhi.

Peter in, “Pia e,” achi hi. Huleh amah chu inn sunga avaluut leh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Simon, bang na chi ngaih ei? Lei a lalte’n sumlam siah hiin siah hitaleh koite lahah ahiai alaah jeel uh, a tate uh lahah ahiai, ahihlouhleh gamdang mi lahah?” chiin anadong hi.
Peter in a kawmah, “Gamdang mi lahah,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Huchi ahihleh tate a-awl uhi.

Hizongleh nang diil ah vachiah inla, ngakuai vakhai inla, huleh nga na khaidoh masatpeen la inla, a kam keeh lechin shekel khat na mu diing hi. Huchu la inla, kei leh nang a diingin a kawmvah pia in, huchilou inchu amahuh i kipalpuuhsah kha diing,” achi hi.
Hulaitahin nungjuite Jesu kawmah ahung va, “Vaan lalgam ah koi alianpeen diai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n naupangneu khat a kawmah akou a, amah chu a lahvah adingsah a,
“Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na kihen va naupang neute bang na hung hihlouh uh leh, vaan lalgam ah na luut het sih diing uhi.
Hujiahin koipouh hi naupangneu banga kingaingiam mi chu vaan lalgam ah alianpeen ahi diing hi.
Huleh mi koipouh hitobang naupang neu khat keimah min a saang chu kei hung saang ahi.
Hizongleh koipouh keimah hung gingta mineute laha khat zong puuhsah chu a ngawng ah suangsumheeh lianpi ohsahin tuikhanglian thuuhtah ah kheluut leh uh, amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
“Kipuuhna bawltute jiahin khovel tung agih hi, puuhnate chu hung um diing mawng ahi a, hizongleh puuhna umsahtu tung agih hi!

Huleh na khut aha, na keeng aha in ahung suhpuuh leh saattan inla paaimang in. Khut nih aha, keeng nih aha neia kumtuang mei a paiha um saangin, piangsuala ahihlouhleh keengbaia hinna a luut chu nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi.
Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh kheikhia inla paimang in. Mit nih neia gawtmun mei a paiha na um saangin, mit khat neia hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi.
Hi naupangte laha khat zong simmoh lou diingin pilvaang un, ajiahchu a angelte un vaan a um ka Pa meel aen zing uhi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
“Ajiahchu beimangte hundam diingin Mihing Tapa ahung hi.
Bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi khat in belaam za nei henla, alahvah khat vaahmangta leh, sawmkuah leh kuahte chu nusiain, taangte a chiahin avaahmang peen vahawl lou diing ahiaimah?
Huleh vamu kiitta henla hileh, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sawmkuah leh kuah vaahmang loute saangin hu belaam peen tungah akipaah jaw diing hi.
Huchibangmahin hi naupangte laha khat zong amanthaai diing chu na Pa uh vaan a um deihlam ahi sih hi.
“Huleh na unau na tunga atatleeh leh, chiah inla nang leh amah chauh heetin a khelhna chu vahilh in. Ama’n na thu angaih leh, na unau na zou ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh angaihkhiah louh inchu ‘heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum kam a thu akichetna diingin’ mi khat aha nih aha tonpih in.
Huleh amahuh angaihkhiah nuam louha ahihleh, kouhtuamte kawmah tut in. Kouhtuamte thu zong angaihkhiah saam louh inchu, amah chu nang a diingin Jentel leh siahdong mi bang hi heh.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, leitung a na kaan photmah uh chu vaan ah kaan ahi diing a, huleh leitung a na phel photmah uh chu vaan ah phel ahi diing hi.
“Na kawmvah ka soi kiit hi, leitung a na lahva mi nih a silnget pouh va akithutuaah uh leh, ka Pa vaan a um bawlsahin aum diing uhi.
Ajiahchu mi nih aha thum aha ka min a akikhopna phot vah a lahvah ka um jeel ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter chu Jesu kawmah ahung a, “Lalpa, ka unau in ka tunga akhelh leh, bang jaatvei ahiai ka ngaihdam diing? Sagihvei tanin ahi diai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Sagihvei chiang ka hung chi sih hi. Sawmsagih mun sagihvei tanchiang ka hung chi jaw ahi.
“Ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu kumpi koiaha a suaahte kawma sum hisaap suhfel tum toh tehkhin ahi.
Ahung suhfel pat a ahihleh, mi khat talent siing khat ba a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n piaah diing aneih louh jiahin a pu in a suaahte kawmah amah leh a ji leh a tate toh aneih zousiah toh juaaha dit diing thu apia hi.
Hujiahin suaahpa in chu khupbohin abia a, ‘Pu, ka tungah thuaah thei tadih inla, a bawnin ka hung dit diing,’ achi hi.
Huin hu suaahpa pu in amah chu alainat mahmah a, ahahkhia a, a bat angaidamta hi.
Hizongleh hu suaahpa chu apawt a, a suaah hihpihte laha khat amah dinari za khat ba chu avamu a, amah chu aman a, ‘Na bat hung pia in!’ chiin a lawl ameeh hi.
Huchiin asuaah hihpihpa chu a keeng bul ah apuuh a, ‘Ka tungah thuaahthei tadih in, ka hung dit veh diing,’ chiin angeen hi.
Ahihvaangin amah aut sih a, a bat aditzoh masangsiah suangkul ah avakhumta hi.
A suaah hihpihte’n a silbawl chu amuh tahun, apona mahmah va, huleh ahung va sil umtan zousiah a pu uh ahung hilhta uhi.
Huphetin a pu in a suaahpa chu akou a, a kawmah, ‘Aw suaah giloupa, na hung nget nguutnguut jiaha na bat zousiah hung ngaidam ing a,
ke’n ka hung hehpih banga nang zong na suaah hihpih na hehpih saam diing hilou maw?’ achi hi.
Huin a pu chu alungthahta a, abat zousiah aditzoh masiah migawttu kawmah apeta hi.
Nanguh koipouh in na lungtang tah va na unaute a tatleehna uh na ngaihdam louh uh leh, vaan a um ka Pa in zong huchibangin na tungvah abawl ve diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi thute asoi zohin Galili gam apatin apawt a, Jordan gaal Judia gam lamah ahungta hi.
Huleh mipi nasatahin ajui va, huleh Ama’n hutah ah amahuh anasudam hi.
Pharisaite zong a kawmah ahung va, Amah je-etin a kawmah, “Bangjiah pouhin mi’n a ji akhuul daan in aphalsah ei?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Achiil apatin Pathian in ‘numei leh pasal in asiam a,’
huleh ‘Hi jiahin pasal in a nu leh a pa anuse diinga huleh a ji ah abehta diing a, huleh anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh,’ chih na sim kha sih uh maw?
Huchiin amahuh chu nih ahi nawnta sih va, sapum khat ahita uhi. Hujiahin Pathian in agawmsa chu mihing in khen sih heh,” achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Ahihleh bang diinga Mosi in kikhuulna lehkha piaaha khuul diing ahi, chia thu apiaah ahiai?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Na lungtang uh khauh jiaha na jite uh khuul Mosi in ahung phalsah ahi. Hizongleh achiil apatin huchibang ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh ke’n ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh aangkawmna jiah hilou a, ji khuul a, adang nei chu aangkawm ahi a, huleh khuulsa numei nei photmah zong aangkawm ahi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Pasal a ji toh kaal thu huchi ahihleh, kiteen ahoih lou ahi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hi thu kisoi mi zousiah in apom thei sih uh, a kawmva piaahte loungaalin.

Ajiahchu michilgeh khenkhat a nu uh suul apat huchibanga piang mawng aum va; huleh michilgeh khenkhat mihing gehthuh zong aum a, huleh michilgeh, vaan lalgam jiaha michilgeha kisiamtawmte zong aum hi. Koipouh apomthei in pom uh heh,” achi hi.
Hulaiin a tungva a khut nga a ahaamteisah diingin Amah kawmah naupang neute ahung pui va, hizongleh nungjuite’n anataai uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n, “Naupang neute chu ka kawma ahung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un; ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh a tungva a khut angah zohin, hu apatin achiahta hi.
Huleh en in, mi khat ahung a, a kawmah, “Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang silpha ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Bang diinga mi hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chihlouh mi hoih dang aum sih hi. Bangteng hitaleh hinna a na luut nuam leh, thupiaahte jawm in,” achi hi.
Ama’n a kawmah, “Akhoi haw e?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “‘Tual na thah louh diing ahi,’ ‘Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,’ ‘Na guuh louh diing ahi,’ ‘Heetpihtu dihlou in pang sin,’
‘Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ huleh ‘Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na veengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi,’” achi hi.
Tangvaalpa’n chu a kawmah, “Hihaw zousiah chu ka khangdawn lai apat ka juih ahita hi. Bang ka sam nalai ei?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hoihbukim keei ning na chih leh, chiah inla na neih zousiah juaah inla, migentheite kawmah pia in, huchiin vaan ah gou na nei diing hi. Huleh hung inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh tangvaalpa in chu hu thu ajaah tahin lungkhamtahin achiah mangta hi, neihlelam tampi nei ahih jiahin.
Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi hausa diingin vaan lalgam luut ahahsa hi.
Huleh ka hung hilh kiit ahi, mi hausa Pathian lalgam a aluut saangin sangawngsau phin bilvang a aluut paisuaah abaihlam jaw hi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite’n hu ajaah tahun limdang asa mahmah va, “Huchi ahihleh koi hutdamin aum zou diai?” achi uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n amahuh aen a, a kawmvah, “Hichu mihing diingin bawl gual ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian diingin chu bangkim ahithei veh hi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “En in, kei un bangkim nusiain nang ka hung juita va, bang ka mu diing viai leh?” achi hi.
