Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, khovel thah ah Mihing Tapa a loupina laltouphah a atou chiangin nanguh kei hung juite chu Israel phung sawmlenihte vaihawmin laltouphah sawmlenih ah na tou diing uhi.
Huleh mi chin ka min jiaha innte aha, sanggam pasalte aha, sanggam numeite aha, pa aha, nu aha, ji aha, tate aha, gamte aha nusia in chu aleh za amu diing va, huleh kumtuang hinna atang diing uhi.
Hizongleh mi tampi amasapeente chu anunungpeen diing va, huleh anunungpeente chu amasapeen diing uhi.
“Ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu lou neitu a grephuan a natong diinga mi chial diinga jiingkaal a pawt bang ahi.
Huleh ama’n natongtute toh ni khat a dinari khat loh diinga akilem tahun, a grephuan ah asawlta hi.
Amah chu daah thumna veelin apawtdoh a, midang dawlmun a ding meimeite amu a,
huleh a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh zong grephuan ah vakuan un, akilawm hun ka hung pe diing,’ achi hi. Huin amahuh chu achiahta uhi.
Huleh daah guupna leh daah kuahna veel diingin, avapawt kiit a, huchibangmahin abawl kiit hi.
Huleh daah sawmlekhat veelin avapawt kiit a, a kawmvah, ‘Bang diinga ding meimei na hi viai?’ achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, ‘Koimah in ahung goih louh jiahin,’ achi uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh zong grephuan ah va kuan un, akilawm bangjeel na mu diing uh,’ achi hi.
Huin nitaahlam ahung hihin, grephuan neitu’n a enkoltu kawmah, ‘Natongtute kou inla anunungpeen apatin a masapeen tanin aloh uh pia in,’ achi hi.
Huin daah sawmlekhat veela agoihte ahung uh leh dinari khat chiat amuta uhi.
Huin amasate ahung tahun muh tamdeuh akineem uhi. Hizongleh amah un zong dinari khat chiat mah amuta uhi.
Huleh hichu akilaah zohun lou neitu tungah aphunta va,
‘Hi anunungte’n daah khat sung chauh atong va, keiuh nisa hahlai thuaaha tonggimte toh akibangin na bawlta mei a,’ achi uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n chu alahva khat adawng a, ‘Lawm, na tungah bangmah ka sukhial sih hi. Dinari khat loh diinga kihoutuaah hilou i maw?
Nang a chu kilaah inla chiahta in, hi anunungpeente kawmah zong nang ka hung piaah jaatmah ka pe uut hi.
Ka neihsa ka uut uut-a ka bawl theih hilou amaw? Huleh ka hoih jiahin na thangsia ahi maw?’ achi hi.
Hutobangin anunung chu amasa diing a, amasa chu anunung diing hi. Ajiahchu tampi kouh ahi a, hizongleh tawmchakhat teel ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu Jerusalem a achiah touh laiin nungjui sawmlenihte lampi ah apuituam a, a kawmvah,
“Ngai un, Jerusalem juanin i chiah tou uh ahi, huleh Mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute khut ah matsahin aum diing a, huleh amah un si diingin siamlouh atangsah diing uhi.
Huleh Amah chu chiamnuih bawlna diing leh jeep diing leh kros a khetbeh diingin Jentelte khut ah apedoh diing uhi. Huleh a ni thum ni in athou kiit diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Zebedi tate nu chu a tapate toh hungin Jesu maai a khupbohin bang sil aha angeen hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Bang ahiai na deih?” achi hi. Amahnu in a kawmah, “Na lalgam ah hi ka tapa tegeel khat na jiatlam ah, khat na veilam ah atou theihna diing uh thu pia in,” achi hi.

Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, “Na nget uh na he sih uhi. Nang un ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei viai, huleh ka baptisma tan diing na tang thei diing viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hihthei e,” achi uhi.

Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka dawn diing nou chu na dawn ngeei diing va, ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang ngeei diing uhi, hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tousah diing thu chu keimah piaah diing ahi sih a, himahleh ka Pa’n abawlsahte kawmah piaah ahi diing,” achi hi.
Huleh sawmte’n huchu ajaah tahun, unau nihte tungah alungthah mahmahta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh chu a kawmah akou a, “Jentel vaihawmte chu a tungvah kilalsahtahin aum va, huleh milian milalte’n a tungvah thu aneih khum uh chih na he uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh lahah chu huchi ahi sih diing, koipouh na lahva let uut chu na suaah un aum diing ahi.
Huleh na lahva amasapeen a pan uut chu na suaah un apang diing hi.
Mihing Tapa hiilhial zong natohsaha um diingin ahung sih a, hizongleh natong diing leh mi tampi tatna diinga a hinna pe diingin ahung jaw ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jeriko apat apawt un, mipi nasatahin Amah ajui uhi.
Huleh en in, mittaw nih lam geia toute’n Jesu lampi ah achiah hi chih ajaah tahun, “Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou uhi.
Huleh mipite’n adaihna diingun ataai va, hizongleh amahuh chu, “Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou seemseem uhi.
Huin Jesu akhawl a, amahuh akou a, “Na tungvah bang bawlleng na uut viai?” achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, mitvaah ka uut uh,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n alainat mahmah a, a mit uh akhoih a, huchiin amuthei pah ngaal va, huin Amah ajuita uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem ahung tun kuan uh, Olive Taang a Bethphage khua atun tahun, Jesu’n nungjuite nih asawl a,
a kawmvah, “Na majawn va khua ah vachiah unla, huleh sabiltung kikhit a kawma a talgual khat toh na vamu pah diing va; hute chu suut unla, ka kawmah hung kai un.
Huleh mi koiaha in na kawmva soi aneih leh, ‘Lalpa’n amahuh amamoh hi,’ na chi diing va, huchiin ama’n ahung sawl pah diing hi,” achi hi.
Hite zousiah chu zawlnei kam tungtawna anakisoi ataangtun theihna diingin ahi:
“Zion tanu chu hilh inla, ‘En in, na Kumpipa chu kingaingiamtahin sabiltung tungah, sabiltung talgual tungah tuangin na kawmah ahung hi,’” achih chu.
Huin nungjuite chu achiah va, Jesu’n thu apiaah bangin abawl uhi.
Huleh sabiltung leh a talgual chu ahung kai va, a tungah a puante uh aphah va, a tungah Jesu atousah uhi.
Huleh mipi tamtah in lampi ah a puante uh aphah va; adangte’n singbawh asaatkhia va, lampi ah aphah uhi.
Huchiin mipi a ma a chiahte leh a nunga juite’n kikouin: “David Tapa kawmah, Hosanna! ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi!’ Tungnungpeen ah Hosanna!” achi uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem sung aluut tahin, “Hi Pa koi ahiai?” chiin a khopi pumpi aliing hial uhi.
Huleh mipite’n, “Hi Pa hi zawlnei Jesu, Galili gam a Nazareth khua a mi ahi,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah aluut a, Pathian biahinn a sil juaah leh lei zousiah chu adelhdoh a, huleh sum hengtute dohkaan haw leh vakhu juaahte touna haw asawnpuuhsah hi.
Huleh a kawmvah, “‘Ka inn chu haamteina inn akichi diing,’ chih gelh ahi, hizongleh nang un suammangte umna kua in na siam uh,” achi hi.
Huin Pathian biahinn ah mittawte leh keengbaite a kawmah ahung va, huleh Ama’n amahuh chu anasudam hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n a silmah bawlte leh Pathian biahinn a, “David Tapa kawmah, Hosanna!” chia naupang kikoute amuh tahun alungkim sih mahmah va,

huleh a kawmah, “Hite’n bang ahiai asoi uh na ja ei?” achi uhi. Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hi, ‘Naungeehte leh nawiteep nalaite kam a pawt in paahtawina na sukimta,’ chih na sim ngei sih uh maw?” achi hi.
Huleh amahuh nusiain khopi apat apawt a, Bethani ah achiah a, hutah ah agiahta hi.
Huin ajiing a khopi lam a akilehkiitin, a gil ahung kialta hi.

Huleh lam geiah theipi kung amu a, a bul a avachiah leh a nah loungaal bangmah amuta sih a, huin theipi kung kawmah, “Tu apat kumtuangin anagah kiit nawn sin,” achi hi. Huleh theipi kung chu avul pah ngaal hi.
Huleh nungjuite’n huchu amuh tahun, “Bangchidaan ahiai theipi kung avul pah mei?” chiin thumah asa mahmah uhi.

Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ginna na neih va, na ginlelh louh uh leh, theipi kung a bawl bang chauh na bawl sih diing va, hizongleh hi taang kawmah zong, ‘Kisuandoh inla tuikhanglian ah kipaai in,’ chi leh uh chin, na chih bangun aum diing hi.
Huleh bangkim gingta a haamtei a na nget phot uh na mu diing uhi,” achi hi.

Huleh Amah Pathian biahinn ah aluut a, thu ahilh laiin, siampu lalte leh vaantaang upate a kawmah ahung va, “Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? Huleh koi in ahiai hi thuneihna ahung piaah?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong thu khat ka hung dong diing a, hukhu na hung hilh uh leh, ke’n zong koi thu in ahiai hi sil ka bawl ka hung hilh ve diing hi.

Johan baptisma hi khoi apatin ahiai? Vaan apatin ahiai, ahihlouhleh mihing apat?” achi hi. Huleh amahuh akingaihtuah va, “‘Vaan apatin,’ chilei lah, ‘Huchi ahihleh bang diinga amah gingta lou?’ achi diing hi.
Hizongleh, ‘Mihing apatin,’ chilei lah mipite i lau ngaala, mi zousiah in Johan chu zawlnei hia aseh jiahun,” achi uhi.
Huchiin Jesu adawng va, “Ka he sih uh,” achi uhi. Huleh Amah in zong a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte ka bawl chih ka hung hilh sih diing.
“Hizongleh nang un bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi koiaha in tapa nih anei a, huleh akhatna kawmah ahung a, ‘Tapa, tuni in ka grephuan ah nna vatong in,’ achi hi.
Ama’n adawng a, ‘Uut sing,’ achi a, hizongleh a khonungin a lungsim ahengta a, avakuanta hi.
Huin anihna kawmah ahung a, huchibangmahin achi hi. Huleh ama’n adawng a, ‘Pu, ka chiah diing hi,’ achi a, hizongleh achiahta sih hi.

Amahuh geel koi jaw in a pa uh deihlam abawl viai leh?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Amasajaw in,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, siahdongte leh nohchijuaahte’n Pathian lalgam ahung luut khelh diing uhi.

Ajiahchu Johan chu dihtatna lam thu ah na kawmvah ahung a, amah na gingta sih uhi; hizongleh siahdongte leh nohchijuaahte’n amah agingta uhi. Huleh nang un hu na muh tahun, amah na gintaatna diingun na kisiih nuam tuan sih uhi.

“Tehkhinthu dang ngaikhia un: Lou neitu mi koiaha khat aum a, hupa’n chu grephuan abawl a, daai in auum kiimveel a, hu sungah grep suuhna kokhuuh alaai a, buuhsang alam hi. Huleh loubawl mite kawmah hohloh diingin apekhia a, gamdang ah achiahta hi.
Huleh a gah loh hun diing kuanin a suaahte chu a gah la diingin loubawl mite kawmah asawl hi.
Huleh a loubawl mite’n a suaahte chu aman va, khat avua va, khat athat va, khat suang in asep uhi.
Huin ama’n a suaah dangte amasa haw saanga tamjaw asawl kiit a, amahuh tungah zong huchimahin anabawl uhi.
Atawp ah, ‘Ka tapa azahtaat kha diing uh,’ chiin a tapa chu asawl hi.
Hizongleh a loubawl mite’n a tapa chu amuh tahun, ‘Hi pa gouluahtu diing ahi, hung un, i that diing va, a gouluah diing chu i kitan diing uh,’ achi uhi.
Huin amah chu aman va, grephuan pua ah apaaidoh va, athatta uhi.
Hujiahin grephuan neitupa ahung tahchiangin hu lou bawltute chu bang alohta diai?” achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Ama’n hu migiloute chu bawlgentheitahin asumang diing a, grephuan chu lou bawltu dang a gah loh hun chin a, a gahte a kawma pe jeel diingte kawmah akeemsah diing,” achi uhi.

Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Pathian Lehkhathu ah: ‘Innlamtute suang deihlouh ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi. Hichu LALPA bawl ahi a, huleh i mitmuh vah athumah ahi,’ chih thu na sim kha ngei sih uh maw?
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam chu na kawm vapat laahsah ahi diing a gah suang diing nam dang kawmah piaah ahi diing hi.
Huleh koipouh hi suang tunga puuh chu akeehjaah diing a; hizongleh akiaahkhum photmahte chu agawijaan diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n a tehkhinthu ajaah tahun, amahuh tung thu soi ahi chih akihe uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu mat atup uh leh mipite alau uhi, amah un zawlnei hia angaih jiahun.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu in asoi kiit a:
“Vaan lalgam chu kumpi koiaha khat a tapa diinga kiteenna ankuang lui tobang ahi a,
huleh kiteenna ankuang luina a chialte kou diingin a suaahte asawl a, huleh amahuh ahung nuam sih uhi.

Ama’n a suaah dangte asawldoh kiit a, ‘Chialte kawmah vachiah unla, “En in, ka nitaah ankuang ka bawl zouta hi, ka bawngtalte leh ka gan vaahthaute thah ahi a, sil zousiah bawlzohsa ahita. Kiteenna ankuang ah hungta un, vachi un,” achi hi.’
Hizongleh amah un angaihsah sih va, khat a lou ah, khat a sumdawnna ah akichiah mangta uhi.
Huleh midangte’n a suaahte chu aman va, musittahin abawl va, athatta uhi.
Hizongleh kumpipa’n huchu ajaah tahin alungthahta hi. Huleh sepaihte asawl a, hu tualthatte chu asumang a, huleh a khopi uh zong ahaalsahta hi.
Huin ama’n a suaahte kawmah, ‘Kiteenna ankuang bawlzoh ahita, hizongleh ka chialte lah ne taah ahi sih uhi.
Hujiahin lamka thuamte ah chiah unla, mi na muh taphot uh kiteenna an ne diingin hung chial un,’ achi hi.
Huchiin hu suaahte chu apawt va, lamka thuamte ah vachiahin amuhphaah tan uh, misia leh mipha, a bawnun akou khawm va, kiteenna mun chu michialte in ahung dimta hi.
Hizongleh kumpipa chu michialte en diinga ahung luut tahin, kiteenna puan silh lou mi khat amuta hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, ‘Lawm, bangchidaan ahiai kiteenna puan silh loua hia na hung luut?’ achi hi. Huin amah chu ahaam keei sih hi.
Huin kumpipa’n a suaahte kawmah, ‘A khut leh a keeng kaan unla, podoh unla, polam mial ah paaita un, hutah ah kah leh hagawi aum diing hi,’ achi hi.
Ajiahchu tampi kouh ahi a, hizongleh tawmtakhat teel ahi uh,” achi hi.
Huin Pharisaite chu achiahdoh va, a thusoi apat Amah amat theihna diing daan uh avakihou uhi.

Huleh amah un a nungjuite uh leh Herod pawlte Amah kawmah asawl va, hute’n a kawmah, “Houtupa, midihtat na hi a, dihtahin Pathian lam thu na hilh a, mi koimah doptuam na nei sih chih ka he uhi; ajiahchu mihing koimah maaizah na nei sih hi.
Hujiahin, bangchi na sa ei, hung hilh in? Kaisar kawma siah tawi dih ahiai, ahihlouhleh dihlou?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a lungsim uh giitlouh daan chu ahe a, “Milepchiahte, bang diinga hung je-et na hi viai?
Siah sum chu hung ensah un,” achi hi. Huin a kawmah dinari khat ahung tawi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hi koi lim leh koi min ahiai?” achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Kaisar a,” achi uhi. Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hujiahin Kaisar silte chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, huleh Pathian silte chu Pathian kawmah pia un,” achi hi.
Amah un hi thute ajaah tahun thumah asa mahmah va, Amah nusiain achiahmangta uhi.
Hu ni mahin Sadukaite, misi thohkiitna aum sih chite, a kawmah ahung va,
“Houtupa, Mosi in mi ta neiloua asih leh, a sanggampa’n a ji luahin, a sanggampa diingin chi ahaahsah diing ahi, achi hi.
Tuin ka kawmvah unau pasal sagih aum va; aupapeen in ji anei a, asita a, chi ahaah louh jiahin a ji chu a sanggampa anuutsiatta hi.
Huchibangmahin anihna zong ta beiin asi a, athumna in aluah a, asagihna tan in anei chiat uhi.
Huleh atawp ah hu numei zong asita hi.
Hujiahin thohkiitna ah amahnu chu sagihte laha koipeen ji ahita diai? A bawnun lah anei chiat ngaalva,” chiin adong uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh dawngin a kawmvah, “Pathian Lehkhathu leh Pathian silbawltheihna na heet louh jiahun na bawlkhial uhi.
Ajiahchu thohkiitna ah akiteeng nawn sih va, teeng zong akiteengsah nawn sih uh, himahleh vaan angelte tobang ahi uhi.
Hizongleh misi thohkiitna thu a Pathian in na kawmva asoi,
‘Kei chu Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, huleh Jakob Pathian ka hi,’ achih khu sim kha lou na hi uh maw? Pathian chu misi Pathian ahi sih a, ahingte Pathian ahijaw,” achi hi.
Huleh mipite’n huchu ajaah tahun, a thuhilh chu thumah asa mahmah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n Sadukaite adongkhaah zou chih ajaah tahun Pharisaite chu akikhawm uhi.
Huin a lahva daansiam khat in Jesu je-etin thu khat adong a,
“Houtupa, daan thu ah bang ahiai thupiaah lianpeen?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “‘LALPA na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah in, na hagau zousiah in, na lungsim zousiah in na lungsiat diing ahi.’
Hichu thupiaah masa leh lianpeen ahi.
Huleh anihna chu hibangmah ahi: ‘Nangmah na kilungsiat bangin na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi.’
Hi thupiaah nihte ah Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute zousiah akikhaikhawm veh hi,” achi hi.
Pharisaite akikhop laiun, Jesu’n amahuh thu adong a,
“Khrist chu bangchiin na ngai viai? Koi Ta ahiai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “David Tapa,” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahihleh bangchi daana David in Hagau a Amah chu ‘Lalpa,’ chi a,
‘LALPA’N ka Lalpa kawmah, “Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in,”’ achih ahiai?
Huchia David in Amah chu ‘Lalpa’ achih leh, bangchidaana a Tapa hi ahiai?” achi hi.
Huin koima’n Amah chu kam khat in zong adawng thei sih va, hu ni akipatin koima’n thu dang mawngmawng adong kiit ngamta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n mipite leh a nungjuite kawmah thu asoi a,
“Daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite chu Mosi touphah ah atou va;
hujiahin juih diing chia ahung hilh photmah uh, jui unla bawl jeel un, hizongleh amahuh silbawl bang chu bawl sih un, ajiahchu amah un asoi va, abawl tuan sih uhi.
Ajiahchu vangih puaah hah tahtah asiam va, mi liangkou ah akoih va, hizongleh amah un lah a khutzung khat un zong akhoihtaang nuam sih uhi.
Hizongleh amah un abawl zousiah uh chu mi muh diinga bawl ahi uhi. A silbuh uh leh a puanmong khipte uh asulian va, a puan mongte uh atualsah uhi.
Ankuang luinate ah mun poimohpeen leh sinagog ah touna poimohpeen bang adeih va,
dawlmunte a mite’n chibai abuuh uh bang, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ chia akouh uh bang aut uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh chu ‘Rabbi’ chihin um sih un; ajiahchu na Houtupa uh khat, Khrist ngeei chu aum a, huleh na bawnun unau na hi uhi.
Leitung ah koima pa chi sih un, ajiahchu na Pa uh khat ahi a, Amah chu vaan a um ahi.
Huleh houtute chihin um sih un; ajiahchu na Houtupa uh khat aum, Khrist chu.
Hizongleh na lahva loupipeen chu na suaah un aum diing ahi.
Huleh koipouh akiliansah chu suhngiam ahi diing a, huleh koipouh kingaingiam chu tawisangin aum diing hi.

“Hizongleh nanguh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu vaan lalgam a luut diing mite na khaahsah uh; ajiahchu nanguh lah na luut sih va, mi aluut diingte lah na luutsah sih uhi.

Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu meithaite inn haw na negam va, kibawltawmin sawt pipi na haamtei uhi. Hujiahin siamlouhtanna lianseem na mu diing uhi.

Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu mi khat Juda sahkhua a kiheisah diingin tuikhanglian leh gam ah na chiah kiimveel va, huleh huchia na siam zoh chiangun amah chu nanguh saanga alehniha gawtmun ta hiin na siam veu uhi.
Nanguh puitu mittawte haw, ‘Koipouh Pathian biahinn loua kichiam chu bangma ahi sih a, hizongleh koipouh Pathian biahinn sana loua kichiam in chu ataangtun diing ahi,’ chite haw, na tunguh agih hi!
Nanguh mingol leh mittawte haw! Ajiahchu sana ahihlouhleh sana siangthousah Pathian biahinn akhoi loupijaw ahiai?
Huleh, ‘Koipouh maitaam loua kichiam chu bangmah ahi sih; hizongleh a tunga um silpiaah loua kichiam in ataangtun diing ahi,’ na chi uh.
Nanguh mingol leh mittawte haw! Ajiahchu silpiaah ahihlouhleh silpiaah siangthousah maitaam chu khoi loupijaw ahiai?
Hujiahin koipouh maitaam loua kichiam phot in, maitaam leh a tunga um zousiah louin akichiam ahi.
Koipouh Pathian biahinn loua kichiam chu, Pathian biahinn leh a sunga teeng zousiah louin akichiam ahi.
Huleh vaan loua kichiam phot chu, Pathian laltouphah leh a tunga toupa loua kichiam ahi.

Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un pudina, anethon leh kummin bang sawm-a-khat na pia va, huleh daan thu poimoh jaw: thukhen dihna bang, zahngaihna bang huleh ginumna bang na ngaihsah sih uh; hite chu ahi na bawl diing uh, adangte zong bawllou tuanlouin.
Nanguh puitu mittawte, thousi hisiang a sangawngsau valhte haw!
Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un nou leh kuang polam na susiang va, hizongleh a sung lah suammangna leh kisuumlouhna in adim hi.
Nang Pharisai mittaw, nou leh kuang sung lam susiang masa in, huchiin apolam zong ahung siang thei diing hi.

Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nanguh hi haan kinuhvaam a polam mawitaha kilang a, hizongleh a sunglam lah misi guh leh silbuaah a dim bang na hi uhi.
Hutobangin nanguh zong polam a mihing mitmuhin dihtat bangin na lang va, hizongleh na sunglam uh chu lepchiahna leh daan poisaloua gamtatna in adim hi.
Nanguh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu zawlneite haan na bawl va huleh midihtat haante zong zahtahin na jeem va,
huleh, ‘Ka pulepate uh dam laia ana-um hileh ung, zawlneite sisan a suahna va tel lou diing hi ve ung,’ na chi uhi.
Hujiahin zawlneite thatte tate na hi uh chih na kihesah uhi.
Huchiin, na pulepate uh mohna tehna sudim un.
Nanguh guulte, nanguh guul suante haw! Bangchiin ahiai gawtmun siamlouhtanna na pelh theih diing uh?

Hujiahin, ngai un, na kawmvah, zawlneite, mipilte leh daanjilsahtute ka hung sawl ahi: alahva khenkhat na that diing va, kros ah na kilhbeh diing va, huleh khenkhatte chu sinagog ah na jeep diing va, khopi khat apat khopi ah na suduhdah diing uh,

huchu midihtat Abel sisan kisuah apat Barakia tapa Zakaria Pathian biahinn leh maitaam kikaal a na thah uh sisan tanpha, leitung a midihtat sisan kisuah zousiah na tungva ahung tun theihna diingin ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi silte zousiah hi khang a mite tungah ahung tung diing hi.

“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, zawlneite anathat a, a kawma kisawlte suang a anaseplumtu! Aahpi’n a noute a ha nuaia aopkhum bangin ke’n zong na tate bangzahvei ahiai kouhkhawm ka tupta a, hizongleh na uutlouh!
En un! Na inn uh chu taihsana umin ahawmsuaahta hi;
ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi,’ na chih masiah uh na hung mu nawn sih diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn apat pawtin achiahta a, Pathian biahinn kibawl daante ensah diingin a nungjuite a kawmah ahung uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hi sil zousiah na mu sih uh maw? Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, suhchip louha suang kithuap mawngmawng hitah ah khat zong aum sih diing,” achi hi.

Huin Jesu Olive Taang tunga atou laiin, nungjuite a kawmah atuamin ahung va, “Hi silte bangchihchiangin ahung um diai? Na hung kiitna diing leh hun tawpna diing chiamchihna bang adiai? hung hilh in,” achi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Mi koimah in ahung heem louhna diingin pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu mi tampi ka min in ahung diing va, ‘Khrist ka hi,’ chiin mi tampi ahung heem diing uhi.
Huleh kidou leh kidou thuthangte na ja pah diing uhi. Na lungdon louhna diingun pilvaang un; ajiahchu hi silte zousiah hung um diing mawng ahi a, hizongleh atawpna ahi nai sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu nam tuam leh nam tuam akidou diing va, huleh lalgam tuam leh lalgam tuam akidou diing uhi. Huleh mun tuamtuam ah kial bang atung diing a, hii bang aleeng diing a, jiil bang aliing diing hi.
Hite zousiah chu nauvei nat kipatna ahi.
“Hu hun chiangin nanguh chu suhgim diingin ahung pedoh diing va, ahung that diing va, huleh ka min jiahin nam zousiah huatin na um diing uhi.
Huleh mi tampi apuuh diing va, khat leh khat akimansah diing va, khat leh khat akimudah diing uhi.
Huleh zawlnei tahlou tampi ahung pawt diing va mi tampi aheem diing uhi.
Huleh daan poisaloua gamtatna apun diing jiahin, mi tampite lungsiatna chu ahung daai diing hi.
Hizongleh atawp donga thuaah mualsuaah mi chu hutdamin aum diing hi.
Huleh hi lalgam tanchinpha chu nam zousiah heetsahna diingin khovel pumpi ah taangkoupihin aum diing a, huzoh chiangin atawpna chu ahung tung diing hi.
“Hujiahin zawlnei Daniel in anasoi ‘Sumangtu kihdahum’ chu mun siangthou a ding na muh chiangun” asim phot in hesiam uh heh,
“huchih hun chiangin Judia gam a umte taangte ah taai uh heh.
Inn tunga um chu a inn sungah bang aha ladoh diingin hung kumsuh sih heh.
Lou a um zong a puan la diingin hung kihkiit sih heh.
Hizongleh hu hun a gaaite leh naungeeh nawiteep neite tung agih hi!
Huleh na taai hun uh phalbi lai ahihlouhleh Sabbath ni ahih louhna diingin haamtei un.
Ajiahchu hu hun chiangin gimthuaahna nasatah um diing ahi, hutobanga gimthuaahna loupi chu khovel siam chiil apat tutanin aum ngei nai sih a, um zong aum nawn sih diing hi.
Huleh hu hun chu suhtom hilou hileh, mihing mawngmawng koimah hingin asuaahta sih diing hi, hizongleh teelte jiahin hu nite chu suhtom ahi diing hi.
Hu hun chiangin khat pouh in na kawmvah, ‘En in, hitah ah Khrist aum,’ ahihlouhleh ‘Hutah ah aum,’ chi zongleh, tahsang sih un.

Ajiahchu khrist tahloute leh zawlnei tahloute ahung pawt diing va, chiamchihna leh sil loupi tahtah miheemna diingin ahung ensah diing va, huchiin ahihtheih leh, teelte ngeei zong ahung heem diing uhi.
Ngai un, amain ka hung hilhlawhta ahi.
“Hujiahin na kawmvah, ‘En un, gamdaai ah aum,’ ahung chih uh leh chiahdoh sih un. ‘En un, pindan sunggil ah aum,’ ahung chih uh leh tahsang sih un.
Ajiahchu suahlam a kawl ahung phet a, tumlam tan asalh vaah bangin, Mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong huchi mahbang ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu saluang umna phot ah mulukolhte zong aum khawm diing hi.
Gimthuaahna hun zohchiangin ni chu suhmialin aum diing a, ha chu avaah nawn sih diing a, vaan apatin aahsite ahung ke diing va, vaan silbawltheihna chu suhliing ahi diing hi.

Hu hun chiangin vaan ah Mihing Tapa chiamchihna chu ahung kilang diing a, huleh leitung a nam zousiah in asuun diing va, huleh Mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna leh gualzohna loupi toh vaan meipi tunga hung amu diing uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a angelte chu peengkuul ging nasatah toh asawl khe diing a, huleh amah un a teelte chu kawlmong ning li akipan, vaan tawp akipan alehlam tawp tanphain akhawm diing uhi.
“Huchiin theipi kung ah tehkhinthu jil un: A baa ahung meen a, a nah ahung sel chiangin nipi anaita chih na he uhi.
Huchibangmahin nang un zong hi silte na muh chiangun, Amah anaita a, kotbul mahmah ah aumta chih he un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi silte tengteng atunkim masiah hi khang a mite amang sih diing uhi.
Vaan leh lei abeimang diing a, hizongleh ka thu amang hial sih diing hi.
“Hizongleh hu ni leh ahun diing chu ka Pa chauh loungaal koimah in, vaan a angelte’n zong ahe sih uhi.
Hizongleh Noah damlai nite bangin, Mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu tuijiin tun matengin, Noah kuang a aluut ni tanin, aneun adawn va, ji leh pasalin akinei va,
huleh tuijiin atun a, a bawnva alaahmang masiah bangma ahe sih uh; Mihing Tapa hung kiitna zong huchi bangmah ahi diing hi.
Hu hun chiangin lou ah mi nih aum diing va; khat chu laahmangin aum diing a, khat chu nuutsiatin aum diing hi.
Numei nih buhgawina ah buh gawiin aum diing va; khat chu laahmangin aum diing a, khat nuutsiatin aum diing hi.
Hujiahin kigingzing un, na Lalpa uh bang chih hun a ahung diing chih na heet louh jiahun.
Hizongleh hichu he un, inn neitupa in guta hung diing hun he leh, aveeng diing a, a inn aluhsah sih diing hi.
Hujiahin nanguh zong kiging zingin um un, ajiahchu na ngaihtuah louh laitah va Mihing Tapa chu hung diing ahi.
“Suaah ginum leh piltah, a pu in a innkuanpihte tunga ahun chin a a an diing uh pe diinga houtu a akoih chu koi ahiai?
A pu ahung pai chianga huchibanga anabawl ahung muh diing hu suaah chu ahampha hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ama’n amah chu aneih zousiah tunga houtu in asiam diing hi.
Hizongleh suaah gilou in a lungsim in, ‘Ka pu chu hung baih lou diing ahi,’ chi henla,
huleh a suaah hihpihte anavuain, zukham ankhamte kawmah nein anadawnta leh,
hu suaahpa pu chu agintaat louh ni, akiveen louh hun laitahin ahung diing a,
huleh amah chu atanbong diing a, milepchiahte tan bang atangsah diing hi. Huah chu kah leh hagawi aum diing hi.
“Hu hun chiangin vaan lalgam chu nungaah siangthou sawm, a thaumei uh kenga moupa dawn diinga pawtkhete toh tehkhin ahi diing.
Huleh a lahvah mi ngaa apil va, ngaa angol uhi.
Huh angolte’n chu a thaumei uh akeng va, thautui akeng tel sih uhi.
Hizongleh apilte’n chu a thaumei uh toh a uum ah a tui zong akeng tel uhi.
Hizongleh moupa chu ahung vaaigeih jiahin a bawnun alusu va, ana-ihmu vehta uhi.
Huleh jaankhang laiin, ‘En in, moupa ahung hi, adawn diingin pawtdoh un!’ chia kikou ging aumta hi.
Hutahin hu nungaah siangthoute chu athou veh va, a thaumei uh adeta uhi.
Huleh angolte’n apilte kawmah, ‘Na thautui uh hung hawm un, ajiahchu ka thaumeite uh mit diing ahita hi,’ achi uhi.
Hizongleh apilte’n adawng va, ‘Keiuh leh nanguh diing akidaih sih diing hi; hizongleh ajuaahte kawmah vachiah unla vakilei un,’ achi uhi.
Huleh amahuh alei diinga avachiah kaalun, moupa chu ahungta a, huleh kigingsa a ana-umte chu amah toh moulopna inn ah aluut khawmta va; huin kot chu akikhaahta hi.
Hu nungin hu nungaah siangthou dangte zong ahung va, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa, kot hung hon in!’ achi uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n adawng a, ‘Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nanguh ka hung he sih,’ achi hi.
Hujiahin kigingzing un, ajiahchu Mihing Tapa hung diing ni leh ahun na he sih uhi.
“Ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu mi khat in a suaahte kou khawm a, a neihlelamte a khut va keemsah a, khual gamlataha zinmang tobang ahi.

Huleh ama’n a suaah khat kawmah talent ngaa, a suaah dang khat kawmah talent nih, huleh a suaah dang khat kawmah talent khat apia a; amah un ahih theih hun diing chiat un apia a, amah chu azin pah ngaal hi.
Huin talent ngaa tangpa chu kuanin avasumdawng pah a, talent ngaa dang mah amuh beh hi.
Huleh huchibangmahin talent nih tang pa’n zong talent nih amuh beh hi.
Hizongleh talent khat tangpa chu chiahin lei atou a, huleh a pu dangka chu aphuumta hi.
Hun sawttah nungin hu suaahte pu chu ahung tunga amahuh toh sum asutuaahta hi.
Huin talent ngaa tangpa ahung a, talent ngaa dang ahung tawi beh a, ‘Pu, nang talent ngaa na hung keemsah a; en in, talent ngaa dang ka muh beh hi,’ achi hi.
A pu in a kawmah, ‘Suaah hoih leh ginum, na bawl hoih hi; sil tawmtakhat tungah na ginum a, sil tampi tungah thuneituin ka hung koih diing hi. Na pu kipaahna ah luut in,’ achi hi.
Talent nih tangpa zong ahung a, ‘Pu, nang talent nih na hung keemsah a; en in, talent nih ka muh beh hi,’ achi hi.
A pu in a kawmah, ‘Suaah hoih leh ginum, na bawl hoih hi; sil tawmtakhat tungah na ginum a, sil tampi tungah thuneituin ka hung koih diing hi. Na pu kipaahna ah luut in,’ achi hi.
Huin talent khat tangpa chu ahung a, ‘Pu, mi kheltah na hi a, na tuh louhna ah na aat a, na theh louhna ah zong na khawm jeel chih ka hung he hi.
Huleh ka hung lau a, vachiahin na talent chu lei nuaiah ka vaphuum hi. En in, hitah ah nang a mah na kimuh kiitta hi,’ achi hi.
Hizongleh a pu in adawng a, a kawmah, ‘Nang suaah gilou leh thasepa, ka tuh louhna ah ka aat a, huleh ka theh louhna ah ka lakhawm veu hi chih na he maw?
Huchi ahihleh ka dangka chu suminn ah na vakoih diing a, huchia ka hung chianga ka sum chu apung toh ka muh kiit diing ahi.
Hujiahin a talent chu amah apat laahsah unla, talent sawm neitu kawmah pia un.
Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu piaah beh ahi diing a, tampi ahung nei diing; hizongleh koipouh anei lou chu aneihsun ngeei zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
Huleh suaah manlouh chu polam mial ah paaikhia un. Hu ah chu kah leh hagawi aum diing hi,’ achi hi.
“Mihing Tapa chu angel siangthou zousiah toh a loupina a ahung chiangin, Amah chu a loupina laltouphah tungah atou diing hi.
A ma ah nam zousiah khopkhawm ahi diing a, Ama’n amahuh haw chu belaampu in keel lah apat belaamte akhenkhiah bangin akhen diing hi.
Huleh belaamte chu a jiatlam ah akoih diing a, hizongleh keelte chu a veilam ah akoih diing hi.
Huchiangin Kumpipa in chu a jiatlam-ate kawmah, ‘Nanguh ka Pa deihsahte, hung unla khovel siam chiil apat a nanguh diinga kibawl lalgam chu luah un.
Ajiahchu ka gil akialin an na hung pia va; ka dang ataahin dawn diing na hung pia va; mikhual ka hihin na hung zintun va;
saguaaha ka umin puan na hung silhsah va; damloua ka umin na hung veh va; suangkul a ka taanin ka kawmah na hung uh,’ achi diing hi.
Huchiangin midihtatte’n, ‘Lalpa, bangchihin ahiai gilkial a ka hung muh va an ka hung piaah uh, ahihlouhleh dangtaaha ka hung muh va dawn diing ka hung piaah uh?
Bangchiin ahiai mikhual a ka hung muh va ka hung na zintun uh, ahihlouhleh saguaaha ka hung muh va puan ka hung silhsah uh?
Ahihlouhleh bangchihin ahiai china aha ahihlouhleh suangkul a na taan aha ka hung muh va na kawma ka hung uh?’ chiin adawng diing uhi.
Huleh Kumpipa’n chu adawng diinga a kawmvah, ‘Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi ka unaute laha neupeen khat tunga na bawl uh chu ka tunga bawl na hi uh,’ achi diing hi.
Huzoh chiangin a veilam a umte kawmah, ‘Nanguh haamsethuaahte, ka kawm apat chiahmang unla, kumtuang mei, diabol leh a angelte diinga kibawl ah luutta un.
Ajiahchu ka gilkialin an na hung pe sih va; ka dangtaahin dawn diing na hung pe sih va;
mikhual ka hihin na hung zintun sih va, saguaah ka hihin puan na hung silhsah sih va, ka chinat a suangkul a ka taan in na hung veh sih uhi,’ achi diing hi.

Huchiangleh amah un zong adawng diing va, ‘Lalpa kei un bangchihin ahiai gilkial aha, dangtaah aha, mikhual aha, saguaah aha, damlou aha, suangkul taang aha a ka hung muh va, na nna ka hung tohsah louh uh?’ achi diing uhi.
Huchiangin Ama’n adawng diing a, ‘Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hite laha neupeen khat tunga na bawl louh uh chu ka tunga bawl lou na hi uhi,’ achi diing hi.
Huleh hute chu kumtuang gawtmun ah achiahta diing va, hizongleh midihtatte chu kumtuang hinna ah achiahta diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi thute asoi zohin a nungjuite kawmah,
“Ni nih zoh chiangin Chiahkaan Kuut aum diing a, huleh Mihing Tapa chu kilhbeh diinga matsahin aum diing chih na he uhi,” achi hi.
Huin siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute leh mipi upate chu siampu lalpeen Kaiapha achih uh innpi ah akikhawm va,
huleh Jesu chu dohabawla man a athah theihna diingun akihou khawm uhi.
Hizongleh, “Kuut laiin hihdah heh, huchilou inchu mipite lahah buaina ahung um kha diing,” achi uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Bethani khua a miphaah anahi Simon inn a aum laiin,
numei khat alabaster buuh a thau namtuui luultah tawiin a kawmah ahung a, ankuang a atou laiin a lu ah aleih hi.
Hizongleh a nungjuite’n hichu amuh tahun, alungkimta sih va, “Bang diinga hikhu mathaanga subei ahiai?
Ajiahchu hi thau hi man tamtaha juaaha mi gentheite kawma piaah theih ahi ngaala,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hichu aheetin a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hi numei nu subuai na hi viai? Ajiahchu amahnu’n ka tunga sil hoihtah bawl ahi.
Ajiahchu migentheite na kawmvah aum zing va, hizongleh kei chu na kawmva um zing ka hi sih hi.
Ajiahchu hi thau namtuui ka tunga aleih chu vuia ka um ni a diingin ahih ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, khoimun ah zong khovel pumpi ah hi tanchinpha kisoina phot ah, hi numeinu silbawl zong amahnu heetzingna diingin akisoi diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda Iskariot achih uh chu siampu lalte kawmah avachiah a,
huleh a kawmvah, “Jesu ka hung pekhe diinga bang na hung pe diviai?” avachi hi. Huleh amah un dangka sawmthum piaah diingin akihoulempihta uhi.
Huchiin hu nungsiah chu Juda in Amah matsahna diing lemtaang ahawlta hi.
Huchiin Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut ni masapeen in nungjuite Jesu kawmah ahung va, a kawmah, “Chiahkaan an na neehna diing khoimun ah hung guatsah leh ung na deih ei?” achi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n “Khopi ah valuut unla mi khat kawmah, ‘Houtupa’n, “Ka hun anaita a, ka nungjuite toh na inn ah Chiahkaan an ka ne khawm diing uh,” achi hi,’ vachi un,” achi hi.
Huchiin a nungjuite’n Jesu’n ahilh bangin abawl va, Chiahkaan an chu abawl zouta uhi.
Huin nitaahlam ahung hihin, nungjui sawmlenihte toh ankuang auum uhi.
Huleh aneeh laiun Ama’n, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na lahva khat in kei ahung mansah diing hi,” achi hi.
Amahuh chu alungdong mahmahta va a kawmah, “Lalpa, kei ka hi maw?” achi chiatta uhi.
Huin Ama’n adawng a, “A khut a kuang hung sawhpihpa ngeei in kei ahung mansah diing hi.
Mihing Tapa chu a tanchin kigial bangjeelin apai diing a, hizongleh Mihing Tapa mansah diingpa tung agih hi! Hu mi chu anapianglou hileh amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin amansahtupa Juda in adawng a, “Rabbi, kei ka hi maw?” achi hi. Ama’n a kawmah, “Nangma’n na chita hi,” achi hi.
Huleh an aneeh laiun, Jesu’n tanghou ala a, avangpiaah a, abalkeeh a, huleh nungjuite apia a, “La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa ahi,” achi hi.
Huin nou ala a kipaahthu asoi zohin, a kawmvah apia a, “Na bawnun dawn un.
Ajiahchu hichu sualnate ngaihdamna diinga mi tampite diinga pawt thuhun thah a ka sisan chu ahi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, ka Pa lalgam a nanguh toh athaha ka dawn ni atun masiah, tukal greptui ka dawn kiit nawn sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un la khat asah zoh un, apawt va Olive Taang ah achiahta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tu jaan chiangin kei jiahin na bawnun puuhsah vehin na um diing uhi; ajiahchu, ‘Belaampu ka jeep diing a, belaam hon chu adalhjaah diing uh,’ chih gelh ahi.
Hizongleh ka thohkiit nung chiangin Galili gam ah na ma vah ka na chiah masa diing hi,” achi hi.
Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “Mi zousiah nang jiahin puuhsahin um zongleh uh, kei chu ka puuh het sih diing,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, tu jaan ngeeiin aah khuan main thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing,” achi hi.
Peter in a kawmah, “Nang toh si khawm diing hi zongleng, ka hung kiheetmohbawl hial sih diing hi!” achi hi. Humah bangin nungjuite zousiah in zong achi chiat uhi.
Huin Jesu chu amahuh toh mun khat Gethsemani achih uh atung a, huleh Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Paam a ka vahaamtei kaalin hitah ah anatou un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n Peter leh Zebedi tapate nih apui a, lungkhamin amangbangta mahmah hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka hinna sihna khop hialin alungngai hi. Hitah ah um unla hung veenpih un,” achi hi.
Huin Amah chu themkhat chiah gamla deuhin akhupboh a, “Aw ka Pa, ahihtheih leh, hi nou hung peelsah in; ahihvaangin keimah thu hilouin, hizongleh nangmah thuthu hijaw heh,” chiin ahaamtei hi.
Huin nungjuite kawmah ahung a, amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu a, huleh Peter kawmah, “Nang un daahkaal khat zong hung veenpih zoulou na hi uh maw?
Heemna a na luut louhna diingun kigingzing unla haamtei un. Tahzetin hagau in chu apeih a, hizongleh tahsa chu achau hi,” achi hi.
Anihveina ah Amah avachiah kiit a, “Pa Aw, ka dawn louha hi nou in hung peel theilou ahihleh, nang thuthu hita heh,” chiin ahaamtei hi.
Huleh ahung a, amahuh ihmuin ahung mu kiit a, ajiahchu a ihmut uh asuaah mahmah hi.
Huchiin amahuh anusia a achiah kiit a, athumveina ah asoi ngei soiin ahaamtei kiit hi.
Huin a nungjuite kawmah ahung a, a kawmvah, “Nanguh ihmu a tawldam nalai na hi uh maw? En un, ahun ahung tungta a, Mihing Tapa chu misualte khut ah matsah ahita.
Thou un, i chiah diing uh; en un, kei hung mansahtu chu ahungta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh thu asoi zing laiin, en un, sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda chu siampu lalte leh upate kawm apat mipi nasatahmei naamsau leh khetbuuh tawite toh ahungta uhi.
Huin amansahtu diing pa in amahuh chiamchihna ahilh masa a, “Ka tawp peenpeen Amah ahi diing hi, Amah chu man un,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n chu Jesu ahung juan pah a, “Chibai, Rabbi!” achi a, huin Amah chu atawp hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Lawm, bang diinga hung na hiai?” achi hi. Huin amahuh ahung va Jesu tungah khut aha va, amanta uhi.
Huleh thakhatin, Jesu umpihte laha mi khat in a khut zamin a naamsau azandoh a, siampu lalpeen suaahpa asaat a, a bil asaatkhiahsah hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na naamsau a paai ah koih kiit in, ajiahchu naamsau pan photmah naamsau mah a si diing ahi uhi.
Huleh tu mahmah a zong ka Pa kawma ngeen a, Ama’n angel legion sawmlenih saanga tamjaw hung sawl theilou sa na hi uh maw?
Hizongleh huchi hitaleh, Pathian Lehkhathu hitobanga hung um ngeei diing chu bangchiin ataangtung theita diai?” achi hi.

Hu daahkaal mahin Jesu’n mipite kawmah, “Suammangtu man diing bang hialin naamsau leh khetbuuhte toh kei man diingin na hung kuan uh maw? Ni chinin nanguh toh Pathian biahinn ah thuhilhin ka tou a na hung man sih uhi.
Hizongleh zawlneite Lehkhathu ahung taangtun theihna diinga hite zousiah hung um ahi,” achi hi. Huin nungjuite zousiah in Amah chu anusia va ataaita uhi.
Huleh Jesu mantute’n Amah chu siampu lalpeen Kaiapha inn a daanjilsahtute leh upate umkhawmna ah apui uhi.
Hizongleh Peter in siampu lalpeen innpi dongin agaal juih hi. Huleh avaluut a, atawpna heet tumin suaahte lahah avatou hi.
Huin siampu lalte leh upate leh vaihawmte zousiah in Jesu athah theihna diingun Amah kalha heetpihtu dihlou ahawl va;
hizongleh amu sih uhi. Heetpihtu dihlou tamtah ahung vaangun, amu tuan sih uhi. Hizongleh atawp ah heetpihtu dihlou nih ahung va,
“Hi Pa’n, ‘Pathian biahinn susia a, ni thum sunga bawlkiit thei ka hi,’ achi hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh siampu lalpeen chu adingdoh a, a kawmah, “Bangma dawnglou diing maw? Hite’n nang ahung heehnate uh bangchidaan ahiai?” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu ahaam keei sih hi. Huin siampu lalpeen in a kawmah, “Pathian hing min in ka hung kichiamsah ahi: Pathian Tapa Khrist na hih leh hihlouh hung hilh in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na chita hi. Ahihvaangin, ka soi kiit ahi, tunung chiangleh Mihing Tapa chu Silbawltheihna jiatlam a tou a, huleh vaan meipi tunga hung na mu diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen in a puan abotkeeh a, “Pathian asoisia hi! Heetpihtu dang bang diing i chi nalai diai? Ngai un, Pathian a soisiatna chu tuin na jata uhi.
Bang na chi ngaih viai?” achi hi. Amah un adawng va, “Si taah ahi,” achi uhi.
Huin a maaitang a chil siatin atuum va, adangte’n a khutpeeh un abeeng va,
“Nang Khrist, hung hilh in! Koi ahiai ahung beeng?” achi uhi.
Huin Peter chu polam a huang sungah atou a, huleh a kawmah suaah numei khat ahung a, “Nang zong Galili mi Jesu toh lawikhat na hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh ama’n chu, “Na thusoi ka he sih,” chiin a bawnva ma ah akiheetmohbawl hi.
Huleh innliim a avapawt tahin numei dang khat in amah chu anamu a, hu mun a umte kawmah, “Hi pa zong Nazareth Jesu toh lawikhat ahi,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n, “Hupa jaw ka he sih,” chia kichiamin akiheetmohbawl kiitta hi.
Huleh tomkhat zouin hu mun a dingte ahung va, Peter kawmah, “Nang zong a lahva khat na hi tahzet hi, ajiahchu na haam in zong akihe hi,” achi uhi.
Huin ama’n, “Hupa chu ka he sih!” chiin haamsia kilohin akichiamta hi. Huleh aah akhuang pah ngaal hi.
Huleh Peter in Jesu thusoi, “Aah khuan main thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing,” achih chu ahung hedohta a, huin polam ah apawt a, hah kahin akapta hi.
Jiingkaal ahung hihin siampu lalte leh vaantaang upate zousiah Jesu thahna diingin akihoukhawm uhi.
Huin Amah chu akaan zohun, apui va gamoptu Pontia Pilat kawmah apekheta uhi.
Huin amansahtu Juda in Jesu siamlouh atangsah uh chih aheetin akisiih a, hu dangka sawmthum chu siampu lalte leh upate kawmah ahung tawi kiit a,
“Mohnabei sisan ka matsah jiahin ka sual ahi,” achi hi. Huleh amah un, “Hu keiuh diingin bang akhawh diai? Nang na lohloh kilohta in,” achi uhi.
Huin ama’n dangka chu Pathian biahinn sunga sepluutin apawt a, chiahin avakikhailumta hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte’n dangka chu ala va, “Sisan man ahih jiahin hichu thohlawm bawm a koih asiang sih hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh akihoukhawm va, mikhual vuina diingin hu sum in beelkhengtu mun aleita uhi.
Hujiahin hu mun chu tutanin Sisan Mun achi uhi.
Huchiin zawlnei Jeremia thusoi, “Israel tate lahah Amah man diing koite aha in anasahsa uh dangka sawmthum chu ala va,
huleh LALPA’N kei ahung thuhilhtaah bangin, beelkhengtu mun man leina diingin azangta uhi,” chih chu hung taangtung ahita hi.
Huin Jesu chu gamoptu ma ah ading a, huleh gamoptu’n, “Judate Kumpipa na hi maw?” chiin adong a, huchiin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na soi bangin ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh siampu lalte leh upate’n Amah aheeh laiun, bangmahin adawng sih hi.
Huin Pilat in a kawmah, “Ahung heehna zoujaai uh ja lou na hi maw?” achi hi.
Himahleh Ama’n kam khat in zong adawng sih a, huphetin gamoptu’n thumah asa mahmah hi.
Huleh gualvaah ni chianga gamoptu’n suangkul taang khat mipite’n ateel peenpeen uh ahahsah ngeina ahi hi.
Hulaiin Barabba achih uh suangkul taang giloutah khat aum hi.
Hujiahin amahuh ahung kikhop tahun Pilat in a kawmvah, “Koijaw ka hung hahdohsah na deih viai? Barabba ahiai, ahihlouhleh Jesu Khrist kichipa?” achi hi.
Ajiahchu thangsiat jiaha amatsah uh ahi chih ahe hi.
Vaihawmna touphah a atou laiin, a ji in a kawmah mi asawl a, “Hu Mi dihtat tungah bangmah bawl sin, ajiahchu Amah jiahin tuni’n ka mang in sil tampi ka thuaah hi,” avachisahta hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte leh upate’n Barabba chu ngeen a Jesu chu sulum diingin mipite athuzoh uhi.
Hizongleh gamoptu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nihte lah a koijaw hung hahkhe leng chi na hi viai?” achi hi. Amah un, “Barabba!” achi uhi.
Pilat in a kawmvah, “Ahihleh Khrist kichi Jesu bang ka lohta diai?” achi hi. Amah un a bawnun a kawmah, “Kros ah kilhbehin um heh,” achi uhi.
Huin gamoptu’n, “Bang jiahin eimaw, bang bawlsual anei ei?” achi hi. Amah un a bawnun, “Kros ah kilhbehin um heh,” chiin akikou seem uhi.
Pilat in bangmah loh theihlouh leh buaina seemseem hi diing ahi chih amuh tahin, tui ala a mipi ma ah a khut silin, “Hi midih sisan ah mohna bei ka hi. Nang un na lohloh kiloh un,” achi hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah in adawng va, “A sisan phuba chu keiuh tung leh ka tate uh tungah tu heh,” achi uhi.
Huin ama’n Barabba chu a kawmvah ahahdohsahta a; huleh Jesu chu ajeep zohin kilhbeh diingin apedohta hi.
Huin gamoptu sepaih honte’n Jesu chu Praitoriam ah apuiluut va, a kawmah sepaih hon a bawnun akhawm uhi.
Huleh Amah puan ahawhkhiahsah va, puansandup asilhsah uhi.
Huin ling lukhuh aphan va, akhuhsah va, a khut jiatlam ah sialluang atawisah uhi. Huleh a ma ah akhuupdin va, “Chibai, Judate Kumpipa!” chiin chiamnuih bawlna in anei uhi.
Huin Amah chu chil aphih khum va, sialluang chu laahsahin a lu jeepna in anei uhi.
Huin chiamnuih bawlna a aneih zoh un, puan sandup chu ahawhkhiahsah va, Amah puan ngeei asilhsah kiit va, huleh kilhbeh diingin apuita uhi.
Huleh ahung pawtdoh tahun, Kureni mi a min Simon kichi mi khat amu va, amah chu a kros po diingin apawngbawl uhi.
Huleh Golgotha kichi mun ahung tun un, huchu Luguh Mun, chihna ahi a,
Amah chu uain thuuh, silkha toh kihal dawn diingin apia uhi. Hizongleh Ama’n huchu achiam a, adawn nuamta sih hi.
Huin Amah chu kros ah akilh va, aisaanin a puansilhte chu akihawm uh, zawlnei in, “Ka puante chu akihawm va, ka puannaah tungah ai asaan uh,” chia anasoi ataangtunna diingin.
Huleh hutah ah atou va Amah chu aveengta uhi.
Huin akiheehna, HICHU JUDATE KUMPIPA JESU AHI, chia kigial chu a lu tungah ataah uhi.
Huin Amah toh suamhaat mi nih zong akilhbeh va, a jiatlam ah khat, a veilam ah khat.
Huleh mi vaahleh phot in a lu uh thingin chiamnuihin asoisia va,
“Nang, Pathian biahinn susia a ni thum sunga bawlkiit diingpa, nang leh nang kihundamta’n! Pathian Tapa na hihleh, kros dawn apat hung kum khia in,” achi uhi.
Humah bangin siampu lalte’n zong chiamnuihin, daanjilsahtute leh upate toh,
“Ama’n midang ahundam a, Amah leh Amah lah akihundam thei sih hi. Israelte Kumpipa ahihleh, kros dawn apat hung kumkhia heh, huchileh ka gingta mei diing uhi.
Ama’n Pathian amuang vele; Amah deih ahihleh, tuin hunkheta hen, ‘Pathian Tapa ka hi,’ achi ngaala,” achi uhi.
Hu suamhaatte, Amah toh kikilhbehte’n zong huchibangmahin ahousia uhi.
Huleh daah guup apatin daah kuahna tandongin leitung pumpi ahung mialta hi.
Huin daah kuahna diing veelin Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakthani?” achi hi, huchu, “Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bang diinga hung taaisan na hiai?” chihna ahi.
Amah kawma ding khenkhatte’n huchu ajaah tahun, “Hi Pa’n Elijah akou ahi,” achi uhi.
A lahva mi khat ataai pah a, spanji ala a, uain thuuh ah adiah a, sialluang mong ah ataah a, adawn diingin ape tou hi.
Adangte’n chu, “Huchisah in; Amah hundam diingin Elijah ahung na eimah i en diing uh,” achi uhi.
Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin akikou kiit a, a hagau ahahta hi.
Huleh en in, Pathian biahinn a puanjaah chu atunglam apat anuailam tanin keeh nih ahung kisuah hi; huleh jiil ahung liing a, suangpite ahung pawhkeeh a,
huleh haante ahung kihong a; misiangthou ihmusate sapum tampi kaihthohin aumta va;
huleh Amah thohkiit nungin haante apat hung pawtdohin khopi siangthou ah aluut va, mi tampi kawmah akilaah uhi.
Huin sepaih zahoutu leh a kawma Jesu veenga umte’n jiilliing leh sil hung umte amuh tahun nasatahin alauta va, “Hichu Pathian Tapa tahzet ahi,” achi uhi.
Huleh Galili gam apat Amah nna atohsah jeel kawmva Jesu hung jui numei tamtah hu mun ah aum va, gaal gamlatah apatin aen zing va,
hute lahah chu Mari Magdalini, Jakob leh Jose nu Mari, huleh Zebedi tate nu chu aum uhi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin, Jesu nungjui hive, Arimathia khua a um a min Joseph kichi, mihausa khat ahung hi.
Hi pa chu Pilat kawmah achiah a Jesu luang angeen hi. Huin Pilat in a luang chu piaah diingin thu apia hi.
Huleh Joseph in Jesu luang chu ala a, puan neem siangtahin atuam a,
huleh a haan thah suang khuaah hawm ah asial a, huleh haan kot ah suang lianpi khat aliihluut a, achiahta hi.
Huleh Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang hutah ah, haan majawn ah touin aum uhi.
Huleh ajiingni, huchu khawlni diinga Kisahkhawl ni jiingni ahi a, siampu lalte leh Pharisaite chu Pilat kawmah ahung khawm va,
“Pu, hu miheem haatpa’n adam laia, ‘Ni thum nungin ka thoukiit diing,’ achih ka hezing uhi.

Hujiahin haan chu ni thum ni tan hoihtaha veen diingin thu pia in, huchilou inchu jaan chiangin a nungjuite hungin a luang avagu diing va, mipi lahah ‘Misi lah akipatin athoukiitta hi,’ achi kha diing uhi. Huchileh heembawlna masa saangin heembawlna nunung asejaw kha diing hi,” achi uhi.
Pilat in a kawmvah, “Veengtu mi na nei uh ahi sih maw; chiah unla na theih patawp un veeng hoihsahta un,” achi hi.
Huchiin achiah va haan chu hoihtahin aenchian va, a suang achiamchih va veengtu akoihta uhi.
Huin Sabbath ni beizoh, hapta ni masapeen diing khua ahung vaah kuanin, Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang chu haan en diingin ahung uhi.
Huleh en in, jiil nasatahin ahung liing hi; ajiahchu Lalpa angel khat vaan apatin ahung kumsuh a, haan kot apat suang aliih khia a, a tungah atouta hi.
A meel kilat daan chu kawlphe bangmai ahi a, huleh a paunsilh chu vuuh bangin avaam hi.
Huleh amah alauh jiahun veengtute chu akithing va, misi bangin ahung umta uhi.
Hizongleh angel in numeite ahoupih a, a kawmvah, “Lau sih un, Jesu kilhbeha um chu na hawl uh, chih ka he hi.
Amah hitah ah aum sih, ajiahchu Ama’n asoi bangin athouta hi. Hung unla, Lalpa lupna mun hung enmah un.

Huleh kintahin chiah unla nungjuite kawmah misi lah apatin Amah athoukiitta hi, chih vahilh un, huleh ngai un, Galili gam lamah na ma vah achiah hi; hu mun ah Amah na mu diing uh. Ngai un, ka hung hilh zouta hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin amahuh chu lau leh kipaah mahmah kawmin haan apatin kintahin achiah va, a nungjuite vahilh diingin ataaita uhi.
Huleh a nungjuite vahilh diinga achiah laiun, en in, Jesu’n amahuh anatuaah a, “Chibai,” achi hi. Huin amahuh ahung va, a keengte tuin abia uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Lau sih un; chiah unla ka unaute Galili gam a chiah diingin vahilh un, huleh hu mun ah ahung mu diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huin amahuh achiah laiun, en in, veengtute khenkhat khopi sungah ahung va siampu lalte kawmah sil umdaan zousiah avahilh uhi.
Huleh upate toh akikhop va akihoutuah zohun, sepaihte kawmah sum tampi apia va,
a kawmvah, “‘Jaan in ka ihmut kaal un a nungjuite ahung va, Amah anaguta uh,’ chi un.
Huleh gamoptu’n anajaah leh, kei un amah ka thuzoh diingva nanguh ka hung hunkhe na diing uh,” achi uhi.
Huchiin sum chu ala va amahuh ahilh bang ngeeiun abawlta va; huleh hi thu chu Judate lahah adalhjaah a tuni tanin akisoi nalai hi.
Huin nungjui sawmlekhatte chu Galili gam ah Jesu’n aguatsah taang ah achiah uhi.
Huleh Amah amuh tahun abia va, hizongleh khenkhat in aginglel uhi.
Huin Jesu chu a kawmva hungin amahuh ahoupih a, “Vaan leh lei a thuneihna zousiah ka kawmah piaah ahita.
Hujiahin chiah unla, nam chin laha mi nungjuiin siam unla, Pa leh Tapa leh Hagau Siangthou min in baptis unla,
thu ka hung piaah zousiah jui diingin thuhilh un; huleh ngai un, kei bangchihtanin khovel tawp dongin na kawmvah ka um zing diing hi,” achi hi. Amen.
Pathian Tapa, Jesu Khrist tanchinpha hung kipatna;
Zawlneite Lehkhabute ah hichiin anakigial hi: “En in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, Ama’n na lampi asial diing hi.”
“Gamdaai a kikou aw in: ‘LALPA lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un,’” chiin.
Johan in gamdaai ah abaptis a, sualte ngaihdamna diinga kisiihna baptis thu ataangkoupih hi.
Huleh Judia Gam mi zousiah leh Jerusalem a umte chu apawt va, a kawmah avachiah va, a sualte uh kiphuangin Jordan Luui ah baptisma atang chiat uhi.
Huleh Johan in sangawngsau mul a kibawl puan asilh a, a kawng chu savun kawnggaah in agaah a, huleh khaukhup leh gam khuaizu ane hi.
Huleh, “Ka nung ah kei saanga lianjaw khat ahung a, kei chu kuuna a keengtophah khau suut taah zong ka hi sih hi.
Ke’n chu tui ah ka hung baptis ngeei a, hizongleh Ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou in nanguh ahung baptis diing,” chiin ataangkoupih hi.
Hu hun laiin hichi ahung hi a, Jesu chu Galili gam a Nazareth apatin ahung a, Jordan ah Johan in baptisma atangsah hi.
Huleh Jesu tui lah apat ahung pawt tahin, vaan kihong leh Hagau vakhu banga a tunga hung kumsuh amu pah hi.
Huin vaan apatin aw khat ahung ging a, “Nang ka Tapa deihtah na hi a, na tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Hagau in kintahin Amah chu gamdaai ah asawldoh pah hi.
Huleh ni sawmli gamdaai ah Setan in aheem a, gamsate lahah aum a, angelte’n a nna atohsah uhi.
Huin Johan suangkul a khuma aum zohin, Jesu chu Pathian lalgam tanchinpha soiin Galili gam ah ahung a,
huleh, “Ahun atungta a, Pathian lalgam anaita hi. Kisiih unla tanchinpha gingta un,” achi hi.
Huleh Galili Diil geia avaahna ah Simon leh a sanggampa Andru diil a leen sep amu hi, ajiahchu amahuh ngamanmi ahi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hung jui un, mihing mantuin ka hung siam diing,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un a leente uh nusiain Amah ajui pah uhi.
Hu apat Amah themkhat achiah gamlaat leh Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan amu hi, amahuh zong a leen uh phoh a kuang a um mah ahi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n amahuh akou pah a, huin amah un a pa uh Zebedi toh a thalaahte uh kuang a nusiain Amah ajuita uhi.
Huin amahuh chu Kapernaum ah aluut va, huleh Amah chu Sabbath ni’n sinagog ah aluut pah a, thu ahilh hi.
Huleh amah un a thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah uhi, ajiahchu Ama’n daanjilsahtute bang hilouin, thuneitahin amahuh thu ahilh hi.
Huin sinagog ah hagau niin paai mi khat ana-um a, huleh amah chu akikoudoh a,
“Nazareth Jesu, ka tangun hung umsah in! Nang leh kei un bang kizopna ahiai i neih? Kei uh sumang diinga hung na hi maw? Nang koi na hiai chih ka hung he hi, Pathian Misiangthou na hi!” chiin.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amah ataai a, “Sip inla, a sung apatin hung pawt in,” achi hi.
Huleh hagau niin in mipa chu alohliing vah a, hah koua kikouin a sung apat ahung pawtta hi.

Huin a bawnun limdang asa mahmah va, huchiin, “Hi bang ahita ei leh? Bangchibang thuhilhna thah ahita ei? Ajiahchu Ama’n thuneitahin dawi niinte nasan thu apia a, huchiin a thu amang uhi,” chiin akidong tuah uhi.
Huleh Galili gam kiimveel zousiah ah a tanchin athangsuaah pahta hi.
Huin sinagog apat ahung pawt tahun Simon leh Andru inn ah Jakob leh Johan toh aluut pah uhi.
Huleh Simon sungnu chu khosih a chinain analum a, huleh amah un amahnu tanchin chu Amah anahilh pah uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n amahnu chu a khut a vatuin aphong a, huin a khosih in anuse pah hi. Huleh amahnu’n a nna uh atohsah hi.
Huleh nitaah, ni tum zohin, damlou zousiah leh dawipaaite a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Huleh khopi sunga mi zousiah chu inn kotbul ah akikhawm uhi.
Huin Ama’n mi tampi natna tuamtuam a nate asudam a, dawi tampi anohdoh a, huleh dawite’n Amah aheet jiahun dawite haam diing Ama’n aphal sih hi.
Huleh jiingkaal in, khovaah ma daihin athou a, apawt a huleh munsip ah avachiah a; hutah ah ahaamtei hi.
Huleh Simon leh a kawma umte’n Amah ahawl uhi.
Amah amuh tahun a kawmah, “Mi zousiah in nang ahung hawl uhi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Khopi nai lahte ah zong thu ka soi theihna diingin i chiah diing uh; hu diing maha hung kuan ka hih jiahin,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n Galili gam pumpi a sinagogte ah thu asoi a, huleh dawite anohdoh jeel hi.
Huin mi phaah khat Amah kawmah ahung a, a ma a khuupdinin, “Na uut inchu, na hung susiang thei hi,” chiin angeen hi.
Huleh Jesu’n alainat mahmah a, a khut a zamin akhoih a, a kawmah, “Ka uut hi, siangta in,” achi hi.
Asoi zoh tahin, a phaahna in anuse pah a ahung siangta hi.
Huleh Ama’n akhapchat a asawlmang pah hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “En in, koima kawmah bangma soi het sin; hizongleh chiah inla, siampu kawmah vakimusah inla, na sian thu amah uh heetsahna diinga Mosi in thu apiaah silte valaan in,” achi hi.

Hizongleh amah chu achiahdoh a, hu thu nasatahin ataangkoupih a aphuangdalh panta hi, huchiin Jesu chu langtangtahin khopi sung ah aluut theita sih hi. Hizongleh khopolam gamdaai munte ah aum jawta a; huleh mun chin apatin a kawmah mite ahung uhi.
Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin Kapernaum ah aluut kiit a, huleh inn ah aum chih thu ahung thangta hi.
Huin kotkhaah kiim tanpha a, umna diing umlou khopin mi tampi ahung kikhawm pah uhi. Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah thu asoi hi.
Huin mijeng khat mi li in hung jawngin a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Mipi jiaha a kawm nai a ahung theih louh tahun a umna inn tung ahawhkhia uhi. Huchia asuhvang zohun, mijeng chu a jawnna lupna toh akhaikhesuh uhi.
Jesu’n a ginna uh amuhin mijeng kawmah, “Tapa, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Hizongleh daanjilsahtute khenkhat hu mun a tou aum va, a lungsim un hichiin angaihtuah uhi,
“Hi Pa’n bang diinga Pathian soisia a hichibang thu asoi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koi ahiai sualnate ngaidam thei?” chiin.
Huleh Jesu’n a lungtang un huchibangin angaihtuah uh chih a lungsim in anahe pah a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hi thute na lungtang va ngaihtuah na hi viai?
Mijeng kawma, ‘Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla, na lupna la inla, keeng in chiahta in,’ chih khoi abaihlam jaw ei?
Hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna diing thuneihna anei chih na heetna diingun,” achi hi. Huin Ama’n mijeng kawmah,
“Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn lamah chiahta in ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah chu athou pah a, a lupna lain a bawnva mitmuh ah achiahdohta hi. Huchiin a bawnun limdang asa va, “Huchibang mawngmawng i mu ngei sih,” chiin Pathian apaahtawi uhi.
Huin Amah chu diil geiah achiahdoh kiit a; huleh mipi zousiah a kawmah ahung va, amahuh thu anahilh hi.
Huleh Amah apai laiin Alphai tapa Levi, siahdonna mun a toulai amu a, a kawm ah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi. Huin Levi athou a, Amah ajuita hi.
Huin Jesu chu Levi inn ah an ne diingin dohkaan ah atou a, siahdongtu tampi leh misualte chu Jesu leh a nungjuite toh an ne diingin atou khawm uhi; ajiahchu tampi ahi va, huleh Jesu nung ajui uhi.

Huleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n siahdongtute leh misualte toh Jesu an nekhawmlai amuh tahun, a nungjuite kawmah, “Bang diinga Ama’n siahdongtute leh misualte toh nea dawn khawm ahiai?” achi uhi.

Jesu’n huchu ajaah tahin a kawmvah, “Mi chidamte’n daktor amamoh sih va, hizongleh damloute’n amamoh uhi. Midihtatte kou diinga hung ka hi sih a, hizongleh misualte kisiihsah diinga koua hung ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.

Huleh Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite’n an angawl uhi. Huin a kawma hungin hi thu asoi va, “Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite nungjuite’n an angawl va, hizongleh bang diinga na nungjuite’n angawl louh uh ahiai?” chiin.
Huchiin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Moupa moupuite kawma aum laisiah moupuite’n an angawl thei ngei viaimah? Moupa a kawmva aum laisiah an angawl thei sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh moupa a lah vapat a puimang hun ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin angawl diing uhi.
“Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in aphoh ngei sih uhi. Phohta leh uh, a phohna puan thah in a puan lui chu akaikeeh diing a, huleh ahung keehjaw seem diing hi.

Huleh mi koimah in uain thah chu savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih uh; thunta leh uh, uain thah in savun thawl lui chu aphukeeh diing a, uain akibo diing a, savun thawl chu asegawp diing hi. Hizongleh uain thah chu savun thawl thah a thun jawh diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Sabbath ni in buhlei lai tawnin achiah va; a nungjuite’n achiah kawm-un buhvuite asihtan panta uhi.
Huin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, “En in, bangjiaha amah un Sabbath ni a daan in aphallouh bawl ahi viaimah?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “David leh a kawma umte’n ataahsap va, huleh agilkial laiva asilbawl uh:

bangchidaana Abiathar siampu lalpeen ahihlai a Pathian inn a luut a, siampute chauh in aneeh siang tanghou siah avaneeh a, a kawma umte kawma zong apiaah ahiai chih na sim kha ngei sih viaimah?” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Sabbath chu mihing a diinga bawl ahi a, mihing chu Sabbath a diinga bawl ahi sih hi.
Hujiahin Mihing Tapa chu Sabbath ni Lalpa zong ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah chu sinagog ah aluut kiit a, hutah ah mi khut jeng khat ana-um hi.
Huleh Amah aheeh theihna diingun, Sabbath ni a asuhdam leh asuhdam louh aensim uhi.
Huin Ama’n khut jengpa kawmah, “A lahvah dingdoh in,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Sabbath ni in sil hoih bawl asiang ei ahihlouhleh sil hoihlou bawl? Hinna hutkhiah asiang ei, ahihlouhleh suhlup?” achi hi. Hizongleh amahuh asip chiat uhi.
Huchiin a lungtang uh khauh jiaha lungsim na leh lungthah pumin amahuh aenveel a, hu mipa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Hupa’n a khut azandoh a, a khut chu alang khat lam tobangin adamta hi.
Huin Pharisaite chu apawtdoh va, Amah asuhlup theih daan diing uh ngaihtuahin Herod pawlte toh akihoukhawm pah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu a nungjuite toh diil lamah achiah mang hi. Huleh Galili gam apat mipi nasatahin amah ajui va, huleh Judia gam
leh Jerusalem leh Idumai leh Jordan gaallam apat, huleh Tura leh Sidon kiim apat bangin mipi nasatahte’n a silbawl loupi daante ajaah tahun Amah kawmah ahung uhi.
Huleh mipi atam jiahin Amah diinga kuang neu khat guatsa a koih diingin a nungjuite ahilh hi, huchilou inchu Amah anehthop kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu mi tampi asudamta a, huchiin natna nei photmah in Amah akhoih theihna diingun aboh lutlut uhi.
Huleh dawi niinte’n Amah amuh un, a ma ah bohkhupin, “Nang Pathian Tapa na hi,” chiin akikou uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a tanchin phuangdoh lou diingin amahuh khauhtahin akhap hi.
Huleh taang tungah achiahtou a adeihtuamte a kawmah akou hi. Huleamahuh a kawmah achiah tou uhi.
Huin sawmlenihte chu a kawma um diing leh thusoia asawlkhiah theihna diing leh
damloute asuhdam va dawite anohdoh theihna diingva thuneihna aneih theihna diingun aguatta hi.
Simon kawmah min dang apia a, huchu Peter ahi;
Zebedi tapa Jakob leh Jakob sanggampa Johan kawmah min dang apia a, amahuh chu Bonerge asa a, huchu, “Vaanpi ging tate,” chihna ahi a;
Andru, Philip, Bartholomai, Mathai, Thomas, Alphai tapa Jakob, Thaddai, Kanaan mi Simon;
huleh Jesu mansahpa Juda Iskariot zong atel hi. Huleh innsung khat ah aluut uhi.
Huleh an nasan ne thei lou khopin mipi nasatah ahung kikhawm kiit uhi.
Hizongleh Amah mite’n hichu ajaah tahun Amah pui diingin akuan uhi, ajiahchu amah un, “Amah angol ahita,” achi uhi.
Huleh daanjilsahtute khenkhat Jerusalem apat a hung suhte’n, “Amah chu Beelzebul in akol ahi a,” huleh, “dawimangpa jiaha dawite anohdoh ahi,” achi uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n amahuh akou a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu in asoi a: “Bangchiin Setan in Setan anohdoh thei diai?
Lalgam khat kilangkhenin kidou leh, hu lalgam chu ading thei sih diing hi.
Innkuan khat kilangkhenin kidou leh, hu innkuan zong ading thei sih diing hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah kidoua akilangkhen leh, ading zou sih diing a, amangthaai jaw diing hi.
Mi koimah in mihaatpa akaantom masat louhngaal leh, mihaatpa inn a luutin a neihlelamte alaahsah thei sih a, huleh akaantom nung chiangin a neihlelamte alaahsah mei diing hi.
“Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mihing tate chu a sualna zousiah uh leh Pathian asoisiatna sualna zousiah uh ngaihdamsah ahi diing a;
hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu ngaihdamin aum ngei sih diing a, kumtuang siamlouhtanna lauhuai atang diing hi.”
Ajiahchu amah un, “Ama’n hagau niin anei ahi,” achih jiahun.
Huin a sanggamte leh a nu ahung va, inn pua a dingin Amah kou diingin mi asawl uhi.
Huleh a kiim ah mipihon atou va; amah un a kawmah, “En in, innpua ah na nu leh na sanggamte’n ahung hawl uh,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte koite ahiai?” achi hi.
Huin akiim a toute aenveel a, “En un, ka nu leh ka sanggamte!
Ajiahchu koipouh Pathian deihjawng bawl photmah chu ka sanggampa leh ka sanggamnu leh ka nu ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n diil pangah thu ahilh pan kiitta a, huleh mipi nasatah a kawma ahung kikhop jiahun diil tunga kuang ah akal a, atouta a, mipi zousiah chu diil pangah aum uhi.
Huin amahuh chu tehkhinthu in thu tampi ahilh a, huleh a thuhilhna ah a kawmvah:
“Ngaikhia un! En un, haichithehtu khat haichi thehin akuan hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, atheh laiin, khenkhat lam geiah atu a, huleh hute chu tungleeng vate ahung va ane zouta uhi.
Khenkhat suangsilei lahah atu a, huleh lei asah louh jiahin apou pah hi.
Hizongleh ni ahung satin nisa in akaang a, huleh zung aneih louh jiahin agawgawpta hi.
Huleh khenkhat chu louling lahah atu a, ling ahung khanglian a, adeepmangta a, huleh gah aneita sih hi.
Hizongleh khenkhat chu lei hoih ah atu a, apou doh a, akhanglian a huleh agah hi: khenkhat aleh sawmthum bang, aleh sawmguup bang leh aleh za bangin ahung pungta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh a tanga aum laiin a kiim a sawmlenihte toh umte’n tehkhinthu tungtaang adong uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pathian lalgam thukiphual chu nanguh heet diinga phal ahi a, hizongleh polam mite diingin chu sil zousiah tehkhinthu a soi ahi.

Huchiin, ‘Amah un muh chu amuh ngeei va hizongleh atheihsiam louhna diingun, huleh jaah chu ajaah ngeei va hizongleh aheetsiam louhna diingun; huchilou inchu a lungsim uh ahung heikiit diing va, a sualnate uh ngaihdam ahi kha diing,’” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hi tehkhinthu na hesiam sih uh maw? Huchi ahihin tehkhinthu zousiah bangchiin na hesiamta diviai?
Haichithehtu in chu thu atheh hi.
Huleh lam geia thu kithehnate chu hite ahi uhi. Thu ajaah tahun Setan ahung pah a, a lungtang va thu kitheh chu alamang hi.
Huleh huchibangmahin hite chu suangsi lei a kithehte ahi uh, thu chu ajaah tahun kipaahtahin apom pah va;
hizongleh amah vah zung anei sih va, tomtakhat chauh aum uhi. Hu nunga thu jiaha gimthuaahna leh suhduhdahna atuaah chiangun, apuuh pah uhi.
Huleh louling laha kitheh chu hite ahi uh; hute’n chu thu aja va,
hizongleh khovel awlmohnate leh hauhsat uutna a heemnate leh sildang dang deihgohnate hung luutin thu chu adeepmangta a, gahlouin ahung umta uhi.
Hizongleh lei hoih a chi kitheh chu hite ahi uhi: thu chu jain apom va, aleh sawmthum bang, aleh sawmguup bang leh aleh za bangin agah uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Thaumei loh nuai aha, ahihlouhleh lupna nuai aha ah koih diingin akila ngei eimah? Hu saangin a tunna ah akikoih jaw sih diaimah?
Ajiahchu kiphuang lou diinga iim bangmah aum sih a, kilang lou diinga phual zong bangmah aum sih a, hizongleh vaah ah puaahdoh ahi diing hi.
Mi koipouhin jaahna diinga bil aneih leh, ja heh,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang ahiai na jaah uh pilvaang un. Na tehna ngeimah un ahung tehsah diing va; huleh nanguh angaikhete kawmah ahung piaah behlap diing uhi.
Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu a kawmah piaahbeh ahi diing a; hizongleh koipouh aneilou chu aneihsun zong laahsah ahi diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n, “Pathian lalgam chu mi’n lei ah haichi tuh henla,
huleh jaan chiangin ihmuin suun chiangin thou henla, haichi chu hung pouin khangdoh henla, amahpa’n lah bangchibanga hung khang ahiai chih he sih leh, hutobang ahi.
Ajiahchu lei in amah in gah ahung suah jeel a: amasain a nah, huin a vuui, huin a vuui ah a tangching asuah hi.
Hizongleh a gah chu ahung min chiangin, buhlaah ahuntaah jiahin kawite in a-at pahta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n, “Pathian lalgam chu bang toh i tehkhinta diai? Ahihlouhleh bang toh tehkhin a soi diing i hi viai?
Hichu ankam tang khat lei a akituh chiangin, haichi zousiah saangin aneupeen a,
hizongleh atuh nungin ahung pou a, loupa zousiah saangin ahung lianjaw a, baa lian pipi ahung nei a, huchiin tungleeng vate a liim ah agiah uh,” achi hi.
Huleh hichibang tehkhinthu tampi in amahuh heettheih khamkham in a kawmvah thu asoi hi.
Hizongleh tehkhinthu louin a kawmvah thu asoi sih hi. Huleh amahuh ngen a aum chiangun, Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah sil zousiah ahilhchian jeel hi.
Hu ni mahin, nitaahlam mialjui ahung hih tahin, Ama’n a kawmvah, “Diil gaal lehlam ah i kaai diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin amah un mipite asawlkhiah zoh tahun, kuang a Amah ana-um bangbangin Amah apaipihta uhi. Huleh a kawmah kuang neu dangte zong aum hi.
Huleh huihpi nasatah ahung nungta a, tuikinawh in kuang chu ahung nawh zuizui a, kuang ah tui chu ahung luut panta hi.
Hizongleh Amah chu kuang mei lamah taangkhap khapin, ihmuin aum hi. Huleh aphawng va, a kawmah, “Houtupa, ka manthaai uh poisa lou na hi maw?” achi uhi.
Huin Amah ahung thou a, huih chu ataai a, tuipi kawmah, “Daai inla, um kinken in!” achi hi. Huin huihnung chu akhawlta a, ahung daaikeeita hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang diinga lau na hi viai? Bangachia ginna neilou nalai na hi viai?” achi hi.
Huin amah un alau mahmah va, khat leh khat kihouin, “Amah hi bangtobang mi ahiai, huih leh tuipi tanpha in zong a thu amang uh!” akichituah uhi.
Huin diil gaal, Gadara mite gam ahung tungta uhi.
Huleh kuang apat ahung pawt tahin, haante apat hung pawt hagau niin paai mi khat in Amah anakituaahpih a,
hupa chu haante a teeng ahi a; huleh mi koima’n akaan thei sih a, khainiang in zong atutaang zou sih hi,
ajiahchu kol buhin khainiang in anakaanta uhi. Huleh khainiangte chu abottan a, kolte asugawp a, mi koima’n athunun zou sih uhi.
Suun leh jaan in taangte leh haante a um zingin akikou a, suang in amah leh amah akijiih keeh hi.
Hizongleh ama’n gamlatah apat Jesu amuh tahin, ataai a bohkhupin avabia hi.
Huleh aw ngaihtaha kikouin, “Jesu, nang Pathian Tungnungpeen Tapa, kei leh nang in bang kizopna i nei ei? Hung soisa lou diingin Pathian min in ka hung ngen hi,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu Jesu’n a kawmah, “Nang hagau niin, hi pa sung apat hung pawt in,” anachihtaah jiahin.
Huin Ama’n, “Na min bang ahiai?” chiin adong hi. Huleh ama’n, “Ka min chu legion ahi, ajiahchu tampi ka hi uh,” chiin adawng hi.
Huleh hu gam apat amahuh sawlmang lou diingin Jesu kawmah hah ngetin angeen hi.
Huin taang pang ah voh hon tampi ataa hi.
Huleh hagau niinte zousiah in, “Voh sung ah hung sawl in, a sungva ka luut theihna diingun,” chiin a kawmah angeen uhi.

Huleh Jesu’n amahuh aphalsah pah hi. Huin hagau niinte chu apawt va, voh sung ah aluut va, huleh voh hon saang nih phial chu keen ah, tuipi lamah hah taaiin ataaisuhta va; huchiin tui ah akelumta uhi.
Huin voh chingtute chu ataai va, khopi sung leh khota ah hi siltung avahilh uhi. Huleh amahuh chu bang sil hung um ahita eimah, chia en diingin ahung uhi.
Huin Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun, dawimat, legion paaipa chu puan silh a, lungsim ngeina pua a hoihtaha anatou chu ahung mu va, huin alauta uhi.
Huleh amute’n dawi matpa tunga sil tun daan leh voh umtan chu mipite anahilh veh uhi.
Huin amah un a gam uh nuse diingin Jesu angeenta uhi.
Huleh Amah chu kuang a aluut zohin, dawi paaipa’n Jesu kawma aum theihna diingin angeen hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n aphal sih a, a kawmah, “Na inn ah chiah inla na lawmte kawmah Lalpa’n nang diinga sil loupi ahung bawlsah daante leh nang ahung lainat daante vahilh in,” achi jawta hi.
Huin achiah a, Jesu’n amah diinga sil loupi abawlsah daante Dekapoli gam ah ataangkoupihta a, huleh mi zousiah in limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Huin Jesu kuang a diil gaalkhat lama ahung kaai kiit zohin mipi tampi a kawmah ahung paikhawm va, Amah chu diil pangah aum hi.
Huleh en in, sinagog a vaihawmte laha mi khat a min Jaira kichi ahung hi. Huleh Jesu amuh tahin a keeng bul ah abohkhup a,
“Ka tanu naupang neucha asi dehdeh hi. Hung inla atung ah na khut hung nga in, amahnu adam a, huleh ahin theihna diingin,” chiin hah ngetin angeen hi.
Huchiin Jesu chu amah toh achiahta a, huleh mipi nasatah in Amah juiin atuam hut-hut uhi.
Huin numei khat kum sawmlenih sipawt a damlou aum a,
huleh daktor tampi etkolna nuaiah naahtahin anathuaahta hi. Amahnu’n a neih zousiah anaseeng zouta a, hizongleh bangma phatuam louin akhawh jawseem hi.
Amahnu’n Jesu tanchin anajaah tahin, anung ah mipi lahah ahung pai a, a puan akhoih hi.
Ajiahchu a lungsim in, “A puan chauh tham kha zongleng, ka dam mei diing,” chiin angaihtuah hi.
Huin a sipawt chu akang pah a, huleh a natna apat adamta chih a tahsa ah akiheet hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a sung apat silbawltheihna apawt chih ahe pah a, mipi lahah akihei kiimveel a, “Koi ahiai ka puan khoih?” achi hi.
Hizongleh a nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Mipite’n ahung tuam hut-hut uh na mu a, ‘Koi ahiai ahung khoih?’ na chih,” achi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n hu sil bawlnu chu muh tumin aen kiimveel hi.
Hizongleh numeinu’n a tunga sil tung hein, lau leh liing pumin ahung a, a ma ah abohkhup a, a kawmah thudih zousiah ahilhta hi.
Huin Ama’n amahnu kawmah, “Tanu, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi. Hamuangtahin chiah inla, na natna apatin damta in,” achi hi.
Ama’n huchia asoi laiin, sinagog a vaihawmtupa inn apatin mi ahung a, “Na tanu asita hi. Bang diinga Houtupa subuai nalai na hiai?” ahung chi hi.
Jesu’n hi thu kisoi ajaah tahin, sinagog a vaihawmtu kawmah, “Lau sin, gingta mei in,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n Peter, Jakob leh Jakob sanggampa Johan chihlouh in Amah ajuih uh aphal sih hi.
Huin sinagog a vaihawmtu inn avatung a, anabuai vengvung leh kapa anamaau jeenjuunte avamu hi.
Amah ahung luut zohin, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga kap a hichi buai na hi viai? Naupangnu chu asi ahi sih, hizongleh ihmu ahi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un Amah chu anuihsan uhi. Hizongleh amahuh chu a bawnun apawtsah a, naupangnu nu leh pa leh a tonpihte apui a, naupangnu lupna ah aluut uhi.
Huin Ama’n naupangnu chu a khut in atu a, a kawmah, “Talitha kumi,” achi a, huchu “Naupangnu, thou in, ka hung chi ahi,” chihna ahi.
Huin naupangnu chu athou pah a, apai hi, ajiahchu amah chu kum sawmlenih mi ahita hi. Huleh amah un nasatahin limdang asa uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n koima hi thu hesah lou diingin amahuh khauhtahin athuhilh a, amahnu chu neeh diing bang aha piaah diing thu apia hi.
Huin hu apat apawtin Amah khua ngeei ah ahung a, huleh a nungjuite’n Amah ajui uhi.

Sabbath ni ahung hihin, sinagog ah thu ahilh panta hi. Huleh athuhilh ja mi tampite’n limdang asa va, “Hi Pa’n hi thute khoi apat amuh ahiai? A kawma pilna kipia bang pilna hi ahiai, a khut a hichitaha silmahte abawltaah mei!
Amah chu Mari tapa, Jakob, Josse, Juda leh Simon sanggampa, sing bawlpa khu hilou maw? A sanggam numeite hitah ah i kawma um hilou ahi uh maw?” achi uhi. Huchiin Amah tungah alunghita sih uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Zawlnei amah gam sung leh amah tanaute lah leh amah inn sungah chihlouh zahbawl louhin aum ngei sih hi,” achi hi.
Tuin mi damlou tawmchakhatte tunga khut nga a asuhdam chihlouh hutah ah sil loupi dang abawl sih hi.
Huleh agintaat louh jiahun Ama’n limdang asa mahmah hi. Huin khota haw a chiah kiimveelin thu ahilh jeel hi.
Huleh Ama’n nungjui sawmlenihte a kawmah akou a, nih nih in asawldoh a, hagau niinte tunga thuneihna zong apia hi.
Ama’n amah un akhualzinna va chiangphut chihlouh bangmah, kawljaal hileh tanghou hileh dangka-ip sung a zong sum keng lou diingin thu apia a,
hizongleh keengtophah chu but unla, huleh puannaah nih silh sih un, chiin thu apia hi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Khoi mun ah zong na tunna inn phot vah, hu apat na pawt masiah uh umden un.

Huleh koi hizongleh ahung tunsah louh va, na thu uh zong angaihkhiah louh uh leh, hu apat na pawt chiangun amahuh heetsahna diingin na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin hu khopi thuaah diing saangin Sodom leh Gomorrah thuaah chu adaan aum jaw diing!” achi hi.
Huchiin akuandoh va mite chu akisiih theihna diingun thu ataangkoupih uhi.
Huleh dawi tampi anohdoh va, damlou tampi thau nuhin asudam jeel uhi.

Huin a min athantaah jiahin kumpipa Herod in a tanchin anajata hi. Huin ama’n, “Hichu Baptistu Johan ahi. Amah chu misi lah apat kaihthoha um a, hujiaha hi silmah bawltheihnate’n amah a nna tong ahita veh,” achi hi.
Midangte’n, “Elijah ahi,” achi uhi. Huleh khenkhatte’n, “Zawlnei ahi, ahihlouhleh zawlneite laha khat ahi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Herod in ajaah tahin, “Hichu a ngawng ka tansahpa, Johan ngeei ahi, amah chu misi lah apat kaihthohkiit ahita,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu Herod in a sanggampa Philip ji Herodia akiteenpih a, Herodia jiahin mi asawl a, Johan chu amansah a, huleh amah chu kaanin suangkul ah akhumta hi.
Ajiahchu Johan in Herod kawmah, “Na sanggampa ji na kiteenpih daan in aphal sih,” anachi hi.
Hujiahin Herodia in Johan chiamchihin thah auut a, hizongleh athat thei sih hi,
ajiahchu Herod in Johan chu midihtat leh misiangthou ahi chih aheet jiahin alau a, ahuumbit jeel hi. Ama’n a thu ajaah tahin alungdong a, hizongleh kipaahtahin angaikhe jeel hi.
Huin Herod in a pianni lawma a miliante leh a sepaih houtuliante leh Galili gam a miliante a diinga ankuang alui laiin lemtaan ni khat ahung tung hi.
Huleh Herodia tanu ahung luut a, a ma vah alaam a, huleh Herod leh a kawma toute akipaahsah mahmah hi. Hujiahin kumpipa’n naupangnu kawmah, “Na deihdeih ngeen in, ka hung pe diing,” achi hi.
Amahnu kawmah, “Na hung nget photmah, ka lalgam kimkhat tanin ka hung pe diing,” chiin zong akihaahsial hi.
Huchiin amahnu chu apawt a, a nu kawmah, “Bang ka ngeen diai?” achi hi. Huleh a nu’n, “Baptistu Johan lutang!” anachi hi.
Huin amahnu chu kumpipa kawmah kintahin ahung luut pah a, “Baptistu Johan lutang tu mahmahin kuang khat in hung pe lehchin ka uut,” chiin angeen hi.
Huin kumpipa chu alungkham mahmah a; hizongleh a kihaahsialnate leh a ankuang umpihte jiahin anial nuam sih hi.
Huleh kumpipa’n mithattu khat asawl pah a, a lutang hung tawi diingin thu apia hi. Huleh amah chu chiahin suangkul sungah a ngawng avatanta a,
a lutang chu kuang khat in ahung tawi a, naupangnu apia a, naupangnu’n a nu kawmah apia hi.
Huleh Johan nungjuite’n hichu ajaah tahun, ahung va a luang ahung la va, haan ah avuita uhi.
Huin apostolte chu Jesu kawmah ahung kikhawm va a silbawlte uh leh a thuhilhte uh ahung hilh uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh chauhin hung unla, munsip ah tomkhat hung khawl phot un,” achi hi. Ajiahchu hutah ah mi ahung pai lehleh atam jiahin an nasan ane man sih uhi.
Huchiin amahuh chu kuang a kitawlin munsip ah atuam chiahta uhi.
Hizongleh mipite’n achiah lai uh amu va, mi tampi in Amah hein khopi zousiah apat keeng in ahung taai uhi. Amah un anamakhelh va a kawmah ahung khawmta uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n kuang apat ahung pawtdohin mipi nasatah amu a, achingtu bei belaam bang ahih jiahun alainat mahmah hi. Huchiin thu tampi ahilh panta hi.
Huin ni avaigeih mahmahtaah jiahin a nungjuite Amah kawmah ahung va, “Hi munsip ahi a, ni lah tum diing ahita hi.
I kiimveel a munte leh khuate a avachiah va, an neeh diing akilei theihna diingun amahuh sawldoh in, neeh diing bangma lah anei sih ngaal va,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nang un neeh diing pia un,” achi hi. Huin amah un a kawmah, “Tanghou dinari za nih man valei in neeh diing ka pe diing uh maw?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai? Chiah unla, vaen dihvua,” achi hi. Huin amah un aneih zah uh aheet tahun, “Beu ngaa leh nga nih,” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n mi zousiah hampa hing tunga ahon hon a tousah diingin thu apia hi.
Huchiin amahuh a gualgual in, zakhat khat bang, sawmngaa ngaa bangin atouta uhi.

Huin Ama’n hu tanghou beu ngaa leh nga nih chu ala a vaan lam enin avangpiaah a, tanghoute chu abalkeeh a, a ma va luisah diingin a nungjuite kawmah apia hi. Huleh nga nihte zong a bawnva lahah ahawm suaahsah hi.
Huchiin a bawnun ane va, avah chiatta uhi.
Huleh a neehvaal uh tanghou neng leh nga neng chu bawm sawmlenih dimin aluaah uhi.
Huleh tanghou nete chu pasal piching saang ngaa veel ahi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n mipite asawlkhiah kaala a nungjuite chu diil gaal lehlam a Bethsaida khua a anachiah masa diingin kuang ah atuangsah pah hi.
Huleh mipite asawlkhiah zohin, haamtei diingin taang ah achiahta hi.
Huleh jaan ahung hihin, kuang chu diil laiah aumta a, Amah chu angenin a piau ah aum hi.

Huin Ama’n amahuh chu huih in alehmuut jiaha kuang theihtawpa jaap a, amangbat daan uh amu hi. Huleh jaanveen lina khovaah kuan lamin Amah chu diil tungah a keeng in apai a, a kawm lam uh ahung juan a, amahuh paipeel atum hi.
Huchiin Amah un Amah chu diil tunga pai amuh tahun siha khat hiinteh chiin, akikou doh uhi;
ajiahchu a bawnun Amah amu va, amangbangta uhi. Hizongleh Ama’n amahuh ahoupih pah a, “Hamuangtahin um un! Keimah ka hi; lau sih un,” achi hi.
Huin kuang ah a kawmvah atuangdoh a, huih chu atawpta hi. Huin amah un soi theihlouh khopin limdang asa uhi.
Ajiahchu amah un tanghou tungtaang silmahte ahesiam nawn sih uhi, a lungtang uh ataah jiahin.
