Huleh gaal lehlam akaai tahun, Genesaret gam atung va, hutah ah a kuang uh akhit uhi.
Huleh kuang apat apawtdoh tahun, mite’n Amah anahe pah va,
hu gam sung pumpi ah ataai kiimveel va, Amah aum hi chih ajaahna lamlam adelh va, damloute a lupna un ahung jawng uhi.

Huleh khotate leh khopite, ahihlouhleh gamningkawi lah bang ah khoi mun ah zong aluutna phot ah damloute chu vanjuaahna kotzing bang ah alumsah va, a puanmong beeh khoih theih angeen va, huchiin akhoih photmah adam jeel uhi.
Huin Jerusalem apat hung pai Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute khenkhat a kawmah ahung uhi.
Huleh amah un a nungjuite khenkhat in khut niin pum a, chih chu khut silloua an aneeh uh amuhun, dih asa sih uhi.
Ajiahchu Pharisaite leh Judate zousiah in upate tawndaan ajuih zing jiahun, a khut uh pilvaangtah a sillouin an ane ngei sih uhi.
Huleh dawlmun apat ahung chiangun, kisusiang louin an ane sih uhi. Huleh sildang tampi juih diinga amuh uh aum a, hute chu noute, beelte, sumbeelte, leh lupna suhsiang bang ahi.
Huin Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute’n, “Bang diinga na nungjuite upate tawndaan banga umlou a, khut silloua an ne ahi viai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Isai in nanguh milepchiahte thu anasoilawh dihten hi: ‘Hi mite’n a muuh un ahung zahbawl va, hizongleh a lungtang uh kei apatin agamla hi.
Mihing thupiaahte chu ginna thuhilhna banga ahilh jiahun ahung be thawn uhi,’ chih gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu nang un Pathian thupiaah paampaihin, mihing tawndaan na tu va, huchu beel leh noute sil bang, huleh adang tampi huchibang silte na bawl uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na tawndaan uh na juih theihna diingun Pathian thupiaah paampaih daan na siam ten uhi.
Ajiahchu Mosi in ‘Na nu leh na pa zah in,’ huleh ‘Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha haamsiat chu suhlupin um heh,’ achi hi.
Hizongleh nang un, ‘Mi’n a nu aha, a pa aha kawma, “Kei apat panpihna silpiaah na muh diing photmah chu Korban ahita, achih inchu,”’ huchu Pathian kawma pia, chihna ahi a,
huchiin ama’n a nu aha, a pa aha diinga bangma abawlsah na phal sih va,
na kipiaah sawn jeel uh na tawndaan uh jiahin Pathian thu bangmahlou na suaahsah uhi. Huleh huchibang sil tampi na bawl uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n mipi zousiah a kawmah akou a, a kawmvah, “Na bawnun ka thu ngaikhia unla, hesiam un:
mihing polam apata a sunga luut a, amah subuaah thei bangma aum sih a, hizongleh amah apata hung pawt silte, hute ngeei chu mihing subuaah ahijaw hi.
Mi koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n mipi nusia a inn sunga aluut zohin, a nungjuite’n hu tehkhinthu Amah adong chian uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh zong huchilawma heetsiamna bei na hi uh maw? Bang sil hitaleh polam apat a mihing sunga luut in amah asubuaah thei sih hi,
ajiahchu neeh photmah lungtang sungah aluut sih a, gil sunga luutin, an zousiah asusiang a, daileenna ah apawtkhe mei ahi chih na he sih uh maw?” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n, “Mihing sung apat a hung pawt, hu ngeei in mihing asubuaah hi,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu sunglam a mihing lungtang apatin ngaihtuahna giloute, aangkawmnate, kingaihna thaanghuaite, tualthahnate,
guuhtaatnate, eennate, giitlouhnate, heemhaatnate, ganta banga huuhnate, kimitsiipnate, soisiatnate, kiletsahnate leh ngolhuainate bang ahung pawt veu hi.
Hi silgilou zousiah chu sunglam apat ahung pawt va mihingte asubuaah veu uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Amah athou a hu apatin Tura leh Sidon gam sungah achiah hi. Huleh inn khat ah koima heet diing uutlouin aluut a, hizongleh akiphual zou tuan sih hi.
Ajiahchu numei khat a tanu hagau niin paai in a tanchin anaja a, huleh ahung a, a keeng bul ah abohkhup hi.
Hu numeinu chu Jentel mi ahi a, jaat lam thu ah chu Sirophoniki mi ahi a, huleh amah nu’n a tanu sunga dawi niin nohdohsah diingin angeen hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Tate suhtaiin um masa phot heh, ajiahchu tate tanghou laahsah a uite kawma piaah akilawm sih,” achi hi.
Hizongleh amahnu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Lalpa, hih jaw ahi a, ahihvaangin dohkaan nuaiah uite’n zong tate tanghou neng kia ane saam uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n amahnu kawmah, “Na thusoi jiahin chiahta in; dawi chu na tanu sung apatin apawtta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amahnu a inn ahung tunin dawi chu anapawtdohta a, a tanu lupna a lum ahung muta hi.
Huleh Tura leh Sidon gam sung apat pawt kiitin, Dekapoli gam lai tawnsuaah pehin Galili Diil ahung tungta hi.
Huin mi bilngong haam zong haam chiang theilou khat a kawmah ahung pui va, a tunga khut nga diingin angeen uhi.
Huin Ama’n mipi lah apatin amah apui tuam a, a khut zung in a bil sungte akhoih a, huleh a chil asiat a, a lei akhoih hi.
Huin vaan lam enin akhuaisa a, a kawmah, “Ephphatha,” achi a, huchu “Kihong in,” chihna ahi.
Huin a bilte ahung vang pah a, a lei kaanna gui ahung kiphel a, huleh chiangtahin ahaamtheita hi.
Huin Ama’n koima hilh lou diingin amahuh akhap a; hizongleh akhap naah pouhleh aphuangdalh jawseem uhi.
Huleh soi theihlouh khopin limdang asa va, “Ama’n sil zousiah abawlhoihta, bilngong natan ajasah a, huleh haamtheilou zong ahaamsahta,” achi uhi.
Huchih hun laiin mipi atam mahmah kiit va, neeh diing bangmah aneih louh jiahun Jesu’n a nungjuite a kawma kouin a kawmvah,
“Mipite tuin ka kawmah ni thum umta ahihjiah uh leh neeh diing bangmah nei lou ahihjiahun ka lainat mahmah hi.
Huleh an ngawlin a inn vah sawl kiit leng, lamkaal ah asawlsam kha diing uh; ajiahchu khenkhatte hung kipatna agamla mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n Amah adawng va, “Koi in hi gamdaai ah mihing hizahpi vahna khop tanghou khoia la diing ahiai?” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Tanghou beu bangzah na nei viai?” chiin adong hi. Huleh amah un, “Sagih,” achi uhi.

Huin Ama’n mipite chu tual a tou diingin thu apia hi. Huleh tanghou beu sagih chu ala a kipaahthu asoi a, abalkeeh a huin a ma va lui diingin a nungjuite kawmah apia a, huin amah un mite ma ah aluita uhi.
Huleh nga tawmtakhat zong anei va; Ama’n avangpiaah a, hute zong a ma va lui diingin thu apia hi.
Huchiin ane va avahta uhi; huleh aneeh vaal uh a neng paalbawm sagih aluaah dim uhi.
Huin a nete chu mi saang li veel ahi uhi. Huleh amahuh asawlmangta hi.
Huleh Amah chu a nungjuite toh kuang sung ah atuang pah a, Dalmanutha gam ah ahungta hi.
Huleh Pharisaite hungin Amah ahung kinialpih panta va, Amah je-etna in vaan apat chiamchihna angeen uhi.

Hizongleh Amah chu a hagau in akhuaisa a, “Bang diinga hi khang a mite’n chiamchihna hawl ahi viai? Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi khang a mite kawmah chiamchihna mawngmawng akipe sih diing,” achi hi.
Huin amahuh anusia a, kuang ah aluut kiit a, gaal lehlam ah achiahta hi.
Huin nungjuite’n tanghou apo mangngilh va, tanghou beu khat chauh chihlouh kuang ah tanghou dang mawngmawng anei sih uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pharisaite leh Herod tol lahah kiveeng unla, pilvaang un,” achi hi.
Huchiin amahuh leh amahuh chu, “Tanghou i neih louh jiah uh ahi,” chiin akingaihtuah uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n hikhu hein a kawmvah, “Bang diinga tanghou na neih louh jiah uh hia kingaihtuah na hi viai? Tutan a he thei lou leh hesiam nailou na hi uh maw? Na lungtang uh taah nalai ahi maw?
Mit nei ngaala mulou na hi viaimah? Bil nei ngaala ja lou na hi viaimah? Huleh hezing lou na hi viaimah?
Mi saang ngaa laha tanghou beu ngaa ka balkeeh laiin a neng vaal bawm bangzah atai na luaahdim uh?” achi hi. Huin amah un a kawmah, “Sawmlenih,” achi uhi.
“Huleh mi saang li laha sagih ka balkeeh laiin a neng vaal paalbawm bangzah atai na luaahdim uh?” achi hi. Amah un, “Sagih,” achi uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bangchidaana tutan a hesiam nailou na hi viai?” achi hi.
Huin Bethsaida ah ahung tung a, huleh a kawmah mittaw khat ahung pui va, Jesu’n akhoih diingin angeen uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n mittawpa chu a khut in atu a kho polam ah apuidoh hi. Huleh amit a chil siatin a tungah a khut akoih a, khua amu thei ei chiin adong hi.
Huin amahpa chu adaahdoh a, “Mite chu sing banga paiin ka mu,” achi hi.
Huin a khutte chu a mitte tungah akoih kiit a, adaahdohsah hi. Huleh khua ahung mu theita a, mi zousiah chiantahin amu theita hi.
Huleh Ama’n amah chu, “Kho sung ah luut sinla, khua a mi koima zong hilh het sin,” chiin a inn lamah asawlta hi.
Huin Jesu leh a nungjuite chu Kaisaria Philippi khuate ah achiah va; huleh lampi ah a nungjuite kawmah, “Mite’n kei hi koi ahi ahung chi viai?” chiin adong hi.
Huleh amah un, “Baptistu Johan ahi, ahung chi uh, hizongleh khenkhatte’n, Elijah ahi, ahung chi uh; huleh adangte’n zawlneite laha khat ahi, ahung chi uh,” chiin adawng uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahihleh nang un kei koi ka hi na hung chi viai?” achi hi. Huin Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “Khrist chu na hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a tanchin koima hilh lou diingin amahuh thu apia hi.

Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah Mihing Tapa in sil tampi athuaah diing bang, upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute nuala aum diing bang, thaha aum diing bang, huleh ni thum ni a athohkiit diing haw bang ahilh panta hi.
Ama’n hu thute chu phuanglaahtahin asoi hi. Huin Peter in Amah apuituam a ataaihilhta hi.
Hizongleh Amah chu kihei veelin a nungjuite aen a, Peter chu ataai a, “Setan, ka nung ah pai in! Ajiahchu nangma’n Pathian silte ngaikhawh louin, hizongleh mihing silte na ngaikhawh jaw hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n mipite leh a nungjuite akou a, a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin a kros puain hung jui heh.
Ajiahchu mi koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh mi koipouh keimah leh tanchinpha jiaha a hinna taan in ahuumbit diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi’n khovel a pumin nei henla, a hinna taanta leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai?
Ahihlouhleh mi’n a hinna luangin bang ape diai?

Hujiahin mi koipouh hi aangkawm haat leh gilou khang a mite laha keimah leh ka thu zumpih chu Mihing Tapa in zong angel siangthoute toh a Pa loupina a ahung chiangin, amah chu azumpih ve diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, hia dingte khenkhat chu Pathian lalgam silbawltheihna toh hung tung amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uhi,” achi hi.
Huin ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter, Jakob leh Johan apui a, huleh atuamin taang sang tung khat ah amahuh chu apui tou a; a ma vah a meel ahung limdangta hi.
Huchiin a puansilh chu ahung taang a, vuuh bangin angou a, leitung a puansawptu koima’n huchibangin asawp ngou thei sih diing hi.
Huleh Elijah leh Mosi a kawmah ahung kilang va, Jesu toh akihou khawm uhi.

Huchiin Peter in Jesu adawng a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, eiuh diingin hitah a um ahoih hi; huleh puanbuuh thum i bawl diing va; nang a diingin khat, Mosi a diingin khat, huleh Elijah a diingin khat,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu alau mahmah jiahun asoi diing peen zong Peter in ahe sih hi.
Huleh meilum lom khat in amahuh ahung khuh a; meilum lah apatin aw ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi; a thu ngai un!” chiin.
Kintaha a kiimveel uh aet pah uh leh Jesu chihlouh a kawmvah midang koima amu nawnta sih uhi.
Huin taang apat ahung kumsuh laiun, Mihing Tapa misi lah apat athohkiit masiah a sil muhte uh koima hilh lou diingin Ama’n thu apia hi.
Huchiin hi thu chu a lungsim vah avom zing va, misi lah apat a thohkiit chih peen bang chihna hi diing adiai chiin akidongtuah uhi.
Huleh amah un, “Bang diinga daanjilsahtute’n Elijah ahung masa ngeeingeei diing ahi chi ahi viai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.

Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Elijah chu hung masa a, sil zousiah abawl hoih diing mawng ahi. Ahihleh Mihing Tapa in sil tampi athuaah diing a, huleh nualin aum ngeei diing ahi, chia a tanchin bangchi daana kigial adiai?
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, hu Elijah chu ahung zouta a, huleh a tanchin kigelh bang ngeeiin a tungah auut uut uh abawl zouta uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah a nungjuite kawm ahung tunin, akiim va mipi nasatah um amu a, huleh daanjilsahtute toh amahuh anakinial uhi.
Mipi zousiah in Amah amuh tahun limdang asa mahmah va, a kawmva taaiin chibai avabuuh uhi.
Huin Ama’n daanjilsahtute kawmah, “Amahuh toh bangjiaha kinial na hi viai?” chiin adong hi.
Huin mipi laha khat in adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, ka tapa dawipaai jiahin na kawmah ka hung pui hi.

Huleh amatna mun phot ah tual ah aheeh puuh jeel a; huchiin a chilphuan buain, a ha bang agawi a, akhauh veu hi. Huchiin na nungjuite kawmah hung nohdohsah un ka chi a, hizongleh abawl thei sih uh,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n amah adawng a, “Ginna neilou khang a mite haw, na kawmva bangtan ahiai ka um diing? Bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Amah chu ka kawmah hung pui un,” achi hi.
Huchiin naupang chu a kawmah ahung pui uhi. Huleh ama’n Jesu chu amuh tahin dawi in naupang chu nasatahin asoisa pah a, huchiin tual ah apuuh a, a chilphuan bo zengzungin akitaal lehleh hi.
Huchiin Ama’n a pa kawmah, “Hichibang ahung hihna bangtan ahita ei?” chiin adong hi. Huin ama’n, “A naupan lai apatin ahita.
Huleh amah that diingin mei lah leh tui lahah asawn luut veu hi. Hizongleh nang in bang aha na bawl theih leh hung lainat inla, hung panpih in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na gintaat phot leh, a gingtate diingin sil zousiah ahithei hi,” achi hi.
Huin naupangpa pa chu akikou pah a; huleh mit-hi luang pumin, “Lalpa, ka gingta a; ka ginlahna hung panpih in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n mipi hung taaikhawm amuh tahin hagau niin chu ataai a, “Nang haamtheihlouhna leh bilngonna hagau, thu ka hung pia hi, a sung apat hung pawt inla, a sungah luut kiit nawn sin,” achi hi.
Huin dawi chu akikou a, nasatahin asoisa a, huzohin ahung pawtta hi. Huleh naupang chu mi tampite’n, “Asi ahita,” achih diing khop un ahung umta hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu a khut a tuin aphong a, ahung thouta hi.
Huleh inn sunga ahung luutin a nungjuite’n, “Bang diinga kei un nohdoh theilou ka hi viai?” chiin aguuh dot uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hitobangte chu haamteina leh an ngawlna loungaalin apawt thei sih hi,” achi hi.
Huin hu apatin achiahdoh va Galili gam atawn peh va, koima heet diing auut sih hi.
Ajiahchu a nungjuite thu ahilh a, a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa chu mite khut ah akipedoh diing a, athat diing uhi. Huleh athah nung uh ni thum ni in athoukiit diing,” achi hi.
Hizongleh amah un a thusoi chu ahesiam sih va, dot diing lah alau uhi.
Huin Amah chu Karpernaum ahung tung hi. Huleh inn sunga aum laiin a kawmvah, “Lampi a hu na kikupna uh bang ahiai?” chiin adong hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu asipkeei uhi, ajiahchu lampi ah koi ahiai lianpeen diing, chiin ahung kikum zouta uhi.
Huin Amah chu atou a, sawmlenihte akou a, a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh amasapeen hih uut chu, anunungpeen leh mi zousiah natohsahtu ahih phot ngeeingeei diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n naupangneu khat akai a, a lailung vah adingsah hi. Huleh Ama’n apom zohin a kawmvah,
“Mi koipouh ka min a hitobang naupangneu khat saang chu kei hung saang ahi. Huleh koipouh kei hung saang chu, kei hung saang hilouin ahung sawlpa saang ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin Johan in, “Houtupa, kei uh hung jui lou mi khat na min a dawite nohdoh ka mu va, huleh keiuh ahung juih louh jiahin ka khapta uhi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n, “Khap sih un, ajiahchu ka min a silmah bawl ngaala, kei hung soise thei mi aum sih hi.
Ajiahchu eiuh hung dou lou photmah chu eiuh lama pang ahi.
Ajiahchu mi koipouh Khrist a na hih jiahva, ka min a tuisih nou khat dawn diinga hung petu in chu, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kipaahman muh diing ataan hial sih diing hi.
“Huleh koipouh kei hung gingta hi naupangneute laha khat zong supuuh chu, a ngawng ah suang sumheeh gihtah kiohsah henla, tuikhanglian sungah kipaai luut leh amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
Huleh na khut in ahung suhpuuh leh, saattan in. Khut nih neia gawtmun mei mit theilou a na chiah saangin, khut kimlou a hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
Huleh na keeng in ahung suhpuuh leh, saattan in. Keeng nih neia gawtmun mei mit theilou a paiha na um saangin, keengbaia hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh, khei khia in. Mit langnih neia gawtmun meikuang a paiha na um saangin mit lang khat neia Pathian lalgam a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
“Ajiahchu mi chin meikuang a soh-al in aum diing a, kithoihna chinteng chi a soh-alin aum diing hi.
Chi chu ahoih a, hizongleh chi chu data hileh, bangchiin na alsah kiitta diviai? Nanguh ngeei ah chi kineih unla, huleh khat leh khat kilemin um un,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n hu mun anusia a, Judia gam kualsung Jordan gaal lampeh ahung tungta hi. Huleh mipite a kawmah ahung kikhawm kiit va, huchiin ahih ngeimah bangin amahuh thu ahilh kiit hi.
Pharisaite a kawmah ahung va, Amah je-etna diingin, “Mi’n a ji akhuul hi daan in aphal ei?” chiin adong uhi.
Huleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Mosi’n nanguh bang thu ahung pia ei?” achi hi.
Amah un, “Mosi’n kikhuulna lehkha giala kikhuul aphal hi,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Na lungtang uh khauh jiahin ahi ama’n hi thupiaah nanguh diinga ahung na gelhsah.
Hizongleh leilung kisiam chiil apatin Pathian in ‘amahuh numei leh pasal in asiam hi.’
‘Hi jiahin pasal in a nu leh a pa anuse diinga huleh a ji ah abehta diing a,
huleh anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh;’ huchiin nih hi nawn louin, hizongleh sapum khat ahung hi jawta diing uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian in agawmsa chu mihing in khen sih heh,” achi hi.
Huleh inn sung ah a nungjuite’n hu thu mah Amah adong kiit uhi.
Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh in a ji akhuul a ji dang aneih leh, aangkawm ahi.
Huleh numei in a pasal akhuul a pasal dang aneih leh, aangkawm ahi,” achi hi.
Huin akhoih theihna diingin naupang neute a kawmah ahung pui va, himahleh a nungjuite’n ahung puite anataai uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hu amuhin, alungkim sih mahmah a, a kawmvah, “Naupangneute ka kawmah ahung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un; ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh naupang neu banga Pathian lalgam saang lou chu, a sungah aluut het sih diing,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n amahuh apom a, a tungvah a khut akoih a, avangpiaahta hi.
Huin lampi a chiah diinga apawt laiin, mi khat ahung taai a, ama a khuupdin in a kawmah, “Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka tan theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” chiin adong hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Bang diinga hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koima ahoih aum sih hi.
Thupiaahte na he vele: ‘Aangkawm sin,’ ‘Tualthat sin,’ ‘Gu sin,’ ‘Heetpihtu dihlouin pang sin,’ ‘Mi heem sin,’ Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ chihte,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, hihaw zousiah chu ka khangdawn lai apat ka juih ahita,” achi hi.

Huin Jesu’n amah aen a, alungsiat a, a kawmah, “Sil khat na sam nalai hi: Chiah inla, na neih photmah juaah inla migentheite kawmah pia in, huchiin vaan ah gou na nei diing; huleh hung inla, kros puain hung jui in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh neihlelam tampi nei mi ahih jiahin amahpa chu hu thu ah a maai ahung mualta a, huleh lungkhamtahin achiah mangta hi.
Huin Jesu’n aen kiimveel a, a nungjuite kawmah, “Mi hausate diingin Pathian lalgam a luut hahsa hina mei e!” achi hi.
Huleh a nungjuite’n chu a thusoite thumah asa mahmah uhi. Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng kiit a, a kawmvah, “Tate haw, hauhsatna muangte diingin Pathian lalgam a luut hahsa hina mei e!
Mi hausa Pathian lalgam a aluut saangin, sangawngsau phin bilvang a aluut paisuaah abaihlam jaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un soitheih louh khopin thumah asa va, “Huchi ahihleh, koi hutdamin aum zou diai?” akichi tuah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh aen a, “Mihing diingin hichu bawl gual louh ahi a, hizongleh Pathian diingin ahi sih; ajiahchu Pathian diingin bangkim ahithei veh hi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, “En in, kei un bangkim nusiain nang ka hung jui uh,” chiin asoi panta hi.

Huchiin Jesu’n adawng a, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh keimah leh tanchinpha jiaha inn aha, sanggam pasalte aha, sanggam numeite aha, nu aha, pa aha, ji aha, tate aha, huleh gam aha nusia chu,

tu damsung hun ngeeia innte leh sanggam pasalte leh sanggam numeite leh nute leh tate leh gamte haw leh suhduhdahnate toh, aleh za a mu lou diing aum sih uh, huleh khovel hung tung diing ah kumtuang hinna toh.
Hizongleh mi tampi amasapeente chu anunungpeen diing va, huleh anunungpeente amasapeen diing uhi,” achi hi.

Huin amahuh chu Jerusalem a chiahtouin lampi ah aum va, huleh Jesu chu ama vah apai a, amah un limdang asa mahmah uhi. Huleh ajuih pum-un alau uhi. Huin Ama’n sawmlenihte apui kiit a, a tunga sil hung tung pah diingte ahilh panta hi:

“Ngai un, Jerusalem a chiahtou diing i hi va, Mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute kawmah apekhe diing va, huleh Amah chu si diingin siamlouh atangsah diingva Jentelte khut ah apekhe diing va;
huleh amah un chiamnuih bawlna in azang diing va, ajeep diing va, chil asiatkhum diing va, athat diing uhi. Huleh a ni thum ni in athou kiit diing,” achi hi.
Huin Zebedi tapate Jakob leh Johan ahung va a kawmah, “Houtupa, na kawma ka deih phot uh hung bawlsah lehchin ka chi uhi,” achi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh diingin bang hung bawlsah leng na chi viai?” anachi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Na loupina ah, khat na jiatlam ah huleh khat na veilam ah hung tousah in,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Bang ahiai na nget uh na he sih uhi. Ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei diviai? Huleh ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang thei diviai?” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Hihthei e,” achi uhi. Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka dawn diing nou na dawn ngeei diing va, huleh ka baptisma tan zong na tang ngeei diing uh;
hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tou diing chu kei piaah diing ahi sih a, a diingva kiguatsate kawmah piaah ahijaw diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh sawmte’n huchu ajaah tahun, Jakob leh Johan tungah alungkim sih mahmah uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n amahuh akou a, a kawmvah, “Jentelte tunga vaihawm diinga kiguatte chu a tungvah akilalsah mahmah va, a miliante un a tungvah thu anei mahmah mei chih na he uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh lahah huchibang ahi sih diing a; koipouh na lah va let uut chu na natongtu un apang diing hi.
Huleh mi koipouh na lahva lianpeen hih uut chu mi zousiah suaahin apang diing hi.
Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa hiilhial zong natohsaha um diingin ahung sih a, hizongleh natongtu diing leh mi tampi tatna diinga a hinna pe diingin ahung jaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jeriko ahung tung uhi. Huleh Amah chu a nungjuite leh mipi tampi toh Jeriko apat apawtdoh laiun Timai tapa Bartimai mittaw chu lam geiah khutdohin anatou hi.
Huleh Nazareth Jesu ahi chih ajaah tahin, “Jesu, David Tapa, hung khotuah in!” chiin akikou hi.
Huin mi tampi’n amah chu sip diingin akhap va; hizongleh ama’n chu, “David Tapa, hung khotuah in!” chiin akihahkou seem hi.
Huchiin Jesu chu akhawl a amahpa kouh diingin thu apia hi. Huin amah un mittawpa chu akou va, a kawmah, “Hamuangtahin um in. Thou in, Ama’n ahung kou hi,” achi uhi.
Huin amah chu a puansilh paaiin athou a, Jesu kawmah ahungta hi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Na tungah bang bawl leng na uut ei?” achi hi. Huin mittawpa in a kawmah, “Rabboni, muhtheih ka uut hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiahta in; na ginna in ahung damsahta hi,” achi hi. Huleh amit ahung vaah pah a lampi ah Jesu ajuita hi.
Huleh Jerusalem kawm, Olive Taang kawma Bethphage leh Bethani atun tahun, Jesu’n a nungjuite laha mi nih asawl a;

huleh a kawmvah, “Na majawn va khua ah vachiah unla, huleh a sunga na luut tahchiangun sabiltung talgual kikhit, a tunga koima tuan ngeilouhna khat na mu pah diing uhi. Huchu hung suut unla hung kai un.
Huleh mi koiaha in na kawmva, ‘Bang diinga na suut uh ahiai?’ ahung chih leh, ‘Lalpa’n amamoh ahi, hitah mun ah ahung thahkiit pah diing,’ chi un,” achi hi.
Huchiin amahuh chu achiah va, inn pua kot bul a lampi kawma sabiltung talgual kikhit chu amu va, huleh asuut uhi.
Huleh hutah a ding koite aha in a kawmvah, “Bang diinga sabiltung talgual suut na hi viai?” achi uhi.
Huchiin amah un a kawmvah Jesu’n thu apiaah bangin asoi uhi. Huchiin achiahsahta uhi.
Huin amah un sabiltung talgual chu Jesu kawmah ahung pui va, a tungah a puan silhte uh aphah va, huleh Amah chu a tungah atuangta hi.
Huin mi tampi’n lampi ah a puante uh aphah va, adangte’n sing a sawlbawh saatin lampi ah aphah uhi.
Huleh malam a paite leh nunglam a juite’n, “Hosanna! ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi!’
Lalpa min a hung tung diing i pu David lalgam chu ahampha hi! Tungnungpeen ah Hosanna!” chiin akikou uhi.
Huin Jesu chu Jerusalem a Pathian biahinn ah aluut hi. Huchiin sil zousiah aen kiimveel a, nitaahlam ahihtaah jiahin, sawmlenihte toh Bethani ah achiahta hi.
Huleh ajiingin Bethani apat ahung un, a gil akialta hi.
Huleh theipi kung nah nei gaal apatin amu a, neehtheih khat amuh khaah leh chiin avajuan hi. Huleh amun atunin, a nah loungaal bangma amu sih hi, ajiahchu theipi gah hun ahi sih hi.
Huin Jesu’n singkung kawmah, “Tunungsiah bangchihtanin koima’n nang apat gah ne nawn sih heh,” achi hi. Huleh a nungjuite’n huchu aja uhi.
Huchiin Jerusalem ahung tung uhi. Huleh Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah aluut a biahinn sunga sil juaah leh leite anohdoh panta a, huleh sum hengtute dohkaante leh vakhu juaahte touna asawnpuuhsah hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn tawn a juaahsil puaah aphal sih hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “‘Ka inn chu nam chin diinga haamteina inn akichi diing,’ chia kigial hilou ahiaimah? Hizongleh nang un ‘suammangte umna kua in’ na siamta uh,” chiin ahilh hi.
Huleh daanjilsahtute leh siampu lalte’n hichu aja va Amah thahna diing lampi ahawlta uh; mi zousiah in a thuhilh limdang asah jiahun Amah alauta uhi.
Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin khopi apatin apawtta uhi.
Huin jiingkaal a ahung paikawm un theipi kung chu a zung tanpha a gawgawp chu ahung mu uhi.
Huleh Peter in hezingin a kawmah, “Rabbi, endua, theipi kung na haamsiat chu agawgawpta hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Pathian gingta un.

Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in hi taang kawmah, ‘Kituandoh inla tuikhanglian ah kipaai in,’ chia a lungtang a ginglel lou hial a asoi chu ahung tung ngeei diing a, asoi photmah bawlsah ahi diing hi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, sil bangpouhmah na nget chiangun, amuin kingai un, huchiin na mu diing uhi.
Huleh haamtei a na din chiangun, koi tung hitaleh thupoi bang aha na neih un chu ngaidam un, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaihdam theihna diingin.
Hizongleh na ngaihdam louh un chu, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaidam sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jerusalem ah aluut kiit uhi. Huleh Pathian biahinn sunga avaah lehleh laiin, siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute leh upate a kawmah ahung uhi.
Huleh amah un a kawmah, “Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? Huleh hi silte bawlna diingin hi thuneihna koi in hung pia ahiai?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong thu khat ka hung dong diing a, hung dawng un, huchiin bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte ka bawl, ka hung hilh diing hi:
Johan baptisma hi vaan apat ahiai, mihing apat? Hung dawng un,” achi hi.
Huin amahuh akingaihtuah va, “‘Vaan apat,’ kichi le lah, ‘Bang diinga amah gingta lou?’ ahung chi diing hi.
Hizongleh, ‘Mihing apat’ chi lei lah,” achi va, mipite alau ngaal uhi, ajiahchu mi zousiah in Johan chu zawlnei hitahzetin asep uhi.
Huchiin amah un adawng va Jesu kawmah, “Ka he sih uh,” achi uhi. Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong bang thuneihna a hi silte bawl ka hih ka hung hilh diaah sih diing,” achi hi.

Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu asoi panta a: “Mi koiaha in grephuan abawl a, huleh daai in auum kiimveel a, greptui suuhna kokhuuh alaai a, a veenna diing buuh sang alam hi. Huleh lou bawlte kawmah hohloh diingin apia a, khual gamlapi ah achiahta hi.
Huleh a gah loh hun in huan a gah atan diing chu lou bawltu kawm apat vala diingin lou bawlte kawmah suaah khat asawl hi.
Huleh amahpa chu anaman va, avua va, khutguaahin asawl kiit uhi.
Ama’n suaah dang khat asawl kiit a, amah chu suang in anasep va, a lutang anasuliam va, zumhuaitaha anabawlin asawlmangta uhi.
Huin ama’n adang khat asawl kiit a, amah chu anathat va; huleh hutobangmahin midang tampi zong khenkhat avua va, khenkhat athat uhi.
“Hujiahin ama’n tapa deihtah khat aneih naahlai jiahin, ‘Ka tapa chu azahtaat diing uh,’ chiin anunungpeenin amah zong a kawmvah asawlta hi.
“Hizongleh hu lou bawlte’n, ‘Hichu a gouluah diingpa ahi. Hung un, amah i that diing uh, huchiin a gouluah diing chu ei a ahi mei diing,’ achi uhi.
Huin amah chu manin athat va, huleh grephuan pua ah apaaidohta uhi.
“Hujiahin grephuan neitu in bang alohta diai? Amah chu ahung diinga lou bawlte chu asumang diing a, huleh grephuan chu midangte kawmah ape diing hi.
Hi Pathian Lehkhathu ah sim kha ngeilou na hi viaimah: ‘Inn lamtute suang deihlouh ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi.
Hichu LALPA bawl ahi a; huleh i mitmuh vah athumah ahi’?” chiin.
Huin hu tehkhinthu chu amahuh demna a soi ahi chih aheet jiahun, Amah chu mat atum uhi. Hizongleh mipite alau va, huchiin Amah chu nusiain achiahta uhi.
Huin amah un a thusoite a man diingin Pharisaite hunkhop leh Herod pawlte hunkhop a kawmah asawl uhi.

Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun, a kawmah, “Houtupa, nang midihtat na hi a, mi koimah doptuam na nei sih chih ka he uhi; ajiahchu mihing koima maaizah na nei sih a, hizongleh dihtahin Pathian lampi thu na hilh jeel, chih ka he uhi. Kaisar kawma siah tawi dih ahiai, ahihlouhleh dihlou?

Pe diing ka hi viai, ahihlouhleh pe lou diing ka hi viai?” achi uhi. Hizongleh Ama’n alepchiah daan uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hung je-et na hi viai? dinari khat hung tawi un, ka en diing,” achi hi.
Huchiin ahung tawi uhi. Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hi koi lim leh koi min ahiai?” achi hi. Huin amah un, “Kaisar a,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Kaisar silte chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, huleh Pathian silte chu Pathian kawmah pia un,” achi hi. Huleh amah un limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Huin Sadukaite khenkhat, misi thohkiitna aum sih chite a kawmah ahung va:
“Houtupa, Mosi in, mi khat chu a sanggampa sita henla, a ji ta neilouin nuse leh, a sanggampa a ji aluah diing a, a sanggampa diingin chi ahaahsah diing ahi, chiin ahung gelh sah hi.
Huleh unau pasal sagih. aumta uhi. A upapeen in ji anei a, huleh chi haah nei louin asita hi.
Huin anihna in amahnu anei a, chihaah neilou mahin asi jeel hi. Huleh athumna pa zong huchibangmahin aum hi.
Huchiin asagih un akiteenpih chiatva chihaah nei louin asi vehta uhi. Atawp ah numeinu zong asita hi.
Hujiahin, thohkiitna ni a ahung thohkiit chiangun a lahva koipeen ji ahita diai? Ajiahchu asagih un akiteenpih kha chiat uhi,” chiin adong uhi.
Jesu’n amah uh adawng a, a kawmvah, “Pathian Lehkhathu leh Pathian silbawltheihna na heet louh jiahun bawlkhial hilou na hi uh maw?
Ajiahchu misi lah apat athohkiit chiangun, akiteeng nawn sih va, teeng zong akiteengsah sih diing uh, hizongleh vaan a angelte bang ahita uhi.
Hizongleh misite kaihthoha aum diing uh thu, Mosi Lehkhabu ah, sawlbawh laha Pathian in, ‘Kei Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian ka hi,’ chia ahoupih daan simlou na hi viaimah?
Amah chu misite Pathian ahi sih a, hizongleh ahingte Pathian ahijaw hi. Hujiahin na bawlkhial mahmah uhi,” achi hi.
Huin daanjilsahtute laha khat ahung a, akinial uh aja a, Jesu’n amahuh dihtahin adawng chih aheetin, “Thupiaah zousiah laha lianpeen khoikhu ahiai?” chiin adong hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Thupiaah zousiah laha lianpeen chu: ‘Aw Israel, ngai un, LALPA i Pathian uh chu LALPA khat ahi.
Huleh LALPA na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah a, na hinna zousiah a, na lungsim zousiah a, huleh na haatna zousiah a na lungsiat diing ahi.’ Hichu thupiaah poimohpeen ahi.
Huleh anihna chu hi ahi: ‘Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi.’ Hite saanga lianjaw thupiaah dang mawngmawng aum sih hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin daanjilsahtupa’n a kawmah, “Ahi, Houtupa, na soi dih hi. Thutah na soi hi, ajiahchu Pathian khat chauh aum a, Amah chihlouh adang aum sih hi.

Huleh Amah chu lungtang zousiah a, heetsiamna zousiah a, hinna zousiah leh haatna zousiah a lungsiat diing ahi. Huleh eimah i kilungsiat banga i innveengte lungsiat chu haaltum sillat leh kithoihna zousiah saangin ahoihjaw hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin amah in piltahin adawng chih Jesu’n amuhin a kawmah, “Pathian lalgam akipatin na gamla sih hi,” achi hi. Huleh hu nungsiah chu koima’n thu mawngmawng adong ngamta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu ahilh laiin, amahuh adawng a, “Daanjilsahtute’n Khrist chu David Tapa ahi, bangchidaana achih uh ahiai?
Ajiahchu David ngeei in Hagau Siangthou in: ‘LALPA’N ka Lalpa kawmah, “Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in,” achi hi.’
Hujiahin David ngeei in Amah chu ‘Lalpa’ chiin akou hi; huchi ahihleh bangchidaana a Tapa hi ahiai?” achi hi. Huleh mi tamtahin kipaahtahin a thu angaikhia uhi.
Huin Ama’n a thuhilhna ah a kawmvah, “Daanjilsahtute lahah kiveeng un, amahuh chu puantual silha vaah lehleh dawlmunte a mite’n chibai abuuh uh bang auut va,
sinagog a touna poimohpeen leh gualvaahna a mun hoihpeen bang angaina va,
meithaite inn haw anegam va, huleh bawltawmin sawt pipi ahaamtei uhi. Amah un chu siamlouhtanna lian seem amu diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu chu sumkholna jawn ah atou a, mipite’n sumkholna a sum akhiah daan uh aen hi. Huleh mi hausa tamtahte’n tampipi akhia uhi.
Huin meithainu gentheitah khat ahung a, paisa lepton nih akhia a, huchu paisa san khat ahi.
Huchiin Ama’n a nungjuite akou a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sumkholna bawm a sum khe tengteng saangin, hi meithai gentheitahnu’n akhe tampeen hi;
ajiahchu amahuh zousiah in aneih vaal uh akhia va, hizongleh hi meithainu in chu aneih zousiah, akitunhingna diing teng akhiah veh ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu Pathian biahinn apat apawt dohin a nungjuite laha khat in a kawmah, “Houtupa, endua, asuangte bang tobanga limdang a, a innte haw bangchitaha loupi ahita eimah!” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Hi inn loupite na mu maw? Suhchip louha suang kithuap mawngmawng hitah ah khat zong aum sih diing,” achi hi.
Huin Olive Taang a Pathian biahinn jawna atou laiin Peter, Jakob, Johan leh Andru te’n aguuhin a kawmah adong va,
“Hung hilh in, hi silte bangchihchiangin ahung tung diai? Huleh hi silte hung tun diing chiangin chiamchihna bang ahung um diai?” chiin.
Huleh Jesu’n, amahuh adawng a, a kawmvah, “Koima’n ahung heem louhna diingin pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu mi tampi ka min in ahung diing va, ‘Amah chu ka hi,’ achi diing va, huleh mi tampi aheem diing uhi.
Huleh gaal thute leh kidou thuthangte na jaah hun chiangun, lungdong sih un; ajiahchu hute chu tung diing mawng ahi a, hizongleh atawpna chu ahi nai tadih sih diing.

Ajiahchu nam tuam leh nam tuam akidou diing va, huleh lalgam tuam leh lalgam tuam akidou diing uhi. Huleh mun tuamtuam ah jiil akiliing diing a, kial leh buaina aum diing hi. Hite chu numei nauvei nat kipatna ahi.
“Hizongleh pilvaang un, ajiahchu vaihawmtute khut ah ahung pedoh diing va, sinagogte ah ahung vo diing uhi. Huleh keimah jiahin gamoptute leh kumpipate ma ah heetpihtuin na ding diing uhi.
Huleh tanchinpha chu nam zousiah kawmah soi masat ahi diing hi.

Hizongleh ahung mat va, ahung piaahdoh hun chiangun bang soi diing ka diai chiin lunghimoh sih un. Hizongleh ahuntaha hung kipia chu soi jaw un, ajiahchu asoitu nanguh hilouin, Hagau Siangthou ahijaw hi.
“Huin sanggampa in a sanggampa thah diingin apedoh diing a, huleh pa in a ta; huleh tate’n a nulepate uh adou diing va, athatsah diing uhi.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huatin na um diing uhi. Hizongleh atawp donga thuaah mualsuaah mi chu hutdamin aum diing hi.
“Hizongleh zawlnei Daniel in anasoi, ‘Sumangtu kihdahum’ chu adin louhna diinga ding na muh chiangun” (asim phot in hesiam heh), “hu hun tahchiangin Judia gam a umte taang ah taai uh heh.
Huleh inn tunga um zong kum sih heh, a inn sunga thuampua umte ladoh diingin zong vakum sih heh.
Lou a um zong a puan la diingin hung kihkiit sih heh.
Hizongleh hu hun laia gaaite leh naungeeh nawiteep neite tung agih hi!
Huleh hu hun chu phalbi lai ahihlouhna diingin haamtei un.
Ajiahchu hu hun ah gimthuaahna aum diing a, hutobang gimthuaahna chu Pathian in leilung asiam chiil apat aum kha nai sih a, um zong aum nawn sih diing hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n hu hun sutom lou hileh, mi mawngmawng asuaahta sih diing hi; hizongleh a miteel, teeltuamte jiahin a nite chu asutomta hi.
Hu hun chiangin mi khat pouh in na kawmva, ‘En un, hitah ah Khrist aum!’ ahihlouhleh ‘En un, hutah ah aum,’ achih uh leh, tahsang sih un.
Ajiahchu khrist tahloute leh zawlnei tahloute ahung pawt diing va, hute’n chu chiamchihnate leh sil loupite ensahin, hithei leh houh, teelte nasan aheemkhe diing uhi.
Hizongleh pilvaang un, ngai un, sil zousiah ka hung hilhlawhta hi.
“Hizongleh hu hun ah, hu gimthuaahna tun zoh chiangin, ni chu amialta diing a, huleh ha in a vaahna ape nawn sih diing a;
vaan apat aahsite chu ahung ke diing a, huleh vaan a um silbawltheihnate chu akiliing diing hi.
“Hutah chiangin Mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna nasatah leh loupina toh meipi laha hung amu diing uhi.
Huleh huzoh chiangin Ama’n a angelte asawlkhe diing a, ateelte chu kawlmong ning li akipan, lei tawp akipanin vaan tawp dongin akhawm khawm diing hi.
“Huchiin theipi kung ah tehkhinthu jil un: A baa a ahung meen a, a nah ahung sel chiangin, nipi anaita chih na he uhi.
Huchiin nang un zong, hi silte ahung tun na muh chiangun Amah ahung naita a, kotkhaah bul ngeei ah ahung tungta, chih he un.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi silte zousiah atun kim masiah hi khang a mite abei sih diing uhi.
Vaan leh lei abeimang diing a, hizongleh ka thu amang hial sih diing hi.
“Hizongleh hu ni leh ahun diing chu Pa chauh loungaal koimah in, vaan a um angelte’n zong, Tapa in zong ahe sih hi.
Ahun diing na heetlouh jiahun pilvaang unla, kiging zinga umin haamtei un.
Hichu mi khat a inn nusia a, a suaahte kawma thuneihna pia a, a natoh diing uh pe chiat a, kot veengtu chu pilvaang diinga hilh a, gamlapi a khualzindoh tobang ahi.
“Hujiahin kigingzing un, ajiahchu inn neitupa hung diing hun, nitaahlam aha, jaankhanglai aha, aah khuan in aha, ahihlouhleh jiingkaal in aha chih na he sih uhi,
huchilou inchu thakhata hungin ihmuin ahung mu kha diing hi.
Huleh na kawmva ka soi chu mi zousiah kawma ka soi ahi: Kigingzing un!” achi hi.
Chiahkaan Kuut leh Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut umna diing ni nih chauh aumta a, huleh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n Jesu dohabawla mat a, thah theihna diing daan ahawl uhi.
Hizongleh, “Kuut laiin hihdah heh, huchilou inchu mipi buaina aum kha diing,” achi uhi.

Bethani khua a, mi phaah anahi Simon inn ah aum a, ankuang a atou laiin, numei khat alabaster buuh spainard thau gimtuui man tamtah tawiin ahung a, amahnu’n abawm chu atatkeeh a, Jesu lutung ah aleihta hi.
Huleh a lahvah lungkim lou khenkhat aum va amah leh amahuh akihou va, “Bang diinga thau gimtuui kimawh suhbei ahiai?
Ajiahchu hichu dinari za thum saanga tamjaw a juaah a, migentheite kawma piaah theih diing ahi,” achi uhi. Huchiin amahnu tung ah aphunta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n, “Amahnu chu aum umin umsah un, bang diinga tohbuai na hi viai? Ka tung ah nna hoih atong hi.
Ajiahchu migentheite na kawmvah aum zing va, na uut hun tengun na panpih thei uhi, hizongleh kei chu na kawmvah ka um zing sih hi.
Amahnu’n abawl theihtawp abawlta ahi, ka sapum vui diing thau ahung nuh masa ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, khovel pumpi a hi tanchinpha kisoina phot ah hi numeinu silbawl zong amahnu heetzingna diingin akisoi diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda Iskariot chu Amah mansah diingin siampu lalte kawmah avachiah hi.
Hikhu ajaah tahun amahuh akipaah va, huleh amah chu sum piaah achiamta uhi. Huin ama’n amatsahna diing hun lemtaang ahawlta hi.
Huleh Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut ni masapeen, Chiahkaan Kuut belaamnou alat ni un a nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Chiahkaan an na neeh theihna diingin khoia vachiahin vabawl leh ung na deih ei?” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite nih asawldoh a, a kawmvah, “Khopi ah valuut unla, huchiin pasal tuibeel pua khat in ahung tuaah diing a, amah chu jui un.
Huleh aluutna peenpeen hu inn neitupa kawmah, ‘Houtupa’n, “Ka nungjuite toh Chiahkaan an ka neehna diing uh mikhual pindan khoitah ahiai?” achi hi,’ chi un.
Huchiin ama’n pindan tungnung liantah, van umsa leh guatsa diam ahung ensah diing a; hutah ah eiuh diing ankuang vabawl khawl un,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite achiah va, khopi sung ah aluut va, huleh a kawmva asoi bangin amuta va, huchiin Chiahkaan an chu abawlta uhi.
Huin nitaahlam ahung hihin Amah chu sawmlenihte toh ahung hi.
Huleh tou a aneeh laiun Jesu’n, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, an ka neeh khawmpih na lahva khat in ahung mansah diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu alungkham panta va, a kawmah, khat khat in, “Kei ka hi maw?” achi va, abaan baanin, “Kei ka hi maw?” chiin adongta uhi.
Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Sawmlenihte laha khat, kuang a ka an sawh khawmpih ahi.
Mihing Tapa chu a tanchin kigial bang ngeeiin apai diing ahi a, hizongleh Mihing Tapa mansah diingpa tung agih hi! Hu mi chu anapianglou hileh amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi,” achi hi.
An aneeh laiun Jesu’n tanghou ala a, avangpiaah a, huleh abalkeeh a, a kawmvah apia a, “La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa ahi,” achi hi.
Huin nou ala a, huleh kipaahthu asoi zohin, a kawmvah apia a, a bawnun adawn chiat uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, “Hichu thuhun thah a ka sisan, mi tampite diinga luangdoh chu ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam a athah a ka dawn ni atun masiah greptui ka dawn kiit nawn sih diing,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un la khat asah zohun apawtdoh va, Olive Taang ah achiahta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tujaan chiangin kei jiahin na bawnun puuhsah vehin na um diing uhi, ajiahchu, ‘Belaampu ka jeep diing a, belaam hon chu adalhjaah diing uhi,’ chih gelh ahi.
“Hizongleh ka thohkiit nung chiangin Galili gam ah na ma vah ka na chiah masa diing hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Peter in chu a kawmah, “Mi zousiah puuhsahin um zongleh uh, kei chu ka puuh sih diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, tuni in, tujaan ngeeiin aah nihvei akhuan main thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Peter in khauh seemin, “Nang toh si khawm diing hizongleng, ka hung kiheetmohbawl hial sih diing,” achi hi. Huchibangmahin a bawnun achi chiat uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu Gethsemani kichi mun khat ahung tungta va; huleh Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Ka haamtei sung hitah ah na tou un,” achi hi.
Huleh Peter leh Jakob leh Johan apui a, nasataha thaphaangin amangbang panta hi.
Huchiin a kawmvah, “Ka hinna sihna khop hialin alungngai hi, hitah ah anaum unla, kiging un,” achi hi.
Huin malam ah themkhat achiah gamla deuh a, tual ah apuuh a, ahihtheih leh, hu hun in Amah apelh theihna diingin ahaamtei hi.
Huin “Abba, Pa, sil zousiah nang a diingin ahithei hi, hi nou hi kei apatin lamang in; hizongleh keimah thu hilouin, nangmah thuthu hijaw heh,” achi hi.
Huin ahung a, amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu a, huchiin Peter kawmah, “Simon ihmu na hi maw? Daahkaal khat zong kiging a umzou lou na hi maw?
Heemna a na luut louhna diingun kiging zing unla haamtei un. Hagau in chu apeih a, hizongleh tahsa chu achau hi,” achi hi.
Huleh achiah mang kiit a, ahaamtei a, asoi ngeimah avachi hi.
Huin ahung kiit a, a ihmut uh asuaah mahmah jiahin amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu jeel a, huleh Amah dawnna diing zong ahe sih uhi.
Huin a thumveina in ahunga a kawmvah, “Nanguh ihmu a tawldam nalai na hi uh maw? Ahunta hi, a hun atungta; en un, Mihing Tapa chu misualte khut ah matsah ahita.
Thou un, i chiah diing uh; en un, kei hung mansahtu chu ahungta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh thu asoi laiin, sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda chu thakhatin a kawmah ahung tung a, siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute leh upate hung sawl mipi tamtah naamsau leh khetbuuh tawiin a kawmah aum uhi.
Huleh Amah mansahpa in amahuh chiamchihna ahilh masa a, “Ka tawp peenpeen chu Amah ahi, man unla, bittahin puimang un,” achi hi.
Huchiin ahung tun tahin avanaih pah a, “Rabbi, Rabbi!” chiin Amah atawp hi.
Huin amah un a tungah khut aha va, amanta uhi.
Huleh a kawmva dingte laha khat in a naamsau azandoh a, siampu lalpeen suaahpa asaat a, a bil asaatkhiahsah hi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, a kawmvah, “Suammangtu man diing bang hialin naamsau leh khetbuuhte toh kei man diingin na hung kuan uh maw?
Ni chinin, Pathian biahinn ah thuhilhin ka um zing a, na hung man sih uhi. Hizongleh Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtung ngeei diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huin nungjuite’n a bawnun Amah anusia va, ataaita uhi.
Huleh tangvaal koiaha khat in, puan neem chauh silhin Amah ajui a, huleh tangvaalte’n amah aman uhi.
Huin a puan neem chu nusiain, a saguaahin a kawm vakipatin ataaita hi.
Huin Jesu chu siampu lalpeen ma ah apui va; huleh amah toh siampu lalte leh upate leh daanjilsahtute zousiah ahung kikhawm uhi.
Peter in siampu lalpeen huangsung tandongin agaal juih a; huleh hutah a biahinn veengtute toh atoukhawm a, mei a-awi khawm uhi.
Huleh siampu lalte leh Judate vaihawmnainn a um zousiah in Jesu athah theihna diingun aheetpihtu diing ahawl va, amu sih uhi.
Mi tamtah in juauthu in aheeh va, hizongleh a heehna haw uh akituaah sih hi.
Mi khenkhat adingdoh va dihloutahin aheeh va,
“‘Hi khut a bawl Pathian biahinn ka suse diing a, ni thum sungin khut a bawl louh adang khat ka lam diing,’ Ama’n achih ka ja uh,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh huchiin zong a heehna uh akituaah thei tuan sih hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen a laivah adingdoh a, Jesu kawmah, “Bangma dawng lou diing maw? Hite’n nang ahung heehnate uh bangchidaan ahiai?” chiin adong hi.
Hizongleh Amah chu asip bihbeh a, bangma in adawng sih hi. Siampu lalpeen in, “Nang Hampha Tapa, Khrist chu na hi maw?” chiin adong kiit hi.
Jesu’n, “Ka hi mah hi. Huleh Mihing Tapa chu Silbawltheihna jiatlam a tou a, vaan meipi toh hung na mu diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen in a puante abotkeeh a, “Heetpihtu dang bang diing i chi nalai diai?
Pathian asoisiat daan na jata uhi; bangchi na sa viai?” achi hi. Huin a bawnun Amah chu si taahin siamlouh atangsahta uhi.
Huin khenkhat in chil asiat khum panta va, a maai atuamsah va, khuttum in asu va, “Soi in!” achi uhi. Huleh houtute’n zong khut in abeeng uhi.
Huleh Peter chu nuailama innpi huang a aum laiin, siampu lalpeen suaah numeite laha khat ahung hi.
Amahnu’n Peter mei awia um amuh in, aen a, “Nang zong Nazareth Jesu toh kilawi na hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh ama’n chu kiheetmohbawlin, “Ka he sih, na soi zong angaihna ka he sih,” achi hi. Huleh inn liim ah avapawtdoh a, huchiin aah akhuangta hi.
Hu suaahnu mah in amah amu kiit a, a kawma dingte kawmah, “Hi pa a lahva khat ahi,” achi jeel hi.
Hizongleh akiheetmohbawl kiit a, huin tomkhat zouin a kawma dingte’n Peter kawmah, “Nang zong a lahva khat na hi tahzet hi, ajiahchu Galili mi na hi a, na haam in zong akihe hi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n, “Na soi uh hi Pa ka he kha sih,” chiin haamsia louin akichiamta hi.
Huleh anihveina in aah ahung khuang pahta a, huin Peter in Jesu’n a kawma, “Aah nihvei akhuan main thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing hi,” achih thu ahedoh a, huchu angaihtuahin akapta hi.
Jiingkaal matahin siampu lalte chu upate leh daanjilsahtute leh vaihawmtute zousiah toh akihou khawm pah va, Jesu chu kaanin apui va, Pilat kawmah apedohta uhi.
Huin Pilat in, “Judate Kumpipa na hi maw?” chiin adong hi. Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Na chih bangin ahi,” achi hi.
Siampu lalte’n sil tampi in aheeh va, hizongleh Ama’n bangmah in adawng sih hi.
Huin Pilat in adong kiit a, “Bangma dawng lou maw? En in, ahung heehna zoujaaite uh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n bangmah in adawng tuan sih a, huchiin Pilat in limdang asa hi.
Kuut ni a mipite nget peenpeen suangkultaang khat Pilat in ahahkhiah jeel ngeina ahi.
Huleh a min Barabba kichi, helna lama a helpihte toh tualthat a koltaang khawm khat aum hi.
Huleh mipite chu kikouin, amahuh diinga abawlsah veu banga bawl diingin angeen uhi.
Hizongleh Pilat in adawng a, a kawmvah, “Judate Kumpipa hung hahdohsah leng na uut viai?” achi hi.
Ajiahchu siampu lalte’n thangsiatna jiahin Jesu apedoh uh ahi chih ahe hi.
Hizongleh siampu lalte’n chu Barabba hung hahdohsah jaw in chia ngeen diingin mipite achiil zouta uhi.
Huin Pilat in adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ahihleh Judate Kumpipa na chihpa uh hi bang ka lohta diai?” achi kiit hi.
Huin amah un, “Kros ah kilhbeh in!” chiin akikou kiit uhi.
Huin Pilat in a kawmvah, “Bang jiahin eimaw, bang bawlsual anei a ahiai?” achi hi. Hizongleh amahuh chu, “Kros ah kilhbeh in!” chiin akihahkou seem uhi.
Huchiin Pilat in mipi suhlungkim auut a, Barabba chu a kawmvah ahahdohsah a, huleh Jesu chu ajeep zohin kros a kilhbeh diingin apedohta hi.
Huin sepaihte’n Amah chu vaihawmna innpi sung, Praitoriam achih vah apui va, huleh sepaih hon khat akou khawm uhi.
Huleh Amah chu puan sandup asilhsah va, ling lukhuh aphan va, akhuhsahta uhi.
“Chibai, Judate Kumpipa!” chiin chibai abuuh uhi.
Huleh sialluang in a lu asaat va, chil asiatkhum va, khuupdinin abia uhi.
Huin chiamnuih bawlna a aneih zohun, puan sandup chu ahawhkhiahsah va, Amah puan ngeei asilhsah kiit va, huleh kros a kilhbeh diingin apuita uhi.
Huleh mi lampailai khat, gam lam apat a hung, Kureni gam mi Simon, Alexandar leh Rufa pa chu a kros po diingin apawngbawlta uhi.
Huin Jesu chu Golgotha mun ah apui va, huchu, Luguh mun, chihna ahi.
Huin murrah toh kihal uain dawn diingin apia va, hizongleh Ama’n asaang sih hi.
Kros ah akilhbeh va, atan diing chiat uh heetna diinga aisaanin a puansilhte chu akihawmta uhi.
Huleh akilhbeh hun uh chu daah thumna ahi.
Amah kiheehna: JUDATE KUMPIPA, chih thugelh chu a tungah akitaah hi.
Amah toh suamhaat mi nih akilhbeh va; khat a jiatlam ah, khat a veilam ah.
Huchiin Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Amah chu daan botsete toh simkhawm ahi,” achih chu ataangtungta hi.
Huleh mi vaahleh phot in soisiain a lu uh athinkhum va, “Chei le! Nang Pathian biahinn susia a ni thum a sadohkiit diingpa,
nangmah kihunkhia inla, huleh kros apat hung kumkhia in,” achi uhi.
Huchibangmahin siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n amahuh laha kichiamnuihin Jesu aeenghou va, “Ama’n midang ahundam a, Amah leh Amah akihundam thei sih.
I muh va, i gintaat theihna diingun Israelte Kumpipa Khrist chu tuin kros apat hung kumkhia heh,” achi uhi. Huleh kros a Amah toh kikilhbeh khawmte nasan in zong Amah aelhou uhi.
Daah guupna ahung hihin, gam pumpi tungah sim ahung jiing a, daah kuahna tandongin khua amialta hi.
Daah kuahna ah Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani?” chiin. Huchu, “Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bang diinga hung taaisan na hiai?” chihna ahi.
A kawma dingte khenkhat in hu ajaah tahun, “Ngai un, Elijah akou,” achi uhi.

Huin mi khat ataai a, spanji khat uain thuuh a diah dimin, sialluang chiang dawn ah ataah a, dawn diingin apia a, “Ngaihsah sih un; Amah lakhe diingin Elijah ahung ngeel eimah i en diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, a hagau ahahta hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn a puanjaah chu a tunglam apat a nuailam tandongin keeh nih ahung kisuahta hi.
Huleh a majawn a ding sepaih zahoutu in, hutobanga kikou doh leh a hagau hah amuhin, “Hi Pa hi Pathian Tapa ahi tahzet hi,” achi hi.
Hutah ah numeite’n zong gaal apat enin aum va, hute lahah Mari Magdalini leh Jakob a Neupa leh Jose nu Mari, huleh Salomi atel uhi.
Amahuh chu Galili gam a aum laia, Amah jui a, a nna natohsahte zong ahi uh. Huleh numei dang tampi Jerusalem a Amah toh kitontoute zong aum uhi.
Nitaahlam ahung hihin, Kisahkhawl ni ahih jiahin, huchu Sabbath ma a ni ahi hi.
Arimathia khua a Joseph, vaihawmtu zahumtah, Pathian lalgam ngaah zinga umpa chu ahung a, hangsantahin Pilat kawmah aluut a, Jesu luang chu avangeen hi.
Huleh Amah sizou anahihtaah chu Pilat in thumah asa mahmah a, huchiin sepaih zahoutu kouin a kawmah asihna asawtta eimah chih adong hi.
Sepaih zahoutu apat aheetchian phetin a luang chu Joseph apeta hi.
Huin ama’n puan neem alei a, Jesu chu alakhia a, puan neem in atuam a, suang hawtkuaah haan sung ah asial a, huchiin suang khat haankot ah aliihkhumta hi.
Huleh Mari Magdalini leh Jose nu Mari in asialna uh aen uhi.
Huleh Sabbath ni abei phetin, Mari Magdalini leh Jakob nu Mari leh Salomi in Amah luang avanuh diingun sil gimtuui alei uhi.
Huleh hapta ni masapeen ni jiingkaal matahin haan ah ni suaah zoh geihin ahung uhi.
Huleh amahuh leh amahuh kihouin, “Haan kot apat suang koi in ahung liihkhiahsah diing adiai?” akichi uhi.
Huleh aet uh leh suang lian mahmah chu liihdohsain amuta uhi.
Huleh haan sunga aluut uh leh tangvaal khat puan vaam tualtah silh a, jiatlam panga tou amu va, alau mahmah uhi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, “Lau sih un. Kros a kikilhbeh Nazareth Jesu na hawl uh ahi. Amah chu athoukiitta a, hitah ah aum nawn sih hi. A sialna mun uh enmah un.
Hizongleh chiah unla, a nungjuite leh Peter kawmah, Galili gam ah na ma vah anachiah masa hi; na kawmva asoi bangin Amah na mu diing uh, chiin vahilh un,” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu kintahin apawt va, haan apatin ataai va, thumah asah jiahun akiliing uhi. Huleh alau jiahun koima kawmah bangmah asoi sih uhi.
Huin hapta ni masapeen baihtah a Jesu athoh zohin, Mari Magdalini, a sung apat dawi sagih anohdoh nu kawmah akilaah masapeen hi.
Amahnu chu achiah a, Jesu umpih veute, Amah suun a kapte chu hu thu avahilhta hi.
Huleh Amah chu ahingta a huleh amahnu in amu ahi chih thu ajaah tahun, agingta sih uhi.
Huleh hu nungin a lahva mi nihte gamlam juan a apai laiun, meeltuam puain Amah chu a kawmvah akilaah hi.
Huin amahuh chu achiah va, nungjui dangte avahilh va, amah un zong anatahsang sih uhi.
Hunung lamin ankuang a atou laiun sawmlekhatte kawmah akilaah a, huleh athohkiit nunga Amah mute thu agintaat louh jiahun agintaat louhna uh leh a lungtang khauhna thu vah ataaihilh hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Khovel zousiah ah chiah unla, silsiam chinteng kawmah tanchinpha soi un.
Koipouh agingta a baptisma tang chu hutdamin aum diing a; hizongleh agingta lou chu siamlouh tansahin aum diing hi.
A gingtate chu hi chiamchihnate in ajui diing: Ka min in dawite anohdoh diing va, haam thahte in ahaam diing uhi.
Guulte khut in ala diing va; sih theihna sil bangchibang dawn zongleh uh, bangma achi sih diing va; damloute tungah khut anga diing va, adam jeel diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huchia Lalpa’n a kawmva thu asoi zohin, Amah chu vaan a puitouhin aum a, huleh Pathian jiatlam ah atouta hi.
Nungjuite chu akuandoh va, mun chin ah thu asoita va, Lalpa’n amahuh atonpih a, chiamchihna in juiin a thu chu asukip jeel hi. Amen.
I lahva chiantaha bukima um hu silte mi tampite’n baanneitaha anagelhkhiah bangun,
achiil apat a mit a mutute leh thu natongtute’n ahung na hilh bangun,
zahumpeen Theophil, abul apat sil zousiah pilvaangtaha suuichetna ka neih zouin, abaan baan a na kawma gelh hoih ka sa hi.
Huchu tuma a nang hung na kihilh thute adih ngeei hi chih na heet bukimna diingin ahi.
Judia kumpipa Herod damlaiin, a min Zakaria kichi, Abia pawla mi siampu natong khat aum a, a ji chu Aaron tanute laha khat ahi a, a min chu Elizabeth ahi.
Amahuh geel chu soiseel beiin, Lalpa thupiaah leh a daan zousiah juiin Pathian mitmuhin adihtat uhi.
Hizongleh Elizabeth achiin jiahin ta anei sih va, anih un ateeh tuaah mahmahta uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Zakaria in ahun tan dungjuia Pathian ma a siampu nna atoh laiin,
siampu tawndaan dungjuia Lalpa biahinn a gimnamtuui haal diingin amah chu aisaan a teelin aum hi.
Huleh gimnamtuui kihaal sungin mipite chu a bawnun inn pua ah anahaamtei uhi.
Huleh Lalpa angel khat gimnamtuui haalna maitaam jiatlam a dingin, a kawmah ahung kilaah a,
Zakaria in amah amuh tahin, launa in adimta hi.
Hizongleh angel in a kawmah, “Zakaria, lau sin, ajiahchu na haamteina jaah ahita hi; na ji Elizabeth in tapa ahung neihsah diing a, a min Johan nasa diing hi.
Huleh nang chu nuamin na kipaah diing a, mi tampi amah pian in akipaah diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa mitmuhin amah chu milian ahi diing a, uain ahihlouhleh khamtheih uain mawngmawng adawn sih diing hi. Huleh a nu sung apat ngeeiin Hagau Siangthou in adim diing hi.
Huleh ama’n Israel tate tampi Lalpa a Pathian uh lamah akihei kiitsah diing hi.

‘Pate lungtang tate lam ngasah diing,’ leh thumangloute midihtat pilna lam ngasah diingin, huleh Lalpa diinga mihon khat kipeihsa a um diinga bawlkhawl diingin, Elijah lungsim leh silbawltheihna toh Lalpa ma ah apai diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Zakaria in angel kawmah, “Hikhu bangchiin ka he thei diai? Ajiahchu kei lah teehsia hita ing a, huleh ka ji zong ateeh mahmahta hi,” achi hi.
Huin angel in adawng a, a kawmah, “Kei Gabriel, Pathian ma a ding chu ka hi, na kawma thusoi diing leh hi thu kipaahhuaite hilh diinga sawl ka hi.
Huleh ngai in, hi silte ataangtun masiah haamtheilouin na um diing hi, ajiahchu a hun ngeeia suhtaangtunga um diing ka thusoite na gingtaat louh jiahin,” achi hi.
Huleh mipite’n Zakaria chu angaah va, Pathian biahinn sunga sawt aum beeh jiahin limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Huleh ahung pawtin a kawmvah thu asoi theita sih hi. Huin Pathian biahinn sunga kilaahna mu ahi chih aheta uhi. Huleh a kawmvah heetsahna abawl a, haam theilouin aumta hi.
A natohna ani achin tahin a inn ah achiahta hi.
Hu hun nungin a ji Elizabeth chu ahung gaaita a, ha ngaa sung akibu a,
“Mite laha ka minse lamang diingin, Lalpa’n ahung muhin ahehpihna hichibangin ka tungah abawlta hi,” chiin.
Huleh a ha guupna ah Pathian in angel Gabriel chu Galili gam a khua khat, a min Nazareth kichi ah,
nungaah siangthou khat, David suan a mi, a min Joseph kichipa ji diinga kikhaamnu kawmah asawl hi. Hu nungaah siangthou min chu Mari ahi.
Huleh angel chu a kawmah aluut a, “Chibai, nasataha deihsahnu! Lalpa na kawmah aum hi. Numei laha hamphanu na hi,” achi hi.
Himahleh amahnu’n amah amuhin a thusoite ah alunghimoh mahmah a, hi bangtobang chibai buuhna hita diing ade aw, chiin angaihtuah hi.
Huin angel in a kawmah, “Mari lau sin, ajiahchu Pathian apat deihsahna na tang hi.
Ngai in, na gaai diing a, Tapa na nei diing a, a min Jesu na sa diing hi.
Amah chu milian ahi diing a, Tungnungpeen Tapa akichi diing hi. Lalpa Pathian in Amah kawmah a pa David laltouphah ape diing hi.
Jakob haahte tungah kumtuangin alal diing a, huleh a lalgam in beini anei sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Mari in angel kawmah, “Hi bangchiin ahi thei diai? pasal toh lah kipawl kha lou ing a,” achi hi.

Huin angel in adawng a, “Hagau Siangthou na tungah ahung tung diing a, Tungnungpeen silbawltheihna in ahung liahkhuh diing hi. Hujiahin Mi Siangthou nang a hung piang diing zong Pathian Tapa chih ahi diing hi.
Huleh ngai in, na sanggamnu Elizabeth in zong a teeh nungin tapa khat apaaita hi, achiing achihnu uh, tu a ha guupna ahita hi
Ajiahchu Pathian diingin ahitheilou bangmah aum sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Mari in, “Lalpa suaahnu chu en in! Na soi bangin ka tungah hung tungta hen,” achi hi. Huin angel in amahnu achiahsanta hi.
Huleh huin Mari chu athou a, kintahin Juda gam sunga singtaang khopi khat ah achiahta hi.
Huleh Zakaria inn ah aluut a, Elizabeth chibai abuuh hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Elizabeth in Mari chibaibuuhna ajaah tahin a sunga nau chu adiang a, Elizabeth chu Hagau Siangthou in ahung dimta hi.
Huleh aw ngaihtahin ahung haamdoh a, “Numei lahah hamphanu na hi. Na gil a gah zong ahampha hi.
Ahihleh ka Lalpa nu ka kawma na hung bangchi daan ahita ei?
Ajiahchu ngai in, na chibaibuuh gin ka bil a aluut tahin, ka sunga naungeeh chu nuamin adiang hi.
Huleh agingtanu zong ahampha hi. Lalpa’n a kawma a thusoite taangtun diing ahih jiahin,” achi hi.
Huin Mari in, “Ka hinna in Lalpa apaahtawi a,
huleh ka hagau chu ka Hundampa Pathian ah anuam hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n a suaahnu dinmun ngiamdaan angaihsah a, huchiin ngai in, tu apatin khang zousiah in hamphanu ahung chita diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Amah Silbawltheipa’n ka tungah sil loupitah abawlta a, huleh a min zong siangthou ahi.
Huleh Amah laute tungah a khotuahna akhang akhangin aum peh hi.
A baantha in ahaat daan aensah a, mikiliansahte chu a lungtang suangtuahna uh asuhdalhsah hi.
Vaihawmtute chu a laltouna vapatin alakhia a, mingiamte chu atawisangta hi.
Gilkialte chu sil hoih in asutai a, huleh mihausate chu khut guaahin asawlmangta hi.
A khotuahna heetzingna in a suaah Israel apanpih hi.
I pulepate, Abraham leh a chihaahte kawma kumtuanga anasoi bang ngeeiin,” achi hi.
Huleh Mari chu a kawmah ha thum veel ataam a, huin a inn ah achiah kiitta hi.
Huin Elizabeth chu a nau neih hun ahung tungta a, huchiin tapa ahung neita hi.
Huleh a innveengte leh a sanggamte’n, Lalpa’n khotuahna loupitah a tungah asulang chih anaja va, akipaahpih uhi.
A ni giat ni in naungeeh zehtan diingin ahung va, a min diingin a pa min lain Zakaria sah atum va,
huin a nu’n adawng a, “Huchi hi sih inteh, Johan chih jawh diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un a kawmah, “Na beh na phung lahah hi min a kikou koimah um loupi,” achi uhi.
Huin amah un a pa kawmah, a min bang na hisah nuam ei? chiin heetsahna abawl uhi.
Huin ama’n gelhna suangpeeh angeen a, “A min chu Johan ahi,” chiin agial hi. Huleh a bawnun thumah asa mahmah uhi.
Huin a kam ahung kihong pah a, a lei ahung kiphel a, ahung haam a, Pathian apaahtawita hi.
Huleh a kawmva teeng zousiah chu ahung lauta uhi. Huleh hi thute chu Judia singtaang gam zousiah ah athangsuaahta hi.
Huleh aja kha zousiah in a lungtang vah ageel chiat va, “Hi naungeeh bangchibang ahung hitaphet de aw?” chiin. Ajiahchu Lalpa khut in amah aumpih tahzet hi.
Huleh a pa Zakaria chu Hagau Siangthou in ahung dim a, huleh thu ahung soilawhta a,
“Israel Lalpa Pathian chu paahtawiin um heh, ajiahchu Ama’n a mite ahung kan a, ahung tanta hi.
A suaah David innkote lahah hutdamna kii ei a diingin ahung siamta hi,
leilung pianchiil apat zawlnei siangthoute kam a anasoi bangin,
huchia i meelmate lah leh ahung mudah zousiah khut apat hutdama i umna diing uh chu,
i pulepate kawma khotuahna anachiam chu bawl diing leh a thuhun siangthou hezing diingin,
Amah in i pa uh Abraham kawma kihaahsialna anachiam chu:
I meelmate khut apat ahung hutkhiah zoh chianga lau loua Amah nna i toh theihna diing leh
i damsung teng Amah mitmuh a siangthou leh dihtattaha a nna i toh theihna diing uh chu ahi.
Huleh nang naungeeh, Tungnungpeen zawlnei ahung kichi diing hi; ajiahchu a lampite bawl diingin Lalpa ma ah na pai diing,
a mite kawma a sualnate uh ngaihdamna tungtawna hutdamna heetna pe diingin,
i Pathian uh khotuahna neemtah jiahin, hu ngeei in tunglam apatin Nisuaah in ahung veh hi.
Mial nuai leh sihna liim nuaia toute taanvaah diing leh hamuanna lampi a i keengte hung puisah diingin,” achi hi.
Huleh naungeeh chu ahung khanglian a, hagau ah ahung haat deuhdeuh a, Israelte kawma akilaah masiah gamdaai ah aum zing hi.
Hulaiin Kaisar Augusta in khovel pumpi kisimpina diing thu asuah hi.
Hichu Syria gam a Kurenia gamoptu ahihlaia kisimpina masapeen ahi.
Mi zousiah chu kisimpina a min gial diingin amahuh khopi chiat vah achiahta uhi.
David innkote leh a suante laha mi ahih jiahin Joseph zong Galili gam a Nazareth khua apatin Judia gam a David khopi Bethlehem achih vah achiah tou hi.
Mari, a ji khaam nau nei diing kuan toh, min gelh diingin achiah uhi.
Hutah a aum laiun a nau neih hun ahung tungta hi.
Huleh a Tapa masa chu ahung neikheta a, puanneem in atuam a, amahuh diinga zinbuuh a mun aum louh jiahin gankuang ah asialta hi.
Hu gam mah ah belaampute a belaamte uh veenga jaan a gam a giah aum uhi.
Huleh en in, Lalpa angel khat a kawmvah ahung a, Lalpa loupina in a kiimveel uh ataanvah a, huleh amahuh chu alau mahmah uhi.
Huin angel in a kawmvah, “Lau sih unla, ngai un, ajiahchu mi chin a diingin thupha kipaah huai mahmah nanguh ka hung puaah hi.
Ajiahchu tuni in nanguh diingin David khua ah Hundampa apiangta, Khrist Lalpa chu.
Huleh hikhu nanguh diingin chiamchihna ahi diing: Naungeeh puanneem a tuam, gankuang a lum chu na mu diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh thakhatin hu angel kawmah vaan mipite ahung khawm va, Pathian aphat va,
“Tungnungpeen ah Pathian loupitahin um henla, leitung a Amah kipaahpih mihingte lahah lemthu leeng heh!” chiin.
Angelte’n vaan lama apaisan tahun belaampute kihoutuahin, “Tuin Bethlehem khua tanpha in i chiah pah diing va, Lalpa’n thu ahung hilh hung tung chu i vaen diing uh,” akichi uhi.
Huin kintahin ahung va, Mari leh Joseph leh gankuang a lum naungeeh chu avamu uhi.
Amuh zohun hi naungeeh tungtaang thu amahuh heetsaha um chu asoithangta uhi.
Aja kha taphot in hu belaampute thusoi chu limdang asa chiat uhi.
Hizongleh Mari in hi thu zousiah a lungtang ah avom zing a, angaihtuah zingta hi.
Huleh belaampute chu amahuh kihilh bang ngeeia sil zousiah ajaah va amuh jiahun Pathian paahtawia phat kawmin akihkiitta uhi.
A zehtanna diing ni giat ahung chinin hu naungeeh chu a min diingin suul a aum ma daiha angel in apiaahsa Jesu asata uhi.
Mosi daan thu dungjuia amahnu kisuhsiang ni ahung tunin, Lalpa ma a lat diingin Amah chu Jerusalem ah ahung pui uhi.
“Ta pasal suul hong photmah chu LALPA diingin siangthou akichi diing hi,” chia Lalpa daan thu a kigial dungjuiin.
Lalpa daan thu a kisoi dungjuia, “Vakhu kop khat aha vapaal nou nih aha,” kithoihna a laan diingin Jerusalem ah ahung pui uhi.
Huleh en in, Jerusalem ah pasal khat a min Simeon kichi aum a, amah chu midihtat leh Pathian ngaihsahtah ahi. Israelte Hamuanna diing chu angaah zing a, huleh Hagau Siangthou a tungah aum hi.
Lalpa Thaunuh amuh masiah asi sih diing chih Hagau Siangthou in ahesah a,
Hagau in Pathian biahinn ah amah ahung pui luut a, huleh naungeeh Jesu chu a nulepa’n daan thu ngeina banga hihsah diinga ahung pomluut tahun,
ama’n Amah chu ana-aangpom a, Pathian apaahtawi a,
hichiin achi hi, “Lalpa, tuin na suaah chu na thu dungjuiin hamuangtahin chiahsahta in.
Ajiahchu ka mit in na hutdamna chu amuta hi.
Huchu mi zousiah maaima ah nana bawlkhawlta hi.
Amah chu Jentelte salhvaah diing vaah leh na mi Israelte loupina diing ahi.”
Joseph leh a nu’n naungeeh tungtaanga thu kisoite chu thumah asa mahmah uhi.
Simeon in amahuh avangpiaah a, a nu Mari kawmah, “En in, hi naungeeh hi Israelte laha mi tampite puuhna diing leh din kiitna diinga guat ahi a, Amah ahi chiamchihna anialkalh diing uh chu,
mi tampite lungtang ngaihtuahna suhlat ahihtheihna diingin, ahi, naamsau in na hinna ngeei asun pailet diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Asher phung a mi, Phanuel tanu Anna kichi numei zawlnei khat aum hi. Amahnu chu teehsia ahita a, pasal aneih zohin kum sagih a pasal toh ateengkhawm hi.
Huzoh kum sawmgiat leh li tanin amah chu meithai ahita a, Pathian biahinn paisan louin suun leh jaan a an ngawl puma haamteiin Pathian nna atong hi.
Amahnu chu huchih laitahin ahung a, Pathian kawmah kipaahthu asoi a, Jerusalem a tatna diing lamen photmah kawmah Jesu tanchin asoi hi.
Lalpa daan thu dungjuia sil zousiah abawl zohun Galili gam ah amahuh khua ngeei Nazareth ah apaikiitta uhi.
Huleh naungeeh chu ahung khanglian deuhdeuh a, hagau in ahung haat deuhdeuh a, pilna in ahung dimta a; huleh Pathian hehpihna chu Amah tungah aumta hi.
Kum chinin a nulepa chu Chiahkaan Kuut chiangin Jerusalem ah achiah veu uhi.
Huleh Jesu kum sawmlenih ahung hihin kuut mangdaan ngeinain Jerusalem ah achiah tou uhi.
Gualvaahna nite abei zoha ahung kileh kiit laiun, naupang Jesu chu Jerusalem ah aumdenta hi. Huleh Joseph leh a nu in hichu ahe sih uhi.
Huin amah un a lawite laha um hina inteh chiin ni khat lam apaita va, a sanggamte uh leh a meelheette uh lah ahawl uhi.
Huleh amuh louh tahun Amah hawlin Jerusalem ah akinungleh kiitta uhi.
Huin ni thum zohin Pathian biahinn ah houtute laha tou amu va, a thu uh angaikhia a, huleh amahuh thu adong hi.
A thu ja phot in aheetdaan leh adawn daan limdang asa mahmah uhi.
A nulepa’n Amah amuh tahun limdang asa mahmah va, a nu’n a kawmah, “Bawi, bang diinga hichibanga hung bawl na hiai? Na pa leh ke’n lungkhamtahin ka hung hawl uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hung hawl na hi viai? Ka Pa nna ka toh diing mawng ahi chih helou na hi uh maw?” achi hi.
Huleh amah un a kawmva a thusoi chu ahesiam sih uhi.
Huin amahuh Nazareth khua ah ajui suh a, a thuthu un aum hi. Himahleh a nu’n hi sil kisoi zousiah a lungtang ah avom zing hi.
Huleh Jesu chu pilna ah leh tahsa ah ahung khanglian deuhdeuh a, Pathian leh mihing deihsahin aum deuhdeuhta hi.

Tiberia Kaisar vaihawm kum sawmlengaa kum in Pontia Pilat chu Judia gamoptu ahi. Herod chu Galili gambung vaihawmtu ahi a, a sanggampa Philip chu Ituria leh Trakoniti gambung vaihawmtu ahi. Lisania chu Abilene gambung vaihawmtu ahi.
Anna leh Kaiapha chu siampu lalpeente ahi uhi. Hulaiin gamdaai a Zakaria tapa Johan kawmah Pathian thu ahung tung hi.
Amah chu Jordan kiim gam zousiah ah ahung a, Johan in gamdaai ah abaptis a, sualnate ngaihdamna diinga kisiihna baptis thu ataangkoupih hi,
zawlnei Isai in lehkhabu a, “Gamdaai a kikou aw ging in, ‘LALPA lamlian sial unla, a lampite sutang un.
Guam chin dipdim ahi diing a, huleh taang leh mual chin suhngiam ahi diing; huleh a kawite chu suhtang ahi diing a, lampi phonte suhnal ahi diing;
huleh mi zousiah in Pathian hutdamna amu diing uh,’” chia kigial bangin.
Huin baptisma tang diinga hung mipite kawmah ama’n hichiin anachi hi, “Guul suante haw, lungthahna hung tung pah diing taaisan diinga koi in ahiai hung vauhilh?
Hujiahin kisiihna toh kituaah gah suang un. ‘Abraham ka pa uh ahi,’ chiin na lungsim un ngaihtuah sih un. Ajiahchu Pathian in hi suangte haw Abraham tate in adingsah thei hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
Huleh tuin zong singbulte ah heita koih ahita hi. Singkung gah hoih suang lou photmah chu phuuh ahi a, mei ah paihluutin aum hi,” chiin.
Huin mipite’n a kawmah, “Ahihleh kei un bang ka bawlta diing viai?” chiin adong uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Koipouh puannaah nih nei in anei lou kawmah pia heh; huleh neeh diing nei in zong huchibangmahin bawl heh,” achi hi.
Huin siahdongtute zong baptisma tang diingin ahung va, a kawmah, “Houtupa, kei un bang ka bawl diing viai?” achi uhi.
Huleh ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahung chiamsah vaal uh phuut sih un,” achi hi.

Huleh sepaihte’n zong huchibangmahin a kawmah, “Kei un bang ka bawl diing viai?” chiin adong va, ama’n a kawmvah, “Huhamtahin sum dawng sih unla, dihloutahin zong koimah heeh sih un. Na loh vah lungkim un,” achi hi.
Huleh mipite chu kineema aum va, mi zousiah in Johan chu Khrist houh ahi de aw chia a lungtang va angaihtuah laiun,

Johan in adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n chu tui ah ka hung baptis ngeei hi; hizongleh kei saanga loupijaw, a keengtophah khau suut taah zong ka hihlouh mi khat ahung diing hi. Ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou leh mei in nanguh ahung baptis diing hi.
A phual jaap siang tinten diingin a khut ah pasiseep atawi a, a buhte a buhpang ah asungkhawm diing a; hizongleh asi chu mei mittheilou in ahaaltum diing hi,” chiin.
Huleh Johan in thudang tampi in mite ahasot a, a kawmvah tanchinpha asoi jeel hi.
Gambung vaihawmtu Herod in a sanggampa Philip ji Herodia akiteenpih jiahin Johan in asalh hi. Huleh silgilou dang abawlte jiahin zong asalh hi.
A silsual bawl zousiah behlapna in Herod in Johan chu suangkul ah akhumta hi.
Johan in mi zousiah chu abaptis zohin Jesu zong abaptis a, huleh Jesu ahaamtei laiin vaan ahung kihong a,
Hagau Siangthou chu tahsa nei vakhu bangin ahung kumsuh a, atung ah atuta hi. Huleh vaan apatin aw ahung suaah a, “Nang ka Tapa deihtah na hi a, na tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a natoh apatchiil laiin Amah chu kum sawmthum veel ahita hi. Mipite’n Joseph tapa hi diingin angaihtuah uhi. Amah chu Heli tapa ahi a,
amah chu Matthat tapa ahi a, amah chu Levi tapa ahi a, amah chu Melki tapa ahi a, amah chu Janna tapa ahi a, amah chu Joseph tapa ahi a,
amah chu Mattathia tapa ahi a, amah chu Amos tapa ahi a, amah chu Nahum tapa ahi a, amah chu Esli tapa ahi a, amah chu Naggai tapa ahi a,
amah chu Maath tapa ahi a, amah chu Mattathia tapa ahi a, amah chu Semei tapa ahi a, amah chu Joseph tapa ahi a, amah chu Juda tapa ahi a,
amah chu Joanna tapa ahi a, amah chu Rhesa tapa ahi a, amah chu Zerubbabel tapa ahi a, amah chu Sheltiel tapa ahi a, amah chu Neri tapa ahi a,
amah chu Melki tapa ahi a, amah chu Addi tapa ahi a, amah chu Kosam tapa ahi a, amah chu Elmodam tapa ahi a, amah chu Er tapa ahi a,
amah chu Joshua tapa ahi a, amah chu Eliezer tapa ahi a, amah chu Jorim tapa ahi a, amah chu Matthat tapa ahi a, amah chu Levi tapa ahi a,
amah chu Simeon tapa ahi a, amah chu Juda tapa ahi a, amah chu Joseph tapa ahi a, amah chu Jonan tapa ahi a, amah chu Eliakim tapa ahi a,
amah chu Melia tapa ahi a, amah chu Menan tapa ahi a, amah chu Mattatha tapa ahi a, amah chu Nathan tapa ahi a, amah chu David tapa ahi a,
amah chu Jesse tapa ahi a, amah chu Obed tapa ahi a, amah chu Boaz tapa ahi a, amah chu Salmon tapa ahi a, amah chu Nasson tapa ahi a,
amah chu Aminadab tapa ahi a, amah chu Aram tapa ahi a, amah chu Hezrom tapa ahi a, amah chu Perez tapa ahi a, amah chu Juda tapa ahi a,
amah chu Jakob tapa ahi a, amah chu Isak tapa ahi a, amah chu Abraham tapa ahi a, amah chu Terah tapa ahi a, amah chu Nahor tapa ahi a,
amah chu Seruk tapa ahi a, amah chu Ragau tapa ahi a, amah chu Phalek tapa ahi a, amah chu Hebar tapa ahi a, amah chu Shela tapa ahi a,
amah chu Kainan tapa ahi a, amah chu Arphaksat tapa ahi a, amah chu Sem tapa ahi a, amah chu Noah tapa ahi a, amah chu Lamek tapa ahi a,
amah chu Mathuselah tapa ahi a, amah chu Enok tapa ahi a, amah chu Jared tapa ahi a, amah chu Mahalalel tapa ahi a, amah chu Kainan tapa ahi a,
amah chu Enos tapa ahi a, amah chu Seth tapa ahi a, amah chu Adam tapa ahi a, amah chu Pathian tapa ahi.
Huleh Jesu chu Hagau Siangthou a dimin Jordan apatin akilehkiit a, huleh Hagau in gamdaai ah apui a,
ni sawmli sung diabol in aheem hi. Hu hun sungin bangmah ane sih a, hu nite abeiin a gil ahung kialta hi.
Huin diabol in a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na hihleh, hi suang hi tanghou suaah diingin thu pia in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n, “‘Mihing tanghou chauhin ahing sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian thu chin in ahing jaw diing,’ chih gelh ahi,” chiin adawng hi.
Huin diabol in Amah chu taang sang khat tungah apuitou a, mitphet kaallouin khovel lalgam zousiah aensah hi.
Huin diabol in a kawmah, “Hi zousiah tunga thuneihna leh a loupina chu ka hung pe diing, ka kawma piaahkhiah ahita ngaala, huleh ka piaah nuam taphot kawmah ka pe veu hi.
Hujiahin kei na hung biah phot inchu, a bawnin nang a ahi diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Setan, ka nung lamah um in! ‘LALPA na Pathian chu na biah diing a, Amah nna chauh na toh diing ahi,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
Huin diabol in Amah chu Jerusalem ah apui a, Pathian biahinn tungzum ah akoih a, a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na hih leh, hitah apat ke khesuh in.
Ajiahchu, ‘Ama’n nang hung veeng diingin a angelte thu ape diing hi.’
Huleh, ‘amah un a khut un ahung na dom diing uh, huchilou inchu na keeng suang ah na tat kha diing,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “‘LALPA na Pathian na je-et louh diing ahi,’ chih ahi,” achi hi.
Huin diabol in a heemna diing tenga aheem zohin hun lemtaang khat a diingin apaisanta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu Hagau silbawltheihna in Galili gam ah akilehkiitta a, huleh a tanchin chu hu gam kiim zousiah ah athangsuaahta hi.
Huleh sinagog ah thu ahilh jeel a, mi zousiah paahtawiin aumta hi.
Huin a khanletna khua Nazareth ahung tungta a, huleh ahihdaan ngeina bangin Sabbath ni in sinagog ah aluut a, Pathian thu sim diingin ading hi.
A kawmah zawlnei Isai Lehkhabu apia va, huin Ama’n hu lehkhabujial chu ahong a, hi thu kigelhna laitah amu a:

“LALPA Hagau chu ka tungah aum hi, migentheite kawma tanchinpha ka soi theihna diinga Ama’n sathau ahung nuh jiahin. Ama’n chu lungtang hasete sudam diingin, saltaangte kawma suahtaatna thu phuang diingin, mittawte kawma mitvaah kiitna thu soi diing leh bawlsiatna thuaahte zaleensah diingin ahung sawl hi;
LALPA lungdam kum thu bang soi diingin ahung sawl hi,” chih chu.
Huin Ama’n lehkhabujial chu ajial a, natongtu kawmah ape kiit a, atouta hi. Huleh sinagog a um mi zousiah mit chu a tungah atu vehta hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Tuni’n hi Pathian Lehkhathu chu na jaah un ahung taangtungta ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh mi zousiah in a thu aheetpih va, a kam a pawt hehpihna thute chu limdang asa mahmah uhi. Huleh amah un, “Hi Pa hi Joseph tapa hilou ahiaimah?” achi uhi.

Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “‘Daktor nang leh nang kisudam in! Kapernaum khua a silbawl ka na jaahte zousiah uh, hitah ah nangmah khua ah zong bawl in,’ chih thupil chu ka kawmah na hung chi ngeei diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei koimah amah gam sung ah kipaahpihin aum ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah damlaiin kum thum leh ha guup vaan akikhaah a, gam pumpi a kial nasatah atun laiin Israel gam ah meithai tampi aum uhi;
ahiinlah Sidon gam a Sarepta khua a meithainu khat kawmah chihlouh a lahva koima kawmah Elijah sawl ahi sih hi.
Huleh zawlnei Elisha damlai in Israel gam ah phaah tampi aum uhi, hizongleh Syria mi Naaman chihlouh koimah suhsiangin aum sih uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh sinagog a um zousiah in hi thute ajaah tahun athangtawm mahmahta uhi.
Huin adingdoh va, Amah chu khua apatin adelhdoh va, a kho kawldawn va sawnkhiah diingin apui uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu a lahvah kigelhmangin achiahta hi.
Huleh Amah chu Galili a khopi khat, Kapernaum ah ahung suh a, Sabbath nite in amahuh thu ahilh hi.
Huleh thuneitaha thu asoi jiahin a thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Huleh sinagog ah dawi niin hagau nei mi khat aum a, huleh aw ngaihtahin akikou a,
“Ka tangun hung umsah in! Nazareth Jesu, nang leh kei un bang kizopna ahiai i neih? Keiuh sumang diinga hung na hi maw? Nang kua na hiai chih ka hung he hi, Pathian Misiangthou na hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n ataai a, “Sip inla, a sung apatin hung pawt in,” achi hi. Huin dawi in amah chu a laai va asuhpuuh zohin a sung apatin ahung pawt a, amah asuna sih hi.
Huleh a bawnun limdang asa mahmah va, “Hikhu bang thu ahita ei! Ajiahchu thuneitah leh silbawltheitahin dawi niinte thu apia a, apawt mei uh,” chiin akihou uhi.
Huin hu kiim gam mun chin ah a tanchin athangta hi.
Huin Jesu’n sinagog apawtsan zohin Simon inn ah aluut a, hutah ah Simeon sungnu chu nasatahin anakhosih hi. Huchiin amahnu diingin anangetsah uhi.
Huin Jesu chu amahnu geiah ading a, khosih chu ataai a, huchiin khosih in anuse pahta hi. Huchiin ahung thou pah a, a nna uh atohsahta hi.
Huleh nitum kuan ahung hihin natna tuamtuam a anadamlou zousiah a kawmah ahung pui va; huin Ama’n atung chiat vah khut anga a, asudamta hi.
Huleh dawite zong, “Nang Khrist Pathian Tapa na hi!” chia kikouin mi tampite sung apatin ahung pawtdoh va, Ama’n amahuh ataai a, Khrist ahi chih aheet jiahun dawite haam diing Jesu’n aphal sih hi.
Huleh khua ahung vaahin apawt a, munsip ah achiah hi. Huin mipite’n Amah ahawl va, a kawmah ahung va, amahuh nuse lou diingin ahou uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pathian lalgam tanchinpha thu chu kho dang ah zong ka soi diing ahi; hu diing maha sawl ka hi him ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n Galili gam a sinagogte ah thu asoi jeel hi.
Ni khat chu Pathian thu angaih theihna diingun mipite’n Jesu anoh va, Genesaret Diil geiah ading hi.
Diil geiah kuang nih um amu a, hizongleh ngamantute chu a kuang uh nusia a, a leente uh sawpin aum uhi.
Huleh Amah chu kuangte laha khat Simon a peen ah atuangdoh a, a kawmah piau gei apat themkhat tolh deuh diingin angeen hi. Huleh atou a, mipite chu kuang tung apatin thu ahilhta hi.
Ama’n thu asoi zohin Simon kawmah, “Lithuuh lam naih inla, nga man diingin na leente sep in,” achi hi.
Huleh Simon in adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, jaan khovaahin gimtahin ka pang va, bangmah ka man sih uh; hizongleh na thu in leen chu ka sep diing hi,” achi hi.
Hichu abawl zohin, nga tampi akhuh kha va, a leen chu keeh diingin akisa hi.
Huleh kuang danga tou, a lawite uh hunga amahuh panpih diingin akhutjaap va, huin amahuh ahung va, kuang tegeel chu asudim uhi. Huchiin tum diingin akisa hialta hi.
Simon Peter in hikhu amuhin Jesu keengbul ah apuuh a, “Lalpa, hung chiahsan in, ajiahchu kei misual ka hi,” achi hi.
A nga matdoh uh amah leh a lawmte’n limdang asah mahmah jiahun ahi;
huleh Simon kithuahpihte Zebedi tate Jakob leh Johan in zong limdang asa mahmah uhi. Huin Jesu’n Simon kawmah, “Lau sin, tu apatin mihing na manta diing,” achi hi.
Huleh a kuangte luuipang a ahung tawldoh zohun, bangkim anusia va Amah ajuita uhi.
Huin Jesu khopi khat a aum laiin, en in, mi khat a pumtanga phaah aum a, ama’n Jesu amuhin leisiin abohkhup a, “Lalpa na uut inchu, na hung susiang thei hi,” chiin angeen hi.
