Huin Ama’n a khut a zamin, amah chu akhoih a, “Ka uut hi, siangta in,” achi hi. Huin a phaah in thakhatin anuse pah hi.

Huleh Ama’n koimah hilh lou diingin thu apia a, “Hizongleh vachiah inla, siampu kawmah vakilah inla, huleh na sian thu mite heetsahna diingin Mosi thupiaah bangin na sianna diingin sil valaan in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh a tanchin chu athang nasa seem a, huleh mipi nasatah a thu ngaikhe diing leh a natna uh kisudamsah diingin ahung uhi.
Huleh Amah chu gamdaai ah achiah tuam a, ahaamteita hi.

Huleh ni khat chu thu ahilh laiin hichi ahung hi a, Galili leh Judia kho chinteng leh Jerusalem apat hung Pharisaite khenkhat leh daanjilsahtute khenkhat a kawmah atou va, amahuh suhdamna diingin Lalpa silbawltheihna chu Amah ah aum hi.
En in, mite’n jeng khat lupna in ahung jawng va, huleh ajawn luut theihna diingun leh a ma a akoih theihna diing angaihtuah uhi.
Mipi jiaha jawn luutna diing lampi amuh louh tahun inn tungah akaltou va, huleh inntung hawhkhiain a laitah ah Jesu ma ah a lupna toh akhaikhesuh uhi.
Huin Ama’n a ginna uh amuhin, a kawmah, “Lawm, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Huin daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n, “Hi Pathian soisia koi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koi in ahiai sual ngaidam thei?” chiin angaihtuah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh aheetin adawng a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga na lungsim va hitobang ngaihtuah na hi viai?
‘Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla, keeng in chiahta in,’ chih khoi abaihlam jaw ei?

Hizongleh Mihing Tapa in leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna thuneihna anei hi chih na heetna diingun, hichu ka bawl ahi,” achi a, mijengpa kawmah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah chiahta in, ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh a ma vah athoukhe pah a, a lupna ala a, Pathian paahtawi kawmin a inn lamah achiahta hi.
Huin a bawnun limdang asa mahmah va, Pathian apaahtawi va, huleh “Tuni’n sil limdangtah mei i mu uhi,” chiin alau mahmah uhi.
Huzouin Amah chu apawtkhia a, siahdonna mun a tou, a min Levi kichi siahdongtu khat amu hi. Huleh a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
Huin Levi in bangkim anusia a, athou a, Amah ajuita hi.
Huleh Levi in a inn ah Jesu diingin ankuang loupitah alui a, hutah ah chu siahdongtu tampi leh midang tampite’n ankuang auumpih uhi.
Hizongleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite chu a nungjuite tungah aphun va, “Bang diinga siahdongtute leh misualte toh ne a dawn khawm na hi viai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Michidamte’n daktor amamoh sih va, hizongleh damloute’n amamoh uhi.
Midihtatte kou diinga hung ka hi sih a, misualte kisiihsah diinga koua hung ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.

Huin amah un Jesu kawmah, “Johan nungjuite’n an angawl va huleh ahaamtei veu uh, huleh Pharisaite nungjuite’n zong huchibangmahin abawl uhi; hizongleh nang nungjuite’n bang diinga ne a dawn ahi viai?” achi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Moupa moupuite kawma aum laisiah moupuite an na ngawlsah thei viaimah?
Hizongleh moupa a lah vapat laahmang hun ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin angawl diing uhi,” achi hi.

Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat zong asoi a: “Koima’n puan thah apat athem kaikhiain puan lui aphoh ngei sih, phohta henla hileh puan thah akaihkeeh angai diing a, a thah them peen chu a lui toh akituaah sih diing hi.
Huleh koima’n uain thah chu savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih. Thunta henla hileh, uain thah in savun thawl lui chu apawhkeehsah diing a, akibo diing a, huleh a thawlte zong asegawp diing hi.
Hizongleh uain thah chu savun thawl thah a thun diing ahi, huchiin anih un abit diing hi.
Mi koima’n zong uain lui adawn zoh nungin athah aduh pah ngei sih, ‘Alui mah tui jaw,’ achi veu uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Sabbath ni masapeen zoha anihnapeen ni in Jesu chu buhlei lai ah apaisuaah hi. A nungjuite’n buhvui asihtan va, a khut va nuaiin ane uhi.
Pharisai khenkhatte’n a kawmah, “Bangjiaha Sabbath ni a bawl phallouh na bawl uh ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, “David in agilkial laia a kawma umte toh asilbawl sim kha lou na hi viaimah?
Pathian inn ah aluut a, Pathian kawma alat zousa uh tanghou chu ane hi. Daan in siampute loungaal in neeh phallouh achih chu ama’n ane a, huleh a kawma umte zong apia hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa chu Sabbath ni Lalpa zong ahi,” achi hi.
Sabbath ni dang khat in Jesu chu sinagog ah aluut a, thu ahilh hi. Hutah ah mi khut jeng khat ana-um hi.
Daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n aheehna diing amuh theihna diingun, Sabbath ni a asuhdam leh asuhdam louh aensim uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n angaihtuah uh ahe a, khut jengpa kawmah, “Thou inla dingdoh in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu athou a adingdohta hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Sil khat ka hung dong diing hi, Sabbath ni a sil hoih bawl asiang ei, ahihlouhleh sil hoihlou bawl? Hinna hutkhiah asiang ei, ahihlouhleh suhlup?” achi hi.
A kiim a umte zousiah aenveel a, hupa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Ama’n huchiin abawl a, a khut chu alang khat lam bangin adamta hi.
Himahleh amahuh chu alungthah mahmah va, Jesu tunga bang bawl diing ahiai chiin khat leh khat akihouta uhi.
Ni khat chu Jesu taang ah haamtei diingin achiah a, Pathian kawmah jaan khovaahin ahaamtei hi.
Huin khua ahung vaah phetin a nungjuite akou a, a lah vapat sawmlenih ateel a, a min uh zong apostolte ahisah hi:
Simon, Ama’n Peter zong achih leh a sanggampa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai,
Mathai leh Thomas, Alphai tapa Jakob, huleh Simon Zelot achih uh,
huleh Jakob tapa Juda, huleh amansahtu Juda Iskariot zong ahi uhi.

Huleh Jesu chu amahuh toh akitonsuh a, mun jaang ah ading a, huleh a nungjui tampite toh, hutah a thungai diing leh a damlouhnate uh suhdama um diing uutin Judia gam zousiah leh Jerusalem apat leh tuipi geia Tura leh Sidon lam apat a kawmah mipi nasatah ahung paikhawm uhi.
Huleh hagau niinte’n asuhgentheihte zong ahung va, Ama’n asudam veh hi.
Amah apat silbawltheihna apawt jiaha amahuh zousiah asuhdam jiahin mipite zousiah in Amah khoih auut uhi.
Huin a nungjuite aen a, hichiin achi hi: “Nanguh migentheite na hampha uhi, ajiahchu Pathian lalgam nanguh a ahi.
Nanguh tua gilkialte na hampha uhi, ajiahchu taisaha um diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tua kapte na hampha uhi, ajiahchu nui diing na hi uhi.
Mihing Tapa jiaha mite’n ahung muhdah va, ahung delhdoh va, ahung housiat va, huleh na min uh chu migilou banga anual chiangun na hampha uhi.
Hu ni in kipaah unla, nuamin kidiang un, ajiahchu ngai un, vaan a na kipaahman uh aloupi hi. Ajiahchu huchibangmahin a pulepate un zawlneite anabawl uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh mihausate na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu nang un nopsahna a bawnin na kimuh zouta uhi.
Nanguh tua gilvahte na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu kial diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tua nuite na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu maaua kap diing na hi uhi.
Mi zousiah in ahung phat chiangun na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu huchibangmahin a pulepate un zawlnei tahloute anaphat uhi.
“Hizongleh nanguh ka thu ngaikhete kawmah ka hung hilh ahi: Na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, ahung mudahte hoih bawl un.
Haansia hung lohte vangpiaah unla, ahung simmoh bawlte diingin haamteisah un.
Na ngeiphe hung behsahtu kawmah a langkhat lam zong doh in. Huleh na puannaah tual uh hung laahsahtu kawmah na puannaah nuai uh alaah zong nial sih un.
Na kawmva hung ngeen photmah kawmah pia unla, huleh na thuampua uh hung laahsahtu kawmah ngeen kiit nawn sih un.
Huleh mi’n na tungva abawl diinga na deih bang ngeeiun, nang un zong amahuh tungah bawl un.
Ajiahchu nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Misualte’n zong amahuh lungsiatte alungsiat uhi.
Huleh na tungva hoihte tung chauha na hoih uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Ajiahchu misualte’n zong huchibangmahin abawl uhi.
Huleh muh kiit na kinepnate uh kawm chauha na thunglaahsah uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Ajiahchu misualte’n zong azah mah muh kiit diingin misualte kawmah athunglaahsah uhi.

Hizongleh nang un chu na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, hoihbawl unla huleh bangmah muhkiit kineem louin thunglaahsah un. Huchileh na kipaahman uh aloupi diinga Tungnungpeen tate na hi diing uhi. Ajiahchu kipaahnataang heloute leh migiloute tungah Amah aching hi.
Hujiahin na Pa uh mizahngaithei ahih bangin, nanguh zong zahngaithei un.
“Mi demse sih un, huchiin demsiatin na um sih diing uhi. Mohpaih sih un, huchiin mohpaihin na um sih diing uhi. Ngaidam un, huchiin ngaihdamin na um diing uhi.

Pia un, huchiin piaahin na um diing uh; hoihtaha tehin, sawndetin, lohhalin pia un, huchiin adimleetin na aangsung vah piaahin na um diing uhi. Ajiahchu na tehna bangbangun mite’n ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh hi tehkhinthu zong a kawmvah asoi hi: “Mittaw in mittaw mah apui thei diai? Puita henla hileh, anih va kokhuuh a kekhawmta lou diing ahi viaimah?
Nungjui chu a houtupa tungah aum ngei sih hi, hizongleh mi chin hoihtaha jilsaha um chu a houtupa bang ahung hi diing hi.
Bang diinga na mit a singtum ngaihtuah lou a, na unau mit a niinthem um muthei na hiai?

Nangmah mit a singtum mulou pi a na unaupa kawma, ‘Unaupa, na mit a niinthem um hung lakhesah in,’ bangchidaana chithei na hiai? Nang milepchiah, na mit a singtum um chu lakhe masa in. Huchiangin na unaupa mit a niinthem laahkhiah diing chu chiangtahin na mu thei diing hi.
“Ajiahchu singkung hoih a gah ase ngei sih a, huleh singkung sia in zong gah hoih asuang thei boh sih hi.
Ajiahchu singkung chin a gah a heet ahi, ajiahchu mi’n lingkung ah theipi alou ngei sih va, huleh lingnoh lahah zong grep alou ngei sih uhi.

Mihoih in a lungtang goubawm hoih apatin sil hoih ahung suahkhia hi. Huleh migilou in a lungtang goubawm sia apatin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhe veu hi. Ajiahchu lungtang a dimleet chu a kam in asoi ahi.
“Huleh nang un bang diinga ka soite bawl lou a, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ hung chi na hi viai?
Koipouh ka kawma hung a, ka thusoite ja a, huleh jui chu bangtobang mi ahi viai chih ka hung ensah diing hi.
Amah chu inn bawlmi, lei thuuhtaha tou a, suangpi tunga innbul lem toh kibang ahi. Huleh tui ahung leetin tui khauh in hu inn chu ahung khoh a, suangpi tunga bawl ahih jiahin asuliing but sih hi.
Hizongleh ja ngaal a, juilou chu innbul kiptah lemlou a, leitung mei a innbawlmi bang ahi; huchu tui khauh in ahung khoh a apuuh pah hi. Huleh hu inn asiatdaan chu anasa ngeel hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n hi thute zousiah mipite kawma asoi zohin, Kapernaum ah aluut hi.
Huin sepaih zahoutu koiaha khat suaah deihtah chu damlouin asi dehdeh hi.
Huin ama’n Jesu tanchin ajaah tahin a kawmah ahung a, a suaahpa hung sudam diinga ngeen diingin Juda upate Amah kawmah asawl hi.
Jesu kawm avatun tahun naahtahin angetsah va, amah chu hi sil na bawlsah taah ahi,
“Ajiahchu ama’n ka nam uh angaina a, ka sinagog uh zong ahung bawlsah hi,” achi uhi.

Huin Jesu chu amahuh toh ahungta a, inn apat gamlalou ahung geiin, hu sepaih zahoutu’n a kawmah a lawite asawl a, “Lalpa kisugim nuam dah mei in, ajiahchu ka innsung na hung luut diing chu keimah in ka chin sih hi.
Hujiahin kei zong na kawma hung taahin ka kingai sih hi. Hizongleh a thu in soi lehchin ka suaahpa chu adam mei diing hi.

Ajiahchu kei zong mi thuneihna nuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte aum va, khat kawma, ‘Chiah in,’ ka chih leh achiah a, huleh adang kawma, ‘Hung in,’ ka chih leh ahung a, huleh ka suaahpa kawma, ‘Hi bawl in,’ ka chih leh abawl jeel hi,” chiin.

Jesu’n hi thute ajaah tahin, amahpa chu limdang asa mahmah a, huleh akinunghei a, mipi Amah juite kawmah, “Na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Israelte lah ngeei ah zong hichilawma ginna haat ka mu kha sih,” achi hi.
Huin a mi sawlte chu inn lamah achiah kiit va, suaah damloupa chu damin amuta uhi.
Huleh ajiingni in Jesu chu Nain kichi khopi khat ah achiah a, a nungjuite tamtah leh mipi tampite’n Amah ajui uhi.
Huleh Amah chu khopi kotkhaah kawm ahung tunin, en in, misi khat ahung jawngdoh va, a nu tapa neihsun ahi. Amahnu chu meithai ahi a, huleh hu khua a mipi tampi a kawmah aum uhi.
Lalpa’n amahnu amuh tahin ahehpih mahmah a, huchiin a kawmah, “Kap sin,” achi hi.
Huin ahung a, a haan kuang chu akhoih a, a jawngtute chu adingta uhi. Huin Ama’n, “Tangvaal thou in, ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
Misi chu ahung toudoh a, ahung haamta hi. Huin Ama’n amah chu a nu kawmah apeta hi.
Huin mi zousiah ahung lauta va, Pathian apaahtawi va, “I lahvah zawlnei loupitah ahung suaahta,” huleh “Pathian in a mite ahung vehta ahi,” chiin.
Huleh hi tungtaang thu chu Judia gam pumpi leh a kiimveel gam zousiah ah athangsuaahta hi.
Huin Johan nungjuite’n hi thu zousiah Johan ahilh uhi.
Huin Johan in a nungjuite laha mi nih akou a, Jesu kawmah asawl a, “Ahung diingpa na hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?” chiin.
Hute chu a kawm ahung tunun, “Baptistu Johan in, ‘Ahung diingpa na hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?’ chia na kawma ahung sawl ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
Hulai ngeeiin Ama’n mi tampi, damloute, hiiveite, dawimatte asudam a, huleh mittaw tampite mit asuhvaahsah hi.

Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chiah unla, na sil muh uh leh na jaahte uh Johan vahilh un: mittawte mit avaahta a, keengbaite apai theita va, mi phaahte asiangta va, bilngongte’n khua ajata va, misite kaihthohin aumta va, huleh migentheite kawmah tanchinpha soiin aumta hi.
Huleh koipouh keimah a kipalpuuh lou chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Johan mi sawlte apai nungun Ama’n mipite kawmah Johan tungtaang thu asoi panta a, “Bang en diinga gamdaai a chiahdoh na hi viai? Sialluang huih muut liing maw?
Ahihlouhleh bang en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Puan neem silh mi khat maw? Ngai un, puan loupi silh leh minuamsate chu kumpi inn ah ahi aum uh.
Ahihlouhleh bangpeen en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Zawlnei maw? Ahi, ka hung chi ahi, zawlnei saanga loupijaw ahi.
‘En in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi asial diing,’ chia a tungthu kigial chu amah ahi.
“Numei sung apat piang lahah Baptistu Johan saanga loupijaw, zawlnei aum sih hi. Hizongleh Pathian lalgam a mineupeen zong amah saangin aloupijaw hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah leh siahdongte’n hi thu ajaah tahun Pathian siam atan uhi, ajiahchu Johan khut a baptisma tang ahi uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisaite leh daansiamte’n Johan baptisma apom louh jiahun Pathian in amahuh diinga alemguatsah chu anualta uhi.
Huin Lalpa’n, “Hi khang a mite bang toh ka tehkhin diai? Huleh bang tobang ahi viai?
Amahuh chu dawlmun a tou naupang, khat leh khat kikou tuah a, ‘Theile hung muutsah ung a, lah laam lou uh chin a; huleh kahla sa ung a, lah kapin na hung maau pih sih uh,’ kichite bang ahi uhi.
Ajiahchu Baptistu Johan chu ahung in an ane sih a, uain zong adawn sih a; huleh nang un amah chu ‘Dawi nei ahi,’ na chi uhi.
Mihing Tapa ahung a, nein adawn a, nang un, ‘En un, an haipa leh uain haipa, siahdongtute leh misualte lawmpa!’ na chi jeel uhi.
Hizongleh pilna chu a tate zousiah in siam atan uhi,” achi hi.
Pharisaite laha khat in Amah toh an neehkhawm auut hi. Huin Amah chu Pharisaipa inn ah aluut a, ankuang ah atouta hi.
En in, hu khopi a um numei sual khat in Jesu Pharisaipa inn ah an nein atou chih aheetin alabaster buuh in thau gimtuui ahung tawi hi.
A nung ah a keeng bul ah kap kawmin ading a, Jesu keengphaangte chu a mittui in asukawt a, a sam in asiaah hi. A keengpeeh atawp a, thau gimtuui anuh hi.
Huleh Amah chialtu Pharisaipa in hikhu amuh tahin a lungsim in, “Hi Pa, zawlnei ahihleh hi akhoihnu koi ahi a, huleh bangchibang mi ahiai chih he leh kilawm a, amah lah misual ahi ngaala,” achi hi.
Huchiin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Simon, na kawmah soinuam khat ka nei hi,” achi hi. Huin ama’n, “Houtupa, soi in,” achi hi.
“Huleh sum thunglaahsahtu koiaha khat in leibatu nih anei a, khat in dinari za ngaa aba a, huleh khat in sawmngaa aba hi.
Aditna diing aneih louh tahun anihun angaihdam tuaahta hi. Hujiahin hung hilh in, a lahva koijaw in amah alungsiat naah jaw diai?” achi hi.
Simon in adawng a, “Angaihdam tamjawpa hi diingin ka gingta hi,” achi hi. Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Na chi dih hi,” achi hi.

Huzohin Ama’n numeinu lam anga a, Simon kawmah, “Hi numeinu na mu ei? Na inn sungah ka hung luut a, nang ka keeng silna diing tui na hung pe sih a, hizongleh amahnu’n a mittui in ka keengpeeh asil a, a sam in asiaah hi.
Nang chu tawp zong na hung tawp sih a, hizongleh hi numeinu’n chu ka hung luut apatin ka keengpeehte tawp akhawl nai sih hi.
Nang in ka lu sathau na hung nuh sih a, hizongleh hi numei in chu ka keengpeehte thau gimtuui ahung nuh hi.
Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, a lungsiat naah mahmah jiahin a sualna tampi chu ngaihdam ahita hi. Hizongleh tawm ngaihdamnate’n alungsiat tawm uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n numeinu kawmah, “Na sualte ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Amah toh ankuang a toukhawmte’n a lungsim un, “Sualnate ngeei zong ngaidam, Hi Pa hi koi ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n numeinu kawmah, “Na ginna in ahung hundamta hi, hamuangtahin chiahta in,” achi hi.
Hute zohin Jesu’n thusoi kawm leh Pathian lalgam tanchinpha soi kawmin khopi leh khotate atuansuaah hi. Huleh sawmlenihte chu a kawmah aum uhi.
Huleh numei hunkhop dawipaai damkiit leh natnate apat damkiit a kawmah aum va, Mari Magdalini achih uh, a sung apat dawi sagih pawtdohna nu toh.
Huleh Herod innsung enkoltu Chuza ji Joanna toh, Susanna toh huleh midang tampite toh ahi va, hute’n chu a silneihsa un Amah nna atohsah jeel uhi.
Huleh mipi nasatah ahung paikhawm va, huleh khopi chin a mi Amah kawma ahung tahun tehkhinthu in asoi hi:
“Haichithehtu khat chu haichi thehin akuan a, huleh atheh laiin khenkhat lampi geiah atu a, huchu akituanchil a, tungleeng vate’n atom beita hi.
Khenkhat suang tung ah atu a, a lei anom louh jiahin, ahung pou patpat in agawgawp pahta hi.
Khenkhat chu louling lahah atu a, ling toh ahung pou khawm a, ling in adeepmangta hi.
Huleh khenkhat chu lei hoih ah atu a, ahung pou a, aleh za in agahta hi,” achi hi. Huleh hi thute asoi zohin akikou a, “Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
Huleh a nungjuite’n, “Hi tehkhinthu hi bangchihna ahiai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.

Huin Jesu’n, “Pathian lalgam thukiphualte chu nanguh diinga heet phal ahi a, hizongleh midang kawmah chu tehkhinthu a soi ahi; huchibanga ‘Amuh va atheihsiam louhna diingun, huleh ajaah va aheetsiam louhna diingun,’ achi hi.
“Hu tehkhinthu hilhchetna chu hih ahi: Haichi chu Pathian thu ahi.
Lampi geia tute chu thu jatute ahi va; huin diabol chu ahung a, agintaat va hutdama aum louhna diingun, thu chu a lungtang vapat alamang hi.
Suang tunga tute chu hichibangte ahi uh, ajaah tahun thu chu kipaahtahin apom uhi. Huleh hite’n chu zung anei sih va, tomkhat sung agingta va, heemna atuaah chiangun apuuh veu uhi.
Huleh louling laha tute chu hichibangte ahi uh: thu ajaah nungun achiah va, khosah diing daan ngaihtuahnate, hauhsatnate leh damsung nopsahnate’n adeepmangta a, agah piching ngei sih uhi.
Hizongleh lei hoih a tute chu hichibangte ahi uhi: lungtang siangthou leh hoih in thu chu aja va, apom va, huleh kuhkaltahin gah asuang uhi.
“Mi koimah in thaumei adet chiangin kuang akhuhkhum ngei sih, ahihlouhleh lupna nuaiah zong akoih ngei sih hi. Hizongleh aluut photmah in amuh theihna diingin atunna ah akoih jaw hi.
Ajiahchu kiphuang lou diinga seel bangmah aum sih a, huleh heet louh diing leh kilang lou diinga phual zong bangmah aum sih hi.
Hujiahin bangchiin ahiai na jaah uh pilvaang un. Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu piaahbeh ahi diing a; huleh koipouh aneilou chu neia akingaih nasan zong laahsah ahi diing,” achi hi.
Hulaiin a nu leh a sanggamte chu Amah mu diingin ahung va, huleh mipi jiahin a kawm atung thei sih va,
“Na nu leh na sanggamte nang hung mu nuamin inn pua ah ading uh,” chiin koiaha in ahilh hi.
Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte chu Pathian thu ngaikhia a juite ahi uh,” achi hi.
Ni khat chu a nungjuite toh kuang ah atuang a, Ama’n a kawmvah, “Diil gaal lehlam ah i kaai diing uh,” achi hi. Huin akitawlta uhi.
Hizongleh akitawl laiun Amah chu aihmuta a, huleh hu diil tungah huihpi ahung nungsuh a, a kuang vah tui ahung luutta a, lauhhuai ah aumta uhi.
A nungjuite a kawma hungin aphawng va, “Houtupa, Houtupa, beimang diing ka hita uh,” achi uhi. Huin Amah chu ahung thou a, huih leh tui kinawh chu ataai a, huin akhawlta va, ahung daaita hi.

Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na ginna uh khoia um ahiai?” achi hi. Amah un chu lauin limdang asa mahmah va, “Hi Pa hi bangtobang mi hi ahiai? Ajiahchu huih leh tui nasan thu apia a, amang mei uh!” akichi uhi.
Galili gaal jawna um Gadara mite gam ah akitawl luut uhi.
Huleh gam a akaaidoh tahun hun sawtpi dawi anapaai koiaha khat in khopi apat Amah anakituaahpih hi. Ama’n chu puan asilh sih a, huleh inn mawngmawng ah zong aum sih a, haan munte lahah aum veu hi.
Ama’n Jesu amuh tahin akikou a, a ma ah apuuh a, aw ngaihtahin, “Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpeen Tapa, kei leh nang in bang kizopna i nei ei? Hung sugim lou diingin ka hung ngeen ahi,” achi hi.

Ajiahchu Ama’n hagau niin chu hi pa sung apat pawt diingin thu anapeta hi. Tampivei dawi niin in amah chu amankhata a, khainiang leh kol buhsahin aum hi. Huleh ama’n a kikaannate chu aphutan a, gamdaai ah dawi puimangin aum veu hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na min bang ahiai?” chiin adong hi. A sunga dawi tampi aluut jiahin, ama’n “Legion,” achi hi.
Huleh dawite’n kokhuuh thuuh a chiah diinga thu pelou diingin Amah angeen uhi.
Hu mun ah taang ah voh hon tampi ataa va, amah un hute sunga aluut uh phalsah diingin angeen uhi. Huleh Ama’n aphalsah hi.
Huin dawite chu hu mipa sung apat pawtin voh hon sungah aluut uhi. Voh hon chu diil lamah munkeen ah ataaisuh hut-hut va, tui ah akelumta uhi.
Huin voh chingtute’n sil umdaan amuh tahun ataai va, hi thu khopi leh khoneute ah avasoi uhi.
Huin bang thu ahita ei chih en diingin ahung pawt va, huleh Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun dawi in anuutsiatpa chu puan silh a, lungsim ngeina pua a hoihtaha Jesu keengbul a tou amu va, huleh alauta uhi.
Huleh amute’n dawimatpa suhdama ahung umdaante amahuh anahilh uhi.
Huin Gadara gam kiimveel a mi zousiah in alau mahmah jiahun Amah chu a kawm vapat chiahmang diingin angeen uhi. Huin Amah chu kuang sungah aluut a, amahuh anuseta hi.
Huleh a sung apat dawite hung pawtnapa in chu Amah kawma aum theihna diingin angeenta hi. Hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu asawlkhia a,

“Na inn ah chiah kiit inla, Pathian in nang diinga bangchituha sil loupi hung bawlsah ahita eimah, chih vaphuang in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu achiahta a, Jesu’n sil loupitah amah diinga abawlsah chu khopi pumpi ah ataangkoupihta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu ahung kinunglehkiit in mipite’n Amah nasatahin anakipaahpih uhi, ajiahchu a bawnva Amah anangaah zing ahi uhi.
Huleh en in, pasal khat a min Jaira kichi sinagog a vaihawmtu ahung a, huleh Jesu keengbul ah akhupboh a, a inn a chiah diingin angeen hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n tanu khat chauh kum sawmlenih veel diing anei a, amah chu laitatin alum hi. Hizongleh hichia Jesu achiah tahin mipite’n atuam hut-hut uhi.
Huleh numei khat kum sawmlenih sipawt, aneih zousiah daktorte kawma zang beita a, hizongleh koima’n asuhdam zohlouh uh aum hi.
Huin Jesu nung ah ahung pai a, a puan mong akhoih a, huin thakhatin a sipawt chu akangta hi.

Huin Jesu’n, “Koi ahiai ahung khoih?” achi hi. Mi zousiah in kei ka hi sih achih chiat phetun, Peter leh a lawite’n, “Houtupa, mihonpi in hung tuam a, hung neh huthut a, ‘Koi ahiai ahung khoih?’ na chih” achi uhi.
Jesu’n, “Koiaha khat in ahung khoih hi, ajiahchu silbawltheihna kei apatin apawt hi chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
Huin numeinu’n akiphual theihlouh amuh tahin kiliing pumin ahung a, a ma ah apuuh a, mipi zousiah maai ah a kawmah akhoih nasan leh ahung dam pah daan aphuangta hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Tanu, kipaahtahin um in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi, hamuangtahin chiahta in,” achi hi.
Ama’n huchia asoi laiin, sinagog vaihawmtupa inn apatin mi khat ahung a, “Na tanu asita hi. Houtupa suhbuai nawn dah mei in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n hi thu ajaah tahin adawng a, a kawmah, “Lau sin, gingta mei in, huchiin amahnu chu adamdoh kiit diing,” achi hi.
Huleh inn sunga aluut tahin Peter, Jakob, Johan leh naupangnu nulepa chihlouh koimah luut aphal sih hi.
A bawnun amahnu kahin anamaau jeenjuun va, hizongleh Ama’n, “Kap sih un, amahnu asi sih hi, a-ihmu ahijaw,” achi hi.
Huin amah un amahnu asita chih aheet jiahun Amah chu anuihsan uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a bawnun asawldoh veh a, amahnu chu a khut in atu a, “Naupangnu, thou in” chiin akou hi.
Huin a hagau ahung kiit a, athoudoh pai a, huin amahnu chu neeh diing pe diingin thu apia hi.
A nulepa’n limdang asa mahmah va, hizongleh hu sil kibawl chu koimah hilh lou diingin Ama’n amahuh akhapta hi.
Huzohin Jesu’n a nungjui sawmlenihte akoukhawm a, dawi zousiah tunga silbawltheihna leh thuneihna, huleh natnate suhdam theihna apia hi.
Huleh amahuh chu Pathian lalgam thu soi diing leh damloute sudam diingin asawldohta hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na zinna diingun chiang aha, sakhau aha, tanghou aha, sum aha bangmah keng sih un; huleh puannaah thuah nih nei sih un.
Na luutna inn vah tungden unla, huleh hu apatin kipankhia un.
Mi ahung kipaahpih lou photmah chu hu khopi apat na pawt chiangun amahuh heetsahna diingin na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un,” achi hi.
Huin achiahta va, tanchinpha soi kawm leh mun chin a mite sudamin akhua akhua ah achiahta uhi.
Hu hun laiin gambung vaihawmtu Herod in Jesu silbawl zousiah anaja a, alungjiingta hi, ajiahchu khenkhat in Johan chu misi lah apat kaihthoha um ahita achi uhi.
Khenkhat in, Elijah ahung kilaah ahita achi uhi. Huleh midangte’n malai zawlneite khat hung thou kiit ahita achi uhi.
Herod in, “Johan lah a ngawng tanta ing a, hizongleh hichilawma a thu ka jaah hi koi ahita ei?” achi hi. Huchiin Amah chu muh auutta hi.
Huleh apostolte’n ahung kiit tahun asilbawl zousiah uh Amah ahilh uhi. Huin Jesu’n amahuh apui a, Bethsaida kichi kho geia munsip khat ah achiah tuampih hi.
Mipite’n huchu aheet tahun Amah ajuita va, huleh Ama’n amahuh anakipaahpih a, a kawmvah Pathian lalgam thu ahilh a, suhdam ngaite asudam hi.

Huin nitum kuan ahung hihin sawmlenihte chu ahung va, a kawmah, “I kiimveel a khopi leh khoneute a chiah a, giahna leh neeh diing hawl diingin mipite sawlkhia in; ajiahchu hia munsip khat a um i hi uhi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nang un neeh diing pia un,” achi hi. Amah un, “Mipi hijaat zoujaai neeh diing i valeisah louh leh, tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh loungaal bangmah i nei sih uh,” achi uhi.
Ajiahchu amahuh mi saang ngaa veel ahi uhi. Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Sawmngaa jeelin ahon hon in tousah un,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un huchiin abawl va, a bawnun atousahta uhi.
Huin Amah in hu tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chu ala a, vaan lam entouin avangpiaah a, abalkeeh a, a nungjuite kawmah mipite ma a lui diingin apia hi.
Huleh ane va, avah chiat uhi. Huleh aneehvaal uh aneng bawm lian sawmlenih aluaah dim uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu angena ahaamtei laiin a nungjuite’n Amah avazop va, huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mipite’n kei hi koi ahi ahung chi viai?” chiin adong hi.
Amah un adawng va, “Baptistu Johan ahi, ahung chi uh, hizongleh khenkhat in, Elijah ahi, ahung chi uh; huleh adangte’n, zawlnei malai-ate laha khat hung thou kiit ahi, ahung chi uh,” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahihleh nang un kei koi ka hi na hung chi viai?” achi a, Peter in adawng a, “Pathian apat Khrist chu na hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n hu thu chu koimah hilh lou diingin amahuh thu apia a;
“Mihing Tapa’n chu sil tampi athuaah ngeei diing hi; upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n anual diing va, athat diing va, huleh ni thum ni in kaihthohin aum diing hi,” chiin.
Huleh Ama’n a bawnva kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin ni chin in a kros puain hung jui heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in ahuumbit diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi’n khovel apumin nei henla, amah kisusiain ahihlouhleh kisumang leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai?
Hujiahin mi koipouh keimah leh ka thute zumpih chu Mihing Tapa’n a loupina toh, a Pa loupina toh, huleh angel siangthoute loupina toh ahung chiangin amah chu azumpih diing hi.
Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, hia dingte khenkhat Pathian lalgam amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uh,” achi hi.
Huleh hite asoi nung ni giat diing bangin Ama’n Peter leh Johan leh Jakob apui a, taang ah haamtei diingin achiah uhi.
Ahaamtei laiin a meel umdaan ahung limdangta a, a puansilhte chu avaam a, ate selsel hi.
Huleh ngai in, mi nih Amah toh akihou va, hute chu Mosi leh Elijah ahi uhi.
Amahuh chu loupina in ahung kilaah va, hi khovel Ama’n apaisan diing thu asoi va, huchu Ama’n Jerusalem ah asubukim diing hi.
Hizongleh Peter leh a kawma umte chu a ihmut uh asuaah mahmah a, huleh ahung halh tahun, Jesu loupina leh a kawma ding mi nihte amuta uhi.

A kawm akipat apaikhiah laiun, bang ahiai asoi zong helouin, Peter in Jesu kawmah, “Houtupa, eiuh diingin hitaha um ahoih hi, puanbuuh thum i lam diing va, nang a diing khat, Mosi a diing khat, huleh Elijah a diing khat,” achi hi.
Huchia asoi laiin meilum ahung kaai a, amahuh ahung khuh a, huleh meilum laha aluut phetun alauta uhi.
Huleh meilum lah apatin aw ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi; a thu ngai un,” chiin.
Huleh aw adaih tahin Jesu chauh muhin aumta hi. Huin asip vengveng va, hulaiin a sil muhte uh koimah ahilh sih uhi.
Huleh ajiingni a taang apat ahung suh tahun mipi nasatahin Amah analamtuaah uhi.
Huleh en in, mipi lah apat mi khat hung kikouin, “Houtupa, ka hung ngeen ahi, ka tapa en in, ka tapa neihsun ahi ngaala.
Ngai in, hagau khat in aman a, thakhat khatin akikoudoh a, huleh chilphuan bo khopin abawlgim veu hi. Naahpiihtaha susidupin anuse veu hi.
Na nungjuite kawmah delhdoh diingin ka ngeen a, adelhdoh thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, “Ginna neilou leh khang paisual aw, bangtan ahiai ka hung umpih a, huleh ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Na tapa hitah ah hung pui in,” achi hi.
Huleh amah chu ahung pai laiin dawi in anasupuuh a asibup hi. Huin Jesu’n hagau niin chu ataai a, naupang chu asudam a, a pa kawmah apeta hi.
Huleh a bawnun Pathian silbawltheihna loupina chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.
“Hi thu kisoite na bil sungvah luut heh, ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu mite khut a matsaha um pah diing ahi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh amah un hi a thusoi chu ahe sih uh, aheet siam louh diingva iim ahih jiahin; huleh a thusoi tungtaang Amah dot diing lah alau uhi.
Huin a lahva koi ahiai lianpeen diing chia kinialna ahung neita uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a lungtang va angaihtuah uh ahe a, naupangneu khat akai a, a kawmah adingsah a,
a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh ka min a hi naupang saang chu kei hung saang ahi; huleh kei hung saang chu ahung sawlpa saang ahi. Ajiahchu na bawnva laha neupeen chu alianpeen diing,” achi hi.
Huin Johan in adawng a, “Houtupa, mi khat na min a dawite nohdoh ka mu va, ka hung juihna va atel louh jiahin ka khapta uh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Amah chu khap sih un, ajiahchu ei hung doulou photmah chu ei lama pang ahi,” achi hi.
Huin hichi ahung hi a, puitouha aum diing hun atunin Ama’n Jerusalem a chiah diing atum tintenta hi.
Huleh a ma ah mi asawl masa a, huchiin amahuh chu anachiahin Amah diinga guatsa diama anakoih diingin Samariate khua khat ah aluut uhi.
Huleh amah un Jerusalem lama chiah ahih jiahin anakipaahpih sih uhi.
A nungjuite Jakob leh Johan in hi aheet tahun, “Lalpa, Elijah bawl bangin amahuh kaangmang diingin vaan apatin mei koukhe lei hoih na sa diai?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu akihei a, amahuh ataai a, “Bangchibang hagau po mi na hih uh kihelou na hi uh.
Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu mihingte hinna suse diinga hung hilouin hundam diinga hung ahijaw hi,” achi hi. Huin kho dang ah achiahta uhi.
Huleh lampi a achiah laiun mi khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, na chiahna phot ah ka hung jui diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Si-aalte’n kua anei va, tungleeng vate’n buuh anei uh; hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n a lu ngahna diing mun anei sih,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n midang khat kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi. Hizongleh ama’n, “Lalpa, vachiah a, ka pa vavui hung phalsah masa phot in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n, “Misite’n a misi uh kivui uh heh; hizongleh nang chu chiah inla Pathian lalgam thu mun chin ah vasoi in,” achi hi.
Huleh midang khat in zong, “Lalpa, ka hung jui diing; hizongleh ka inn a mite kampha in hung vahasah masa phot in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Mi koipouh lei let diinga laangkawn tuzinga nung lam en chu, Pathian lalgam mi hitaah ahi sih,” achi hi.
Hi silte nungin Lalpa’n midang sawmsagih zong aguat a, Amah ngeei hungna diing khopi chin leh mun chin ah a ma ah nih nih in asawl hi.
Hujiahin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Buh laah diing atam mahmah a, hizongleh a natongtute atawm uhi; hujiahin buh la diinga natongtute hung sawldoh diingin buh neitu Lalpa kawmah ngeen un.
Chiah unla, ngai un, ngei hon laha belaamnoute bangin ka hung sawl hi.
Dangka-ip aha, sakhau aha, keengtophah aha keng sih unla, huleh lampi ah koimah chibai buuh sih un.
“Inn na luutna phot vah amasapeenin, ‘Hi inn ah hamuanna tung heh,’ chi un.
Hu a hamuanna taah aum leh, na hamuanna uh chu a tungah aum diing a, aum louh leh, na kawmvah ahung kihkiit diing hi.
Hu inn ah um zing unla, ahung piaah phot uh nein dawn un, ajiahchu natongtu chu loh mutaah ahi. Inn khat apat inn khat ah tuan lehleh sih un.
“Khopi na luut na phot va ahung na kipaahpih uh leh, na ma va alui photmah uh ne un.
Hu a damlou umte chu sudam unla, a kawmvah, ‘Pathian lalgam na kawm naih uh ahung tungta,’ chi un.
Hizongleh khopi na luutna phot va ahung na kipaahpih louh uh leh, a kho kotzing ah chiah unla,
‘Na kho leivui ngeei uh ka keengtaw va baang nasan nanguh kalhna in ka thingkhia uhi. Ahihvaangin Pathian lalgam na kawm naih uh ahung tungta, chih he un,’ chi un.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, hu Ni chianga hu khopi thuaah diing saangin Sodom khopi thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.

“Korazin, na tung agih hi! Bethsaida, na tung agih hi! Ajiahchu na sungva silmah kibawlte Tura leh Sidon khua a kibawl hileh, sawtin sai-ip puan silhin vut laha touin sawtpi in akisiih zouta diing uhi.
Hizongleh vaihawm ni chiangin nanguh thuaah saangin Tura leh Sidon thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.
Huleh nang Kapernaum vaan tana paahtawia um diinga kisa, Misi Khua ah paihkhiahin na um diing hi.
Koipouh na thusoi uh ngai chu kei thu ngai ahi uh; koipouh nanguh hung nual chu kei hung nual ahi uh; huleh kei hung nual chu ahung sawlpa nual ahi uh,” achi hi.
Huleh sawmsagihte chu kipaahtahin ahung tung kiit va, “Lalpa, na min jaalin dawite nasan ka thu un aum uhi,” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Setan vaan apat a kawlphe banga hung kia ka mu hi.
Ngai un, guulte leh mom-aaite totdeen theihna leh meelma silbawltheihna zousiah tungah thuneihna ka hung pia hi, huleh bangmah in ahung suna het sih diing hi.
Hizongleh dawite na thuthu va aum jiahun kipaah sih unla, hizongleh vaan a na min uh gelh ahih jiahin kipaah jaw un,” achi hi.

Hu hun laitahin Jesu chu Hagau in akipaah a, “Aw Pa, vaan leh lei Lalpa, nangma’n mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naungeehte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung paahtawi hi. Ahi Pa, huchibang chu na kipaahna mahmah ahi.
Ka Pa’n sil zousiah ka kawmah ahung pekheta hi. Tapa koi ahiai chih Pa loungaal koima’n ahe sih, huleh Pa koi ahiai chih Tapa leh a kawmva Tapa’n aphuan nuamnate loungaal koima’n ahe sih,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite lam anga a, aguuhin, “Na sil muhte uh muhna mitte ahampha hi;
ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh kumpi tampite’n na sil muhte uh muh anauut va, hizongleh amu sih uh; huleh na jaahte uh zong jaah anauut va, hizongleh aja sih uhi,” achi hi.
Huchiin en in, daansiam mi khat adingdoh a, Amah jeetna in, “Houtupa, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.
Ama’n a kawmah, “Daan ah bang akigial ei? Bangchiin na sim kha ei?” achi hi.

Ama’n adawng a, “ ‘LALPA na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah a, na hagau zousiah a, na haatna zousiah a, huleh na lungsim zousiah a na lungsiat diing ahi,’ huleh ‘nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi,’ chiin,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na dawng dih mahmah hi; hikhu bawl in, huchiin na hing diing hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh ama’n siamkitan uutin Jesu kawmah, “Ka innveeng koi ahiai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Mi koiaha khat Jerusalem apatin Jeriko ah achiah suh a, suammangte atuaah kha hi. Hute’n a puansilh asuutsah va, avoliam va, silouphetin anusia uhi.
Huin siampu khat hu lampi ah achiah suh a, amah amuh tahin lampi gei langkhat ah apeelta hi.
Huleh hichi mahbangin Levi mi khat hi mun ahung tung a, aen a, lampi gei lang khat ah apeel hi.
Hizongleh Samariami khat khualzin lai chu hupa umna mun ahung tung a, amah amuh tahin alungsiat mahmah hi.
Huin a kawmah achiah a, a liamnate thau leh uain sun khumin atuam a; amah gan tunga tuangsahin zinbuuh ah achiahpih a, aenkolta hi.
Huleh ajiingni a achiah diingin dinari nih aladoh a, zinbuuh neitu kawmah apia a, ‘Amah anaenkol inla, hi baan ah na seen zahzah chu ka hung kiit chiangin ka hung pe kiit diing,’ achi hi.
Tuin hi mi thumte lahah a koipeen chu gutate tuaahpa innveeng hi diingin na ngaihtuah ei?” achi hi.
Ama’n, “A tunga khotuahna neipa,” achi hi. Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiah inla, nang zong huchibangin vabawl in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu leh a nungjuite achiah laiun khua khat ah aluut va, numei khat a min Martha kichi in a inn ah atungsah hi.
Huleh amahnu’n Mari kichi nau numei khat anei a, amah chu Jesu keengbul ah atou a, a thusoi angai hi.
Hizongleh Martha chu neehbawlin abuai mahmah a, Jesu kawmah ahung a, “Lalpa, ka sanggamnu’n kei chauh neeh bawla ahung set khawhsa lou na hiaimah? Hung huh diingin sawl in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Martha, Martha, sil tampi na ngaihtuaha buai na hi.
Hizongleh sil khat chauh apoimoh hi, Mari in tan hoih ateelta a, huchu laahsah louh diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, mun khat a Jesu ahaamtei laiin, ahaamtei zohin a nungjuite khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, Johan in a nungjuite ahilh bangin haamtei daan hung hilh in,” achi hi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na haamtei chiangun, ‘Ka Pa uh vaan a um, na min kizahtaat heh. Na lalgam hung tung heh. Na deihjawng vaan a akibawl bangin lei ah zong kibawl heh.
Ka ni teng neehkhop uh ni chinin hung pia in.
Ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam bangun, ka sualnate uh hung ngaidam in. Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, huleh giloupa apat hung hunkhe jaw in,’ chi un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na lahva koi ahiai lawm khat nei a, jaankhang laia a kawma vachiah a, ‘Lawm, tanghou beu thum hung thunglaah sah in;
ajiahchu ka lawmpa khualzin ka kawmah ahung a, a ma ah lui diing bangma ka nei sih hi,’ vachi a;
huphet-a a lawmpa’n inn sung apat a, ‘Hung subuai sin, kot khaah ahita a, ka tate zong ka kawmah lupna ah alumta uhi. Hung thouin ka hung pe thei sih,’ chia anadawng, lawm khat nei kua ahiai?
Ka hung hilh ahi, a lawm ahih jiaha vathoua vape diing hi sih mahzongleh, anget teeiteei jiahin thouin adeih zahzah avape diing hi.
“Ka hung hilh ahi, ngeen un, piaahin na um diing uh; hawl un, na mu diing uh; kiu un, honsahin na um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu angeen taphot in atang va, ahawl taphot in amu va, huleh akiu taphot chu honsahin aum diing hi.
“Na lahva pa koiaha a tapa in tanghou ngeen leh, kuan ahiai suang pe diing? Ahihlouhleh nga ngeen leh, nga luangin guul ape diaimah?
Ahihlouhleh aahtui ngeen leh mom-aai ape diaimah?
Huchia nanguh migilou in bawn na tate uh sil hoih piaahnataang na heet uh leh, na Pa uh vaan a um in a ngeentute kawmah Hagau Siangthou naah piaah tham lou diing ahiaimah?” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n dawi haam theilou khat anohdoh a, huleh hichi ahung hi a, dawi apawt phetin haam theiloupa chu ahung haamta hi; huchiin mipite’n limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat in, “Dawimangpa Beelzebul jaala dawite anohdoh ahi,” achi uhi.
Adangte’n Amah je-etna in vaan apatin chiamchihna angeen uhi.
Hizongleh Amah in, angaihtuah uh aheetin a kawmvah, “Lalgam kilangkhena amah leh amah kidou photmah, amangthaai veu a, huleh innsung khat zong kilangkhena akidou leh, apuuh veu hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah akikhen leh, bangchiin a lalgam ading thei diai? Beelzebul vaihawmna jaala dawite nohdoh ahi na hung chi ngaalva.
Huleh ke’n Beelzebul jaala dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, na tapate un koi jaala anohdoh uh ahiai? Hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n Pathian khut zung vaanga dawite ka nohdoh ahihleh, Pathian lalgam na tungvah ahung tung tahzet ahi.
“Mihaat in hiamlethal tawia a inn aveen chiangin a neihlelamte abit hi.
Hizongleh amah saanga haatjaw khat ahung a, ahung zoh chiangin akimuanna gaalthuam zousiah alaahsah a, huleh agaallaah silte chu ahawmjaah veu hi.
Koipouh ka lama pang lou chu ahung dou ahi a, huleh koipouh ahung laahkhawmpih lou in chu asudalh ahi.
“Hagau niin chu mi khat sung apat apawtkhiahin tui um louhna mun chin ah khawlna diing hawlin avaah lehleh a; huin amuh louh phetin, ‘Ka pawtna inn mah ah ka chiah kiit mei diing,’ achi hi.
Huleh hutah ahung tunin phiat sianga zep hoiha um amu hi.
Huin achiah a, amah saanga giloujaw hagau dang sagih ahung pui a, a sung ah aluut va, ateengta uhi. Huin hupa umdaan nunung chu amasa khu saangin ahung sejaw seemta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Ama’n hi thute asoi laiin mipi lah apat numei koiaha ahung kikou doh a, a kawmah, “Nang hung kipaaina gil ahampha hi, huleh nawi na teepte toh,” chiin.
Hizongleh Ama’n chu, “Ahi mah hi, himahleh Pathian thu ja a juite ahamphajaw uh,” achi hi.

Huleh mipi ahung kikhop khawm laiun Ama’n a kawmvah thu asoi a, “Hi khang chu khang giloutah ahi uhi. Chiamchihna ahawl va, hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Jonah Ninevi kho mite diinga chiamchihna ahih bangin Mihing Tapa zong hi khang a diingin chiamchihna ahi diing hi.

Simlam kumpinu chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing a, siamlouh atangsah diing hi, ajiahchu Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin kawlmong apat ahung hi. En un, Solomon saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
Ninevi kho mite chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh athou diing va, siamlouh atangsah diing uh, ajiahchu Jonah thusoi jiahin amahuh akisiih uhi. En un, Jonah saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
“Mi koima’n thaumei avaah chiangin mun kiphual ahihlouhleh loh nuaiah akoih ngei sih uh; ahung luutte’n avaah amuh theihna diingun, thaumei tunna ah akoih jaw uhi.
Sapum vaahna thaumei chu mit ahi. Hujiahin na mit ahoih chiangin na sapum zong a bawnin avaah suaah hi. Hizongleh na mit ahoih louh chiangin na sapum zong amial veh hi.
Hujiahin na sungva vaah um chu mial ahih louhna diingin pilvaang un.
Hujiahin na tahsa pumpi avaah a, a mialna mun aum louh leh, thaumei vaahtahin ahung taanvaah bangin avaah suaah veh diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n thu asoi zohin Pharisai koiaha khat in a kawma an ne diingin Amah achial hi. Huin aluut a, an ne diingin atouta hi.
Huin an neeh ma a Ama’n a khut asil louh chu amuhin Pharisaipa’n limdang asa mahmah hi.
Huin Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Nanguh Pharisaite’n nou leh kuang apolam na silsiang ngeei uhi, hizongleh na sunglam uh chu suammangna leh giitlouhna in adim hi.
Nanguh mingol haw, apolam siamtu’n a sung lam zong siamlou ahiaimah?
Hizongleh sunglam a um na silneihte uh migentheite kawmah pe jaw un, huleh ngai un, sil zousiah nanguh diingin asiang hi.

“Hizongleh Pharisaite, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un pudinate, peganon leh huan haichi tuamtuam sawm-a-khat na pia va, vaihawmna dih leh Pathian lungsiatna na thudon sih uhi. Hite chu ahi na bawl diing uh, adangte zong bawllou tuanlouin.
Nanguh Pharisaite, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un sinagog ah touna poimoh peenpeente leh dawlmunte ah mi’n chibai ahung buuh diing na deih uhi.
Nanguh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nanguh chu haankhuuh kimulou mi’n haan ahihlam heloua atunga avapai veunate bang na hi uh,” achi hi.
Huin daansiamte laha khat in adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, hichibanga na thusoi in keiuh zong hung taai na hi,” achi hi.
Ama’n, “Nanguh daansiamte zong, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un vangih tahtah mi na posah va, nang un lah hu vangihte na khut zung khat un zong na khoihtaang nuam sih uhi.
Na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un zawlneite haan na lam va, amahuh lah na pulepate uh thah ahi.
Na pulepate uh silbawl ahoih hi chiin na heetpih tahzet uhi; ajiahchu amah un amahuh anathat va, nang un a haan uh na lamsah uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian pilna in zong, ‘A kawmvah zawlneite leh apostolte ka sawl diing a, a lahva khenkhat anathat diing va, khenkhat asuduhdah diing uhi.’
Khovel siam chiil apat a kisuah zawlnei zousiah sisan phuba chu hi khang tungah phuut theih ahi diing hi.
Abel sisan kisuah apat maitaam leh Pathian biahinn kikaal a kithat Zakaria sisan tanin. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi phuba chu hi khang tungah akila diing hi.
“Nanguh daansiamte, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un heetna chabi lamangin nanguh lah na luut sih va, mi aluut diingte lah na khaam veu uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n hi thute asoi laiin daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n Amah chu thu tampi soisah tumin hahphinin aphin panta uhi.
Siamlouh atansah theihna diingun ahaam khelhna mat tumin Amah ataang zing uhi.
Huchih laiin mipi simseenglouh, khat leh khat kituanchil khop hiala ahung kikhop laiun, Jesu’n amasapeenin a nungjuite ahoupih a, a kawmvah, “Pharisaite tol lahah kiveeng un, huchu lepchiahna ahi.
Kilang lou diinga kiphual bangmah aum sih a, huleh heetlouh diinga iim zong bangmah aum sih hi.
Hujiahin mial a na soi photmah uh vaah ah jaahin aum diing a, huleh innsung tawng a bilbul a na soi uh chu inntungvuumte ah taangkoupihin aum diing hi.
“Huleh nanguh ka lawmte aw, ka hung hilh ahi, tahsa that theia huzohchianga bangmah dang bawltheih nei nawnloute lau sih un.
Hizongleh koi ahiai na lau diing uh, ka hung hilh lawh diing hi: Athah nunga zong gawtmun a paihtheihna thuneitupa Amah chu lau un; ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, Amah chu lau un.
Kawlgiit ngaa paisa nih in ajuaah veu sih viaimah? Ahiinlah a lahva khatmah zong Pathian ma ah mangngilhin aum sih hi.
Ahi, na lutung va samjangte nasan sim veh ahi. Hujiahin lau sih un, kawlgiit tampi saangin na luuljaw uhi.
“Ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh mite ma a kei hung gum photmah chu Mihing Tapa in zong Pathian angelte ma ah amah agum diing hi.
Hizongleh mite ma a kei hung kiheetmohbawl chu Pathian angelte ma ah kiheetmohbawlin aum diing hi.
Koipouh Mihing Tapa kalha thusoi chu ngaihdam ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
“Huleh nanguh sinagogte ah leh thukhentute leh thuneitute ma a ahung pui tahchiangun bangchia bang thu in ka dawng diai, ahihlouhleh bang ka soi diai chiin lunghimoh sih un.
Ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou in ahuntahin na soi diing uh ahung hilh diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh mipi laha khat in Amah kawmah, “Houtupa, ka unaupa kawma gou hung kihoppih diingin soi in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mihing, koi in ahiai kei na tungva vaihawmtu aha, tanhawmtu aha a hung bawl?” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pilvaang unla, eenna chinteng lahah kiveeng un, ajiahchu mihing damsan sil tampi neih ahi sih,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, tehkhinthu khat asoi a, “Mihausa koiaha khat chu a lou a piang ahung pung mahmahta hi.
Huchiin a lungsim in akingaihtuah a, ‘Ka buhlebaal koihna diing lah ka nei sih a, bangloh diing ka diai?’ achi hi.
“Huin, ‘Hikhu ka bawl diing: Ka buhinn ka phel diing a, alianjaw ka lam diing a, huleh hutah ah ka buhlebaalte leh ka thuampua zousiah ka koih diing hi.
Huleh ka hinna kawmah, “Hinna, kum tampi sunga diing thuampua tampi na neita a, kitawlnga inla, nein, dawnin huleh nuamtahin um in,” ka chi diing,’ achi hi.
Hizongleh Pathian in a kawmah, ‘Nang mingol! Tujaan leh na hinna hung kilaahsah diing ahi. Hu na sil kholkhawmte koi a diing ahita diai?’ achi hi.
Amah chauh diinga gou kikhol a, Pathian lama hausa lou chu huchi ahi veu hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, bang ahiai ka neeh diing chiin na hinna diing uh leh bang ahiai ka silh diing chiin na tahsa diingun lunghimoh sih un.
Ajiahchu hinna chu neeh diing saangin, huleh tahsa zong puansilh saangin athupi jaw hi.
Va-aahte ngaihtuah un, buh lah atuh sih va, aat zong a-at sih uh, buhpang leh buhinn zong anei sih uh; hizongleh Pathian in amahuh avaah hi. Nanguh vate saanga bangchituha luuljaw na hita viaimah?
Huleh nanguh lahah koi in ahiai lunghihmoh jiaha a dung tong khat a behlap thei?
Huchia nang un hu sil neupatawp zong na bawl theihlouh uh leh, bang diinga sildangte tungtaanga lungkham na hi viai?

“Lili paah khan daan ngaihtuah un: nna lah atonggim sih va, pat zong akheeh sih uhi; hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Solomon ngeei zong a loupina zousiah a akizepin hi lili paahte laha khat banga zepmawi ahi zou sih hi.
Huchia gam a hampa tunia hing a, a jiinga meikhuuh a paih mei diing bawn Pathian in hichituha azep inchu, Aw nanguh ginna haatloute, bangchituha nanguh silhsaha um diing na hita viaimah?
Huleh na neeh diing uh aha, na dawn diing uh aha hawl sih unla, bangmah in lunghimoh sih un.
Ajiahchu khovel a namte’n hihaw zousiah lawptahin ahawl uh; huleh na Pa un hi silte na mamoh uh chih ahe hi.
Hizongleh nang un chu Pathian lalgam hawl jaw un, huchiin hi silte piaah beh na hi diing uhi.
Pawl tawmte lau sih un, ajiahchu na kawmva lalgam piaah diing chu na Pa uh kipaahna jawngtah ahi.
“Na neih teng uh juaah unla, migentheite kawmah pia un. Vaan ah guta naih phaah louhna leh leikha neehsiat louhna ah dangkaip lui theilou leh gou setheilou kikhol jaw un.
Ajiahchu na gou uh umna phot ah na lungsim uh zong aum diing hi.
“Na kawng uh gaah unla, na thaumei uh zong kuangsah zing un.
Mi a pu uh kiteenna ankuang luina apat hung pai a kotkhaah ahung kiuh tah chianga anahonsah thei diinga ngaah zing bangin um un.
A pu uh ahung tahchianga amah ana-ngaah zinga amuh suaahte ahampha uhi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kawng agaah diinga amahuh chu ankuang ah atousah diing a, aneeh uh abawlsahta diing hi.
Huleh jaanveen nihna in ahiai, jaanveen thumna in ahiai hung leh, huchibanga ahung muh inchu, hu suaahte chu ahampha uhi.
Hichu he un, guta hung diing hun inn neitupa in he henla hileh, aveeng diing a, a inn asuvangsah sih diing hi.
Hujiahin nanguh zong kiging zingin um un. Ajiahchu na ngaihtuah louh laitah va Mihing Tapa chu hung diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, hi tehkhinthu hi keiuh kawm chauha na soi ahiai, ahihlouhleh mi zousiah kawmah zong?” achi hi.
Lalpa’n, “Neihlelam enkoltu ginum leh piltah, a pu in a innkuanpihte tunga ahun china a an tan diing uh pe diinga houtu a akoih diing chu koi ahiai?
A pu ahung pai chianga huchibanga anabawl ahung muh diing hu suaah chu ahampha hi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ama’n amah chu aneih zousiah tunga houtuin asiam diing hi.
Hizongleh hu suaahpa’n a lungsim in, ‘Ka pu hung zohlou diing hita,’ chiin asuaah numei leh pasalte anajeepin, huleh nea dawnin anakhamta leh,
hu suaahpa pu chu agintaat louh ni khat in, aheet louh kaalin ahung diing a, atumtan diing a, ginglou mite tan bang atangsah diing hi.
“Huleh suaah a pu deihjawng he ngaal a, anakiginglou leh a deihjawng banga bawl lou chu tampivei vuaah ahi diing hi.

Hizongleh helou a, vuaahna taah hial sil bawl chu tawmtakhatvei vuaah ahi diing hi. Ajiahchu koipouh tampi kipiaahna kawmah, tampi akiphuut diing hi; huleh mi’n tampi akolsah uh kawmah atamjaw seem aphuut diing uhi.
“Leitung a mei khesuh diinga hung ka hi, tuin zong kaang panta leh chi hina mei ing e!
Hizongleh baptisma tan diing khat ka nei hi, hu ka taangtun masiah ka ngaih muanglou hina mei e!
Leitung a lemna leengsah diinga hung hungsa na hi viaimah? Hilou hial, ka hung hilh ahi, kikhenna umsah diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
Ajiahchu tu apatin innsung khat a mi ngaa um chu nih lang ah thum, huleh thum lang ah nih pangin akikhen diing uhi.
Pa in a tapa, huleh tapa in a pa, nu in a tanu, huleh tanu in a nu, innpinu in a mounu huleh mounu in a innpinu adou diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n mipite kawmah zong, “Nang un nitumna lama mei hung kaai na muh chiangun, ‘Guah ju diing ahi,’ na chi pah ngaal uhi, huleh huchiin ahung um ngeei hi.
Huleh sim huih hung nung na heet chiangun, ‘Khua lum diing ahi,’ na chi va, huchiin ahung um ngeei hi.
Nanguh milepchiahte aw! Lei leh vaan umjia lah na hesiam va, bang diinga tulai hun umjia hesiam lou na hi viai?
“Huleh bang diinga nang un dihna chu bang ahiai chih ngaihtuah lou na hi viai?

Thukhentu ma a na langpa toh na chiah chiangin lamkaal ah amah apat suahtaatna diing hawl haamhaam in. Huchilou inchu vaihawmtu ma ah ahung tut diing a, vaihawmtu in thuneitulian kawmah ahung pekhe diing hi. Huleh thuneitulian in suangkul ah ahung khum kha diing hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, paisa lepton khat tan a na ditbei keei masiah hu apatin na pawt hial sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huchih hun laiin, Galili gam a mite Pilat in athah a, a sisan uh kithoihna sa toh ahalkhawmsah uh thu Amah kawma hung hilh mi hunkhop aum uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Huchibang silte athuaah jiahun hu Galili mite chu Galili gam a mite zousiah saanga sual diaahkhola ngaihtuah na hi viaimah?
Hilou e, ka hung hilh ahi, nanguh zong na kisiih louh un chu, huchibangmahin na mangthaai veh diing uhi.
Ahihlouhleh Siloam innsang in apuuhkhum a anetlup mi sawmlegiatte zong Jerusalem a um zousiah saanga sual diaahkhol hia ngaihtuah na hi viaimah?
Ka hung hilh ahi, hilou e; nanguh zong na kisiih louh un chu, huchibangmahin na mangthaai veh diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n hi tehkhinthu zong asoi a: “Mi koiaha in a grephuan ah theipi kung khat anei a, huin agah ahung hawl a, khat zong amu sih hi.
Huin ama’n grephuan enkoltu kawmah, ‘En in, kum thum sung hi theipi kung ah a gah ka hung hawl a, khat zong ka mu sih hi. Phuuh in, bang diinga mun luaha um zing ahiai?’ achi hi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, ‘Pu Aw, tu kum zong umsah nalai in, a kiimkot ka tohkuaah a lei hoih a ka phungvuh masiah in.
Ahung gah taah leh, apha ahi diing a; ahung gahlouh leh, huchian na phuuh na diing,’” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n Sabbath ni in sinagog khat ah thu ahilh hi.
Huleh en in, kum sawmlegiat haatlouhna dawi in amat numei khat aum hi. Anung akuul khiukheu a, huleh adingtang thei himhim sih hi.
Huin Jesu’n amah amuh tahin akou a, a kawmah, “Numei, na haat louhna apat hahkhiah na hita,” achi hi.
Huleh atung ah a khut akoih a, huchiin amahnu chu thakhatin ahung tang pah a, Pathian apaahtawita hi.

Huin Sabbath ni a Jesu’n mi asuhdam jiahin sinagog houtupa chu alungthah mahmah a, mipite kawmah, “Mihing natohna diing ni guup aum a, hu sungin hung unla, hung kisudamsahta un, Sabbath ni a hilouin,” achi hi.
Huphetin Lalpa’n amah adawng a, “Nang milepchiah, Sabbath ni in na bawng uh aha, na sabiltung uh aha, a khihna apat suutin tui dawnsah diingin na puikhe veu uh hilou ahiaimah?
Hi numei Abraham tanu ahih toh, en in, Setan in kum sawmlegiat sung amat chu Sabbath ni a a gaahna suutsah louh diing ahiaimah?” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n hi thute asoi tahin a meelmate zousiah chu azumta va, mipite chu a sil loupi bawl zousiah jiahin akipaah chiat uhi.
Huin Amah in, “Pathian lalgam chu bang tobang ahiai? Huleh bang toh tehkhin diing ka hiai?
Hichu mi’n ankam tang khat alaah a, a huan a apaihluut bang ahi. Huchu ahung pou a, akhang a, sing lianpi ahung suaah a, huleh tungleeng vate’n a baate giahna in anei uh,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah in, “Pathian lalgam chu bang toh tehkhin diing ka diai?
Hichu numei in tol alaah a, taangbuang tehna thum dim laha a bawna athoh veh masiah aphuum bang ahi,” achi kiit hi.
Huleh Ama’n thuhilh kawmin Jerusalem lam juanin khopite leh khotate tawn jeelin achiah hi.
Huin mi khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, hutdama um diingte tawmtakhat hi uh maw?” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Kot geeng ah luut tum teeiteei un, ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, mi tampi’n luut atum diing va, aluut thei sih diing uhi.

Inn neitupa khatvei athoh a, kot akhaah tahchiangin, nanguh inn pua a dingin, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa, kot hung hon in,’ chia kot na kiuh chiangun Ama’n na kawmvah, ‘Khoilam mi na hi viai mah ka hung he sih,’ chiin ahung dawng diing hi.
Hutahchian nang un, ‘Na ma ah ka ne un, ka dawn va, huleh ka kotzingte vah thu na hilhta hi,’ na chi diing uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n, ‘Ka hung hilh ahi, khoilam mi na hi viai mah ka hung he sih. Nanguh silgilou bawlte zousiah, ka kawm apat paimang un,’ ahung chi diing hi.
“Abraham, Isak, Jakob leh zawlneite zousiah Pathian lalgam a um na muh va, nanguh polam a paihkhiaha um na hih uh na hung kiheet chiangun, hutah ah kah leh hagawi aum diing hi.
Huleh suahlam leh tumlam apat leh simlam leh maallam apatin mi ahung diing va, Pathian lalgam ah atou khawm diing uhi.
Huleh ngai un, anunungpeente amasapeen a pang diing aum uhi. Huleh amasapeente zong anunungpeen a pang diing aum uh,” achi hi.
Hu ni mahin Pharisai khenkhat ahung va, a kawmah, “Pawt inla hi mun apat chiahmang in, ajiahchu Herod in thah hung tum ahi,” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Chiah unla hu si-aal kawmah hi thu vasoi un, ‘Ngai in, tuni leh jiing chiangin dawite nohdohin natnate ka sudam diing a, huleh ni thum ni in ka siltupte zoh ahita diing hi.’
Hizongleh tuni toh, jiing chiang toh ajiing kiit toh ka pai jeel diing hi, ajiahchu Jerusalem polam ah zawlnei asi ngei sih hi.
“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, zawlneite anathat a, a kawma kisawlte suang a anaseplumtu! Aahpi’n a noute a ha nuaia aopkhum bangin na tate bangzahvei ahiai kouhkhawm ka tupta a, hizongleh na uutlouh!
En un, na inn uh chu taihsana umin ahawmsuaahta hi! Huleh chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi,’ na chih masiah uh na hung mu sih diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Sabbath ni a Pharisai houtu khat inn a an ne diinga Jesu achiah tahin hoihtahin aenkhia uhi.
Huleh en in, a ma ah chipawm damlou mi khat aum hi.
Huin Jesu’n daansiamte leh Pharisaite ahoupih a, a kawmvah, “Sabbath ni a suhdam daan in phal ahiai, phal lou?” achi hi.
Amahuh chu asip chiat va, huin Ama’n damlou chu atu a, asudam a, achiahsahta hi.
Huin a kawmvah, “Na lahva koi in ahiai na sabiltung uh aha, na bawngtal uh aha kokhuuh ah keta leh, Sabbath ni a zong kaidoh lou diing?” achi hi.
Huleh amah un hi thute adawng thei kiitta sih uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a mi kouhte un mun sangpeen ateel veu uh chih amuh tahin, a kawmvah tehkhinthu asoi hi:
“Kiteenna gualvaahna a koiaha in ahung kouh chiangin touna poimohpeen ah tou sih un. Huchilou inchu nang saanga mi zahtaathuai jaw anakou kha diing a,
nang hung koutu leh amah chu na kawma hungin, ‘Hi pa touna diing ot in,’ ahung chi diing a, nang chu zumtahin mun hoihlou peen ah na vatou panphiing diing hi.

Hizongleh ahung kikouh chiangin chiah inla mun ngiampeen ah vatou jaw in, huchiin ahung koutu ahung chiangin na kawmah, ‘Lawm, asang deuh ah hung tou in,’ ahung chi thei diing hi. Hutahchian na an neehpihte ma ngeei ah zahbawlin na um diing hi.
Ajiahchu koipouh amah kingaisang chu angiam diing a, huleh amah kingaingiam chu tawisangin aum diing hi,” chiin.

Huin Ama’n a chialtupa kawmah zong, “Suun ankuang aha, jaan ankuang aha na lui chiangin na lawmte leh na sanggamte leh na unaute leh na innveeng mihausate haw kou sin. Huchilou inchu amah un zong ahung kou ve diingva, huleh thuhkiitin na um kha diing hi.
Hizongleh ankuang na lui chiangin tagahte, piangsualte, keengbaite leh mittawte kou jaw in.
Huchiin na hampha diing hi; ajiahchu amah un ahung thuh zou sih diing va, midihtatte thohkiit chiangin thuhin na um diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh a an neehpihte khat in hi thute ajaahin a kawmah, “Pathian lalgam a an ne diing mi chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Mi koiaha khat in ankuang luina loupitah abawl a, mi tampi achial hi.
Huleh aneeh hunin a mi chialte kawmah, ‘Hung un, tuin bangkim akimanta,’ vachi diingin a suaahpa asawl hi.
Hizongleh amah un suanlam anei chiat va, amasapeen in a kawmah, ‘Lou ka leita a, aen diinga ka chiah akiphamoh hi. Na hung ngaihsiam ka hung ngeen hi,’ achi hi.
Adang in, ‘Bawngtal tuah ngaa ka leita a, asiat aphat en diinga ka chiah akiphamoh hi. Na hung ngaihsiam ka hung ngeen hi,’ achi hi.
Huleh adang khat in, ‘Ji ka neita a, hujiahin ka hung thei sih hi,’ achi hi.

“Huchiin hu suaahpa chu ahung a, hu thute a pu ahung hilh hi. Huin hu inn neitupa chu lungthahin hu suaahpa kawmah, ‘Kotzingte leh khopi kawmkaal lahte ah kintahin chiah inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte leh keengbaite hitah ah hung puiluut in,’ achi hi.
Huin a suaahpa’n, ‘Pu, na hung thupiaah bangin ka bawl zouta a, hizongleh mun a-awng nalai hi,’ achi hi.
Huin a pu in a suaahpa kawmah, ‘Lamliante leh daaipaamte ah chiahdoh inla, ka inn adim theihna diingin mi hung sawl luut teeiteei in.
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, ka mi chialte khatmah in zong ka ankuang lui achiam sih diing uh,’” achi hi.
Huleh mipi nasatahin Amah atonpih va, Amah chu akinunghei a, a kawmvah,
“Mi koipouh ka kawma hung in a nu, a ji, a tate, a sanggampa, a sanggamnu leh amah hinna nasan ahuat louh leh, ka nungjuitu ahi thei sih diing hi.
Huleh koipouh amah kros kipuaah a, ka nung hung jui lou chu ka nungjui ahi thei sih diing hi.
“Ajiahchu nanguh koipouh innsang leptum in alep zohna diing aneih leh neih louh heetna diinga tou masa phot a aluut diing zah ngaihtuah lou diing koi na um viai?
Huchilou inchu innbul alep zoh nungin lamzou theita sih leh, amu zousiah in nuihsanin,
‘Hi pa’n inn alempan ngaala, azou theita sih,’ achi kha diing uhi.
“Ahihlouhleh kumpi koi ahiai kumpi dang dou diinga kuan diing in, amah dou diinga mi siing nih toh hung kuanpa khu mi siing khat toh anadouzou diing adiai chih tou masa phot a ngaihtuah lou diing um?
Ahihlouh vaanglah leh, adangpeen gamlapi a aum laiin kilemna thuchiam ngeen diingin palai asawl diing hi.
Huchibangmahin nanguh lahah koipouh aneih zousiah paisan lou chu ka nungjuitu ahi thei sih diing hi.
“Chi chu ahoih a, hizongleh chi chu data hileh, bangin akisual kiitta diai?
Lei a diingin lah ahoih sih diing a, eehneel diingin zong ahoih boh sih diing a, mi’n apaaidoh jaw veu uhi. Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
Huin siahdongtute leh misualte zousiah in a thu ngaikhe diingin Amah kawm ahung juan uhi.
Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute’n, “Hi Pa’n misualte akipawlpih a, an bang aneehpih,” chiin aphunchiaah uhi.
Huin Ama’n hi tehkhinthu a kawmvah asoi a:
“Nanguh laha mi koiaha in belaam za nei henla, a lahah khat mangsah leh, sawmkuah leh kuahte gamdaai a nusia a, amang peen amuh masiah vahawl lou diing koi na hi viai?
Huleh amuhkiit tahin kipaahtahin a liangkou ah apua hi.
Huin inn atun tahin a lawmte leh a innveengte akou khawm a, a kawmvah, ‘Hung kipaahpih un, ajiahchu ka belaam mang ka mu kiitta hi,’ achi hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, huchibangmahin kisiihna tuan diing neilou midihtat sawmkuah leh kuahte tungah saangin misual khat kisiiha lunghei tungah vaan ah kipaahna alianjaw diing hi.
“Huleh numei koi ahiai dangka siih sawm nei in khat mangsahta leh, thaumei de a, inn phiat a, amuh kiit masiah nguntaha hawl lou diing?
Huleh amuh kiit chiangin a lawmte leh a innveengte akou khawm a, ‘Hung kipaahpih un, ajiahchu ka dangka siih khat mansah ka mu kiitta hi,’ achi hi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, huchibangmahin Pathian angelte ma a misual kisiih khat tungah kipaahna aum hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n, “Mi koiaha khat in tapa nih anei a,
a lahva naupangjawpa’n a pa kawmah, ‘Pa, kei goutan diing teng hung pia in,’ achi hi. Huchiin a pa’n agou chu amahuh ahawmsahta hi.
Huleh ni sawt lou nungin tapa naupangjawpa’n atan teng ala a, khual gamlapi ah azinta hi. Huleh hu mun ah aneih teng pahtattahin avazang zou pahta hi.
Huleh a bawna azat bei zoh veh tahin hu gam ah kial nasatah ahung tungta a, neeh diing ahung kitasamta hi.
Huleh amah chu achiah a, hu gam a mi khat avabeelta hi. Ama’n amah chu voh an pe diingin a lou lamah anasawlta hi.
Huleh vohte neeh be hawngte in a gil suhvah auut mahmah a, koima’n lah bangma neeh diing ape sih hi.
“Huleh ahung kiphawhkhiah tahin, ‘Ka pa kawma kiloh suaahte an neeh seenglouh nei atam meijeen uh toh, kei lah gilkiala si diing ka hita hi!
Ka thou diing a, ka pa kawmah ka chiah diing a, a kawmah, “Pa, vaan leh nangmah mitmuhin sil ka bawl sualta hi.
Na tapa chihtaah zong ka hi nawn sih hi. Na kawma kiloh na suaahte khat bangin hung bawl in,” ka chi diing,’ achi hi.
Huin athou a, a pa kawmah ahungta hi. Huleh gamlapi a aum laiin a pa’n anamu a, alainat mahmah a, ataai a, angawng kawi a, atawpta hi.
Huin a tapa’n a kawmah, ‘Pa aw, vaan leh nangmah mitmuhin sil ka bawl sualta hi. Na tapa chihtaah zong ka hi nawn sih,’ achi hi.
“Hizongleh a pa’n chu a suaahte kawmah, ‘Puan hoihpeen hung ladoh unla, silhsah un, a khut ah zungbuh butsah unla, a keeng ah keengtophah butsah un.
Huleh bawngnou vaahthau hung la unla that un. Huchiin i ne diing va, kipaahtahin i um diing uhi;
ajiahchu hi ka tapa chu asi a, ahung hing kiitta hi; amang a, akimu kiitta hi,’ achi hi. Huchiin kipaahtahin alawm uhi.
“Hizongleh a tapa upajaw chu lou ah aum a, inn ahung tun kuanin sil tumging leh laamthawm ajata hi.
Huin a suaahte khat akou a, hite bang ahita ei chiin adong hi.
Ama’n a kawmah, ‘Na naupa ahung tung a, dam leh hoiha amuh kiit jiahin na pa’n bawngnou vaahthau athat ahi,’ achi hi.
“Huin amahpa chu alungthahta a, inn ah aluut nuamta sih hi. Hujiahin a pa chu ahung pawt a ahung jawl hi.

Huin ama’n adawng a, a pa kawmah, ‘Ngai in, kum hizahpi na nna tong ing a, khatvei mah zong na thupiaah jui khial lou ing a, huchiin zong ka lawite toh nop ka bawlna diing keelnou khat zong na hung pe ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh na tapa, nohchijuaahte toh na sum teng vazang zou veh pa ahung tun tahin amah diingin bawngnou vaahthau na gohsah pah hi,’ achi hi.
“Huin a pa’n a kawmah, ‘Tapa, nang ka kawmah na um zing a, huleh ka neih zousiah zong nang a ahi.
Hi na naupa asi a, ahung hing kiitta a, amang a, i mu kiitta hi, hujiahin kipaahtah leh nuamtahin i um diing ahi,’” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah hi thu zong asoi a, “Mihausa koiaha in neihlelam enkoltu khat anei hi. Amahpa’n a neihlelam amawh thaangzat sah chiin a kawmah aheeh uhi.
Huin amah chu akou a, a kawmah, ‘Na tungthu ka jaah hi bangchi ahiai? Na neihlelam kol hisaap hung pia in, ajiahchu neihlelam enkoltu a pang nawn lou diing na hi,’ achi hi.
“Huin neihlelam koltupa’n a lungsim in, ‘Bangchi diing ka hita diai? Ka pu in lah ka mohpuaahna hung tawpsah diing ahita hi. Lei lah tou zou lou ing a, khutdoh diing lah ka zum hi.
Mohpuaahna ahung tawp sah chianga amah un a inn va ahung umsah theihna diingun ka bawl daan diing ka heta hi,’ achi hi.
Huchiin a pu leibate chu akou chiat a, amasapeen kawmah, ‘Ka pu a bangjaat ahiai na bat?’ achi hi.
Ama’n ‘Thau tehna za khat,’ achi hi. Huin ama’n a kawmah, ‘Na lehkha la inla, tou kin inla, sawmngaa gial in,’ achi hi.
Huleh adang khat kawmah, ‘Nang bangjaat ahiai na bat?’ achi hi. Ama’n a kawmah, ‘Kor za khat,’ achi hi. Huin ama’n, ‘Na lehkha la inla, sawmgiat gial in,’ achi hi.
“Hu neihlelam enkoltu dihtatloupa’n piltaha abawl jiahin a pu in aphatta hi. Ajiahchu hi khovel tate chu amahuh khang ah vaah tate saangin apiljaw uhi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, amanthaai hun chianga kumtuanga aumna a nanguh ahung umsah theihna diingun dihtatlouhna sum in na lawm diing kibawl un.
“Koipouh tawmtakhat tunga ginum chu tampi tungah zong aginum ahi. Huleh koipouh tawmtakhat tunga dihtatlou chu tampi tungah zong adihtat sih uhi.
Hujiahin dihtatlouhna sum tunga bawn na ginum louh uh leh kuan ahiai nanguh dihtatna sum tah hung kolsah diing?
Huleh midang a tunga bawn na ginum louh uh leh kuan ahiai nanguh a tah hung pe diing?

Suaah khat in pu nih nna atong kop thei sih hi, ajiahchu khat huain khat alungsiat diing hi, ahihlouhleh khat gumin khat amusit diing hi. Pathian nna leh sum nna na tong kop thei sih diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh sum ngaina Pharisaite’n zong hi thu zousiah aja va, Amah anuihsan uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mite mitmuh a siamtan tumte na hi uhi. Hizongleh Pathian in na lungtang uh ahe hi. Ajiahchu mihing laha paahtawia um chu Pathian mitmuhin sil kihdahhuaitah ahi.
Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute chu Johan hung um tanchiang aum a, hu kalsiah chu Pathian lalgam tanchinpha akisoi a, huleh mi chin in hutah ah pawngluut haam asawm uhi.
Huleh daan thu thaivom khat man saangin lei leh vaan abei abaihlam jaw hi.
Koipouh a ji khuula adang kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi, huleh a pasal in akhuulsa kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi.
“Mihausa koiaha aum a, puan sandup leh puan malngaat asilh a, ni chinin nuamsatahin aum hi.
Huleh a min Lazar kichi apumtanga meima a dim khat kotkhaah bul a alupsah veu uh khutdoh khat aum hi.
Mihausapa dohkaan apat khateneng kia pouh neehvah auut hi. Hulou zong uite ahung a, a meimate aliaahsah veu hi.
“Huleh hichi ahung hia, hu khutdohpa chu asi a, angelte’n Abraham aangsung ah apui uhi. Huleh mihausapa zong asi a, vuiin aumta hi.
Huleh gawtmun ah gimthuaahin aum a, adaah tou a, gamlapi a Abraham leh a aangsung a Lazar um chu amuta hi.
Huin akou a, ‘Pa Abraham, hung khotuah inla, Lazar chu a khut zung muuh tui a diahkawt a, ka lei hung suvot diingin hung sawl in; ajiahchu hi meikuang ah ka gim mahmah hi,’ achi hi.

“Hizongleh Abraham in, ‘Tapa, nangma’n na damlaiin sil hoihte na kimuh a, huchibangin Lazar in sil hoihloute amu chih geeldoh in. Hizongleh tuin amah chu hitah ah hamuanin aum a, nang chu gimthuaahsahin na um ahi.

Huleh hite lou zong, hilam apat na kawmva hung tumte ahung theihlouhna diing uh leh hulam apat keiuh kawma hung tumte ahung theihlouhna diingun, keiuh leh nanguh kikaal ah guam liantah aum hi,’ achi hi.
“Huin ama’n, ‘Ahihleh Pa, amah chu ka pa inn ah sawl diingin ka hung ngeen hi,
ajiahchu sanggam pasal ngaa ka nei a, amahuh vahilh heh, huchilou inchu amahuh zong hi gimthuaahna mun ah ahung kha diing uh,’ achi hi.
Abraham in a kawmah, ‘Amah un Mosi leh zawlneite anei uh, hute thu ngaikhia uh heh,’ achi hi.
Huin ama’n, ‘Hilou e, pa Abraham, misi laha mi khat a kawmvah vachiah leh, akisiih diing uh,’ achi hi.
Ama’n a kawmah, ‘Mosi leh zawlneite thu angaihkhiah nuam louh uh leh, misi lah apat mi khat thou kiit mahzongleh atahsang tuan sih diing uh,’” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Puuhnate um lou thei ahi sih hi, hizongleh puuhnate umsahtu tung agih hi!
Hi mineute laha khat zong asuhpuuh saangin a ngawng ah suangsumheeh ohsahin tuikhanglian sung ah kipaai luut leh, amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
Pilvaang un, na unaupa’n na tunga sil abawl sual leh, taai in; huleh akisiih leh, ngaidam in.
Ni khat sunga na tunga sagihvei sil abawl sual a, sagihvei na kawma, ‘Ka kisiih hi’ chia nang lama ahung kiheikiit leh, na ngaidam in,” achi hi.
Huleh apostolte’n Lalpa kawmah, “Ka ginna uh khangsah in,” achi uhi.
Huin Lalpa’n, “Ankam tang khat bang ginna na neih uh leh, hi singtheimin kung kawmah, ‘Kibotdoh inla, tuilianpi ah kisuan in,’ na chi diing va, na thu amang diing hi.
“Nanguh laha koi na hi viai loukai aha, belaam ching aha, suaah khat nei a, lou apat ahung tun chiang a, ‘Hung pah inla an vane in,’ anachi diing?
Hizongleh, ‘Ka neeh diing hung bawlsah inla, na taai gaah inla, ka neeh a, ka dawn zoh masiah hung zen in, huzoh chiangin nang nein na dawn diing,’ chi jaw lou diing ahiaimah?
Ama’n hu suaahpa chu a kawmah thu kipiaah banga abawl jiahin apaahta eimah? Ka gingta sih hi.
Huchibangmahin nang un zong na kawmva thupiaah zousiah na bawlzoh chiangun, ‘suaah hitaahlou ka hi uh, ka bawl diing mawng uh ahi ka bawl uh,’ chi un,” achi hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem juana achiah laiin Samaria leh Galili gam tawnin achiah hi.
Huleh Amah chu khua khat a aluut leh phaah sawm in analamtuaah va, amahuh chu gamlapi ah ading uhi.
Huleh aw ngaihtahin akikou va, “Jesu, Houtupa, hung khotuah in,” achi uhi.
Huleh amahuh amuh tahin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Chiah unla, siampute vakiensah un,” achi hi. Huleh hichi ahung hi a, achiah laiun ahung siangta uhi.
Huleh a lahva khat in adamta chih ahung kiheet tahin aw ngaihtaha Pathian paahtawiin ahung kihkiit hi.
Huleh Jesu keeng bul ah abohkhup a, kipaahthu asoi hi. Huleh amah chu Samariami ahi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, “Sawm hilou maw suhsianga um, hizongleh kuahte khoia um ahita viai?
Hi namdang mipa chihlouh Pathian paahtawi diinga hung kihkiit koima akimu sih maw?” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Thou inla chiahta in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Pharisaite’n Pathian lalgam hung tung hun diing adoh tahun Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Pathian lalgam chu muhtheihin ahung tung sih hi.
Huleh, ‘En un, hitah ah,’ ahihlouhleh, ‘En un, hutah ah’ zong achi sih diing uhi. Ajiahchu, ngai un, Pathian lalgam chu na kawmvah aum hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Mihing Tapa damlai nite ni khat beeh mu nuam mahmah ngaala, na muh theihlouh hun uh ahung tung diing hi.
Huchiin na kawmvah, ‘En un hitah ah,’ ahihlouhleh, ‘En un hutah ah,’ ahung chi diing va, chiah sih unla, a nung uh zong jui sih un.
Ajiahchu kawlphe vaan nuai langkhat a aphet a, vaan nuai lehlam tanpha asalhvaah mahbangin Mihing Tapa zong a ni chiangin hubang ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh hu main sil tampi Ama’n athuaah diing a, hi khang a mite nualin aum diing hi.
“Noah damlai a sil umdaan bangin Mihing Tapa ni chiangin zong ahi diing hi.
Noah kuang a aluut a, tuiziin ahung tun a, a bawnva asuhlup ni atun masiah ane un adawn va, ji anei va, huleh jileta in akipetuah uhi.
“Huchibangmahin Lot damlai in zong aum a, ane un adawn va, alei un ajuaah va, huleh asuan va, alam uhi.
Hizongleh Sodom apat Lot apawt ni in vaan apatin mei leh kaat aju a, a bawnun asulumta hi.
“Huchibangmahin Mihing Tapa hung kilaah ni chiangin ahi diing hi.
Hu ni chiangin koipouh inn tunga um chu inn sunga a thuampua la diingin kum sih heh. Huleh huchibangmahin koipouh lou a um zong hung kihkiit sih heh.
Lot ji hezing un.
Mi koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, huleh koipouh a hinna taan in ahuumbit diing uhi.
Ka hung hilh ahi, hu jaan in lupna khat ah mi nih aum diing a, khat laahin aum diing a, khat nuutsiatin aum diing hi.
Numei nih in mun khat ah buh agawi khawm diing va, khat chu laahin aum diing a, khat nuutsiatin aum diing hi.
Lou ah mi nih aum diing va, khat chu laahin aum diing a, khat nuutsiatin aum diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Khoiah e, Lalpa?” achi uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, “Saluang umna phot ah mulukolhte zong aum khawm diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n amahuh lungkeloua ahaamtei zing diing uh ahi chih heetna diingin a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat asoi a:
“Khopi khat ah Pathian lau lou leh mihing zong bangmaha simlou vaihawmtu khat aum hi.
Huleh hu khopi sungah meithai khat mah aum a, amahnu chu a kawmah ahung gige a, ‘Ka langpa tungah dihtahin thu hung khensah in,’ ahung chi hi.
“Huleh amah chu tomkhat sung auut sih a, hizongleh anungin a lungsim in, ‘Pathian lau louin mihing bangmahin sim sih mahleng,
hi meithainu’n ahung suhbuai jiahin atung ah dihtahin thu ka khensah diing hi, huchilou inchu ahung thithena in ahung sutawl kha diing hi,’ achi,” achi hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n, “Vaihawmtu dihtatlou thusoi chu ngai un.
Pathian in a miteel suun leh jaan a Amah koutute tungah dihtahin thu akhen sih diai mah, amahuh tungah khongai sawt jiangzongleh?
Ka hung hilh ahi, Ama’n kintahin dihtahin vai ahawmsah diing hi. Hizongleh Mihing Tapa ahung chiangin leitung ah ginna ahung mu na diai?” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n mi amahuh midihtat hia kingaihtuah a, midangte musit koite aha kawmah hi tehkhinthu asoi a:
“Mi nih Pathian biahinn ah haamtei diingin achiah tou va, khat chu Pharisai ahi a, huleh khat chu siahdongtu ahi.
Pharisaipa chu ading a, amah chauhin ahaamtei a, ‘Aw Pathian, midang negute, dihtatloute, aangkawmte ahihlouhleh hi siahdongtu ngeei bang ka hih louh jiahin na tungah ka kipaah hi.
Hapta khat in an nihvei ka ngawl a, ka neih zousiah apat sawm-a-khat ka pia hi,’ achi hi.
“Huleh siahdongtu in chu agaal a dingin vaan lam zong aen ngam sih a, hizongleh, ‘Aw Pathian, kei misual tungah zahngai in,’ chiin a awm atuum hi.

“Ka hung hilh ahi, khat peen saangin hi pa chu siamtangin a inn ah achiahta hi, ajiahchu mi amah kingailoupi photmah suhngiam ahi diing a, huleh amah kingaingiam photmah chu tawisangin aum diing,” achi hi.
Huleh akhoih diingin Amah kawmah naupangte ahung pui va, hizongleh nungjuite’n amuh tahun amahuh anataai uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh akou a, “Naupangneute ka kawma ahung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un, ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi.
Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh Pathian lalgam naupangte banga pomlou chu a sungah aluut hial sih diing,” achi hi.
Huleh vaihawmtu koiaha khat in Amah kawmah, “Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka tan theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” chiin adong hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Bang diinga hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koima ahoih aum sih hi.
Nang in, ‘Aangkawm sin,’ ‘Tualthat sin,’ ‘Gu sin,’ ‘Heetpihtu dihlouin pang sin,’ ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ chih thupiaahte na he hi” achi hi.
Ama’n, “Hihaw zousiah chu ka khangdawn lai apat ka juih ahita hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n hi thute ajaah tahin a kawmah, “Sil khat na sam nalai hi. Na neih zousiah juaah inla, migentheite kawmah hawm in, huchiin vaan ah gou na nei diing hi; huleh hung inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n hichu ajaahin alungkham mahmah hi, ajiahchu mihausa mahmah ahi.
Huin Jesu’n alungkham mahmah chih amuhin, “Mihausate diingin Pathian lalgam a luut hahsa hina mei e!
Ajiahchu mihausa Pathian lalgam a aluut saangin sangawngsau phin bilvang a aluut paisuaah abaihlamjaw hi,” achi hi.
Huin hi thu jatute’n, “Huchi ahihleh koi hutdamin aum zou diai?” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n, “Mihing diinga sil hitheilou chu Pathian diingin ahithei hi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in, “En in, kei un bangkim nusiain nang ka hung jui uhi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam jiaha inn aha, nulepa aha, sanggamte aha, ji aha, tate aha nusia chu,
tu damsung ngeeia aleh tampi leh hun hung tung diinga kumtuang hinna toh mulou diing koima aum sih hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n sawmlenihte apuituam a, a kawmvah, “Ngai un, Jerusalem a chiah tou diing i hi va, Mihing Tapa tungtaang thu a zawlneite thugelh zousiah ahung taangtung diing hi.
Ajiahchu Amah chu Jentelte kawmah piaahkhiah ahi diing a, chiamnuih bawlna in azang diing va, zumhuaitaha bawlin chil asiat khum diing uhi.
Huleh Amah chu avo diing va, athat diing uhi. Huleh ni thum ni in athou kiit diing,” achi hi.
Amah un hi silte chu ahesiam sih va, hi thu chu a lahvah phualin aum a, thu kisoite zong ahe sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Amah chu Jeriko atun kuanin mittaw koiaha khat lam geiah khutdohin anatou hi.
Ama’n mipi pai thawm ging ajaahin, bangchi thu ahita ei chiin adong hi.
Amah un Nazareth Jesu apai ahi chiin ahilh uhi.
Huin ama’n, “Jesu, David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou hi.
Huleh amasate’n amah chu sip in chiin ataai va, hizongleh amah chu, “David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akihahkou seem hi.
Huin Jesu akhawl a, amah chu a kawma hung pui diingin thu apia hi. Huleh a kawm ahung tunin anadong a,
“Na tungah bang hung bawlsah leng na uut ei?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Lalpa, muhtheih ka uut hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Mutheita in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh thakhatin ahung mutheita a, Pathian paahtawi kawmin Amah ajuita hi. Huleh mi zousiah in hu amuh tahun Pathian aphatta uhi.
Huleh Jesu chu Jeriko ah aluut a, apaisuaah hi.
Huleh en in, a min Zakai kichi siahdongtu lian aum a, amah chu mihausa ahi.
Huleh ama’n Jesu chu bangtobang mi ahiai chih muh atum a, hizongleh mipite leh a din ngiam jiahin amu thei sih hi.
Huchiin ataaikhelh a, anaen diingin theipi dawn ah akal hi, Ama’n hu lampi hung tawn pah diing ahih jiahin.
Huleh Jesu hu mun ahung tunin adaahtou a, amah chu amu a, a kawmah, “Zakai kintahin hung kum in, ajiahchu tuni’n na inn a tung diing ka hi,” achi hi.
Huin kintahin ahung kum a, kipaahtahin Amah chu azintunta hi.
Huleh amah un huchu amuh tahun, “Misual khat kawma zintung diingin achiah ve,” chiin aphun uhi.
Huleh Zakai chu ading a, Lalpa kawmah, “Lalpa, ngai in, ka neihlelam kimkhat gentheite kawmah ka pe diing hi; huleh mi thuampua bang aha dihloutaha ka laah aum leh, aleh li in ka dit diing,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Tuni in hi inn sungah hutdamna ahung tungta hi, amah zong Abraham tapa ahi ngaala.
Ajiahchu beimangte hawl diing leh hundam diinga Mihing Tapa chu hung ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh hi thute angaihkhiah laiun Jerusalem anaihtaah jiah leh Pathian lalgam hung lang pah diinga angaihtuah jiahun Ama’n tehkhinthu khat asoibeh hi.
