Ama’n hujiahin asoi a, “Miloupi koiaha khat lalgam dang khat vaneia hung kilehkiit diingin khua gamlatah ah achiah hi.
Huleh ama’n a suaahte sawm akou a, mina sawm a kawmvah apia a, huleh ‘Ka hung kiit masiah hikhu in sumkawl anavei un,’ achi hi.
“Hizongleh a mite’n amah chu ahua va, ‘Hi pa ka tungva vaihawmtu diingin ka deih sih uh,’ chiin a nung ah palai asawl uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, lalgam chu avanei a, ahung kilehkiitin a sum veipung zah uh heetna diingin a suaah sum apiaahte chu a kawmah akousah hi.
Khatnapa chu ahung a, ‘Lalpa, na mina khat chu mina sawm in apung hi,’ achi hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmah, ‘Hoih e, nang suaah hoih, sil tawmtakhat tunga na ginum jiahin khopi sawm tungah vaihawmtu in pang in,’ achi hi.
Huin anihnapa ahung a, ‘Lalpa, na mina ngaa in apung hi,’ achi hi.
Ama’n huchibangmahin a kawmah, ‘Nang zong khopi ngaa tungah vaihawmtu in pang in,’ achi hi.
Huleh adang ahung a, ‘Lalpa, en in, na mina khat chu hitah ah aum hi, puanthem a tuunin ka koih heh hi.
. Ajiahchu migumtat na hi a, ka hung lau hi. Na koih louhna bang ah na la a, huleh na tuh louhna bang ah na aat hi,’ achi hi.
Ama’n, ‘Nang suaah gilou, na kam suaah ngeei in siamlouh ka hung tangsah diing. Migumtat ka hih a, ka koih louhna a ka laah veu a, huleh ka tuh louhna a ka aat veu na he maw!
Huchi ahihleh ka hung tun chianga ka sum apung ka laah theihna diinga bangchidaana ka sum chu suminn a anakoih lou na hiai?’ achi hi.
Huin ama’n a kawma dingte kawmah, ‘A mina chu laahsah unla, mina sawm neipa kawmah pia un,’ achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, ‘Lalpa, ama’n mina sawm anei hi,’ achi uhi.
“Ka hung hilh ahi, anei taphot chu piaah beh ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh anei lou chu aneihsun zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh hu ka meelmate a tungva ka vaihawm diing deihloute chu hung pui unla, ka ma ah that un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n huchia asoi zohin amakaih a, Jerusalem lam juanin achiah tou uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Olive kichi taang a Bethphage leh Bethani kho kawm naih ahung tun tahun, Ama’n a nungjuite laha mi nih asawl a,
“Na majawn va khua ah vachiah unla, na luut tahchiangun sabiltung talgual koimah tuan ngei nailouhna na vamu diing uhi. Huchu hung suut unla hung kai un.
Huleh mi koiaha in, ‘Bang diinga na suut uh ahiai?’ chia ahung dot leh, ‘Lalpa’n amamoh hi,’ chiin a kawmah soi un,” achi hi.
Huleh a sawlte avachiahta va, a kawma asoi bang ngeeiin avamu uhi.
Huleh sabiltung talgual chu asuut tahun, aneite’n a kawmvah, “Sabiltung talgual bang diinga na suut uh ahiai?” achi uhi.
Amah un, “Lalpa’n amamoh hi,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu kawmah ahung kai va, sabiltung talgual tungah a puante uh aphah va, Jesu atuangsah uhi.
Huleh Amah achiah laiin lampi ah a puante uh aphah uhi.
Huleh Amah chu Olive Taang liamsuhna diing tah ahung tun kuan in, a nungjui mipi zousiah in a silmahbawlte tengteng amuh jiahun akipaah va, aw ngaihtahin Pathian apaahtawi va,
“LALPA min a hung Kumpipa chu ahampha hi! Vaan ah lemthu leng henla, tungnungpeen ah loupina um heh!” chiin.
Huin mipi laha Pharisai khenkhat in Amah kawmah, “Houtupa, na nungjuite taai in,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ka hung hilh ahi, hite asip un chu, suangte akikoudoh pah diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh atun kuan-un Ama’n khopi chu amu a, akahkhum a,
“Aw nang, nangmah in tuni in lemna hung tut silte hung heta mei lehchin maw! Hizongleh tuin chu na mit apat akiphualta hi.
Ajiahchu na gaalte’n na kiimveel a kulh bawl a, ahung uumbichilh a, taaikhiahna diing umloua ahung uumkhumna nite na tungah ahung tung diing hi.
Huleh nang leh na sunga na tate tual saatna in ahung nei diing va, na sungah suang khatbeeh kithuapin anuse sih diing uh, ahung kiveh lai nite na heetlouh jiahin,” achi hi.
Huin Amah chu Pathian biahinn ah aluut a, sil juaahte leh leite anohdoh a,
A kawmvah, “‘Ka inn chu haamteina inn ahi,’ chih gelh ahi, hizongleh nang un ‘suammangte umna kua’ in na siamta uh,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah in ni chinin Pathian biahinn ah thu ahilh a; hizongleh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute leh mipi houtute’n Amah thah atum uhi.
Hizongleh mipi zousiah in phatuamngaitaha a thu angaihkhiah zing jiahun alohna daan diing ahe sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a mite thu ahilh a, tanchinpha asoi laiin ni khat chu siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute leh upate chu Amah langin Amah kawmah ahung va,
huchiin a kawmah, “Bang thuneihna in ahiai hi silte na bawl? Ahihlouhleh koi ahiai hi thuneihna hung pia? Hung hilh in,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong sil khat ka hung dong diing, hung dawng un:
Johan baptisma hi vaan apat ahiai, mihing apat?” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu akingaihtuah va, “‘Vaan apat,’ chilei lah, Ama’n, ‘Ahihleh bang diinga gingta lou?’ ahung chi diing hi.
Hizongleh, ‘Mihing apat,’ chilei lah, mipi zousiah in suang in ahung sep diing uhi, ajiahchu Johan hi zawlnei ahi chih agingta ngaalva,” achi uhi.
Huin amah un khoi apat chih ka soi thei sih uh chiin adawng uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong bang thuneihna a hi silte bawl ka hiai chih ka hung hilh sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n mipite kawmah hi tehkhinthu asoi a, “Mi koiaha khat in grephuan abawl a, huan bawlmite kawmah hohloh diingin apia a, huleh gam tuam ah sawtpi taam diingin achiahta hi.
Huleh a gah loh hun in grephuan gah chu anapiaah diingun huan bawlmite kawmah suaah khat asawl hi. Hizongleh huan bawlmite’n amah chu anavua va, khutguaahin asawlmangta uhi.
Huin ama’n suaah dang asawl kiit a, amah zong zumhuaitahin abawl va, khutguaahin asawlmangta uhi.
Huin ama’n athumna asawl kiit a, amah zong anasuliam va, apaaidoh uhi.
“Huin grephuan neitu in, ‘Bang chi bawl diing ka diai? Ka tapa deihtah ka sawl diing hi, amah anazahtaat khamoh sih diing uh,’ achi hi.
Hizongleh huan bawlmite’n anamuh tahun, ‘Hi pa gou luahtu diing chu ahi, a gou i tan theihna diingun i that diing uh,’ chiin akihou uhi.
Huin grephuan apatin apaaidoh va, athat uhi. Ahihleh grephuan neitu in a tungvah bangchiin abawl diai?
Ahung diinga huan bawlmite chu asumang diing hi. Huleh grephuan chu midangte kawmah ape diing hi,” achi hi. Amah un hi ajaah tahun, “Huchi lawmlawm jaw tun dah heh,” achi uhi.
Huin amahuh aen a, “Ahihleh, ‘innlamtute suang deihlouh ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi,’ chia kigial khu bang ahiai?
“Koipouh suang tunga kipuuh chu akeehjaah diing a; huleh akiaahkhum photmahte chu agawijaan diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hulai mahin siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n Amah mat atum va, hizongleh mipite alau uhi; ajiahchu hu tehkhinthu amahuh demna a asoi ahi chih ahe uhi.
Huin Amah chu ataang va, gamoptu vaihawmna leh thuneihna a atut theihna diingun a thu soikhial man diingin midih kipang enkhetu asawlkheta uhi.
Huleh amah un a kawmah, “Houtupa, dihtahin thu na soiin na hilh veu a, koimah khentuam neilouin Pathian lampi dihtahin na hilh hi, chih ka he uhi.
Keiuh diingin Kaisar kawma siah tawi dih ahiai, ahihlouhleh dihlou?” chiin adong uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n adohabawl uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hung je-et na hi viai?
Dinari khat hung ensah un. Koi lim leh koi min atuang ei?” achi hi. Amah un adawng va, “Kaisar a,” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hujiahin Kaisar silte chu Kaisar kawmah pia unla, huleh Pathian silte chu Pathian kawmah pia un,” achi hi.
Huin mipite ma ah a thu soikhial mat diing amu sih va, a dawnna chu limdang asa mahmah va, asipta uhi.
Huzohin misi thohkiitna aum sih chi Sadukaite laha hunkhop a kawmah ahung va, Amah chu adong va,
“Houtupa, Mosi’n koipouh a sanggampa in ji nei a, ta beia asihsan leh, a sanggampa’n a ji aluah diing a, a sanggampa diingin chi ahaahsah diing ahi, chiin ahung gelhsah hi.
Huchiin unau pasal sagih aum a, a-upapeen in ji anei a, ta neilouin asi hi.
Huin anihna in aluah a, ta neilouin asi hi.
Huin athumna in aluah a, huchibangmahin a sagih un anei va, ta neilouin asi chiatta uhi.
Atawpin numeinu zong asita hi.
Hujiahin thohkiitna ni chiangin amahnu chu koipeen ji ahita diai? A sagih un ji in anei chiat ngaalva,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Hi khang tate chu akiteeng va, jileta in akipia uhi.
Hizongleh hu khang luah taah diing leh misi lah apat thohkiitna a tel taah diinga guatte chu akiteeng nawn sih va, teeng zong akiteengsah sih uhi.
Amahuh chu si zong asi thei nawn sih uh, ajiahchu angelte bang ahi va, huleh thohkiitna tate ahih jiahun Pathian tate ahi uhi.
Huchiin misi kaihthohin aum chih Mosi’n zong sawlbawh lahah Lalpa chu ‘Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian’ achih laiin ahesah ahi.
Huchiin Amah chu misi Pathian ahi sih a, ahingte Pathian ahijaw hi, ajiahchu Amah ah mi zousiah ahing ahi,” achi hi.
Huin daanjilsahtu koite aha in adawng va, “Houtupa, na soi dih ngeel hi,” achi uhi.
Hu nungin amah un thudang mawngmawng adong ngam nawnta sih uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Khrist chu David Tapa ahi bangchidaana achih uh ahiai?
Ajiahchu David ngeei in Phatna Late Lehkhabu ah, ‘LALPA’N ka Lalpa kawmah,
“Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in,”’ achi hi.
Huchia David in Amah chu ‘Lalpa’ achih leh, bangchidaana a Tapa hi ahiai?” achi hi.
Huzohin Ama’n mipi kikhawmte zousiah jaahin a nungjuite kawmah,
“Puannaah tual silha vaahleh uut a, dawlmunte a chibai buuh bang, sinagog a touna poimohpeente leh gualvaahna a mun hoihpeente tan ngaina, daanjilsahtute lahah pilvaang un,
meithaite inn haw anegam va, bawltawmin sawt pipi ahaamtei uhi. Amah un chu siamlouhtanna lian seem amu diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh Amah chu adaahdoh a, mihausate’n sumkholna a sum akhiah lai uh amu hi.
Huleh Ama’n meithainu gentheitah khat in paisa lepton nih akhiah lai zong amu hi.
Huin Ama’n, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amahuh zousiah saangin hi meithai gentheitahnu’n akhe tamjaw hi;
ajiahchu hite zousiah in aneih vaal uh Pathian thohlawm ah akhia uhi, hizongleh amahnu’n chu a hinna diinga aneihsun teng akhe veh hi,” achi hi.
Huin koite aha in Pathian biahinn thu, suang hoih tahtahte leh silpiaahte a zep hoih ahihdaan asoi laiun, Ama’n,
“Hi na sil muhte uh ahihleh suhchip louha suang kithuap mawngmawng hitah ah khat zong aum louhna diing nite ahung tung diing hi,” achi hi.
Amah un, “Houtupa, hi silte bangchihchian ahung um diai? Huleh hi silte ahung tun diing chiangin chiamchihna bang ahung um diai?” chiin adong uhi.
Huin Ama’n, “Heema na um louhna diingun pilvaang un. Ajiahchu, ‘Khrist ka hi,’ huleh ‘A hun chu anaita,’ chiin mi tampi ka min in ahung diing uhi. Hujiahin amahuh jui sih un.
Hizongleh kidou thu leh kiphin buai thute na jaah chiangun lau sih un; ajiahchu hi silte hung tung masa diing mawng ahi, hizongleh a tawpna in ajui pah nai sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huzohin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nam tuam leh nam tuam akidou diing va, huleh lalgam tuam leh lalgam tuam akidou diing uhi.
Huleh mun tuamtuam ah jiil nasatah aliing diing a, kialte hung tungin hiite ahung leeng diing hi; huleh vaan apatin sil lauhuaite leh chiamchihna huaisetahte ahung um diing hi.
Hizongleh hi silte zousiah atun main nanguh ahung man diing va, sinagog leh suangkulte ah hung puiin ahung suduhdah diing uhi. Ka min jiahin kumpipate leh gamoptute ma ah ahung pui diing uhi.
Huleh hichu nanguh diingin heetpihtua panna hun lemchang ahi diing hi.
Hujiahin bangchi dawn diing chih ngaihtuah masa lou diingin na lungtang vah kisukip un;
ajiahchu meelma zousiah in ahung dou va, ahung soiseel theihlouh diing uh kam leh pilna ka hung pe diing hi.
Hizongleh nanguh chu na nulepate uh, na sanggamte uh, na behte uh leh na lawmte ngeei un zong ahung pedoh diing va, na lahva khenkhat chu ahung that diing uhi.
Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huatin na um diing uhi.
Hizongleh na lu va samjang khat zong amangthang sih diing hi.
Na thuaah mualsuahzohna un na hinna uh na huumbit diing uhi.
“Huleh sepaihte’n Jerusalem auumkhum uh na muh chiangun a manthaaina diing anaita chih he un.
Hu hun chiangin Judia gam a umte taang ah taaimang uh heh, hu khopi sunga umte zong pawtdoh uh heh, huleh gam lama umte zong hu khopi sungah luut sih uh heh.
Ajiahchu thu kigelh zousiah ataangtunna diinga hu nite chu phubalaahna ni ahi diing hi.
Hizongleh hu hun a gaaite leh naungeeh nawiteep neite tung agih hi! Ajiahchu gam sungah hahsatna nasatah leh hi mite tungah lungthahna tung diing ahi.
Huleh amahuh chu naamsau hiam in asi diing va, nam chin kawmah suaaha puiin aum diing uhi. Huleh Jentelte hun ataangtun masiah Jerusalem chu Jentelte totdeenin aum diing hi.
“Huleh ni leh ha leh aahsite bang ah chiamchihna aum diing a, tuikhanglian kinoh leh maau vengvungte’n leitung ah nam chin hahsatna leh mangbatna atun diing hi.
Mite chu launa jiaha khovel a sil hung tung diingte ngaihtuahna jiahin asidang diing uh, ajiahchu vaan silbawltheihnate akisuliing diing hi.
Hutahchiangin amah un Mihing Tapa chu silbawltheihna leh loupina nasatah toh meipi laha hung amu diing uhi.
Huleh hi silte ahung tun pat chiangin entou unla, daahdoh un, ajiahchu na tatna uh anaita hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat asoi a, “Theipi kung leh sing kung zousiah en un.
A nah ahung sel tahchiangin nipi ahung naita chih na mu va, na kiheet uhi.
Huchibangmahin hi silte ahung tun na muh chiangun Pathian lalgam ahung naita chih he un.
“Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sil zousiah ataangtun veh masiah hi khang amang sih diing uhi.
Vaan leh lei abeimang diing a, hizongleh ka thu chu bangchihmahin amang sih diing hi.
“Neehvah taatluat leh zukham leh damsung khosah ngaihtuahna in na lungtang uh asuhbuai louhna diingin, huleh na heetlouh kaal va hu Ni ahung tunguih louhna diingin pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu thaang kipel banga leitung pumpi a umte zousiah tunga tung diing ahi.
Hujiahin hi sil hung tung pah diing zousiah peel taah leh Mihing Tapa ma a ding taah na hih theihna diingun bangchihlaipouhin haamtei unla, kigingzing un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n suun laiin Pathian biahinn ah thu ahilh a, jaan chiangin apawtdoh a, Olive kichi taang ah ava-um veu hi.
Huleh mipi zousiah chu jiingkaal matahin Amah kawmah Pathian biahinn ah a thu ngaikhe diingin ahung uhi.
Huleh Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut, huchu Chiahkaan Kuut achih uh ahung naita hi.
Siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n Amah athah theihna diing uh angaihtuah va, mipite lah alau uhi.
Huin sawmlenihte laha tel Juda Iskariot achih uh sungah Setan aluut hi.
Huchiin apawtdoh a, Jesu bangchiin amansah theih diai chih ngaihtuahin siampu lalte leh houtute avakikuppih hi.
Huin amahuh chu akipaah va, amah chu sum piaah lem asa uhi.
Huleh ama’n lem asa a, mipi um louh kaal khat a Amah matsahna diing hun lemtaang ahawlta hi.
Huin Chiahkaan belaamnou latna ni diing Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut ni ahung tungta a,
Ama’n Peter leh Johan asawl a, “Chiah unla, Chiahkaan an i neeh diingun vabawl un,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Khoitah ah vabawl leh ung na deih ei?” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ngai un, khopi sunga na luut chiangun tuibeel pua pasal khat in ahung na tuaah diing a, aluutna inn juiluut un.
Huleh a inn neitupa kawmah, ‘Houtupa’n, “ka nungjuite toh Chiahkaan an ka neehna diing uh mikhual pindan khoitah ahiai?” ahung chi hi,’ na chi diing uhi.
Huleh ama’n pindan tungnung lianpi, guatsa diam khat ahung ensah diing a, hutah ah vabawl un,” achi hi.
Huin achiah va, a kawmva asoi bangin amuta va, Chiahkaan an chu abawlta uhi.
Huleh a hun ahung chin tahin Amah atouta a, apostol sawmlenihte’n zong atoupih uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka thuaah main hi Chiahkaan an nanguh toh neehkhawm ka uut mahmah hi;
ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam a hikhu ataangtun masiah ka ne nawn sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh nou ala a, kipaah thu asoi zohin, “Hi la unla, kihawm un;
ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam ahung tun masiah greptui ka dawn kiit nawn sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin tanghou ala a, kipaahthu asoi zohin abalkeeh a, a kawmvah apia a, “Hichu ka tahsa, nanguh diinga piaah chu ahi, na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl un,” achi hi.
Huchibangmahin nitaah an neeh zohin nou zong ala a, “Hi nou chu ka sisan a thuhun thah nanguh diinga luangkhia chu ahi.
Hizongleh ngai un, ahung mansahtu diing khut chu ka kawmah dohkaan tungah aum hi.
Tahzetin Mihing Tapa chu akiguatsa bangjeelin apai hi; hizongleh amansahtu tung agih hi!” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu hitobang bawl diingpa a lahva koipeen hi diing ahiai chiin akidong tuahta uhi.
Huleh amahuh lahah koiaha lianpeen a seh diing chia kinialna zong aum hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Jentel kumpipate chu a tungvah kilalsahtahin aum va, huleh a tungva vaihawmtute chu ‘mi hoihna diing bawltute’ achi uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh chu huchibang na hi sih diing uh; na lahva lianpeen chu naupangjaw bangin um heh, huleh houtu lianpeen chu sawltawn anhawmtu bangin um jaw heh.
Ajiahchu ankuang uumtu leh anhawmtu koi ahiai lianjaw? Ankuang uumtu hijaw lou diing maw? Hizongleh kei chu na lahvah anhawmtu bangin ka um hi.
Nanguh chu heemna ka tuaah sung siah hung umpihtute na hi uhi.
Huleh ka Pa’n kei lalgam ahung guatsah bangin nanguh diingin lalgam ka hung guatsah hi;
huchia ka lalgam a ka dohkaan a na neeh va, na dawn va, huleh Israel nam sawmlenihte vaihawmsaha laltouphah a na tou theihna diingun,” achi hi.
Huin Lalpa’n, “Simon, Simon, ngai in, Setan in buh banga ahung seep theihna diingin ahung ngeen hi.
Hizongleh na ginna aman louhna diingin ka hung haamteisah hi, na kiheikiit chiangin na unaute sukip in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh ama’n a kawmah, “Lalpa nang toh suangkul leh sihna a zong chiah ka ngaap hi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n, “Peter, ka hung hilh ahi, ke’n Amah ka he kha sih chia thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl masiah tuni’n aah akhuang sih diing,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh dangkaip bei a, sakhau bei a, huleh keengtophah bei a ka hung sawl laiin sil khat beeh na kitasam viaimah?” achi hi. Amah un, “Tasamlou,” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hizongleh tuin chu dangkaip nei in keng henla, huchibangmahin sakhau nei in zong; huleh naamsau neilou in a puan juaah henla, lei heh.
Ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, ‘Amah chu daan botsetute lahah asimtel uh’ chih gelh chu ka tungah ataangtung diing him ahi. Ajiahchu ka tungtaang thute tungkim ahita,” achi hi.
Huin amah un, “En in Lalpa, hi ah naamsau nih aum hi,” achi uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahun hi,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu apawtdoh a, angeina bangin Olive Taang ah achiah a, huleh a nungjuite’n zong ajui uhi.
Huleh amun atun un Ama’n a kawmvah, “Heemna a na luut louhna diingun haamtei un,” achi hi.
Huin Amah chu suang a sehphaah tan diing bang ah achiah tuam a, khuupdin in ahaamtei a,
“Pa, lem na saha ahihleh, hi nou hi kei apatin suanmang in; ahihvaangin keimah thu hilouin, hizongleh nangmah thuthu hijaw heh,” achi hi.
Huin vaan apatin angel khat a kawmah ahung kilaah a, Amah ahung suhaat hi.
Huin Amah chu agim mahmah a, phatuamngai jawseemin ahaamtei hi. Huchiin a khosa chu sisan vat bangin lei ah avakheta hi.
Huleh Amah ahaamtei zoha ahung thohdoh tahin nungjuite kawmah ahung a, amahuh chu lungngaih jiaha ihmuin amu hi.
Huin, “Bang diinga ihmu na hi viai? Heemna a na puuh louhna diingun thou unla haamtei un,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n thu asoi laitahin, en un, mipi hon khat ahung va, huleh sawmlenihte laha khat, Juda achih uh ahung makai a, tawp tumin Jesu kawm anaih hi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Juda, Mihing Tapa hi tawp a mansah na hi maw?” achi hi.
Akiim a mi umte’n sil hung um diing chu amuhun, “Lalpa, naamsau in ka saat diviai?” achi uhi.
Huleh a lahva mi khat in siampu lalpeen suaahpa asaat a, a bil jiatlam asaatkhiahsah hi.
Huin Jesu’n ahoupih a, “Hichi chiang chu phal un,” achi hi. Huin a bil chu akhoih a, asudamta hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawma hung siampu lalte leh Pathian biahinn veengtute leh upate kawmah, “Suammangtu man diing bang hialin naamsau leh khetbuuhte toh na hung kuan uh maw?
Na kawmva ni chin a Pathian biahinn a ka um laiin ka tungah khut na ha hial sih uhi. Hizongleh tu hun leh mial thuneihna hi nanguh a ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Amah chu aman va, apui va siampu lalpeen inn sungah apuiluut uhi. Huleh Peter in gamlatahin agaal juih hi.
Huleh amah un huan sung laiah mei achih va, atoukhawm va, Peter chu a lahvah avatou hi.
Huleh mei kawma atou laiin suaah nungaah koiaha in amu a, nguntahin aen a, “Hi pa zong Amah kawma um him ahi,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n, “Numei, Amah ka he sih hi,” chiin akiheetmohbawl hi.
Huleh tomkhat zouin midang khat in amu kiit a, “Nang zong a lahva mi na hi,” achi hi. Huin Peter in, “Ka hi sih, mihing,” achi hi.
Huleh daah kaal khat veel nungin midang khat in, “Hi pa zong Amah kawma um himah tham ve aw, Galili mi ahi ngaala,” achi tinten hi.
Peter in, “Mihing, na thusoi ka he sih,” achi hi. Huin a thusoi laitahin thakhatin aah ahung khuangta hi.
Huin Lalpa chu akihei a, Peter aen a, “Tuni’n aah khuan main thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl diing,” chia Lalpa’n a kawma asoi chu Peter in ahung hedohta hi.
Huin Peter chu polam ah apawtdoh a, hah kahin akapta hi.
Huleh Jesu mantute’n Amah chu chiamnuih bawlna a nei in, avua va,
huleh amaaikaan zohun a maai abeeng va, “Koi ahiai hung vua? Hung hilh in,” chiin adong uhi.
Huleh thudang tampi a Amah soisia in akawh uhi.
Huleh khovaah tahin vaantaang upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute ahung kikhawm va, a vaihawmna ma vah apuiluut va,
“Khrist na hih leh, hung hilh in,” achi uhi. Himahleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hung hilh zongleng, na gingta sih diing uhi.
Huleh ke’n zong nanguh thu hung dong leng, na hung dawng saam sih diing va, chiah lah na hung chiahsah sih diing uhi.
Tu kalsiah Mihing Tapa chu Pathian silbawltheihna jiatlam ah atouta diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin a bawnun, “Ahihleh Pathian Tapa na hi maw?” achi uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na hung chih bangun ka hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un, “Heetsahna dang bang i ngai nawn tuan eimah? Ajiahchu eimah ngeei in a kamsuah i jata uh,” achi uhi.
Huin mipite chu a bawnun ading va, Amah chu Pilat kawmah apui uhi.
Huin amah un Hi Pa’n, “Amah leh Amah Khrist, Kumpipa ka hi kichiin Kaisar kawma siahtawi akhap a, huleh ka namte uh atohbuai ka he uh,” chiin aheehta uhi.
Huin Pilat in, “Judate Kumpipa na hi maw?” chiin adong hi. Ama’n adawng a, “Na chih bangin ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Pilat in siampu lalte leh mipite kawmah, “Hi Pa tungah sualna bangma ka mu sih,” achi hi.
Huin amah un, “Ama’n Galili gam apatin hi mun tanin Judia gam kho chin ah thu hilhin mipite atohbuai veu hi,” chiin ahahpan seem uhi.
Galili thu ajaah tahin Pilat in hu Mi chu Galili mi ahihleh hihlouh adong hi.
Huleh Amah chu Herod vaihawmna nuaia um ahi chih aheet tahin Herod kawmah asawl a, hulaiin amah zong Jerusalem a um ahi.
Huleh Herod in Jesu amuh tahin akipaah mahmah a, a tanchin tampi anajaah jiahin hun sawttah apat akimuhpih uut mawng ahi; huleh a chiamchihna bawl bang aha beeh muh zong akineem hi.
Huin ama’n a kawmah thu tampi adong a, hizongleh Ama’n bangmah in adawng sih hi.
Huin siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute adingkhia va, nasatahin Amah aheeh uhi.
Huin Herod leh a sepaihte’n Jesu chu asimmohbawl va, chiamnuih bawlna a azat nungun puan loupi asilhsah va, Pilat kawmah asawlkiitta uhi.
Huleh hu ni mahin Herod leh Pilat lawmta ahung hita uhi, hu masiah chu kilungdou zing anahi uhi.
Huin Pilat in siampu lalte leh houtute leh mipite akoukhawm a,
a kawmvah, “Hi Pa’n mite atohbuai chia ka kawma na hung pui uh ahi hi. Huleh en un, na ma va hoihtaha ka etchian nungin na heehna thu vah Amah tungah bangmah dihlouhna ka mu sih hi.
Herod in zong amu sih, ajiahchu nanguh a kawmah ka hung sawl a, huleh ngai un, sihna khop hial bangma abawl sih hi.
Hujiahin ka jeep diing a, ka hah mei diing,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu kuut ni a ama’n mi khat a kawmva ahahkhiahsah teeiteei diing ahi hi.
Huin amahuh thakhatin akikou va, “Hi Pa sumangthaai inla, Barabba hung hahdohsah in,” achi uhi.
Hi pa chu khopi sunga helna bang aha jiah leh tualthah jiaha suangkul taang ahi hi.
Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu ahahdoh nuam a, a kawmvah thu asoi kiit hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu akikou va, “Kros ah kilhbeh in, kros ah kilhbeh in,” achi uhi.
Huin ama’n a thumveina diingin a kawmvah, “Bangjiahin ei maw? Bang bawlsual anei a ahiai? Sihna khop hial a tungah bangma ka mu sih hi. Hujiahin ka jeep diing a, ka hahdoh mei diing,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un aw ngaihtah in kros a kilhbeh diingin angeen teeiteei va, huin amahuh aw leh siampu lalte aw in aneh zoujawta hi.
Huin Pilat in anget bangva bawl diingin thu atan hi.
Huleh helna leh tualthahna jiaha suangkul taang angetpa uh chu ahahdoh a, Jesu ahihleh auut uutva bawl diingin apekheta hi.
Huleh Amah apui laiun khota lam apat a hung, Kureni gam mi Simon chu aman va, Jesu nunga kros chu apuaahpih theihna diingin a tungah angata uhi.
Huleh mipi nasatah leh Amah kah a maau jeenjuun numei hon in ajui uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh lam hung ngain, “Jerusalem tanute, kei hung kah sih unla, nanguh leh na tate uh diingin kap jaw un.
Ajiahchu ngai un, hichibang nite ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin, ‘Chiingte leh naupaai ngeilouhna gilte, huleh naungeeh teep ngeilouh nawite ahampha uh,’ achi diing uhi.
Hu hun chiangin amah un ‘taangte kawmah, “Hung netkhum un,” huleh mualte kawmah, “Hung khuhkhum un,”’ achi diing uhi.
“Ajiahchu sing hing a bawn hi silte abawl uh leh, sing gaw ah bang akibawl taphet diai?” achi hi.
Huleh midang migilou nih zong Amah toh suhlup diingin apui uhi.
Huleh Kalvari achih mun uh atun tahun, hu ah Amah chu kros ah akilhbehta va, migiloute toh, khat a jiatlam ah, khat a veilam ah akilhbeh uhi.
Huin Jesu’n, “Pa, amahuh ngaidam in; ajiahchu asilbawl uh ahe lou uh ahi,” achi hi. Huin aisaanin a puansilhte akihawm uhi.
Huleh mipite’n dingin aen zing va, houtute’n zong, “Midang bawn ahundam vele, Pathian miteel, Khrist ahih ngeel leh, Amah leh Amah kihundam leh aveleh,” chiin aeenghou uhi.
Sepaihte’n zong chiamnuih bawlna in anei va, a kawma hungin uain thuuh apia va,
huleh, “Judate Kumpipa na hih leh, nangmah kihundam in,” achi uhi.
Huleh a lutung jawn ah Grik, Latin leh Hebrai haam in, HICHU JUDATE KUMPIPA AHI, chia thugelh akitaah hi.
Huleh migilou kikhaite laha khat in Amah asoisia a, “Khrist na hih leh, nangmah kihundam inla, keiuh zong hung hundamta’n,” achi hi.
Hizongleh khatpeen in chu amah taai kawmin adawng a, “Nang banggiap toh kibanga mohpaih ahih mei chu, Pathian lau lou na hiaimah?
Ei chu gawt taah mawng i hi hi, ajiahchu i silbawlte man dihtah mu i hi; hizongleh hi Pa’n chu bangma asusual sih hi,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, na lalgam na tun chiangin hung hezing in aw!” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, tuni’n ka kawmah Paradis ah na um diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hichu daah guupna veel diing ahi a, daah kuahna tandongin leitung zousiah ahung mialta hi.
Huleh ni ahung mialta a, Pathian biahinn a puanjaah chu akimlai ah ahung keehta hi.
Huleh Jesu chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Pa, ‘na khut ah ka hagau ka hung keemsah hi,’” achi hi. Huleh huchu achih zohin a hagau ahahta hi.
Huleh sepaih zahoutu in sil umdaan amuh tahin, “Hi Pa chu chiantahin Mi dihtat ahi ngeei mei!” chiin Pathian apaahtawita hi.
Huleh hu etnop en diinga hung khawm mipi zousiah in sil umdaan amuh tahun a awm uh tuum kawmkawmin achiah kiitta uhi.
Huleh a meel heette zousiah leh Galili gam apat Amah hung jui numeite chu gaal ah ading va, hi silte aenzing uhi.
Huleh ngai un, mi khat a min Joseph kichi vaihawmtu khat aum a, amah chu mihoih leh midihtat ahi.
Ama’n chu avaihawm uh leh asilbawl uh zong lem anasahpih sih hi. Amah chu Judate khopi Arimathia mi ahi a, Pathian lalgam ngaah zinga um ahi.
Hi pa chu Pilat kawmah achiah a Jesu luang avangeen hi.
Huin alakhia a, puanneem in atuam a, koimah sial ngei nailouhna suang kikhuaah haan khat ah asialta hi.
Huleh hu ni chu Kisahkhawl ni ahi a, Sabbath ni kipan diing ahita hi.
Huleh numeite, Galili gam apat Amah toh hung kitonte’n zong anung ajui va, a haan leh a luang kisial daan amu uhi.
Huin achiah kiit va, silgimnamte leh thau gimtuuite asiam va, daan dungjuiin Sabbath ni in akhawlta uhi.
Huleh hapta ni masa ni in, jiingkaal matahin a gimtuui bawlte uh tawiin, amahuh toh numei dang koite aha haan ah ahung uhi.
Huleh suang chu haan apat liihdoha um amu uhi.
Huin a sung ah aluut va, Lalpa Jesu luang chu amuta sih uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, hujiaha alungbuai laiun, en un, mi nih puan vaamtah mei silhin a kawmvah ahung ding uhi.
Huleh amahuh laua lei a abohkhup laiun amah un a kawmvah, “Bang diinga misi laha mihing hawl na hi viai?
Hitah ah Amah aum nawn sih a, himahleh athou kiitta hi. Galili a aum laia na kawmva asoi hezing un:
‘Mihing Tapa chu misualte khut ah matsahin aum diing a, kros ah akilhbeh diing va, huleh ni thum ni’n athou kiit diing,’ achih chu,” achi uhi.
Huin amah un a thusoite ahung hedohta uhi.
Huleh haan apatin amahuh anungchiah kiit va, hi silte zousiah sawmlekhatte leh midang teng kawmah ahilhta uhi.
Amahuh chu Mari Magdalini leh Joanna leh Jakob nu Mari leh a kawmva um numei dangte toh ahi va, hi silte chu apostolte kawmah ahilhta uhi.
Huleh a thusoi uh chu mawh thu maiin angai va, anatahsang sih uhi.
Huin Peter chu adingdoh a, haan ah avataai a, huleh kuuna aet leh puan neemte chauh um chu amu a, sil um daante chu limdangsatahin inn lamah achiahta hi.
Huleh ngai in, hu ni mahin a lahva mi nih Emmau kichi khua khat, Jerusalem apat kilometar sawmlekhat banga gamla ah achiah uhi.
Amahuh chu hi sil hung tung zousiah thu ah ahoulim va,
huleh hichi ahung hi a, houlima akidottuah laiun Jesu ngeei in ahung naih a, amahuh toh achiah khawmta hi.
Hizongleh Amah aheet theihlouhna diingun amit uh suhvaihin aum hi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na chiah kawmva na kihoulimna uh bang ahiai? achi hi. Huleh dahmeel potahin ading den uhi.
Huin khatpa a min Kleopa kichipeen in adawng a, Amah kawmah, “Tulai a hutah a sil tungte helou a um, Jerusalem a mikhual nang chauh na hiaimah?” achi hi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang silte eimaw?” achi hi. Huin amah un a kawmah, “Nazareth Jesu, Pathian leh mi zousiah mitmuh a silbawl leh thusoi a Zawlnei minthangtah tungtaang thu,
huleh Amah chu siampu lalte leh ka houtute un sitaaha siamlouh tansah diinga apiaahkhiah va, kros a akilhbeh uh thute ahi.
Hizongleh kei un chu Israelte tantu diing Amah ahi chih ka kineem uhi. Huleh hi haw lou zong hi silte tun kalsiah tuni a ni thum ni ahita hi.
Hizongleh ka lawi lahva numei khenkhat haan ah mataha vachiahte’n thumah satahin ahung koih uhi.
Huleh a luang amuh louh phetun ahung kihkiit va, ahing kiitta chia hung hilh angelte zong ka mu uh, achi uhi.
Huin ka umpihte lahva khenkhat haan ah avachiah va, numeite soi bangngeeiin amu va, hizongleh Amah amu tuan sih uhi,” achi uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Aw mingolte leh zawlneite thusoi zousiah tahsang diinga lungngongte!
Khrist in hi silte thuaah a, a loupina a aluut diing him hilou ahiaimah?” achi hi.
Huin Mosi leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute zousiah apanin Pathian Lehkhathu pumpi a Amah tungtaang kigialte a kawmvah ahilhchianta hi.
Huleh achiahna diing khua uh tung diing ahita va, Amah chu chiahsuaah tum bangin aum hi.
Hizongleh amah un Amah chu ahou va, “Ka kawmvah um meita in, nitaahlam ahita a, huleh ni zong tum diing ahita hi,” achi uhi. Huin Amah chu a kawmva um diingin aluutta hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amahuh toh ankuang a touin tanghou ala a, avangpiaah a, huleh abalkeeh a, a kawmvah apia hi.
Huin amit uh ahung vaahta a, Amah aheta va, huin Amah chu a mitmuh vapat amangta hi.
Huin amah un, “Lampi a ahung houpih a, Pathian Lehkhathu ahung hilhchian laiin i sungah i lungtang akuang hial hilou ahiaimah?” achi uhi.
Huleh hulaitah mahin adingdoh va, Jerusalem ah akinungleh va, sawmlekhat umkhawmte leh a kawmva umte chu amu uhi.
Amah un, “Lalpa chu athou kiit tahzet ahi, Simon kawmah zong akilaahta,” anachi uhi.
Huin amah un zong lampi a sil hung umte leh tanghou abalkeeh a, Amah aheetdoh daante uh ahilh uhi.
Huleh hichia asoi laiun, Jesu ngeei chu a lahvah ahung ding a, a kawmvah, “Na tungvah hamuanna um heh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu achija mahmah va, alau va, hagau khat muin akingaihtuah uhi.
Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang diinga mangbang na hi viai? Huleh bang jiaha na lungtang va ginlahna um ahiai?
Ka khutte, ka keengpeehte en un, keimah mah hilou ka hiaimah? Hung khoih unla, en un, ajiahchu keimah in hite neia na hung muh bangun hagau in sa leh guh anei sih hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n huchia asoi zohin a khutte leh a keengpeehte amahuh alah hi.
Huleh akipaah taahluat jiahva agintaat louh uh leh limdang asah laiun Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hitah ah neeh diing bang aha na nei viai?” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah nga kikang gaw khat leh khuaizu khal khat apia uhi.
Ama’n huchu ala a, a ma vah aneta hi.

Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mosi Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute leh Phatna Late a ka tungtaang kigial zousiah ahung taangtun diing daan nanguh toh ka umkhawm laia na kawmva ka thusoite chu hi haw ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Pathian Lehkhathu aheet theihna diingun a lungtang uh ahonsahta hi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hichibanga gelh ahi, Khrist in gim athuaah diing a, a ni thum ni in misi lah apat athoukiit diing a,
huleh kisiihna leh sual ngaihdamna chu Amah min in Jerusalem apatin nam chin lahah soi ahi diing hi.
Nanguh hi silte heetpihtute na hi uhi.
Huleh ngai un, ka Pa sil chiam na tungvah ka hung sawl diing hi; hizongleh tunglam apat silbawltheihna a thop na hih masiah uh Jerusalem khopi ah um kinken un,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n amahuh chu Bethani tanphain apuidoh a, huin a baan ajaah a, amahuh avangpiaah hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, avangpiaah laitahin amahuh apaisanta a, vaan ah puitouhin aumta hi.
Huin amah un Amah abia va, kipaah mahmahin Jerusalem ah akihkiitta uhi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn ah Pathian phat leh paahtawiin aum zingzingta uhi. Amen.
Achiil in Thu aum a, Thu chu Pathian kawmah aum a, huleh Thu chu Pathian ahi.
Amah chu achiil in Pathian kawmah aum hi.
Sil zousiah Amah tungtawna siam ahi a, silsiam himhim Amah siam louh bangmah aum sih hi.
Amah ah hinna aum a, hu hinna chu mihingte vaahna ahi.
Vaah chu mial ah ahung vaah a, mial in huchu ahe sih hi.
Pathian apat a sawl mi khat aum a, a min chu Johan ahi.
Mi zousiah in amah jaala agintaat theihna diingun hu Vaah heetpih diingin amah chu heetpihtuin ahung hi.
Amah chu hu Vaah ahi sih a, hizongleh hu Vaah heetpihtu diinga sawl ahijaw hi.
Huchu Vaah dihtah, khovel a hung mi zousiah hihvaahtu ahi.
Amah chu khovel ah aum a, khovel Amah siam ahi, hizongleh khovel in Amah ahe sih hi.
Amah chu a mite kawmah ahung a, Amah chu a mite’n anapom sih uhi.
Hizongleh Amah anapom photmahte chu a kawmvah Pathian tate hihtheihna diing thuneihna apia hi, Amah min gingtate chu:
hute chu sisan a piang ahi sih va, tahsa deihdaan a piang zong ahi sih va, mihing deihdaan a piang zong ahi het sih uh, hizongleh Pathian deihdaan a piang ahijaw uhi.
Huleh Thu chu tahsa ahung hi a, i lahah aum hi. Pa ta khat neihsun loupi bangin, a loupi jia i mu uhi, Amah chu hehpihna leh thutah a dim ahi.
Johan in Amah thu heetpihin, a kikou a, “Amah ahi, ‘Ka nunga hung paipa chu ka ma a um mawng ahih jiahin kei saangin adeihhuaijaw hi,’ chia a thu ka soipa chu,” achi hi.
Amah bukimna apat hehpihna tunga hehpihna i tang chiat uhi.
Ajiahchu daan chu Mosi zanga piaah ahi a, hizongleh hehpihna leh thutah chu Jesu Khrist jiahin ahung um hi.
Koima’n bangchihmahin Pathian amu ngei sih; Tapa tang neihsun, Pa aang sunga umpa in Amah chu ahilhchianta hi.
Huleh hichu Judate’n Jerusalem apat siampu leh Levi mite, “Koi na hiai?” chia dong diinga asawl laiva Johan theihchetna ahi.
Huleh amah chu ki-iim louin akiphuang a, “Khrist chu ka hi sih” chiin akiphuang hi.
Huin amah un, “Ahihleh koi na hiai? Elijah na maw?” chiin adong uhi. Ama’n, “Ka hi sih” achi hi. “Hu Zawlneipa na hiaimah?” achi va, ama’n “Hilou” chiin adawng hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Ahung sawlte ka dawn theihna diingun hung hilh in. Koi na hiai? Nang leh nang koi kichi na hiai?” achi uhi.
Ama’n, “Kei chu Zawlnei Isai in asoi banga, ‘“LALPA lampi sial tang un,” chia gamdaai a kikou aw chu,’ chia asoipa chu ka hi” achi hi.
A mi sawlte uh chu Pharisaite laha mi ahi uhi.
Huleh amah adong va, a kawmah, “Khrist lah hilou, Elijah lah hilou, hu Zawlnei lah hilou na hih leh, bang diinga na baptis ahiai?” achi uhi.
Johan in amahuh adawng a, “Ke’n chu tui ah ka baptis a, hizongleh na heetlouh uh khat na lahvah ading hi.
Amah ahi ka nunga hung paipa, kei saanga deihhuai jawpa chu ahi a, a keengtophah khau suut taah zong ka hih sih hi,” achi hi.
Hu silte chu Jordan gaala Bethani a, Johan in abaptisna mun a siltung ahi.
Ajiingni’n Johan in Jesu a kawm lama hung amu a, “En un, Pathian Belaamnou khovel sualna pomangpa chu!
Hichu ahi, ‘Ka nung ah Mi khat ahung pai a, ka ma a um mawng ahih jiahin kei saangin alianjaw hi,’ chia ka na Soipa chu.
Ke’n Amah ka na he sih hi. Hizongleh Israelte kawma akisuhlat theihna diingin tui a baptis in ka hung ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Johan in a thu aheetpih a, “Hagau vakhu banga vaan apat hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden ka mu hi.

Ke’n Amah ka na he sih a, hizongleh tui a baptis diinga hung sawlpa Amah mah in ka kawmah, ‘Koi tungah zong Hagau hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden na muh peenpeen, Amah chu Hagau Siangthou a baptis diingpa chu ahi,’ ahung chi hi.
Huchu ka mu a, Hi Pa chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka heetpih hi,” achi hi.
A jiing kiit in Johan chu a nungjuite nih toh ading a,
huleh Jesu lampai lai amu a, “En un, Pathian Belaamnou!” achi hi.
Hu nungjui nihte’n a thusoi aja va, Jesu ajuita uhi.
Huin Jesu akihei a, ahung juih uh amuh in a kawmvah, “Bang ahiai na hawl uh?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Rabbi”, (huchu Houtupa chihna ahi) “khoiah ahiai na teen?” achi uhi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hung unla en un,” achi hi. Huin amahuh chu ahung va, a teenna aen va, huleh a kawmah hu ni aum uhi, daah sawmna ahih jiahin.
Johan thusoi ja, Jesu jui tegeel laha khat chu Simon Peter sanggampa Andru ahi.
Ama’n amasapeenin amah ngeei sanggampa Simon amudoh a, a kawmah, “Messiah” (huchu Khrist chihna ahi) “kichipa chu ka muta uh,” achi hi.
Huleh Andru in Simon chu Jesu kawmah ahung pui a, Jesu’n amah aen a, “Nang chu Jonah Tapa Simon na hi a, Kepha ahung kichita diing hi,” achi hi (huchu Suang, chia let ahi).
Huleh ajiingni’n Jesu’n Galili gam ah chiah atum a, Philip amu a, a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
Philip chu Andru leh Peter teenna khopi Bethsaida a teeng ahi.
Philip in Nathanael amu a, a kawmah, “Mosi in Daan Lehkhabu a a tungtaang anagelh leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute in anagelh uh Nazareth Jesu, Joseph tapa chu ka muta uh,” achi hi.
Huin Nathanael in a kawmah, “Nazareth apatin sil hoih apiang thei eimah?” achi hi. Philip in a kawmah, “Hung en in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n Nathanael a kawm lam juana hung amu a, a kawmah, “En un, heembawlna neilou Israel mitah chu,” achi hi.
Huin Nathanael in a kawmah, “Bang na hung chi heet ahiai?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Philip in nang ahung kouh main, theipi kung nuaia na um laiin ka hung mu hi,” achi hi.
Nathanael in adawng a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Pathian Tapa na hi, Israelte Kumpipa na hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “‘Theipi kung nuaiah ka hung mu,’ na kawma ka chih jiaha gingta na hi maw? Hi silte saanga loupijaw na hung mu diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, tu apatin vaan kihonga Pathian angelte Mihing Tapa tunga kal leh kum na muta diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh ni thum ni’n Galili gam a Kana ah kiteenna khat aum a, hutah ah chu Jesu nu aum hi.
Huleh Jesu leh a nungjuite zong kiteenna ah chial ahi uhi.
Huleh uain ahung kitaahsap tahun Jesu nu in a kawmah, “Uain anei nawn sih uh,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Numei, nang hung heetsah diing bang aum ei? Ka hun atung nai sih hi,” achi hi.
A nu’n suaahte kawmah, “Ama’n na kawmva asoi photmah bawl un,” achi hi.
Huleh Judate tawndaan dungjuia kisuhsiangthouna suangtuibeel guup, litar sawmsagih leh guup apat za leh sawmleli dawl akitung hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tuibeelte ah tui sungdim un,” achi hi. Huin beelngawng tan chiatin asung dim uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Tuin thaal unla, gualvaah vaihawmtu kawmah tawi un,” achi hi. Huchiin amah un atawi uhi.
Gualvaah vaihawmtu’n uain hung suaah chu achepin khoi apat hung um ahih ahe sih a (ahihvaangin suaah tui thaalte’n chu ahe va), gualvaah vaihawmtu in moupa chu akou a,
a kawmah, “Mi chin in achiil in uain hoih asungkhia va, huleh tamdeuh ahung dawn nung chiangun ahoihloujaw atungkhia uhi. Nang in chu tutanphain uain hoih na koih nalai hi,” achi hi.
Hi chiamchihna kipatna chu Jesu’n Galili gam a Kana a abawl ahi a, Amah loupi daan asulang hi. Huleh a nungjuite’n Amah agingta uhi.
Huzohin Amah chu Kapernaum ah achiahsuh a, Amah toh, a nu toh, a sanggamte toh, huleh a nungjuite toh hutah ah ni bangzah aha khat ataam uhi.
Huleh Judate Chiahkaan Kuut ahung naita a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn a bawngtal leh belaam leh vakhu juaahte leh sumhengtute tou chu amu hi.
Huin jeepna khauhual abawl zohin Pathian biahinn apatin belaamte leh bawngtalte anohdoh veh a; huleh sumhengtute dangka asunbuaahsah a, a dohkaan uh asawnpuuhsah hi.
Huleh Ama’n vakhu juaahte kawmah, “Hi silte hitah apatin lamang un! Ka Pa inn sumdawnna inn in bawl sih un!” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n, “Na inn a diinga ka phatuamngaihna in ahung ne zouta,” chih gelh chu ahung hedoh uhi.
Hujiahin Judate’n adawng va a kawmah, “Hi silte bawl theihna diingin thuneihna na nei hi chih etsahna diingin chiamchihna bang ahiai na hung muhsah theih?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Hi Pathian biahinn chu susia un, ni thum sungin ka tung ding kiit diing,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n, “Kum sawmli leh guup hi Pathian biahinn bawlna in aluut a, nang in ni thum sungin na tung ding kiit diing maw?” achi uhi.
Ahihvaangin Ama’n hu biahinn chu a tahsa asoina ahi.
Hujiahin misi lah apat Amah athoh kiit nungin, a nungjuite’n a kawmvah hi thute asoita ngeei ahi chih ahung hedohta va; huin Pathian Lehkhathu leh Jesu thusoi agingtata uhi.
Hizongleh Chiahkaan Kuut Jerusalem a aum laiin chiamchihna abawlte amuh tahun, mi tampite’n a min agingta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu a kawmvah akituluut nuam sih hi, ajiahchu Ama’n mi zousiah ahe a;
huleh Ama’n mihing sunga um aheet jiahin mihing thu koimah hilhchet akiphamoh sih hi.
Pharisaite laha mi, a min Nikodem kichi, Judate vaihawmtu khat aum hi.

Amah chu jaan in Jesu kawmah ahung a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Pathian apat a thuhilhtu diinga hung na hi chih ka he uhi; ajiahchu Pathian a kawma aum louh leh, na chiamchihna silmah bawlte koima’n abawl thei sih diing,” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in apian thah louh leh, Pathian lalgam amu sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Nikodem in a kawmah, “Mi ateeh nungin bangchiin apiang thei diai? A nu sunga luutkiitin apiang thei diing maw?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh tui leh Hagau apat apian louh leh, Pathian lalgam ah aluut sih diing hi.
Tahsa a piang phot chu tahsa ahi a, Hagau a piang photmah chu hagau ahi.
‘Na pian thah ngeeingeei diing ahi,’ chia na kawma ka soi limdangsa sin.
Huih a uutna pouh ah anung a, a gin na ja a, hizongleh khoi apat a hung a, khoilama chiah diing chih na he sih hi. Koipouh Hagau a piang phot chu huchibang ahi,” achi hi.
Nikodem in adawng a, a kawmah, “Hi silte bangchiin ahi thei diai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Israelte houtu na hi a, hi silte na he sih maw?
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, kei un chu ka heet uh ka soi va, ka muh uh ka hesah uhi, hizongleh nang un ka thu heetsah uh na pom sih uhi.
Leitung silte ka hung hilh bawn gingta lou na hih uh leh, vaan lam silte hung hilh leng bangchiin na gingta diviai?
Vaan apat hung kumsuh Mihing Tapa vaan a um chihlouh kuamah vaan ah akal ngei nai sih hi.
Mosi in gamdaai a guul akhaikaang mahbangin Mihing Tapa zong khaikaangin aum ngeei diing hi.
Koipouh Amah gingta in abeimang louha kumtuang hinna aneih jawhna diingin.
Ajiahchu Pathian in khovel alungsiat mahmah a, huchiin a Tapa tangkhat neihsun apia, koipouh Amah gingta in abeimang louh a, hizongleh kumtuang hinna aneih jawhna diingin.
Ajiahchu khovel siamlouhtangsah diingin Pathian in a Tapa khovel ah asawl sih, hizongleh khovel Amah jaala hutdam ahih theihna diingin asawl jaw hi.
Amah gingta chu siamlouh tansahin aum sih; hizongleh agingta lou chu siamlouhtansah zoh ahita, Pathian Tapa tangkhat neihsun min agintaat louh jiahin.
Hichu siamlouhtanna ahi: vaah khovel ah ahung a, hizongleh a silbawlte uh agiitlouh jiahin mite’n vaah saangin mial alungsiat jaw uhi.
Ajiahchu koipouh sil gilou bawl in vaah ahaw veu va, huleh vaah ah zong ahung sih uh, huchilou inchu asil bawlte uh alang kha diing hi.
Hizongleh a silbawlte uh Pathian a bawl ahi chih alat theihna diingin, koipouh sildih bawl chu vaah ah ahung uhi,” achi hi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu a nungjuite toh Judia gam ah ahung va, hutah ah amahuh toh aum zing a, abaptis hi.
Huleh Johan in zong tui atam jiahin Salim kawm Ainon ah abaptis hi. Huleh mipite ahung va, baptisma atang uhi.
Ajiahchu hulaiin Johan chu suangkul ah khum ahi nai sih hi.
Huin Johan nungjuite leh Judate kikaal ah kisuhsiangthouna thu ah kinialna ahung umta hi.
Amahuh chu Johan kawmah ahung va, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Jordan gaal a na umpih, a tanchin na heetpihpa’n, ngai in, Ama’n baptisma abawl a, mi zousiah Amah kawmah ahung uh,” achi uhi.
Johan in adawng a, “Vaan apat a piaah ahih louh leh, mihing in bangmah anei thei sih hi.
‘Kei Khrist chu ka hi sih a,’ hizongleh ‘Amah ma a sawl ka hi jaw,’ ka chih khu nanguh mah in na hung heetpih uhi.
Mounu neipa chu moupa ahi a, hizongleh moupa lawmpa, a kawma ding a, a thu ngaikhia chu moupa aw jiahin nasatahin anuam hi. Huchiin hi ka nuamna chu abukimta hi.
Amah chu alian deuhdeuh diing a, kei chu ka kiamsuh diing hi.
Tunglam apat a hung chu sil bangkim tunga um ahi a; lei a piang chu leimi ahi a, huleh lei thu asoi veu hi. Vaan apat a hung chu sil bangkim tunga um ahi.
Huleh amuh leh ajaah chu Ama’n ahesah hi, huleh koimah in a thuheetsah apom sih uh.
Koipouh a thuheetsah pom in Pathian chu adih hi chiin anamdet hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian sawl in Pathian thu asoi veu hi, ajiahchu Pathian in Hagau chu teh detdetin ape sih hi.
Pa in Tapa alungsiat a, huleh a khut ah sil zousiah apeta hi.
Koipouh Tapa gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita. Koipouh Tapa nual in hinna amu sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian lungthahna a tungah aum zing hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Johan saangin Jesu’n nungjui asiam in abaptis tamjaw chih Pharisaite’n aja uh chih Lalpa’n aheet tahin,
(Ahihvaangin Jesu hial in chu abaptis sih a, a nungjuite’n abaptis jaw uhi,)
Judia gam anusia a, Galili gam ah achiah kiitta hi.
Huchiin Samaria gam tawna pai chu Amah diingin akuul hi.
Huin Amah chu Samaria khopi khat, Sykar achih uh, Jakob in a tapa Joseph kawma a mun piaah kawm ahung tungta hi.
Hutah ah Jakob tuitohdoh aum a, Jesu chu a khualzin gim jiahin tuitohdoh geiah atou a, huchu daah guupna veel diing ahi hi.
Huin Samaria numei khat tuitawi diingin ahung a, Jesu’n a kawmah, “Tui dawn diing hung pia in,” achi hi.
A nungjuite lah neeh diing leiin khopi ah achiahta ngaalva.
Samaria numeinu’n a kawmah, “Bangchidaana nang Judami in kei Samaria numei kawma tui dawn diing na hung nget ahiai?” achi hi. Ajiahchu Judate’n Samaria mite toh kizopna bangmah anei sih uhi.

Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Pathian silthawnpiaah leh na kawma, ‘Tui dawn diing hung pia in,’ chipa koi ahiai chih he lehchin jaw, nang in a kawma ngeen diing chin a, Ama’n nang tui hing hung pe diing hi a,” achi hi.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, athaaldohna diing bangma na nei sih a, tuitohdoh lah athuuh ngaala. Khoi apatin ahiai tui hing na laah diing?
Ka pu uh Jakob in hi tuitohdoh ahung pia a, amah ngeei in zong adawn a, a tate leh a gangualte’n zong adawn va, amah saanga lianjaw na hiaimah?” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahnu adawng a, “Koipouh hi tuitohdoh dawn chu adangtaah kiit diing a;

hizongleh ke’n a kawma ka piaah diing tui dawn photmah chu bangchihtanin adangtaah sih diing uhi. A kawmva ka piaah diing tui chu tuinaah ahung hi diing a, kumtuang hinna phain akikhohdoh diing hi,” achi hi.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, ka dang ataah louhna diing leh tuitawi diinga hitaha ka hung nawn louhna diingin, hi tui hung pia in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Pai inla, na pasal va kou inla, hitah ah hung kiit in,” achi hi.
Huin amahnu’n adawng a, “Pasal ka nei sih,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “‘Pasal ka nei sih,’ na chih chu na chi dih mahmah hi.
Ajiahchu pasal ngaa na neita a, tua na neih zong na pasal ahi sih, hi thu na soi dih hi,” achi hi.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, zawlnei na hi chih ka hung he thei hi.
Ka pulepate un hi taang ah Pathian abe veu va, hizongleh nang un chu mite’n Pathian a biahna mun diing chu Jerusalem ahi na chi uh,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Numei, hung gingta in, hi taang leh Jerusalem khel lou a Pa na biah hun uh hung tung diing ahita.
Nang un na heetlouh uh na bia uh; kei un chu ka biah uh ka he uh, ajiahchu hutdamna Judate a hung kipan ahi.
Hizongleh Pa chu abe tahtahte’n hagau leh thutah a abiah diing hun chu hung tung diing ahita, tuin zong atung zing ahi; ajiahchu huchibanga Pathian bemite Pa’n ahawl ahi.
Pathian chu Hagau ahi a, huleh abe mite’n hagau leh thutah a abiah diing uh ahi,” achi hi.
Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Messiah” (Khrist kichi) “ahung diing chih ka he hi. Amah ahung chiangin sil bangkim ahung hilh veh diing hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Kei, na kawma thusoi chu Amah ka hi,” achi hi.
Huleh hulaitahin a nungjuite ahung tung va, numeinu akihoupih chu limdang asa mahmah uhi. Hizongleh koima’n, “Bang hawl na hiai?” ahihlouhleh, “Amahnu bang diinga na kihoupih ahiai?” achi sih uhi.
Huin numeinu’n a tuibeel ataaisan a, khopi ah achiah a mite kawmah,
“Ka sil bawl zousiah hung hilh thei Mi khat aum a, hung unla, hung en dihvua, Khrist hilou diing ahiaimah?” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu khopi apat apawtdoh va, a kawmah ahungta uhi.
Huchihlaiin a nungjuite’n “Rabbi, an ne in,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh heetlouh neeh diing an ka nei,” achi hi.
Hujiahin a nungjuite akihou va, “Koiaha in aneeh diing ahung tawisah diing adiai?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka an chu ahung sawlpa deihjawng bawl leh a nna tohzoh ahi.
Nang un, ‘Ha li zoh chiangin buh laahhun ahung tung diing,’ na chi sih viaimah? Ngai un, ka hung hilh ahi, daah unla loute en un, laahhun in amin vehta hi.
Koipouh ala in loh amu a, atuhpa leh alapa akipaah khawm theihna diingun, kumtuang hinna tan a um diing gah akikhol veu hi.
Huchiin ‘Khat in atuh a, adang in ala’ chih thu hitah ah adih ngeel hi.
Na tohgim louh uh la diingin ka hung sawl hi, midangte’n anatong va, nang un atoh uh na phattuampih uh ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh, “Ama’n ka bawl zousiah hung hilh,” chih heetpih numeinu jiahin hu khopi a Samariami tampi’n Jesu agingta uhi.
Huchiin Samariate chu Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun a kawmva um diingin angeen va, huleh Amah chu hutah ah ni nih anituang hi.
Huleh Amah thusoi jiahin midang tampi’n agintaat behlap uhi.
Huleh numeinu kawmah, “Tuin nang soi jiaha gingta ka hi sih uh; ajiahchu keiuh ngeei in a thu ka jaah va, huleh Hi Pa chu khovel Hundampa Khrist ahi chih ka heet uh ahi,” achi uhi.
Huleh ni nih nungin hu apat in apawt a, Galili gam ah achiahta hi.
Ajiahchu Jesu ngeei in zawlnei a gam ah paahtawiin aum ngei sih chih ahesahta hi.
Huin Galili gam ahung tunin, Jerusalem a kuut manna a asilbawlte zousiah amuh jiahun Galili mite’n Amah anakipaahpih uhi; ajiahchu amahuh zong hu kuut ah avachiah uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu chu tui uain asuaahsahna Galili gam a Kana khua ahung tung kiit hi. Huleh hutah ah miloupi khat a tapa Kapernaum khua a china aum hi.
Jesu Judia gam apat hung pawtin Galili gam ah ahung chih ajaah tahin, a kawmah achiah a, hung suh a, a tapa sudam diingin Amah angeen hi, ajiahchu amahpa si dehdeh a china ahi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiamchihna leh sil loupite na muh louh uh leh, na gingta sih diing uhi,” achi hi.
Miloupipa’n a kawmah, “Pu, ka tapa sih main hung suh in,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiahta in, na tapa adamta hi,” achi hi. Huleh hu mipa’n Jesu’n a kawma a thusoi chu agingta a, achiahta hi.
Huleh apai suh laiin a suaahte’n anakituaahpih va, “Na tapa adamta,” chiin anahilh uhi.
Huin ama’n ahung dam pat lai hun a kawmvah adong a, amah un a kawmah, “Jaan ni, daah sagih hun in a khosih in anuseta hi,” achi uhi.
Huchiin a pa in huchu Jesu’n a kawma, “Na tapa adamta,” achih hun laitah ahi chih aheta hi. Huleh amah leh a innkuanpih teng in agingta uhi.
Huchu Jesu’n Judia gam apat ahung pawt a, Galili gam a ahung laia chiamchihna silmah abawl nihveina ahi.
Hi nungin Judate kuut khat aum a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
Huleh Jerusalem ah Belaam Kotkhaah kawmah diil khat, Hebrai haam a Bethesda kichi inn liim ngaa nei aum hi.
Hutah ah damloute, mittawte, keengbaite leh jengte atam a tam aum va, tui kiloh angaah uhi.
Ajiahchu hun chihkhat chiangin angel khat hu diil ah achiah suh a, tui avatohliing veu hi. Koipouh tui kitohliing nung a luut masapeen peen chu bangchibang natna nei hizongleh suhdamin aum veu hi.
Huleh hutah ah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi khat aum hi.
Jesu’n amah lum amuh a, huleh hutobanga hun sawtpi um ahita chih aheet tahin Ama’n a kawmah, “Suhdam na uut ei?” achi hi.
Damloupa’n, “Pu, tui akitohliing chiangin diil a hung koih diing mi ka nei sih a, ka chiah chiangin midang in ahung makhelh veu hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla, keeng in paita in,” achi hi.
Huleh thakhatin amah chu ahung damta a, a lupna ala a, apaita hi. Huleh hu ni chu Sabbath ni ahi.
Hujiahin Judate’n suhdama umpa kawmah, “Sabbath ni ahi a, na lupna na puaah daan hilou ahi,” achi uhi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ahung sudampa’n ka kawmah, ‘Na lupna la inla, pai in,’ ahung chi hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin amah un a kawmah, “‘Na lupna la inla, pai in,’ hung Chipa koi ahiai?” chiin adong uhi.
Hizongleh suhdama umpa’n koi ahiai chih ahe sih hi, ajiahchu hu mun ah mipi tamtah aum a, Jesu lah achiahmangta hi.
A nunglamin Jesu’n amah chu Pathian biahinn ah amu a, a kawmah, “Ngai in, suhdamin na umta hi, sual kiit nawn sin, huchilou inchu sil hoihlou seem na tungah ahung tung kha diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin hu mipa chu achiahta a, amah sudampa chu Jesu ahi chih Judate avahilhta hi.
Hujiahin hi silte chu Sabbath ni a abawl jiahin Judate’n Jesu chu agawtbawl va, thah asawmta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka Pa in tutanin nna atong zing a, huleh ke’n zong ka tong zing,” achi hi.
Huchiin Sabbath ni abohsiat chauh hilou a, Pathian ka Pa ahi achih a, Pathian toh kibanga akibawl jiahin Judate’n Amah chu thah atum seem uhi.

Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pa in abawl amuhte loungaal Tapa in Amah thuin bangmah abawl thei sih hi; ajiahchu Ama’n abawl photmah hute chu Tapa in zong abawl veu hi.
Ajiahchu Pa in Tapa alungsiat a, a silbawl zousiah Amah amusah veu hi; huleh thumah nasah diing uh hite saanga nna loupijaw amusah diing hi.
Pa in misite akaihthoh a, asuhhing mahbangin Tapa in zong auut pouhmah hinna ape thei hi.
Ajiahchu Pa in koima vai ahawmsah sih, hizongleh vaihawmna zousiah Tapa kawmah apekheta hi,
huchia Pa azahbawl bangva mi zousiah in Tapa zong azahbawl theihna diingun. Koipouh Tapa zahbawl lou in Pa, Amah sawlpa zong azahbawl lou ahi.
“Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh ka thu ja a, ahung sawlpa gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita; vaihawmkhumin aum sih diing a, hizongleh sihna apat hinna ah aluut jawta ahi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, misite’n Pathian Tapa aw ajaahna diing uh hun hung tung diing ahita a, tuin zong atung zing hi, huleh aja photmah ahing diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pa in Amah a hinna akineih bangin, Tapa in zong Amah a hinna akineih diingin apeta hi.
Huleh Mihing Tapa ahih jiahin a kawmah vaihawmna thu zong apeta hi.
“Hikhu thumahsa sih un, ajiahchu haan a um zousiah in a aw ajaahna diing uh hun chu hung tung diing ahita a,
huleh haan apat ahung pawtdoh diing va, sil hoih bawlte chu athoudoh diing va, hinna anei diing uh, huleh silgilou bawlte chu siamlouhtangin athoukiit diing uhi.
Ke’n ka thu in bangmah ka bawl thei sih, ka jaah bangin vai ka hawm veu hi; huleh ka vaihawm chu adih hi, ajiahchu keimah deihjawng hawl louin, Pa, ahung sawlpa deihjawng ka hawl jaw hi.
“Ke’n keimah leh keimah tanchin kiheetpih hitaleng, ka kiheetpihna chu adih sih hi.
Kei hung heetpih khat aum, huleh ka tanchin Ama’n aheetpih chu adih ahi chih ka he hi.
Nang un Johan kawmah mi na sawl uh, ama’n thutah chu aheetpih hi.
Mihing thu heetsahna ka pom sih, hizongleh hutdama na um theihna diingun hi silte ka soi ahi.
Johan chu thaumei kuang leh taang bang ahi a, huleh nang un a vaah ah tomkhat nopsah taahdih na uut uhi.
Hizongleh Johan a saanga heetpihna lianjaw ka nei hi, ka Pa’n ka toh zoh diinga ahung piaah ka natohte mah in Pa in ahung sawl chih ahung heetpih hi.
Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa ngeei in kei ahung heetpih hi. Nang un bangchihmahin a aw na ja ngei sih va, a meel zong na mu ngei sih uhi.
Huleh Amah ahung sawlpa na gintaat louh jiahun a thu na lung sungvah na vom sih uhi.
Pathian Lehkhathu na sim ngun ngeel uhi, ajiahchu hute sungah kumtuang hinna neiin na kingaihtuah uh; hute chu ka tanchin heetpihtu ahi uhi.
Ahiinlah hinna na neihna diingun ka kawmah na hung nuam sih uhi.
Mihing paahtawina ka pom sih hi.
Hizongleh Pathian lungsiatna nanguh ah aum sih chih ka hung he hi.
Ka Pa min in ka hung a, nang un na hung pom sih uh, midang khat amah mah min in kihung leh lah, na pom diing uhi.
Nanguh, khat leh khat kipaahtawi tuahna ngaina a, Pathian chauh apat a hung pawt paahtawina hawl loute’n bangchiin na gingta diviai?
“Pa kawma nanguh hung heeh diingin hung ngaihtuah sih un; nanguh hung heehtu khat aum, amah chu na muan uh Mosi ahi.
Ajiahchu Mosi anagingta hita uh lehchin, kei zong na hung gingta diing uhi; ajiahchu ama’n ka tanchin ahi anagelh.
Hizongleh amah thugelhte na gintaat louh uh leh, bangchiin kei thute na gingta diviai?” achi hi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili Diil gaal, Tiberia Diil zong kichi lamah achiahta hi.
Huleh natna veite tunga a silmah bawlte amuh jiahun mipi nasatah in Amah ajui uhi.
Jesu chu taang ah achiah tou a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh atou hi.
Huleh Chiahkaan Kuut, Judate kuut chu anaita hi.
Huin Jesu adaah a, mi tampi a kawm lam hung juan amuhin Philip kawmah, “Hite neeh diing tanghou khoia lei diing i hiai?” achi hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n hichu Philip etkhiahna diinga asoi ahi, ajiahchu bang ahiai abawl pah diing Ama’n akiheet hi.
Philip in adawng a, a kawmah, “Mi chin in themkhat chiat a atan diing uh zong dinari za nih man tanghou in adaih sih diing hi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite laha khat, Simon Peter sanggampa Andru in a kawmah,
“Hitah ah barley buh tanghou pheeng ngaa leh nga nih nei naupang khat aum hi, ahihvaangin mi hizahpi lahah bangtham ahi diai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n, “Mipite tousah un,” achi hi. Huleh hutah ah hampa tampi aum hi. Huchiin pasalte chu atouta va, atam lam uh chu saang ngaa veel ahi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n tanghou chu ala a, huleh avangpiaah zohin nungjuite kawmah ahawm a, nungjuite’n atoute kawmah, huchibangmahin ngate zong adeihkhop un ahawm uhi.
Huin akham nungun Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Bangmah manglou diingin a neehvaal nengte uh luaah un,” achi hi.
Hujiahin aluaahkhawm va, barley buh tanghou pheeng ngaa nete neehvaal a neng bawm sawmlenih aluaah dim uhi.
Huin Jesu chiamchihna bawl amuh tahun hu mipite’n, “Tahzetin Hi Pa chu khovel a Zawlnei hung diingpa ahi ngeei mei,” achi uhi.
Huin mipite’n Amah chu kumpipa a bawl diinga pawngmat pah diing ahi uh chih Jesu’n aheet tahin Amah ngenin taang lamah achiahtuamta hi.
Huleh nitaah ahung hihin a nungjuite diil ah achiahsuh va,
kuang khat ah atuang va, Kapernaum lam juanin diil tungah achiah uhi. Huleh khua amialta a, Jesu lah a kawmvah ahung nai sih hi.
Huin huihpi haattahin diil chu anawh sang hulhul hi.
Huchiin kilometar ngaa aha guup aha ajaap nungun Jesu diil tunga pai a, kuang lam hung naih amu va, amahuh alau uhi.
Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Keimah ka hi, lau sih un,” achi hi.
Huin amah un kipaahtahin Amah chu kuang ah atuangsahta va, huleh kuang chu kintahin azot gam uh atung pahta hi.
Ajiingni in diil gaal lehlam a ding mipite’n a nungjuite tuanna loungaal kuang neu dang aum sih chih leh Jesu a nungjuite toh kuang ah achiah sih a, a nungjuite angen un achiah uh chih aheta uhi.
Ahihvaangin Tiberia apatin Lalpa’n avangpiaah nunga tanghou aneehna mun kawmah kuang neu dang ahung tung hi.
Hujiahin, mipite’n Jesu leh a nungjuite aum nawn sih uh chih ahung heet tahun amahuh zong kuang ah atuang va, Jesu hawlin Kapernaum ahung tung uhi.
Huleh Amah chu diil gaal lehlam a amuh tahun a kawmah, “Rabbi, bangchiha hitah tung na hiai?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, chiamchihnate na muh jiahva hung hawl na hi sih va, hizongleh tanghou na neeh va, na vah jiahun na hung hawl uh ahijaw hi.
An mangthang mei diingin tonggim sih unla, kumtuang hinna donga um zing diing an, Mihing Tapa in ahung piaah diing hawlin tonggim jaw un, ajiahchu Pa Pathian in Amah achiamchihta hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Pathian nna ka toh theihna diingun bang ahiai ka bawl diing uh?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Amah, ahung sawlpa na gintaat uh, hichu Pathian natohna ahi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Ahihleh ka muh va, ka hung gintaat theihna diingun bang chiamchihna na hung ensah diai? Bang na tong diai?
Ka pulepate un gamdaai ah manna ane uh; ‘Ama’n vaan apatin neeh diing tanghou apia,’ chia kigelh bangin,” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, vaan apat a tanghou hung petu Mosi ahi sih a, hizongleh vaan apat a tanghou hung petu chu ka Pa ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian tanghou chu vaan apat hung kumsuh, khovel kawma hinna pepa chu ahi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, hu tanghou chu hung pe zingzing in,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi. Koipouh ka kawma hung chu agilkial ngei sih diing a, huleh koipouh kei hung gingta chu adangtaah ngei sih diing hi.
Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, nang un na hung muh un zong na hung gingta sih uhi.
Ka Pa’n ahung piaah zousiah ka kawmah ahung diing a, huleh ka kawma hung photmah chu bangchi zongleh ka nohdoh het sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu keimah deihjawng bawl lou a, ahung sawlpa deihjawng bawl diinga vaan apat hungsuh ka hijaw hi.
Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa deihjawng chu: Ama’n ahung piaah zousiah khat beeh mangsah lou a, hizongleh ni tawpni chianga ka kaihthoh chu ahi.
Huleh hichu ahung sawlpa deihjawng ahi, koipouh Tapa mu a gingta in kumtuang hinna aneih a, huleh ke’n ni tawpni chianga ka kaihthoh diing chu ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Ama’n, “Kei vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou ka hi,” achih jiahin Judate a tungah aphun uhi.
Huleh amah un, “Hi Pa hi Jesu, Joseph tapa, a pa leh a nu zong i heet uh hilou ahiaimah? ‘Vaan apat hung kumsuh ka hi,’ bangchidaana achih ahiai?” achi uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Phunphun sih un.
Pa, kei hung sawlpa’n ahiip louh leh, koimah ka kawmah ahung thei sih; huleh ke’n amah nitawp ni chiangin ka kaithou diing hi.
Zawlneite Lehkhabute ah, ‘Pathian hilhin aum veh diing uh,’ chih gelh ahi. Hujiahin mi chin Pa thu ja a, he photmah ka kawmah ahung veu hi.
Pathian apat a hungpa loungaal mi koimah in Pa amu ngei sih, Ama’n chu Pa amuta hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kei hung gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita.
Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi.
Na pulepate un gamdaai ah manna ane va, hizongleh asi uhi.
Hichu vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou, mi’n aneeh a, asih louhna diing uh chu ahi.

Kei vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou hing chu ka hi. Mi koipouh in hi tanghou aneeh inchu, kumtuangin ahing diing uh; huleh ka tanghou piaah diing chu khovel hinna diinga ka piaah ka tahsa ahi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate hah nialin akinial va, “Bangchidaana Hi Pa’n a tahsa neeh diinga pe thei diing ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa tahsa na neeh va, huleh a sisan na dawn louh uh leh, nanguh ah hinna na nei sih uhi.
Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, huleh ka sisan dawn in kumtuang hinna aneita a, huleh ke’n amah chu ni tawpni chiangin ka kaithou diing hi.
Ajiahchu ka tahsa hi an ahi tahzet a, huleh ka sisan zong dawn diing ahi tahzet hi.
Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, ka sisan dawn chu kei ah aum zing a, huleh kei amah ah ka um zing hi.
Pa hingzing in ahung sawl a, Pa jiaha ka hin bangmahin koipouh kei hung ne chu kei jiahin amah zong ahing diing hi.
Hichu vaan apat a tanghou hing hung kumsuh chu ahi. Na pulepate un manna aneeh va asih bang uh hilouin, koipouh hi tanghou ne chu kumtuangin ahing diing hi,” achi hi.
Hi thute Ama’n Kapernaum khua a aum laiin sinagog a athusoina a asoi ahi.
Hujiahin a nungjuite tampi’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Hichu thu hahsa ahi, kuan ahiai ngai thei diing?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n hi thu ah a nungjuite aphun uh chih a lungsim a aheetin a kawmvah, “Hi thu in nanguh ahung lunghilousah maw?
Mihing Tapa tuma a aumna ngei a akaltouh mu leh uh chin bang na loh diviai?
Suhingtu chu Hagau ahi a, tahsa chu bangmah aphatuam sih. Na kawmva ka thusoite chu hagau ahi a, hinna zong ahi.
Hizongleh na lahvah gingtalou khenkhat na um uh,” achi hi. Ajiahchu Jesu’n atuung apat agingtaloute leh Amah mansah diingpa aheetsa ahi.
Huleh Ama’n, “Hujiahin ka Pa’n ahung piaah louh leh, koimah ka kawmah ahung thei sih chiin na kawmvah ka soi ahi,” achi hi.
Hu hun apatin a nungjuite tampi anungpaita va, Amah ajui nawnta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n sawmlenihte kawmah, “Nanguh zong na paimang nuam uh maw?” achi hi.
Huchiin Simon Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “Lalpa, koi kawmah ahiai ka chiah diing uh? Nang in kumtuang hinna thute na nei hi.
Huleh nang chu hu Pathian hing Tapa Khrist chu na hi chih ka gingta va, he zong ka he uhi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Nanguh sawmlenihte ka hung teel na hi sih viaimah? Huleh na lahva khat diabol ahi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Ama’n Simon tapa, Juda Iskariot thu asoi ahi. Ajiahchu amah hi sawmlenihte laha telve, Amah mansah diingpa chu ahi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili gam ah avaah lehleh a, Judate’n thah atup jiahun Judia gam apha nuam sih hi.
Huleh Judate Bawhta Kuut ahung naita hi.
Hujiahin a sanggamte’n a kawmah, “Na nungjuite’n na natohte amuh theihna diingun, hi apatin Judia gam ah chiahmang in.
Ajiahchu minthanna diing hawl mi koima’n aguuhin bangmah abawl ngei sih hi. Hi silte bawl na hih leh, khovel kawmah kimusah in,” achi uhi.
Ajiahchu a sanggamte ngeei in zong Amah agingta sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka hun atung nai sih, hizongleh nanguh hun chu bangchihlaipouhin atung zing hi.
Khovel in nanguh ahung ho thei sih a, hizongleh kei chu ahung hua uhi, a natohte uh agilou chih ka heetsah jiahin.
Nanguh hi kuut ah chiahtou un, kei chu hi kuut ah ka hungtou nai sih diing hi, ajiahchu ka hun atung bukim nai sih hi,” achi hi.
Hi thute a kawma asoi zohin Amah chu Galili gam ah aum zing nalai hi.
Hizongleh a sanggamte kuut mangna a achiah touh nungun Amah zong vaantaang heetlouhin, aguuhin achiah tou hi.
Huin Judate’n kuut mangna ah Amah ahawl va, ‘Khoia um ahiai?’ achi uhi.
Huchiin Amah tungtaang ah mipite lahah phunna nasatah aumta hi. Ajiahchu khenkhat in, “Mihoih ahi,” achi va; adang in, “Adih sih, mite puikawi ahijaw,” achi uhi.
Ahihvaangin Judate lau jiahin koima’n atung thu alangtangin asoi ngam sih uhi.
Huleh kuut kimang saan laitahin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah achiah tou a, thu ahilh hi.
Huleh Judate’n thumah asa va, “Hi Pa’n jil ngeiloupi-a bangchidaana lehkha he ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka thuhilh chu keimah a hung kuan ahi sih a, ahung sawlpa a hung kuan ahijaw hi.
Mi koipouh in Amah deihjawng abawl uut inchu, thuhilhna chu Pathian apat ahiai, ahihlouhleh keimah phuaahthuh ka soi ahiai chih ahe diing uhi.
Koipouh amah phuaahthuh thusoi chu amah kipaahtawina diing deih ahi, hizongleh a sawlpa paahtawi diing deih chu, Amah ngeei chu midih ahi a, huleh Amah ah dihtatlouhna aum sih hi.
Mosi in nanguh daan thu ahung pe sih eimah? Hizongleh na lahva koima’n daan thu na jui sih uhi. Bang diinga thah hung tum na hi viai?” achi hi.
Mipite’n adawng va, “Dawipaai na hi ve, koi in ahiai nang thah hung tum?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nna khat ka tong a, na bawnun thumah na sa uhi.
Huchiin Mosi in zehtan thu nanguh ahung pia a (zehtan thu Mosi jiaha piaah ahi sih a, pulepate a hung kipan ahijaw hi), huleh Sabbath ni in mi zeh na tan uhi.
Mosi daan thu botse loua Sabbath ni a mi’n zeh atan theih leh, keima’n Sabbath ni a mi khat ka damsiangsah jiaha bang diinga ka tunga lungthah na hi viai?
Alatdaan bangin thu khen sih unla, dihtattahin khen jaw un,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Jerusalem apat mi khenkhat in, “Hi Pa hi thah atup pa uh hilou ahiaimah?
Endih vua, hangtahin thu asoi a, amah un lah a kawmah bangmah asoi sih uh. Amah hi Khrist chu ahi chih vaihawmtute’n ahe tahtah uh adiai?
Hizongleh enlah hi Pa khoia hung kipan ahiai chih i he ngaala, hizongleh Khrist ahung chiangin koima’n khoi apat ahih ahe sih diing hi,” achi uhi.

Huin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah thuhilhin akikou a, “Nang un kei na hung he va, huleh khoia hung kipan ka hiai chih zong na hung he uhi. Keimah thu a hung ka hi sih a, hizongleh kei hung sawlpa chu adih ahi, nang un Amah na he sih uhi.
Hizongleh ke’n Amah ka he hi, ajiahchu Amah apat a hung ka hi a, Amah hung sawl ka hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Amah mat atum va, hizongleh ahun atun nailouh jiahin koima’n a tungah khut aha sih uhi.
Huleh mipi tamtahin Amah agingta va, “Khrist ahung chiangin Hi Pa bawl saanga tamjaw chiamchihna abawl diai?” achi uhi.
Pharisaite’n atung thu ah mipite hutobanga aphun uh aja va, huleh Pharisaite leh siampu lalte’n Amah man diingin houtute asawl uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tomchakhat na kawmvah ka um diing a, huzohchian ahung sawlpa kawmah ka chiah diing hi.
Nang un na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh, huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate amahuh kihouin, “I muh louh diinga khoia chiah diing ade aw? Grikte laha kithehdalhte kawma chiaha Grikte thu vahilh diing ahiai?
‘Na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh, huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ chih thu hi bang achihna ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huleh kuut ni loupi, ni nunungpeen ah Jesu chu ading a, akikou a, “Koipouh adang ataah leh, ka kawmah hung henla, dawn heh.
Koipouh kei hung gingta chu Pathian Lehkhathu in asoi bangin a sung apatin tuihing luuite aluangdoh diing,” achi hi.
Hizongleh hichu Ama’n Amah gingtate’n amuh diing uh Hagau asoina ahi, ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou piaah ahi nai sih hi, Jesu paahtawia aum nai louh jiahin.
Hujiahin mipi tamtahte’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Tahzetin Hi Pa Zawlnei ahi,” achi uhi.
Adangte’n, “Khrist ahi,” achi uhi. Hizongleh khenkhatte’n, “Khrist chu Galili gam ah ahung piang diaimah?
Pathian Lehkhathu in, Khrist chu David chihaahte laha leh David teenna khua Bethlehem ah ahung piangdoh diing, achi sih eimah?” achi uhi.
Huchiin Amah jiahin mite lahah kikhenna aumta hi.
Huleh a lahva khenkhat in Amah mat atum va, hizongleh koima’n a tungah khut aha sih uhi.
Huin houtute chu siampu lalte leh Pharisaite kawmah ahung va, amah un houtute kawmah, “Bang diinga Amah hung puilou?” anachi uhi.
Houtute’n adawng va, “Hi Pa thusoi bangin koima’n thu asoi ngei himhim sih,” achi uhi.
Huin Pharisaite’n adawng va, “Nanguh zong puimanga um na hita uh maw?
Vaihawmtute leh Pharisaite lahah Amah gingta mi aum khata eimah?
Hizongleh daan thu helou hi mipite chu haamsethuaah ahi uh,” achi uhi.
Nikodem, jaan a Jesu kawma hung, a lahva telpa’n a kawmvah,
“I daan thu un mi amah kam a thu jaah ahih ma leh a silbawlte heet main siamlouh atangsah ngei eimah?” achi hi.
Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Nang zong Galili mi na hi maw? Hawl inla, kan in, ajiahchu Galili gam ah zawlnei himhim apiang ngei sih hi,” achi uhi.
Huin mi chin a inn chiat vah achiahta uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu Olive Taang ah achiahta hi.
Huleh jiingkaal matahin Pathian biahinn ah ahung kiit a, mi zousiah a kawmah ahung va; huin Ama’n touin amahuh thu ahilh hi.
Huleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n numei khat, a-aangkawm laia amat uh a kawmah ahung pui va, a laiva adinsah zohun,
a kawmah, “Houtupa, hi numei hi a-aangkawm laitaha kiman ahi.
Daan Lehkhabu ah Mosi in hitobang mi chu suang a sehlup diing thu ahung pia hi. Hizongleh nang bang na chi ngaih ei?” achi uhi.
Hichu Amah heehna diing amuh theihna diingva aje-etna va asoi uh ahi. Hizongleh Jesu chu akuun a, a khut zung in lei agial hi.
Huchia adoh mun jiahun ahung dingtang a, a kawmvah, “Na lahva sualna nei het loupeen in amahnu chu suang in sep masa heh,” achi hi.
Huin akuun kiit a, lei agial jeel hi.
Hizongleh amah un hi thu ajaah tahun a sialepha heetna un siamlouhtangsahin, a upapeen apat atawptanin khat khat in achiahmangta va, Jesu chauh leh a laia ding hu numeinu aum hi.
Huin Jesu ading a, numeinu chihlouh midang amuh louh tahin a kawmah, “Numei, nang hung heehte khoia um ahita viai? Koima’n siamlouh ahung tangsah sih maw?” achi hi.
Amahnu’n, “Koima’n hung tangsah lou, Lalpa,” achi hi. Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ke’n zong siamlouh ka hung tangsah sih hi, chiah inla sual kiit nawn sin,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei khovel vaah ka hi, koipouh kei hung jui chu mial ah akhohei sih diing a, hizongleh hinna vaah anei jaw diing hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, “Nangma’n nangmah tanchin na kisoi a, na thusoi adih sih,” achi uhi.

Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Keimah in keimah tanchin soi hitaleng, ka heetpihna chu adih hi, ajiahchu khoi apat hung ka hih leh, khoia chiah diing ka hih ka he hi; hizongleh nang un khoi apat hung ka hih leh khoia chiah diing ka hih na he sih uhi.
Nang un tahsa daan in vai na hawm uh, ke’n koima vai ka hawmsah sih.
Huleh vaihawmsah hita zongleng, ka vaihawm chu adih hi; ajiahchu kei ngen ka hi sih a, kei leh kei hung sawlpa ka Pa toh ka hijaw uhi.
Na daan vah zong mi nih thuheetpih chu adih ahi chih gelh ahi.
Kei chu keimah leh keimah thuheetpih ka hi a, huleh Pa ahung sawlpa’n ka thu ahung heetpih hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Na pa khoiah aum ei?” achi uhi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Nang un kei lah na hung he sih va, ka Pa zong na he sih uhi. Kei hung he hileh uh chin, ka Pa zong na he diing uh,” achi hi.
Hi thute Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu ahilh laiin sumkoihna mun ah asoi a, huleh a hun atun nailouh jiahin koima’n a tungah khut aha sih hi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka chiahmang diing a, nang un na hung hawl diing va, na sualna vah na si diing uhi. Ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n, “Ama’n, ‘Ka chiahna diing ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ achih jiahin Amah leh Amah akithat diing adiai?” achi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh chu nuailam akipan na hi va, kei chu tunglam akipan ka hi. Nanguh hi khovel a na hi va, kei chu hi khovel a ka hi sih.
Hujiahin na sualna vah na si diing uh chih na kawmvah ka soi ahi; ajiahchu kei Amah ka hi chih na gintaat louh uh leh, na sualna vah na si diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Nang koi na hiai?” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Achiil apat a na kawmva ka soi khu mah ka hi.
Na tungthu vah soi diing leh vaihawmsah diing tampi ka nei hi, hizongleh ahung sawlpa chu adih hi; huleh Amah apat ka jaahte chu khovel kawmah ka soi veu hi,” achi hi.
Ama’n Pa tungtaang a kawmvah asoi ahi chih amah un ahe sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa na khaikaang zoh chiangun Amah ka hi chih leh keimah thuin bangmah ka bawl sih a, hizongleh ka Pa’n ahung hilh bangin hi thute ka soi jaw ahi, chih na he diing uh.
Amah ahung sawlpa ka kawmah aum hi. Pa in ka ngenin ahung nuse sih, ajiahchu akipaah jawng silte ka bawl zing hi,” achi hi.
Hi thute asoi laiin mi tampi’n Amah agingta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n amah gingta Judate kawmah, “Ka thu a na um zing uh leh, ka nungjuite na hi tahzet diing uhi.
Huleh thutah na he diing va, thutah in nanguh ahung jaleensah diing hi,” achi hi.
Amah un, “Abraham chihaahte ka hi va, bangchihmahin koima salin ka taang ngei sih uh. Bangchidaana, ‘Na jaleen diing uh,’ na chih ahiai?” chiin adawng uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh sual bawl chu sual suaah ahi.
Suaah chu kumtuangin inn ah aum zing sih, hizongleh Tapa chu kumtuangin aum zing hi.
Hujiahin Tapa in ahung jaleensah inchu, na jaleen tahzet diing uhi.
Abraham chihaahte na hi uh chih ka hung he hi, hizongleh ka thu nanguh a aum louh jiahin, nang un kei thah diing na hung tum uhi.
Ke’n ka Pa kawma ka muhte ka soi a, nang un zong na pa kawmva na muhte uh na bawl uh,” achi hi.
Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Abraham chu ka pa uh ahi,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah asoi a, “Abraham tate hita leh uh chin, Abraham natohte na tong diing uhi.
Hizongleh tuin kei, Pathian kawma ka jaah thutah na kawmva hung Hilhpa, thah na hung tum va, Abraham in hitobangin anabawl sih hi.
Nang un chu na pa uh silbawlte na bawl uhi,” achi hi. Huin amah un a kawmah, “Kingaihna thaanghuai apat piang ka hi sih uh, Pa khat ka nei uh, Amah chu Pathian ahi,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Pathian na Pa uh hitaleh chu keimah na hung lungsiat diing uhi, ajiahchu Pathian apat a hung pawt ka hi a, keimah thuin ka hung sih a, Ama’n ahung sawl jawh ahi.
Bangchidaana ka soi hesiam lou na hi viai? Ka thu na jaah theih louh jiahun ahi.

Nanguh chu na pa uh diabol apat hung na hi va, huleh na pa uh deihjawng sual na bawl uut uhi. Amah chu achiil apat tualthattu ahi a, amah ah thutah aum louh jiahin thutah ah aum sih hi. Juau asoiin zong amah hihna ngeei apat asoi ahi, ajiahchu amah mijuau ahi a, huleh juauna pa zong ahi.
Thutah ka soi jiahin nang un na hung gingta sih uhi.
Na lahva kua na hi viai sual thu a siamlouh hung tangsah? Thutah ka soi leh bang diinga hung gingtalou na hi viai?
Mi, Pathian a in chu Pathian thu angaikhe veu a, Pathian a na hihlouh jiahun nang un chu na ngaikhe sih uhi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n adawng va, a kawmah, “Samariami na hi a, huleh dawipaai na hi ka hung chih uh chu ka chi dih mahmah sih viaimah?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Dawipaai ka hi sih a, hizongleh ka Pa ka paahtawi a, huleh nang un kei na hung paahtawi sih uhi.
Keimah loupina diing ka hawl sih, hukhu hawl leh vaihawmtu khat aum hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in ka thu azop leh kumtuangin sihna amu ngei himhim sih diing,” achi hi.

Hujiahin Judate’n a kawmah, “Tuin chu dawipaai na hi chih ka hung heta uh, Abraham a sita a, huleh zawlneite zong a sita uh, hizongleh nang in, ‘Mi koipouh in ka thu azop leh, sihna achiam ngei himhim sih diing,’ na chi hi.
Asita ka pu uh Abraham saanga loupijaw na hiai? Huleh zawlneite lah asita va, nang banga kingai na hiaimah?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Kei leh kei kipaahtawi hitaleng, ka kipaahtawina bangmah ahi sih diing, ahung paahtawi chu ka Pa, nang un ka Pathian uh ahi, na chih uh khu ahi.
Hizongleh nang un Amah na he sih uh, ke’n chu Amah ka he hi. Huleh ‘Amah ka he sih chita leng,’ nanguh banga mijuau ka hita diing hi; hizongleh Amah ka he a huleh a thu zong ka zop hi.
Na pu uh Abraham in ka ni amuh diing chu anuam mahmah a, huleh amu ngeei a, akipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Huin Judate’n a kawmah, “Nang kum sawmngaa zong ching nailou chin a, Abraham na mu kha maw?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Abraham um ma a um KA HI,” achi hi.
Hujiahin amah un asehna diingin suang ala va, hizongleh Jesu chu akiphual a, Pathian biahinn apat apawt a, a lahva paisuaahin achiahta hi.
Huleh Jesu’n apai kawmin a pian apat mittaw khat amu hi.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Rabbi, hi pa mittaw a apian, kuan ahiai sil sual bawl, hi pa’n ahiai, ahihlouhleh a nulepa in?” chiin adong uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Hi pa lah asual sih a, a nulepa lah asual sih uh, hizongleh Pathian natohte amah a akilat theihna diingin ahijaw hi.
Suun ahihlaiin ahung sawlpa nna ka toh ngeeingeei diing ahi. Jaan hung tung diing ahita, hu hun chiangin koima’n nna atong thei sih diing uh.
Khovel a ka um sung teng khovel vaah ka hi,” achi hi.
Huchia asoi zohin Ama’n lei ah a chil asiat a, hu chil in tungman abawl a, huleh hu tungman chu mittawpa mit ah anuh a,
huleh a kawmah, “Chiah inla, Siloam diil ah vasil in,” achi hi (Siloam chu Sawl chihna ahi). Huchiin achiah a, asil a, huleh mutheiin ahung kiit hi.
Hujiahin a innveengte leh ma a mittaw ahih lai musate’n, “Hi pa hi khutdoha tou veupa hilou ahiaimah?” achi uhi.
Khenkhatte’n, “Amah ahi,” achi uhi. Adangte’n, “Akibatpih ahi,” achi uhi. Hizongleh ama’n, “Amah chu ka hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Bangchiin ahiai na mit ahung vaah?” achi uhi.
