Ama’n adawng a, “Jesu kichi Mi khat in tungman abawl a, ka mit ahung nuhsah a, huleh ka kawmah, ‘Siloam diil ah chiah inla vasil in,’ ahung chi hi. Huchiin ka chiah a, ka sil a, ka mutheita hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Amah khoiah aum ei?” achi uhi. Ama’n, “Ka he sih,” achi hi.
Huleh a ma a mittawpa chu Pharisaite kawmah ahung pui uhi.
Jesu’n tungman bawl a, a mit asuhvaah ni chu Sabbath ni ahi a,
Pharisaite’n zong a mit hung vaah daan a kawmah adong kiit uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka mit ah tungman anuh a, ka vasil a, ka muta hi,” achi hi.

Hujiahin Pharisaite khenkhat in, “Hi Pa Pathian apat ahi sih, ajiahchu Sabbath ni atang sih hi,” achi uhi. Adangte’n, “Bangchiin misual in hitobangin chiamchihna abawl thei diai?” achi uhi. Huin a lahvah kikhenna aumta hi.
Huin amah un mittawpa kawmah, “Na mit ahung suhvaahsah jiahin Amah tungtaang nang bang na chi ngaihtuah ei?” achi kiit uhi. Ama’n, “Zawlnei ahi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate’n a mit hung vaahpa nulepa akouh masiah uh, mittaw anahi a, ahung vaahta ahi chih a tungtaang thu agingta sih uhi.
Huleh amah un a nulepa kawmah adong va, “Hi, na tapa uh ahi maw, mittawa piang na chihpa uh? Bang chiin ahiai tua ahung muh theih taah?” achi uhi.
A nulepate’n amahuh adawng va, “Hi ka tapa uh ahi a, huleh mittawin apiang chih ka he uh.
Hizongleh bangchidaana tua ahung muhtheih taah ka he sih uh, huleh koi in a mit asuhvaahsah zong ka he sih uh. Mipiching ahi a, amah dong un, amah tungtaang ama’n akisoi mei diing,” achi uhi.
A nulepate’n Judate alau jiahun hi thute asoi uhi; ajiahchu Judate’n Amah chu Khrist ahi chia phuang aum leh, sinagog apat nohdoh diing chia thu analemsah uh ahita hi.
Hujiahin ahi a nulepate’n, “Mipiching ahi a, amah dong un,” achih uh.
Huin amah un mittawpa chu akou kiit va, a kawmah, “Pathian loupina pia in! Hi Pa jaw misual ahi chih ka he uh,” achi uhi.
Hujiahin ama’n adawng a, “Amah misual ahihleh hihlouh ka he sih, sil khat ka he hi, mittaw anahi hizongleng, tuin ka mu theita hi,” achi hi.
Huin amah un a kawmah, “Ama’n na tungah bang ahiai abawl? Na mit bang ahung chi suhvaahsah ei?” achi kiit uhi.
Ama’n, “Ka hung hilhta a, hizongleh na ja uut sih uh, bang diinga ja uut kiit na hi viai? Nanguh zong a nungjui hih na uut uh maw?” chiin adawng hi.
Hujiahin amah hahtaaiin ataai va, “Nang Amah nungjui na hi a, keiuh chu Mosi nungjuite ka hi uh.
Pathian in Mosi kawmah thu asoi chih ka he uh, hizongleh Hi Pa ahihleh khoi apat a hung ahih ka he sih uh,” achi uhi.
Amahpa’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Khoi apat a hung ahih na heetlouh uh, hikhu mah ahi athumahna, Ama’n lah ka mit ahung suhvaahsah ngaala,
Pathian in misualte thu angaikhe ngei sih chih i he uhi. Hizongleh mi koipouh Pathian bia a, a deihjawng bawl chu Pathian in angaikhe veu hi.
Khovel um tuung akipan koima’n mittawa piang a mit asuhvaahsah chih akija ngei sih.
Hi Pa Pathian apat ahihlouh inchu, bangmah abawl thei sih diing,” achi hi.
Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Nang sual lumlet a piang in keiuh na hung hilh vial maw?” achi uhi. Huin amah chu anohdohta uhi.
Amah anohdoh uh chih Jesu’n aja a, huleh amah amuhin a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na gingta ei?” achi hi.
Ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Ka gintaat theihna diingin, Lalpa, Amah koi ahiai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Amah na muta a, nang hung houpihpa ahi,” achi hi.
Huin ama’n, “Lalpa, ka gingta hi,” achi a, huin bohkhupin Amah abeta hi.
Huleh Jesu’n, “Muthei loute’n ahung muh theihna diing uh leh mitvaahte mit ahung tawt theihna diingin vaihawm diingin khovel ah ka hung ahi,” achi hi.
A kawma um Pharisai khenkhatte’n hi thute ajaah tahun a kawmah, “Keiuh zong mittaw ka hi viaimah?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mittaw hileh uh chin sualna neilou diing hi uh chin a; hizongleh tuin, ‘Ka mu thei uh,’ na chi uhi. Hujiahin na sualna uh aum zing hi.
“Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kotkhaah a luut loua lam tuama kal a, belaam huang a luut chu guta leh suammang ahi.
Hizongleh koipouh kotkhaah a luut chu belaampu ahi.
Amah chu kotkhaah ngaahpa’n anahonsah a, belaamte’n a aw aja uhi. Huleh ama’n belaamte chu a min un akou a, apuidoh veu hi.
Huleh a belaamte apawtdohsah chiangin a ma vah apai a, a aw aheet jiahun belaamte’n a nung ajui uhi.
Midang chu ajui sih diing va, ataaimangsan jaw diing uhi, ajiahchu midang aw ahe thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
Hi tehkhinthu Jesu’n a kawmvah asoi a, hizongleh amah un a kawmva bang thu ahiai asoi chih ahe sih uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, kei belaam kotkhaah chu ka hi.
Ka ma a hung pai zousiah chu gutate leh suammangte ahi uh, hizongleh belaamte’n a thu uh angai sih uhi.
Kei kotkhaah chu ka hi, koipouh keimah a aluut leh, hutdamin aum diing a, huleh luutin apawt diing a, neeh diing amu diing hi.
Guta chu gu diing leh that diing leh suse diing loungaalin ahung sih. Kei chu amah un hinna a neihna diing uh leh tamtah aneihna diingva hung ka hi.
“Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi, belaampu hoih in a belaamte diingin a hinna apia hi.
Hizongleh kiloh, belaampu hilou, belaam neitu hilou in chu ngei hung amuh chiangin belaamte anusia a, ataai veu hi; huleh ngei in amahuh aman a asudalh veu hi.
Kiloh chu ataai veu hi kiloh ahih jiahin, huleh belaamte angaihsah sih hi.
“Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi, huleh ka belaamte ka he a, amah un zong kei ahung he uhi.
Pa’n kei ahung heet bangin ke’n zong Pa ka he hi; huleh belaamte diingin ka hinna ka pia hi.
Huleh hi belaam huang a lou belaam dang ka nei hi; amahuh zong ka hung pui diing a, ka aw aja diing va, huleh belaampu khat toh hon khat ahung hi diing uhi.
Hujiahin ka Pa’n ahung lungsiat hi, laah kiit diinga ka hinna ka piaah jiahin.
Koima’n ahung laahsah ahi sih a, ka thuin ka pia ahijaw hi. Piaah theihna leh laah kiit theihna thu ka nei hi. Hi thupiaah ka Pa apat ka muta hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin hi thute jiahin Judate lahah kikhenna aum kiitta hi.
Hizongleh a lahva tampi’n, “Dawipaai ahi, angol ahi, bang diinga Amah thu ngaikhia na hi viai?” achi uhi.
Adangte’n, “Hi thu kisoite dawipaai mi thusoi ahi sih, dawi in mittaw mit asuvaah thei eimah?” achi uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem a Latna Kuut lai ahi a, phalbi lai ahi.
Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah Solomon Innliim ah avaah lehleh hi.
Hujiahin Judate Amah kiimveel ah ahung va, a kawmah, “Bangtan ahiai lungawpkaia na hung koih diing? Khrist na hih leh, chiangtahin hung hilh in,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka hung hilhta a, na gingta sih uh. Ka Pa min a ka natohte’n ka tanchin ahung heetpih uhi.
Hizongleh na kawmva ka soitaah bangmahin ka belaamte na hihlouh jiahun na gingta sih uhi.
Ka belaamte’n ka aw aja uh, ke’n amahuh ka he a, amah un ahung jui uhi.
Huleh keima’n a kawmvah kumtuang hinna ka pia hi, kumtuangin amangthaai sih diing va, koima’n ka khut apat ahung laahsah thei sih diing hi.
Ka Pa, amahuh kei hung pepa mi zousiah saangin alianjaw hi. Koima’n ka Pa khut apat ahung laahsah thei sih diing hi.
Kei leh Pa chu khat ka hi uh,” achi hi.
Huin Judate’n a sehna diingun suang ala kiit uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Nna hoih tampi ka Pa akipanin nanguh ka hung musah a, hu natohte laha khoipeen jiahin ahiai suang a na hung seh tum uh?” achi hi.
Judate’n adawng va, “Natoh hoih jiahin suang in seh ka hung tum uh ahi sih, hizongleh Pathian na soisiat jiah leh nang Mihing hi ngaala, Pathian banga na kibawl jiahin ahijaw,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Na daan vah, ‘“pathiante na hi uh,” ka chi,’ chih gelh hilou ahiaimah?
Pathian thu tunnate bawn pathiante chih ahihleh (Pathian Lehkhathu koima’n asuse thei sih diing hi),
‘Pathian Tapa ka hi’ ka chih jiahin Pa in asuhsiang a khovel a asawlpa tungah, ‘Pathian na soisia’ na hung chi uh ahi maw?
Ka Pa natohte ka toh louh leh, hung gingta sih un.
Hizongleh ka toh a ahihleh, kei hung gingta sih mahzongleh uh chin, natohte gingta un, Pa keimah ah aum a, kei Amah ah ka um chih na heet va, na gintaat theihna diingun,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Amah mat atum kiit va, hizongleh a khut vapat akiheem khia hi.
Huin Johan in achiil a baptis abawlna mun, Jordan gaal ah achiah kiit a, hutah ah ava-umta hi.
Huleh mi tampi a kawmah ahung va, “Johan in chiamchihna bangmah bawl anei sih a, hizongleh hi Pa tungtaanga Johan in asoi zousiah adih veh hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh hutah ah mi tampite’n Amah agingta uhi.
Huleh Mari leh a sanggamnu Martha teenna Bethani khua a mi khat Lazar kichi chu achina hi.
Hu Mari chu Lalpa thau namtuui nuh a, a sam a a keeng siahsahnu ahi a, a sanggampa Lazar chu achina hi.
Hujiahin a sanggamnute’n Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, ngai in, na lungsiatpa achina hi,” chiin mi asawl uhi.
Jesu’n hu thu ajaahin, “Hi natna chu sihna diing hial ahi sih a, hizongleh hi jiaha Pathian Tapa paahtawia aum theihna diinga Pathian loupina diing ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n Martha leh a sanggamnu leh Lazar alungsiat hi.
Huchiin Lazar achina chih ajaahin aumna mun mah ah ni nih aum nalai hi.
Huzohin Ama’n nungjuite kawmah, “Judia gam ah i chiah kiit diing uh,” achi hi.
Nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Rabbi, tuma deuh mahin Judate’n suang in seh ahung tum va, hutah ah chiah na sawm kiit maw?” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Suun khat sungin daahkaal sawmlenih aum sih eimah? Mi koi zong suun a apai inchu, hi khovel vaah amuh jiahin akisui ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh amah a vaah aum louh jiahin, mi koi zong jaan a apai inchu, akisui veu hi,” achi hi.
Hi thute asoi zohin a kawmvah, “I lawmpa uh Lazar a-ihmuta a, hizongleh a ihmutna apat phawng diingin ka chiah diing,” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuite’n, “Lalpa, ihmu ahih inchu, adamkiit na diing hi,” achi uhi.
Ahiinlah Jesu’n Lazar sih thu asoi ahi a, hizongleh amah un ihmu a khawldam thu soi hiin angaihtuah uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n chiantahin a kawmvah, “Lazar asita hi.
Huleh na gintaat theihna diingun, nanguh vaanga hutah a ka um louh ka kipaah hi. Hizongleh a kawmah i chiah diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Thomas Diduma kichipa’n a nungjui hihpihte kawmah, “Amah toh i sih khawm theihna diingin eiuh zong i chiah diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin Jesu ahung tunin Lazar chu haan ah ni li ana-umta chih ahung he hi.
Bethani chu Jerusalem kho kawm naih, kilometar thum veela gamla ahi.
Huleh Martha leh Mari chu a sanggampa uh sihna tunga hehneem diingin Judate tampi a kawmvah ahung uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu ahung chih ajaah tahin Martha chu achiah a, Amah avalamtuaah a, hizongleh Mari chu inn sungah atou nalai hi.
Huin Martha in Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, hitaha um hilehchin chu, ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a,
hizongleh tuin zong Pathian kawma na nget photmah Pathian in ahung pe diing chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Na sanggampa athou kiit diing hi,” achi hi.
Martha in a kawmah, “Ni tawpni a thohkiitna ah athou kiit diing chih chu ka he hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Kei thohkiitna leh hinna ka hi. Koipouh kei hung gingta chu si mahzongleh ahing diing hi.
Huleh koi hizongleh hing a huleh kei hung gingta photmah chu kumtuangin bangchihtanin asi sih diing hi. Hikhu na gingta ei?” achi hi.
Amahnu’n a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa, nang chu Khrist, Pathian Tapa khovel a hung diingpa chu na hi chih ka gingta hi,” achi hi.
Huchia asoi zohin achiah a, a sanggamnu Mari chu a guuhin akou a, “Houtupa ahung a, ahung kou,” achi hi.
Mari in hu ajaahin kintahin athou a, a kawmah ahung hi.
Jesu chu khosung ahung tung nai sih a, Martha in avalamtuaahna mun ah aum nalai hi.
Huin Judate, inn sunga amah hehneema amah toh umte’n Mari chu kintaha thoua pawtdoh amuh tahun, “Haan ah kap diingin achiah,” chiin a nung ajui uhi.
Huin Mari in Jesu umna mun ahung tun a, Amah amuhin a keengbul ah apuuh a, a kawmah, “Lalpa hitaha um hilehchin chu ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Mari kap a, amah toh hung Judate zong kapa um Jesu’n amuhin hagau in amaau a, amangbangta hi.
Huleh, “Amah khoiah na sial viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, hung inla, en in,” achi uhi.
Jesu akapta.
Hujiahin Judate’n, “Endih vua, lungsiat hina mei e!” achi uhi.
Khenkhat in, “Hi Pa, mittawte mit suhvaahsahpa’n hi pa zong silousah theilou adiai?” achi uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu chu a lungsim a maau kiitin haan ah ahung a, haan chu kohawm ahi a, suang a sit ahi.
Jesu’n, “Suang ladoh un,” achi hi. Misipa sanggamnu Martha in a kawmah, “Lalpa, tuin chu auihta diing hi, ajiahchu a sihna ni li ahita hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Na gintaat a ahihleh, Pathian loupina na mu diing, na kawmah ka chi sih eimah?” achi hi.
Huin amah un misi umna apat suang chu aladoh va, huleh Jesu chu avaandaah a, “Pa, ka thu na ngaihkhiah jiahin na tungah ka kipaah hi.
Huleh na hung ngaikhe zingzing chih zong ka he hi, hizongleh ka kiim a ding mipite jiahin hikhu ka chi hi, huchia nangma’n na hung sawl ahi chih agintaat theihna diingun,” achi hi.
Huin hute asoi zohin aw ngaihtahin, “Lazar, hung pawtdoh in,” chiin akikou hi.
Huin misi chu a khut a keeng haan puan a kituamin ahung pawtdoh a; a maai chu puan a tuam ahi hi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Phel unla, paisah un,” achi hi.
Huchiin Mari kawma hung, Jesu silmah bawl mu Judate laha tampite’n Jesu agingtata uhi.
Hizongleh khenkhat chu Pharisaite kawmah achiah va, Jesu silbawlte avahilh uhi.
Hujiahin siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n vaihawmtute akoukhawm va, “Bang i lohta diai? Ajiahchu Hi Pa’n chiamchihna tampi abawl hi.
Hichibanga i hahzan un chu, mi zousiah in Amah agingta diing va, huleh Romte ahung diing va, i mun leh i nam ahung laahsah diing uh,” achi uhi.
Huin a lahva mi khat, hu kum a siampu lalpeen Kaiapha in a kawmvah, “Bangmacha na he sih uh,
i nam pumpi aman louhna diinga mipi luanga mi khat asih eiuh diingin ahoih chih zong na ngaihtuah sih uh,” achi hi.
Hichu ama’n amah phuaahthuhin asoi ahi sih hi; hizongleh hu kum a siampu lalpeen ahih jiahin hu nam diinga Jesu asih diing asoilawh ahi.
Huleh hu nam chauh hilouin, Pathian ta kithehdalhte zousiah pawl khat a apuikhawm theihna diingin zong ahi.
Hujiahin hu ni apatin Amah thahna diing ngaihtuahin akihou khawm zingta uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu chu Judate lahah alangtangin avaah nawn sih a, hizongleh hu apat a gamdaai naih lamah Ephraim kichi khopi khat ah achiah a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh aum zingta uhi.
Huleh Judate Chiahkaan Kuut chu ahung naita a, mi tampite gam apatin kisusiang diingin Jerusalem ah Chiahkaan Kuut hun main achiah tou uhi.
Huin amah un Jesu ahawl va, Pathian biahinn a ding kawmin akihou va, “Bangchiin na ngaihtuah viai? Kuut a hung lou diing adiai?” achi uhi.
Siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n Amah amat theihna diingun mi koipouh in a umna aheet leh, asoi lat diing ahi chih thu apeta uhi.
Hujiahin Chiahkaan Kuut umna diing ni guup main Jesu chu misi lah apat akaihthoh Lazar umna Bethani khua ahung tung hi.
Hujiahin hutah ah Jesu diingin nitaah an abawl va, Martha in neeh abawl a, hizongleh Lazar chu Amah toh ankuang uumte laha khat ahi.
Huin Mari in spainard thau namtuui man tamtah litra khat ahung tawi a, Jesu keeng anuh a, a sam in a keengte chu asiaah a, huleh thau gim in inn chu ajeelsuaahta hi.
Huleh nungjuite laha khat, Amah mansah diingpa Juda Iskariot, Simon tapa in,
“Bang diinga hi thau gimtuui dinari za thum a juaaha gentheite kawma kipelou ahiai?” achi hi.
Hichu ama’n gentheite akhawhsahpih jiah hilouin, guta ahi a, dangka-ip akol a, a sunga kikoih alaah veu jiahin asoi ahijaw hi.
Huin Jesu’n, “Ka kivui ni a diinga ama’n akoih theihna diingin amahnu subuai sih un.
Ajiahchu migentheite na kawmvah aumzing va, hizongleh kei chu na kawmvah ka umzing sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Judate tampi in Amah hutah ah aum chih aheta va, Jesu jiah chauh hilouin, misi lah apat akaihthoh Lazar zong amuhnop jiahun ahung uhi.
Hizongleh Lazar zong athah theihna diingun siampu lalte chu akihou uhi.
Ajiahchu amah jiahin Judate tampi apaimang va, Jesu agingtata uhi.
Ajiingni in kuut a hung mi tampite’n Jesu Jerusalem ah ahung diing ahi chih ajaah tahun,
tuum nahte atawi va, Amah lamtuaah diingin apawtdoh uhi. Huleh, “Hosanna! ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi!’ Israelte Kumpipa ngeei chu!” achi uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n sabiltung tal gual khat amu a, a tungah atuang hi;
“Lau sin, Zion tanu, en in, na Kumpipa chu sabiltung talgual tunga tuangin ahung hi,” chia gelh bangin.
Nungjuite’n hi silte a tuungin ahesiam sih uhi; hizongleh Jesu paahtawia aum nungin hi thute Amah tungtaanga kigial ahi a, huleh a tungah hi silte abawl uh ahi chih ahung hedohta uhi.
Hujiahin haan apat Lazar akouhdoh a, misi lah apat akaihthoh laia a kawma umte’n a thu aheetpih uhi.
Hikhu jiahin mipite’n zong hi chiamchihna abawl chih ajaah jiahun Amah analamtuaah uhi.
Hujiahin Pharisaite akihou va, “Bangma na loh thei sih uh chih na he viai? En un, khovel in Amah ajuita hi!” chiin.
Huleh Pathian be diinga kuut a hungte lahah Grikmi hon khat aum va,
hujiahin amahuh chu Galili gam a Bethsaida khua a um Philip kawmah ahung va, “Pu, Jesu muh ka uut uh,” chiin angeen uhi.
Philip chu ahung a, Andru ahilh a, Andru leh Philip in Jesu ahilh uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Mihing Tapa paahtawia aumna diing hun atungta hi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, buhtang khat lei a akiaah a, asih louh leh, a ngenin aum zing hi; hizongleh asih inchu, tampiin agah veu hi.
Koipouh a hinna iit in ataan diing a, huleh koipouh hi leitung a a hinna hua in kumtuang hinna dongin ahuumbit diing hi.
Koipouh in ka nna atoh leh, hung jui heh; huleh ka umna ah ka suaahpa zong aum diing ahi. Mi koipouh in ka nna atoh leh, ka Pa in amah akipaahpih diing hi.
“Tuin ka hinna amangbang hi, bang ahiai ka soi diing? ‘Pa, hi hun lahah hung hunkhia in,’ ka chi diing adiai? Himahleh hikhu diing jiaha hi hun a hung ka hi ngaala.
Pa, na min paahtawi in,” achi hi. Huin vaan apat aw ahung suaah a, “Ka paahtawita a, ka paahtawi kiit diing hi,” chiin.
Hujiahin a kawma ding mipi leh hukhu jate’n vaan ging ahi, achi va; adangte’n lah, “Angel in Amah ahoupih ahi,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Hi aw chu kei diinga hung suaah ahi sih a, nanguh diinga hung suaah ahijaw hi.
Tu chu hi khovel vaihawm lai ahi, hi khovel lal chu tuin paihkhiah ahi diing hi.
Huleh kei chu lei apat khaikaanga ka um leh, mi zousiah ka kawmah ka hiip diing hi,” achi hi.
Hichu Ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai asih diing chih heetsahna a asoi ahi.

Mipite’n Amah adawng va, “Khrist chu kumtuangin aum zing diing chih daan thu apat ka ja uhi. Bangchidaana nang in, ‘Mihing Tapa khaikaanga aum ngeei diing ahi,’ na chih ahiai? Mihing Tapa chu koi ahiai?” achi uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hun tomchakhat vaah na lahvah aum hi. Vaah na neih laiun mial in ahung lap louhna diingin khohei un; ajiahchu koipouh mial a khohei in khoilama pai ahih ahe sih hi.
“Vaah tate na hung hih theihna diingun vaah na neih laiun vaah chu gingta un,”achi hi. Hi thute Jesu’n asoi zohin apawt a, amahuh apat akibuta hi.
Hizongleh a ma vah chiamchihna tampi bawl zongleh Amah agingta tuan sih uhi.
Zawlnei Isai in, “Lalpa, ka thusoi uh koi in ahiai gingta? Huleh LALPA khut zong koi kawmah ahiai akilat?” chia asoi ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
Hujiahin agingta thei sih uh, ajiahchu Isai in,

“Ama’n a mit va amuh theihlouhna diingun a mit uh asuhtawtsah a, a lungtang va aheetsiam louhna diingun a lungtang uh asuhkhauhsah ahi, huchilou inchu a lungtang un ahesiam diingva ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, huchiin ke’n amahuh ka na suhdam kha diing hi,” achi kiit hi.
Hi thute chu Isai in Lalpa loupina amuh laia asoi ahi a, huleh Amah tungtaang thu asoina ahi.
Ahihvaangin vaihawmtu lamkaite lahah zong tampi’n Jesu agingta va, hizongleh Pharisaite jiahin Amah asoiphuang ngam sih uhi; huchilou inchu sinagog apat nohdohin aum kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu amah un Pathian kipaahpiha um saangin mihingte kipaahpiha um adeihjaw uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu chu akikou a, “Koipouh kei hung gingta chu, kei hung gingta ahi sih a, ahung sawlpa gingta ahijaw hi.
Huleh koipouh kei hung mu chu ahung sawlpa mu ahi.
Koipouh ahung gingta chu mial a aum zing louhna diingin vaah diinga khovel a hung ka hi.
“Mi koipouh in ka thusoite jain gingta sih mahzongleh, ke’n ka vaihawm sih hi; ajiahchu khovel vaihawm diinga hung ka hi sih a, khovel hundam diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
Koipouh kei hung deihlou a, ka thusoite zong pomlou in siamlouhtangsahtu khat anei hi, ka thusoite mahmah in ni tawpni chiangin amah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
Ajiahchu keimah phuaahtawmin ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa, kei hung sawlpa’n ka soi diing leh ka hilh diing thu ahung pia hi.
Huleh a thupiaah chu kumtuang hinna ahi chih ka he hi. Hujiahin ka soi pouhmah chu Pa in ka kawma asoi bangin ka soi ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Chiahkaan Kuut main, Jesu’n hi khovel apat paimanga Pa kawma achiah diing hun ahung tungta chih aheet tahin, khovel a um a mite chu analungsiatta a, amahuh chu a tawp tanin alungsiat hi.
Huin nitaah an neeh laiin diabol in Simon tapa Juda Iskariot lungtang ah Jesu matsah diing angaihtuahsah zouta hi.
Jesu’n Pa in sil bangkim a khut ah apeta chih leh Pathian apat a hung a, Pathian kawma chiah kiit diing ahih daan hein,
nitaah an uumlaiin ading a, a puansilh akoih a, kisiaahna puan lain ateeng hi.
Huleh kisilna kuang sunga tui asun zohin a nungjuite keeng asilsah a, kisiaahna puan ateen in asiaah jui peh hi.
Huin Simon Peter kawmah ahung a, Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, nang in maw ka keeng na sil diing?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Ka silbawl nang tuin na he sih a, hizongleh tunung chiangin na hung he diing hi,” achi hi.
Peter in a kawmah, “Ka keeng na sil hial sih diing,” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Ka hung sil louh leh, ka kawmah tan bangmah na nei sih diing,” achi hi.
Simon Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, ka keeng chauh hilouin, ka khut leh ka lu zong hung sil in,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Koipouh kisilsa in a keeng loungaal sil amamoh sih hi; huleh nanguh chu na siang uhi, hizongleh na bawnun chu hilouin,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n amansah diingpa ahe a, hujiahin “Na bawnva siang veh lou na hi uh,” achih ahi.
Huchiin a keeng uh asil zoh a, puansilh la a, atou kiit zohin a kawmvah, “Na tungva ka silbawl bang ahiai na he viai?
Nang un kei chu Houtupa leh Lalpa na hung chi va, na hung chi dih ngeei uh, ajiahchu ka hi him ahi.
Kei, Lalpa leh Houtupa in na keeng uh ka sil leh, nanguh zong khat leh khat keeng na kisilsah diing uh ahi.
Na tungva ka bawl banga na bawlna diingun na etton diing uh ka hung pia ahi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, suaah chu a pu saangin alianjaw sih a, huleh thupotu zong a sawltu saangin alianjaw sih hi.
Hi silte hein bawl hileh uh chin, mihampha na hi diing uhi.
“Na bawnva thu ka soi sih, ka teelte ke’n ka he hi; hizongleh huchu ‘Ka tanghou nepa ngeei in ka tungah a khetuul alehta hi,’ chih Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtun theihna diing ahi.
“Ahung tun chianga Amah ka hi chih na gintaat theihna diingun ahung tun main tuin ka hung hilh ahi.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh ka mi sawl taphot pom chu kei hung pom ahi; huleh koipouh kei hung pom in ahung sawlpa apom ahi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n hi asoi zohin a lungsim amangbang a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na lahva khat in ahung mansah diing,” chiin ahesahta hi.
Nungjuite’n koipeen ahiai asoi chih helouin akientuah uhi.
Huleh a nungjuite laha khat, Jesu’n alungsiatpa chu Jesu aanga kingaiin aum hi.
Hujiahin Simon Peter in koi thu ahiai asoi chih dong diingin amah chu mitmei in ahoupih hi.
Huin Jesu kawma nungjui kingaipa’n a kawmah, “Lalpa, koipeen ahiai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Tanghou them ka diah a, ka piaah peenpeen chu amah ahi,” achi hi. Huin tanghou them adiah zohin Simon tapa Juda Iskariot kawmah apia hi.
Huleh tanghou them apiaah zohin Setan chu a sungah aluutta a, Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na bawl diing chu kintahin bawl in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh dohkaan kiim a toute koimah in bang chihna a hu thu a kawma asoi ahiai chih ahe sih uhi.
Ajiahchu Juda in dangka-ip akol jiaha Jesu’n a kawma, “Kuut a i mamoh diing silte lei in,” chi ahihlouhleh gentheite kawma bang aha khat apiaah diing chi aha hiin a lahva khenkhat in angaihtuah uhi.
Huin tanghou them alaah zohin amah chu apawtdoh pah a, hu hun chu jaan ahi.
Hujiahin Juda apawtdoh nungin Jesu’n, “Tuin chu Mihing Tapa paahtawiin aumta, huleh Pathian zong Amah ah paahtawiin aum hi.
Amah a Pathian paahtawia aum inchu, Pathian in Amah ngeei ah Amah apaahtawi diing a, apaahtawi pahngaal diing hi.
“Ta deihtahte, tomchakhat na lahvah ka um tadih hi. Nang un na hung hawl diing va, Judate kawmah, ‘Ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ ka chih mahbangin, tuin na kawmvah ka chi ahi.
Thupiaah thah na kawmvah ka hung pia hi, khat leh khat kilungsiat un; ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
Khat leh khat na kilungsiat uh leh, mi zousiah in ka nungjuite na hi uh chih ahe diing uhi,” achi hi.

Simon Peter in Amah kawmah, “Lalpa, khoiah ahiai na chiah diing?” achi hi. Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Ka chiahna diing ah tuin na hung jui thei sih diing uh, himahleh tunung chiangin na hung jui thei diing uhi,” achi hi.
Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, bangjiahin ahiai tua ka hung juih theih louh diing? Nang diingin ka hinna ka pe diing hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Keimah jiahin na hinna na pe diing maw? Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nangma’n thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl main aah akhuang sih diing hi.
“Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih un, Pathian na gingta uh, kei zong hung gingta un.
Ka Pa inn ah umna tampi aum; umlou hileh, ka hung hilhta diing hi. Ajiahchu nanguh diinga mun bawla chiah diing ka hi.
Huleh ka chiah a, nanguh diinga mun ka bawl leh, ka hung kiit diing a huleh ka umna a nanguh zong na um theihna diingun ka kawmah nanguh ka hung la diing hi.
Khoia ka chiah diing na he va, a lampi zong na he uh,” achi hi.
Thomas in a kawmah, “Lalpa, khoia na chiah diing ka he sih uh, a lampi bangchiin ka he diviai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Kei lampi leh thutah leh hinna chu ka hi. Keimah a pailouin koimah Pa kawm atung ngei sih hi.
Kei hung he hileh uh chin, ka Pa zong na heta diing uh; huleh tu apat Amah na he va, muh zong na muta uhi,” achi hi.
Philip in a kawmah, “Lalpa, Pa chu keiuh hung musah in, huchiin keiuh diingin ahuntawh diing,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Philip, hi tan veipi na kawmah ka um a, huchiin zong na hung he nai sih maw? Koipouh kei hung mu in Pa amu ahi, bangchidaana ‘Pa chu keiuh hung musah in,’ na chih ahiaimah?
Kei Pa ah ka um a, Pa kei ah aum chih gingta lou na hiaimah? Na kawmva ka thusoite, keimah thu in ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa kei a um in, nna atong hi.
Kei Pa ah ka um a, Pa kei ah aum chih hung gingta un, ahihlouhleh silbawlte jiah beeh in hung gingta un.
Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kei hung gingta in chu ka silbawlte ama’n zong abawl ve diing hi; ka Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin, hite saanga loupijaw zong abawl diing hi.
Tapa a Pa chu paahtawia aum theihna diingin, ka min a na nget photmah uh, huchu ka bawl diing hi.
Ka min a bangpouh na nget un chu, ka bawl diing hi.
“Kei na hung lungsiat uh leh, ka thupiaahte jui un.
Huleh na kawmva kumtuanga um diingin Pa ka ngeen diing a, Ama’n Panpihtu dang ahung pe diing hi,
khovel in aneih theih louh thutah Hagau ngeei chu, ajiahchu Amah amu sih va, he zong ahe sih uhi; ahihvaangin nang un chu Amah na he uh, ajiahchu na kawmvah aum a huleh na sungvah aum diing hi.
Tagah bangin ka hung nuse sih diing a, na kawmvah ka hung diing hi.
Tomchakhat nungin khovel in kei ahung mu nawn sih diing hi, hizongleh nang un chu na hung mu diing uhi. Kei ka hing jiahin, nanguh zong na hing diing uhi.
Hu ni chiangin kei ka Pa ah ka um a, nanguh kei ah na um uh chih leh kei nanguh ah ka um chih na he diing uhi.
Koipouh ka thupiaahte nei a, jui chu kei hung lungsiat ahi. Huleh koipouh kei hung lungsiat chu ka Pa lungsiatin aum diing a, ke’n amah ka lungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka kisulang diing hi,” achi hi.
Iskariot hiloupeen Juda in a kawmah, “Lalpa, keiuh kawmah kisulang a, khovel kawma na kisuhlat louh diing bangchidaan ahiai?” achi hi
Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung lungsiat leh, ka thu ajui diing hi; huleh ka Pa’n amah alungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka hung diing va, amah toh ka umkhawm zing diing uhi.
Koipouh ahung lungsiat louin ka thusoite ajui sih hi; thu na jaahte uh keimah a ahi sih a, Pa kei hung sawlpa a ahijaw hi.
“Na kawmva ka um taahdih sungin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Hizongleh Pa’n ka min a ahung sawl diing Panpihtu, Hagau Siangthou in sil zousiah nanguh ahung hilh diing a, huleh thu na kawmva ka soisa photmah nanguh ahung hedohsah diing hi.
Hamuanna ka hung nuutsiat hi, ka hamuanna ka hung pia hi; khovel in apiaah bangin ke’n nanguh ka hung pe sih. Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih unla, lau zong lausah sih un.

“‘Ka chiahmang diing a, na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing,’ chia na kawmva ka soi na jata uhi. Kei na hung lungsiat un chu, ‘Pa kawmah ka chiah diing,’ ka chih jiahin na nuam diing uh, ajiahchu ka Pa kei saangin alianjaw hi.
A hun atun chianga na gintaat theihna diingun tuin ahung tun main ka hung hilhta hi.
Tu kalsiah na kawmvah thu tampi ka soi nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu hi khovel vaihawmtu ahung hi, ama’n keimah ah bangmah anei sih hi.
Hizongleh khovel in keima’n Pa ka lungsiat ahi chih aheet theihna diingun, Pa in ahung thupiaah bangin ka bawl ahi. Thou un, hi apatin i chiah diing uhi.
“Kei grepgui dihtah chu ka hi, huleh ka Pa chu a huan enkoltu ahi.
Keimah a baa gahlou photmah chu alamang veu a, agah tam seem theihna diingin agah photmah chu ahahsiang veu hi.
Tuin nanguh chu na kawmva ka thusoi tungtawnin na siangzouta uhi.

Keimah ah um ngiitngeet un, kei zong nanguh ah ka um ngiitngeet diing hi. Baa in grepgui a aum ngiitngeet louhngaal leh, amah ngen a agah theih louh mahbangin, nanguh zong keimah a na um ngiitngeet louh uh leh na gah thei sih diing uhi.
“Kei grepgui chu ka hi, nanguh a baate na hi uh, koipouh keimah a aum ngiitngeet leh, kei amah a ka um ngiitngeetnapa chu tampi in agah veu hi; ajiahchu keimah louin bangma na bawl thei sih uhi.
Mi koipouh keimah a aum ngiitngeet louh leh, baa bangin paihdohin aum a, avuai veu hi; huleh mite’n amahuh atomkhawm va mei ah apaai va, akaang veu uhi.
Keimah a na um ngiitngeet va, huleh ka thu zong nanguh a aum ngiitngeet inchu, na uut-uut uh na ngeen diing va, huchu ahung kibawlsah diing hi.
Tampi a na gahna vah, ka Pa paahtawiin aum hi; huchiin ka nungjuite na hi diing uhi.
“Pa’n kei ahung lungsiat bangin ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat hi; ka lungsiatna ah um ngiitngeet un.
Ke’n ka Pa thupiaahte ka juih a, a lungsiatna a ka um ngiitngeet mahbangin, nang un ka thupiaahte na juih uh leh, ka lungsiatna ah na um ngiitngeet diing uhi.
Ka kipaahna nanguh a aumden theihna diing leh na kipaahna uh abukim theihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiat un, chih hi ka thupiaah ahi.
Mi’n a lawmte diinga a hinna apiaah saanga lianjaw lungsiatna koima’n anei sih hi.
Thu ka hung piaah photmah na bawl un chu, ka lawmte na hi diing uhi.
Suaahte ka hung chi nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu suaah in a pu in bang abawl ahe sih hi; lawmte ka hung chi jawta diing hi, ajiahchu ka Pa kawma ka jaah zousiah na kawmvah ka hung hesahta hi.

Nang un kei na hung teel sih va, hizongleh chiah a gah diing leh na gah uh umzing diingin ke’n nanguh ka hung teelin ka hung guatjaw hi, huchia ka min a Pa kawma na nget photmah uh ahung piaah theihna diingin.
Hi thute ka hung pia hi, khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
“Khovel in nanguh ahung huat leh, nanguh ahung huat main kei ahung haw zouta chih he un.
Khovel a hileh uh chin, khovel in amah a alungsiat diing hi. Hizongleh khovel a hilou a, khovel apat a ka hung teeldoh na hihjawh jiahun khovel in nanguh ahung hua ahi.

‘Suaah a pu saangin alianjaw sih,’ chih na kawmva ka thusoi hezing un. Amah un kei ahung suhduhdah un chu, nanguh zong ahung suduhdah diing uhi; ka thusoite ajuih uh leh, na thusoite uh zong ajui diing uhi.
Hizongleh ahung sawlpa aheet louh jiahun ka min jiahin hi silte zousiah na tungvah abawl diing uhi.
Kei hung loua a kawmva thu soi lou hileng, sualna neilou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu a sualna uh ngaihdamna diing aneita sih uhi.
Koipouh kei hung hua in ka Pa zong ahua ahi.
Midang koima bawl ngeilouh natohte a lahva bawllou hileng, sualna neilou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu muh zong ahung muta va, huleh kei leh ka Pa ka nih un hua zong ahung hua uhi.
Hizongleh hichu, ‘Amah un ajiah beiin ahung mudah uh,’ chih a daanbu va kigial thu ataangtunna diinga hung um ahi.
“Hizongleh Pa kawm apat na kawmva ka hung sawl diing, Pa apat hung pawt, Panpihtu, thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin, Ama’n ka tanchin ahung heetpih diing hi.
Huleh achiil apat a ka kawma um na hih jiahun nanguh zong heetpihtuin na pang diing uhi.
“Kipalpuuhsaha na um louhna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Sinagogte ah ahung nohdoh diing va; ahi, koipouh nanguh hung that in Pathian natong banga akingaihtuah hun uh ahung tung diing hi.
Huleh Pa leh kei ahung heet louh jiahun hi silte na tungvah abawl diing uhi.
Hizongleh ahun ahung tun chianga hute ka hung hilhta chih na heetdohna diingun hi silte nanguh ka hung hilhta ahi. Na kawmva ka um jiahin hi thute achiil in na kawmvah ka soi sih hi.
“Hizongleh tuin chu ahung sawlpa kawma chiah diing ka hi a, koimah in, ‘Khoia chiah diing na hiai?’ chiin na hung dong sih uhi.
Hizongleh hi thute na kawmva ka soi jiahin na lungtang uh lungkhamna in adimta hi.

Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh hi, nanguh diingin ka chiahmang ahoihjaw hi; ajiahchu ka chiahmang louh leh, Panpihtu na kawmvah ahung sih diing hi; ka chiah inchu, na kawmvah Amah ka hung sawl diing hi.
Amah ahung tun chiangin sualna lam leh dihtatna lam leh vaihawmna lam tungtaang ah khovel siamlouh daan ahesah diing hi.
Kei ahung gintaat louh jiahun sual thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
Ka Pa kawma chiah a, na hung muh nawn louh diing jiahun, dihtatna thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
Hi khovel lal chu vaihawmsaha aumtaah jiahin vaihawmna thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
“Na kawmvah soi diing tampi ka nei a, hizongleh tuin na po zou nai sih uhi.

Hizongleh thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin Ama’n nanguh thutah zousiah he diingin ahung pui diing hi; ajiahchu Ama’n phuaahthuh in thu asoi sih diing a, hizongleh ajaah photmah chu asoi jaw diing hi; huleh sil hung tung diingte ahung musah diing hi.
Ama’n kei ahung paahtawi diing hi, ajiahchu kei a ala diing a nanguh ahung musah diing hi.
Pa sil neih zousiah kei a ahi. Hujiahin Ama’n keimah a ala diing a, nanguh kawmah ahung phuangdoh diing ka chi hi.
“Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin tomchakhat nung chiangin nang un na hung mu nawn sih diing uh, huleh tomchakhat nung chiangin na hung mu kiit diing uhi,” achi hi.

Huin a nungjuite khenkhat in, “‘Tomchakhat nung chiangin kei na hung mu nawn sih diing uh; huleh tomchakhat nung chiangin kei na hung mu kiit diing uhi,’ achih khu toh, ‘Pa kawm a ka chiah diing jiahin,’ i kawma achih khu bang achihna adiai?” chiin akihou uhi.
Hujiahin amah un, “Hi a thusoi, ‘Tomchakhat nung chian,’ achih bang achihna ahiai? i he sih uh,” achi uhi.

Huchiin Amah adong nuam uh chih Jesu’n ahe a, a kawmvah, “‘Tomchakhat nung chian na hung mu nawn sih diing uh; huleh tomchakhat nung chian na hung mu kiit diing uh,’ chia ka soi na kidongtuah uh ahi maw?

Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nanguh na kap diing va, na maau diing uh, hizongleh khovel akipaah diing; nanguh chu na lunggim diing va, hizongleh na lunggimna uh kipaahna suaahsah ahi diing hi.
Numei in a nau avei laiin na athuaah hi; hizongleh ahun atuntaah jiahin mihing khat khovel a ahung pian kipaahna jiahin nau asuaah zoh tahin hu hahsatna chu ahe nawn sih hi.
Hujiahin tuin lunggimna na nei uh ahi; hizongleh nanguh ka hung mu kiit diing a, na lungtang uh akipaah diing a, huleh na kipaahna uh koima’n ahung laahsah sih diing hi.
Hu ni chiangin nang un bangmah na hung dong sih diing uhi. Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ka min a Pa kawma na nget photmah uh Ama’n nanguh ahung pe diing hi.
Tutanin ka min in bangmah na ngeen nai sih uhi. Na kipaahna uh akimna diingin, ngeen un, na mu diing uhi.
“Hi thute etsahna in na kawmvah ka soi ahi; hizongleh etsahna a na kawmva thu soi nawn lou a, Pa tungtaang chiantaha ka hung heetsah diing hun tung diing ahita.
Hu ni chiangin ka min in na hung ngeen diing uh, huleh nanguh diingin Pa kawmah ka ngeen diing ka chi ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu nang un kei na hung lungsiat va, Pathian apat hung ka hi chih na gintaat jiahun Pa ngeei in nanguh ahung lungsiat hi.
Pa apat hung a khovel a hung ka hi. Huleh khovel nusia a Pa kawma chiah kiit diing ka hi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Ngai in, tuin chu etsahna in na soi sih a, chiantahin na soita hi.
Tuin chu silbangkim na he a, koimah in ahung dot na kiphamoh sih chih ka hechianta uhi. Hikhu jiahin Pathian akipan a hung pawt na hi chih ka gingta uhi,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Tuin na gingta uh maw?
Ngai un, a hun ahung tung diing ahi, tuin zong atungta, mi chin na inn chiat vah na kithehdalh diing va, ka ngenin na hung nuse diing uhi. Ahihvaangin Pa ka kawma aum jiahin ka tang ka hi sih hi.
Keimah a hamuanna na neihna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi. Khovel ah gimthuaahna na nei uh, hizongleh hamuangtahin um un, ke’n khovel ka zouta hi,” achi hi.
Hi thute Jesu’n asoi zohin, vaanlam aentou a, “Pa, a hun atungta; na Tapa paahtawi in, na Tapa’n zong nangmah ahung paahtawi theihna diingin.
Nangma’n mi na hung piaahte tunga thuneihna na hung piaah bangin, mi na hung piaah zousiah tungah kumtuang hinna ka pe diing hi.
Huleh hichu ahi kumtuang hinna, nang Pathian tah chauh leh na sawl Jesu Khrist aheet theihna diing uh chu.
Leitung ah ka hung paahtawita a, bawl diinga na hung piaah nna ka tong zouta hi.
Tuin aw Pa, khovel um ma a na kawma ka neih loupina toh, nang ngeei toh hung paahtawi khawm in.
“Khovel apat a na hung piaahte kawmah na min ka sulangta hi. Amahuh nang a ahi va, kei kawmah na hung pia a, huleh na thu ajuita uhi.
Nangma’n ka kawma na hung piaahte photmah nangmah apat ahi chih tuin aheta uhi.
Ajiahchu nang in thu na hung piaahte a kawmvah ka peta hi; huleh amah un apomta va, tahzetin nang apat a hung ka hi chih aheta uh; huleh na hung sawl ahi chih agingtata uhi.
Amahuh diingin ka ngetsah hi. Khovel a diingin ka ngetsah sih hi, hizongleh nang in na hung piaahte diingin ka ngetsah jaw hi, ajiahchu amahuh nang a ahi uhi.
Kei a zousiah nang a ahi a, nang a zousiah kei a ahi, huleh amah vah paahtawiin ka um hi.

Tuin kei khovel ah ka um nawn sih diing a, hizongleh hite khovel ah aum diing va, huleh kei na kawmah ka hung diing hi. Pa siangthou, ei pumkhat i hih mahbanga amahuh zong pumkhat ahih theihna diingun, nang na hung piaahte na min in keem in.
Khovel a amahuh toh ka um sungin ka kawma na hung piaahte na min in ka keem hi. Amahuh ka keemta a, Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtun theihna diingin mangthang tapa loungaal khat beeh amangthang sih uhi.
Tuin na kawmah hung diing ka hita, huleh amahuh a ka kipaahna abukim theihna diingin hi silte khovel ah ka soi ahi.
Na thu amahuh ka peta a, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mahbanga amahuh khovel a ahihlouh jiahun, khovel in amahuh ahua hi.
Amahuh khovel apat a lamang diingin ka hung ngeen ahi sih a, hizongleh migiloupa apat veeng diingin ka hung ngeen ahijaw hi.
Amahuh khovel a ahi sih uh, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mahbangin.
Na thutah in amahuh koihsiangthou in, na thu chu thutah ahi.
Kei khovel a na hung sawl mahbangin, ke’n zong amahuh khovel ah ka sawl hi.
Thutah a amahuh zong suhsiangthou ahih theihna diingun, amahuh jiahin ka kisusiangthou hi.
“Hite a diing chauhin ka ngeen sih a, hizongleh a thu jiahva kei hung gingta diingte a diingin zong ka hung ngeen hi,

huchia pumkhat ahih theihna diingun, Pa, nang keimah a na um a, kei nangmah a ka um banga amahuh zong eimah a pumkhat ahih theihna diingun; huleh nang in na hung sawl chih khovel in agintaat theihna diingin.
Huleh ei pumkhat i hih banga amahuh zong pumkhat ahih theihna diingun nang in na hung piaah loupina amahuh ka peta hi:

kei amahuh ah, nang kei ah, huchia amahuh kipumkhat-a suhbukim ahihtheihna diingun, huleh khovel in nang in kei na hung sawl chih aheetna diing leh kei na hung lungsiat banga khovel in amahuh alungsiat theihna diingin.
“Pa Aw, kei na hung piaah loupina amah un amuh theihna diingun, kei na hung piaahte zong ka umna a kei toh aum diing uh ka deih hi; ajiahchu khovel siam ma pehin kei na hung lungsiatta hi.
Aw Pa dihtat, khovel in nang ahung he sih a, hizongleh ke’n chu ka hung he hi; huleh nang na hung sawl chih hite’n aheta uhi.
Huleh keimah na hung lungsiatna a kawmva aum theihna diing leh kei amahuh a ka um theihna diingin, a kawmvah na min ka hesahta a, ka hesah jeel diing hi,” achi hi.
Jesu’n hi thute asoi zohin a nungjuite toh Kidron Luuita gaal ah achiah va, hutah ah huan khat aum a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh aluut uhi.
Huleh amansahpa Juda in zong a mun ahe hi, Jesu a nungjuite toh hu lamah avaah veu uh chih aheet jiahin.
Huin Juda in siampu lalte leh Pharisaite apat biahinn veengtu houtute leh sepaih pawl puiin thaumeite leh meiselte leh gaalvante tawiin hutah ah ahungta hi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a tunga siltung diing zousiah hein apawtdoh a, a kawmvah, “Koi ahiai na hawl uh?” achi hi.
Amah un adawng va, “Nazareth Jesu,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei ka hi,” achi hi. Huleh amansahpa Juda zong ading hi.
Huin, “Kei ka hi,” achih tahin anungtawl va, lei ah apuuh uhi.
Huin Ama’n, “Koi ahiai na hawl uh?” chiin adong kiit hi. Amah un, “Nazareth Jesu,” achi uhi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Kei ka hi chiin ka hung hilhta hi. Hujiahin kei hung hawl na hih uh leh, hi mite chiahsah un,” achi hi.
Huchiin, “Nang na hung piaahte khatmah zong ka mangsah sih hi,” chia Ama’n asoi ataangtun theihna diingin.
Huin Simon Peter in naamsau khat anei a, azandoh a, siampu lalpeen suaahpa asaat a, a bil jiatlam asaatkhiahsah hi. Hu suaahpa min chu Malka ahi.
Huin Jesu’n Peter kawmah, “Na naamsau a paai ah siat in. Ka Pa’n nou ahung piaah chu ka dawn sih diaimah?” achi hi.
Huin sepaih pawlte leh sepaih houtu leh biahinn veeng houtute’n Jesu chu aman va, akaan uhi.
Amasapeenin Anna kawmah apui uhi, ajiahchu amah hu kum a siampu lalpeen Kaiapha sungpa ahi.
Huleh Kaiapha chu mipite luanga mi khat sih ahoihjaw hi, chia Judate kawma hilhpa ahi.
Huleh Simon Peter in Jesu ajui a, huchibangmahin nungjui dang khat in zong ajui hi. Hu nungjuipa chu siampu lalpeen meelheet ahi a, siampu lalpeen innhuang sungah Jesu toh aluut khawm hi.
Hizongleh Peter chu polam ah kotkhaah bul ah ading hi. Huin nungjui khatpeen, siampu lalpeen meelheetpa chu avapawt a, kotkhaah ngaahnu kawmah asoi a, Peter ahung puiluut hi.
Huchiin kotkhaah ngaah suaah nungaahnu’n Peter kawmah, “Nang zong hi Pa nungjuite laha khat hilou na hi maw?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Ka hi sih,” achi hi.
Huleh suaahte leh houtute hutah ah ading va, avot jiahin suangmeihol achih va, a-awi uhi. Huleh Peter in zong amahuh toh ding khawmin mei a-awi hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen in Jesu kawmah a nungjuite tungtaang leh a thuhilhna tungtaang adong hi.
Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Alangtangin khovel kawmah thu ka soi a, Judate umkhawm zingna sinagogte leh Pathian biahinn ah thu ka hilh zing a, aguuhin bangmah ka soi sih hi.
Bang diinga nang un kei hung dong na hi viai? Ka thusoi jate kawmah dong un, ngai un, amah un ka soi ahe uhi,” achi hi.
Hutobang asoi zohin a kawma ding houtute laha khat in Jesu abeeng a, “Siampu lalpeen bang huchiin na dawng maw?” achi hi.
Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Thu dihlou ka soi leh, ka dihlouhna hung hesah in; hizongleh ahoih ka soi leh, bang diinga hung beeng na hiai?” achi hi.
Huin Anna in Amah chu kaansain siampu lalpeen Kaiapha kawmah asawlta hi.
Simon Peter in chu dingin mei a-awi hi. Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Nang zong nungjuite laha khat hilou na hi maw?” achi uhi. Ama’n akiheetmohbawl a, “Ka hi sih,” achi hi.
Peter in a bil asaatkhiahsahpa sanggam, siampu lalpeen suaahte khat in, “Huan ah Amah toh na um khawm uh ka hung mu sih eimah?” achi hi.
Peter in akiheetmohbawl kiit a, huleh aah akhuang pahta hi.

Huin amah un Jesu chu Kaiapha inn apat Praitoriam ah apuita va, huchu jiingkaal matah ahi; huleh amahuh chu Praitoriam sungah aluut sih uhi, huchilou inchu akisubuaah kha diing va, Chiahkaan an ane thei sih kha diing uhi.
Pilat chu a kawmvah ahung pawt a, “Hi Pa heehna bang ahiai na neih uh?” achi hi.
Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Amah migilou hi sih leh, na kawma hung pekhe het lou diing ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
Huin Pilat in a kawmvah, “Pui unla, na daan dungjuiun vaihawmsah un,” achi hi. Judate’n a kawmah, “Keiuh diingin mi suhlup daan ahi sih hi,” achi uhi.
Hichu bangchibanga asih diing thu Jesu’n asoi ataangtun theihna diingin ahi.
Huin Pilat chu Praitoriam sungah aluut kiit a, Jesu akou a, a kawmah, “Judate Kumpipa na hi maw?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Hikhu nangmah lungsim a suaah na soi ahiai? Ahihlouhleh midang in ka tungtaang thu ahung hilh ahiai?” achi hi.
Pilat in adawng a, “Kei Juda mi ka hiaimah? Na chipihte leh siampu lalte’n nang ka kawmah ahung pekhia uhi. Bang ahiai na bawltaah?” achi hi.

Jesu’n adawng a, “Ka lalgam hi khovel a ahi sih. Ka lalgam hi khovel a hitaleh, Judate khut a piaahkhiah ka hih louhna diingin ka suaahte’n adou diing uhi; hizongleh ka lalgam chu hitah ahi nai sih hi,” achi hi.

Hujiahin Pilat in a kawmah, “Ahihleh kumpipa na hi maw?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Kumpipa na chih chu ka hi. Huleh hikhu diinga piang ka hi a, thutah heetpih diinga khovel a hung ka hi. Koipouh thutah a hi photmah in ka aw aja uhi,” achi hi.
Pilat in a kawmah, “Thutah chu bang ahiai?” achi hi. Huleh hikhu asoi zohin Judate kawmah apawt kiit a, a kawmvah, “Amah ah dihlouhna ka mu het sih hi.
Hizongleh Chiahkaan Kuut ni a mi khat ka hung hahdohsah diing ahi chih tawndaan khat na nei uhi. Hujiahin Judate Kumpipa hung hahdohsah leng na uut viai?” achi hi.
Huin a bawnun, “Hi Pa hilouin, Barabba jawh!” chiin akikou uhi. Barabba ahihleh suammang ahi.
Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu chu puiin ajeepta hi.
Huleh sepaihte’n ling lukhuh aphan va, a lu ah akhuhsah va, puan sandup asilhsah uhi.
Huin, “Chibai, Judate Kumpipa!” achi va, a khut un abeeng uhi.
Huin Pilat chu apawt kiit a, a kawmvah, “En un, Amah ah dihlouhna ka mu sih chih na heetna diingun na kawmvah ka hung puidoh hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Jesu chu linglukhuh khuh leh puan sandup silhin ahung pawtdoh a, Pilat in a kawmvah, “En un, a Mihing chu!” achi hi.

Huin siampu lalte leh houtute’n Amah amuh tahun, “Kros ah kilhbeh in, Kros ah kilhbeh in,” chiin akikou uhi. Pilat in a kawmvah, “Nang un pui unla, kros ah kilhbeh un, ajiahchu keima’n Amah ah dihlouhna ka mu sih hi,” achi hi.
Judate’n amah adawng va, “Daan khat ka nei uh, Pathian Tapa a akibawl jiahin ka daan dungjuiun Amah chu sitaah ahi,” achi uhi.
Hujiahin Pilat in hu thu ajaah tahin alau seemta hi.
Huleh Praitoriam ah aluut kiit a, Jesu kawmah, “Khoia hung kuan na hiai?” achi hi. Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng sih hi.
Hujiahin Pilat in a kawmah, “Ka kawmah thu na soi sih maw? Kros a kilhbeh theihna leh hahkhiah theihna nei ka hi chih helou na hiaimah?” achi hi.
Jesu’n adawng a, “Tunglam akipan piaah hi sih lehchin, ka tungah bangmah bawl theih na nei sih diing hi. Hujiahin na kawma kei hung pekhepa in sualna anei lianjaw hi,” achi hi.

Hu nungsiah Pilat in hahdohna diing lampi ahawl a, hizongleh Judate’n, “Hi Pa na chiahsaha ahihleh, Kaisar lawm na hi sih hi. Koipouh amah leh amah kumpi a kibawl chu Kaisar dou ahi,” chiin akikou uhi.
Hujiahin Pilat in hu thu ajaah tahin Jesu ahung puidoh a, huleh vaihawmna touphah, Suanglep kichi, hizongleh Hebrai haam a Gabbatha kichi tungah atou hi.
Huleh hu ni chu Chiahkaan Kuut ni diinga Kisahkhawl ni ahi a, daah guupna veelin ama’n Judate kawmah, “En un, na Kumpipa uh!” achi hi.

Hizongleh amahuh chu akikou va, “Sumang in, sumang in, kros ah kilhbeh in,” achi uhi. Pilat in a kawmvah, “Na Kumpipa uh ka kilhbeh diing maw?” achi hi. Siampu lalte’n, “Kaisar loungaal kumpi dang ka nei sih uh,” chiin adawng uhi.
Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu chu kros a kilhbeh diingin a kawmvah apekheta a, sepaihte’n Jesu chu atu va, apuita uhi.
Huleh Amah chu a kros kipuaahin Luguh mun kichi, Hebrai haam a Golgotha kichi mun ah achiah a,
hutah ah Amah chu midang nih toh kros ah akilhbehta va, a gei geel ah khat tuaah, Jesu alai ah.
Huleh Pilat in heetsahna khat agial a, kros tungah ataah a, akigial chu: NAZARETH JESU, JUDATE KUMPIPA, chih ahi.
Huchiin Jesu akilhbehna uh khopi naih ahih jiahin hu heetsahna chu Judami tampite’n asim uhi. Huleh hichu Hebrai haam, Grik haam leh Latin haam a kigial ahi.
Huin Judate siampu lalte’n Pilat kawmah, “‘Judate Kumpipa,’ chiin gial sinla, ‘Amah in, “Judate Kumpipa ka hi” achi,’ chiin gial jaw in,” achi uhi.
Pilat in adawng a, “Ka gelhzoh chu, ka gelhzoh ahi mei,” achi hi.

Huin Jesu chu kros a akilhbeh zohun sepaihte’n a puansilhte ala va, khat chiat a atan diingun phel li asuah va, huleh a puannaah zong ala uhi; a puannaah chu akhuina bei ahi a, a ngawng apat apuma gat veh ahi.

Hujiahin amah un, “I botkeeh sih diing a, kuan tang diing ahiai ai i saan diing uh,” chiin akihou uhi. Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Ka puansilhte a lahvah ahawm va, ka silhleteen diingin ai asaan uhi,” achih ataangtunna diingin. Hujiahin hi silte sepaihte’n abawl uhi.
Huleh Jesu kros kawmah a nu leh a nu sanggamnu, Kleopa ji Mari leh Mari Magdalini ading uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a nu leh nungjui alungsiatpa a kawma ding amuh tahin, a nu kawmah, “Numei, en in, na tapa!” achi hi.
Huin a nungjuipa kawmah, “En in, na nu,” achi hi. Hu hun apatin hu nungjuipa’n amahnu chu a inn ah apuita hi.
Hi nungin Jesu’n sil bangkim tuin bawlzoh veh ahita chih hein Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtunna diingin, “Ka dang ataah,” achi hi.
Hutah ah beel uain thuuh a dim khat akitung a, spanji khat uain thuuh in asudim uhi. Huleh hussop chiang in ataah va, a kam ah akoihtou uhi.
Huin Jesu’n uain thuuh achep zohin, “Zoh ahita,” achi hi. Huin a lu akuun a, a hagau ahahta hi.

Huleh Kisahkhawl ni ahih jiahin a luangte uh Sabbath ni a kros dawn a aum louhna diingin Pilat kawmah a keengte uh suhgawpsah a, a luang uh lamang diingin angeen uhi, ajiahchu Sabbath ni chu ni loupi ahi.
Hujiahin sepaihte ahung va, akikilhbehpih masapeenpa leh a khatpa a keeng uh asuhgawpsah uhi.
Hizongleh Jesu kawm ahung phaah tahun Amah anasi zouta chih ahung muh un, a keengte asuhgawpsah sih uhi.
Hizongleh sepaihte laha khat in teipi in a naah asun a, hutah ah sisan leh tui ahung pawtdoh pah hi.
Huleh hikhu mupa’n aheetpihta a, a sil heetpih chu adih ahi; huleh na gintaat theihna diingun ama’n thutah asoi hi chih ama’n ahe hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in, “A guh khat zong suhgawp ahi sih diing,” achih chu ataangtun theihna diingin hi silte ahung umta ahi.
Huleh Pathian Lehkhathu dang in, “Amah un asutpa uh aen diing uh,” achi hi.

Hi nungin Joseph, Arimathia mi, Jesu nungjui, hizongleh Judate alauh jiaha aguuha juipa in, Jesu luang alaah theihna diingin Pilat kawmah avangeen a, Pilat in anaphal hi. Hujiahin amah chu ahung a, Jesu luang alata hi.
Huleh Nikodem, a tuung a jaan a Jesu kawma hung pa zong ahung a, murrah leh aloe thau litra za khat veel ahung tawi hi.
Huin Jesu luang ala va, Judate kivui ngeina bangin silgimtuui toh puan malngaat in atuam uhi.
Huleh kros a akilhbehna mun vah huan khat aum a, hu huan ah haan thah khat koimah kivui ngeilouhna aum hi.
Huchiin Judate Kisahkhawl ni ahih jiah leh haan anai jiahin hutah ah Jesu chu asialta uhi.
Huin hapta ni masapeen in, jiingkaal khua mial nalaiin Mari Magdalini chu haan ah ahung a, huleh haan apat suang kiladoh amuta hi.
Huin ataai a, Simon Peter leh Jesu’n alungsiat nungjui khatpeen kawmah ahung a, a kawmvah, “Haan apatin Lalpa alamangta va, khoitaha akoih uh akihe sih,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Peter chu apawtdoh a, nungjui dang khatpeen toh, haan lam juanin ahung uhi.
Huchiin anihun ataai khawm va, nungjui khatpeen in Peter amakhelh a, haan ahung tung masa hi.
Ama’n kuunin aen a, puan malngaat amu a, ahihvaangin a sungah aluut sih hi.
Huleh Simon Peter chu a nungin ahung tung a, haan sungah aluut a, puan malngaatte amu hi.
Huleh a lu tuamna puan chu puan malngaat toh umkhawm lou a, atuama kijiala mun khat a um amu hi.
Huin haan tung masa nungjui dangpeen zong a sungah aluut a, amu a agingtata hi.
Ajiahchu amah un misi lah apat Amah athoukiit diing ahi chih Pathian Lehkhathu ahe nai sih uhi.
Huin nungjuite chu a inn lamvah achiah kiitta uhi.
Hizongleh Mari chu haan pua ah kapin ading a, huleh akah pumin akuun a, haan sung aen a,
huleh Jesu luang kisialna mun ah puanvaam silh angel nih, khat a lu lamah, khat a keeng lamah touin amu hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Numei, bang diinga kap na hiai?” achi uhi. Amahnu’n a kawmvah, “Ka Lalpa alamangta va, huleh a koihna uh ka heet louh jiahin ahi,” achi hi.
Huchia asoi zohin akinunghei a, Jesu ding amu a, hizongleh Jesu ahih ahe sih hi.

Jesu’n a kawmah, “Numei, bang diinga kap na hiai? Koi ahiai na hawl?” achi hi. Amahnu’n huan veengtupa sain a kawmah, “Pu, hitah apat Amah na puaahmang ahihleh, na koihna hung hilh in, huchiin ka la diing,” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Mari!” achi hi. Amahnu chu akihei a, a kawmah, “Rabboni!” achi hi, (huchu, Houtupa chihna ahi).

Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hung tuzing sin, ajiahchu ka Pa kawmah ka chiahtou nai sih hi; hizongleh ka unaute kawmah chiah inla a kawmvah, ‘Ka Pa leh na Pa uh, ka Pathian leh na Pathian uh kawmah ka chiahtou diing hi,’ vachi in,” achi hi.
Mari Magdalini chu ahung a, nungjuite kawmah Lalpa amuh thu leh hi silte Ama’n a kawmah asoi hi chih ahilhta hi.
Hu ni mah, hapta ni masapeen nitaah in, Judate lau jiaha nungjuite umna kotte akikhaah nungin Jesu ahung a, a laivah ading a, a kawmvah, “Na tungvah hamuana um heh,” achi hi.
Huchia asoi zohin a khutte leh a naah chu a kawmvah alah a, hujiahin nungjuite’n Lalpa amuh tahun akipaahta uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Na tungvah hamuanna um heh! Ka Pa’n ahung sawl mahbangin nanguh zong ka hung sawl hi,” achi kiit hi.
Hikhu asoi zohin a tungvah huu ahaihkhum a, a kawmvah, “Hagau Siangthou tangta un.
Koi sualna zong na ngaihdam phot uh ngaihdam ahi diing a; koi sualna zong na ngaihdam louh phot uh ngaihdam louh ahi diing,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Thomas, Diduma kichi, sawmlenihte laha khat chu Jesu hung laiin a kawmvah aum sih hi.

Hujiahin nungjui dangte’n a kawmah, “Lalpa ka muta uh,” achi uhi. Hizongleh ama’n a kawmvah, “A khut siihkilhna pawnte ka muh a, siihkilhna pawn sunga ka khutzung ka guan a, huleh a naah a ka khut ka thun louh leh, ka gingta sih diing,” achi hi.
Huleh ni giat nungin nungjuite inn sungah aum kiit va, Thomas zong a kawmvah aum hi. Huin kot kikhaah hi ngaalin Jesu ahung a, a laivah ading a, “Na tungvah hamuanna um heh,” achi hi.
Huin, Ama’n Thomas kawmah, “Na khutzung in hung sawh inla, ka khutte en in, huleh na khut in baan inla, ka naah sawh in, gingta louin um sinla, gingtata in,” achi hi.
Thomas in adawng a, a kawmah, “Ka Lalpa leh ka Pathian!” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Thomas, nang in chu na hung muh jiahin na gingta ahi a, muloua gingtate ahampha uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh hi lehkhabu a kigial lou chiamchihna dang tampi Jesu’n a nungjuite ma ah abawl hi.
Hizongleh hite chu nang un Jesu chu Khrist, Pathian Tapa ahi chih na gintaatna diing uh leh na gintaat jiahva a min a hinna na neihna diingva kigial ahi.
Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Tiberia Diil ah, a nungjuite kawmah akilaah kiit a, hitobangin akilaah hi:
Simon Peter toh, Thomas, Diduma kichi toh, Galili gam a Kana khua a um Nathanael toh, Zebedi tate toh, huleh a nungjui dang nih umkhawn ahi uhi.

Simon Peter in a kawmvah, “Ngamanin ka chiah diing,” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Keiuh zong na kawmah ka hung diing uh,” achi uhi. Huin achiahdoh va, kuang khat sungah atou pah va, hu jaan in bangmah aman sih uhi.
Hizongleh jiingkaal ahung hihin Jesu chu diil pangah ading a, ahihvaangin nungjuite’n Jesu ahi chih ahe sih uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Naute, neeh diing bang aha na nei viai?” achi hi. Amah un, “Nei lou,” chiin adawng uhi.
Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kuang jiatlam ah sep leh uh chin, na man diing uh,” achi hi. Huin amah un asep va, huchiin nga atam mahmah jiahin akaidoh zouta sih uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu’n a lungsiatpa’n Peter kawmah, “Lalpa ahi,” achi hi. Huin Simon Peter in Lalpa ahi chih ajaah tahin a puannaah tungnung asilh a (ajiahchu saguaaha um ahi), huin diil ah atawmluutta hi.
Huleh nungjui dangte chu leen a nga awhte kai kawmin, kuang neu khat in ahung uhi, ajiahchu piaugaw apat gamlataha um ahi sih va, fi t za thum giap ahi.
Huin piaugaw ahung tun tahun amah un suangmeihol kichih leh a tunga nga leh tanghou kikoih amu uhi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tua na nga matte uh khenkhat hung tawi un,” achi hi.
Simon Peter chu achiah tou a, nga lianpipi za leh sawmngaa leh thum a dim leen chu piaugaw ah ahung kaidoh hi. Huchilawma tam hizongleh leen chu akeeh sih hi.
Jesu’n a kawmvah, “An hung ne un,” achi hi. A nungjuite’n Lalpa ahi chih aheet jiahun koimah in, “Koi na hiai?” achi ngam sih uhi.
Hujiahin Jesu ahung a, tanghou ala a, a kawmvah apia a, hutobangmahin ngate zong apia hi.
Huchu Jesu’n sihna apat athohkiit nunga a nungjuite kawma akilaah a thumveina ahi.

Huchiin an aneeh zohun Jesu’n Simon Peter kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, hite saangin kei na hung lungsiat jaw ei?” achi hi. Ama’n a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n, “Ka belaamnoute vaah in,” achi hi.

Jesu’n anihveina in a kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, na hung lungsiat ei?” achi hi. Simon in a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka belaamte ching in,” achi hi.

Jesu’n a thumveina in a kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, na hung lungsiat ei?” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawma thumvei, “Na hung lungsiat ei?” achih jiahin Peter chu alungkham hi. Huin ama’n a kawmah, “Lalpa, nang in sil zousiah na he a; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka belaamte vaah in.

Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na naupan laiin nang leh nang na kawng na kigaah a, na uutna lamlam ah na chiah veu hi. Hizongleh na hung upat chiangin chu na khut na jaah diing a, midang in ahung gaah diing a, na uutlouhna lamlam ah ahung pui diing hi,” achi hi.
Hichu Ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai ama’n Pathian apaahtawi diing chih heetsahna diinga asoi ahi. Huleh hikhu asoi zohin Ama’n a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
Huleh Peter akinunghei a, Jesu’n alungsiat nungjuipa in amahuh hung juiin amu hi. Hi pa chu nitaah an neehna a Jesu aang a kingaai a, “Lalpa, koi ahiai nang hung mansah diing?” chipa ahi.
Peter in amah amuh tahin Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, hi pa bangchi diing ahiai?” achi hi.
Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka hung masiaha amah um diinga ka deih leh, hukhu nang diingin bang ahiai? Nang hung jui in,” achi hi.

Hujiahin hu nungjuipa chu asi sih diing chiin unaute lahah hi thu kisoi chu athang vengvungta hi. Jesu’n lah a kawmah amah asi sih diing, achi sih a, hizongleh, “Ka hung masiaha amah um diinga ka deih leh, hukhu nang diingin bang ahiai?” chi ahijaw hi.
Hi silte heetpih leh gelhtu chu hi nungjuipa ahi a, huleh a heetpihna chu adih ahi chih ka he uhi.
Huleh Jesu’n abawl sildang tampi zong aum hi. Hute gelh kim veh diing hitaleh, lehkhabu kigial diingte chu khovel in zong dawllou diingin ka ngaihtuah hi. Amen.
Aw Theophil, tuma a ka lehkhabu ah, Jesu silbawl leh a thuhilhte zousiah,
ateeltuam apostolte kawma Hagau Siangthou tungtawna thupisaahte apiaah zoh a, vaan lam a laahtouha aum ni tan tanchin ka hung gialta hi.
Hu apostolte kawmah gentheihna athuaah nungin heetchianna tamtah toh apostolte kawmah hingin Amah akiensah a, ni sawmli zet a kawmvah akilaah a, Pathian lalgam thu asoi zing hi.
Amahuh toh akimuhkhawmna khat ah, Ama’n Jerusalem nuse lou diingin, hizongleh Pa silchiam khu ana-ngaah diingin thu apia a, “Hu ka soi na ja uhi;
ajiahchu Johan in tui ah abaptis ngeei a, hizongleh nanguh chu ni sawtlou sungin Hagau Siangthou in baptis-in na um diing uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un ahung kikhop tahun a kawmah, “Lalpa, tuin ahiai Israelte kawma lalgam na tunding kiit diing?” chiin adong uhi.
Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pa’n a hun leh a ni Amah thuthu a um diinga aguat chu, nang un na heet diing uh ahi sih hi.

Hizongleh na tungva Hagau Siangthou ahung tun chiangin silbawltheihna na nei diing uhi; huchiin Jerusalem ah, Judia leh Samaria gam zousiah ah, huleh khovel kawlmong tanpha in zong ka thu heetpihtute na hi diing uh,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n hi thute asoi zohin, amuh ngeeiun vaan a puitouhin aum a; meilum in amuh phaahlouh vah apuitouta hi.
Apai touh lai a, amah un vaan lam aetzing laiun, en in, mi nih puan vaam silhin a kawmvah ahung ding va;

hute’n chu, “Nanguh Galili gam a mite bang diinga vaan lam en zinga ding na hi viai? Hi Jesu na kawm vapat a vaan a puitouha um hi, vaan a achiah na muh mahbangun, Amah ngeei ahung kiit diing hi,” achi uhi.
Huin Olive kichi taang apatin Jerusalem ah akihkiitta va; huchu Jerusalem kawm ahi a, Sabbath ni a chiah theihna tan ahi.
Huleh a umna uh pindan tungnung a chiahtouin aluut va, hutah a umte chu Peter, Jakob, Johan, Andru, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomai, Mathai, Alphai tapa Jakob, Simon Zelot leh Jakob tapa Juda ahi uhi.
Amahuh chu numeite leh Jesu nu Mari toh, a sanggamte toh lungsim munkhat puain phatuamngaitaha ngetsah leh haamteiin aum zing uhi.
Hu hun laiin Peter chu nungjuite lai ah ading a (a bawnun za leh sawmnih veel ahi va),
“Ulenaute, Hagau Siangthou in Jesu mantute lamkaipa Juda thu David kam a anasoilawh hi Pathian Lehkhathu khu ahung taangtung diing mawng ahi;
ajiahchu, amah hi i lahva simtel anahi a, huleh hi natohna ah tanvou ananei hi.”
(Hi pa’n a dihtatlouhna man in gam khat alei a, a bungbuin akia a, alai ah apawhkeeh a, a gil zousiah apawt vehta hi.
Hu thu chu Jerusalem a umte zousiah in anahe va, huchiin hu gam chu amahuh haam in Akeldama, achi uhi, huchu Sisan Mun, chihna ahi.)
“Ajiahchu Phatna Late ah hi thu gelh ahi, ‘A teenna hawmsuaah henla, a sungah kuamah teeng sih heh’; huleh ‘A natohna mun midang in tang heh,’ chih ahi.
Hujiahin, Lalpa Jesu i lahva hun chintenga aum lai hun zousiah a,
Johan baptisma apat i lah vapat vaan a puitouha aum ni tanpha a ahung na kithuahpihte laha mi khat, a thohkiitna hung theihpihtu diing aum ngeeingeei diing ahi,” achi hi.
Huin mi nih aguat uhi: Joseph, Barsaba kichi, Jasta chiha zong akouhpa uh leh Matthia ahi uhi.
Huleh ahaamtei va, “Nang, Lalpa, mihing zousiah lungtang hetu, mi nihte laha kua jaw ahiai na teel, hung hesah in,
hichu Juda in amah mun azot theihna diinga apuuhsansa natohna leh apostol hihna mun chu luah diingin,” achi uhi.
Huleh ai asaansah va, a aisaan uh chu Matthia tungah atu a; huchiin amah chu apostol sawmlekhatte toh simtel ahita hi.
Huleh Pentikost ni ahung tun tahin, lungsim munkhat puain a bawnun mun khat ah aum khawm uhi.
Huleh thakhatin vaan akipanin thawm ging, huihpi nasatah nung bangin ahung um a, hukhu in chu a touna inn uh asudim veh hi.
Huleh meikuang lei tobangte chu amah leh amah kihawmkhenin a kawmvah ahung kilang a, a tung chiat vah ahung umta hi.
Huleh a bawnun Hagau Siangthou in adimta va, Hagau in ahaamsah bangjeelin haam dang in ahung haam panta uhi.
Vaan nuai a jaat zousiah lah apat Pathian ngaihsah Juda haw Jerusalem ah aum uhi.
Huleh hu ging ajaah tahun mipi ahung kikhawm va, huleh ahaam uh mi zousiah in amahuh haam chiat a ajaah jiahun limdang asa uhi.
A bawnun amangbang va, thumah asa mahmah va, akihoutuah va, “Endihvua hia haam haw zousiah Galili gam a mi ngen hilou ahi uh maw?
Bangchidaan ahiai i bawnva i pianpih haam a i jaah chiat uh?
Khenkhat Parthiate, Mediate, Elamte, Mesopotamia gam a teengte, Judia leh Kappadosia, Ponta leh Asia,
Phrigia, Pamphilia, Aigupta, huleh Kureni kho kawm veela Libya gam a umte i hi va, huleh khenkhat Rom khua apat hung zinte, Judate leh Juda sahkhua a kiheite,
Krit mite leh Arab mite bang i hi ngaal va, hizongleh Pathian silbawl loupite asoi uh eimah haam chiatin i ja uh,” achi uhi.
Huleh a bawnun thumah asa va, angaihna ahe sih va, “Bangchihna ahita ei?” achi uhi.
Khenkhat in anuihsan va, “Uain thah kham hi uh e,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Peter chu sawmlekhatte toh ading khawm a, aw ngaihtahin a kawmvah asoi a, “Nanguh Judia mite leh Jerusalem a um zousiahte haw, hi thu he unla, ka thu zong ngai un.
Ajiahchu amah un na gintaat bangun akham sih uhi, daah thumna ahi pan hi.
Hizongleh hite zawlnei Joel in anasoi chu ahi:

‘Pathian in, ni nunungte ah hichi ahung hi diing, mi zousiah tungah ka Hagau ka leih diing a, na tapate leh na tanute un zawlnei bangin thu asoi diing va, na tangvaalte un kilaahna amu diing va, huleh na teehsete un mang aman diing uhi.
Huleh hu hun chiangin ka suaahpate leh ka suaahnute tungah zong ka Hagau ka leih diing a, zawlnei bangin thu asoi diing uhi.
Huleh tunglam vaan ah sil loupite, nuailam lei ah chiamchihnate ka musah diing a, sisan leh mei leh meikhu lompi toh.
LALPA Ni chijaathuai leh loupi chu ahung tun main, ni chu suhmial ahi diing a, ha chu sisan suaahsah ahi diing hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi diing a, LALPA min kou photmah chu hutdamin aum diing hi,’ achih bangin.

Nanguh Israel mite, hi thute ngai un, Nazareth Jesu chu Pathian in Amah zanga na lahva silmahte, silloupite leh chiamchihna abawlte apatin Pathian kipaahpih Mi ahi chih ahesah hi, huchu nang un zong na he uhi;
Amah chu Pathian lemguat mawng leh heetlawh bangin piaahkhiah ahi a, misualte khut in kros ah na kilhbeh va, na sulumta uh;
sihna tuuhden gual ahihlouh jiahin Amah chu Pathian in sihna natna phelsahin, akaithouta hi.
Ajiahchu David in a tungthu asoi a: ‘LALPA chu bangchihlaipouhin ka ma ah ka mu zing a; suhliinga ka um louhna diingin Amah chu ka jiatlam ah aum hi.
Hujiahin ka lungtang akipaah a, ka lei zong anuam a; hulou ah ka tahsa zong kineemtahin ahing diing hi.
Ajiahchu ka hagau Misi Khua ah na nuse sih diing a, na Misiangthou chu muatna mu diingin na phal saam sih diing hi.
Nangmah in hinna lampi na hung hesah a, na ma ah kipaahna in na hung sudim zing diing,’ chiin.
Ulenaute, nampa David thu hi kimuangtahin na kawmvah ka soi thei hi. Amah chu asi a, vui zong avuita va, a haan zong tuni tanin i kawmvah aum nalai hi.
Hujiahin zawlnei ahihjiah leh Pathian in kichiam a amah kawma thu anachiamta tahsa daana amah tahsa ngeei chihaah, a laltouphah a tou diingin Khrist akaithou diing chih atheih jiahin,
ama’n hichu anamulawh a, Khrist thohkiit diing thu asoi ahi, Khrist hagau Misi Khua ah nuutsiatin aum sih a, a tahsa in zong muatna amu sih hi, chiin.
Hi Jesu chu Pathian in akaithou kiitta a, huchu ka bawnun heetpihtute ka hi uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian khut jiatlam a paahtawia aum zohin, huleh Pa apat chiamsa Hagau Siangthou amuh zohin, Ama’n tua na muh uh leh na jaah uh chu ahung leih ahi.
Ajiahchu David chu vaan ah akaltou sih a, hizongleh amah ngeei in, ‘LALPA’N ka Lalpa kawm ah, “Ka jiatlam ah tou in,
na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah, achi hi,” achi jaw hi.’
Hujiahin hi Jesu na kilhbeh ngeei uh chu Pathian in Lalpa leh Khrist hi khawmin abawlta chih, Israel nam zousiah in chiantahin he uh heh,” achi hi.
Huleh hi thu ajaah tahun a lungtang va sut bang ahung hita va, Peter leh apostol dangte kawmah, “Ulenaute, bangchibangin ka bawlta diing viai?” achi uhi.
Huin Peter in a kawmvah, “Kisiihin lunghei unla, na sual uh ngaihdam ahihna diingin Jesu Khrist min in baptisma tang chiat un, huchiin Hagau Siangthou silpiaah na tang diing uhi.
Ajiahchu a thuchiam chu nanguh diing zong, na tate uh diing zong, gamlataha um zousiah a diingin zong Lalpa i Pathian in a kawma akouh photmahte a diing zong ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh thudang tamtah in ahilhchian a, “Hi khang paisualte lahah kihuumbit un,” chiin ahasuan hi.
Huin a thu kipaahtaha pom photmah in baptisma atang va; hu ni in mi saang thum veela behlapin aum uhi.
Huleh apostolte thuhilhna leh kipawlkhawmna ah, tanghou balkeehin haamteiin phatuamngaitahin aum zingzing uhi.
Huleh mi zousiah in alauta va; apostolte’n silmahte leh chiamchihna tamtah abawl uhi.
Huleh agingta zousiah akipumkhat va, silbangkim a neih uh akikop uhi.
Huleh a silneih uh leh a van uh ajuaah va, a kisapna bangun a bawnva lahah ahawm jeel uhi.
Huin ni chinin lungsim munkhat in Pathian biahinn ah aum jeel va, a inn lam haw vah zong tanghou balkeehin kipaahtah leh lungsim siangtahin a an uh ane jeel va;
Pathian apaahtawi va, mi zousiah deihsahin aum uhi. Huleh hutdamna hung mu photmahte Lalpa’n ni chinin a kikhopna vah abehlapsah jeel hi.
Huleh ni khat chu Peter leh Johan chu daah kuah in, haamtei hun laiin, Pathian biahinn ah achiah tou uhi.
Huleh koiaha pasal khat, a pian chiil apat keengbai ahung jawng va, hu pa chu Pathian biahinn a luutte kawma khutdoh diingin, biahinn kotkhaah Kilawm achih uh bul ah ni chinin alumsah veu uhi.
Huchiin Peter leh Johan Pathian biahinn a luut diing amu a, khut anadoh hi.
Huin Peter in Johan toh amah hah etin aen va, Peter in, “Kei uh hung en in,” achi hi.
Ama’n amahuh apat bang aha muh kineemin amahuh aen hi.
Huin Peter in, “Dangka leh sana bangmah ka nei sih, hizongleh ka neihsun ka hung pe diing: Nazareth Jesu Khrist min in thou inla keeng in chiah in,” achi hi.
Huin a khut jiatlam a tuin akaithou a, thakhatin a keengte leh a siaahguhte ahung haat pahta hi.
Huchiin amah chu adiangdoh a, ading a, keeng in apai hi; huleh keeng a paiin leh kidiangin Pathian paahtawi kawm jeelin, amahuh toh Pathian biahinn ah aluutta hi.
Keeng a apai leh Pathian apaahtawi mi zousiah in amu uhi.
Amah un Pathian biahinn Kotkhaah Kilawm bul a khutdoha tou veupa ahi chih ahe va, huleh a tunga sil tung limdang asa mahmah uhi.
Huleh keengbai hung dampa’n Peter leh Johan atuuh laiin, mi zousiah in limdang asa mahmah va, Solomon innliim achih uh mun ah ahung taaikhawm uhi.

Peter in hu amuh tahin, mite ahoupih a, “Nanguh Israel mite, hikhu bang diinga limdangsa na hi viai? Ahihlouhleh keiuh silbawltheihna leh Pathian ka ngaihsah jiahva amah ka paisah uh bang hiala bang diinga hung en zing na hi viai?
Abraham, Isak, Jakob Pathian, i pulepate Pathian in, a Suaah Jesu atawisangta hi. Amah na mansah va, Pilat in hah atupin zong Pilat ma ah na nual uhi.
Misiangthou leh Dihtat chu na nual va, tualthatpa chu na kawmva piaah na ngeen jawta uhi.
Hinna Lal chu na that va; hizongleh Pathian in Amah chu misi lah apat akaithou kiit a, hu heetpihtute ka hi uhi.
Jesu min ginna jiahin, tu a na muh uh leh na heet uh hi pa chu Amah min in asuhaat ahi; huleh Amah tungtawna ginna hung kuan khu in na bawnva mitmuh ah hi pa asudam bukimta hi.
“Tuin unaute, na heetlouh jiahun hi na bawl uh ahi chih ka he a, na vaihawmtute un zong hichibangin anabawl uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian in a zawlnei zousiah kam a Khrist in athuaah ngeei diing chia anaphuanlawhsa chu, huchibangin ataangtungsahta hi.
Hujiahin kisiih unla, na sualte uh nawtmang ahih theihna diingin kiheikiit un, huchiin Lalpa kawm apat halh hunte ahung tung thei diing a,
huchiangin hun paisa a na kawmva phuandoha um Jesu Khrist ahung sawl diing hi.
Sil bangkim siamhoihna hun atun masiah Amah chu vaan in akol tadih diing hi, hu siamhoihna hun diing chu Pathian in leilung pianchiil apat a zawlnei siangthoute kam in asoi zouta hi.

Ajiahchu Mosi ngeei in i pulepate kawmah, ‘LALPA Pathian in keimah ahung tundoh bangin na unaute lahah Zawlnei khat ahung tungdoh diing hi. Ama’n na kawmva asoi zousiah chu na ngaihkhiah ngeeingeei diing uh ahi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi diing a, mi kuapouh hu Zawlnei thu ngaihsahlou chu mite lah apat suhmangthaai ahi diing uhi,’ achi hi.
“Ahi, Samuel apat zawlnei zousiah leh a nung va thu anasoi photmahte’n huchibangin, tulai hun tanchin anasoilawh chiat uhi.
Nanguh chu zawlneite tate leh Pathian in thuhun anabawlpih i pulepate uh tate na hi uh, Abraham kawmah, ‘Na chihaah jaalin khovel a innkuan zousiah vangpiaahin aum diing uh,’ achi hi.
Pathian in a Suaah Jesu kaithouin, na giitlouhnate vapat hung kiheisah diing leh vaang hung pe diingin nanguh kawmah ahung sawl masapeen ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Peter leh Johan in mite kawma thu asoi laiun, siampute leh Pathian biahinn houtute leh Sadukaite ahung va,
mi athuhilh jiah uh leh Jesu jaala misi lah apat a thohkiitna thu ahilh jiahun alungkimta sih uhi.
Huin aman va, nitaahlam ahih jiahin ajiingni tanphain suangkul ah akhumta uhi.
Hizongleh thu ngaikhete laha tamtahin agingta va; atamdaan uh chu pasal ngen zong saang ngaa veel apha uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, ajiingni in, a houtute uh leh upate leh daanjilsahtute leh
siampu lalpeen Anna leh Kaiapha leh Johan leh Alexandar leh siampu lalpeen chipih tampi chu Jerusalem ah akikhawm uhi.
Huleh Peter leh Johan chu a laivah adingsah va, “Bang silbawltheihna in ahiai, ahihlouhleh koi min in ahiai hibang na bawl uh?” chiin adong uhi.
Huin Peter chu Hagau Siangthou in adim a, a kawmvah, “Nanguh mipi houtute leh Israel upate haw,
kei un mihaatlou khat tunga sil hoih ka bawl va, ahung dam jiaha, tuni a etkhiaha ka um uh leh,
na bawnun he unla, Israelmi zousiah in zong he un, huchu Nazareth Jesu Khrist, kros a na kilhlup uh, Pathian in misi lah apat akaithouta a, Amah min ngeei in hi pa chu na ma vah damin adingta ahi.
Hi Jesu chu ‘nanguh innlamtute’n na suang deih louh uh, aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi.’
“Midang kuamah kawmah hutdamna aum sih; ajiahchu vaan nuai a mihingte kawma kipia min lahah hung hundam diing min dang mawngmawng aum sih,” achi hi.
HulehPeterlehJohanhaansan daan amuh va, lehkhasiamlou leh siamna neilou ahi uh chih aheet tahun, thumah asa mahmah va, huleh Jesu toh ana-umta uh chih aheta uhi.
Huleh suhdama umpa a kawmva ding amuhun bangmah asoiseel thei tuan sih uhi.
Hizongleh a vaihawmna vapat, pawtdoh diinga thu apiaah nungun akihou va,
“Hi mite bang i lohta diai? Ajiahchu chiamchihna heet thamtah amah uh tungtawna kibawl chu Jerusalem a um zousiah kawmah alang chiang mahmah a, ei un zong i nial thei tuam sih uhi.
Hizongleh mi kawma akithan seem louhna diingin, tukalsiah hi min a koimah kawma thu asoi nawn louhna diingun i vau diing uh,” achi uhi.
Huchiin amahuh akou va, Jesu min a thu soi kiit het lou diing leh thu hilh kiit nawnlou diingin thu apia uhi.
Hizongleh Peter leh Johan in adawng va huleh a kawmvah, “Pathian mitmuhin Pathian thuman saangin nanguh thuman adih ahi diai, nang un ngaihtuah un.
Ajiahchu kei un jaw ka sil muh uh leh ka jaahte uh soi louin ka um thei sih uh,” achi uhi.
Huin amahuh naahtaha avau zohun, mipi jiah leh gawtna diing san amuhlouh jiahun ahahta uhi, ajiahchu hu siltungte jiahin mi zousiah in Pathian apaahtawi uhi.
Ajiahchu chiamchihna a suhdama umpa chu kum sawmli saanga tamjaw ahita hi.
Huleh Peter leh Johan hahdoha aum tahun a lawite uh kawmah achiah va, siampu lalte leh upate’n asoi zousiah uh ahilh uhi.
Huleh amah un ajaah tahun, kituaahtah leh aw ngaihtahin Pathian kawmah, “Lalpa, nang chu vaan leh leite, tuipi leh a sunga um zousiah siamtu Pathian na hi.
Nang in na suaahpa David kam in hi thu na soi hi: ‘Bang diinga Jentelte hel ahi viai? Huleh bang diinga mite’n sil phatuamlou suangtuah ahi viai?
Leitung kumpipate akisa suausuau va, huleh vaihawmtute’n zong LALPA leh a Khrist tungah thu aphial uhi,’ chiin.
“Ajiahchu na Suaah siangthou, na thaunuh Jesu kalhin Herod leh Pontia Pilat chu Jentelte leh Israel mite toh akikhawm tahzet uh,
na silbawltheihna khut leh na lungsim a hung tung diinga na guatlawh taphot bawl diingin.
Huleh tuin, Lalpa, ahung vaudaan uh en in, na suaahte’n hangsanna zousiah toh na thu asoi theihna diing uh pia in,
mite sudam diinga na khut na zandohin, na Suaah siangthou Jesu min jaalin chiamchihna leh sil loupite ahung um hi,” achi uhi.
Ahaamtei zohun aum khawmna uh ahung kiliing a; a bawnun Hagau Siangthou in ahung dim vehta va, huchiin Pathian thu chu hangsantahin asoita uhi.
Huleh agingta mipite chu, lungtang munkhat leh lungsim munkhat in aum uhi; a lahva khat in zong a silneih chu kei a tuam ahi achi sih a, himahleh sil zousiah akikop jaw uhi.
Apostolte’n silbawltheihna thupitah toh Lalpa Jesu thohkiitna thu chu ahilh zing va, a bawnva tung ah hehpihna nasatah aum hi.
A lahvah tasam koimah zong aum sih uhi, ajiahchu gam ahihlouhleh inn neite’n ajuaah va, a sil juaahte uh man ahung tawi va,
apostolte keengbul ah akoih jeel va, mi chin kawmah a mamoh daanun ahawm uhi.
Huleh Jose, Levi mi, Kupra gam mi, apostolte’n Barnaba achih uh, hu min umjia chu Hamuanna tapa chihna ahi a,
ama’n a gam neih chu ajuaah a, a man ahung tawi a, apostolte keengbul ah akoihta hi.
Hizongleh mi khat a min Anania kichi in a ji Saphira toh a neih uh ajuaah va,
huleh a ji heetin a man khenkhat a-iimta a, khenkhat hung tawiin apostolte keengbul ah akoih hi.
Hizongleh Peter in, “Anania, Hagau Siangthou heem diing leh gam man khenkhat iim diingin bang diinga Setan in na lungsim sudim ahiai?

Juaaha aum mateng nang a hi zing lou ahiaimah? Na juaah nungin zong na thuthuin aum sih eimah? Bang diinga hi thute na lungtang a ngaihtuah na hiai? Mihing heem na hi sih a, Pathian heem na hi jaw,” achi hi.
Anania in hu thu ajaah tahin apuuh a, asita hi. Hu thu ja zousiah tungah lauhna nasatah ahung tungta hi.
Tangvaalte’n thoudohin amah atuam va, ajawngdoh va, avuita uhi.
Huleh daah kaal thum diing veel nungin, a ji sil umdaan heloupiin ahung luut hi.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, “Hung hilh in, gam hizah chauhin ahi maw na juaah uh?” achi hi. Huin ama’n, “Hi, hijaat chauhin ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in a kawmah, “Bang diinga Lalpa Hagau je-et diinga kithutuaah na hi viai? En in, na pasal vuite keeng kotkhaahbul ah aumta hi, huleh nang zong ahung jawng doh diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin thakhatin a keengbul ah apuuh pah a, asita hi. Huin tangvaalte ahung luut va, amahnu chu si in ahung mu va, ajawngdoh va, a pasal geiah avuita uhi.
Huin kouhtuam zousiah leh hu thu ja pouhmahte’n alau mahmah uhi.
Apostolte khut tungtawn in mipite lahah chiamchihna leh sil loupi tamtah bawlin aum hi. Huin amahuh a bawnun lungsim mun khatin Solomon Innliim ah aum uhi.
Huleh mite’n amahuh angaisang mahmah va, himahleh kuamah a lahvah atel ngam sih uhi.
Numei leh pasal gingthah tampitah Lalpa kawmah ahung kibehlap deuhdeuh uhi.
Huchiin Peter achiah kawma a liim khenkhatte tunga atuh theihna diing chiin damloute ahung pui va, lupnate leh pheehte bang ah kotzing vai ah alumsah uhi.
Jerusalem kiim a khuate apatin mipite zong damloute leh hagau niin suhgimte hung puiin ahung khawm va, hute zong ahung dam vehta uhi.
Huin siampu lalpeen leh a lawite zousiah ahung va, thangsiatna in adim va, hute chu Sadukai pawl ahi uhi.
Apostolte chu aman va, vaantaang suangkul ah akhumta uhi.
Hizongleh Lalpa angel in jaan in suangkul kotkhaahte hung hongin amahuh apuidoh a,
“Chiah unla, Pathian biahinn ah vading unla, mite kawmah hi hinna thu zousiah vasoi un,” achi hi.

Hu thu ajaah tahun jiingkaal matahin Pathian biahinn ah avaluut va, thu avahilh uhi. Hizongleh siampu lalpeen leh a lawite ahung va, vaihawmte leh Israel suan upate zousiah akoukhawm va, apostolte vapui diingin suangkul ah mi asawl uhi.
Hizongleh houtute avachiah va, suangkul ah amahuh avamuta sih va, ahung kihkiit uhi.
“Suangkul bittaha kikhaahin a veengtute zong kotkhaahbul a dingin ka mu ngaalva, hizongleh ka hon uh leh a sung ah koimah ka mu sih uh,” chiin asoi uhi.
Siampu lalpeen leh Pathian biahinn veengtu lamkaipa leh siampu lalte’n hu thute aheet tahun hikhu bang chiphetin ahung thangta de aw, chiin a thu ah amangbang mahmah uhi.
Huin mi khat ahung a, a kawmvah, “Ngai un, suangkul a na mi khumte un Pathian biahinn ah dingin mite thu ahilh uh,” chiin ahung soi hi.
Huchiin houtute lamkaipa chu houtute toh avachiah va, mipite’n suang a aseh diing uh alau jiahun bawlse louin ahung pui uhi.
Huleh amahuh ahung puitung phetun, vaihawmte ma ah adingsah va, huin siampu lalpeen in a kawmvah,
“Hi min a thu hilh kiit nawn lou diingin thu khauhtahin ka hung peta uh hilou maw? Ngai un, na thuhilh un Jerusalem khua na sudim vehta va, huleh hi Pa sisan hung khuhsah tum na hi uh!” achi hi.
Huin Peter leh apostol dangte’n, “Mihing thu saangin Pathian thu ka man jawh ngeeingeei diing uh ahi.
Jesu nang un singdawn a na khai va, na suhluppa uh, i pulepate Pathian in akaithouta hi.
Israelte kawma kisiihna leh sual ngaihdamna pe diingin, Amah ngeei chu Pathian in Lal leh Hundampa diingin a jiatlam ah atawisangta hi.
Huleh keiuh hi thute heetpihtute ka hi uhi, huchibangmahin Pathian in a thujui photmahte kawma apiaahta Hagau Siangthou zong heetpihtu ahi,” chiin adawng uhi.
Huleh hu thu ajaah tahun a lung uh akhoih mahmah a, asuhlup tumta uhi.
Huin mi khat a min Gamaliel, Pharisai, daansiam, mi zousiah in azahtaat khat vaihawmtute lahah ahung ding a, hu apostolte chu puidoh tadih diingin thu apia hi.
Huin a kawmvah, “Nanguh Israel mite aw, hi mite tunga na silbawl tup uh pilvaang un.
