Ajiahchu tumain zong, Theoda, milian ka hi chiin ahung um a, hupa chu pasal ja li veel in anajui va, amah chu suhlupin aumta hi. Huleh amah thumang photmah a bawnun adalhjaahta va, bangmah ahita sih uhi.
Hupa nungin kisimpi laiin, Galili gam mi Juda ahung um kiit a, huleh a kawmah mi hunkhop ahiip hi. Hizongleh amah zong asita a, a thumang zousiah zong adalhjaahta uhi.
Tuin ka hung hilh ahi, hi mite khoih dah unla, huchiin umsah mei un. Hi a siltup uh leh a silbawl uh mihing apat ahih inchu, suhsiatin aum diing hi.
Hizongleh Pathian apat ahih inchu, amahuh na sumang thei sih diing uhi, huchilouin jaw Pathian dou na hi kha diing uh,” achi hi.
A thusoi chu lem asata va, huchiin apostolte chu akou va, ajeep va ajeep zohun, Jesu min a thu soi kiit het lou diingin thu apia va, ahahta uhi.
Amahuh chu vaihawmtute lah apatin apawtkhia va, Jesu min jiaha zumna thuaahtaaha ngaih ahih jiahun akipaah mahmah uhi.
Huleh ni chinin Pathian biahinn leh inn chin ah Jesu chu Khrist ahi chia tanchinpha thu hilh leh soi atawp sih uhi.
Huleh nungjuite apun touh jeel laiun, a ni chin neehletaah hawmna va a meithaite uh angaihsah louh jiahun, Grik haam zang Judate chu Hebraite tungah aphunta uhi.
Huin sawmlenihte’n nungjui mipite akou va, “Pathian thu tawpsana neehletaah ka buaipih un chu, ahoih sih diing hi.
Hujiahin unaute, na lahva Hagau Siangthou leh pilna a dim, mi min hoih ngen sagih teel un. Amahuh chu hi natohna mohpo diingin i guat diing uhi.
Keiuh chu haamtei leh thu natongin ka um zom zing jaw diing uh,” achi uhi.
Huin hu thu in mi zousiah akipaahsah hi. Huchiin Stephen, ginna leh Hagau Siangthou a dim, Philip, Prokora, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena, leh Antiok khua a mi Juda sahkhua a kihei Nikola toh ateel uhi.
Amahuh chu apostolte ma ah adingsah va, ahaamtei zohun a tungvah a khut uh anga uhi.
Huleh Pathian thu ahung dalh a, Jerusalem ah nungjuite apungta mahmah uhi. Huleh siampute lahah zong mi tamtah ginna lamah athumangta uhi.
Huleh Stephen, ginna leh silbawltheihna a dimin mi lahah silmah leh chiamchihna loupitahte abawl veu hi.
Hizongleh Kureni, Alexandria, Silisia leh Asia gamte apat Jaleenpawl Sinagog kichi pawl khat a telte lah apat mi khenkhatte ahung kisa va, Stephen ahung kinialpih uhi.
Hizongleh a pilna leh a soipihtu Hagau chu anialkhe theita sih uhi.
Huin hute’n chu, “Mosi leh Pathian asoisiat ka ja uh,” chi diingin mite achiilgu uhi.
Huleh mite, upate leh daanjilsahtute achiilsia va, Stephen chu asual va, aman va, vaihawmtute kawmah apui uhi.
Huleh heetpihtu dihloute abawltawm va, hute’n chu, “Hi pa’n hi mun siangthou leh daan thu soisiat atawp sih hi.
Ajiahchu hi Nazareth Jesu’n hi mun asuse diing a, Mosi in tawndaan ahung piaahsawnte asulimdang diing, chia asoi ka ja uh,” achi uhi.
Huin vaihawmna a toute zousiah in Stephen aensaal chiat va, a meel chu angel meel bangin amu uhi.
Huin siampu lalpeen in, “Hi thute adihna eimah?” achi hi.
Huin Stephen in, “Ulenaute leh pate aw, ngai un: I pu uh Abraham chu Haran khua a aum ma a, Mesopotamia gam a aum laiin, loupina Pathian a kawmah ahung kilaah a,
a kawmah, ‘Na gam apat leh na chipihte lah apat pawt inla, gam ka hung etsah diing lamah hung pai in,’ achi hi.
“Amah chu Kaldaite gam apat apawt nungin Haran ah ateeng hi. A pa sih nungin Pathian in hu apatin, hi tua na teenna gam vah apeem luutsahta hi.

Huleh hitah ah chu mun luah diing bangmah, a keeng ngahna diing khop zong ape sih hi. Hizongleh Abraham in ta aneih ma thamin Pathian in amah leh a nunga a chihaahte tanpha a gou diingin gam chu piaah achiamta hi.
Huleh Pathian in hichibangin asoi hi: a chihaahte mi gam ah ataam diing va, salin anei diing va, kum za li abawl genthei diing uhi.
Huleh Pathian in, ‘Suaaha aumna diing uh nam chu keima’n ka vaihawm diing a, huzoh chiangin ahung pawt diing va, hi mun ah ka nna atong diing uhi,’ achi hi.
Huleh Pathian in a kawmah zehtan thuhun apia a; huchiin Abraham in Isak ahung hing a, a ni giat ni in a zeh atan hi. Isak in Jakob ahung hing a, Jakob in nampa sawmlenihte ahung hing hi.
“Huleh nampate’n Joseph chu athangsiat va, Aigupta ah ajuaahta uhi. Hizongleh Pathian chu a kawmah aum hi.
A gimthuaahnate zousiah apat ahundoh a, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharaoh mitmuh ah deihsahna leh pilna apia hi. Huchiin amah chu Aigupta gam leh a innsung mi zousiah tungah gamoptuin abawlta hi.
“Huin Aigupta leh Kanaan gam zousiah ah kial ahung tungta a, gimthuaahna nasatah ahung umta a, i pulepate un neeh diing amuta sih uhi.
Hizongleh Jakob in Aigupta gam ah buh aum chih ajaah tahin i pute uh achiah masatpeenna uh diingin asawlta hi.
A nihvei chiahna vah, Joseph chu a sanggamte akihesah a, Joseph innkuante chu Pharaoh kawmah heetsahin aumta uhi.
Huin Joseph in a pa Jakob leh a innkuanpihte zousiah amah kawmah hung diingin achial a, a bawnun sawmsagih leh ngaa ahi uhi.
Huchiin Jakob chu Aigupta gam ah achiah suh a, amah leh i pute uh asita uhi.
Huleh a luang uh Shekem khua ah apotung va, Abraham in Shekem a Emmor tapate apat dangka sum a alei haan ah avuita uhi.
“Hizongleh Pathian in Abraham kawma a thuchiam atun hun ahung nai tahin hu mite chu Aigupta gam ah hung pungin ahung tam deuhdeuhta uhi,
Joseph helou kumpi dang ahung um masiahin.
Hu mipa’n i chipihte adohabawl a, i pulepate uh asuduhdah a, a naungeehte uh hinglou diingin apaihdohsah hi.
“Hulaiin Mosi ahung piang a, Pathian mitmuhin a meel ahoih a, a pa inn ah ha thum etkolin aum hi.
Amah akoihdoh tahun, Pharaoh tanu in ala a, amah tapa diingin avaahta hi.
Huleh Mosi chu Aigupta mite pilna zousiah jilsahin aum a, huchiin thu leh natoh ah sil abawlthei mahmah hi.
“Huleh ama’n chu kum sawmli ahung hihin, a unaute, Israel tate chu kan ahung uutta hi.
Huleh a lahva mi khat dihloutaha suhgima um amuh in, ahundoh a, Aiguptami chu sulumin suhduhdaha umpa phuba alaahsah hi.
Huleh ama’n amah khut in Pathian in amahuh hundoh diing ahi, chih a unaute’n he diing asa a, hizongleh amah un ahe sih uhi.
Huleh a jiing in a lahva mi nih akisual laiun a kawmvah ahung a, ‘Lawmte, unau na vevua; bang diinga dihloutaha kibawl na hi viai?’ chiin lep atum hi.
“Hizongleh a innveengpa tunga silgilou bawl jawpa’n Mosi chu asawndoh a, ‘Kuan nang ka tungva houtu leh vaihawmtu diingin ahung bawl ei?
Jaanni a Aiguptami na thah banga hung thah tum na hi maw?’ achi hi.
Huin hi thu jiahin Mosi chu ataaimangta a, Midian gam ah mikhual in ataamta a, hutah ah tapa nih avanei hi.
“Kum sawmli abei nungin, Sinai Taang gamdaai ah, sawlbawh a meikuang lahah, Lalpa angel khat a kawmah ahung kilaah hi.
Mosi in hi amuhin a silmuh chu limdang asa a; en diinga avanaih laiin Lalpa aw in a kawmah,
‘Kei, na pulepate Pathian chu ka hi, Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, Jakob Pathian,’ achi hi. Huin, Mosi chu akithing a, aen ngamta sih hi.
“‘Huin LALPA’N a kawmah, “Na keeng apat na keengtophah suut in, ajiahchu na dinna chu mun siangthou ahi.

Aigupta gam a ka mi umte gentheih daan chu chiantahin ka mu zing hi. Huleh a thuum leh maau uh zong ka jata a, amahuh hundoh diinga hung suh ka hi. Hungin, Aigupta gam ah ka hung sawl diing,”’ achi hi.

“Hi Mosi, ‘Kuan nang ka tungva houtu leh vaihawmtu diingin ahung bawl ei?’ chia anual uh chu, sawlbawh laha a kawma hung kilaah angel kithuahpihna toh, Pathian in amah ngeei chu houtu leh hundohtu hi kawm diingin asawlta hi.
Ama’n chu Aigupta gam ahte, Tuipi San ahte leh gamdaai ahte kum sawmli sung sil loupi leh chiamchihnate amuhsah nungin, amahuh apuidohta hi.
“Israel tate kawma, ‘LALPA na Pathian un na unaute lah a Zawlnei khat kei tobang atungding diing a, Amah thu na ngaikhe diing uhi,’ chitu chu hi Mosi ahi.
Gamdaai a mipungkhawmte laha ana-um, Sinai Taang a amah kawma thusoi angel toh, i pulepate uh toh ana-umpa chu amah ahi; amah chu eite ahung piaah diinga Pathian thu hing latupa ahi.
“I pulepate’n a thu jui uut louin anual va, Aigupta gam alunggulh kiit uhi.
Aaron kawmah, ‘I mapui diingin pathiante hung bawlsah in, ajiahchu hi Mosi Aigupta apat a hung puidohpa lah a tanchin ka he nawnta sih uh,’ achi uhi.
Huleh hulaiin bawngnou lim abawl va, hu milem ah akithoih va, amahuh khutsuaah tungah anuamta uhi.

Huin Pathian in akiheisan a, vaan a aahsite abiah theihna diingun amahuh apedohta hi. Zawlneite Lehkhabute a, ‘Israel innkuante aw, gamdaai ah kum sawmli sung sa leh kithoihnate ka kawmah na hung laanta uh maw?
Molok biahbuuh leh na pathian uh Remphan aahsi biah diinga a lim na bawlte uh zong na jawng uhi. Hujiahin keima’n nanguh Babylon gaal lamah ka hung thotmang diing,’ chih gelh bangin.
“A lim amuh banga bawl diinga Mosi hilhtu in aguat bangin i pulepate un hu gamdaai ah heetsahna biahbuuh anei uhi.
Huleh hu biahbuuh aneih tahun, Pathian in i pulepate ma a namte adelhdohsah laiin, i pulepate’n Joshua nuaiah hu biahbuuh chu anapoluut uhi. Huchu David hun tanphain hu ah aum zing hi.
David in Pathian mitmuhin deihsahna amu a, Jakob Pathian diing biahbuuh bawlsah diingin angeen hi.
Hizongleh hu inn chu Solomon in abawl jawta hi.
“Ahihvaangin, Tungnungpeen chu khut a bawl biahinnte bang ah aum sih hi, zawlnei in,
“‘Vaan ka touphah ahi a, lei ka keeng ngahna ahi; inn bangchi bangin na hung bawlsah diing viai? LALPA’N achi, ahihlouhleh ka khawlna mun zong bang ahiai?
Ka khut in hi sil zousiah abawl hilou amaw? achi hi,’ chia asoi bangin.
“Miluhlul leh lungtang leh bil zehtanlouhte aw, Hagau Siangthou na doudaal zing uhi. Na pulepate uh bawl bangin na bawl zing uhi.
Na pulepate un zawlneite laha kua ahiai asuhduhdah louh uh? Huleh Midihtat hung diing thu soilawhte chu asulum va, hu Midihtat mansahtu leh thattute tuin nanguh ngeei na hi uhi.
Daan thu angelte tungtawnin na mu va, himahleh na jui tuan sih uhi,” achi hi.
Hi thute ajaah tahun a lung uh athah mahmah a, Stephen chu ha agialkhum uhi.
Hizongleh ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou a dimin vaanlam aen den a, Pathian loupina leh Pathian jiatlam a Jesu ding amu a,
“En un, vaan kihong ka mu a, Pathian jiatlam a Mihing Tapa ding zong ka mu hi!” achi hi.
Huin amahuh chu aw ngaihtahin akikou va, a bil uh ahuum va, thakhatin akidelhhuan uhi.
Khopi apatin adelhdoh va, suang in asep va, huleh a heetpihtute’n tangvaal khat a min Saul keengbul ah a puannaah tualte uh akoih uhi.
Stephen in, “Lalpa Jesu, ka hagau la in,” chia Pathian akouh laiin suang in akisehhuan uhi.
Huin amah chu akhuupdin a, aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Lalpa, hi a sualna moh uh posah sin,” achi hi. Huleh hi thu asoi zohin a-ihmuta hi.

Huleh Saul in zong Stephen sih chu lem asa hi. Hu hun laiin Jerusalem a kouhtuam tungah suhduhdahna nasatah aum panta hi. Huchiin apostolte chihlouh chu Judia leh Samaria gam zousiah ah adalhjaah vehta uhi.
Huleh Pathian ngaihsah kuate aha in Stephen chu avui va, nasatahin asuun uhi.
Saul in ahihleh inn chin a luutin, numei pasal akaidoh a, suangkul a khumin, kouhtuam asuduhdah mahmah hi.
Huleh suhdalha umte’n chu a chiahna phot vah tanchinpha asoita uhi.
Huin Philip chu Samaria khopi ah achiah suh a, a kawmvah Khrist thu asoi hi.
A silmah bawlte ajaah va amuh tahun, mipite’n Philip thusoi chu lungsim munkhatin angaikhia uhi.
Dawi niinte chu aw ngaihtaha kikouin mi tampi amatte uh sung apat ahung pawt uhi. Huleh jeng leh keengbai tamtahte zong ahung damta uhi.
Huleh hu khopi ah kipaahna nasatah aumta hi.
Hizongleh a min Simon kichi mi khat aum a, ama’n chu milian ka hi chiin, tuma lamin hu khopi ah mitphialdawi zangin Samaria mite chu limdangsatahin akoih veu hi.
Mi zousiah in, a neupeen apat a lianpeen tanphain, “Hi mipa ahi Pathian silbawltheihna loupi kichi chu,” chiin a thu angaihsah vehta uhi.
Huleh mitphialdawi a hun sawttah limdangsataha anakoihtaah jiahin, a thu angaihsah uhi.
Hizongleh amah un chu Pathian lalgam leh Jesu Khrist min tanchinpha Philip in asoi agintaat tahun, anumei apasal in baptisma atangta uhi.
Huin Simon nasan in zong ahung gingta a, baptisma atan nungin Philip kawmah aum zing a, chiamchihna leh silmah nasatah kibawlte amuhin, limdang asa thei mahmah hi.
Huin Jerusalem a um apostolte in Samariate’n Pathian thu a-awita uh chih aheet tahun, a kawmvah Peter leh Johan asawl va,
hu mite chu avatunsuh tahun Hagau Siangthou atan theihna diingun ahaamteisah uhi.
Humain chu a lahva kuamah tungah Hagau Siangthou atung nai sih hi. Himahleh Lalpa Jesu min a baptisma tang chauh ahi nalai uhi.
Huin Peter leh Johan in a tungvah a khut uh anga va, Hagau Siangthou atangta uhi.
Huleh Simon in apostolte khut ngah jiah a, Hagau Siangthou piaah ahi chih amuhin, sum apia a,
“Hitobang thuneihna hung pe ve un, kua tungah hizongleh khut ka ngahna phot in Hagau Siangthou amuhvena diingun,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Peter in a kawmah, “Pathian silpiaah dangka sum a lei na tup jiahin, na sum nangmah toh mangkhawm heh.
Hi thu ah tel lah na tel sih a, tan zong na nei ngaal sih hi, ajiahchu na lungtang Pathian muhin adih sih hi.
Hujiahin na giitlouhna kisiih inla, Pathian kawmah nasatahin haamtei in, huchiin na lungtang a na ngaihtuah hi ahung ngaidam khamoh sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu khaatna in na lungtang agaah a, huleh dihtatlouhna sal a taang na hi,” achi hi.
Huin Simon in adawng a, “Na sil soite uh bangmah ka tunga atun louhna diingin nang un Lalpa kawmah nasatahin hung haamteisah un,” achi hi.
Huin amah un Lalpa thu aheetsah leh asoi zoh nungun, Jerusalem ah achiah kiitta va, Samaria khua tamtah ah tanchinpha asoita uhi.
Lalpa angel in Philip ahoupih a, “Thou inla, simlam a Jerusalem apat Gaza pai suhna lampi ah chiah in,” achi a, huchu gamdaai a um ahi.
Huchiin amah chu athou a, achiahta hi. Huleh ngai in, Ethiopia mi, Ethiopia kumpinu Kandake nuaia michilgeh thunei liantah, amahnu gou teng keemtu chu Jerusalem a Pathian be diingin ahung a,
apaikiit lamin a kangtalai a toukawmin zawlnei Isai Lehkhabu asim hi.
Huin Hagau in Philip kawmah, “Hu kangtalai vanaih inla, a kawmah vaum in,” achi hi.
Huin Philip chu a kawmah avataai a, zawlnei Isai Lehkhabu asim aja a, “Na sim chu na hesiam na eimah?” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n chu, “Kuamah hung hilhchet louhin bang chiin ka hesiam diai?” achi hi. Huin ama’n Philip chu kaldohtou a, a kawma tou diingin ajawn hi.
Pathian Lehkhathu asim chu: “Thah diing belaam bangin Amah chu apui va; belaamnou a mulmeettu ma a asip khiinkhian bangin, Ama’n zong a kam akeeh sih;
Amah kimuhsitna ah dihtaha vaihawmna chu laahmangin aum hi. A haahte tanchin kuan ahiai hung soi diing? Ajiahchu leitung apatin a hinna laahsahin aum ngaal a,” chih ahi.
Huleh michilgeh in Philip ahoupih a, a kawmah, “Ka hung ngeen hi, hi thu khu zawlnei in koi thu asoina ahiai? Amah thu ahiai, midang thu?” achi hi.
Huin Philip in a kam akaah a, hu Pathian Lehkhathu ngeei apanin a kawmah Jesu thu asoita hi.
Lampi a apai laiun tui mun khat ahung tung va, michilgeh in, “Endua, hi ah tui aum, baptisma ka tanna diing bangin ahung daal ei?” achi hi.
Huin Philip in, “Na lungtang zousiah a na gintaat leh, na tang thei hi,” achi hi. Huleh ama’n adawng a, “Jesu Khrist chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta hi,” achi hi.
Huin kaangtalai chu akhawlsah a; Philip leh michilgeh chu tui lahah achiah suh khawm va, huin Philip in amah chu baptisma atangsah hi.
Huleh tui apat apawtdoh touh phetun, Lalpa Hagau in Philip chu alamangta a, michilgeh in Philip chu amu nawnta sih hi. Huleh a lampi ah nuamtahin apai jeelta hi.
Hizongleh Philip chu Azota khua a um ahi chih akihedohta a; huin paisuaah pehin Kaisaria khua atun masiah kho chin ah tanchinpha chu ataangkoupihta hi.
Hulaiin Saul in chu Lalpa nungjuite thah diingin avau zing a, siampu lalpeen kawmah avachiah a,
Damaska a sinagogte a diingin lehkha angeen hi, huchia mi koipouh, pasal hiin numei hitaleh hi Lampi pawl a mite amuh photmah kaansa a Jerusalem a ahung pui theihna diingin.
Azin laiin Damaska kawm ahung tung a, thakhatin vaan akipanin vaah a kiim vah ahung taang hi.
Huin lei ah apuuh a, “Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai?” chiin aw aja hi.
Huin ama’n, “Lalpa, koi na hiai?” achi hi. Huin Lalpa’n, “Na suhduhdah Jesu ka hi. Vuaahna siihzum peeh nang diingin ahahsa hi,” achi hi.

Huleh ama’n kithing kawm leh limdangsatahin, “Lalpa, bang bawl diingin na hung deih ei?” achi hi. Huin Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Thou inla khopi sungah luut in, huchiin na bawl diing chu hilhin na um diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah toh zin khawmte chu soi diing beiin ading va, aw chu aja va, hizongleh koimah amu sih uhi.
Huin Saul chu lei apatin athou a, a mit hah mahzongleh bangmah amuthei sih hi. Huchiin a khut in akai va, Damaska ah apuiluut uhi.
Huleh ni thum kho mulouin aum a, bangmah ane in adawn sih hi.
Huleh Damaska ah a min Anania kichi nungjui khat aum a; Lalpa’n kilaahna in a kawmah, “Anania,” achi hi. Ama’n, “En in, Lalpa, hi ah ka um,” achi hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Thou inla, kotzing Tang achih vah chiah inla, Juda inn a um, Tarsa khua a mi, a min Saul kichi kandoh in; ajiahchu, ngai in, ahaamtei laitah ahi.
Huleh ama’n kilaahna in mi khat a min Anania kichi hung luut a, a mit suvaah diinga a tunga khut ngain amuta hi,” achi hi.
Huin Anania in, “Lalpa, hi pa’n Jerusalem a na misiangthoute tunga sil hoihlou tamtah abawl daante mi tampi kam apat ka ja hi.
Huleh hi ah zong na min lou zousiah kaanna diingin siampu lalte kawm akipatin thu amu hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Chiah in, ajiahchu hi pa hi Jentelte leh kumpipate leh Israel tate kawma ka min poluuttu diinga ka beel teel ahi.
Ajiahchu ka min vaanga gimna bangchituha thuaah diing ahiai, chih a kawmah ka hesah diing hi,” achi hi.

Huin Anania chu avachiah a, inn ah aluut a, a tunga a khut ngain, “Unaupa Saul, na mit vaahna diing leh Hagau Siangthou a na dim theihna diingin Lalpa, na hungna lampi a na kawma kilaah Jesu ngeei in ahung sawl ahi,” achi hi.
Thakhatin a mit apat phulip tobang ake pah a; huleh a mit ahung vaah a, huin athou a, baptisma atangta hi.
Huleh an ane a, suhhaatin aumta hi. Huin Saul chu Damaska a nungjui umte kawmah ni bangzah aha aum hi.
Huleh sinagogte ah Khrist chu Pathian Tapa ahihdaan ataangkoupih pah ngaal hi.
Huleh a thu jate zousiah in limdang asa mahmah va, “Hi pa Jerusalem a hi min loute suduhdah veupa hilou amaw? Huleh kaansa a siampu lalte kawma pui tuma hitah a hung hilou maw?” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Saul chu ahung haat seem a, hi Jesu chu Khrist ahi tahtah hi chih hilhchianin, Damaska a Juda umte chu angaihna helouin akoih hi.
Huleh ni tamtah nungin, amah thah tumin Judate akihou uhi.
Hizongleh Saul in a siltup uh anahe hi. Huleh amah un amah thah tumin kulh kotkhaah suun leh jaan in ataang uhi.
Hizongleh nungjuite’n amah chu jaan in apui va, kulh baang ah bawm in akhaikheta uhi.
Huleh Saul Jerusalem atun in nungjuite kithuahpih atum a; hizongleh amah un nungjui ahihve agintaat louh jiahun alau chiat uhi.
Hizongleh Barnaba in amah apui a, apostolte kawmah ahung tonpih hi. Huleh ama’n lampi a Lalpa amuh a, Lalpa’n ahoupih daan bang leh Damaska a Jesu min a hangsantaha thu asoi daante bang asoita hi.
Huchiin amah chu Jerusalem ah a kawmvah luut jeel pawt jeelin aum a, hangsantahin Lalpa Jesu min in thu asoi hi.
Huleh amah in Grik haam zang Judate anial a; hizongleh amah un thah atum uhi.
Huchu unaute’n aheet tahun, Kaisaria ah apuisuh va, Tarsa ah asawlmangta uhi.
Huin Judia gam, Galili gam leh Samaria gam veel ah kouhtuamte’n hamuanna anei va huleh suhkhangin aumta uhi. Huleh Lalpa lauin ahing va, Hagau Siangthou hamuanin aum va, ahung pung deuhdeuhta uhi.
Hichi ahung hi a, Peter in amahuh vehsuaah kawmin, Lidda khopi a misiangthou um zousiah kawmah zong achiah suh hi.
Huleh hutah ah a min Ainia, kichi, ajeng jiaha kum giat lupna a lum zing khat amu hi.
Huleh Peter in a kawmah, “Ainia, Jesu Khrist in ahung sudam hi, thou inla na puanphah jial in,” achi hi. Huchiin amah chu athou pah hi.
Huleh Lidda leh Sharon a umte zousiah in amah chu amu va, Lalpa lam angata uhi.
Huleh Joppa khua ah a min Tabitha kichi nungjui khat aum a, Tabitha umjia chu Dorka ahi, hi numei in silbawl hoih leh khotuahna silpiaah ahau mahmah hi.
Hichi ahung hi a, hulaiin a chi ana a, asita a; asil zohun pindan tungnung ah alumsah uhi.
Huleh Lidda khua chu Joppa kho kawm ahih jiahin, nungjuite’n Peter hutah ah aum chih aja uhi. Sawt halloua a kawmva hung diinga va-ngeen diingin a kawmah mi nih asawl uhi.

Huin Peter chu athou a, amahuh geel toh akitonta uhi. Ahung tunin, amah chu pindan tungnung ah apuitouta uhi. Meithai zousiah a kawma dingin, Dorka in a kawmva a damlai a a puannaahtual bawlte leh a puan bawlte lah pumin akap uhi.
Hizongleh Peter in a bawnun apawtsah a, akhuupdin a, ahaamteita a; a luang lam ngat in, “Tabitha, thou in,” achi hi. Huleh amahnu’n chu amit ahung hah a, Peter amuh tahin athouta hi.
Huleh Peter in a khut apia a, akaithouta a, misiangthoute leh meithaite akou a, amahnu chu damin apeta hi.
Huleh hu thu Joppa khua zousiah in ahe veh va, mi tampi’n Lalpa agingta uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Peter chu Joppa khua ah savun bawlpa Simon inn ah ni tampi ataamta hi.
Huleh Kaisaria khua ah a min Kornelia kichi mi khat aum a, Italy Pawl achih va sepaih zahoutu ahi.
Pathian ngaihsah mi ahi a, a innkuante zousiah toh Pathian lau daan asiam uhi. Mite kawmah khotuahna tampi apia a, Pathian kawmah zong ahaamtei zing hi.
Daah kuah veelin ama’n kilaahna in Pathian angel khat a kawma hung luut a, “Kornelia!” hung chi khat chiangtahin amu hi.
Hizongleh Kornelia in amah aet leh alau a, “Lalpa, bang ahita ei?” achi hi. Huin angel in a kawmah, “Na haamteinate leh na silpiaahte heetzing diingin Pathian ma ah ahung tungtouta hi.
Huchiin tuin, Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, mi khat Peter chih a akouh uh, Simon chu vakousah in.
Amah chu tuikhanglian geia teeng, savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi. Ama’n na bawl diing ahung hilh diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh angel Kornelia houpih khu apai tahin, Kornelia in a suaahte laha mi nih leh amah natohsah zingte laha Pathian ngaihsah sepaih khat akou hi.
Thu zousiah a kawmva ahilh zohin, Joppa khua ah asawlta hi.
A jiing a apai laiun, khopi atun kuan-un daah guup veelin, Peter chu haamtei diingin inn tungah akaltou hi.
Huleh a gil ahung kial mahmah a, an neeh auut a, hizongleh neeh diing abawl laiun zelhin ahung umta hi.
Huleh vaan kihongin, sil bang aha khat, puan liantah bang, a ning li a khih, lei a hung kikhai khesuhin amu hi.
Hu sungah chu leitung a keeng li nei ganhing chi chinteng leh gamsate leh silhing bohvaahte leh tungleeng vate aum uhi.
Huleh a kawmah aw ahung ging a, “Peter, thou in, that inla ne in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Peter in, “Hilou e, Lalpa, ajiahchu asianglou leh abuaah photmah bangmah ka ne ngei sih hi,” achi hi.
Huleh aw in anihveina in, “Pathian in asuhsiangthousa, nang in sianglou chi sin,” achi hi.
Huchibangin thumvei ahung um a; huin sil chu vaan a khaitouhin aum kiitta hi.
Peter in kilaahna a amuh khu limdangsa a, bangchihna ahiai chia nasataha abuai laiin, en in, Kornelia mi sawlte’n Simon inn akandohta va, kotkhaahbul ah anading uhi.
Huleh akou va, Simon, Peter chiha akouh uh azintun leh tun louh anadong uhi.
Peter in kilaahna a a sil muh chu angaihtuah laiin, Hagau in a kawmah, “Ngai in, mi thum in ahung hawl uhi.
Huchiin thou in, kumkhia inla, bangma ginglel louin amahuh jui in; ajiahchu amahuh chu ka sawl ahi uh,” achi hi.
Huin Peter chu Kornelia mi sawlte kawmah achiah suh a, a kawmvah, “Ngai un, na hawl uh chu ka hi. Bang ahiai na hung nasan uh?” achi hi.

Amah un, “A inn a na hung theihna diing leh na thusoi diingte ajaah theihna diingin Kornelia, sepaih zahoutu, midihtat, Pathian lau leh Judami zousiah soiphatpa chu angel siangthou khat in thu apia hi,” achi uhi.
Huin amahuh akou luut a, agiahsahta hi. Huleh a jiing in Peter chu amahuh toh achiah a, Joppa khua a unau kuate aha in amah akitonpih uhi.
Huleh a jiingkiit in Kaisaria khua ah aluutta uhi. Huleh Kornelia in a tanaute leh a lawm deihtahte koukhawmin, amahuh ana-ngaah zing hi.
Huleh Peter ahung luut kuanin Kornelia in analamtuaah a, a keengbul ah bohkhupin anabia hi.
Hizongleh Peter in amah chu akaithou a, “Ding in, kei zong mihing ka hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amah toh kihoulim kawmin, inn sungah aluut a, mi tamtah umkhawm chu amuta hi.
Huleh a kawmvah, “Judami namdang toh kipawl a, a kawmva chiah chu daan kalh ahi chih na he uhi. Hizongleh kuamah daan kalh leh buaahbaang ka chih diing ahi sih, chih Pathian in ahung hesah hi.
Hujiahin na hung kouh tahun, nial louin ka hung pah ahi; hujiahin na hung kouhna san uh bang ahiai chih ka hung dong ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Kornelia in, “Ni li paita tu hun in ka inn sunga an ngawl a, daah kuahna a ka haamtei laiin, ngai in, mi khat puanvaam tah silhin ka ma ah ahung ding a,
huleh ama’n, ‘Kornelia, na haamteina jaahin aumta, mi kawma na khotuahna silpiaah zong Pathian in ahezing hi.

Hujiahin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter chiha akouh uh chu na kawmah kou in; amah chu tuikhanglian pang a savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi; amah ahung chiangin thu ahung hilh diing hi,’ achi hi.
Hujiahin na kawmah mi ka hung sawl pah a, na hung hi ahoih hi. Hujiahin tuin Pathian in na kawma ahung thupiaah zousiah ja diingin Pathian mitmuhin ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi,” achi hi.
Huin Peter in asoi a, “Pathian in mi deihsahtuam anei sih hi, chih chiangtahin ka he hi.
Ahihvaangin, nam chin laha koipouh amah lau a, dihtaha gamta photmah chu apaahtaat mi ahi veu uhi.
Pathian in Israel tate kawma thu athot, Jesu Khrist tungtawna hamuanna tanchinpha soi chu, Amah chu mi zousiah Lalpa ahi chih ahi,
Johan in ataangkoupih baptisma khuh nungin, Galili gam apat ahung thang pan a, Judia gam zousiah ah athangsuaah a, hu thu chu nang un na he uhi.

Pathian in Nazareth Jesu chu Hagau Siangthou leh silbawltheihna a athopdaan na he uhi. Amah chu sil hoih bawl leh diabol thuneihna nuaia um zousiah sudamin avaahleh hi, ajiahchu Pathian in Amah aumpih hi.
Huleh Judate gam leh Jerusalem a asilbawl zousiah heetpihtu ka hi uh, Amah chu singdawn a khai in asulumta uhi.
Himahleh Amah chu Pathian in misi lah apatin ni thum ni’n akaithou a, phuanglaahtaha muhtheihin abawlta hi.
Mi zousiah kawmah ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian in heetpihtu ateelte kawmah chauh ahi, misi lah apat athohkiit nunga Amah kawma nea dawn keiuh kawm ah zong.
Huleh mite kawma thu soi diing leh Amah chu mihing leh misite tunga Vaihawmtu diinga Pathian guat ahi chih heetpih diingin Pathian in thu ahung pia hi.
Koipouh Amah gingta in a min jaalin sualnate ngaihdamna amu diing uh chih a tanchin chu zawlnei zousiah in anaheetsahsa uh ahi,” achi hi.
Peter in hi thute asoi laitahin, a thu ja zousiah tungah Hagau Siangthou ahung tungta hi.
Huleh zehtante laha gingtute, Peter toh hung zousiahte’n, Hagau Siangthou piaah chu Jentelte tunga zong leih ahih jiahin thumah asa mahmah uhi.
Amahuh chu haam dangte a thusoi leh Pathian phatin aja ngaal va. Huin Peter in,
“Hi mite, eimah banga Hagau Siangthou tangve chu baptisma atan louhna diingun mi’n tui zat akhaam thei diviaimah?” achi hi.
Huchiin Lalpa min a baptisma tang diingin thu apia hi. Huin ni bangzah aha taam diingin angeenta uhi.
Huleh Judia gam a apostolte leh unau umte’n Jentelte’n zong Pathian thu apomta uh chih ajata uhi.
Peter chu Jerusalem atun touh tahin zehtante’n a kawmah,
“Zehtanlouhte inn ah na luut a, amahuh toh na ne hi,” chiin akalh uhi.
Hizongleh Peter in sil umdaan abul akipatin kizom jeelin a kawmvah ahilhchian hi, hichia chiin,
“Joppa khopi ah haamtei in ka um a, huleh zelhin ka um a, manglam bangin bang aha bawm, puan liantah bang a ning li a khih, vaan apat hung kikhaikhia ka mu a, ka kawm ngeei ah ahung tung hi.
Huchu en den in ka ngaihtuah a, lei a gamsa keeng li neite, gamsate, ganhing bohvaahte leh tunga leeng vate ka mu hi.
Huleh aw in, ‘Peter, thou in, that inla ne in,’ hung chiin ka ja hi.
Hizongleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, hilou e, ajiahchu abuaahbaang leh asianglou photmah ka kam ah aluut ngei sih,’ ka chi hi.
Hizongleh vaan akipanin aw in, ‘Pathian in asuhsiangsa nang sianglou chi sin,’ ahung chi kiit hi.
Huleh huchibang ngenin thumvei ahung um a, huin a bawnin vaan ah khaitouhin aum kiitta hi.
“Ngai in, mi thum Kaisaria apat ka kawma ahung sawlte uh ka umna inn ah anatung uhi.
Hagau in ginglel lou leh koimah khentuam neilou a, amahuh jui diingin ahung sawl hi. Hi unau guupte’n zong ahung jui va, hu mipa inn ah ka luut uhi.
Ama’n ka kawmah, a inn a angel kilaah amuh daan leh angel in a kawma, ‘Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter achih uh chu vakousah in,
ama’n thu ahung hilh diing a, hu thu in nang leh na innkuanpihte zousiah hutdamin na um diing uh,’ achih daan zong ahung hilh hi.
“Thu ka soi pat tahin, Hagau Siangthou i tunga ahung tun chiil lai mahbangin, a tungvah ahung tungta hi.
Huin Lalpa thu, ‘Johan in tui ah mi abaptis veu a, hizongleh nang un chu Hagau Siangthou in baptisma na hung tang diing uh,’ achih chu ka hung hedoh kiitta hi.
Huchiin eiuh Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingtate kawma, Pathian in silpiaah ahung piaah bang a kawmva apiaah leh, kei bang giap hi Pathian nial gual ka hiaimah?” achi hi.
Hu thu chu ajaah tahun asipta va, “Huchi ahihleh, Pathian in Jentelte zong hing diinga akisiih uh phal ahita ve,” chiin Pathian aphatta uhi.
Huin Stephen tungtaang toh kisaia suhduhdahna ahung um jiaha taaithaangte chu Phinisia gamte, Kupra gamte, Antiok khuate tanpha ah atung va, Judate kawm chauh ah thu asoi uhi.
Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat chu Kupra gam leh Kureni khua a mite ahi uhi. Hu mite’n Antiok khua atun tahun Grik haam zang Judate zong ahoupih va, Lalpa Jesu tanchinpha ahilhta uhi.
Lalpa khut in amahuh panpihin mi tamtahin agingta va, Lalpa lam ahung ngatta uhi.
Huin a tanchin uh Jerusalem khua a kouhtuam umte’n aja va, Antiok khua tung diingin Barnaba asawlkhia uhi.
Huleh amah avatun a, Pathian hehpihna avamuhin akipaah mahmah a, a bawnun Lalpa a munkhat a um diingin ahasuan hi.
Ajiahchu amah chu mihoihtah, Hagau Siangthou leh ginna a dim ahi. Huleh mi tamtah Lalpa kawmah atelbehta uhi.
Huin Barnaba chu Saul hawl diingin Tarsa khua ah achiah hi.
Amah amuhin, Antiok khua ah ahung pui hi. Huleh hichi ahung hi a, kum khat kouhtuamte kikhopna ah atel va, mi tampi thu ahilh uhi. Antiok khua ah nungjuite chu Khristian chiha kouh ahi masapeen uhi.
Huleh hulaiin zawlnei koite aha Jerusalem apatin Antiok ah ahung suh uhi.
Huleh a lahva mi khat, a min Agaba kichi ading a, khovel zousiah ah kial loupitah tung diing ahi chih, Hagau hilhin ahesah hi. Hu kial chu Klaudias Kaisar lal laiin ahung tung hi.
Huin nungjuite’n ahihtheih daan chiatun, Judia gam a umte kawmah panpihna thot atum uhi.
Huchu abawlta ngeei va, Barnaba leh Saul khut ah, upate kawmah athotta uhi.
Hulai veelin kumpipa Herod in kouhtuamte laha khen khat bawl gentheih tumin aman a,
Johan sanggampa Jakob chu naamsau in asaatlum hi.
Hikhu in Judate akipaahsah chih amuh jiahin, Peter zong mat atum sawn hi. Hulai chu Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut lai ahi.
Amah amat tahin suangkul ah akhum a, sepaih hon li li chiat jeelin akiveen kheel sah a, Chiahkaan Kuut zoh chianga mipite kawmah puidoh atum hi.
Hujiahin Peter chu suangkul ah akoih tadih a, hizongleh kouhtuamte’n amah diingin phatuamngaitahin Pathian kawmah ahaamteisah zing uhi.
Peter chu Herod puidoh diing ni tun ma jaan in, sepaih nih kikaal ah khainiang nih bulhin a-ihmu a, huleh a veengtute zong kotkhaahbul ah aum va suangkul chu aveeng uhi.
Huleh en in, Lalpa angel khat a kawmah ahung a, suangkul sungah vaah ahung taangta a; Peter chu apang beengin aphawng a, “Thou kin in,” achi hi. Huleh khainiangte a khut apat aketa hi.
Huin angel in a kawmah, “Na kawng gaah inla, na keengtophah but in,” achi hi. Huleh ama’n huchibangin abawl hi. Huin angel in a kawmah, “Na puan silh inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
Huin Peter chu apawt a, ajuita hi. Angel silbawl chu atah ahih ahe sih a, hizongleh kilaahna amuh asa jaw hi.

Huleh veengtu masa leh anihna apelh nungun, khopi luutna siihkot chu atungta va, huchu amahuh diingin amah leh amah in ahung kihongta hi. Huleh apawt va, kotzing khat apaipeel va, huin, angel in apaisan pahta hi.
Huleh Peter chu ahung halh tahin, ama’n “Lalpa’n angel ahung sawl a, Herod khut leh Juda mite kinepna zousiah apatin ahung hundohta chih tuin chiantahin ka heta,” achi hi.
Hu sil angaihtuah zohin, Johan, Mark achih uh nu Mari inn ah avachiah a, hutah ah chu haamteina neiin mi tamtah ana-umkhawm uhi.
Peter in kotkhaah akiuh tahin, a min Rhoda kichi suaah nungaah nou khat adawng diingin ahung hi.
Peter aw ahih aheet tahin akipaah jiahin kot chu hong louin ataailuut kiit jawta a, Peter kotkhaahbul ah ading chih avasoi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Lungbuai hi teh,” achi uhi. Hizongleh ama’n chu thudih ahi chiin apang teeiteei hi. Huin amah un, “Hichu a angel ahi,” achi uhi.
Hizongleh Peter in kot akiu ngatngat a, huleh kot ahon tahun amah amu va, limdang asa mahmah uhi.

Hizongleh ama’n asipna diingun a khut in ajaap a, Lalpa’n suangkul apat amah apuidoh daan chu ahilhta hi. Huleh ama’n, “Hi thute Jakob leh unaute kawmah vahilh un,” achi hi. Huin apawt a, mun dang ah achiahta hi.
Ni asuaah tahin, sepaih haw chu Peter khoia um ahiai, chiin buai chihtahin abuaita uhi.
Herod in ahawl a, amuh louh tahin, a veengtute chu aendih a, thah diingin thu apeta hi. Huin Herod chu Judia gam apat Kaisaria khua ah achiah suh a, hutah ah aum zingta hi.

Huleh Herod chu Tura leh Sidon khua a mite tungah alungthah mahmah a, himahleh amah un kumpipa lupna pindan enkoltu Blasta chu athuzoh va, thukhat a luangin a kawmah ahung uhi, ajiahchu a khomite uh chu kumpipa gam a neehletaah a kinga ahih jiahun kilemna angeen uhi.
Huleh a ni chiam ni in Herod in a lalpuan asilh a, a laltouphah tungah atou a, a kawmvah thu asoi hi.
Huleh mipi chu kikouin, “Hichu pathian aw ahi, mihing a ahi sih,” achi uhi.
Huleh Pathian kawma paahtawina apiaah louh jiahin, Lalpa angel in amah aman pah ngaal a, huut in ane a, asita hi.
Hizongleh Pathian thu chu adalh a, apung jeel hi.
Huleh Barnaba leh Saul in a natoh uh azohun Jerusalem apat akihkiitta va Johan, Mark zong kichi chu a kawmvah apui uhi.

Antiok khua a kouhtuam umte lahah, zawlneite leh thuhilhtute aum uhi. Hute chu Barnaba leh Nigar achih uh Simeon leh Kureni a um Lukia leh gambung vaihawmtu Herod toh khang khawm Manaen leh Saul chihte ahi uhi.
Huleh Lalpa natong a an angawl laiun, Hagau Siangthou in, “Barnaba leh Saul keimah nna seem diinga ka kouh chu hung khenkhiahsah un,” achi hi.
Huleh an angawlva ahaamtei zohun, a tungvah a khut uh anga va, asawlta uhi.
Huchiin Hagau Siangthou sawldohin achiah va, Seliukia khopi ah achiah suh va, hu akipatin Kupra tuikulhgam lamah kuang in achiahta uhi.
Huleh Salamis a aum laiun, Judate sinagogte ah Pathian thu asoi va; Johan zong apanpih diingin apui uhi.
Huleh hu tuikulhgam chu tawnsuaahin Paphos ah atung va, hutah ah dawisiam, zawlnei tahlou, Judami khat amu va, a min chu Bar-Jesu ahi.
Hu mi chu gamoptu Sergia Paulas mipiltah kawma um ahi. Hu gamoptu’n Saul leh Barnaba chu akou a, Pathian thu jaah auut hi.
Hizongleh dawisiampa Elima (a haam va hu umjia chu dawisiam chihna mah ahi) in gamoptu chu ginlouhsah tumin, amahuh chu anadoudaal hi.
Huin Saul, Paul achih uh, chu Hagau Siangthou in adim a, amah chu aensaal a,
huin, “Aw nang miheem leh lepchiahna chinteng a dimpa, nang diabol tapa, nang dihtatna zousiah meelmapa, Lalpa lam dihtahte suhsiat tawplou diing na hi maw?

Tuin ngai in, Lalpa khut na tungah atu ahi, na mit ahung taw diing a, bangtan aha khovaah mulouin na um diing,” achi hi. Huin thakhatin meikaai leh mial a tungah ahung kia a; khut a kaitu diing hawlin avaah lehlehta hi.
Huin gamoptu in hu sil kibawl chu amu a, Lalpa thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah a, agingtata hi.
Huin Paul chu amah toh umte toh Paphos khua apatin achiah va, Pamphilia gam a Perga khua atung va, huleh Johan in amahuh nusiain Jerusalem ah akihkiitta hi.
Hizongleh amahuh chu Perga khua apat achiah jeel va, Pisidia gam a Antiok khua atung va, huleh Sabbath ni’n sinagog ah aluut va, atou uhi.
Huleh Daan Lehkhabu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute asim zohun sinagog a vaihawmte’n a kawmvah mi asawl va, “Ulenaute, mite hasotna thu soi diing na neih uh leh soi un,” achi uhi.
Huin Paul ading a, a khut a jaapin asoi a, “Israelmite leh nanguh Pathian laute, ngai un.
Hi Israel namte Pathian in i pulepate uh ateel a, Aigupta gam a aum laiun asuloupi a, tungnung khut haat in hu akipatin apuidohta hi.
Kum sawmli hun sung veel chu Ama’n gamdaai ah a silbawlte uh athuaah thei hi.
Huleh Kanaan gam a nam sagihte asuhmang zohin, a gam uh a kawmvah goutan in ahawmsah hi.
Hu nungin Ama’n kum za li leh sawmngaa sung vaihawmtute apia a, zawlnei Samuel chiangtanin.
Huleh hu nungin kumpi angeen va; huchiin kum sawmli sung diingin Pathian in Saul, Kis tapa Benjamin phung a mi, amahuh apia hi.

Huleh Ama’n amah asuanmang nungin a kumpipa diingun David atungdohta hi. Pathian in amah tungtaang ah hichu asoi a, ‘David, Jesse tapa, ka lungtang bang pua mi ka muta, ama’n chu ka deihlam phot abawl diing,’ achi hi.
“Hi mipa chihaahte lahah Pathian in a thuchiam dungjuiin Israel mite kawmah Hundampa Jesu ahung tungdohta hi.
Ahung main Johan in kisiihna baptisma thu Israel mi zousiah kawmah anahilh masa hi.

Huleh Johan in a lam ajuih zoh kuan laiin, ‘Nang un kua hi diingin na hung gingta viai? Amah chu hilou ka hi. Hizongleh ngai un, ka nung ah mi khat hung diing ahi, kei chu a keengtophah suut taah zong ka hi sih hi,’ achi hi.
“Ulenaute, Abraham suan tate haw, na lahva Pathian lau zousiahte haw, na kawmvah hi hutdamna thu ahung kithot hi.
Jerusalem a umte leh a lamkaite un Sabbath ni chin a asim uh zawlneite aw leh Amah chu ahe sih va, siamlouhtangsahin, hu thute anasutaangtungta uhi.
A sihna diing khop a tungah bangma amuh louh-un zong, Pilat kawmah hihlum diingin angeen uhi.
Huleh Amah tungtaang thu anakigelhsa zousiah asuhtaangtung zohun, sing dawn apatin alakhia va, haan ah asialta uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu Pathian in misi lah apat akaithou kiitta hi.
Huleh Amah toh Galili gam apat a Jerusalem khua a chiah toute kawmah ni tampi sung akilaah veu a, hu mite chu tuin mite kawmah a thu heetpihtute ahi uhi.
“Huleh kei un zong i pulepate uh kawma chiamsa, hu thuchiam tanchinpha kipaah huai ka hung hilh uhi.
Pathian in Jesu akaihthoh kiitna ah, huchu, ei a tate uh kawmah asutaangtung ahi. Phatna Late nihna ah, ‘Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni in ka hung hingkheta hi,’ chih gelh bangin.
“Huleh muatna mun a pai kiit talou diinga Pathian in Amah misi lah apat akaihthoh diing daan thu chu hichiin asoi hi, ‘David kawma ka piaah khotuahna muanhuai chu nangmah ka hung pe diing,’ chiin.
“Hujiahin Ama’n Phatna Late dangah, ‘Na Misiangthou chu muatna mu diingin na phal saam sih diing hi,’ achi kiit jeel hi.
“Ajiahchu David in chu Pathian vaihawmsah banga amah khang a mite nna atoh zohin, a-ihmuta hi. Huleh a pulepate kawmah asial va, amuat mangta hi.
Himahleh Pathian in akaihthohpa’n chu muatna amu sih hi.
“Hujiahin hichu he un, mite leh unaute, hi Pa vaanga sual ngaihdamna thu na kawmva kisoi ahi.
Kuapouh Amah gingta phot chu, Mosi daan thu a siam na tan zohlouhna vapat sil zousiah ah siamtansahin aum uhi.
Hujiahin pilvaang un, huchilou inchu Zawlneite Lehkhabute a hu thu kisoi na tungvah ahung tung kha diing hi:
‘Nanguh musittute, ngai un, limdangsa unla, mangthaai un. Ajiahchu na damsung un nna khat ka tong hi. Hu nna chu mi’n nanguh hung hilh mahleh uh, na gingta top sih diing uhi,’ chih chu,” achi hi.
Huleh sinagog apat Judate apawt tahun, Jentelte’n Sabbath ni kiit chianga hu thute chu a kawmva soi diingin angeen uhi.

Huleh kikhawmte chu akikhen jaah tahun, Juda tamtahte leh Juda sahkhua a kihei Pathian ngaihsah mi tamtahte’n Paul leh Barnaba ajui va, amah un amahuh chu anahoupih va, Pathian hehpihna a um zing diingin athuzoh uhi.
Huleh Sabbath ni kiit in a khopi pumpi phial un Pathian thu ngaikhe diingin ahung kikhawm uhi.
Hizongleh Judate’n mipite amuh tahun, athangse mahmah va, Paul thusoi chu akalh va, asoisia uhi.

Huin Paul leh Barnaba in hangsantahin asoi va, “Pathian thu hi nanguh kawma soi masat diing mawng ahi. Hizongleh na khinkhiah va, kumtuanga hing taahlou a na kikoih nungun, Jentelte lam ka ngatta uhi chih he un.
Ajiahchu Lalpa’n hichi bangin kei uh thu ahung pia hi: ‘Jentelte vaah hi diingin ka hung guat a, kawlmong tanpha a hutdamna hi diingin,’ chih gelh bangin,” achi hi.
Huleh Jentelte’n hu thu ajaah tahun akipaah va, Lalpa thu chu atawisang va; kumtuanga hing diinga guat taphot in agingta uhi.
Huleh Lalpa thu chu hu gam pumpi ah adalhta hi.
Hizongleh Judate’n Pathian ngaihsah numei zahtaathuaite leh khopi sunga mipoimohte achiilsia va, Paul leh Barnaba chu asuduhdah va, a gam vapat adelhdohta uhi.
Huin amah un a tungvah a keengpeeh va leivui athing khia va, Ikoniam ah achiahta uhi.
Huleh nungjuite chu kipaahna leh Hagau Siangthou in adimta uhi.
Huleh Ikoniam ah hichi ahung hi a, Judate sinagog ah aluut khawm va, thu asoi uhi. Huchiin Judate leh Grikte tamtah in zong agingta uhi.
Hizongleh gingtalou Judate’n Jentelte achiilsia va, unaute amudahsahta uhi.
Hujiahin Lalpa ah hangsantaha thu soiin hutah ah sawttah aum uhi. Ama’n chiamchihnate leh sillimdangte a khut va hihsahin, a hehpihna thu ahesah jeel hi.
Hizongleh khopi sunga mipite chu akilangkhen uhi: khenkhat in Judate agum va, khenkhat in apostolte agum uhi.
Huin Jentelte leh Judate’n a houtute uh toh kithuaha apostolte zumhuaitaha bawl diing leh suang a seh diing angaihtuah va,
amah un hichu anahe va, Lukaonia gam a khopite Lystra, Derbe ah leh a kiimveel gamte ah ataaidohta uhi.
Hutah ah chu tanchinpha asoita uhi.
Huleh Lystra ah keeng zoi koiaha mi khat atou a, a pian tung apat jeng mawng ahi a, keeng in apai ngei sih hi.
Hu mi in Paul thusoi angaikhia a; Paul in guntahin aen den a, a damna diingin ginna anei chih ahe a,
aw ngaihtahin, “Na keeng in ding tang in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu akitawm a, a keeng in apaita hi.
Huleh mipite’n Paul silbawl chu amuh tahun, ngaihtaha kikouin, Lukaonia haamin, “Mihing banga pathiante chu i kawmva hung suh ahi uh,” achi uhi.
Huleh Barnaba chu Zeus, achi va, Paul chu thusoipeen ahih jiahin, Hermi, achi uhi.
Huin khopi kot maai a milem biahinn a Zeus siampupa’n bawngtalte leh paahkhi chu kotpi bul ah ahung tawi a, mipite toh amahuh geel biahna in lat atumta hi.
Hizongleh apostolte, Barnaba leh Paul in hichu atheih tahun, a puan uh abotkeeh va, mipi laha tawmluutin akikou va,

“Unaute, bang diinga hi silte bawl na hi viai? Keiuh zong nanguh toh pianken kibang mihing ka hi uhi. Hi sil thulimloute na kiheisan va, vaan leh lei, tuikhanglian leh a sunga sil um zousiah bawlpa Pathian hing kawma na hung kihei theihna diingun tanchinpha ka hung tut uh ahi.
Huleh Pathian in chu nidanglaiin nam chin amahuh lampi chiat a achiah uh anaphal hi.

Ahihvaangin Amah tungtaang heetsahna bawllouin ana-umsah sih hi. Huchiin sil hoih abawl jeel a, vaan apat guahtui leh gahpha bangkim ahung pia a, i lungtang uh neeh diing leh kipaahna in asudim zing hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh hi thute soiin, mipite’n amahuh biahna diinga gan agoh diing uh akhap zou haamhaam uhi.
Huleh Antiok leh Ikoniam khua apat Judate hutah ah ahung va, mipite chu athuzoh zou va, huchiin Paul chu suang in asep va, si a agintaat jiahun khopi gei lamah akaidoh uhi.
Ahihvaangin nungjuite a kiim a adin laiun, ahung thou a, khopi sungah ahung luut kiitta hi. Huleh a jiing in Barnaba toh Derbe khua ah achiahta uhi.
Amah un hu khopi ah tanchinpha asoi va, nungjui tampi asiam va, Lystra, Ikoniam leh Antiok khua ah akihkiitta va,
“Gimna tampi thuaahin Pathian lalgam ah i luut diing mawng ahi,” chiin nungjuite lungsim akipsah va, ginna a um zingzing diingin ahasot uhi.
Kouhtuam chin a upate ateel va, an ngawla ahaamtei zohun, amahuh chu agin uh Lalpa kawmah akeemsahta uhi.
Pisidia gam chu atawnsuaah va, Pamphilia gam atung uhi.
Perga khua a thu asoi zohun, Attalia ah achiah suh uhi.
Hutah apatin kuang in akitawl va, hu a natoh zohte uh tong diinga Pathian hehpihna a kepsaha aumna mun uh Antiok ah akilehkiitta uhi.
Huleh ahung tunun, kouhtuamte chu akoukhawm va, Pathian in amahuh zanga sil abawl zousiah leh Jentelte diinga ginna kotkhaah ahonsah daante ahilh uhi.
Huchiin nungjuite toh sawttah aum khawmta uhi.
Huleh mi bangzah aha Judia gam apatin ahung suh va, “Mosi daan banga zeh na tan louh uh leh hutdam na hi thei sih diing uh,” chiin unaute ahilh uhi.

Huleh huchia Paul leh Barnaba chu amahuh toh kikhinga hahniala akinial phetun, Paul leh Barnaba chu a lahva mi bangzah aha toh hu thubuai tungtaang ah, Jerusalem a apostolte leh upate kawma chiah tou diingin aguat uhi.
Huin kouhtuamte’n amahuh chu asawl va, amah un Jentelte kisiih kiit daan thu soi jeelin, Phinisia gam leh Samaria gam tawnin apai va, huchiin unaute zousiah nasatahin akipaahsah uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem atunun kouhtuamte leh apostolte leh upate’n amahuh anakipaahpih va; huin Pathian in amahuh zanga a silbawlte zousiah asoi uhi.
Hizongleh Pharisai pawl a gingtu koite aha ading va, “Jentelte’n zeh atan uh akuul a, huleh Mosi daan jui diinga hilh diing ahi uh,” achi uhi.
Huin apostolte leh upate chu hu thu ngaihtuah diingin akikhawm uhi.
Sawttah akinial nungun, Peter ading a, a kawmvah, “Ulenaute, Jentelte’n keimah kam a tanchinpha ja a, a gintaatna diingva Pathian in nidanglaia, i lah vapat ahung guatdaan na he uhi.
Huleh lungsim hetu Pathian in eihaw ahung piaah bangmahin Hagau Siangthou a kawmva piain, aheetpihta hi.
Huleh eihaw leh amahuh khentuam neilouin, ginna in a lungsim uh ahih siangthou hi.
Huchiin i pulepate leh eihawn zong i zohlouhsa uh namkol chu tuin nungjuite ngawng a baat tuma bang diinga Pathian je-et na hi viai?
Hizongleh amahuh tobangin, eihaw zong Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna a hutdam diing hiin i kigingta uhi,” achi hi.
Huin mipi zousiah asipta va, Barnaba leh Paul in Pathian in amahuh zanga Jentelte laha chiamchihna leh sil loupi abawl thu asoi uh angaikhia uhi.
Asoi zohun, Jakob in asoi a, “Ulenaute, ka thu ngai un.
Pathian in Amah min po diingin a lah vapat mi hon khat ladoh diingin amasain Jentelte aveh hi chih thu Simon in asoita hi.
Huleh hi thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thu akituaah hi:
‘Hizoh chiangin ka hung kiit diing a, David biahbuuh puuhsa ka bawl kiit diing; a siatna ka bawl kiit diing a, huchiin ka tungding diing hi.
Midangte leh Jentelte ka min a kikou zousiahte’n LALPA ahawlna diingun, hi silte zousiah bawlpa LALPA’N achi hi,’ chih gelh bangin.
“Pathian in a silbawlte zousiah chu kumtuang apat aheet ahi.
“Hujiahin Jentelte laha Pathian lama kiheite chu hihbuai dah lei chih ka ngaihdaan ahi.
Milem biahna, sil sianglou neehte, kingaihna thaanghuai, akiheehlup thoh sa leh sisan neeh chihte tawpsan diingin a kawmvah gial lehhang, ka chi jaw hi.
Ajiahchu sinagogte a Sabbath ni tenga amah thu chu sim ahih jiahin, nidanglai apatin khopi chin ah Mosi in amah tungtaang soitu anei hi,” achi hi.

Huin apostolte leh upate’n kouhtuam zousiah toh, a lahva mi teel a Paul leh Barnaba toh Antiok khua a chiahsah hoih asa uhi. Ateelte uh min chu Barsaba kichi Juda, achih uh leh Sila ahi va, amahuh chu unaute laha houtu ahi uhi.
Hichibanga kigial lehkhathot chu a khut vah athot uhi: Apostolte leh upate leh unaute’n Antiok khua leh Syria leh Silisia gam a um Jentel unaute kawmah: Chibai.

Ka lah vakipatin mi khenkhat, “Zeh na tan va, daan thu zong na juih diing uh ahi,” chia thu soiin nanguh hung subuaiin, na lungsim uh amangbangsah chih ka he va, a kawmvah lah thu bangmah ka pe ngaal sih uhi.
Hujiahin ka kithugual zohun, mi teeldoh a, ka deihtah uh Barnaba leh Paul,
Lalpa Jesu Khrist min jiaha sih khawhsaloua um tegeel toh, na kawmva mi hung sawl chu hoih ka sa uhi.
Huchiin Juda leh Sila ka hung sawl va, amah un zong hi thu kam in ahung hilh diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou leh kei un hi thu poimohte chihlouh puaahgih dang bangmah na tungvah ngahlouh hoih ka sa uhi:

milem biahna sa neeh bang, sisan neeh bang, akiheehlup thoh sa neeh bang leh kingaihna thaanghuai bang tawp leh uh chin ka chi uhi. Hi haw na tawp uh leh, nanguh diingin ahoih diing hi. Damtahin um un, chiin.
Huchiin asawlkheta va, Antiok khua atun tahun mipi akoukhawm va, lehkhathot chu apeta uhi.
Huchu asim zohun, hamuanna thu jiahin akipaah mahmahta uhi.
Juda leh Sila zong zawlnei ahi va, thu tamtah in unaute chu ahamuan va, asukip uhi.
Huleh hutah a sawttah aum nungun amahuh chu hamuangtahin unaute lah apat apostolte kawmah achiahsahta uhi.
Sila in chu hu mun a umtaahdih hoih asa hi.
Paul leh Barnaba chu Antiok ah Lalpa thu hilh leh soiin midang tamtah toh aum zing uhi.
Ni bangzah aha nungin Paul in Barnaba kawmah, “I chiahkiit diing a, kho chin a Lalpa thu i soina zousiah a unaute vaveh ni, bangchiin aum viai chih i vaen diing,” achi hi.
Huleh Barnaba in Mark kichi Johan chu a kawmvah pui atum hi.
Hizongleh Pamphilia gam a amahuh kiihsan a, natohna a amahuh toh anachiah loupa chu a kawmva pui diing Paul in hoih asa sih hi.
Huchiin nasataha kinialin akikhen uhi. Barnaba in Mark apui a, Kupra gam ah kuang in achiahta hi.
Huleh Paul in Sila ateel a, unaute’n Pathian hehpihna a akolsah nungun achiahdohta hi.
Huleh kouhtuamte sukip jeelin Syria leh Silisia gam tawnin achiah uhi.
Huin amah chu Derbe leh Lystra ah ahung a; ngai in, hutah ah Timothi kichi, nungjui khat aum hi. Amah chu gingtu, Juda numei koiaha tapa ahi a, hizongleh a pa chu Grikmi ahi.
Amah chu Lystra leh Ikoniam aum unaute’n asoiphat mahmah uh ahi.
Paul in amah chu tonpih diingin adeih a, apui hi. Hu kiimveel a Juda umte jiahin a zeh atansah hi, amah un a pa Grikmi ahi chih aheet jiahun.
Khopite tawna apai kawm-un, amah un Jerusalem a um apostolte leh upate’n anamdet uh thupuuhnate chu a kawmvah juih diingin apekhia uhi.
Huchiin kouhtuamte chu ginna ah asukipta va, ni chin in apung deuhdeuhta uhi.
Asia gam a thusoi diing Hagau Siangthou in akhap jiahin amah un Phrigia gam leh Galatia gam atawnsuaah va,
Mysia gam kawm atun tahun, Bithunia gam ah luut atum va, hizongleh Hagau in aphal sih hi.
Huchiin Mysia gam akhen va, Troas ah achiahsuhta uhi.
Huleh jaan laiin Paul in kilaahna amu a, Makedonia gam a mi khat dingin, “Makedonia gam ah hung gaalkaai inla, hung panpih in,” chia ngeenin amu hi.
Huleh hu kilaahna amuh zohin a kawmva tanchinpha soi diingin Lalpa’n ahung kou ahi chih ka heetun, Makedonia gam ah chiah ka tum pah uhi.
Huchiin Troas khua apat kuang in ka pawt va, zangtahin Samothrake tuikulhgam ah ka chiah va, a jiing in Niapoli ah ka chiah jeel uhi.
Hu apatin Philippi ah ka chiah va, huchu Makedonia gam a kho poimoh khat ahi a, Rom mite teenna veeng ahi. Hu khopi ah ni bangjaat aha ka taam uhi.
Sabbath ni in khopi polam a luuipang ah haamteina mun hia ka gintaat vah ka chiah uhi. Huin ka tou va, numei hung paikhawmte kawmah thu ka soi uhi.
Huleh numei khat a min Lidia, puan sandup juaah, Thiateira khopi a um, Pathian be mi in ka thu uh aja a, Paul thusoi jui diingin Lalpa’n a lungtang asuhvaahsah hi.
Huleh amah leh a innkote’n baptisma atan zohun, “Lalpa a ginuma na hung ngaih uh leh, ka inn ah hung unla hung tung un,” chiin ahung kou hi. Huchiin ahung houtaang teeiteeita hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, haamteina mun a ka chiah laiun, suaah nungaah kua aha aisaansiam jawl in ahung kituaahpih hi. Ama’n chu a aisaan jiahin a pute sum tamtah amuhsah veu hi.
Hu mi in chu Paul leh keiuh kikouin ahung jui a, “Hi mite, hutdamna lampi hung hilhte hi Tungnungpeen Pathian suaahte ahi uh,” achi hi.

Huchiin ni tamtah huchibangin ahih a, huin Paul in jadah mahmahin akihei a, dawi kawmah, “Jesu Khrist min in a sung apat pawt diingin thu ka hung pia ahi,” achi hi. Huleh amah chu hu laitahin apawt pah hi.
Huleh a pute’n summuh akinepna uh abei, chih aheet tahun, Paul leh Sila aman va dawlmun ah thukhentute ma ah akailuut uhi.
Thukhentute kawmah apui va, “Hite hi Judami ahi va, ka khopi uh atohbuai mahmah uhi.
Ei Rom mite’n i laah va i zop sianglou tawndaante juihsah ahung tum uhi,” achi uhi.
Huchiin mipite chu amahuh sual diingin ahung kipan uhi. Thukhentute’n a puan uh abohkeehsah va chiangpum a jeep diingin thu apia uhi.
Tampivei ajeep zohun, suangkul ah akhum va, a suangkul veengtu kawmah bittaha veeng diingin thu apia uhi.
Huchitaha thu apiaah jiahun, ama’n chu suangkul sungnung jaw ah akhum a, a keengte vah singkol abutsah hi.
Hizongleh jaankhang laiin Paul leh Sila chu ahaamtei va, Pathian kawmah phatna la asa va, huleh mitaangte’n angaikhia uhi.
Thakhatin jiil nasatahin ahung kiliing a, huchiin suangkul innbulte ahung liing a, kot zousiah chu kihong pahin, mi chin kolbuhte ahung kiphel vehta hi.
Huin suangkul veengtu chu ihmu ahung halh a, suangkul kotkhaahte kihong amuhin mitaangte chu taaimangta uh asa a, a naamsau adoh a, kithah atum hi.
Hizongleh Paul chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Bangmah kiloh sin, ajiahchu ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi,” achi hi.
Huin a veengtu’n chu thaumei akan a, atawmluut a, kithing kawma hungin, Paul leh Sila ma ah akhupbohta hi.
Huleh amahuh chu ahung puidoh a, “Pute, hutdama umna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.
Huin amah un, “Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingta in, huchiin hutdamin na um diing, nang leh na innkuante,” achi uhi.
Huin amah un a kawm leh a inn a um zousiah kawmah Lalpa thu asoita uhi.
Ama’n amahuh chu hu jaan hu daah mahin apui a, ajeepna golhte uh asilsiang hi. Huin amah leh a innkote zousiah in baptisma atang pah ngaal uhi.
Amahuh chu a inn sungah apui a, a ma vah an alui a, Pathian agintaat jiahun a innkote zousiah toh akipaah uhi.
Ni asuaah in, thukhentute’n, “Hu mite hah in,” chiin mimantute asawl uhi.
Suangkul veengtu in Paul kawmah hu thu ahilh a, “Thukhentute’n nanguh hah diingin mi ahung sawl uhi; hujiahin tuin pawt unla hamuangtahin chiah un,” achi hi.

Hizongleh Paul in a kawmvah, “Rom khualetui hihna nei mite ka hi ngaalva, ka tungthu uh atanna umlouin vaantaang mitmuhin ahung jeep va, suangkul ah ahung khum uhi. Tuin aguuha hung delhkhiah sawm ahi uh maw? Hithei ngeilou diing! Amahuh mahmah hung uh henla hung puidoh uh heh,” achi hi.
Huleh mimantute’n hu thute chu thukhentute kawmah ahilh uhi. Rom khualetui hihna nei mite ahi uh chih ajaah tahun alauta uhi.
Huin amahuh ahung va, ajawl va, apuidoh va, khopi nuse diingin angeen uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu suangkul apat apawt va Lidia inn ah aluut va; unaute amuh tahun ahasot va, apawtta uhi.
Huleh Amphipoli leh Apollonia apaipeel va, Thessalonika atungta va, hutah ah chu Judate sinagog aum hi.
Paul chu amah ngeinain, a kawmvah aluut a, Sabbath ni thumvei Pathian Lehkhathu apat akikuppih a,
Khrist chu gimthuaah diing mawng ahihdaan bang, huleh misi lah apat thou kiit ngeei diing ahihdaan hilhchianin, “Hi na kawmva ka soi Jesu chu Khrist ahi” chiin ahilhchian a, asulang hi.
Huchiin a lahva mi khenkhat in agingta va Paul leh Sila chu azopta uhi, Pathian ngaihsah Grik mipi nasatah leh numei lamkai tamtahte toh.

Hizongleh ginglou Judate’n ahuphulh jiahun dawlmun a migilou thasia kuate aha a kawmva pui in mipi akoukhawm va, khopi sung teng asubuaita uhi. Huin Jason inn aluh va, amahuh chu vaantaang laha puikhiah atum uhi.
Huleh amahuh amuh louh phetun, Jason leh unau dang kuate aha khopi sung thukhentute kawmah akailuut va, kikouin, “Hi khovel hihbuai lumlette hi ah zong ahung uh;
Jason in anazintungsah a, hite zousiah in kumpi dang, a min Jesu aum hi, chiin Kaisar thuphuan kalhin aum uhi,” achi uhi.
Mipite leh khopi sung thukhentute’n hu thu ajaahun abuaita uhi.
Huleh amah un Jason leh midangte kawm apatin a luangva heen diing sil alaah zohun, amahuh ahahta uhi.
Huleh unaute’n ajaan ajaan in Paul leh Sila chu Beria ah asawlkhe pah uhi. Hutah avatun tahun Judate sinagog ah aluut uhi.
Hu mite chu Thessalonika a mite saangin a lungsim uh anakihong jaw va, lungsim kilawptahin thu chu apom va, a thusoi uh chu adih leh dihlouh heetna diingin ni chinin Pathian Lehkhathu ah ahawl uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh laha tamtah in agingta uhi, Grik numei leh pasal zahum tampite toh.
Hizongleh Thessalonika khua a Judate’n Paul in Beria khua ah Pathian thu asoita chih aheet tahun, hutah ah zong ahung va, mipite ahung tohbuai uhi.
Huin kintahin unaute’n Paul chu tuikhanglian tan a chiah diingin asawlkhe pah va, hizongleh Sila leh Timothi chu hutah ah aum denta uhi.
Paul puitute’n chu Athen tanin apui va; Sila leh Timothi chu akintheipatawpa a kawma hung diinga a thuhaah chu puain achiahta uhi.
Paul in Athen a amahuh anangaah laiin, hu khopi chu milem pathiante a dimin amu a, a lungsim asuna hi.
Hujiahin sinagog ah Judate leh Pathian ngaihsahte ahoulimpih a, dawlmun ah zong ana-um photmahte chu ni chinin ahoulimpih jeel hi.

Huin Epikuriamite leh Stoikmite laha mipil kuate aha in zong amah ahung kinialpih uhi. Huleh khenkhat in, “Hi thasia kamtam in bang ahiai asoi tup?” achi uhi. Akhen dangte’n, Jesu thu leh thohkiitna tanchinpha asoi jiahin, “Amah chu gam dang pathiante thusoitu ahihtuaah hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh amah chu apui va Areopaga ah atut va, a kawmah, “Hi thuhilhna thah na soi hi na hung hesah thei diai?
Silmah bang aha ka bil vah na hung tut ahi; hujiahin hi silte umjia ka he uut uhi,” achi uhi.
Ajiahchu Athenmi haw zousiah leh a khua va zin umte’n zong, ahun uh sildang bangmaha zang louin thu thah taphot soiin aha, angaikhe beehin aha aum veu uhi.
Huin Paul chu Areopaga mual laitah ah ading a, thu asoi hi, “Nanguh Athen mite haw, bangkim ah sahkho ngaihsahtah mi na hi uh chih ka he hi.
Ajiahchu ka vaahleh kawm a, na biahte uh ka et leh maitaam khat tungah, HEETLOUH PATHIAN A DIING, chia kigial ka mu hi. Hujiahin heloupi-a na biah uh, hu Amah chu ka hung hilh ahi.
“Pathian, khovel leh a sunga sil zousiah siamtu chu, vaan leh lei Lalpa ahihjiahin, khut a bawl biahinnte bang ah aum ngei sih hi.
Amah chu sil tasam bangin mihing khut a natohsahin zong aum ngei sih hi. Ajiahchu Amah ngeei chu bangkim kawmah hinnate, haihna leh sil zousiah petu ahijaw hi.
Leitung zousiah a teeng diingin sisan khat apatin nam chin a mihingte Ama’n asiam hi. Amahuh diingin hunbiihte aguat a, a teenna gamgi uh zong akhamsah hi.
Amah chu eite chiat apat gamla sih zongleh, amah un Lalpa ahung hawl va, amai amai va Amah ahung muhna diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Amah ah i hing va, i taang va, i um uhi, na laphuaahsiam uh kuate aha in zong, ‘Ei zong Amah haahte i hi ngaalva,’ chia asoi bangun.
“Huchiin Pathian haahte i hih jiahun, Pathian Pianken Umdaan chu sana pouh, dangka pouh, suang pouh, mihing khutsiam leh suhtuaha kheen milem tobang ahi, chih i ngaihtuah diing uh ahi sih.
Pathian in i heetlouh laite uh akiheetmohbawl a, hizongleh tuin chu mun chin a mi zousiah kisiih diingin thu apeta hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n Mi aguatpa tungtawna khovel dihtatna a avaihawmna diing ni chu aguatta hi; huchiin Ama’n misi lah apat Amah akaihthohna ah a silguat muanhuaina mi zousiah kawmah alangsahta hi,” chiin.
Huleh amah un misi lah apat thohkiitna thu ajaah tahun, khenkhat in anuihsan va, adang in, “Hi thu na kawmah ka ngaikhe kiit diing uh,” achi uhi.
Huchiin Paul chu a lah vakipat apawtta hi.
Hizongleh mi khenkhatte’n amah azop va huleh agingta uhi. Huleh amahuh laha khenkhat chu Areopaga pawl a mi Dionisia leh numei khat, a min Damari ahi a, huleh a kawmva midangte toh ahi uhi.
Hu silte zohin Paul chu Athen apat apawt a, Korinth ah achiahta hi.

Huleh a min Akuila, Judami khat amu a, hu mi chu Ponta gam a piang ahi a, Klaudias in Judate zousiah Rom apat pawt diingin thu apiaah jiaha a ji Prisilla toh Italy gam apat hung tungpan phet ahi va; Paul chu a kawmvah ahung hi.
A natoh uh kibang ahih jiahin a kawmvah atung a, a natoh uh chu puanbuuh bawl ahih jiahin atongkhawmta uhi.
Sabbath ni chinin sinagog ah thu asuutpih a, Judate leh Grikte chu thuzoh atum hi.
Huleh Sila leh Timothi chu Makedonia apat ahung tunun, Hagau in Paul chu thusoi diingin aphuut a, huleh Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih Judate kawmah ahilhchian veu hi.

Hizongleh amah un amah chu kalhin asoisia va, Paul in a puan athing a, a kawmvah, “Na sisan moh uh na tungvah kituh heh; na sisan vapat kei ka siang ahi. Tu kalsiah Jentelte kawmah ka chiahta diing hi,” achi hi.
Hu apatin achiah a, mi khat a min Jasta achih uh inn ah aluut a, hu mi’n chu Pathian abe veu a, a inn zong sinagog toh kizom ahi.
Huleh Krispa, sinagog houtu in a innkuante zousiah toh Lalpa agingta uhi. Korinth a mi tamtah in zong jain agingta va, baptisma atangta uhi.
Huin jaanin Lalpa chu Paul kawmah manglam bangin akilaah a, “Lau sinla, sip louin thu soi jeelin.
Ajiahchu na kawmah ka um zing ahi, hung suna diingin kuamah in na tungah khut aha sih diing uh, hi khopi ah mi tampi ka nei ngaala,” achi hi.
Huleh Paul chu hutah ah a lahva Pathian thu hilhin kum khat leh ha guup aumta hi.
Huleh Gallio, Akaia gamoptu ahih laiin, Judate’n kithutuaahin Paul asual va, vaihawmna touphah ma ah atut va,
“Hi pa soplai in daan kalh jawngin Pathian be diingin mi aheem puuh hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh Paul in dawng diinga akisah laitahin, Gallio in Judate kawmah, “Aw nanguh Judate, hi haw hi sil dihlou thu aha, sil hihsual thu aha beeh hileh, ka hung ngaihsahna diing jiah aum diing hi.
Hizongleh thute, minte, nanguh daan thute giap ahihleh vaang, nang un kingaihtuah jaw un; ajiahchu ke’n huchibang thu ka ngaihtuah uut sih hi,” achi hi.
Huleh vaihawmna touphah apatin amahuh adelhmangta hi.
Huin Grikmi zousiah in sinagog houtu Sostheni aman va, vaihawmna touphah ma ah avua uhi. Himahleh Gallio in hu a silbawlte uh poi asa sih hi.

Huleh hu nungin Paul chu ni sawttah ataam nalai hi. Huzohin unaute chu kampha in akhen a, Prisilla leh Akuila toh Syria gam lamah kuang in achiahta uhi. Kichiamna aneih jiahin, Kenkria ah Paul in a sam ameet hi.
Huin Ephesi atung a, amahuh hutah ah anuseta hi; hizongleh amah chu sinagog ah aluut a, Judate toh thu asuutkhawmta uhi.
Huleh amah un a kawmva sawt deuh taam diingin angeen va, amah auut sih a,
hizongleh kampha in akhen a, “Jerusalem a kuut um diing ah tel ngeei ka tum hi. Pathian in aphal leh, na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing hi,” achi hi. Huleh Ephesi akipatin kuang in achiahta hi.
Huleh Kaisaria ahung kaaiin, achiah tou a, kouhtuamte chibai abuuh a, Antiok ah achiahsuhta hi.
Huleh hutah ah ni tam lou aum nungin, achiah kiit a, nungjuite zousiah sukip diingin Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam zousiah atuansuaah hi.
Huleh Judami khat a min Apollo, Alexandria khua a piang, thusoi siam leh Pathian Lehkhathu he deuh mei, Ephesi ah achiah hi.
Hu mi chu Lalpa lampi thu jilsiamsahsa ahi a, Johan baptisma chauh he hizongleh, hagau a guntuhtaha Lalpa tanchin dihtaha soiin ahilh jeel hi.
Huleh sinagog ah hangsantahin thu asoi panta hi. Prisilla leh Akuila in a thusoi ajaah tahun a inn vah apui va, a kawmah Pathian lampi thu kichian seemin ahilh chianta uhi.
Huleh ama’n Akaia gam a chiah peh atup phetin, unaute’n ahasuan va, amah anakipaahpihna diingun nungjuite kawmah lehkha athotta uhi. Amah atun tahin, hehpihna jaala gingtate nasatahin apanpih hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n silbawltheitahin vaantaang heetin Judate anialdong a, Pathian Lehkhathu zangin Jesu chu Khrist ahi, chih ahilhchian hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Apollo hi Korinth a aum kaalin Paul chu khosah gamte tuansuaah zouin Ephesi ahung tung hi. Huleh nungjui kuate aha ahawldoh hi.
Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na gintaat laitahun Hagau Siangthou na tang viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hagau Siangthou aum chih zong ka ja kha ngei mawngmawng sih uh,” achi uhi.
Huin ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang baptisma ahiai na tan uh?” achi hi. Amah un, “Johan baptisma,” achi uhi.
Huin Paul in, “Johan in chu mi kawmah a nunga hung diing Khrist Jesu chu na gintaat diing uh ahi, chiin kisiihna baptisma in abaptis ahi,” achi hi.
Amah un hichu ajaah tahun, Lalpa Jesu min in baptisma atangta uhi.
Huleh Paul in a tungva a khut angah tahin, Hagau Siangthou a tungvah ahung tungta a, haamdangte in ahaam va, zawlnei bangin thu asoilawh uhi.
Huleh a bawnun pasal sawmlenih veel ahi uhi.
Huleh Paul chu sinagog ah aluut a, ha thum sung diing hangsantahin thu asoi a, Pathian lalgam tungtaang thu ah houlimpihin mi ajawl tuuntuun jeel hi.
Hizongleh khenkhat in a lungtang uh akhauhsah va thu amang sih va, mipi ma a hu Lampi chu asoisiat tahun, amahuh achiahsan hi. Nungjuite apuituam a, Tiranna skul ah ni chinin akihoulimpihta hi.
Huleh hichibangin kum nih sung aum a; huchiin Asia gam a um zousiah, Judate leh Grikte’n Lalpa Jesu thu ajata uhi.
Huleh Pathian in Paul khut in silmah tungtuang tahtahte abawlsah hi.
Huchiin a sa tung apatin puan themte aha teenthuahte aha bang damloute kawmah ahung tawi va, anatnate uh adam jeel a, huleh a sung vapat dawite zong apawt jeel uhi.
Huin dawite nohdoh siam Judami vaah lehleh khenkhat in, “Paul in a thu ataangkoupih veu Jesu min in ka hung vau uhi,” chiin dawipaaite tungah Lalpa Jesu min alou veu vial uhi.
Huleh Judami, siampu lal khat, Skeva in hutobang bawl tapa sagih anei hi.
Hizongleh dawi gilou in chu adawng a, “Jesu ka he hi, Paul zong ka he hi, himahleh nanguh koite na hi viai?” achi hi.
Huin dawipaai pa’n chu amahuh ahung boh a, azou a, anuaisiahta a; huchiin hu inn apatin saguaah leh liamin ataaidohta uhi.
Huleh hichu Ephesi khua a teeng zousiah, Judate leh Grikte kawmah athangta a; lauhna chu a bawnva tungah ahung tung a, Lalpa Jesu min chu tawisangin aumta hi.
Huleh agingta zong tamtah ahung va, a silbawlte uh thupha atawi va, akiphuangta uhi.
Mitphialdawi tawi mi tampi in zong a lehkhabu uh ahung tawi khawm va, mi zousiah mitmuhin ahaalta va; aman asuut va, dangka saang sawmngaa apha hi.
Huchiin loupitahmaiin Lalpa thu chu nasatahin akithehdalh a, agualzou jeel hi.
Hu silte abawlzoh nungin, Paul in Hagau in, Makedonia gam leh Akaia gam atotsuaah zoh chianga Jerusalem a chiah atum a, “Hu a ka chiah zoh chiangin, Rom zong ka vapha teeiteei diing,” achi hi.
Huchiin amah panpihtute mi nih Timothi leh Erasta chu Makedonia gam ah asawl a, hizongleh amah chu Asia gam ah hun tomkhat aum tadih hi.
Hulai veelin hu Lampi thu jiahin mi abuai nasaten uhi.
Ajiahchu mi khat a min Demetria, dangka siih kheengtu, dangka siih a Artemis milem biahinn bawltu in khutsiamte kawmah kilohna tampi ape jeel hi.
Hu mipa’n a natoh banguh tongte toh amahuh akoukhawm a, huin a kawmvah, “Pute aw, hi natohna hi i hauhna uh ahi, chih na thei uhi.
Hi Ephesi chauh ah hilouin, Asia gam pumpi phial ah zong, khut a bawlte chu pathiante ahi sih uh, chiin hi Paul in mi tampi athuzoh a, akiheisah zouta hi chih, nanguh ngeei in na mu un na ja uhi.

Huchiin i kiveina uh manlouh ahung suah diing lauhuai chauh zong ahi sih a, pathiannu loupi Artemis biahinn zong simmohin ahung um kha diing a, huleh Asia gam pumpi leh khovel in abiah uh amahnu ngeei zong a loupina apat suhngiamin ahung um kha diing chih alauhuai ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh hu thute ajaah tahun athangtawm mahmah va, “Ephesi mite Artemis chu aloupi hi!” chiin akikou uhi.
Huin a kho pumpi abuai vehta va, Gaia leh Aristarka, Makedonia gam a mi, Paul in a khualzinna a atonpih tegeel chu aman va, kituaahtahin etnop inn ah ataailuutpihta uhi.
Paul in mi laha luut atup leh nungjuite’n aphal sih uhi.
Huleh Asia gam a houtute laha Paul lawmte khenkhat in a kawmah mi asawl va, etnop inn a luut het lou diingin angeen uhi.
Khenkhat thu khatin akikou va, khenkhat thudang in akikou uhi, ajiahchu kikhawmte chu abuai va, mi tamjaw in a kikhopna san uh zong ahe sih uhi.
Huleh mipi lah apat Alexandar akaidoh va, Judate’n amah chu ama lamah asawn uhi. Alexandar in a khut in ajaap a, mipite kawmah a siamna thu soi atum hi.
Hizongleh amah Judami ahi chih aheet tahun, daah kaal nih sung diing veel aw kituaahtahin, “Ephesi mite Artemis chu aloupi hi!” chiin akikou kou uhi.

Huleh khopi lehkhagialtu in mipi adaihsah zohin, “Nanguh Ephesi mite, Ephesi hi Artemis pathiannu loupi biahinn keemtu khopi ahi chih leh a lim vaan apat hung kesuh khu keemtu ahi chih helou koi aum ei?
Huchiin hi thu nial gual ahihlouh nungin, na sip khiinkhian diing uh ahi. Kin hehuin bangma na bawl diing uh ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu hi na hung mipuite uh hi biahinn luhmi lah ahi sih va, na pathiannu soisete zong ahi sih uhi.
Demetria leh a tohpih khutsiam haw in mi kua tung aha a thubuai aneih uh leh, vaihawmna innte akihong zing a, gamoptute zong aum uhi. Khat leh khat kiheeh uh heh.
Hizongleh sildang a buaina nei na hih uh leh daan banga kikhopna ah lep diing ahi.
Tuni a buaina jiahin i tungvah thu ahung um diing lauthawng ahuai hi, i kikhopna san peen hih ahi chih theih diing lah aum sih ngaala,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n huchia asoi zohin kikhopna chu atawpsahta hi.
Huleh buaina adaih nungin, Paul in nungjuite a kawmah akou a, amahuh ahasot a, kampha in aha a, Makedonia gam a diingin achiahta hi.
Huleh hu gam veel atotsuaah a, a kawmva hasotna thu tampi asoi zohin, Greece gam atungta hi.
Huleh hutah ah ha thum ataam a, Syria gam lama kuang a apai sawm laiin, Judate’n amah aguuh taan jiahun, Makedonia gam lehtot kiit atumta hi.
Huleh Beria khua a Sopater, Thessalonika khua a Aristarka leh Sekunda, Derbe khua a Gaia leh Timothi, huleh Asia gam a Tikika leh Trophima, amah un Asia gam dongin atonpih uhi.
Hite chu ka ma vah anachiah va, Troas ah ahung na ngaah uhi.
Huleh kei uh chu Tolsohlouh Tanghou nite zohin Philippi apat kuang in ka pai va, ni ngaa nungin a kawmvah Troas khua ah ka tung va, hutah ah ni sagih ka taam uhi.
Hapta ni masapeenin, nungjuite tanghou balkeeh diinga ahung kikhop laiun Paul in ajiingni a pai atup jiahin a kawmvah thu asoi a, huleh jaankhang dongin asoi hi.
Huleh pindan tungnung a ka kikhopna vah thaumei tampi aum hi.
Huleh a min Eutika kichi khangdawng khat kotta ah atou a, tuuitahin ana-ihmu hi. Paul in thu asoi sawt taahluat jiahin, anaihmu kha a, innsawng thumna apatin akesuh a, a sisain atawm uhi.
Huleh Paul akumsuh a, a tungah abohkhum a, akawi a, “Mangbang sih un, ajiahchu amah ah hinna aum nalai hi,” achi hi.
Huin pindan tungnung a akaltouh kiit phetin, tanghou abalkeeh a, ane a, sawttah khovaah dongin a kawmvah thu soiin ahoulim a, huchiin achiahta hi.
Huleh amah un tangvaalpa chu ahingin ahung pui va, huleh amahuh chu nasataha hamuanin aumta uhi.
Huleh keiuh chu long lamah ka na chiah masa va, Asso khopi juanin kuang in ka paita va, hutah ah Paul tuansah diing ka sawm uhi; ajiahchu ama’n a keeng a chiah tumin huchi bangin achi mawng ahi.
Huleh Asso a ahung kituaahpih tahin ka tuangsahta va, Mitylene ka tungta uhi.

Huleh hu apatin kuang in ka chiah kiit va, ajiingni in Kios tuikulhgam lehlam jawn ka tung uhi. Huleh ajiingni in Samos tuikulhgam ka tung va, Trogiliam ah ka taam uhi. Ajiingni in Mileta ka tung uhi.
Ajiahchu Paul in Asia gam a um sawt autlouh jiahin Ephesi chu kuang a paikheel atupsa him ahi a, ahihtheih leh Jerusalem ah Pentikost ni a um atup jiahin akin pai hi.
Huleh Mileta akipatin Ephesi ah mi asawl a, kouhtuam upate avakousah hi.
Huleh amahuh a kawma ahung tun tahun, ama’n a kawmvah, “Asia gam a ka hung chiil ni masa apat na kawmva ka um sung siaha ka umdaan na he uhi.
Kingaingiamtah leh Judate’n thah diinga thu aphial jiahva mittui tampi leh sil hahsa ka tunga hung tungte thuaah kawmin Lalpa nna ka tong hi.
Huleh nanguh phattuamna diing sil bangmah phuangdoh louin ka iim sih a, ka hung hesah veh a, vaantaang lah leh inn chin ah ka hung thuhilh veu hi.
Judate leh Grikte kawmah zong Pathian lama lungsim kisiih thu leh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ginna thu ka hesah jeel hi.
“Huleh tuin ngai un, hagau in Jerusalem a chiahtou diingin ahung phuut hi. Hu mun a ka tunga sil hung tung diingte ka he sih hi.
Kaanna leh hahsatna in ahung ngaah hi, chia khopi chin a Hagau Siangthou in ahung heetsah veute chauh ka he hi.

Hizongleh ka kitaaidemna kipaahtaha ka taaitung theihna diing leh Lalpa Jesu apat ka muh Pathian hehpihna tanchinpha heetsah diing natohna ka tohzoh theihna diingin hi silte khat beeh in ahung hihliing sih a, ka hinna zong iit taahin ka ngai sih hi.
“Huleh tuin, nanguh zousiah in ngai un, Pathian lalgam thu soia ka vaahlehnate’n ka meel na mu nawn sih diing uh, chih ka he hi.
Hujiahin mi zousiah sisan ah ka siang ahi chih tuni in ka hung hesah hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thuguat zousiah na kawmvah phuandoh louha iim ka nei sih hi.
Hujiahin Pathian kouhtuam, Amah sisan a aleite vaah diingin, Hagau Siangthou in houtu a ahung siamna belaam pawlte zousiah leh nanguh tungah pilvaang un.
Ajiahchu ka chiah nung chiangin ngei huhamte na lahvah ahung luut diing va, belaam pawlte ahawi sih diing uh chih ka he hi.
Nanguh lah ngeei ah zong nungjui pawlte amahuh lama kaimang diingin thu heikawi na hung um diing uhi.
Hujiahin kiveeng un, kum thum sung zet mittui luang puma suun leh jaan a mi chin taaihilh ka tawp louh daan hezing un.
“Huleh tuin unaute, Pathian kawmah leh nanguh hung khangsah thei leh nanguh suhsiangthousate tengteng kawma goutan hung pe theitu Pathian hehpihna thu ah ka hung keemsah hi.
Kuamah dangka, sana, silhleteen ka eeng ngei sih hi.
Hi khutte’n keimah leh ka lawite taahsap atongdoh jeel chih nanguh ngeei in na he uhi.
Hitobanga tonggimin haatloute na panpih diing uh ahi chiin sil zousiah ah ka hung ensahta hi. Lalpa Jesu ngeei in, ‘Laah saangin, piaah hi vangpiaahna sangjaw ahi’ chia asoi khu hezing un,” achi hi.
Huleh huchibang thu asoi zohin akhuupdin a, a bawnun ahaamtei khawm uhi.
Huleh a bawnun hah kahin akap va, Paul angawngkawi va, atawp va,
a meel amuh nawn louh diing uh thu asoi chu alungkhampih diaah uhi. Huleh long mun tanphain avahata uhi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amahuh toh ka kikhen zohun, long in ka chiah va, zangtahin Kos tuikulhgam ka tung uhi. Huleh a jiing in Rhode tuikulhgam ka tung va, hu apatin Patara khopi ka tung uhi.
Phinisia gam tawn diing long khat ka mu va, ka tuang va, ka chiah jeel uhi.
Kupra tuikulhgam ka muh un, hu gam chu veilam pang ah ka peel va, Syria gam lamah ka chiah jeel va, huleh Tura ah ka kinga uhi, hu mun a long a vante suahkhiah diing ahih jiahin.
Huleh nungjuite ka hawldoh va, hutah ah ni sagih ka taam uhi. Amah un Hagau a heetsahna in Paul chu Jerusalem a chiah lou diingin ahilh uhi.

Ka um hun diing tan uh ka um zohun, ka kipandoh va, ka chiahna diing uh ka juanta uhi. Huleh amah un a bawnun, a jite leh a tate uh toh khopi gei dongin ahung ha uhi. Huin tuikhanglian geiah ka khuupdin va, ka haamtei uhi.
Kampha a ka kihaah zohun, keiuh long ah ka tuang va, amahuh inn lamah akihkiitta uhi.
Tura khua apat kuang a chiahin Tolemai khua ka tung va, unaute chibai ka buuh va, a kawmvah ni khat ka taam uhi.
Ajiingni in keiuh Paul lawite teng ka kipandoh va, Kaisaria ka tung uhi. Dikon sagihte laha khat, sawlleh Philip inn ah ka luut va, amah toh ka um uhi.
Hu mipa’n ta nungaah siangthou li anei a, amah un thu asoilawh jeel uhi.
Hu a ni bangzah aha ka taam laiun, Judia gam apat a min Agaba kichi zawlnei khat ahung suh hi.

Amah ka kawmvah ahung a, Paul kawnggaah ala a, a khutte leh a keengte a kikaanin, “Hichu Hagau Siangthou in achih ahi: ‘Hi kawnggaah neitu hi Jerusalem a Judate’n hichi bangin akaan diing va, Jentelte khut ah apekhe sawn diing uh,’” achi hi.
Hi thu ka jaah tahun, keiuh leh hu mun a umte’n Paul chu Jerusalem a chiah lou diingin ka ngeen uhi.
Huin Paul in, “Bang diinga na kah va, ka lung na natsah uh ahiai? Ajiahchu Jerusalem a kaan chauh hi louin, Lalpa Jesu min in sih zong ka ngaap ahi,” chiin adawng hi.
Huleh houhzoh gual ahihlouh tahin ka sipta va, “Lalpa deihjawng bawl hihen,” ka chita uhi.
Hu hun nungin ka vante uh ka siam va, Jerusalem ah ka chiah touta uhi.
Kaisaria apatin nungjuite khenkhat in ahung jui va, ka tunna diing uh Kupra a nungjui masa Mason inn ah ahung pui uhi.
Huleh Jerusalem ka hung tun tahun, unaute’n kipaahtahin ahung na dawn uhi.
Huleh ajiingni in Paul leh kei un Jakob ka vaveh va, hutah ah kouhtuam upate zousiah aum uhi.
Huleh Paul in amahuh chibai abuuh zohin, a natohna zanga Pathian in Jentelte laha sil abawlsah zousiah chu abaan baan in asoi hi.
Huleh amah un hu thu ajaah tahun, Lalpa apaahtawi va, huin Paul kawmah, “Unaupa, Judate lahah gingtute saang tamtah na mu a, huleh a bawnun daan tungtaang ah phatuam angai uhi.
Nang Jentelte laha Juda um haw zousiah kawma a tate uh zehtan louh diing leh tawndaan banga um louh diing, chiin Mosi daan paihkhiahna diing thu na hilh jeel chih mi kam apatin na tanchin ahe uhi.
Bang i bawlta diai le? Mipi ahung paikhawm ngeei diing uhi, ajiahchu na hung tung chih lah ja ngeei diing ahi uhi.
Hujiahin na kawma ka soi bangun bawl in: Kichiamna nei pasal li ka nei uhi.

Hu mite pui inla, amahuh toh kisusiang inla a sam uh a meetna diing uh sum tuaah in, huchiin mi zousiah in mi kam a na thu ajaah teng uh bangmahlou ahi chih leh nang chu daan juiin kijentahin na umjaw chih ahe diing uhi.

Jentelte laha gingtute tungtaang thu chu, milem biahna sil neeh apat, sa sisan neeh apat, heehlup sa neeh apat, huleh kingaihna thaanghuai apat, akihepkhiah louhngaal uh sildang ajuih uh angai sih, chiin thupuuhna ka la va, ka gialta uhi,” achi uhi.

Huin Paul in ajiingni in kichiamna nei pasal lite chu apui a, amahuh toh kisusiang zouin, kisiansahna ni bei hun diing leh amahuh chiat a diinga a sillat hun diing uh vakihesah diingin Pathian biahinn ah aluut hi.
Huleh ni sagih achin diing kuan tahin, Asia gam a Judate’n Pathian biahinn a Paul amuh tahun mipi zousiah achiilsia va, amah tungah khut aha va,

akikou va, “Israel mite, hung panpih un, gam chin a mi zousiah kawma i mite, daan thute leh hi mun soisia chu hi pa ahi. Hulou zong Pathian biahinn ah Grikte aluutpih a, hi mun siangthou ahihbuaah zouta hi,” achi uhi.
Ajiahchu amah un hu main Paul leh Ephesi khua a mi Trophima umkhawm in khopi ah amu va, Pathian biahinn ah Paul in amah chu hung pui zouta in angaihtuah uhi.
Huin khopi zousiah abuaita va, mipite chu ataaikhawm va, Paul chu aman va, Pathian biahinn apat akaidoh va, kotkhaahte akhaah pah ngaal uhi.
Amah thah atup laitahun, Jerusalem a mi zousiah abuai uh chih thu sepaih pawl houtulian kawm atung hi.
Ama’n sepaihte leh sepaih zahoutute apui pah ngaal a, a kawmvah ataai suh uhi. Huin amah un sepaih houtulian leh sepaihte amuh tahun, Paul avuaah uh chu atawpta uhi.
Huin houtulian in ahung naih a, Paul atu a, khainiang nih a khih diing thu apia hi. Huleh koi hi a bang bawl kha ahiai, chih adong hi.
Mipi lahah akhen thukhatin akikou va, akhen thudang in akikou uhi. Huleh buai jiahin thudih ahe thei sih a, sepaihte giahbuuh a puiluut diingin thu apia hi.
Huleh Paul chu kalbi atun laiin, mipi asousang nasat jiahun sepaihte’n amah adomkaang uhi.
Mipite’n, “Sumangthaai un,” chia kikouin ajui lutlut ngaal uhi.
Huleh Paul chu sepaihte giahbuuh kulh a apuiluut diing kuan-un, ama’n sepaih houtulian kawmah, “Na kawmah thu themkhat ka soi thei diai?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Grik haam na he maw?
Tuma a mite buaina bawla mihel saang li gamdaai a puikhetu, Aiguptami hilou na hi maw?” achi hi.

Hizongleh Paul in, “Judami, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a mi ka hi, khopi nameilou a khualetui hihna nei ka hi. Hung lungsiat inla, mi zousiah kawmah thusoi hung phalsah diingin ka hung ngeen hi,” achi hi.
Huleh lem asah tahin, Paul chu kalbi ah ading a, mipi lam a khut in ajaap a, asip duam tahun, a kawmvah, Hebrai haam in thu asoi a:
“Ulenaute leh pate haw, tuin na kawmvah ka siamna thu ka soi diing hi, ngai un,” achi hi.
Huleh a kawmva Hebrai haam a thu asoi ajaah tahun, asipta seem va, huin ama’n,

“Kei chu Juda mi ka hi a, Silisia gam a Tarsa khopi a piang, hizongleh hi khopi a khanglian ka hi. Huleh Gamaliel nuaia i pulepate uh daan thu khauhtah dungjuia jilsaha um, tunia nanguh zousiah banga Pathian lama anaphatuamngai ka hi.
Huleh hi Lampi pawl a mite hi sihna khopin ka suduhdah jeel a, numei pasal in ka kaan a suangkul ah ka khum jeel hi.

Huin siampu lalpeen leh upate zousiah in zong hu thu chu ahung heetpih uhi. Amahuh kawm apat unaute piaah diingin lehkha ka mu a, amahuh sawisa diingin Damaska khopi tana umte, Jerusalem a kaansa a hung pui diingin ka chiah hi.
“Huleh hichi ahung hita a, ka chiah a, Damaska gei ka tunin, suunkim veel tahin, thakhatin vaan apat vaah nasatah ka kiim ah ahung vaahsot hi.
Huleh kei chu tual ah ka puuh a, aw khat in, ‘Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai?’ chiin ka ja hi.
Huleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, koi na hiai?’ chiin ka dawng hi. Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, ‘Nazareth Jesu, na suhduhdah chu ka hi,’ achi hi.
Huleh ka kawma umte’n vaah chu amu va alau uhi, hizongleh ka kawma thusoitu aw chu ahesiam sih uhi.
Huleh ke’n, ‘Bang ka bawl diai, Lalpa?’ ka chi hi. Lalpa’n ka kawmah, ‘Thou inla Damaska ah chiah inla, hutah ah sil zousiah na bawl diinga kiguatte chu hilhin na um diing hi,’ achi hi.
Huleh hu vaah loupi jiahin khua ka mu thei nawnta sih a, ka lawite’n khut in ahung kai va, Damaska ah ka luutta hi.
“Huleh mi khat Anania, daan toh kituaahtah a Pathian ngaihsah leh hu a um Judate zousiah in azahtaat uh,
ka kawmah ahung a ka kawma ding in, ‘Unaupa Saul, khua muta in,’ ahung chi hi. Huleh huchih laitahin amah chu ka muta hi.
Huleh ama’n, ‘I pulepate uh Pathian in a deihlam he diing leh Midihtat chu mu a, a kam a suaah aw ja diinga ahung guat na hita hi.
