Ajiahchu na muh leh na jaah thu ah mi zousiah kawmah Amah thu heetpihtu na hi diing hi.
Huleh bang diinga khongai nalai na hiai? Thou inla baptisma tang in, huleh Lalpa min kouin na sualna kisusiang in,’ ahung chi hi.
“Hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem a ka chiah kiit a, Pathian biahinn a ka haamtei laiin, zelhin ka um a,
‘Kin inla Jerusalem apat kintahin pawt in, ajiahchu ka tanchin na soi diing pomlou diing ahi uh,’ hung chiin Amah chu ka mu hi.
Huleh keima’n, ‘Lalpa, amah un sinagog a umte suangkul a ka khum a, nang hung gingtate ka vuaah veu ahe uhi.
Na thu hetu Stephen sisan asuah laiun, kei zong a kawmah ka ding a, suhlup diing lemsatu ka hi a, amah thattute puante zong ka na keem ahi,’ ka chi hi.
Ama’n ka kawmah, ‘Chiah in, gamlataha Jentelte kawmah ka hung sawl diing ahi,’ ahung chita,” achi hi.
Huleh amah un hi tanchiang a thusoi angaikhia va, huin aw ngaihtahin, “Hitobang phet mi hi khovel akipatin suchimit un, ajiahchu hingtaah ahi sih hi,” achi uhi.
Huleh akikou va, a puante uh asepkhia va, vaanlam a leivui atheh laiun,
sepaih houtulian in Paul chu sepaihte giahbuuh a puiluut diingin thu apia a, a tunga hutobang lawma akikouna san uh aheetna diingin jeep a dohchian diing achi hi.
Hizongleh savun khau a akaan zohun, Paul in a kawma ding sepaih zahoutu kawmah, “Rom khualetui hihna nei mite mawngmawng siamlouh tansahna bei a vuaah phal ahiaimah?” achi hi.
Sepaih zahoutu’n hu ajaah tahin, sepaih houtulian kawmah achiah a, “Na silbawl diing pilvaang in, ajiahchu hi pa Rom khualetui hihna nei ahi,” chiin ahilh hi.
Huin sepaih houtulian ahung a, a kawmah, “Hung hilh in, Rom mi na hi maw?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Hi e,” achi hi.
Huleh sepaih houtulian in, “Hi khualetui hihna ke’n sum tampi a ka lei ahi,” chiin adawng hi. Huleh Paul in, “Kei chu Rom mi mawnga piang ka hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin dotchian tumte’n amah achiahsan pah va, sepaih houtulian in zong Rom mi ahi chih aheettahin, amah mah in akaansah ahih jiahin alauta hi.

Ajiingni in, Judate’n bang jiahin ahiai Paul aheeh uh chih heetchian auut jiahin, sepaih houtulian in amah akaanna vapat aphel hi. Siampu lalte leh vaihawmtute zousiah kikhawm diingin thu apia a, Paul ahung pui va, a ma vah adingsahta uhi.
Huleh Paul in vaihawmtute aen teentaan a, “Ulenaute, tuni tanin Pathian mitmuhin sialepha heetna hoihtah zousiah toh ka um zing hi,” achi hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen Anania in Paul kawma dingte’n a kam behsah diingin asawl hi.

Huin Paul in a kawmah, “Nang, baang kinuh vaampa, Pathian in nang ahung beeng jaw diing hi. Nang daan thu banga ka thu ngaihtuah diingin na tou a, daanlou banga kei beh diingin na hung chi maw?” achi hi.
Huleh a kawma dingte’n, “Nang in Pathian siampu lalpeen na soisia maw?” achi uhi.
Huin Paul in “Unaute, siampu lalpeen ahih ka he sih a ahi; ajiahchu, ‘Na mite uh tunga vaihawmtu soise sin,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.

Hizongleh Paul in, khenkhat Sadukaite ahi va adang Pharisaite ahi uh chih aheet tahin, vaihawmtute lahah akikou a, “Ulenaute, kei chu Pharisai, Pharisai khat tapa ka hi, misite kinepna leh thohkiitna thu ah vaihawmsaha um ka hi,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n hichia asoi zohin, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite kaal ah kinialna ahung um a, mi paikhawmte chu akilangkhenta uhi.
Ajiahchu Sadukaite’n misi thohkiitna mawngmawng aum sih, angelte zong aum sih, hagau zong aum sih, achi va; hizongleh Pharisaite’n hute chu aum veh hi chih apom uhi.

Nasatahin abuaita va, Pharisai pawl laha daanjilsahtute khenkhat in dingdohin anial va, “Hi mi a giitlouhna bangma i mu sih uh; hagau in aha, angel in aha a kawmah thu soi ahihtaah leh, Pathian i dou sih diing uh,” achi uhi.

Huleh ahung kinial naah deuhdeuh phetun, sepaih houtulian in Paul chu aloihtel khaah diing uh alau a, sepaihte chu vachiah suh a, a lah vapat a Paul chu thagum a ladoh a, sepaihte giahbuuh a hung pui ngeei diingin thu apia hi.
A jaan in Lalpa chu Paul kawmah ading a, “Paul, hamuangtahin um in, Jerusalem a ka thu na heetsah bangin, Rom ah zong na hesah diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh khua ahung vaah tahin Judate hunkhop akithukum va, Paul athah masiah va bangmah ne lou leh dawn lou diingin akichiamta uhi.
Huleh mi thah sawma kithukumte chu sawmli saanga tamjaw ahi uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu siampu lalte leh upate kawmah achiah va, “Paul ka thah masiah va bangma ne lou diingin nasatahin haamsia louin ka kichiam uhi.

Hujiahin nang un vaihawmtute toh a thu kichian seem a ngaihtuah diing kipangin na kawmva puikhe diingin sepaih houtulian kawmah vasoi un; huleh ama’n na kawm uh ahung phaah ma a anathat diinga mansa ka hi uhi,” achi uhi.
Huleh Paul tupa, a sanggamnu tapa in aguuh taan thu uh anaja a, sepaihte giahbuuh ah avaluut a Paul avahilhta hi.
Huin Paul in sepaih zahoutute laha khat a kawmah akou a, “Hi tangvaal chu sepaih houtulian kawmah pui in, a kawmah soi diing bang aha anei hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin ama’n sepaih houtulian kawmah apui a, “Paul mitaangpa in a kawmah ahung kou a, hi tangvaal in na kawma soi diing bang aha aneih jiahin na kawma hung pui diingin ahung ngeen hi,” achi hi.
Huin sepaih houtulian in a khut in atu a, atuamin apuidoh a, “Ka kawma na soi diing chu bang ahiai?” chiin aguuhin adong hi.
Huleh ama’n, “Paul thu kichian seema ngaihtuah tum bangin, jiing chianga vaihawmtute kawma puisuh diingin Judate’n hung nget lem asata uhi.

Hizongleh a thu uh na zop sin, ajiahchu a lahva mi sawmli saanga tamjaw in aguuh taan va, hu mite’n amah athah masiah va bangma ne lou diing leh dawn lou diingin akichiam uhi; huleh tuin na thu ngaahin mansain aum uhi,” achi hi.
Huchiin sepaih houtulian in tangvaal chu achiahsah a, “Hi thute na hung hesahta chih koimah hilh sin,” chiin thu apia hi.
Huleh sepaih zahoutute laha nih akou a, “Jaan daah thum chianga Kaisaria tana chiah diingin sepaih za nih toh, sakol tungtuang mi sawmsagih toh, teitawi mi za nih toh kimansain koih un;
huleh gamoptu Felix kawma bittaha aluut theihna diingin Paul tuanna diing sakol zong guatsah un,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n hichibangin lehkhathot agial hi:
“Klaudias Lisias in gamoptu zahumpeen Felix chibai abuuh hi.
Hi mi Judate’n amat va athah diing kuan-un, kei chu sepaihte toh ka vachiah a, amah hi Rom mi ahi chih ka heetin ka hundohta hi.
Huleh a heehna jiah peen uh heet ka uut a, a vaihawmtute uh kawmah ka pui hi.
Amah chu a daan thu uh bang aha a kiheeh ahi chih ka he a, hizongleh a heehna thu vah sihna leh kaanna diing khop bangma aum sih, chih ka kandoh hi.
Huleh Judate’n amah ataang uh chih hilh ka hih tahin, na kawmah amah ka hung sawl ngaal hi; huleh amah heehte’n a tunga thubuai aneih phot uh na ma a soi diingin thu ka pia hi. Mangpha.” chiin.
Huchiin sepaihte’n a thupiaah bangin Paul chu jaan in apui va, Antipatri atunpih uhi.
Ajiingni in sakol tungtuang mite amah toh akitonsah va, sepaihte chu amahuh giahbuuh ah ahung kiihta uhi.
Amahuh Kaisaria khopi atung va, gamoptu kawmah lehkhathot chu apia va, Paul zong ama ah adingsah uhi.
Huleh gamoptu in lehkhathot asim zohin, Paul umna gam adong hi. Huleh Silisia gam apat ahi chih aheet tahin,
“Nang hung heehte ahung tun chiangun, na thu ka ngaikhe diing,” achi hi. Huleh Herod Praitoriam sunga koih diingin thu apia hi.
Huleh ni ngaa nungin siampu lalpeen Anania toh, upate khenkhat leh thusoi siam Tartulla toh ahung suh va, Paul tunga thubuai chu gamoptu kawmah asoi uhi.
Huleh Paul akouhdoh tahun, Tartulla in Felix ma ah Paul aheehpanta a, “Nangmah vaanga lemna nasatah ka neih jiah uh leh na lunggeelsiamna a hi gam a kisiamhoihnate ahung tun jiahin,
bangchihtanin khoimun pouh ah lungkimtahin ka kipaah zing uhi, zahumtah Felix.
Ahihvaangin, nang diinga chimtaahhuai talua hih ka uut sih, na migiitna a ka thu uh themkhat hung ngaihkhiahsah diingin ka hung ngeen ahi.
“Ajiahchu kei un hi mihuathuaitah, mun chin a vaahleh a, khovel a Judate zousiah tohbuaitu leh Nazarethmite pawl a a makaipeen uh khat ahih ka he uhi.
Pathian biahinn suhbuaah zong atum a, huin amah chu ka man va, ka daan thu bangun vaihawmsah ka tum uhi.
Hizongleh sepaih houtulian Lisias ka kawmvah ahung a, ka khut vakipatin ngongtattahin alamangta a,
amah heehtute na kawma hung diing thu apia hi. Nang ngeei in amah dong chianin ka heehna thute zousiah uh na he thei diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Judate’n zong hu thu chu huchibang ahi chiin apanpih uhi.
Huin gamoptu’n thusoi diinga khut a ajaap tahin, Paul in, “Nang chu kum tamtah hi nam vaihawmsahtu na hih ka heet jiahin kipaahtahin ka dihna thu ka soi diing hi.
Jerusalem a Pathian be diinga ka chiah touh nung ni sawmlenih vaal ahi nai sih diing chih na he thei diing hi.
Huleh Pathian biahinn a mi toh ka kinial aha, ahihlouhleh sinagog leh khopi sunga mipi ka chiilsiatna bangma amu sih uhi.
Tuin zong ahung heehnate uh kichiantahin abul asuikhe thei sih uhi.
Hizongleh hichu na kawmah ka soidoh ahi: amah un biahdaan tuam achih uh Lampi juiin ka pulepate uh Pathian ka bia hi, Daan leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute a kigial zousiah gingta kawmin.
Huleh midihtatte leh dihtatloute thohkiitna aum diing chia amah un zong agintaat uh, huchu ke’n Pathian lamah ka kineppih ahi.
Hujiahin Pathian lam leh mihing lama sialepha heetna chu soiseelbeia um diingin bangchihlaipouhin ka kihahbawl hi.
“Tuin kum bangzah aha nungin ka namte uh kawma silpiaah diing leh lat diing hung tawiin ka hung hi.
Hu sil ka piaah laiin, Asia gam a hung kipan Judami koite aha in mipi tellou leh buailouin Pathian biahinn a ka kihihsiangthou chu ahung mu uhi.
Hute’n ka tunga thubuai nei hileh uh, hi ah na ma ah umin ahung heeh diing uhi.
Ahihlouhleh vaihawmtute ma a ka din laiin hi mite ngeei in, ka suhkhelh muh aneih uh leh, soi uh heh.
A lahva ding a, ‘Misi thohkiitna thu ah tuni’n na ma ah vaihawmsahin ka um ahi,’ chia ka kikou khiah jiah ahih louhngaal leh,” chiin adawng hi.

Huleh Felix in hi thute ajaah tahin hu Lampi thu chu ahechian deuh a, amahuh kawmah, “Sepaih houtulian Lisias ahung tun suh chiangin na thu uh ka ngaihtuah veh diing,” chiin kikhopna atawpsah phot hi.
Huleh ama’n Paul chu veeng a, thuthawl deuh a umsah a, a lawite’n a nna atohsah uh khaplou diingin sepaih zahoutu khat kawmah thu apia hi.
Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin, Felix chu a ji Juda numei Drusilla toh ahung va, Paul akousah a, Khrist a ginna thu angaikhia hi.

Huleh Paul in dihtatna thute, kideehna thute leh vaihawmna hung tung pai diingte asoi leh Felix chu lauin akithing a, “Tuin chiah kiit phot in, hun lem ka neih tahchiangin ka hung kou diing,” achi hi.
Huleh ahahkhiahna diinga Paul in sum apiaah bang akineem a, akousah mun sim a, ahoupih thimthem hi.
Huleh kum nih nungin Porkia Festa in Felix chu ahung hengta a, hizongleh Felix in Judate kipaahsah aut jiahin Paul chu suangkul a khumin anuseta hi.
Huchiin Festa chu hu gam ahung tun ni thum nungin, Kaisaria apatin Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
Huin siampu lalpeen leh Juda lamkaite’n a kawmah Paul tungthu ahiloulam in ahesah uhi.
Huleh Paul kalha deihsahna atan va, lampi a anaguuh taan va, anathah theihna diingun a kawmah Paul chu Jerusalem a vapui tousah diingin angeen uhi.
Hizongleh Festa in Paul chu Kaisaria ah kep ahih daan leh amah zong hu lamah chiah pah diing ahihdaan ahilh hi.
Huchiin ama’n, “Hu mipa’n giitlouhna nei ahih heetna diingin, na lahva thu neithei photmah in hung juisuh uh henla heeh uh heh,” chiin adawng hi.
Huleh a lahva ni sawm vaal ataam nung in Kaisaria ah achiahsuh a; a jiing in vaihawmna touphah ah atou a, Paul chu hung pui diingin thu apia hi.
Amah ahung tunin, Jerusalem apat hung suh Judate chu a kiim ah ading va, Paul tungah thubuai tampi soiin, setahin aheeh va, hizongleh a heehna thu dihtah asulang thei tuan sih uhi.
Paul in a dihna thu asoi a, “Judate daan thu ah hiin, Pathian biahinn thu hita henla, Kaisar tungah hitazongleh, sil mawngmawng ka hihkhial sih hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Festa in Judate deihjawng bawl auut a, Paul kawmah, “Jerusalem a chiahtouh a hutah a ka ma a hi thute ngaihtuah hileh na uut ei?” chiin adong hi.
Huin Paul in, “Vaihawmsah a ka umna diing mah, Kaisar vaihawmna touphah ma ah ka ding hi. Nang in zong chiantaha na heet bangin, Judate tungah bangma ka hihkhial sih hi.

Migilou ka hih a, sihna khopa sil hihkhial ka hih leh, sih zong ka nial sih; hizongleh hite’n ahung heehna teng uh adihtah aum louh leh, koima’n a kawmvah ahung pekhe thei sih diing hi. Kaisar kawmah ka tut ahi,” achi hi.
Huin Festa in vaihawmtute ahoupih kiimveel zohin, “Kaisar kawmah na tutta a, Kaisar kawmah na tung ngeei diing hi,” chiin adawng hi.
Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin, kumpipa Agrippa leh Berniki chu Kaisaria a hungin Festa chibai abuuh uhi.
Huleh amahuh hu a ni bangzah aha ataam nungun, Festa in Paul tungthu kumpipa kawmah asoi a, “Felix in mi taang khat anusia a;
Jerusalem a ka umlaiin siampu lalte leh Judate upate’n a thu ahung hesah va, siamlouhtangsah diingin ahung ngeen uhi.
“Ke’n a kawmvah, ‘A heehpa uh leh a heehte akimaaituah va, a heehna thu va ama’n adihna thu soina lemtaang aneih main, mi kuamah gawt diinga piaahkhiah Rom mite daan ahi sih hi,’ chiin ka dawng hi.
Hujiahin amahuh hitah ahung tunun, sawt hallouin ajiingni in vaihawmna touphah ah ka tou a, hi mi chu hung pui diingin thu ka pia hi.
Huleh a heehtute adin laiun, ka gintaat bangtahin a tungah giitlouhna thubuai bangmah lah asoi sih uhi.
Hizongleh amahuh biahdaante leh mi khat, Jesu asisa, Paul in ahing kiit chia asoi thu ah kinialna nei ahijaw uhi.
Huleh ke’n hutobang kinialnate khendaan ka heetlouh jiahin Jerusalem a chiah a, hutah a hu thu khen auut leh uutlouh ka dong hi.
Hizongleh Paul in Augusta thupuuhna diinga siit anget jawh jiahin Kaisar kawma ka sawl theih masiah veeng diingin thu ka pia hi,” achi hi.
Huin Agrippa in Festa kawmah, “Ke’n zong hupa thusoi ka ngaikhe uut,” achi hi. Ama’n, “Jiingchiangin a thusoi na ngaikhe diing,” achi hi.
Hujiahin ajiingni in Agrippa leh Berniki chu loupitahin ahung va, sepaih houtuliante leh khopi a miliante toh thusoina inn ah ahung luut va, Festa thupiaahna jiahin Paul chu ahung pui uhi.

Huin Festa in, “Kumpipa Agrippa leh hi mun a ka kawmva um zousiahte’n hi pa na mu uhi, amah chu Juda mipi zousiah in Jerusalem ah leh hi mun ah ka kawmah aheeh va, hing taah ahi sih chiin ngaihtahin akikou uhi.
Hizongleh sihna diing khop hial bangmah abawl sih chih ka he a, ama’n Augusta kawma thu atut jiahin sawl ka sawm ahita.

Hizongleh amah tungtaang ah bangmah ka lalpa kawma gelh diing lah ka thei sih hi. Hujiahin na ma vah ka hung puikhia ahi; ajiahchu a thu dotveel nunga gelh diing neu khat beeh ka muh theihna diingin, kumpipa Agrippa Aw, nang ma a hung pui ka hi diaahkhol hi.
Mitaang khat vaihawm diinga sawl a, a tunga a heehna thu uh heetsah louh ngolhuai hiin ka he ngaala,” achi hi.
Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, “Na dihna thu na soi thei hi,” achi hi. Huin Paul in a khut ajaah a, adihna thu asoi a:
“Kumpipa Agrippa, Judate’n ahung heehna zousiah ah ka dihna thu tuni a na ma a ka soi diing jiahin ka kipaah hi,
ajiahchu Judate tawndaan zousiah leh thubuaihuai thute na heet mahmah jiahin. Hujiahin thuaahtheitaha na hung ngaihkhiahsah ka hung ngeen hi.
“Ka naupan lai apat, amasapeen a ka chipihte lah leh Jerusalem a ka umdaan Judate zousiah in ahe uhi.
Achiil apat a ka sahkho daanva akhauhpeen dungjuia Pharisai anahi ka hi chih ka tanchin ahe va, auut uh leh ahung soipih thei uhi.
Huleh tuin ka pulepate uh kawma Pathian thuchiam chu kineppihna jiahin hitah ah vaihawmsahin ka ding ahi.
Hu thuchiam kinepna chu, ka nam uh sawmlenihte’n suun leh jaan a Pathian nna phatuamngaitaha tongin muh akineem uhi. Kumpipa Agrippa hu kinepna jiahin Judate’n ahung heeh uh ahi.
Pathian in misite akaithou chih bang diinga gintaat huailoua ngai na hi viai?
“Ke’n zong Nazareth Jesu min kalh jawngin sil tampi bawl leng hoih diingin ka na gingta veu hi.

Hu bang chu Jerusalem ah zong ka na bawl hi. Huleh siampu lalte kawm apat thuneihna ka laah nungin, misiangthoute laha mi tampi suangkul a ka khum chauh hilouin, amahuh athah laiun lemsa lamah ka na pang jeel hi.
Huleh sinagog chin ah amahuh ka gawt zing a, Jesu min soisiatsah ka tum hi. A tungvah ka gilou mahmah a, gam dang a khopite tanpha ah ka suduhdah hi.
“Hutobang bawl diingin, siampu lalte thupiaah mu a, a phalna lehkha uh tawia Damaska a ka chiah laiin,
Aw kumpipa, suun laitahin, vaan akipan vaah, ni saanga vaahjaw kei leh ka tonpihte kiim ah vaahin ka mu hi.
Huleh ka bawnun tual ah ka puuh va, Hebrai haam in, ‘Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai? Vuaahna siihzum peeh nang diingin ahahsa hi,’ chiin aw khat ka ja hi.
V“Huleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, kua na hiai?’ ka chi hi. Huin Ama’n, ‘Na suhduhdah Jesu ka hi.
Hizongleh thou inla ding in; ajiahchu na sil muhte leh na kawma ka hung phuandoh diingte seem diing leh heetpihtu diinga nang hung guat diingin na kawmah ka hung kilaah ahi.
Judate leh tua ka hung sawlna Jentelte khut apat ka hung hundoh diing hi,

Jentelte mit suvaah diing leh mial apat vaah lam ngatsah diingin, huleh kei ahung gintaat jiahva suhsiangte laha gou aluah theihna diingun, Setan thuneihna apat Pathian lama akihei theihna diing uh leh sual ngaihdamna amuhna diingun ka hung sawl hi,’ achi hi.
“Hujiahin, Aw kumpipa Agrippa, vaanlam kilaahna thu chu ka nial sih hi.

Huchiin amasain Damaska khua a mite kawmah, huleh Jerusalem khua a mite kawmah, huleh Judia gam zousiah a mite kawmah leh Jentelte kawmah zong, huchia akisiih va, Pathian kawm azot va, kisiihna toh kiphu nna atohna diingun ka hesahta hi.
Hite jiahin Judate’n Pathian biahinn ah ahung man va, thah ahung tum uh ahi.
Pathian akipan panpihna ka muh jiahin, tuni tanin aneu leh aliante kawmah thu hesahin ka um nalai hi. Zawlneite leh Mosi in hung tung diing achih uh thu chauh loungaal thu dang ka soi sih hi;
huchu Khrist in gim athuaah diing a, misite lah apat thoukiit masapeen ahi diing a, Judate leh Jentelte kawmah vaah chu ataangkoupih diing achih thu uh,” achi hi.
Huleh huchia adihna thu asoi laiin, Festa in aw ngaihtahin, “Paul, angol hita teh! Na lehkhasiam taahluatna in hung sungol ahi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh ama’n, “Zahumpeen Festa, angol ka hi sih hi, thu dihtah leh pilna thu ka soi ahijaw hi.
Hi thute kumpipa’n ahe hi, hujiahin a kawmah zong kimuangtahin ka soi ahi. Hi silte bangma a kawmah heet louh aum sih chih ka he hi, ajiahchu hi silte ningkawm khat a kibawl ahi sih hi.
Kumpipa Agrippa, zawlneite thu na gingta ei? Na gingta chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, “Hun tomkhat sunga Khristian a hung thuzoh tum na hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Paul in, “Hun tomkhat hiin hun sawtpi hitaleh, nang chauh hilouin tunia ka thu ja zousiah keimah banga um diingin Pathian kawmah ka ngeen hi, hi kolte ahihleh but louin,” achi hi.
Huleh Paul in huchia asoi zohin, kumpipa leh gamoptu leh Berniki chu a kawmva toute toh ading chiat uhi.
Huleh achiahdoh tuam tahun, akihou va, “Hi mipa’n sihna leh kolbuhna khop hial sil bangmah abawl sih hi,” achi uhi.
Huin Agrippa in Festa kawmah, “Hi pa’n Kaisar kawmah a thu tut lou hileh, hahkhiah theih mei diing hi a,” achi hi.
Huleh Italy gam a kuang a ka chiah diing uh thu suhpuuh ahih phetin, Paul leh mitaang dang khenkhat chu Augusta Pawl a mi sepaih zahoutu, a min Julias kichi akeemsah uhi.
Huleh Asia gam tuipi geia khua umte tawn diing Adramittiam khopi long ah ka tuang va, ka kitawlta uhi. Makedonia gam, Thessalonika khua a um Aristarka in kou ahung tonpih hi.
Ajiingni in Sidon khopi ka tung va, Julias in Paul ahoih bawl a, a poimoh asepsah theihna diingin a lawite kawmah achiahsah hi.
Hu apatin long in ka chiah kiit va, huih alehnun jiahin Kupra tuikulhgam liah lamah ka kitawl uhi.
Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gamjuul tuilianpi ka khen nungun, Lykia gam a Myra khopi ka tung uhi.
Hutah ah sepaih zahoutu in Italy gam juan diing Alexandria khopi long amu a, hutah ah ahung tuangsah hi.
Awl-awlin ni tampi ka kitawl va, hahsatahin Knida khopi jawn ka gei haamhaam va, huih in ahung nan jiahin Salmoni juanin Krit tuikulhgam liah ah ka kitawl va,
hahsataha kitawlin Lasia khopi kawma um Kuangkhawlna Kilawm achih mun uh ka tungta uhi.
Huin ni tampi abeita a, huleh An ngawlna Ni abeitaah jiahin long a pai alauhuai a, hujiahin Paul in amahuh athuhilh a,
a kawmvah, “Pute aw, tua long a paina ah siatna leh manna nasatah tung diing ahi chih ka he a, thuampua leh long tung chauh ah hilouin, i hinna uh nasan diingin zong lauhuai ahi,” achi hi.
Ahihvaangin, sepaih zahoutu in Paul soi saangin longpu leh long neitu thu agingtajaw hi.

Huleh phalbi hun a umna diinga kuang khawlna mun akijen louh jiahin a tamjaw in hu apat a kitawldoh a, Phinix khopi tun teeiteei kineemin, hutah a phalbi sung um asawmta va; Phinix chu Krit tuikulhgam a kuang khawlna mun khat ahi a, sim tumlam leh maal tumlam ngat tuaah ahi.
Huleh sim huih awl-awla ahung nun tahin, adeihjawng uh mu kisain siihka chu akaitou va, Krit tuikulhgam ning juuljuul ah akitawl uhi.
Hizongleh tomkhat zohin hu apatin Euroklidon achih uh huihpi haattah ahung nung suhta hi.
Long ahung phukhata a, huih lam anawt theih taahlouh jiahin ka mawh hahta va, ahung toh lehlehta hi.
Klauda achih uh tuikulhgam khat juul ah ka taai va, hahsatahin bitna kuang neu chu ka bitsah thei haamhaam uhi.
Akaihdoh zohun apanpihna khaute zangin, long nuai lamah avial va; huin ajawhleh Sirti sehneel phu kha inteh chih lauin puanjaahna bangkim akai ngiam va, huchiin ahung mawh toh lehlehta hi.
Tuikinawh in ahung vawh nasat jiahin, ajiingni in long a thuampuate tui ah apaikhia uhi.
A ni thum ni’n ka khut ngeei un kuang van ka paikhia uhi.
Ni tampi, ni leh aahsi akilang sih a, huihpi namei in ahung nuai sih a, hin diing mawngmawng ka kineem nawnta sih uhi.
Hizongleh sawttah an neloua um nungin, Paul a lahvah ading a, “Pute aw, ka thusoi nana juih jawh diing va, Krit apat kitawlkhe loua um a, huleh hibang siatna leh manna tuaah louh diing hi jeen a.
Huleh tuin, lungmuangtaha um diingin ka hung hasuan ahi, ajiahchu na lahva kuamah in hinna ataan sih diing uh, long chu se diing ahi.
Ajiahchu amah a ka hih a, a nna zong ka toh Pathian angel tujaanin ka kawmah ahung ding a,
‘Lau sin, Paul, Kaisar ma ah na ding ngeei diing ahi; en in, long a na tuanpihte zousiah zong Pathian in ahung piaah na hita,’ ahung chi hi.
Hujiahin pute aw, lungmuang tahin um un; ajiahchu Pathian ka gingta a, ahung hilh bangin aum diing hi.
Ahihvaangin tuikulhgam khat ah ahung sepdoh ngeei diing hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Adria Tuilianpi a huih in adung avaai a ahung muut leengna a jaan sawmleli jaan in, jaan kimlai diingin longpute’n gam khat tung diing bangin akiheta uhi.
Huin tui thuuh daan ateh va, fi t za leh sawmnih hiin ahe va, themkhat kitawl gamla deuhin ateh kiit va, fi t sawmkuah hiin ahe uhi.
Huin suang lah phu kha inteh chih alau va, long nung lamah siihka nei li akhia va, khovaah ngaahin ahaamteita uhi.
Huleh longpute’n chu kuang ma lama long siihkate khia kipangin, bitna kuang neu chu tuilianpi ah akhaikhia va, long chu taihsan atum uhi.
Paul in sepaih zahoutu leh sepaihte kawmah, “Hite long a aum zing louh uh leh na bit thei sih diing uh,” achi hi.
Huin sepaihte’n bitna kuang neu khaute asaattan va ahahta uhi.
Khovaah kuanin, Paul in a bawnun an ne diingin ahasuan hi, “An ngawla na ngaah va bangmah neloua na umna uh tuni ni sawmleli ahita.
Hujiahin an ne diingin ka hung hasuan hi, ajiahchu hi na damna diing uh ahi a, na lahva kuamah a samjang khat zong amang sih diing,” achi hi.
Huleh hu thu asoi zohin, tanghou ala a, amahuh zousiah ma ah Pathian kawmah kipaahthu asoi a, abalkeeh zohin ane panta hi.
Huin amahuh zousiah lungmuangtahin aum va, an zong aneta uhi.
Huleh long sunga um mi chu ka bawnun za nih leh sawmsagih leh guup ka hi uhi.
Huleh an aneehkham zohun, an chu tui lahah apaai va, long asuzangta uhi.
Huleh khovaah phetin a gam chinchaai aheta sih va; hizongleh sehneel piau nei khat amu va hutah ah chu ahihtheih leh long tawlluut atum uhi.
Huleh long siihka haw chu ahahkhia va, tuilianpi ah anusia va, long heehna kaanna aphel va, long puanjaah chu huih seh jawngin akaitou va, piau taah ajuanta uhi.
Huleh tuilianpi nih kisuhtuahna mun ah ka luut kha va, long in lei asuta a; huin long malam chu akiphut detta a, hihliing zohlouhin aum a, a meilam chu tuikinawh ahaat jiahin akeehta hi.
Huleh sepaihte’n mitaangte chu tui liau gaalkaaia taaimang khat um kha unteh, chiin thah atumta uhi.
Hizongleh sepaih zahoutu in Paul bitsah auut a, a siltup uh akhaam a; tuiliau siam photmah tuilianpi a tawmkhia a, piaugaw a kaai masa diingin thu apia hi.
Midang khenkhat singpeeh tungah, khenkhat long keehphel tung banga gaalkaai diingin thu apia hi. Huchiin a bawnun piaugaw ah bittahin agaalkaai vehta uhi.
Huleh bittaha asuaahtaat phetun, hu tuikulhgam chu Malta ahi chih aheta uhi.
A gam mite’n lungsiat tahzetin ahung na lungsiat va; guah ajut jiah leh adap jiahin mei achih va, ka bawnun ahung na kipaahpih uhi.
Huleh Paul in sing lom khat atom a, mei a avah leh meisa hul jiahin guulngaan khat ahung pawtdoh a, a khut ah akikhai denta hi.
Huleh a gam mite’n a khut a guul kikhaiden amuh un, “Hi pa hi tualthat ahi ngeei diing, tuilianpi apat bittahin suaahta mahleh, thudih khenna in ahin phal nawnlou ahita,” achi uhi.
Huleh ama’n guulsia chu mei ah athing khia a, bangmah achi sih hi.

Ahihvaangin, amah un chu ahung pawm aha, ahihlouhleh thakhat a puuha si pah diinga gingtain angaah uhi. Hizongleh sawtpi angaah va bangmah achih louh tahin, a lungsim uh aheng va amah chu pathian ahi, achi jawta uhi.
Hu mun chu hu tuikulhgam hausapa, a min Poblio achih uh gam ahi a, hupa’n ahung na kipaahpih a, ngainatahin ni thum ahung zintungsah hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Poblio pa chu khosih leh eehsiih in analum a, Paul a kawmah avaluut a, ahaamtei a, a tungah a khut anga a, asudamta hi.
Huchibanga abawl zohin, hu tuikulhgam a midang natna nei zousiah zong ahung va, adam chiatta uhi.
Amah un nasatahin ahung paahtawi va; ka chiah diingun ka poimoh zousiah uh ahung pia uhi.
Huleh ha thum nungin Alexandria long, a luvuum a Unau Phiit lim kitaah, hu tuikulhgam a phalbi sung teng taamta khuh ah ka chiahta uhi.
Huleh Syrakusa ah ka kinga va, hutah ah ni thum ka taam uhi.
Huleh hu apatin ka pai kual va, Rhegiam khopi ka tung uhi. Ni khat nungin sim huih ahung nung a, a jiing kiit in Putioli khopi ka tung uhi.
Hutah ah unaute ka mu va, a kawmvah ni sagih taam diingin ahung ngeen uhi. Huchiin Rom lam juanin ka chiah jeelta uhi.
Unaute’n ka tanchin uh ajaah tahun, hu akipatin Appi Dawlmun leh Zinbuuh Thumte khopi chianga hung dawn diingin ahung uhi. Paul in amahuh amuhin, Pathian kawmah kipaahthu asoi a, ahamuangta hi.
Huleh Rom ka tunun, sepaih zahoutu in mitaangte chu veengtu sepaih houtu kawmah apekhia a; hizongleh Paul chu aveengtu sepaih khat toh amah chauh a aum aphalsah hi.

Huleh hichi ahung hi a, ni thum nungin Paul in Juda houtu haw akoukhawm a; amahuh ahung kikhop tahun a kawmvah, “Ulenaute, i mipite ahihlouhleh i pulepate uh tawndaan tungah bangmah ka bawlsiat aum louh vaangin, Jerusalem apatin Rom mite kawmah mitaanga piaahkhiah ka hita hi.
Ahung etdih zohun, sihna khop hial ka tunga bangma aum louh jiahin hahkhiah ahung sawm uhi.
Hizongleh Judate’n huchu anial jiahun Kaisar kawmah ka thu tut lou thei ka hita sih hi; ka chipihte heehna a bawl chu hilouin.
Hujiahin hi thu jiaha nanguh toh kimuhtuah a, kihoulim diingin ka hung ngeen ahi, Israelte kinepna jiaha hi khainiang a kaan ka hi ngaala,” achi hi.
Amah un a kawmah, “Na tanchin Judia gam apatin lehkhathot in ka mu sih va, unaute koima’n zong hi a hungin na tung thubuai bangmah ahung ensah sih va, asoi zong ahung soise ngei sih uhi.
Hizongleh na ngaihdaan chu nangmah apat ka ja nuam uhi; ajiahchu hi pawl hi gam chin a soisiat a aum uh ka he uhi,” achi uhi.

Huleh ni aguat va, hu atun ni in a kawmvah mi tampi ahung va, jiingkaal apat nitaahlam dongin a kawmvah Pathian lalgam thu hilhchianin ahesah a, Mosi Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thu in, Jesu lamah amahuh ajawl tuuntuun hi.
Khenkhat in thu kisoi chu agingta va, khenkhat in agingta sih uhi.
Huleh amahuh akithugual theih louh phetun, Paul in thu khat asoi zohin apawtkheta uhi, a thusoi chu hih ahi: “Hagau Siangthou in zawlnei Isai kam a i pulepate uh kawma asoi chu adih ngeei mei,
‘Hi mite kawmah chiah inla vasoi in, “Ja chu na ja diing va, angaihna na he sih diing uh; mu chu na mu diing va, hizongleh heetsiamna na nei sih diing uhi;

ajiahchu hi mite lungtang ataahta a, a bil uh angongta a, a mit uh asiingta uhi; huchilou inchu a mit un amu kha diing va, a bil un aja kha diing va, a lungtang un ahesiam kha diing va, huchiin ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, ke’n ka na sudam kha diing hi,”’ achih chu.
Hujiahin Pathian hutdamna thu chu Jentelte kawma sawl ahita chih he un, amah un zong angaikhe diing uhi,” achi hi.
Hi thute asoi zohin, Judate chu apawtkheta va, amahuh lahah nasataha kinialna anei uhi.
Huleh Paul chu kum nih pumluum inn luahman kipiaahin aum a, a kawma chiah photmah anakipaahpih hi.
Pathian lalgam thu asoi a, Lalpa Jesu Khrist thu jaleentahin ahilh jeel a, koimah in amah akhaam sih uhi.
Paul, Jesu Khrist suaah, apostol hi diinga kouh, Pathian tanchinpha diinga sehtuam in,
hu tanchinpha Pathian in malai peha zawlneite kam a Pathian Lehkhathu Siangthou a anachiamsa,
huchu tahsa daan a David suan a piang, a Tapa Jesu Khrist i Lalpa uh tungtaang,
huleh Amah chu misi lah apat thohkiitna jaalin sianthouna Hagau dungjuiin silbawltheihna toh Pathian Tapa ahi chiin phuandohin aumta hi, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist chu.
A min jiaha nam chin laha mi ginna lama thumangsah diingin Amah vaangin hehpihna leh apostol hihna ka tangta uhi.
Hute lahah nanguh zong Jesu Khrist a kouhte na hi uhi.
Pathian deihtahte, misiangthou hi diinga kouhte, Rom khua a um zousiah kawmah, i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Khovel pumpi a na ginna uh athansuaah jiahin na bawnva tunga ka kipaahna thu, amasapeenin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin ka Pathian kawmah ka soi hi.
Huchi ahih jiahin ka haamteina ah na min uh ka lou ngiitngeet chih a Tapa tanchinpha a ka hagau a a nna ka tohsah zing Pathian chu ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Bangchidaan aha khat a tu beeha na kawmva ka hungna diing Pathian deihdaan a lampi ka muhtheiha ahihleh chiin ka ngeen hi.
Ajiahchu na detna diingva hagaulam silpiaah bang aha ka hung piaah theihna diingin nanguh hung muh ka uut hi;
huchu na ginna uh leh ka ginna a nanguh leh kei i kisuhhaattuah theihna diingin ka chihna ahi.

Huleh unaute, Jentel dangte kawma ka tohgimna gah ka muhtaah bangmaha nanguh laha zong ka muh theihna diingin na kawmvah tampivei hung ka tumta a, hizongleh tu dongin daalin ka um zing chih na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi.
Grikte leh Grik hiloute kawmah bat ka nei hi, mipil leh mipilloute kawmah zong.
Huchiin nanguh Rom khua a umte kawmah zong tanchinpha soi diingin ka kithalawp zing hi.

Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh Khrist tanchinpha chu ka zumpih sih hi, ajiahchu agingta photmah diingin hichu hutdamna diinga Pathian silbawltheihna ahi: Judate diingin ahi masa a, huleh Grikte diingin zong ahi.
Ajiahchu hikhu ah Pathian dihtatna chu ginna apat ginna ah suhlatin aumta hi; “Midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing,” chih gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu thutah dihtatlouhna a daaltu, mihingte Pathian ngaihsahlouhna leh dihtatlouhna zousiah tungah Pathian lungthahna chu vaan apatin suhlatin aumta hi.
Pathian in aheetsahtaah jiahin Pathian tanchin heet diing chu amahuh ah suhlatin aumta hi.
Ajiahchu khovel siam chiil apat a sil muhtheihlouhte, a kumtuang silbawltheihna leh a Pathian jia natan chiang silsiam ah akilang a, chiantaha muhin aum a, hujiahin suanlam diing anei sih uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian he ngaalin Pathian bangin apaahtawi sih va, kipaahthu zong asoi sih va, himahleh a ngaihtuahna uh chu thulimlou ahung suaahta a, huleh a lungtang ngol uh chu ahung mialta hi.
Pil kisain mingol ahung suaahta va,
sitheilou Pathian loupina chu sithei mihingte, vate, keenglinei sate leh aboh a vaah ganhingte lim ah atangsahta uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian in amahuh chu a sapum uh zumhuaitaha kibawltuah diing leh a lungtang uh uutjawng banga sil niin abawl uh phalin apedohta hi.
Hute’n chu Pathian thutah juau a tangsahin, kumtuanga phattaah a Siamtu saangin a silsiam biain a nna atohsah jawta uhi. Amen.
Hujiahin Pathian in zumhuaitaha ahuuh uh phalin apedohta hi. Ajiahchu a numeite uh nasan in zong a pianken umdaan ngeina uh daanlou banga um diingin akibawl limdang uhi.
Hutobangmahin pasalte’n zong numei zatdaan ngeina tawpsanin huuhin khat leh khat akienlah va, pasal leh pasal kilawmloutahin akibawl va, apaikhial man muh diing uh chu amahuh ah akimuh uhi.
Huleh a lungsim va Pathian aheet uutlouh jiahun, Pathian in sil kilawmloute bawl diinga lungsim manlouh aneih uh phalin apedohta hi;

dihtatlouhna, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina, giitlouhna, duhaamna, kimuhdahna zousiah a dimin; thangsiatnate, tualthahnate, kinialnate, kiheemnate, mi siatna diing ngaihtuahnate in adim va; amahuh chu misoisiathaatte,
miheehsete, Pathian mudahte, kihau haatte, kiliansahte, kichapousahte, silgilou pandohtute, nulepa thumangloute,
heetsiamna neiloute, ginumloute, pianpih lungsiatna neiloute, kilem uutloute, zahngaihna neiloute ahi uhi;
amah un hutobang sil bawlte chu sitaah ahi chih Pathian vaihawmna he ngaalun, amahuh chauh bawl zong hilouin hizongleh midang hutobang bawlte zong akipaahpih uhi.

Hujiahin, aw mihing, mi soiseel haat koi hitazongleh chin, suanlam diing himhim neilou na hi, ajiahchu midang na soiseelna tah ah nangmah siamlouh na kitangsah ahi; nang asoiseeltu in zong hutobang silte na bawl thou jiahin.
Hizongleh Pathian vaihawmna chu hutobang sil bawlte tungah thutah dungjuiin atu ahi chih i he hi.
Aw mihing, hutobang sil bawlte soiseel a, nang lah hute mah bawl thou ngaal, Pathian vaihawmna peel diinga kigingta na hiaimah?
Ahihlouhleh Pathian hoihna in kisiih diingin nang ahung pui chih helouin, a hoihna leh a jaidoh daan leh a thuaahtheihna hauhdaante simmoh na hiaimah?
Hizongleh na lungtang khauh jiah leh na kisiih nuamlouh jiahin, Pathian lungthahna ni leh vaihawmna dihtat hung kilat ni chianga diingin na tungah lungthahna na kikholkhawm ahi.
Ama’n chu “mi chin a silbawl bang jeelun athuhkiit diing”:
sil hoih bawla kuhkaltaha pang a, loupina leh paahtawina leh manthaai theihlouhna hawl mite kawmah kumtuang hinna ape diing hi.
Hizongleh soihah a thutah juilou a, dihtatlouhna juite tungah chu lungthahna leh thangtawmnate aum diing a,
thuaahgimna leh lungngaihna nasatah chu silgilou bawl zousiah tungah aum diing hi, Judate tungah aum masa diing a huleh Grikte tungah zong aum diing hi;
hizongleh sil hoih bawl photmahte kawmah chu loupinate, paahtawinate leh hamuannate piaah ahi diing hi: Judate kawmah piaah masat ahi diing a, huleh Grikte kawmah zong piaah ahi diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian ah deihsahtuamna aum sih hi.
Koipouh daan neiloua sil bawlsual chu daan louin ROMTE 1:28,282 amangthaai diing a, koipouh daan neia sil bawlsual chu daan a vaihawmsahin aum diing hi.
Ajiahchu daan thu ja mi hih chauh chu Pathian mitmuhin siamtang ahi sih a, hizongleh daan banga gamta chu midih ahi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu daan neilou Jentelte’n a pianken lungtang un daan silte abawl va, daan nei sih mahleh uh, hite chu daan in akineihtawm jeel uhi.
A lungtang vah daan silbawl gelh ahi chih aensah va, huchu a sialepha heetna un aheetpih a, a lungsimte uh kinialin siam leh siamlouh akitangsah lehleh uhi,
ka tanchinpha soi dungjuia Pathian in Jesu Khrist zanga mihing thukiphualte vai ahawmsah ni chiangin.
Ngai in, nang chu Judami kichi na hi a, daan na muang a, Pathian na suang a,
huleh a deihjawng na he a, daan a hilha na um jiahin sil hoih jawte na khenthei a,
huleh nangmah ngeei chu mittawte puitu leh mial a umte diinga vaah hiin na kimuang a,
daanbu a heetna leh thutah um chu nei a kikoihin, mingolte leh naungeehte hilhtu hiin na kigingta hi.
Hujiahin nang, midangte hilhtu, nang leh nang kihilhlou na hiaimah? Nang guuhtaat louh diing ahi chia thusoitu, na gu veu maw?
Nang, “Aangkawm sin,” chia hilhtu, aang na kawm veu maw? Nang milem hopa, milem biahna inn a silte na gu veu maw?
Nang, daan suangpa, na daan bohsiat jiahin Pathian na suminse veu maw?
Ajiahchu, “Pathian min chu nanguh jiahin Jentelte lahah soisiatin aumta hi,” chia gelh bangin.
Ajiahchu daan juitu na hih inchu, zehtan aphatuam ngeei a; himahleh daan bohsetu na hih inchu, na zehtan chu tanlouh bang ahung hita hi.
Hujiahin zehtanlou mi’n daan thusehte ajuih leh, a zehtanlouh chu tan banga ngaih ahi sih diaimah?
Huleh piandaana zehtanlou mi’n daan ajuih leh, nang, lehkhathu leh zehtan daan nei ngaala daan bohsetu chu ahung soiseel sih diaimah?
Ajiahchu apolaang chauh a Judami hi chu Judami tah ahi sih a, akilanga tahsa chauha zehtan zong zehtan ahi sih hi.

Hizongleh a sungnung lama Judami hi chu Judami tah ahi; huleh zehtan tah chu lungsim lama tan ahi a, lehkha thu mei a hilouin, Hagau ah ahi; amah paahtaat loh chu mihing apat ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian apat ahijaw hi.
Bang ahiai Judami in hamphatna aneih tuan? Ahihlouhleh zehtan zong bang ahiai aphattuamna?
Lam chinteng ah aphatuam hi. Apipeenin, Pathian kamsuahte a kawmva kolsaha aum jiahin ahi.
Ajiahchu khenkhatte’n gingta sih mahleh uh bang achi tuan diai? A gintaatlouhna un Pathian ginumna bangmalou asuaahsah diaimah?
Suaahsah lou hial! Pathian chu adih a, hizongleh mi chin ajuau uhi: “Na thusoi a siamtanga na um a, vaihawmsaha na um chianga zong na zoh theihna diingin,” chia gelh bangin.
Hizongleh i dihtatlouhna in Pathian dihtatna asuhlat leh, bang i soi diai? Pathian in mi agawtin dihtatlou ahiai? (Mihing bangin ka soi ahi).
Hilou hial! Ajiahchu huchi hitaleh Pathian in khovel vai bangchiin ahawmta diai?
Ahihvaangin ka juau soi jiaha Pathian thutahna Amah loupina diinga apun seem leh, bang diinga kei zong misual banga siamlouh tansaha um nalai ka hiai?

Huleh bang diing a, ahung heeh va khenkhat in ka soi louhpi na hung soisah bangva, “Sil hoih ahung pawt theihna diingin sil hoihlou i bawl diing uh” chia soi jaw lou i hi viai? Hutobang mite’n siamlouh atan uh adih ahi.
Ahihtaahleh bang? Amahuh saangin i hoihjaw tuanva ahiaimah? Hoihjaw himhim lou. Ajiahchu Judate leh Grikte anihun sual nuaia um veh ahi uh chih ama in i kawhchianta hi.
Hichia gelh bangin, “Koimah midihtat mawngmawng aum sih, khatmah zong aum sih.
Koimah hesiam mawngmawng aum sih, koimah Pathian hawl mawngmawng aum sih.
Ahilou lamah apeet zou vehta va, bangmah phatuamlou ahung suaah vehta uhi. Koimah sil hoih bawl mawngmawng aum sih, khatmah zong aum sih hi.”
““A lawl uh haan kihong ahi a, a lei un heemthu asoi va”; “A muuh vah guulsia gu aum hi”;
“A kam uh haanse lohna leh khaatna in adim hi.”
“A kal uh sisan suah diingin akin suan uhi.
Manthaaina leh gentheihna a lampi vah aum a;
huleh hamuanna lampi zong ahe sih uhi.”
“A mit hah vah Pathian launa mawngmawng aum sih hi,” chih chu.
Huchiin daan in sil bangpouh asoi photmah chu, kam chinteng hup ahih theihna diing leh khovel zousiah Pathian ma a mohtanga aum theihna diingun, daan nuaia umte kawma asoi ahi chih i he uhi.
Ajiahchu daan silbawlte jiahin koimah Pathian mitmuhin siamtangin aum sih diing uh; ajiahchu daan jiahin sual kiheetna ahung um hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu Daan leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute in aheetsah bangin, daan tellouin Pathian dihtatna chu suhlatin aumta hi.
Huchu Jesu Khrist gintaatna jiaha a gingta photmahte diinga suhlat-a um Pathian dihtatna chu ahi; ajiahchu a kilimdanna bangmah aum sih hi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah in sil abawlsualta va, Pathian loupina aching zouta sih uhi,
Khrist Jesu a um tatna jaalin a hehpihna in athawn a siamtansahin aum va,
Pathian thuaahtheihna jaala malaia a sualnate uh kiheetmohbawla aum jiahin, a dihtatna suhlatna diingin Khrist Jesu chu ginna tungtawna a sisan jaala sual thuphatawina hi diingin Pathian in aguat a,
tulai hun a a dihtatna sulang diingin, huchia Amah chu midihtat ahihtheihna diing leh Jesu gingta photmahte siamtangsahpa ahihtheihna diingin.
Ahihleh kisahtheihna diing khoiah aum ei? Aum thei mawngmawng sih hi. Bang daan in ahiai siam i tan uh? Silbawl daan in ahiai? Hilou, ginna daan in ahijaw hi.
Hujiahin mi khat chu daan silbawlte jiah hilouin ginna jiahin siamtansah ahi chih i gingta uhi.
Pathian chu Judate Pathian chauh ahiaimah? Jentelte Pathian zong hilou maw? Hi e, Jentelte Pathian zong ahi.
Zehtante ginna jiaha siamtangsah diing leh zehtanlouhte zong huh ginna tungtawn mah a siamtangsah diing Pathian chu khat ahi ngaala.
Ahihleh ginna jaala daan chu bangmalou i suaahsah uh ahiai? Suaahsah lou hial! Husaangin, daan i sukipjaw uh ahi.
Ahihleh tahsa daan a i pu uh Abraham in amuh bang ahiai i soi diing uh?
Ajiahchu natoh jiaha Abraham siamtansaha aum leh suan diing anei hi, hizongleh Pathian lamah chu anei sih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in bang ahiai asoi? “Abraham in Pathian agingta a, huchu amah diinga dihtatna a ngaih ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh natongtu loh chu hehpihna silpiaah a ngaih ahi sih a, bat a ngaih ahijaw hi.
Hizongleh nna tonglou a, Pathian ngaihsahloute siamtangsahpa gingta jaw mi ginna chu dihtatna a ngaih ahi,
Pathian in natoh telloua midihtat a aseh mi hamphatdaan David in zong anasoi a:
“A tatleehna uh ngaihdama um a, a sualnate uh khuha umte chu ahampha uhi;
LALPA’N sualna neia aseh louh diing mi chu ahampha hi,” chia asoitaah bangin.
Ahihleh hu hamphatna zehtante tung chauha um ahiai, ahihlouhleh zehtanlouhte tungah zong? Ginna chu Abraham a diinga dihtatna a ngaih ahi i chi ngaala.
Ahihleh huchu bangchi kingaih ahiai? Azehtan nungin ahiai, ahihlouhleh azehtan main? Azehtan nungin ahi sih a, azehtan main ahijaw hi.

Huleh zehtanlouha aum laia ginna a amuh dihtatna heetna zehtan chiamchihna chu amu a; zehtanlouh hizongleh uh agingta zousiah pa ahih theihna diingin, dihtatna chu amahuh diinga zong seha aum theihna diingin,
huleh zehtanlouhte a diinga zehtante pa chauh ahi sih a, i pu uh Abraham zehtanlouha aum laia a ginna neih banga neite pa zong ahi.
Ajiahchu Abraham aha, ahihlouhleh a chihaah kawmah khovel gouluahtu ahi diing chih daan jiaha chiam ahi sih a, hizongleh ginna a dihtatna jiahin ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu daan a mite gouluahtute ahih un chu, ginna bangmalou ahita diing a, thuchiam zong panna bei ahita diing hi.
Ajiahchu daan in lungthahna asiam hi, ajiahchu daan um louhna ah bohsiatna zong aum sih hi.

Hujiahin hehpihna dungjuia ahih theihna diingin ginna jiahin ahi a, chihaahte zousiah in thuchiam chu peelloua amuhna diingun, daan nei mite chauh hilouin, hizongleh i bawnva i pu uh Abraham banga ginna nei zousiah in zong amuh theihna diingun,
(“Nam tampite pa in ka hung bawlta hi,” chia gelh bangin) misite suhingtu leh sil umloute um banga soitu Pathian agintaatpa mitmuh ah.
Kinephuai a aum louhin zong ama’n chu kineemtahin agingta hi, nam tampite pa ahung hihtheihna diingin, “Huchibangin na chihaah ahung hi diing,” chia kisoi dungjuiin.
Huleh ginna a haatlou hi louin, a sapum sisa banga um leh amah chu kum za khat veel diing mi ahi a, Sarah achiing ahih zong angaihtuah sih hi.
Ginlelhna jaalin Pathian thuchiam tahsanglouin aum sih a, hizongleh ginna ah ahaat a, Pathian loupina apia hi.
Huleh Ama’n thu achiam phot chu ataangtungsah thei hi chih hechianin agingta tinten hi.
Hujiahin a ginna chu “amah a diinga dihtatna a ngaih ahita hi.”
Huleh a ginna chu a dihtatna a ngaih ahi chih amah diing chauha gelh ahi sih a,
hizongleh eiuh diingin zong ahi. Misi lah apat a i Lalpa uh Jesu kaithoupa i gintaat un chu eiuh diingin zong dihtatna a ngaih ahi diing hi.
Hu Jesu chu i tatsualnate jiahin piaahkhiahin aum a, huleh siam i tanna diingun kaihthohin aum hi.
Hujiahin ginna jiaha siamtansaha umin, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaalin Pathian toh kilemin i um uhi.
Amah jaal mahin i dinna uh hi hehpihna ah ginna jaalin luuttheihna i ROMTE 4:10,286 neita va, huleh Pathian loupina a kineemin kipaahin zong i um uhi.
Huleh huchauh zong hilouin, gimthuaahna in kuhkalna asiam chih hein gimthuaahna ah zong i kipaah va;
huleh kuhkalna in heetchianna asiam a, heetchianna in kinepna asiam hi.
Huleh kinepna in chu alungkesah sih, ajiahchu hu Hagau Siangthou i kawma ahung piaah in Pathian lungsiatna i lungtang vah aleihleetta hi.
Ajiahchu haatna beia i um laiin, a huntahin Khrist chu Pathian ngaihsahloute luangin ahung sita hi.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh midihtat luanga sih mi auut khol sih diing a, ahiinlah mi hoih luanga sih chu mi khenkhat in angaap meithei hi.
Hizongleh misualte i hih laia Khrist i luangva ahung sihna ah Pathian in ahung lungsiatna chu alangsahta hi.
Hu saangmahin, tuin, a sisan a siamtansaha i um nungin Amah jaalin lungthahna apatin hutdamin i um diing uhi.
Ajiahchu meelma i hihlaia bawn a Tapa sihna jiaha Pathian toh kilemta i hih un chu, kilema i um zoh nungun a hinna jiahin hutdamin i um diaahkhol diing uhi.
Hu chauh hilouin, tua Pathian toh kilepna i muhna uh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist jaalin Pathian ah zong i kipaah uhi.
Hujiahin, mi khat jiaha sual khovel a ahung luut a, sual jiaha sihna ahung luut mahbangin, mi zousiah anasualtaah jiahin sihna in mi zousiah ajeelsuaahta hi.
Ajiahchu daan umma tanin sual khovel ah aum a, hizongleh daan um louh laiin sual chu suala ngaih ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh Adam apat Mosi tanphain Adam sualna banga sil bawlsual loute tungah zong sihna in vai ahawm hi; Adam chu ahung diingpa Jesu etsahna ahi.

Hizongleh silthawnpiaah chu giitlouhna toh kibang ahi sih hi. Ajiahchu mi khat giitlouh jaala bawn mi tampi asih va ahihleh, Pathian hehpihna leh Mi khat, Jesu Khrist hehpihna jiaha silthawnpiaah chu mi tampite tungah suhpungin aum ngeei diing hi.

Huleh hi silthawnpiaah chu mi sual khat tungtawna hung kuan khu toh akibang sih hi, bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh mi khat sualna jiahin vaihawmna chu ahung um a hu in siamlouhtanna atun hi, hizongleh sualna tampi lahah silthawnpiaah ahung um a hu in siamtansahna atun hi.
Ajiahchu mi khat giitlouh jiaha sihna in hu mi khat jiah maha vai ahawm leh, hehpihna nasatah leh dihtatna silthawnpiaah mute’n Mi khat, Jesu Khrist jiahin hinna ah vai ahawm ngeei diing uhi.
Hujiahin mi khat giitlouh jiahin siamlouh tansahna chu mi zousiah tungah ahung um hi. Huchi bangmahin Mi khat dihtatna silbawl jiahin hinna siamtansahna chu mi zousiah tungah ahung um hi.
Ajiahchu mi khat thumanlouh jiaha mi tampite misual akihihsah mahbangin, Mi khat thuman jiahin mi tampite midihtat hihsah ahi diing uhi.
Huleh giitlouhna atam seemna diingin daan ahung um hi. Hizongleh sual apunna phot ah hehpihna zong apung jawseem hi,
huchia sual in sihna a vai ahawm mahbanga, hehpihna in dihtatna jaala kumtuang hinna tanna diinga i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jiaha vai ahawm theihna diingin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Hehpihna apun seemna diingin sual ah i um zing diing uh adiai?
Um zing lou hial diing! Eiuh sual lama sisate bangchiin sual ah i hing thei nalai lai diai?
Eiuh Khrist Jesu a baptis a um photmahte chu a sihna ah baptis-in i um uh ahi chih helou na hi viaimah?
Hujiahin Pa loupina jaala Khrist chu misi lah apat kaihthoh ahih bangin eihaw zong hinna thah a i hin theihna diingun baptisma tungtawnin sihna ah Amah toh vuiin i um uhi.
Ajiahchu a sihna kibatpiha Amah toh i na kizoptaah uh leh, a thohkiitna kibatpihin zong i kizop diing uh,
huchia sualna sapum suhjawngkhaala aum theihna diingin, tu apat sual suaaha i um nawn louhna diingun i mihing lui uh Amah toh kilhbehin aumta hi chih theiin.
Ajiahchu koipouh asitasa chu sual apatin ajaleenta hi.
Huleh Khrist toh i sihtaah a ahihleh, Amah toh hin zong i hinkhawm diing uh ahi chih i gingta hi.
Khrist chu misi lah apat kaihthohin aum a, asi nawn sih diing chih hein. Sihna in Amah tungah thu anei nawnta sih hi.
Ajiahchu a sihna chu sual lam thu ah setden diingin khatvei asita a; hizongleh ahin lam thu ahihleh Pathian lamah ahing ahi.
Huchibangmahin nanguh zong sual lam thu ah sitain kingai unla, hizongleh Pathian lamah i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ah hingin kingai un.
Hujiahin na sapum uh uutjawng na juihna diingun na sapum sithei vah sual in vaihawm sih heh.

Na sapum hiangte uh zong dihtatlouhna vanzat diingin sual kawmah pephal sih un, hizongleh misi lah akipat hing kiit bangin Pathian kawmah kipia un; huleh na sapum hiangte uh zong dihtatna vanzat diingin Pathian kawmah pia un.
Ajiahchu sual in na tungvah thu aneita sih diing hi, bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh daan nuaia um na hi sih va, hizongleh hehpihna nuaia um na hijaw uhi.
Ahihleh bang chita diing? Daan nuaia um hilou a hehpihna ROMTE 5:19,288 nuaia um i hih jiahin i sual diing uh ahi diai? Sual hial lou diing!

Mi khat kawma suaah banga thumang diinga na kipiaah chiangun, na thuman pa uh suaahte na hi va, nanguh chu sihna tuntu sual suaahte aha, ahihlouhleh dihtatna tuntu thumanna suaahte hijaw aha, na hi uh chih helou na hi viaimah?
Hizongleh Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh, sual suaah anahi himahzongleh uh chin, nanguh hung kipia kihilhna daan thu chu lungtang tah in na juita uhi.
Sual apat hahdoha umin, dihtatna suaahte na hung hita uhi.

Na tahsa uh haatlouh jiahin mihing daanin ka soi ahi. Na sapum hiangte uh daan bohsiatna tuntu dihtatlouhna leh giitlouhna suaah diinga nana piaah bangun, huchibangmahin tuin na sapum hiangte uh sianthouna tuntu dihtatna suaah diingin pia un.
Ajiahchu sual suaahte na hih laiun dihtatna lam ah nana jaleenta uhi.
Ahihleh tua na sil zumpihte vah hulaiin gah bang ahiai leh na neih uh? Hu silte tawpna lah sihna ahi ngaala.
Hizongleh tuin sual apat jaleensaha um a, Pathian suaahte na hung hih nungun, sianthouna khopin na gah uh na nei va, huleh a tawpna ah kumtuang hinna toh na nei uhi.
Ajiahchu sual man sihna ahi a, hizongleh Pathian silthawnpiaah chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaalin kumtuang hinna ahi.
Unaute, daan in mi a damsung teng a tungah thu aneihkhum ahi chih na he sih viai mah (daan he mite kawmah ka soi ahi)?
Ajiahchu numei pasal nei chu a pasal damsung siah daan a a pasal a kaanin aum ahi. Hujiahin a pasal asih inchu, pasal lam thu ah daan apat hahkhiahin aum hi.
Huchiin a pasal dam zinga midang akiteenpih inchu, aangkawmnu akichi diing hi. Hizongleh a pasal asih inchu, hu daan thu apatin ajaleenta a, midang toh kiteeng zongleh aangkawmnu ahi sih diing hi.
Hujiahin, ka unaute, midang khat, sihna apat kaihthoha umpa na kiteenpih theihna diingun, daan thu lamah Khrist sapum tungtawnin asi na hung hita uhi, huchia Pathian lama gah i suah theihna diingun.
Ajiahchu tahsa a i um laiin, daan in atohthou i sual uutnate’n sihna tun diinga gah suang diingin i sapum hiangte ah nna atong uhi.
Hizongleh tuin eiuh hung kaantu chu sihsan zouin, daan apat hahkhiahin i umta uhi, huchia lehkhagelh lui bangphet hilou a Hagau hinna thah a nna i toh theihna diingin.

Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Daan chu sualna hi adiai? Hilou hial! Aleh lamah, daan jiahin hilou leh chu, sual kichi helou diing hi ing a. Ajiahchu daan in, “Na een louh diing ahi,” na chi sih leh, een kichi helou diing ka hi.
Hizongleh sual in thupiaah tungtawnin hun lemtaang muin ka sungah eenna chinteng aumsah hi. Ajiahchu daan umlouin sual chu asi ahi.
Huleh tumalamin kei chu daan louin ka na hing a, hizongleh thupiaah ahung um tahin sual ahung hingdoh a huleh kei ka sita hi.
Huleh hinna hung po diing thupiaah chu sihna diing ahung hita chih ka hung hedohta hi.
Ajiahchu sual in thupiaah jiaha hun lemtaang muin ahung heem a, hukhu zangin ahung sulumta hi.
Hujiahin daan chu asiangthou a, huleh thupiaah zong asiangthou a huleh adihtat a huleh ahoih hi.

Ahihleh sil hoih khu kei diinga sihna hung hita adiai? Hilou hial! Hizongleh sual chu sual a akilat theihna diingin sual in sil hoih tungtawnin keimah ah sihna ahung tongdoh hi. Hujiahin sual chu thupiaah tungtawna sual nasatah ahung hihtheihna diingin.
Ajiahchu daan chu hagaulam sil ahi chih i he hi, hizongleh kei chu sami, sual suaaha khotsa ka hi.
Ajiahchu sil ka bawl peen ka hesiam sih hi. Ajiahchu sil ka bawl uutpeen chu ka bawl sih a; hizongleh ka uutlouh peen ka bawl hi.
Ka bawl uutlouh peen ka bawl inchu, daan ahoih hi chia pom ka hita diing hi.
Huchiin tuin a bawltu chu kei ka hita sih a, hizongleh sual keimah a um bawl ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu keimah ah (chih chu ka tahsa ah) sil hoih mawngmawng ateeng sih chih ka he hi; abawl uutna peen chu keimah ah aum a, hizongleh hu a hoih bawl theihna keimah ah ka mu sih hi.
Ajiahchu sil hoih ka bawl uut peen ka bawl sih a; hizongleh sil hoihlou ka bawl uutlouh peen ka bawljaw hi.
Ka uutlouh peen ka bawl inchu, a bawltu keimah ka hita sih a, sual keimah a um bawl ahijaw hi.
Huchiin hi daan ka hung hedohta, sil hoih ka bawl uut laiin giitlouhna ka kawmah aum hi.
Ajiahchu ka mihing lungsim sunglam ah Pathian daan tungah ka kipaah hi.
Hizongleh ka tahsa hiangte ah daan tuam khat aum chih ka he hi. Hukhu in ka lungsim daan adou a, huleh ka tahsa hiangte a um sualna daan kawmah suaahin ahung pui veu hi.
Migenthei hina meijeen ing e! Hi sihna sapum lah apat koi in ahiai hung suaahtasah diing?
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaalin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi. Huchiin keimah tah in chu ka lungsim in Pathian daan ka tong a, hizongleh tahsa in chu sualna daan ka tong hi.
Hujiahin tuin chu Khrist Jesu a umte, tahsa daan a hing lou a, hizongleh Hagau daan a hingte diingin siamlouhtansahna mawngmawng aumta sih hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist Jesu a um hinna Hagau daan in sual leh sihna daan apat ahung jaleensahta hi.
Daan in tahsa tungtawna a haatlouh jiaha abawl guallouh chu, Pathian in a Tapa ngeei chu sual tahsa tobang pua a sual jiaha ahung sawlna ah, tahsa sual chu siamlouh atangsahta hi,
huchia tahsa daan a hing lou a, himahleh Hagau daan a hingjaw eihaw tunga dihtatna daan poimohte suhtaangtunga aum theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu tahsa daan a umte’n tahsa lam silte alunggulh va, hizongleh Hagau daan a umte’n chu Hagau silte alunggulh uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsa lam silte ngaihtuah chu sihna ahi a, hizongleh Hagau silte ngaihtuah chu hinna leh hamuanna ahi.
Ajiahchu tahsalam lungsim chu Pathian toh kimeelmaatna ahi; bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh huchu Pathian daan nuaiah aum sih a, um zong aum theilou him ahi.
Huchiin tahsa a umte’n Pathian akipaahsah thei sih uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian Hagau nanguh a aum tahzet inchu, tahsa a um na hi sih va hizongleh Hagau a um na hijaw uhi. Hizongleh mi koipouh in Khrist Hagau aneih louh inchu, Amah a ahi sih hi.
Huleh Khrist nanguh a aum leh, sapum chu sual jiahin asi ahi; hizongleh Hagau chu dihtatna jiahin ahing ahi.
Hizongleh misi lah akipat Jesu kaithoupa Hagau nanguh a aum inchu, misi lah akipat Khrist kaithoupa’n nanguh a um Hagau tungtawnin na sapum uh sitheite zong asuhing diing hi.
Hujiahin unaute, bat nei i hi uhi, tahsa a hilouin, tahsa daan a hing diing hi louin.
Ajiahchu tahsa daan a na um un chu, na si diing va; hizongleh sapum silbawlte Hagau a na suhlup jeel un chu, na hing diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian Hagau puia um photmahte chu Pathian tate ahi uhi.
Lau a um kiit diingin suaah hihna hagau na mu uh ahi sih a, hizongleh ta hihna Hagau na mu uh ahijaw a, hu Hagau jiahin “Abba, Pa,” chiin i kikou uhi.
Hagau ngeei in eimah hagau toh Pathian tate i hi chih ahung heetpih hi.
Huleh tate i hih-un chu, gouluahtute i hi; Amah toh i thuaahgim tahzet un chu Pathian gouluahtute leh Khrist gouluahpihtute i hi uhi; huchia eite zong Amah kawma paahtawia i um theihna diingun.
Ajiahchu tulaia thuaahgimnate chu ijawchianga eiuh a loupina suhlat-a um diing toh tehkaahthamin ka ngai sih hi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah in kineem mahmahin Pathian tate kilatna diing angaahlah mahmah uhi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah chu umjebei a umsahin aumta uh, amahuh uutthu hilouin, kinepna neia amahuh a thu nuaia umsahpa jiahin ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah zong siatna suaah apat suahtaatsaha umin Pathian tate jaleenna loupi ah aluut diing uhi.
Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah tutan dongin thuum leh nauvei na thuaahin aum uh chih i he uhi.
Huleh amahuh chauh hilouin, Hagau gah masa nei eihaw ngeei zong ta hihna, i sapum uh tatna muhna diing, ngaahlah mahmahin lungsim in i maau uhi.
Ajiahchu kinepna a hutdamin i um uhi; hizongleh muhsa zinga kinep chu kinepna ahi sih hi, mi’n amuhsa zing ah bang diingin akineem nalailai diviai?
Hizongleh i muhlouh i kineppih inchu, kuhkaltahin i ngaah hi.
Hutobangmahin, Hagau in zong i haatlouhnate ah ahung panpih hi. Ajiahchu bangchi banga haamtei diing i hiai chih i he sih a; hizongleh Hagau in thuumna soi guallouhin ahung ngetsah zing hi.
Huleh Pathian deihjawng banga misiangthoute diinga angetsah jiahin, Amah lungtang entu in Hagau lungsim bang ahiai chih ahe hi.
Huleh Pathian lungsiatte, Ama’n aguat banga akouhte diingin sil zousiah chu a hoihna diingun atongkhawm chiat hi chih i he uhi.
Ajiahchu aheetlawhte chu Amah Tapa banga um diingin aguatlawh hi, a Tapa chu unau tampite laha tachiil ahung hihtheihna diingin.
Huleh Ama’n aguatlawhte chu kouh zong akou a; akouhte chu siam atangsah a; siam atansahte chu apaahtawi hi.
Ahihleh hi thute ah bang i soita diai? Pathian i lama apan leh, koi in ahiai hung dou thei diing?
Amah Tapa ngeei zong hawilou a, hizongleh i bawnva diinga hung pedohpa in bang diingin sil zousiah athawnin Amah toh ahung pekhawm lou diai?
Pathian miteelte koi in ahiai heeh diing? Siamtangsahtu Pathian ahi ngaala.
Koi in ahiai siamlouhtangsah diing? Asi chu Khrist ahi ngaala; ahi, athoukiit jawta a, Pathian jiatlam ah aum a, eiuh diinga hung ngetsahtu zong ahi.

Khrist lungsiatna akipan koi in ahiai hung khen diing? Gimthuaahna in ahiai, lungngaihna in ahiai, suhduhdahna in ahiai, kial in ahiai, saguaahna in ahiai, lauhuaina in ahiai, naamsau in ahiai hung khen diing?
“Nangmah jiahin nitumin thahin ka um va, goh diing belaam banga ngaih ka hi uhi,” chia gelh bangin.
Khenlou hial diing, hite zousiah ah ahung lungsiattu jaalin gualzoute saanga tungtuang jaw i hi uhi.
Ajiahchu sihna aha, hinna aha, angelte aha, lalnate aha, silbawltheihnate aha, sil umzingte aha, sil hung um diingte aha,
saanna aha, thuuhna aha, ahihlouhleh silsiam dang mawngmawng in zong i Lalpa uh Khrist Jesu a um Pathian lungsiatna akipan eite ahung khen thei sih diing chih chiantahin ka he hi.
Khrist ah thutah ka soi ahi, ka juau sih, Hagau Siangthou ah ka sialepha heetna in zong ahung heetpih hi,
ka lungtang ah hahsatna daaitheilou leh lungngaihna nasatah ka nei hi.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh ka unaute, tahsa lama ka chipihte luangin keimah Khrist kawm apat koihtuam khopa haamse thuaahin um leng chiin ka haamtei hi.
Israelmi ahi ngaalva; ta hihnate, loupinate, thuhunte, daan thu piaahnate, Pathian biahinn a natohnate leh thuchiamte bang amahuh neih ahi.
Pulepate amahuh a ahi a, tahsa lam thu ah Khrist zong amahuh lah apat a hung pawt ahi a, Amah chu sil zousiah tunga um kumtuanga paahtawi taah Pathian ahi. Amen.
Hizongleh Pathian thu bangmalou banga umta ahi sih hi. Ajiahchu Israel haahte a bawnun Israel mi ahi veh sih uhi.
Abraham chihaahte ahih jiahun zong a bawnun tate ahi veh tuan sih uh; hizongleh, “Isak ah na haahte akichi diing,” chih ahijaw hi.
Hu tahsa tate chu Pathian tate ahi sih va; hizongleh thuchiam tate chu chihaah a ngaih ahijaw uh chihna ahi.
Ajiahchu hikhu thuchiam ahi: “Tu bang hun in ka hung diing a, Sarah in tapa anei diing,” chih chu.
Huleh hi chauh hilouin, Rebekah in, mi khat, i pu uh Isak tungtawna nau apaai laiin,
(naupangte chu piang nailouin, sil hoih leh silsia zong bawl nailouin, teel lam thu a Pathian siltupnajiah adet theihna diingin, silbawl jiah hilou a hizongleh a koutu deih jiah hijawin),
a kawmah, “A upajaw in a naupangjaw nna atohsah diing,” Pathian in achi hi.
“Jakob ka lungsiat a, hizongleh Esau chu ka mudah hi,” chih gelh bangin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Pathian ah dihtatlouhna aum a adiai? Hilou hial!
Ajiahchu Ama’n Mosi kawmah, “Ka khotuah uut photmah ka khotuah diing a, ka lainat uut photmah ka lainat diing,” chiin anasoita hi.
Huchiin adeihpa jiahin ahi sih a, muhsawma taaipa jiahin zong ahi diaah sih, hizongleh akhotuahtu Pathian jiahin ahijaw hi.

Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in Pharaoh kawmah hichiin achi, “Hi jiah tahin ka hung tungding a, nangmah a ka silbawltheihna ka etsah theihna diing leh leitung pumpi a ka min phuana aum theihna diingin,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Pathian in auut photmah akhotuah a, auut photmah zong asoihahsah veu hi.
Nang in ka kawmah, “Bang diinga Ama’n i dihlouhna hung kawh ahiai? A deihjawng koi in akalh ei?” na chi ahi meithei.
Hizongleh tahzetin, Aw mihing, nang Pathian dawng vialtu koi na hiai? Silsiam in a siamtu kawmah, “Bang diinga hitobanga hung siam na hiai?” achi diaimah?
Beelkhengtu in beel leitang khat apat beel khat phatuam a zattaaha kheeng diing leh beel khat zattaahloua kheeng diingin, beel leitang tungah thu anei sih eimah?
Pathian in a lungthahna leh silbawltheihna suhlat auut a, manthaaina tuaah diinga kiguatsa lungthahna beelte tunga athuaahzoh haamhaam leh, bang akhawh diai?
Huleh Ama’n malai apat loupina tang diinga aguatlawhsa hi khotuahna beelte tunga a loupina hauhsatna asuhlat theihna diinga,
Judate lah apat chauh hilou a, hizongleh Jentelte lah apat akouhdoh eite tunga zong athuaahzoh haamhaam leh, bang akhawh diai?
Hosea Lehkhabu a, “Ka mi hi ngeiloute chu ka mite ka chi diing a, lungsiat ngeilouh mite zong ka lungsiatte ka chi diing hi.
Huleh hichi ahung hi diing a, a kawmvah, ‘Ka mite na hi sih uh,’ chiha umna ngeei ah, Pathian hing tate chihin aum diing uh,” anachih bangmahin.
Huleh Isai in zong Israelte tungtaang thu anataangkoupih a: “Israel tate jaw tuikhanglian sehneel bangin tam zongleh uh, agawtmawh chauh hutdamin aum diing uh.
Ajiahchu LALPA’N leitung a nna tomkhat abawl diing jiahin, Ama’n hu nna chu azou diing a, dihtatna in asutom diing hi” chiin.
Huleh Isai mah in, “Sepaihte LALPA’N chihatu diing hung na hawisahlou hileh, Sodom bangin i umta diing va, Gomorrah banga bawlin i umta diing uhi,” chia anasoilawh bangin.
Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Dihtatna delhlou Jentelte’n dihtatna aphata uh ahi, ginna jiaha dihtatna chu.
Hizongleh daan a dihtatna delh Israelte’n hu dihtatna daan chu aphazouta sih uhi.
Bang jiahin? Ginna in adelh sih va, daan silbawlte a muhtheih banga adelh jiahun ahi. Ajiahchu puuhna suang ah apuuhta uhi.
“Ngai in, Zion ah puuhna suang leh daalna suangpi ka koih hi, koipouh Amah gingta chu azahtasah sih diing hi,” chia gelh bangin.
Unaute, Israelte diinga ka lungtang deihpeen leh Pathian kawma ka haamteina peen chu hutdama ahung um theihna diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lamah phattuam ngaihna anei uh chih ka heetpih hi, ahihvaangin heetna dungjuiin chu ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian dihtatna helouin, amahuh dihtatna tundoh tumin, Pathian dihtatna ah akituluut nuam sih uhi.
Ajiahchu agingta photmahte diingin Khrist chu dihtatna muhna diingin daan suhtawpna ahi.
Ajiahchu daan a kuan dihtatna tungtaang Mosi in agial hi, “Hu silte juitu chu hute in ahing diing,” chiin.
Hizongleh ginna a dihtatna in chu hichiin achi hi, “Na lungsim in, ‘Vaan ah koi akaltou diai?’ chi sin” (huchu, tunglam apat Khrist puikhiah diing chihna ahi),
“ahihlouhleh, ‘Lei nuaiah koi akumsuh diai?’” chi sin (huchu, misi lah apat Khrist puitouh diing, chihna ahi).
Hizongleh bang ahiai asoi? “Thu in ahung naih hi, na kam leh na lungtang ah aum hi” (huchu ginna thu ka soi uh chu ahi):
huchu na kam a Jesu chu Lalpa ahi chia na phuan a, misi lah apat Pathian in Amah akaithou chih na lungtang a na gintaat leh, hutdamin na um diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi’n lungtang in agingta a dihtatna amu hi, huleh kam in aphuang a hutdamna amu hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Koipouh Amah gingta chu azahtasah sih diing,” achi hi.
Ajiahchu Judate leh Grikte kilimdanna bangma aum sih hi, ajiahchu a bawnva tunga Lalpa chu khat ahi a, Amah kou zousiah tungah ahausa hi.
Ajiahchu “LALPA min kou photmah chu hutdamin aum diing hi.”
Ahihleh Amah agintaat louhpi uh bangchiin akou diviai? Huleh a thu ajaah louhpi uh bangchiin agingta diviai? Huleh a soitu umlouin bangchiin aja diviai?
Huleh sawl ahihlouh uh leh bangchiin thu asoi diviai? “Hamuanna tanchinpha leh sil hoih kipaah huai hung tutte keeng kilawm hina mei e!” chia gelh bangin.
Hizongleh tanchinpha a bawnun ajom veh sih uhi. Ajiahchu Isai in, “Lalpa, ka thusoi uh kua in ahiai gingta?” anachi hi.
Huchiin ginna chu jaahna jiahin ahung um a, huleh jaahna chu Pathian thu tungtawnin ahung um hi.
Hizongleh ka chi ahi, amah un aja sih va ahiaimah? Ja tham e: “A aw uh leitung pumpi ah athangsuaah a, a thu uh kawlmong tanphain athangta hi.”
Hizongleh ka chi ahi, Israelte’n ahe sih va ahiaimah? Amasapeenin Mosi’n, “Nam zong hiloute zangin ka hung thangsesah diing a, heetsiamna neilou namte zangin ka hung sulungthah diing hi,” anachi hi.
Huleh Isai in hangsantahin, “Ahung hawl loute in ahung mu va; ahung kou loute kawmah suhlatin ka umta hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Israelte kawmah chu, “Mithumangloute leh soihahte diingin suun nitum in ka baan ka jaah hi,” chiin asoi hi.
Ahihleh Pathian in a mite paaikheta ahiaimah? Paaikhe lou hial! Ajiahchu kei zong Israelmi, Abraham chihaah, Benjamin phung a mi ka hi.
Pathian in a mi aheetlawhte apaaikhe sih hi. Pathian Lehkhathu in Elijah thu asoi na he sih viaimah? Ama’n Israelte tungthu Pathian kawmah atut a,
“LALPA, na zawlneite athat va, na maitaamte asuchim va, keimah tangin ka um a, kei zong thah ahung tum uhi,” chiin.
Hizongleh Pathian in a dawnna in bangchiin asoi ei? “Baal lim ma a khuupdin ngeilou mi saang sagih keimah diingin ka koih hi,” chiin adawng hi.
Hutobangin tulaiin zong Pathian hehpihna a teel ahih dungjuiin gawtmawh hon khat aum nalai hi.

Huleh hehpihna jiah ahih inchu, natoh jiah ahita sih hi; huchilou inchu hehpihna chu hehpihna ahita sih diing hi. Hizongleh natoh jiah ahih inchu, hehpihna ahita sih diing; huchilou inchu natoh zong natoh ahita sih diing hi.
Ahihleh bang ahita diai? Israelte’n ahawl uh amu sih va; hizongleh teelte’n chu amu uh, adang zousiah chu suhtawtin aumta uhi.
“Pathian in tuni dongin a kawmvah motna hagau apia hi, amuh theihlouhna diing uh mitte leh ajaah theihlouhna diing uh bilte toh,” chih gelh bangin.
Huleh David in, “A dohkaan uh chu amahuh diingin thaang leh pial hung suaah henla, puuhna leh phubalaahna hung suaah heh.
Khua amuh louhna diingun a mitte uh hung mial henla, huleh a kawng uh kuunsah zing in,” achi hi.
Ahihleh ka chi ahi, a puuhna diingun akisui viai? Kisui lou hial! Hizongleh a giitlouhna jiahva Jentelte athangsiat theihna diingun Jentelte kawmah hutdamna ahung tung jawta hi.
Huleh a giitlouhna uh bawn khovel suhhauhsatna ahih a, huleh a lohsapna uh zong Jentelte hauhsatna ahih inchu, a buchinna uh bangchipheta hauhsatna ahita diai mah!
Ajiahchu nanguh Jentelte kawmah ka soi ahi, kei Jentelte apostol ka hih jiahin ka natohna ka paahtawi hi,
bangchijawng ahakhat-a ka chipihte ka thangsiatsah a, a lahva khenkhatte beeh ka hutdam theih khaah leh chiin.
Ajiahchu amahuh paihkhiahna bawn khovel toh Pathian kilepna ahihleh, amahuh pomkiitna chu sihna apat hinna loungaal bang ahi diai?
Ajiahchu a gahmasa asianthouin chu, a lom pumpi zong huchibangmahin asiangthou hi; huleh a zung asianthouin chu, a baate zong huchibangmahin asiangthou hi.
Olive sing tah baa khenkhatte saattanin um henla, huleh nang olive tahlou a lahvah phuhluutin um lehchin, olive zung hauhsatna kikoppihtu na hung hita diing a,
baate tungah kiuangsah sin. Hizongleh kiuangsah zongleh chin a zung chawmtu nangmah na hi sih a, a zung chu nang hung chawmtu ahijaw hi, chih he in.
Ahihleh nang in, “Phuhluut-a ka um theihna diingin baate suhtana um ahi,” na chi ahi diing.
Ahi, agintaatlouh jiahun ahi suhtana aum uh, huleh nang na ginna jiahin na ding ahi. Kiuangsah sinla, hizongleh lau jaw in.
Ajiahchu Pathian in pianpih baa tahte bawn ahawi louh inchu, nang zong ahung hawi tuam sih diing hi.

Hujiahin Pathian hoihdaan leh thukhauhdaan en in: apuuhte tungah chu akhauh a; hizongleh a hoihna a na umzing leh, nang tungah chu ahoih diing hi. Huchi ahihlouh inchu, nang zong saatkhiahin na um ve diing hi.
Huleh amahuh zong gingtaloua aum zing louh un chu, phuhluutin aum diing uhi, ajiahchu Pathian in amahuh aphutluut thei hi.

Ajiahchu nang, pianken a olive tahlou apat saatkhiah bawn pianken loutaha olive sing hoih a phuhluut-a na um leh, hi pianken mawnga baa tahte chu amahuh olive sing ngeei ah bangchituha phuhluut seemin aumta diviai?
Ajiahchu unaute, na kipilsah louhna diingun hi thukiphual, Jentelte bukimna ahung tun tokaalin Israelte tungah lungngonna hunkhop chiang ahung tung tadih ahi, chih na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi.
Huchiin Israel zousiah hutdamin aum diing uhi, “Zion apatin Hundampa ahung diing a, Jakob apatin Pathian ngaihsahlouhna asumang diing hi.
Ajiahchu a sualnate uh ka laahmang tahchianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi,” chih gelh bangin.
Tanchinpha lam ngaihtuahin chu nanguh jiahin meelma ahi uhi, hizongleh teel thu lam ngaihtuahin chu pulepate jiahin deihtahte ahi uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian silthawnpiaahte leh a kouhna chu henlamdang theihlouh ahi.
Ajiahchu nang un nidanglaia Pathian thu na manlouh bang va, hizongleh tua amahuh thumanlouhna jiaha khotuahna na muh bangun,
hutobangmahin tuin amah un agingta sih uh, huchia nang un khotuahna na muhta jiahva amah un zong khotuahna amuh theihna diingun.
Ajiahchu Pathian in akhotuah veh theihna diingin, amahuh zousiah chu thumanlouhna nuaiah akhum vehta hi.
Aw, Pathian pilna leh heetna thuuh hina lawmlawm e! A lemguatnate hawl guallouh leh a lampite muh guallouh hina meijeen e!
“Ajiahchu LALPA lungsim koi in ahiai he? Ahihlouhleh kua ahiai Amah lemguatpihtu a pang ngei?”
“Ahihlouhleh aditkiit diinga zong koi in ahiai Amah kawma sil pe masa phot?”
Ajiahchu Amah akipan leh Amah jaalin leh Amah diinga sil zousiah um ahi. Amah kawmah kumtuangin loupina um hen. Amen.
Hujiahin unaute, na sapum uh kithoihna hing leh siangthou leh pomtaah hi diinga Pathian kawma kilaan diingin Pathian khotuahna jiahin ka hung ngeen hi, huchu na natoh diingva kilawm him ahi.
Huleh hi khovel daan bangin um sih unla, himahleh Pathian deihjawng hoih leh pomtaah leh hoihbukim bang ahiai chih na heetchian theihna diingun na lungsim uh a thaha umin hung limdang jawta un.

Ajiahchu ka kawma hung kipia hehpihna jaalin ka soi ahi, na lahva mi koimah in akingaihsang diing huntawh vaalin kingaisang sih hen, hizongleh Pathian in mi chin kawma ginna apiaah hun bang jeela dihtaha ngaihtuah jaw diingin ka chi ahi.
Ajiahchu sapum khat ah hiang tampi i nei va, hizongleh hiang zousiah natoh akibang veh sih hi.
Huchiin eihaw tampi hizonglehhang, Khrist ah sapum khat i hi va, khat leh khat i kihiangtuah chiat uhi.
I kawma Pathian hehpihna hung kipia dungjuiin silpiaah tuamtuam i nei chiat va, hute i zang diing uhi: thusoilawhna ahihleh, i ginna uh toh kihunin i soi diing uhi;
natohsahna ahihleh, i tong diing uh; thuhilhtu in zong hilh jeel heh.
Hasot theihna tangtu in zong hasot jeel henla, silpetu in zong iit het louin pia heh. Makaitu in taimatahin ma kai henla, mi khotuahtu in kipaahtahin khotuah heh.
Lungsiatna chu heem bawlna tellouin hi heh. Gilou photmah hua unla, ahoih lam photmah tu tinten un.
Unau kilungsiatna in khat leh khat kilainat tuah chiat un. Kizahbawlna lamah khat leh khat kideihsah tuah chiat un.
Taimaatna lamah thase sih unla, hagau lamah chihtahtah suahin Lalpa nna tong un;
kinepna a kipaah zingin, gimthuaahna a hahkatin, haamteina a kuhkal zingin;
misiangthoute taahsapna panpih unla, mikhualte kipaahpih zing un.
Ahung suduhdahte vangpiaah un; vangpiaah unla huleh haamsiat sih un.
Kipaahte kipaahpih unla, huleh kapte kahpih un.
Khat leh khat ngaihtuah kibangin um un. Kiliansah sih unla, hu saangin mikingaingiamte toh kilawi jaw un. Nangmah ngaih in kipilsah sin.
Koimah giitlouhna giitlouh in thuh sih un. Mi zousiah mitmuh ah sil kilawm bawl diing tum un.
Ahihtheih inchu, na hihtheih laisiah uh mi zousiah toh kituaahin um un.
Unau deihtahte, phuba kila sih un, hizongleh lungthahna chu Pathian ot jaw un; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Phubalaah chu kei a ahi, keima’n ka thuh diing hi,” Lalpa’n achi hi chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin, “Na meelma agilkial leh, neeh diing pia in; adangtaah leh, dawn diing pia in. Ajiahchu huchibanga na bawl leh, a lutung ah meiaam na sekhawm ahi diing hi.”
Giitlouhna kizousah sih unla, hoihna in gilou zou jaw un.
Mi chin a tunga vaihawmtute nuaiah kituluut heh. Ajiahchu Pathian thu louin koimah vaihawm aum sih hi. Vaihawmtu a umte chu Pathian guat ahi uhi.
Hujiahin koipouh vaihawmtu nial chu Pathian silguat doudaal ahi a, huleh adoudaaltute’n amahuh tung mah ah siamlouhtansahna amu diing uhi.

Vaihawmtute chu sil hoih bawlte diingin lauhuai ahi sih va, hizongleh mi giloute diingin lauhuai ahi uhi. Vaihawmtu lau loua um na uut ei? Sil hoih bawl in, huchiin vaihawmtu paahtaat na loh diing hi.

Ajiahchu vaihawmtu chu na hoihna diinga Pathian natongtu ahi. Hizongleh silgilou na bawl inchu, lau in; ajiahchu ama’n naamsau ajiah beiin atawi sih hi; ajiahchu amah Pathian natongtu ahi a, silgilou bawlte tunga lungthahna phubalatu ahi.
Hujiahin lungthahna lau jiah chauh hilouin, na sialepha heetna jiahin zong vaihawmtu nuaia na kituhluut diing mawng ahi.
Ajiahchu hikhu jiahin siah zong na pia uh ahi, ajiahchu amahuh chu hi sil ngeei bawl diinga Pathian natongtu mah ahi uhi.

Hujiahin a kawmvah atan diing lawm zousiah uh pia un: siah piaahna diingpa kawmah siah pia un; leiman tawina diingpa kawmah leiman tawi un; lau diingpa chu lau unla; zahbawl diinga umpa chu zahbawl un.
Kilungsiat tuahna loungaal chu koimah bangmah ba sih un, ajiahchu amah midang lungsiatpa in daan ajuikim veh ahi.

Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh hi thupiaahte, “Aang na kawm louh diing ahi, Tual na thah louh diing ahi, Na guuh louh diing ahi, Heetpihtu dihloua na pan louh diing ahi, Na een louh diing ahi,” chih haw leh hulou thupiaah dang mawngmawng aum leh, hute chu, “Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi,” chih in akhaikhawm veh hi.
Lungsiatna in a innveengte abawlse sih hi; hujiahin lungsiatna chu daan zuihkimna ahi.
Hun umdaan hein hite bawl un, ihmu khanloh ahun mahmahta hi; ajiahchu i gintaat chiillai saangin i hutdamna uh anai jawta hi.
Jaan abei dehdehta a, khua vaah diing ahita hi. Hujiahin mial a silbawlte paaiin vaah gaalthuam in i kithuam diing uhi.
Suun a um bangin dihtahin i um diing uh, thaangtatin leh zukham buaia umlouin, huuh leh kingaihna thaanghuai a umlouin, kihaau leh kithangsiat-a um louin.
Hizongleh Lalpa Jesu Khrist in kithuam unla, huleh tahsa uutna supiching diingin bangmah kibawl sih un.
Ginna a haatlou mi chu, a ginlahnate soiseel louin pomdaan siam un.
Mi khat in bangkim ne theiin akigingta a, hizongleh mi haatlou in chu anteh louhing chauh ane hi.
Anete’n aneloute simmoh sih henla, aneloute’n zong anete soiseel sih hen; ajiahchu Pathian in amah apomta hi.
Midang khat suaah soiseeltu nang koi na hiai? A pu a diingin ading ahihlouhleh apuuh ahi. Ahi, amah chu dinsahin aum diing hi, ajiahchu Pathian in amah adingsah thei hi.
Mi khat in ni khat chu ni dang saangin angai poimoh tuam a; midang in ni zousiah kibang chiatin angai hi. Mi chin in amahuh lungsim chiat ah chiangtahin kiheet uh heh.

Ni tangtu in Lalpa a diingin atang a, huleh ni tangloutu in Lalpa a diingin atang lou ahi. Anetu in Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soiin Lalpa a diingin ane a, huleh ane loutu in zong Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soiin Lalpa a diinga ne lou ahi.
Ajiahchu koimah amah a diinga hing ahi sih a, huleh koimah amah a diinga si zong ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu i hin leh, Lalpa a diingin i hing a; huleh i sih leh, Lalpa a diingin i si uh ahi. Hujiahin i hin in zong, i sih in zong, Lalpa a i hi uhi.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh misite leh mihingte Lalpa ahih theihna diingin Khrist chu asi a, athoukiit a huleh suhhingin aum ahi.
Hizongleh nang bang diinga na unau soiseel na hiai? Ahihlouhleh nang bang diinga na unau simmoh na hiai? Ajiahchu i bawnva Khrist vaihawmna touphah ma a ding diing i hi uhi.
Ajiahchu, “Keimah ka hin jiahin, khuup chinteng ka ma ah akhuupdin diing va, lei chinteng zong Pathian kawmah akiphuang diing uh, LALPA’N achi hi,” chih gelh ahi.
Huchiin i bawnun Pathian kawmah eimah tanchin chiat i soi diing uhi.
Hujiahin khat leh khat i kisoiseel nawn sih diing uh, hizongleh koipouh in a unau kisuihna diing aha, ahihlouhleh kipuuhna diing bangmah abawl louhna diing ngaihtuah tinten jaw hen.
Sil amah a sianglou mawngmawng aum sih chih, Lalpa Jesu ah ka hechian a, ka muang mahmah hi; hizongleh sil khat siangloua ngaitu diingin, huchu amah diingin sianglou ahi.
Na sil neeh jiaha na unau lungsim anat inchu, lungsiatna daan in na gamtalou ahi. A luanga Khrist si zouta mi khat chu na sil neeh in sumang sin.
Hujiahin na hoihna uh mi’n gilou a asoisiat diingin umsah sih un;
ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu neeh leh dawn thu ahi sih a, himahleh dihtatna, hamuanna leh Hagau Siangthou a kipaahna bang ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu koipouh hi silte a Khrist natong chu Pathian pomtaah leh mihing pomin aum veu uhi.
Hujiahin kilepna diing leh khat leh khat khantouhna diing silte i delh diing uhi.
An jiahin Pathian natohna suse sin. Sil zousiah chu asiangthou ngeei a, hizongleh a sil neeh a mi khat puuhna bawl chu amah diingin sual ahi.
Na unau puuhna diing aha ahihlouhleh lunghihmohna diing aha ahihlouhleh suhjawngkhaalna diing aha ahih inchu, sa neehlouh leh uain dawn louh leh sil bangmah bawllouh ahoih hi.
Ginna na nei ei? Pathian ma ah nangmah chauhin kineih in. Amah hoihsah lama amah leh amah siamlouh kitangsahlou mi chu ahampha hi.
Hizongleh gingleltu in aneeh inchu, ginna a aneeh louh jiahin siamlouhtangin aum hi; ajiahchu ginna loua bawl photmah chu sual ahi.
Huchiin ei a haatte’n eimah chauh nopsahna diing hawllouin, a haatloute haatlouhna i thuaahpih diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu mi chin in i innveengte a khantouhna diingun, a hoihna diingun i sulungkim diing uhi.
Ajiahchu, “Nang hung housete housiatna chu ka tungah atuta hi,” chia gelh bangin Khrist in zong Amah nopsahna diing angaihtuah sih hi.
Ajiahchu malai a anakigial photmah chu, Pathian Lehkhathu a kuhkalna leh hamuanna tungtawna eite’n kinepna i neih theihna diinga eiuh kihilhna diinga gelh ahi.
Huchiin thuaahtheihna leh hamuanna Pathian in Khrist Jesu mahbangin khat leh khat lungsim kibang neiin hung umsah hen,
huchia Pathian, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa ngeei chu lungsim munkhat pua leh aw khat suaha na paahtawi theihna diingun.
Hujiahin Khrist in zong Pathian loupina diinga ahung kipaahpih mahbangin khat leh khat kipaahta chiat un.
Tuin huchu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, pulepate kawma thuchiamte sukip diingin Khrist Jesu chu Pathian thudih heetsahna diingin zehtante suaah ahung hita hi,
huchia khotuahna jiaha Jentelte’n Pathian apaahtawi theihna diingun, “Hikhu jiahin Jentelte lahah na min ka hung paahtawi diing a, na min phatin la ka sa diing hi,” chih gelh bangin.
Huleh ama’n, “Nanguh Jentelte, a mite toh kipaah un,” achi kiit hi.
Huleh, “Nanguh Jentelte zousiah, LALPA chu phat un, huleh mi zousiah in zong Amah phat un,” achi kiit hi
Huleh Isai in, “Jesse Zungpi aum diing a, huleh Amah chu Jentelte tunga vaihawm diingpa ahi a, Jentelte’n Amah ah kinepna anei diing uhi” chiin asoi kiit hi.
Hagau Siangthou silbawltheihna jiaha kinepna na hauh theihna diingun kinepna Pathian in ginna a kipaahna leh hamuanna chinteng in hung sudim hen.
Ka unaute, nanguh chu hoihna in na dim va, heetna in na dim va, khat leh khat na kihasuantuah thei uh chih keimah mah in zong ka muang hi.
Ahihvaangin, unaute, Pathian in ahung piaah hehpihna jiahin nanguh hung heetdohsahna diingin hangsantahin sil khenkhat tungtaang ka gial ahi,
Jentelte kawma Jesu Khrist thunatongtu ka hihtheihna diingin Pathian tanchinpha nna ka tong hi, huchia Hagau Siangthou a suhsiangthou Jentelte sillatte chu pomtaah ahih theihna diingin.
Hujiahin Pathian lam silte ah Jesu Khrist ah kiletsahna diing ka nei ahi.
Khrist in Jentelte thuawisahna diinga thusoi leh natoh a keimah tungtawna abawlte loungaal bangmah ka soi ngam sih hi,
chiamchihna leh sil loupite in, Pathian Hagau silbawltheihna in, huchiin Jerusalem khua leh a kiimveel gam apat Illyrikum gam tanpha in Khrist tanchinpha kimtahin ka soi zouta hi.
Huchiin midang innbul phuhsa tunga inn bawl ka hihlouhna diingin, Khrist min kiloh nailouhna mun a tanchinpha soi chu ka siltup ahi,
hizongleh, “A tanchin kisoi ngei louhnate’n amu diing va, huleh aja ngei nailoute’n ahung hesiam diing uh,” chia gelh bangin.
Hikhu jiahin na kawmva hung diing tampivei daalin ka umta hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu hi gam kiimveel ah mun ka neita sih a, huleh kum tampi na kawmva hung nuamin zong ka umta a,

Spain gam a ka chiah hunhun chiangin, na kawmvah ka hung diing hi. Ajiahchu ka hung zin chiangin nanguh toh kithuahkhawm theihna hun tomkhat ka neihtheih masat leh, nanguh hung muh ka kineem a, huleh ka zinna lampi ah na hung panpih uh ka kineem hi.
