Hizongleh tuin chu misiangthoute natohsah diingin Jerusalem a chiah phot diing ka hi.
Ajiahchu Makedonia leh Akaia gam a mite’n Jerusalem a misiangthoute laha migentheite diingin kipaahtahin thohlawm athohkhawm uhi.
Ahi, lungkimtahin ahih uhi, huleh a leiba uh zong ahi mawng uhi. Ajiahchu Jentelte’n a hagaulam silte uh akikoppih ngaal un chu, tahsa lam silte a amahuh apanpihve uh chu ahih diing mawng uh ahi.
Hujiahin, hi ka bawl zoh a, hi gah zong chiantaha ka muhsah zoh chiangin nanguh hung tawnin Spain gam ah ka chiah diing hi.
Huleh na kawmva ka hung chiangin Khrist tanchinpha vangpiaahna kim toh ka hung diing chih ka he hi.
Unaute, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist min leh Hagau lungsiatna jaala Pathian kawma na hung haamteisahna vah chihtahzet hung suahpih diingin ka hung ngeen hi,
huchia Judia gam a gingloute laha ka suaahtaat theihna diing leh Jerusalem khua a diinga ka natohna hi misiangthoute diinga pomtaah ahih theihna diingin,
huchia Pathian deihjawng banga, kipaahtaha na kawmva ka hung a, i kisuhhalh khawm chiat theihna diingun.
Tuin hamuanna Pathian na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Kenkria a kouhtuam natongtu i sanggamnu uh Phibi na kawmvah meellaahna ka hung bawl hi,
Lalpa min a misiangthoute banga nana pom va, na panpih uh angaihna photmah a na panpih diingun; ajiahchu ama’n zong mi tampi anapanpihta a, keimah ngeei zong ahung panpihta hi.
Khrist Jesu a ka natoh khawmpih Prisilla leh Akuila chibai hung buuhsah un.
Amah un ka hinna a diingin a ngawng uh adohta uhi, amahuh kawma kei chauh in kipaah thu ka soi hilouin, Jentel kouhtuam zousiah zong a tungvah akipaah uhi.
Huchibangmahin a inn va kouhtuam kikhawmte zong chibai hung buuhsah un. Akaia gam a Khrist a gah masapeen ka deihtah Epaineta chibai hung buuhsah un.
Eiuh diinga tonggim Mari chibai hung buuhsah un.
Ka chipihte leh ka koltaanpih, apostol laha minthang tah, Khrist a zong kei saanga um masajaw Andronika leh Junia chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a ka deihtah Amplia chibai hung buuhsah un.
Khrist a i natohpih Urbana leh ka deihtah Staki chibai hung buuhsah un.
Khrist a pom Apelle chibai hung buuhsah un. Aristobulu innkuan a mite chibai hung buuhsah un.
Ka chipih Herodion chibai hung buuhsah un. Lalpa a um Narkissa innkuan a mite chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a natong, Triphaina leh Triphosa chibai hung buuhsah un. Lalpa a nna hahtoh mahmah, deihtah Persi chibai hung buuhsah un.
Lalpa a teel Rufa, leh a nu huleh kei nu zong hive, chibai hung buuhsah un.
Asunkrita, Phlegon, Herma, Patroba, Hermi leh a kawmva um unaute chibai hung buuhsah un.
Philologa leh Julia, Neria leh a sanggamnu, huleh Olimpa leh a kawmva misiangthou umte zousiah chibai hung buuhsah un.
Tawp siangthou in chibai kibuuh tuah un. Khrist kouhtuam zousiahte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Tuin ka unaute, kihilhna daan nanguh hung kihilh louh jawnga kikhenna leh puuhna siamdohtute chiamchih diing leh kiheisan diingin ka hung ngeen hi.
Ajiahchu hutobang mite’n i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist nna atong sih uh, hizongleh amahuh gilpi nna atong jaw uhi, huleh dangnaal jiah leh maaitangphat kamsiamna in heetna tawmte lungsim aheem uhi.
Na thuman daan uh mi zousiah lahah akithangta hi. Hujiahin na tungvah ka kipaah hi; hizongleh sil hoih lama na pil va, huleh silgilou lama na mawl uh ka deih hi.
Huleh hamuanna Pathian in Setan chu tomkaallouin na keeng nuaivah ahung tuandeensah diing hi. I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na tungvah um hen. Amen.
Ka natohpih Timothi leh ka chipihte Lukia, Jason leh Sosipater in chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Keimah Tartia, hi lehkhathot gialpa’n Lalpa min in chibai ka hung buuh hi.
Gaia, kei leh kouhtuam zousiah zintunnapa in chibai ahung buuh hi. Khopi sung sumkoltu Erasta leh unaupa Kuarta in chibai ahung buuh uhi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva tungah um hen. Amen.
Tuin, ka tanchinpha leh Jesu Khrist thu taangkoupihna dungjuia, khovel siam chiil apat phuala um,

hizongleh tua suhlat hita, ginna lama thumanna diinga zawlneite Pathian Lehkhathu jaala nam zousiah kawma heetsaha um, hu thukiphual kiphuandohna dungjuia, huleh kumtuang Pathian thupiaah dungjuia nang hung tungding thei,
Amah chauh apil Pathian kawmah Jesu Khrist jaalin kumtuangin loupina um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihdaan a Jesu Khrist apostol diinga kouh leh i unaupa uh Sosthene in,
Korinth khua a Pathian kouhtuam umte, Khrist Jesu a suhsiangthou diinga kouhte kawm leh mun china i Lalpa Jesu Khrist min lou amahuh leh eite zousiah kawmah:
I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Na tungva Jesu Khrist a Pathian hehpihna hung kipia jiahin ka Pathian tungah ka kipaah zingzing hi;
huchiin silbangkim ah, thusoina chinteng leh heetna chinteng ah Amah ah suhhauhsatin na umta uhi,
huchia Khrist thu heetpihna nanguh a suhkipa aumtaah bangin,
huchiin silpiaah ah tasam louin, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hung kilaahna diing ngaahlahtahin nana ngaah uhi,
Ama’n i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ni chianga soiseelbeia na um theihna diingun a tawp dongin zong ahung sukip diing hi.
Pathian chu a ginum hi, Ama’n a Tapa i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist toh kipawlkhawmna ah nanguh ahung kou luutta hi.

Tuin unaute, na bawnva thukhat a na um va huleh na lahvah kikhenna aum louh a, hizongleh lungsim kibang leh ngaihdaan kibanga soiseelbeia na kizop jawhna diingun i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in ka hung ngeen hi.
Ajiahchu ka unaute, na lahvah kihauna aum chih na tungtaang thu uh Kleo innkuanpihte’n ahung hilh uhi.
Tuin hikhu ka soi hi, nanguh mi chin in, “Kei Paul lawi ka hi,” huleh “Kei Apollo lawi ka hi,” “Kei Kepha lawi ka hi,” “Kei Khrist lawi ka hi,” na chi uhi.
Khrist hawmkhenin aum eimah? Paul nanguh diingin kilhbehin aum eimah? Ahihlouhleh Paul min in baptisma na tang viaimah?
Krispa leh Gaia chihlouh na lahva khat beeh ka hung baptis louh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Huchilou inchu khenkhat in keimah min a baptisma tang na kichi kha diing uhi.
Huleh Stephana innkuante zong ka baptis a, hute chihlouh midang ka baptis lam ka he sih hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist in baptis diingin ahung sawl sih a, hizongleh tanchinpha soi diingin ahung sawl jaw hi; pilna thu a soi louin, huchilou inchu Khrist kros bangmalou asuaah kha diing hi.
Ajiahchu kros thu chu mangthaaite diingin ngolhuai ahi a, hizongleh eiuh hutdama umte diingin chu Pathian silbawltheihna ahi.
Ajiahchu, “Mipil pilna ka suse diing a, huleh lemhetu lemheetna ka koihmang diing hi,” chih gelh ahi.
Mipil khoiah aum ei? Daanjilsahtu khoiah aum ei? Hi khang a nialhaatmi khoiah aum ei? Pathian in hi khovel pilna ngolhuai asuaahsah sih eimah?
Ajiahchu Pathian pilna ah, khovel in pilna tungtawna Pathian aheet louh nungun, thu kisoi ngolhuai tungtawna agingtate hutdam diing chu Pathian kipaahpih ahita hi.
Ajiahchu Judate’n chiamchihna angeen va, Grikte’n pilna ahawl uh;
hizongleh kei un chu Khrist kilhbeha um thu ka soi uhi, huchu Judate diingin puuhna, huleh Grikte diingin ngolna ahi;
hizongleh Judate hiin Grikte hitazongleh, kouhte diingin Khrist chu Pathian silbawltheihna leh Pathian pilna ahi.
Ajiahchu Pathian ngolna mihing saangin apiljaw a, huleh Pathian haatlouhna zong mihing saangin ahaatjaw hi.
Ajiahchu unaute, kouh na hihna uh ngaihtuah dihvua. Tahsa lama mipil tampite, mihaat tampite, milian tampite kouh ahihlouh daan uh.
Hizongleh Pathian in mipilte azahtaatsahna diingin khovel sil ngolhuaite ateel jawta a, huleh sil haatte azahtaatsahna diingin khovel sil haatloute ateel jawta hi;
huleh khovel sil ngiamte leh sil muhsithuaite Pathian in ateel a, huleh sil umlou tanin ateel hi, sil umte bangmalou asuaahsah theihna diingin,
huchia Pathian ma a koimah akiuahsah theihlouhna diingin.
Hizongleh nanguh chu Amah vaangin Khrist Jesu ah na um uhi, Jesu chu Pathian apat eiuh diingin pilna, dihtatna, suhsiangthouna leh tatdohna ahung hita hi.
Huchia, “Akisuang phot chu LALPA ah kisuang heh” chia kigial bangin.
Huleh unaute, kei chu na kawmva Pathian thu heetpihna phuanga ka hung laiin, thusoi siamna sangtah leh pilna toh hung ka hi sih hi.
Ajiahchu ke’n Jesu Khrist leh Amah kilhbeha um thu chauh lou chu na lahvah bangma dang heet ka tum sih hi.
Huleh kei chu haatlou leh lauin, nasataha kithing kawmin na lahvah ka um hi.
Ka kamsuahte leh ka thusoite chu mihing pilna a jawlsiamna thu ahi sih a, hizongleh Hagau leh silbawltheihna suhlatna in ahijaw,
huchia na ginna uh mihing pilna a kinga lou a, Pathian silbawltheihna a akingah jawhna diingin.
Ahiinlah pichingte lahah chu pilna thu zong ka soi jeel uhi, ahihvaangin hi khang pilna thu ahi sih a, hi khang vaihawmtu hung mangthaai diingte pilna thu zong ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh kei un chu Pathian pilna thukiphual, Pathian in khovel um ma a i loupina diingva anaguatlawhsa pilna kiphualgu thu ka soi jaw uhi.
Huchu hi khang vaihawmtute khatbeeh in ahe sih uhi; ajiahchu anahe hita uh leh, loupina Lalpa chu anakilhbeh sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh, “Mit a muh ngeilouh, bil a jaah ngeilouh, huleh mihing lungtang a zong luut ngeilou, Pathian in Amah lungsiatte diinga abawlsah silte chu,” chia gelh bangin.
Hizongleh Pathian in hute chu a Hagau in i kawmah ahung hesahta hi. Ajiahchu Hagau in sil bangkim ahawldoh a, ahi, Pathian sil thuuhtahte zong.
Ajiahchu mihing silte chu mihing a um hagau loungaal koi ahiai he diing? Huchibangmahin Pathian silte zong Pathian Hagau loungaal koimah in ahe sih hi.
Huchiin Pathian in athawna ahung piaah silte i heettheihna diingun ei un chu khovel hagau hilouin, hizongleh Pathian a kuan Hagau chu i tang uh ahi.
Hi silte chu mihing pilna a soi louin, hizongleh Hagau Siangthou thuhilhna in hagaulam silte chu hagaulam thute a hilhchian in ka soi jaw uhi.
Hizongleh tahsa mi in chu Pathian Hagau silte apom thei sih hi, ajiahchu amah ngaihin hute chu ngolhuai ahi; hite chu hagau a heet ahih jiahin he zong ahe thei sih hi.
Hizongleh hagau mi in chu sil zousiah ahechian veu a, amah ahihleh koima’n ahechian sih hi.
Ajiahchu “Amah thuhilh thei diinga LALPA lungsim koi in ahiai he?” Hizongleh ei un chu Khrist lungsim i pua uhi.
Huleh unaute, hagau mite kawma soi bangin na kawmvah thu ka soi thei sih a, hizongleh tahsa mite kawma soi bangin, Khrist a naungeehte kawma soi bangin ka soi ahi.
An gum hilouin nawitui in ka hung vaah hi; ajiahchu na ne thei nai sih va, huleh tutanin zong na ne thei nai sih uhi;
ajiahchu nanguh na tahsami nalai uhi. Na lahva kithangsiatna, kinialna leh kipawlkhenna aum jiahin, tahsami hi nalai leh mihing meimei banga khosa nalai hilou na hi uh maw?
Ajiahchu khat in, “Kei Paul lawi ka hi,” huleh adang in, “Kei Apollo lawi ka hi,” na chih laisiah uh tahsami hilou na hi viaimah?
Ahihleh Paul koi ahiai, huleh Apollo koi ahiai? Hizongleh Lalpa’n apiaah bangjeela amahuh tungtawna na gintaat uh thunatongtute hilou ahi viaimah?
Keima’n ka suan a, Apollo in tui abuaah a, hizongleh Pathian in akhangsah hi.
Huchiin asuantu zong bangmah ahi sih a, tui buaahtu zong bangmah ahi sih, akhangsahtu Pathian chauh loungaal chu.
Huleh asuantu leh tui buaahtu chu akibang ahi va, mi chin in atohgim bang jeelun kipaahman akimuh chiat diing uhi.
Ajiahchu keiuh chu Pathian natohkhawmpihte ka hi uh; nanguh chu Pathian louma na hi va, Pathian inn na hi uhi.

Pathian hehpihna kei hung kipia dungjuiin, innlamtu siamtah bangin ke’n innbulphuh chu ka lemta a, midang in a tungah inn alam uhi. Hizongleh mi chin hu a tunga a innlam daan vah pilvaang chiat uh heh.
Ajiahchu innbulphuh lepsa loungaal innbulphuh dang kuama’n alem thei nawn sih hi, hu innbulphuh chu Jesu Khrist ahi.
Tuin hi innbulphuh tungah mi koipouh in sana in, dangka in, suangmantam in, sing in, hampa in, buhpawl in lamta leh,
mi chin natoh chu ahung kisulang diing hi; ajiahchu mei a suhlat hi diing ahih jiahin a Ni in aphuangdoh diing hi; huleh mei in mi chin natoh chu bangchi bang ahiai chih asuchian diing hi.
Innbulphuh tunga koi natoh zong aum zing leh, amah in kipaahman amu diing hi.
Koi natoh zong akaah inchu, manna athuaah diing hi; hizongleh amah tah chu hutdamin aum diing a, ahihvaangin mei a paisuaah bang ahi diing hi.
Pathian inn na hi va, huleh na sungvah Pathian Hagau ateeng chih helou na hi viaimah?
Mi koipouhin Pathian inn asuhbolhhoh inchu, Pathian in amah asuse diing hi. Ajiahchu Pathian inn chu asiangthou a, hu inn chu nanguh na hi uhi.
Mi koimah amah leh amah kiheem sih heh. Na lahva mi koiaha hi khang a pil akisah leh, ahung pil theihna diingin mingol hung suaah heh.
Ajiahchu hi khovel pilna chu Pathian ngaihin ngolna ahi. Ajiahchu, “Amah in mipilte a pil lepchiahna vah aman hi,” chih gelh ahi.
Huleh hubaan ah, “LALPA’N mipil ngaihtuahnate ahe a, hute chu bangmalou ahi,” chia gelh bangin.
Hujiahin mi koimah mihing ah kisuang sih heh. Ajiahchu sil zousiah nanguh a ahi:
Paul hiin Apollo hiin Kepha hizongleh, ahihlouhleh khovel hiin hinna hiin sihna hizongleh, sil um nalaite hiin sil hung um diingte leh sil zousiah chu nanguh a ahi.
Huleh nanguh chu Khrist a na hi va, huleh Khrist chu Pathian a ahi.
Huchiin mi’n keiuh chu Khrist suaahte leh Pathian thukiphual enkoltute bangin hung he uh heh.
Hubaan ah, hitah a enkoltute chu mi ginum ahih uh apoimoh hi.
Hizongleh nang un na hung etkhiah uh aha ahihlouhleh mihing thukhenna a na hung etkhiah uh chu kei diingin sil neutakhat ahi. Adihtahin kei leh kei zong ka kienkhe sih hi.
Ajiahchu keimah ah ahung awimohtu bangmah umin ka he sih hi, ahiinlah huin siam ahung tangsah ahi tuan sih; hizongleh ahung enkhetu chu Lalpa ahi hi.

Hujiahin a hun main Lalpa hung masiahin bangmah enkhe sih un. Ama’n chu mial a sil kiphualte vaah ah ahung podoh diing a, huleh lungtang a ngaihtuahte zong ahung sulang diing hi. Hu hun chiangin mi chin in paahtawina chu Pathian apat atang chiat diing uhi.

Unaute, tuin hi silte chu nang un akigialta khu kheellam bangma na ngaihtuah louh diing uh chih keiuh apat na jil theihna diing uh leh huchia nanguh koimah in khat na kiuahsahpih va, khat na kalh louhna diingun, na phattuamna diingun keimah leh Apollo tungah etsahna thu in ka kizang ahi.
Ajiahchu kuan ahiai nang midang apat hung tuamsah? Huleh na muh louh bang ahiai na neih? Tuin amuta ngeei na hih leh, bang diinga mulou banga kisathei na hiai?
Tuin na kichingta uh! Na hung hausata uhi! Keiuh louin kumpipate na hung hita uh, huleh huchia keiuh zong nanguh toh ka lal theihna diingun, adihtahin kumpipate na hih uh ka deih hi!
Ajiahchu Pathian in keiuh apostolte chu si diinga guatsa bangin anunungpeen a hung koih hiin ka ngaihtuah hi. Ajiahchu khovel mitmuhin, angelte leh mihingte mitmuhin etnop a et ka hung hita uhi.

Keiuh chu Khrist a diinga mingol ka hi va, hizongleh nanguh chu Khrist ah mipil na hi uhi! Keiuh chu ka haat sih va, hizongleh nanguh chu na haat uhi! Nanguh chu na zahum va, hizongleh keiuh chu simmohin ka um uhi!
Tu daahkaal dongin ka gilkialun ka dangtaah va, silhleteen tasamin ka um va, mite vuaahthop leh teenna mumal beiin ka um uhi.
Huleh ka khut un nna ka tong uhi. Housiata ka um un ka vangpiaah va, suhduhdaha ka um un ka thuaah teeiteei uhi.
Soisiat-a ka um un neemtahin ka dawng uhi. Tutanin khovel niinnoh, sil zousiah bolhhoh bang ka hung hita uhi.
Na zahtaatna diingun hi thute ka gial ahi sih a, hizongleh ka ta deihtahte bangin ka hung taaihilh ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu nang un Khrist ah hilhtu saang sawm nei zongleh uh chin, pa chu tampi na nei sih uhi; ajiahchu tanchinpha jaalin Khrist Jesu ah nanguh ka hung hingkhia hi.
Huchihjiahin ka umdaan juitute hi diingin ka hung hasot hi.
Hikhu diing jiahin Lalpa a ka ta deihtah leh ginum Timothi na kawmvah ka hung sawl hi. Ama’n chu gam chin a kouhtuam zousiah ka thuhilh bangin, Khrist a ka umdaan nanguh ahung hesah kiit diing hi.
Na kawmva hung nawnlou diing banga hung na ngaihtuahin na lahvah khenkhat anakiuangsah uhi.
Hizongleh Lalpa’n lem achih leh, na kawmvah ka hung baih diing a, huchiin kiuangsahte chu a thusoi uh hilouin a silbawltheihna uh ka heta diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu thu ah aum sih a, silbawltheihna ah aum jaw hi.
Bang ahiai na deih uh? Na kawmvah chiang tawiin ka hung diai, ahihlouhleh lungsiatna leh lungneemna hagau toh ka hung diai?
Na lahvah kingaihna thaanghuai aum chih athang vengvung a, huchibang kingaihna thaanghuai Jentelte lahah zong aum ngei sih, huchu mi khat in a pa ji akiteenpih hi.
Huleh huchibang silbawlpa chu na lah vapat nohdoh diinga lungngaih naahsaangin na kiuahsahpih jaw uhi.
Ajiahchu keimah tahsa a ka tel louh vaangin hagau in ka tel a, na lahva tel tobangin hutobanga gamtapa chu atung vai ka hawm zouta hi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in, ka hagau toh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna toh na kikhopkhawm chiangun,
huchibang mi chu Lalpa Jesu Ni chianga a hagau hutdama aum theihna diingin, a tahsa suhmangna diingin Setan kawmah pedoh un.
Na kisahtheihna uh ahoih sih hi. Tol themchakhat in tanghou beu a pumin ajeelsuaah veu hi chih na he sih uh maw?
Hujiahin tolsohlouh na hih ngeei bangmah un, tanghou beu thah na hihtheihna diingun, tol lui chu paaimang un. Ajiahchu adihtahin i Chiahkaan uh Khrist chu ei a diingin latin aumta hi.
Hujiahin tol lui toh hilouin, giitlouhna leh suhsiat tupna tol toh zong hilouin, hizongleh chihtahna leh thutahna tolsohlouh tanghou toh kuut chu i nei diing uhi.
Kingaihna thaanghuai a kibualte kithuahpih lou diingin ka lehkhathon ah ka hung gialta hi.

Hi khovel a kingaihna thaanghuai a kibualte toh aha, mihuaihamte toh aha, leepgute toh aha, ahihlouhleh milem bete toh aha kithuah het louh diing ahi chi chu ka hi sih hi, ajiahchu huchi diing hileh khovel apat na chiahdoh uh ngai diing ahi.

Hizongleh tuin chu koipouh unau chih hingaala kingaihna thaanghuai aha, huaiham aha, milem bia aha, soisiat haat aha, zukham haat aha, leepguuh haat aha, huchibang mi chu kithuahpih lou diing leh neeh tanpha ne khawm lou diingin na kawmvah tuin ka hung gialta hi.
Ajiahchu polam mite keimah in ka vaihawm diing bang aum ei? Nang un a sunga umte vaihawm lou na hi viai mah?
Hizongleh polam a mite chu Pathian in avaihawm hi. Hujiahin “na lah vapatin hu migiloupa chu koihdoh un.”
Na lahva koiaha khat in midang tungah thubuai neita leh uh chin, misiangthoute ma a tut louin, daan a heeh diingin midihtatloute ma ah na tut ngam diviaimah?
Misiangthoute’n khovel vaihawm diing ahi uh chih na he sih viaimah? Huleh khovel vaihawm diing na hih uh leh, sil neupeente vaihawm diinga taahlou na hi uh maw?
Angelte tunga vaihawm diing i hi chih na he sih viaimah? Huchi ahih inchu, hi damsung silte giap i vaihawm taahluat diing hilou maw?
Huchi ahihleh hi damsung silte tungtaang a vaihawmna na neih uh leh, kouhtuam a mi zahumlou peente vaihawm diingin na tousah viaimah?
Hichu na zumna diingun ka soi ahi. Na lahvah mipil, a unaute kikaal a vaihawm thei khat beeh umlou ahiaimah?
Himahleh unau in unau daan ah na heeh va, hu zong gingloumite ma ah ahi nalai hi!
Huchi ahih jiahin khat leh khat daan a na kiheehtuah uh chu na guallelhna lianpi uh ahi. Bang diinga amohjaw hi a kikoih meilou na hi viai? Bang diinga dihloutaha bawlna thuaah jaw meilou na hi viai?
Hilou, nanguh mah in na bawl sual va na heem uh, huleh hu zong na unaute uh tungah ahi na bawl uh!
Midihtatloute’n Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uh chih na he sih viaimah? Heemzohin um sih un. Kingaihna thaanghuai a bualte aha, milem bete aha, aangkawmte aha, mihuuhte aha, tohuuhte aha,
gutate aha, eenhaatte aha, zukham haatte aha, misalh haatte aha, huleh leepgute aha in Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uhi.
Huleh na lahva khenkhat huchibang nana hi uhi. Hizongleh nanguh chu silsiang leh suhsiangthou na hita uh, nanguh chu Lalpa Jesu min leh i Pathian uh Hagau a siamtansah na hita uhi.
Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah bawl chu ahoihkim sih hi. Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh bangmah in thuneihna ka tunga aneih ka phal sih hi.

Ante chu gilpi a diing ahi a, huleh gilpi zong an a diing ahi, hizongleh anihun Pathian in asumang diing hi. Huleh sapum chu kingaihna thaanghuai a diing ahi sih a, hizongleh Lalpa a diing ahijaw a, huleh Lalpa chu sapum a diing ahi.
Pathian in Lalpa chu akaithou a, huleh eiuh zong a silbawltheihna in ahung kaithou diing hi.
Na sapum uh Khrist hiangte ahi chih na he sih viaimah? Ahihleh Khrist hiangte chu lain nohchijuaahte hiang in ka bawl diing ahiaimah? Bawllou hial diing!
Ahihleh nohchijuaah toh kizop photmah chu amahnu toh sapum khat ahi uh chih helou na hi viaimah? Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh,” achi hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa toh kizop photmah chu Amah toh hagau a pumkhat ahi uhi.
Kingaihna thaanghuai taaisan un. Mihing sualna zousiah chu sapum polam ahi a, hizongleh kingaihna thaanghuai a sual bawl in chu amah sapum tungah sil abawlsual ahi.
Ahihlouhleh na sapum uh chu Pathian apat na neih uh, Hagau Siangthou inn ahih daan leh na sapum uh nanguh a ahihlouh daan na he sih viaimah?
Ajiahchu man a leisa na hi uhi; hujiahin na sapum uh leh na hagau un Pathian paahtawi un, huchu Pathian a ahi.
Huleh ka kawma na hung sil gelhte uh thu ah: Pasal in numei suhkhaah louh ahoih hi.
Ahihvaangin kingaihna thaanghuai aum jiahin, pasal chin in ji kineih chiat henla, huleh numei chin in zong pasal kineih chiat heh.
Pasal in a ji kawmah a tan diing chu pia heh, huleh huchibangmahin numei in zong a pasal kawmah pia heh.
Ji in amah sapum tungah thu anei sih a, a pasal in anei jaw hi. Huleh huchibangmahin pasal in zong amah sapum tungah thu anei sih a, a ji in anei jaw hi.

An ngawl leh haamteina a na kipumpiaah theihna diingva hun tomkhat a diinga na kilungtuaah uh ahih louhngaal leh, khat in khat tan diing dawl kikhaam sih un; huleh na kisuum zohlouh jiahva Setan in ahung heem louhna diingin hung umkhawm kiit un.
Hizongleh hi thu chu thupiaah banga soi louin, phalsah thuin ka soi jaw ahi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah keimah bang chiat uh leh ka deih hi. Hizongleh mi chin in Pathian apat silpiaah tuam chiat anei uh, khat in hitobangin, adang in hutobangin anei chiat uhi.
Hujiahin kiteeng nailoute leh meithaite kawmah hichiin ka chi hi: Keimah bangin um uh leh amahuh diingin ahoih diing hi.
Ahihvaangin akisuum zohlouh uh leh chu kiteeng uh heh, ajiahchu tahsa uutna a kisuumzohlouh saangin kiteen ahoihjaw hi.
Tuin kiteengsate kawmah thu ka pia hi, kei piaah hilouin Lalpa piaah ahijaw hi: Ji in a pasal paisan sih heh.
Hizongleh apaisan inchu, pasal neilouin umzing jaw heh, ahihlouhleh a pasal toh kilem kiit uh heh. Huleh pasal in a ji khuul sih heh.
Hizongleh adangte kawmah chu, Lalpa’n asoi hilouin, ke’n ka soi hi: Unau koiaha in gingloumi ji a aneih a, amahnu a kawma aum nuam zing leh, khuul sih heh.
Huleh gingloumi pasal a nei in chu a pasal in a kawma um zing auut leh, nuse sih heh.

Ajiahchu ginglou pasal chu a ji jiahin suhsiangthouin aum a, huleh ginglou ji zong a pasal jiahin suhsiangthouin aum hi. Huchi hilou hileh chu na tate uh asiang sih diing uh, hizongleh tuin chu asiangthou uhi.
Hizongleh a ginglou jaw in akhen leh, khen mei heh. Unaupa aha, unaunu aha chu huchibang thu ah kaanin aum sih hi. Hizongleh Pathian in eiuh chu kituaaha um diingin ahung kou hi.
Ajiahchu Aw ji, na pasal na hutdam diing leh diing louh bang na he ei? Ahihlouhleh Aw pasal, na ji na hutdam diing leh diing louh bangchiin na he ei?
Hizongleh Pathian in mi chin kawma ahawmsahtaah bangin, Lalpa’n mi chin akouhtaah bangin, huchiin um heh. Huleh huchibangin keimah in kouhtuam chin ah thu ka pia hi.
Zehtansa a kouh mi aum ei? Zehtanlouh hung hi tuan sih heh. Zehtanlouh a kouh mi aum ei? Zehtan hi tuan sih heh.
Zehtan bangmah ahi sih a, zehtan louh zong bangmah ahi sih hi, hizongleh apoimoh chu Pathian thupiaahte juih khu ahi.
Mi chin kouha aumna mah vah um zing uh heh.
Suaah hihlai a kouh na hiai? Poisa sin; hizongleh suahtaatsah theih na hihin chu, suaahta mei in.
Ajiahchu suaah hihlai a Lalpa a kouh chu Lalpa mi jaleen ahi. Huchibangmahin jaleen hihlai a kouh zong Khrist suaah ahi.
Man a leisa na hi uh; mite suaah hi sih un.
Unaute, mi chin kouha aumna bang chiatin hutah ah Pathian toh umzing uh heh.
Huchiangleh nungaah siangthoute tungtaang ahihleh Lalpa thupiaah bangmah ka nei sih hi. Hizongleh ginum diinga Lalpa hehpihna tang ka hih jiahin, ka ngaihdaan ka soi diing hi.
Huchiin tulai hahsatna jiahin hichu hoih diingin ka ngaihtuah hi, huchu mi aum ngeia aum zing chu ahoih hi, ka chi hi.
Ji a kaan na hiaimah? Kisuutkhiah tum sin. Ji apat kaan nawnlouh na hiaimah? Ji neih tum sin.

Hizongleh ji na neih zongleh sil bawlsual na hi sih; huleh nungaah siangthou in zong pasal nei mahleh sil bawl sual ahi sih hi. Ahihvaangin huchibang mite’n leitung khosahna ah buaina athuaah diing uhi; hizongleh ke’n chu na thuaah louh uh ka deih hi.
Hizongleh unaute, hikhu ka soi ahi, hun atomta hi, huchiin ji neite chu neilou bangin,
huleh kapte kaplou bangin, kipaahte chu kipaahlou bangin, sil leite chu aneilou bangin,
huleh khovel sil zangte chu azang nuamlou bangin um uh heh. Ajiahchu hi khovel umdaan hi abeimang zing hi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu lungkhamna beia na um uh ka hung deihsah hi. Ji neilou in chu Lalpa akipaahsah theihna diingin, Lalpa lam silte angaihsah hi.
Himahleh ji nei in chu a ji akipaahsah theihna diingin khovel silte angaihsah hi.

Pasal nei leh nungaah siangthou zong akibang sih hi. Pasal neilou in chu tahsa leh hagau a siangthoutaha aum theihna diingin Lalpa lam silte angaihsah hi. Hizongleh pasal nei in chu a pasal akipaahsah theihna diingin khovel lam silte angaihsah hi.

Huleh hite chu na hoihna diingva ka soi ahi. Nanguh deihjawng khap tuma ka soi ahi sih a, himahleh umdaan kilawm hun a na um theihna diing uh leh Lalpa nna buailoua na toh theihna diingva ka soi ahijaw hi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in a ta nungaah siangthou akuul donga aleensah a, a tunga dihlou kisa a, a pasal neih diing khawh asah leh, hoih asah bangin bawl heh. Abawl sual sih; pasal neisah mei heh.
Ahihvaangin lungsim dettah pua a, phamohsahna neilou a, amah lungsim uutna kithunun zou a, a ta nungaah siangthou kepzing a lungtang a tumpa in chu abawl hoih hi.
Huchiin a ta nungaah siangthou pasal neisahpa in abawl hoih a, hizongleh pasal neisahloupa in abawl hoihjaw hi.
Ji chu a pasal adamsung siah daan thu a kaan ahi. Hizongleh a pasal asih inchu, Lalpa a um mi chauh, adeih photmah akiteenpih thei hi.
Hizongleh kei ngaihtuah daanin chu aum ngeiin um leh nuam asajaw diing hi; huleh keimah in Pathian Hagau neiin zong ka kingaihtuah hi.
Huleh milemte biahna kithoihna sil latte tungtaang ahihleh koipouh in heetna i nei chiat uh chih i he uhi: Heetna in mi achapousah a, himahleh lungsiatna in mi asiamhoih hi.
Mi koiaha in bangkim he a akingaihtuah inchu, aheet diing bangin ahe nailou ahi.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in Pathian alungsiat inchu, hu mi mah chu Pathian heetin aum hi.
Hujiahin milem biahna kithoihna silte neeh lam thu ahihleh, khovel ah milem kichi bangmah ahi sih chih leh khat chauh loungaal Pathian dang aum sih chih i he uhi.
Ajiahchu pathian tampi leh lalpa tampi aum mahbangin, pathian chia minvohte vaan ah aha ahihlouhleh lei ah aha um zongleh uh,

ahihvaangin eiuh diingin chu Pa, Pathian khat chauh aum a, Amah apat sil zousiah ahung um a, huleh eiuh chu Amah diingin i hing uhi; huleh Lalpa khat, Jesu Khrist aum a, Amah tungtawnin sil zousiah aum a, huleh Amah tungtawnin eiuh i hing uhi.

Ahiinlah hu heetna chu mi teng in anei sih hi; himahleh khenkhatte in chu tutan chiangah milem biahna toh akingeinaseh jiahun, milem kawma kilaanta banga geelin hu an chu ane va; huleh a sialepha heetna uh ahaatlouh jiahin suhbolhhohin aumta hi.
Hizongleh neeh in Pathian paahtaat ahung lohsah sih hi; ajiahchu i neeh jiahun i hoihjaw uh ahi sih a, ne sih zonglei i sejaw uh ahi tuan sih hi.
Hizongleh pilvaang un, huchilou inchu hi na jaleenna uh bangchi ahain mi haatloute diingin puuhna ahung suaah kha diing hi.
Ajiahchu heetna nei nang mi koiaha in milem biahna ankuang uum a tou hung muta leh, amah sialepha heetna haatloupa chu milem biahna silte ne diinga haansanloh talou diing ahiaimah?
Huchiin na unau haatlou, amah luanga Khrist sita chu na heetna jiahin amangthaai diing adiai?
Huleh huchia unaute tunga na sual va, a sialepha heetna haatlou uh na suhliamsah chiangun Khrist tungah na sual uh ahi.
Hujiahin neeh in ka unau asuhpuuh inchu, sa ka ne nawn mawngmawng sih diing hi, huchilou inchu ka unau ka supuuh kha diing hi.
Apostol hilou ka hiaimah? Jaleen hilou ka hiaimah? I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ka mu sih eimah? Nanguh Lalpa a ka natoh gah hilou na hi viaimah?
Midangte diingin apostol hi sih zongleng, nanguh diingin chu ka hi ngeei mei hi. Ajiahchu nanguh chu Lalpa a ka apostol hihna chiamchihna na hi uhi.
Kei hung enkhetute kawma ka kiveenna chu hikhu ahi:
Neeh theihna diing leh dawn theihna diing jaleenna neilou ka hi viaimah?
Apostol dangte leh Lalpa unaute leh Kepha banga gingtu khat ji a nei a, kipuileh theilou ka hi viaimah?
Ahihlouhleh kei leh Barnaba chauh in nna tong lou diinga thuneihna neilou ka hi viaimah?
Sepaih koi ahiai amah neihsa seenga gaal kuan ngei? Grephuan bawl ngaala a gah ne lou koi aum ei? Ahihlouhleh gan hon khawi ngaala a nawi dawn lou koi aum ei?
Hi thute mihing ngaihdaan chauh a soi ka hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh daan thu in zong humah asoi sih eimah?
Ajiahchu Mosi daan bu ah, “Bawngtal in buh achil laiin a muuh kaan sin,” chih gelh ahi. Pathian in bawngtalte diing angaihtuah ahiaimah?

Ahihlouhleh Ama’n eiuh diing jiah maha soi ahiaimah? Eiuh diing jiaha gelh ahi tahzet hi, huchu lei lettu in kineemtahin alet diing ahi a, huleh kineem puma buh votu in zong a kinepna chu amuh diing mah ahi.
Kei un na kawmva hagaulam silte tuh ka hih uh leh, nanguh apat na tahsa lam silte uh aat leh ung sil loupi ahiaimah?

Midangte’n na tungvah hi thuneihna tang ahih uh leh, kei un zong ka tangjaw tham sih diviaimah? Ahihvaangin hi thuneihna ka zang sih va, hizongleh sil zousiah ka thuaah uh; huchilou inchu Khrist tanchinpha ka daal kha diing uhi.
Pathian biahinn a natongte’n biahinn a silte ane va, huleh maitaam a natongte’n maitaam a silte ah tan anei uh chih na he sih viaimah?
Huchibangmahin tanchinpha soitute chu tanchinpha mah a ahin diing uh ahi chiin Lalpa’n aguatta hi.

Hizongleh ke’n chu hi silte khatbeeh ka zang sih a, huleh hi silte ka tungah kibawl leh chia gelh zong ka hi sih hi; ajiahchu koiaha in ka kisuanna peen bangmalou a abawl saangin kei diingin sih ahoihjaw hi.
Ajiahchu tanchinpha soi zong leng suan diing bangmah ka nei sih hi, bawllouh theihlouh ka tunga kinga ahih jiahin; ahi, tanchinpha soi sih leng ka tung gih diing ahi!
Ajiahchu hi sil thanuamtaha bawl ka hih leh, kipaahman muh diing ka nei hi; hizongleh ka uut thu lou a bawl ka hihin chu, tanchinpha keemtu hihna mohpuaahna chu piaah ka hita him hi.
Huchi ahihleh ka kipaahman bang ahita diai leh? Huchu tanchinpha a ka thuneihna ka zatkhial louhna diinga Khrist tanchinpha ka soi chianga a manbeia ka soi theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah apat jaleen himahleng, mi tam seem ka laahluut theihna diingin mi zousiah suaah in ka kibawl hi.
Judate ka laahluut theihna diingin Judate kawmah Judami bangin ka um hi. Daan nuaia umte ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan nuaia umte kawmah daan nuaia umte bangin ka um hi.
Daan neiloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan neiloute kawmah daan neilou bangin ka um hi, Pathian daan nuaia umlou tuanlouin, hizongleh Khrist daan nuaia um ngaalin.
Mi haatloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, mi haatloute kawmah haatlou bangin ka um hi. Bangchijawng aha a mi khenkhat beeh ka hutdam theihna diingin mi zousiah kawmah sil bangkimin ka kibawl hi.
Nanguh toh tan ka neih theihna diingin tanchinpha jiahin hichu ka bawl ahi.
Kitaaidemte chu a bawnun ataai va, hizongleh khat chauh in kipaahman amu veu uh chih na he sih viaimah? Na tan theihna diingun taai un.

Huleh koipouh kitaaidemna a kipaahman muh tum mi chu sil zousiah ah akideeh veu uhi. Amah un vaang lallukhuh sethei muhna diingin abawl uh ahi, hizongleh eite’n chu lallukhuh setheilou diingin i bawl uhi.
Hujiahin tup bei hilouin, huchibangmahin ka taai a, huih guaah lahpi tuum hilouin ka pang ahi.
Hizongleh ka tahsa ka sawi a, ka thu nuaiah ka koih hi, huchilou inchu midangte kawma tanchinpha ka soi zoh nungin keimah houh paihkhiahin ka um kha diing hi.
Hubaan ah, unaute, hite na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi, huchu i pulepate a bawnun mei nuaia ana-um va, huleh a bawnun tuipi akaan va,
huleh a bawnun mei leh tuipi a Mosi kawma baptis-in aum va,
a bawnun hagaulam an kibang ane va,
huleh a bawnun hagaulam dawn diing kibang adawn chiat uhi. Ajiahchu amah un amahuh juitu hagaulam Suangpi apat adawn chiat va, hu Suangpi chu Khrist ahi.
Hizongleh a lahva mi tamjawte tungah Pathian alungkimta sih a, hujiahin gamdaai ah a luang uh apuuhlum gamta uhi.
Huchia silgilou alunggulh bangva i lunggulh louhna diingun, hite chu i etton diingva siltung ahi.
A lahva khenkhatte chu milem bemi ahih bangun milem bemi hi sih un. “Mipite chu ne diing leh dawn diingin atou va, huleh nopleninga um diingin ading jeel uh,” chih gelh bangin.
A lahva khenkhat in kingaihna thaanghuai abawl va, ni khat a saang sawmnih leh saang thum apuuhloh bangun, ei un kingaihna thaanghuai i bawl sih diing uhi.
A lahva khenkhat in aje-et va, guulte a suhmanga aum bangun, ei un jaw Khrist i je-et sih diing uhi.
A lahva khenkhat aphun va, sumangtu suhmanga aum bangun, i phun sih diing uhi.
Huchiin hite zousiah chu etton diingin a tungvah anatung ahi a, huleh eiuh huntawp hung tunnate kawma thuhilhna diinga gelh ahi.
Hujiahin dinga kingaihtuah chu pilvaang heh, huchilou inchu apuuh kha diing hi.

Mihing diinga heemna taangpi chihlouh heemna bangmahin ahung man kha nai sih hi; hizongleh Pathian chu aginum hi, Ama’n na thuaahzoh vaal uh heemna na tuaah diing uh aphal sih diing; hizongleh na thuaahzohna diingun heemna toh kitonin taaikhiahna lampi zong ahung siamsah diing hi.
Hujiahin ka deihtahte, milem biahna taaisan un.
Mipilte kawma thusoi bangin ka soi ahi; ka thusoi ngaihtuah un.
Vangpiaahna nou i dawn uh Khrist sisan kipawlkhawmpihna hilou ahiaimah? Tanghou i balkeeh uh Khrist tahsa i kikoppihna hilou ahiaimah?
Ajiahchu eiuh tampi hizonglehhang tanghou beu khat leh tahsa khat i hi uhi; ajiahchu hu tanghou beu khat ah tan i nei khawm chiat uhi.
Tahsa daan a Israelte en un: kithoihna sa nete maitaam toh tan nei khawm ahi sih viaimah?
Ahihleh bang ahiai ka soi? Milem chu sil bang ahakhat ahiai, ahihlouhleh milem biahna a sil kilaante zong sil bang aha khat ahiai?
Jentelte kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah hilouin, dawite kawmah akithoih uh chih soi ka hijaw a, huleh nanguh dawite toh na kipawlkhawm uh ka deih sih hi.
Lalpa nou leh dawite nou na dawnkhawm thei sih diing uh; Lalpa dohkaan a leh dawite dohkaan a zong na nekhawm thei sih diing uhi.
Ahihlouhleh Lalpa thangsiat diinga suhlungthah tum i hi viai? Amah saanga haatjaw i hi viaimah?
Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah ahoihkim veh sih hi. Sil zousiah kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah in asiamhoih sih hi.
Mi koimah in amah ngen hoihna diing hawl sih henla, hizongleh mi chin in midang hoihna diing hawl jaw heh.
Dawl a sa kijuaah photmah chu sialepha heetna jiahin bangma dongse louin ne un.
Ajiahchu, “Leilung leh a sunga um zousiah LALPA a ahi.”
Ginglou mite laha koiaha in an ne diinga ahung chial a, huleh chiah na uut ngaal inchu, na ma va alui phot uh sialepha heetna jiahin bangma dongse louin ne mei un.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in, “Hichu kithoihna ahi,” chia ahung hilh leh, amah ahung hilhpa jiah leh sialepha heetna jiahin ne sih un; ajiahchu “leilung leh a sunga um zousiah LALPA a ahi.”
Nangmah sialepha heetna chi ka hi sih a, hizongleh midang sialepha heetna chi ka hijaw hi. Ajiahchu midang sialepha heetna in bang diinga ka jaleenna hung vaihawm diing ahiai?
Ajiahchu kipaahtaha ka neeh leh, bang diinga kipaahthu ka soina an tunga soisiat-a um ka hiai?
Hujiahin na neeh un hileh, na dawn un hitaleh, na bawl photmah uh Pathian loupina diingin bawl veh un.
Judate aha Jentelte aha ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuamte aha lungnatna diing bangmah bawl sih un,
huchia amahuh hutdam ahih theihna diingva, keimah phattuamna diing chauh hawllou a, hizongleh mi tampite phattuamna diing ka hawljawh mahbangin.
Kei Khrist umdaan juitu ka hih mahbangin nanguh ka umdaan juitute hi un.
Huleh unaute, sil zousiah a na hung heetzing va, thugousiah ka hung piaahsawn bang jeela na kolzing jiahun ka hung paahta hi.
Hizongleh pasal photmah lutang chu Khrist ahi a, numei lutang chu pasal ahi a, huleh Khrist lutang chu Pathian ahi chih na heet uh ka hung deih hi.
Pasal a lu khuh puma haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi aha photmah in a lu azahbawl lou ahi.
Hizongleh numei a lu khuh loua haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi photmah in a lu azahbawl lou ahi; ajiahchu huchibanga bawl chu a sam kimeet kiau toh kibang giap ahi.
Ajiahchu numei in a lu akhuh louhngaal inchu, meetkiau mei heh. Ahihvaangin numei diinga sammeet ahiai mah, ahihlouhleh meetkiau azumhuai jiahin khuh heh.
Ajiahchu pasal hi Pathian lim leh loupina ahihjiahin a lu akhuh louh diing mawng ahi; hizongleh numei chu pasal loupina ahi.
Ajiahchu pasal chu numei apat siam ahi sih a, hizongleh numei ahihleh pasal apat siam ahijaw hi.
Pasal chu numei a diinga siam ahi sih a, hizongleh numei chu pasal a diinga siam ahijaw hi.
Hikhu jiahin numei in a lu tunga thuneihna chiamchihna angelte jiahin aneih ngeeingeei diing ahi.
Ahihvaangin Lalpa ah chu numei apat pasal ajaleen thei sih a, pasal apat numei zong ajaleen thei diaah sih hi.
Ajiahchu numei hi pasal apat siam ahih mahbangin, pasal zong numei tungtawnin apiang hi; hizongleh sil zousiah chu Pathian apat ahi veh hi.
Nang un kingaihtuah un. Numei in a lu khuhloua Pathian kawma ahaamtei akilawm eimah?
Pasal in sam sau aneih leh, amah diingin azumhuai hi chih pianken ngeinadaan in zong ahung hesah sih eimah?
Hizongleh numei in sam sau aneih inchu, amah diingin loupina ahijaw hi; ajiahchu a sam chu a khuhna diinga piaah ahi.
Hizongleh mi koiaha in anial nuam inchu, huchibang tawndaan i nei sih va, Pathian kouhtuamte’n zong anei sih uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh hi thu ka hung hilhna ah ka hung phat thei sih hi, ajiahchu a hoihjawhna diingin na kikhawm sih va, asiatjawh seemna diingin na kikhawm veu uhi.
Ajiahchu amasapeenin kouhtuam a na kikhop chiangun na lahvah kilangkhennate aum chih ka ja a, huleh gin zong gingtaatna khat ka nei hi.
Ajiahchu na lahva midih a pomte heetdoh ahih theihna diingun, na lahvah kilangkhennate zong aum diing mawng ahi.
Hujiahin na kikhop chiangun Lalpa nitaah an ne diinga hung na hi sih uhi.
Ajiahchu na neeh chiangun mi chin in midangte main nanguh nitaah an na kineeh chiat va; huchiin khat agilkial a, adang in akham hi.

Bangchidaan ahiai? Neehna diing leh dawnna diing inn kineih lou na hi viaimah? Ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuamte na musit-un bangma neiloute na selphou uh ahiaimah? Na kawmvah bang ahiai ka soi diing? Hi thu ah ka hung paahta diing adiai? Ka hung paahta hial sih hi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa kawm apat ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilhsawn ahi: huchia Lalpa Jesu’n matsaha aum jaanin tanghou ala a,
huleh kipaahthu asoi zohin abalkeeh a, “La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa nanguh diinga kibalkeeh chu ahi; na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl un,” achi hi.
Huchibangmahin an aneeh zohin nou zong ala a, “Hi nou chu thuhun thah a ka sisan ahi. Na dawn tengva na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl un”, achi hi.
Ajiahchu hi tanghou na neeh va hi nou na dawn tengun, ahung kiit masiah Lalpa sihna na phuangdoh jeel uh ahi.
Hujiahin mi koipouh taahloupi-a Lalpa tanghou ne leh nou dawn in chu Lalpa tahsa leh sisan tungah siamlouh atang diing hi.
Huleh mi amah kienchianjaw heh, huchiin tanghou chu ne henla, nou chu dawn heh.
Ajiahchu Lalpa tahsa hesiam lou a ne taahlou leh dawn taahloupi-a ne leh dawn in chu amah siamlouh kitanna diingin anein adawn hi.
Hikhu jiahin na lahvah mi tampi na jawngkhaal va huleh na china va, huleh tampi na ihmuta uhi.
Ajiahchu ei leh ei dihtaha i kietchian leh, vaihawmsahin i um sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh vaihawmkhuma i um chiangun khovel toh siamlouhtanga i um louhna diingun Lalpa taaihilhin i um veu uhi.
Hujiahin ka unaute, ne diinga na kikhop chiangun, khat leh khat kingaah chiat un.
Hizongleh mi koipouh a gil akial leh a inn lamah ne heh, huchia vaihawmna na thuaahna diingva hung kikhawm na hihlouhna diingun. Huleh thu dangte chu ka hung chiangin ka lemtuaah veh na diing hi.
Huleh unaute, hagaulam silpiaahte tungtaang heloua na um uh ka deih sih hi.
Jentelte na hih laiun puia na um bang jeelun, milem haamtheiloute lamah puimangin na um uh chih na he uhi.
Hujiahin koima’n Pathian Hagau a thu soiin Jesu chu haamse thuaah ahi, achi ngei sih a, huleh koima’n Hagau Siangthou jaal louin Jesu chu Lalpa ahi, achi thei ngei sih, chih ka hung hesah hi.
Huchiin silpiaah tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh Hagau kibang ahi.
Huleh thunatohna tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh Lalpa kibang ahi.
Huleh natohna tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh bangkim a bangkim bawltu Pathian khat ahi.
Hizongleh mi zousiah phattuampih diingin Hagau natoh kilatna chu mi chin kawmah piaahin aum hi.
Ajiahchu mi khat kawmah Hagau tungtawnin pilna thu piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hu Hagau tungtawn mah in heetna thu piaah ahi;
midang kawmah hu Hagau mah in ginna piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hu Hagau mah in suhdamtheihna silpiaahte piaah ahi;

midang kawmah silmah bawltheihnate piaah ahi a, midang kawmah thusoilawhtheihna piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hagaute heetkhentheihna piaah ahi a, midang kawmah haam tuamtuamte a thusoitheihna piaah ahi a, midang kawmah haam tuamtuamte lehdohtheihna piaah ahi.
Hizongleh hute zousiah chu Hagau khat mah in hi silte zousiah chu atongdoh a, mimal chin kawmah adeih bangjeelin ahawm hi.
Ajiahchu sapum chu khat ahi a, hizongleh hiang tampi anei hi; hiang zousiah chu tam mahleh uh sapum khat ahih bangun, Khrist ah zong hutobangmah ahi.
Ajiahchu eiuh Judate hiin Jentelte hitalei, suaah hiin suaah lou hilei, i bawnun sapum khat a um diingin Hagau khat a baptis-in i um va, huleh i bawnun Hagau khat mah a dawnsahin i umta uhi.
Ajiahchu sapum chu hiang khat chauh ahi sih a, hizongleh hiang tampi ahijaw hi.
Keeng in, “Khut ka hihlouh jiahin sapum a pang ka hi sih,” chi leh, hijiahin sapum a panglou ahi diaimah?
Huleh bil in, “Mit ka hihlouh jiahin sapum a pang ka hi sih,” chi leh, hijiahin sapum a panglou ahi diaimah?
Sapum chu a pumpi in mit hitaleh, khojaahna khoiah aumta diai? A pumpi in khojaahna hitaleh, gimnam heetna khoiah aumta diai?
Hizongleh Pathian in hiang chinteng chu pha asah bangin sapum ah akoih hi.
Huleh a bawnun hiang khat chauh hitaleh uh, sapum khoiah aumta diai?
Hizongleh tuin hiang tampi aum a, ahiinlah sapum khat chauh ahi.
Huleh mit in khut kawmah, “Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih,” achi thei sih a, lutang in zong keeng kawmah, “Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih,” achi thei tuan sih hi.
Chitheilou chauh hi thamlouin, sapum hiang haatloua kilangte chu apoimohjaw mahmah hi.
Huleh i sapum hiang zahtaat thamlouh a i ngaihte tungah zahna lianjaw i pia va, huleh i hiang suhlat thamlouhte’n naahpiihtahin kilawmna aneijaw uhi.
Hizongleh i hiang suanhuaite’n huchibang amamoh sih uhi. Hizongleh Pathian in poimoh thamlou hiangte chu zahna lianjaw piain, sapum chu alemkhawm hi,
huchia sapum a kikhenna aum louh a, hizongleh hiangte chu khat leh khat akingaihsah chiat theih jawhna diingun.
Huleh hiang khat in athuaahin zong, hiang zousiah in athuaahpih hi; huleh hiang khat paahtawia aum leh, hiang dang zousiah in akipaahpih uhi.
Tuin nanguh chu Khrist sapum na hi va, a mimal malin a hiangte na hi uhi.

Huleh Pathian in kouhtuam ah hite akoih hi: amasapeenin apostolte, anihna ah zawlneite, athumna ah thuhilhtute, hubaan ah silmah bawltute, huzohin suhdamtheihna silpiaahte, panpihtheihnate, vaihawm siamnate, haam tuamtuamte a haamtheihnate.
A bawnun apostol ahi viai? A bawnun zawlnei ahi viai? A bawnun thuhilhtu ahi viai? A bawnun silmah bawltute ahi viai?
A bawnun suhdamtheihna silpiaahte anei viai? A bawnun haamdangte in thu asoi viai? A bawnun haam aletthei viai?
Hizongleh silpiaah hoihpeente chu lunggulh jaw un. Huleh lampi hoihjaw ka hung musah nalai diing hi.
Mihing haamte leh angel haamte in thu soi mahleng, lungsiatna ka neih louhin chu, sum-eng tumging aha ahihlouhleh daah khutbeh ging aha bang ka hi giap hi.

Huleh thusoilawhtheihna silpiaah nei in, thukiphual zousiah leh heetna zousiah hesiam veh mahleng, taang kisuantheihna khop ginna zousiah nei mahleng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu, bangmah ka hi sih hi.
Huleh ka neih zousiah migentheite vaahna diingin pedoh vehin, huleh ka sapum haaltum diingin pedoh zongleng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu, bangma ka phattuampih sih hi.
Lungsiatna in athuaahthei a huleh aching hi; lungsiatna in athangse sih; lungsiatna chu akiphat sih a, akiuangsah sih hi;
akilawmlouin agumtat sih a, amah deihjawng chauh angaihtuah sih a, alungthah baih sih a, silgilou angaihtuah sih hi;
dihtatlouhna ah akipaah sih a, hizongleh thutah ah akipaah hi;
sil zousiah puaah daan asiam a, sil zousiah agingta a, sil zousiah alamen a, sil zousiah athuaah mualsuaah hi.
Lungsiatna chu bangchihmahin abei sih diing hi. Hizongleh thusoilawhtheihnate um mahzongleh, ahung bei diing hi; haamdangte um mahleh, ahung tawp diing hi; heetnate um mahleh, ahung mang diing hi.
Ajiahchu akimlouin i he a, akimlouin i soilawh uhi.
Hizongleh abukim chu ahung tun chiangin akimlou chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
Ka naupan laiin naupang haam in ka haam a, naupang heet in ka he a, naupang ngaihtuah in ka ngaihtuah hi; hizongleh ka hung pichin phetin naupanlai silte ka paaikheta hi.

Ajiahchu tuin liimlang a et bangin chianloutahin i mu hi, hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kimaaituahin i muta diing hi. Tuin chu akimlouin ka he a, hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kei hung kiheet bangin ka heta diing hi.
Huleh tuin ginna, kinepna leh lungsiatna hi teng thum aum zing hi; hizongleh hi teng laha lianpeen chu lungsiatna ahi.
Lungsiatna chu delh jeel unla huleh hagaulam silpiaahte lunggulh un, adiaahkholin thusoilawhtheihna diing lunggulh un.
Ajiahchu haam tuam khat a haam in chu mi kawma thusoi hilouin, Pathian kawmah asoi ahijaw hi, koimah in asoi aheetlouh jiahin; ahiinlah hagau ah chu thukiphual asoi ahi.
Hizongleh thusoitu in chu mihing kawmah siamhoihna thute, hasotna thute leh hamuanna thute asoi ahi.
Haamdang a thusoi in chu amah chauh akisiamhoih a, hizongleh thusoitu in chu kouhtuamte asiamhoih hi.

Na bawnva haamdangte a na haam uh chu ka hung deihsah hi, hizongleh hu saangin thu na soitheih uh ka hung deihsahjaw hi; ajiahchu kouhtuam in siamhoihna atan theihna diinga aletdoh louhngaal leh, haamdangte a haam saangin thusoi mi chu aloupijaw hi.

Tuin unaute, haamdangte a thusoiin na kawmvah hungta leng, thuphuandoh in aha, heetna in aha, thusoilawhtheihna in aha, ahihlouhleh thuhilhna in aha na kawmvah soi sih leng, bang in ka hung suphatuam diai?
Sil hinna neilou gingthei theile aha ahihlouhleh tingtang aha ngeei zong umjia neia agin louh leh, bang kimuut a, bang kitum ahiai chih bang achi kiheet theih diai?
Ajiahchu peengkuul mumal beiin kimuut leh, koi ahiai gaal kuan diinga kisa diing?
Huchibangmahin nang un zong haam heettheih diinga na soi louh uh leh, bang kisoi ahiai chih bang achi kiheet diai? Ajiahchu huih laha haam na hi giap diing uhi.
Khovel ah haam chi tuamtuam tampi aum ahi mei thei, hizongleh umje neilou khatmah zong aum sih hi.
Hujiahin, hu haam umjia ka heetlouh inchu, hu thusoipa diingin kei chu gamdangmi ka hi a, huleh kei diingin a soipa zong gamdangmi ahi diing hi.
Huchi mahbanga nang un zong hagaulam silpiaahte na lunggulh jiahun, kouhtuam siamhoihna diinga na hung khantouh theihna diing uh hawl un.
Hujiahin haamdang khat a thusoitu in alehdoh theihna diingin haamtei heh.
Ajiahchu haamdang khat in haamteita leng, ka hagau chu ahaamtei a, hizongleh ka heetna chu asuphatuam sih hi.
Ahihleh a thutawpna bang ahita diai? Hagau in ka haamtei diing a, heetsiamna toh zong ka haamtei diing hi. Hagau in la ka sa diing a, heetsiamna toh zong la ka sa diing hi.
Huchilou inchu, hagau a kipaahthu na soi chiangin bangma hesiam loupa in na kipaahthu soi ah bangchiin na thusoi heloupiin, “Amen,” achi thei diai?
Ajiahchu nang in chu kipaahthu na soi hoih ngeel a, hizongleh midang chu asiamhoih tuan sih hi.
Nanguh zousiah saanga haam dangte a thu ka soi tam jawh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi ahi.
Ahiinlah kouhtuam lahah chu haam dang khat a thu saang sawm ka soi saangin, ka thusoi a midangte ka hilh theihna diingin ka heetsiamna toh thu teng ngaa soi ka uut jaw hi.
Unaute, heetsiamna lamah naupang sih unla, ahiinlah giitlouhna lamah chu naupang un; huleh heetsiamna lamah piching un.
Daan Lehkhabu ah, “Haam dang mite leh gamtuam mite kam in hi mite kawmah thu ka soi diing a; huchiin zong ka thu angaikhe tuan sih diing uhi,” Lalpa’n achi, chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin haam dangte chu gingtute diingin hilouin hizongleh gingloute diingin chiamchihna ahi; hizongleh thusoilawhna chu gingloute diingin ahi sih a, gingtute diingin ahijaw hi.
Hujiahin kouhtuam pumpi mun khat a na kikhopna vah mi zousiah haam dangte in haamta leh uh chin, hutah ah ahe nailoute ahihlouhleh gingloumite hungta leh, nanguh chu mingol ahung chi sih diviaimah?

Hizongleh mi zousiah in thu soilawhta leh uh, ginglou ahiai ahihlouhleh heloumi khat hutah ah hung leh, amah chu mi zousiah in misual ahihdaan ahesah diing va, misual ahi chiin amah leh amah akihedohsah diing uhi.
Huchiin a lungtang thuguuhte chu suhlatin aumta diing a, huleh khupboha puuhin Pathian abe diing a, na lahvah Pathian aum tahzet hi chih asoisawn diing hi.

Bangchih diing ahita diai, unaute? Na hung kikhop tengun mi chin in phatna la bang, thuhilhna bang, haam tuam bang, thuphuandoh bang, haam lehdohna bang na nei chiat uhi. Sil zousiah chu siamhoihna diinga bawl hi heh.
Mi koipouh in haam tuam khat a thu asoi leh, nih aha ahihlouhleh atam tawpin thum in aha soi heh, hu zong kikheel jeelin hi henla, huleh mi khat in letdoh heh.
Alettu diing aum louh leh, amah chu biahinn ah sipkhianin um henla, huleh amah leh Pathian kaal ah kisoi heh.
Thusoilawhtute nih aha thum aha in soi uh henla, adangte in asoi uh ngaihtuah uh heh.
Hizongleh a kawma tou thusoilawh dang khat kawma thuphuandoh ahung um leh, amasapeen sip heh.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah in ajil va, mi zousiah hasot-a aum theihna diingin na bawnun khat khat in thu na soilawh thei uhi.
Huleh zawlneite hagau chu zawlneite thuthu in aum uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian chu buaina Pathian ahi sih a hizongleh hamuanna Pathian ahijaw hi, misiangthoute kouhtuam tengteng a ahih mahbangin.
Na numeite uh chu kouhtuam kikhopnate ah sip uh heh, ajiahchu amahuh diingin thusoi phal ahi sih hi; hu thamlouin daan Lehkhabu in zong asoi bangin akituhluut diing uh ahi.
Huleh bang aha heet nuam aneih un chu, inn lamah a pasalte uh dong uh heh; ajiahchu kouhtuam kikhopna a numei thusoi chu azumhuai hi.
Ahihlouhleh Pathian thu achiil a nanguh apat hung suaah ahiaimah? Ahihlouhleh nanguh kawm chauha hung tung ahiaimah?
Mi koipouh in thusoilawhtu ahiai ahihlouhleh hagaumi ahiaimah hia akingaihtuah leh, na kawmva ka thugelhte chu Lalpa thupiaah ahi chih he uh heh.
Hizongleh mi koipouh ahelou aum leh, amah chu helouin um mei heh.
Hujiahin unaute, thusoilawh theihna chu lunggulh unla, haam dangte a haam zong khap sih un.
Sil zousiah hoihtah leh kituuptaha bawl hi heh.
Hubaan ah, unaute, na kawmva ka tanchinpha hung soi, pom zong na pom va huleh humah ngeei zong na dinna uh hi chu ka hung hesah ahi,
na kawmva ka hung soi thu na pomdet uh leh, humah a hutdam zong na hi uhi, huchi ahihlouh inchu, athawnin na gingta uh ahi.
Ajiahchuamasapeeninkeimah in zong ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilh sawn ahi: huchu Pathian Lehkhathu dungjuiin Khrist chu i sualnate jiahin asi a,
huleh Amah chu vuiin aum a, Pathian Lehkhathu dungjuiin ni thum ni in kaihthohin aumta a,
huleh Kepha kawmah akilaah a, huzohin apostol sawmlenihte kawmah.
Hunungin unau za ngaa saanga tamjawte kawmah khatvei thuin akilaah a, amahuh chu atamjaw tutanin adam nalai va, hizongleh khenkhat chu a-ihmuta uhi.
Hunungin Jakob kawmah akilaah a, huin apostol zousiah kawmah.
Huleh atawppeenin ahun loua piang kei kawmah zong akilaah hi.
Ajiahchu apostolte laha aneupeen ka hi, Pathian kouhtuamte ka suhduhdah jiahin apostol minvoh taah zong ka hi sih hi.

Hizongleh Pathian hehpihna jiahin tua ka hihna chu ka hita a, huleh a hehpihna ahung piaah chu athawnin aum sih hi; hizongleh amahuh haw zousiah saangin ka tonggimjaw hi, ahihvaangin kei toh ahi sih a, Pathian hehpihna ka kawma umin atong jaw ahi.
Hujiahin kei hiin amahuh hitaleh, huchiin ka soi va, nang un na gingta uhi.
Ahihleh tuin Khrist chu misi lah apat athoukiit chih akisoi ngaal leh, bangchidaana na lahva mi khenkhat in misi thohkiitna aum sih na chih uh ahiai?
Hizongleh misi thohkiitna umlou ahih inchu, Khrist zong kaihthoha umlou ahi diing hi.
Huleh Khrist kaihthoha umlou ahih inchu, ka thusoi uh athawn ahi a, na ginna uh zong athawn ahi hi.
Ahi, misite thoukiit lou ahih un chu, Pathian in Khrist akaihthou louhpi akaithou hi chia ka heetpihtaah jiahun, keiuh chu Pathian heetpihtu dihlou hia ngaihin ka umta diing uhi.
Ajiahchu misite athohkiit louh un chu, Khrist zong kaihthoh ahi sih diing hi.
Huleh Khrist kaihthoha aum louh inchu, na ginna uh athawn ahi diing a, na sualna vah na um nalai diing uhi.
Huchiangleh Khrist a ihmute amangthaai ahita diing uhi.
Tu damsung chauha Khrist a kinepna i neih un chu, mi zousiah laha mi lungsiathuai peen i hi diing uhi.
Hizongleh tuin Khrist chu misi lah apat kaihthohin aumta a, ihmute gahmasa ahung hita hi.
Ajiahchu mihing jiaha sihna ahung um jiahin, Mihing jiah mahin misi thohkiitna zong ahung umta hi.
Ajiahchu Adam a mi zousiah asih mahbangin, Khrist ah mi zousiah suhhingin aum diing uhi.
Hizongleh mi chin chu amahuh hun chiat ah ahi diing va: Khrist chu gahmasapeen ahi a, huchiin ahung kiit chiangin Khrist a te hun ahi diing hi.
Huchiin Ama’n lalgam Pa Pathian kawma apiaahkhiah chiangin, vaihawmna zousiah leh thuneihna zousiah leh silbawltheihna zousiah asuhmang chiangin, a tawpna ahung tung diing hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n a meelmate zousiah a keeng nuaia akoih masangsiah vai ahawm ngeei diing ahi.
Meelma nunungpeen suhmanga um diing chu sihna ahi.
Ajiahchu “Ama’n sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah akoihta hi.” Himahleh “sil zousiah a thu nuaiah akoih” achih khu in a thu nuaia sil zousiah koihtu chu ahuam sih chih akilang hi.
Huleh sil zousiah a thu nuai a aum chiangin, Pathian chu bangkim a bangkim ahihtheihna diingin, Tapa ngeei zong sil zousiah a thu nuaia koihpa nuaiah akituluutta diing hi.
Huchilou inchu, misite thoukiit mawngmawng lou ahihleh, misite a diinga baptisma tangte’n bang abawlta diviai? Ahihleh bang diinga misite a diinga baptisma atansah uh adiai?
Huleh bang diinga eite zong daahkaal chin a lauhhuai dinmun a umzing i hi viai?
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist a ka hung suanna jiahin nitengin ka si chih tahzetin ka soi ahi.
Mihing hihdaan banga Ephesi a gamsate kisualpih ka hih leh, kei diingin bang aphatuam diai? Misite thoukiit lou ahihleh, “Nein i dawn diing uh, ajiahchu jiing chianga si diing i hi!”
Heemin um sih un: “Lawm gilou in umdaan hoih asusia hi.”
Dihtatna lamah halh unla, sual sih un; ajiahchu khenkhat in Pathian heetna anei sih uhi. Hichu na zahtaatna diingva ka soi ahi.
Hizongleh mi khenkhat in, “Misite bangchiin kaihthoh ahi diing viai? Bangchi bang sapum neiin ahung pawt diviai?” achi ahi diing.
Nang mingol, na haichi tuh zong asih louh leh, ahingdoh sih hi.
Huleh na tuhin a kung hung um diing khu na tuh sih a, gehu hiin haichi dangdang hitaleh, a tang mah ahi na tuh.
Hizongleh Pathian in pha asah bangjeelin a kung apia a, huleh haichi chin kawmah amah kung chiat apia hi.
Tahsa zousiah chu tahsa kibang ahi sih a, hizongleh mihing tahsa jaat tuam ahi a, gamsate tahsa jaat atuam a, ngate tahsa jaat atuam a, vate tahsa jaat atuam hi.
Vaanlam sapum aum a, leilam sapum zong aum hi; hizongleh vaanlam sapum loupina atuam a, leilam sapum loupina atuam hi.
Nisa loupina tuam khat aum a, ha loupina tuam aum a, huleh aahsite loupina tuam aum hi; ajiahchu aahsi leh aahsite zong loupina daan ah akibang sih uhi.
Huchibangmahin misi thohkiitna zong ahi. Sapum chu muattheia tuhin aum a, muattheiloua kaihthohin aum hi.
Simmoh umtaha tuhin aum a, loupitaha kaihthohin aum hi. Haatloutaha tuhin aum a, silbawltheitaha kaihthohin aum hi.
Pianpih sapuma tuhin aum a, hagaulam sapum neia kaihthohin aum hi. Pianpih sapum aum a, hagaulam sapum zong aum hi.
Huleh hichia gelh ahi, “Mi masa Adam chu hinna nei mi ahung hita hi.” Adam nunung chu hinna petu Hagau ahung hita hi.
Ahihvaangin, hagaulam chu aum masa sih a, hizongleh tahsalam aum masa a, huleh hunungin hagaulam ahung um hi.
Mihing masa chu lei a siam, leivui apat ahi a; Mihing nihna chu vaan apat Lalpa ahi.
Lei a siam mite chu lei a kisiampa bang ahi va, vaanlam mite chu vaan a Mi bang ahi uhi.
Huleh lei a kisiampa meel i puaah bangun, vaan Mi meel zong i po diing uhi.
Unaute, tuin hi ka soi ahi, tahsa leh sisan in Pathian lalgam aluah thei sih a, muatthei in zong muattheihlouhna aluah thei sih hi.
Ngai un, thukiphual ka hung hilh ahi: I bawnun i ihmu veh sih diing va, hizongleh i bawnun suhlimdangin i um veh diing uhi,
thakhatin, mitphet kaallouin, peengkuul nunungpeen gin chiangin. Ajiahchu peengkuul ahung ging diing a, huleh misite chu muattheiloua kaihthohin aum diing va, eite zong suhlimdangin i umta diing uhi.
Ajiahchu hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna asilh diing a, huleh hi sithei in sihtheihlouhna asilh ngeei diing hi.
Huchia hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna asilh a, huleh hi sithei in sihtheihlouhna asilh hun tahchiangin, “Sihna chu zohna ah valhin aumta.
Aw sihna, na gu khoiah aum tai? Aw haankhuuh, na gualzohna khoiah aum tai?” chia kigialte chu ahung taangtungta diing hi.
Sihna gu chu sual ahi a, huleh sual silbawltheihna chu daan thu ahi.
Hizongleh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaala gualzohna hung pepa Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Hujiahin ka unau deihtahte, dettahin, suhliing guallouhin, Lalpa natoh phatuamngaitaha tong gigein um un, na tohgimna uh chu Lalpa ah athawn sih diing chih na he ngaalva.
Huleh misiangthoute diinga thohlawm tungtaang thu chu, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte ka thupiaah bangin nang un zong bawl un.
Ka hung chianga thohlawm donna aum nawn louhna diingin, hapta ni masapeen in na neih bang jeelun, mi chin in na khut vah na koih khawl chiat un.
Huleh ka hung chiangin koi hitaleh pha na sahsahte uh chu na hehpihna silpiaah uh vathah diingin lehkhathonte toh Jerusalem ah ka sawl diing hi.
Huleh kei zong ka chiah alem leh, kei toh kitonin achiah diing uhi.
Makedonia gam tawna ka pai chiangin na kawmvah ka hung diing hi, ajiahchu Makedonia gam tawna pai diing ka hi.
Huleh ka khualzinna diing photmah a na hung panpih theihna diingun na kawmvah tomkhat, ahihlouhleh phalbi sung siah aha, ka taam meithei hi.
Ajiahchu zin kawma hung muh malam ka uut sih hi; hizongleh Lalpa’n lem asah leh, sawt deuh na kawmva taam ka kineem hi.
Hizongleh Pentikost dongin Ephesi khua ah ka taam diing hi.
Ajiahchu phatuamtaha natohna diing kot lianpi kei diingin akihong a, doutute zong tampi aum uhi.
Huchiin Timothi ahunga ahihleh, lauthawng loua na lahva aum theihna diing ngaihtuah un; ajiahchu kei tobangin ama’n Lalpa nna atong hi.
Hujiahin koima’n musit sih heh. Hizongleh ka kawma ahung theihna diingin a khualzinna ah lungmuangtahin sawl jaw un; ajiahchu unaute toh ka kawma ahung uh ka kineem mahmah hi.
Tuin unaupa Apollo thu ahihleh unaute toh na kawmva hung diingin ka phuut a, hizongleh tutaha hung diing chu amah deihdaan ahi sih hi; ahiinlah hun lemtaang aneih chiangin ahung diing hi.
Kiveeng un, ginna ah dingkip un, hangsan unla, haattahin um un.
Na silbawl photmah uh lungsiatna toh bawl hi heh.
Unaute, Stephena innkuanpihte chu Akaia gam a gah masapeen ahi va, misiangthoute natohna diingin akipia uh chih na he uhi,
huchibangte kawm leh mi chin keiuh hung tohpiha tonggimte kawma kituluut diingin ka hung ngeen hi.
Stephena, Fortunata leh Akaika hung chu ka kipaah hi, ajiahchu amah un na umlouh awng uh ahu uhi.
Ajiahchu amah un kei lungsim leh nanguh lungsim ahung suhhalhsah uhi. Hujiahin huchibang mite chu ahihna uh heetpih un.
Asia gam a kouhtuamte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi. Akuila leh Prisilla in a inn va kouhtuam kikhawmte toh Lalpa ah tahzetin chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Unaute zousiah in chibai ahung buuh uhi. Tawp siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh tuah un.
Kei Paul in hi chibai buuhna chu keimah khut ngeei a ka gelh ahi.
Mi koipouh in Lalpa Jesu alungsiat louh leh, haamse thuaahin um heh. Maranatha.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kawmvah um hen.
Khrist Jesu a ka hung lungsiatna na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihlama Jesu Khrist apostol leh i unaupa uh Timothi in, Korinth khua a um Pathian kouhtuamte leh Akaia gam pumpi a misiangthoute zousiah kawmah:
Pathian i Pa uh leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa, lainatna Pa leh hamuanna zousiah Pathian chu paahtawiin um hen,
Pathian in ahung hamuanna khu mah a ei un zong hahsatna a um photmahte i hamuan theihna diingun, Pathian in eiuh hahsatna zousiah ah ahung hamuan hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist gimthuaahnate i tungva adimleet bangin, i hamuanna uh zong Khrist jiahin adimleet hi.

Huleh gimthuaaha ka um un chu, nanguh hehnepna diing leh hutdamna diingin ahi a, huchu gimthuaahna ka thuaah bang uh kuhkaltaha thuaahzohna diingin aphatuam hi. Ahihlouhleh hamuana ka um uh leh, nanguh hehpihna diing leh hutdamna diingin ahi.
Huleh ka gimthuaah uh hung thuaahpihtute na hih bangva, ka hehnepna uh tangtute zong na hi uh chih ka heet jiahun, na tungva ka kinepna uh adet hi.

Ajiahchu unaute, Asia gam a ka tungva gimthuaahna hung tung chu na heetlouh uh ka deih sih uh: huchu hin zong kineem zou nawn lou khopa um in, ka haatna un azoh guallouh puaahgih nasatah guanin ka um uhi.
Hizongleh keiuh leh keiuh kimuang loua misi kaithouthei Pathian ka muan jawhna diingun tahzetin si diinga thupuuhkhumna chu keiuh ah ka kineih uhi.
Ama’n chu huchituha sihna nasatah lah apat ahung hundohta a, huleh ahung hundoh zing hi; ahung hundoh nalai diing chiin Amah ah ka kineem uhi.
Mi tampite apat silpiaah ka muh jiah va, mi tampi in keiuh luanga kipaahthu asoi theihna diingun, nang un zong keiuh diinga na hung haamteisahna un na hung panpih uhi.

Ka kisuanna uh chu hikhu ahi: ka sialephaheetna un ahung heetpih, huchu tahsa pilna daan hilou himahleh Pathian hehpihna jaal jaw a khovel a siangthou leh Pathian laua chihtaha ka gamtat uh khu ahi a, nanguh kawmah huchibangin ka gamta diaahkhol uhi.
Ajiahchu na sim va huleh pom zong na pom uh khu loungaal na kawmvah thu dang bangma ka gial sih uhi. Huleh atawp donga na heetsiam zing uh ka kineem hi
(tua heetna chiang na hung neih bangun), Lalpa Jesu Ni chiangin nanguh zong ka kisuanpihte uh na hih bangun, keiuh chu na kisuanpihte uh ka hi diing uhi.
Huleh hi gintaatnatah neiin phattuamna nihveina na tan theihna diingun na kawmva hung masat ka tum hi.
Huleh nanguh hung tawn malamin Makedonia gam a chiah suaahin, Makedonia gam apat na kawmva hung kiitin, nang un Judia gam lama ka chiahna diing ah hung thah ulehchin ka chi hi.
Hujiahin huchibang ka ngaihtuah laiin, ngaihsamtaha bawl ka hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh ka sil guanggalhna ah tahsalam daana “Hi hi” chih leh “Hilou hilou” chihkhawm lehleh ka hiaimah?
Hizongleh Pathian aginum bangin, nanguh lama ka thu uh chu Ahi chih leh Hilou chih ahi khawm sih hi.
Ajiahchu na lahva keiuh, keimah ngeei leh Silvana leh Timothi in, a thu ka soi uh Pathian Tapa Jesu Khrist chu Ahi chih leh Hilou chih ahi khawm sih a, Amah ah chu Ahi chih ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thuchiam zousiah chu Amah ah Ahi chih ahi a, hujiahin Pathian loupina diingin Amah ah Amen ka chi uhi.
Huleh Khrist a nanguh toh hung sukiptu leh keiuh thau hung nuhtu chu Pathian ahi.
Ama’n chu chiam zong ahung chiamchihta a huleh i lungtang vah khaamna Hagau ahung peta hi.
Himahleh ka hinna tunga heetpihtu diingin Pathian ka kou ahi, huchia nanguh ka hung hawi theihna diingin Korinth ah ka hung nawn sih hi.
Na ginna tungva thu hung neihkhum hilouin, na kipaahna diingva na tohpihte uh ka hijaw uhi; ajiahchu ginna ah na dingdet uhi.
Hizongleh nanguh lung suna diingin na kawmvah ka hung kiit sih diing chih keimah ngeei in ka na thupuuhta hi.
Ajiahchu ke’n nanguh hung sulungkham leng, ka suhlungkhamte mah chihlouh koi in ahiai kei hung kipaahsah diing?

Huleh na kawmvah hi thu mah ahi ka hung gelh, huchilou inchu, ka hung chiangin ka kipaahna diingte lahah lungkhamna ka mu jaw kha diing hi, ka kipaahna chu na bawnva kipaahna hi diingin ka muang ngaala.

Ajiahchu lunggimna leh lungkhamna nasatah apat mittui tampi toh ka hung gelh ahi; suhlungkhama na um louh va, hizongleh na tungvah lungsiatna nasatah ka nei hi chih na heet jawhna diingun ka gial jaw hi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in lungkhamna asiam leh, kei ahung sulungkham sih a, hizongleh soiuang taahluat louhin, bangtan ahain na bawnun ahung sulungkham hi.
Huchibang mi a diingin chu mi tampi in apiaah uh hi gawtna ahuntawh hi.
Huchiin na ngaihdam diing va huleh na hamuan jawh diing uh ahi, huchilou inchu huchibang mi chu alungkham taahluatna in atuumzou kha diing hi.
Huchi ahih jiahin amah lama na lungsiatna uh hesah thah diingin ka hung hasot hi.
Hukhu jiah mahin zong ka gial ahi, huchu sil zousiah a thu na man uh leh na manlouh uh ka heetchianna diingin.
Bangma pouha mi na ngaihdam uh chu, ke’n zong ka ngaidam hi. Ajiahchu sil bangpouh ka ngaihdam leh, hi ka ngaihdam mi chu nanguh jiahin Khrist ma ah ka ngaidamta hi.
Huchilou inchu Setan in eiuh ah hun lemtaang amu kha diing hi, ajiahchu a guuha a lungtupte i haih sih uhi.
Huleh Khrist tanchinpha soi diinga Troas khua a ka hung laiin Lalpa’n kei diingin kot khat ahung honsah hi.
Ka unaupa Tita ka muhlouh jiahin ka ha amuang thei sih hi; hizongleh amahuh hakhiain hu apatin Makedonia gam ah ka chiahta hi.
Hizongleh Khrist a gualzohna hung pe zingtu leh keiuh zanga Amah heetna gimnamtuui mun chin a phuangdohtu Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um hen.
Ajiahchu hutdama umte leh mangthaaite lahah Pathian a diingin Khrist gimnamtuui ka hi uhi.
Khenkhat kawmah sihna diinga sihna gimnam ka hi va, huleh khenkhat kawmah hinna diinga hinna gimnam ka hi uhi. Huleh hi silte diinga chingzou koi ahiai?
Ajiahchu Pathian thu chu mi tamtah in sumkawlveina a azat bangun kei un chu ka zang sih uhi; hi saangin chihtahna toh Pathian apat bang jawin Khrist ah Pathian mitmuh in thu ka soi uh ahi.
Keiuh leh keiuh kisoiphat pankiit ka hita viaimah? Ahihlouhleh kei un midangte bangin na kawmvah soiphatna lehkha ahihlouhleh nanguh apat soiphatna lehkha poimoh ka hi viaimah?
Nanguh chu ka lehkhathot uh ka lungtang va gelh, mi zousiah heet leh sim na hi uh;
Khrist lehkhathot, keiuh etkol, lehkhatui a gelh hilou a, Pathian hing Hagau a gelh, suangpeeh a gelh hiloua tahsa lungtang peeh a gelh na hijaw uh chih chiantaha suhlat ahi.
Huleh huchibang muanna chu Khrist jaalin Pathian lamah ka nei hi.
Sil bang aha khat keiuh apat ahi chi diingin keiuh chauhin ka chin sih va, ka chitna uh chu Pathian apat ahijaw hi.

Ama’n chu thuhun thah natongtute hithei diingin keiuh ahung chinsah a, lehkhajeem a natongtute hilouin hizongleh Hagau a natongtute diingin ahijaw; ajiahchu lehkhajeem in asulum a, hizongleh Hagau in chu hinna apia hi.
Suangpeeh a sut a gelh, sihna natohna chu hichilawma loupina toh ahung a, hu loupina hung kiam hiaihiai chu Mosi maaitanga aum jiaha Israel tate’n a maaitang aet ngam louhva ahihleh,
Hagau natohna chu bangchiin aloupijaw lou thei diai?
Ajiahchu siamlouh tansahna natohna bawn aloupi inchu, dihtatna natohna chu nasatahin aloupijaw hi.
Ajiahchu loupina ummasa chu loupina nasajaw in akhuumkheel jiahin hilam thu ah loupina anei nawn sih hi.
Ajiahchu ahung kiam hiaihiai bawn aloupia ahihleh, aum zing khu chu nasatahin aloupijaw seem hi.
Hutobang kinepna ka neih jiahun, hangtaha thusoi ngamna ka nei uhi.
Huleh akiam hiaihiai vaah chu Israel tate’n aet tang theihlouhna diingva a maaitang puan khuh Mosi bang chu ka hi sih hi.
Hizongleh a lungsim uh suhkhauhin aum hi. Ajiahchu tuni tanin Thuhun Lui asim chiangun hu maaikhuhna chu hawhkhiah louhin aum zing hi, hu maaikhuhna chu Khrist chauh a suhbeia um ahih jiahin.
Hizongleh tuni tanphain Mosi Lehkhabu asim chiangun a lungtang vah maaikhuhna aum zing hi.
Ahihvaangin Lalpa lama akihei chiangun hu maaikhuhna chu laahmang ahi diing hi.
Tuin Lalpa chu Hagau ahi; huleh Lalpa Hagau umna phot ah jaleenna aum hi.

Hizongleh eiuh chu i bawnun, maai khuhlouha liimlang a en bangin Lalpa loupina chu en zingin, hu meel bang ngeei po diingin loupina apat loupina ah ahung sulimdang zing hi, Lalpa Hagau apat bang ngeeiin.
Hujiahin hehpihna ka tan bangva hi natohna ka tan jiahun ka lungke sih uhi.

Hizongleh sil zumhuai kiphualte ka paampaihta uh; doha lungsim a hing louin, Pathian thu mi heemna a zang louin, hizongleh Pathian mitmuh ah thutah suhlatna jiahin mi chin sialepha heetna ah keiuh leh keiuh adih hiin ka kisoipha jaw uhi.
Hizongleh ka tanchinpha uh phuala aum leh, mangthaaite kawmah ahi phuala aum.
Pathian lim batpih Khrist tanchinpha loupina vaah in amahuh asalhvaah theihlouhna diingin, hi khovel pathian in agingtaloute lungsim asuhmialsahta hi.
Ajiahchu keiuh leh keiuh ka kisoithang sih va, Khrist Jesu chu Lalpa ahi chih leh keiuh chu Jesu jiahin na suaahte ka hi uh chih ka soi jaw uhi.
Ajiahchu mial lah apat a vaah hung vaahdoh diing, chia thupetu chu Pathian ahi a, Ama’n Jesu Khrist meel a Pathian loupina heetna vaah ahung piaahna diingin ka lungtang uh asalhvaahta hi.
Hizongleh silbawltheihna haattah chu kei uh apat hilou a, Pathian apat ahihjawh theihna diingin hu gou chu lei beel ah ka keem uhi.
Lehlam lehlam ah nehthopin ka um va, hizongleh ka chimoh nai sih uhi. Lungdongin ka um va, hizongleh ka lungke tuan sih uhi.
Suhduhdahin ka um va, hizongleh taihsanin ka um sih uhi; sawn puuhin ka um va, hizongleh suhmangin ka um sih uhi.
Jesu hinna ka sapum va suhlat-a aum theihna diingin, bangchihlaipouhin Jesu sihna ka sapum vah ka po lehleh uhi.
Ajiahchu ka tahsa uh sithei a Jesu hinna zong suhlat-a aum theihna diingin keiuh ahing nalaite chu bangchihlaipouhin Jesu a diingin sihna kawmah piaahkhiahin ka um uhi.
Huchiin keiuh ah sihna in atong a, hizongleh nanguh ah chu hinna in atong hi.
“Ka gingta a hujiahin ka soita hi,” chih gelh bangin, ginna hagau ngeei ka nei jiahun, kei un zong ka gingta va hujiahin ka soi uh ahi;
ajiahchu Lalpa Jesu kaithoukiitpa in keiuh zong Jesu toh ahung kaithou diing a, nanguh toh a maaima ah ahung tut diing chih ka he uhi.
Ajiahchu mi tampi tunga hawmjaaha um hehpihna in Pathian loupina diinga kipaahthu soina aluangleetsah theihna diingin, sil zousiah chu nanguh phattuamna diinga um ahi.
Huchihjiahin ka chau sih uhi; ka polam mihing uh kiam hiaihiai zongleh, ka sunglam mihing uh chu ni chin a siamthahin aum zing hi.
Ajiahchu mitphetkaal sung chauh ka gimthuaahna uh jaangtakhat in kumtuang loupina gih tungtuang jaw ahung bawlsah zing hi.
Sil muhtheihte enlouin, hizongleh sil muhtheihlouhte ka enjaw uhi. Ajiahchu sil muhtheihte chu tomtakhat sunga diing ahi a, hizongleh sil muhtheihlouhte chu kumtuang a diing ahijaw hi.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh hi puanbuuh, i lei inn uh suhsiatin um mahzongleh, Pathian apat khut a bawl hilou kumtuang inn det vaan ah i nei uh chih i he uhi.
Ajiahchu vaan apat i inn diing uh silhthuahsaha um uut mahmahin hi puanbuuh sungah i maau zing uhi.
Huchibanga silhthuahsaha i um inchu, saguaahin i um sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu eiuh hi puanbuuh a umte chu puaahgih puain i maau zing uhi, silhloua i um uut jiah uh hilouin, silhthuahsaha i um uut jiahun ahijaw hi, huchia sithei chu hinna in avalhzoh theihna diingin.
Huleh hikhu diinga eiuh hung siamtu chu Pathian ahi a, huleh khaamna Hagau hung petu zong Amah ahi.
Huchiin bangchihlaipouhin muangtahin i um uhi, sapum inn a i um laisiah uh Lalpa inn a umlou i hih uh hein.
Ajiahchu muh theiha pailouin, ginna in i pai jaw uhi.
Muangtahin i um va, ahi, sapum a umloua Lalpa kawma um i uut jaw tham uhi.
Huchihjiahin inn ah umin umlou zonglehhang, Amah kipaahpih jawng hih chu tuppeenin i nei uhi.
Ajiahchu mi chin in a sapum a asilbawlte asia apha abawl bangbanga amuh theihna diingin Khrist vaihawmna touphah ma ah i bawnun i ding diing uhi.
Hujiahin Lalpa lauhuai daan hein mite ka jawl teeiteei uhi; hizongleh Pathian kawmah suhlatin ka um va, huleh na sialepha heetna va suhlat-a ka um uh zong ka kineem hi.

Ajiahchu na kawmvah ka hung kisoipha kiit uh ahi sih, hizongleh lungtang a hiloua apolaang a kisuangte kawma dawnna na neih theihna diingun keiuh jiaha kisuan theihna hunlemtaang hung pia ka hijaw uhi.
Ajiahchu ka ngol uh leh, Pathian a diingin ahi a; ka pil uh leh, nanguh diingin ahi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah sih luanga mi khat asih inchu, mi zousiah si ahita hi chia ka ngaihtuah jiahun, Khrist lungsiatna in ahung sawl teeiteei hi.
Huleh a hingte zong amahuh diinga ahin nawn louh va, asih luangva si a thoukiitpa a diinga ahin jawhna diingun Amah chu mi zousiah diingin asi ahi.
Huchihjiahin tukalsiah chu tahsa lamah kuamah ka he nawn sih uhi. Tahsa daanin Khrist anaheta zongleh ung, tuin chu hutobangin ka he nawn sih uhi.
Hujiahin mi koipouh Khrist a aum inchu, silsiam thah ahita hi; sil luite abeita a, ngai un, sil zousiah ahung thah vehta hi.
Huleh sil zousiah chu Pathian apat ahi a, Ama’n Jesu Khrist jiahin Amah toh kilemin ahung bawl a, ka kawmvah kilepna natohna ahung pia hi.
Huchiin Pathian chu Khrist a umin, khovel Amah toh kilemin abawl a, a tatsualnate uh tatsualna a sehsah louin, ka kawmvah kilepna thu ahung kolsahta hi.
Hujiahin kei uh chu Khrist palaite ka hi va, Pathian in kei uh manga nanguh ahung nget bangin, Pathian toh kilem un, chiin Khrist luangin ka hung ngeen uhi.
Ajiahchu Amah ah Pathian dihtatna i hung hih theihna diingun, sual mawngmawng helou Amah chu Pathian in eiuh jiahin sualin abawlta hi.
Huleh keiuh Amah toh tongkhawmte’n Pathian hehpihna chu phattuamna beia na muh louhna diingun ka hung hasot uhi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Hun kipaah huai ah ka hung ngaikhia a, hutdamna ni ah ka hung panpih hi,” achi hi. Ngai un, tu hun kipaah huai ahi; ngai un, tu hutdamna ni ahi.
Ka thunatohna uh dema aum louhna diingin sil bangmah ah puuhna diing ka bawl sih uhi.
Himahleh Pathian thunatongtute ka hi uh chih sil zousiah ah ka suchian uhi: kuhkal mahmahna ah bang, hahsatna ah bang, taahsapna ah bang, lungkhamna ah bang,
jeepna ah bang, suangkul taanna ah bang, buaina ah bang, tohgimna ah bang, ihmut louhna ah bang, an ngawlna ah bang;
sianthouna in, heetna in, thuaahtheihna in, chitna in, Hagau Siangthou in, lungsiatna dihtah in,
thutah thu in, Pathian silbawltheihna in, jiatlevei a dihtatna gaalvan in,
zahbawlna leh zahbawllouhna in, soisiatna leh soiphatna in; mi heemtute banga ngaihin, mi dihtah hingaalin;
mi heetlouhin, minthangtah hingaalin; si diing bangin, huleh ngai un, ka hing uhi; vuaahthop bangin, thah chu hilouin;
lungkhamtah bangin, kipaah zing ngaalin; genthei bangin, mi tampi suhausa ngaalin; bangma neilou bangin, huleh sil zousiah nei ngaalin.
Aw nanguh Korinthte, na kawmvah kihongtahin ka soi va, ka lungtang uh ka hong lian uhi.
Nanguh ka hung khaah uh ahi sih a, himahleh nanguh ngeei in na hung lainatna uh na khaah uh ahijaw hi.
Huleh tate kawma soi bangin ka soi ahi, nanguh ka hung piaah banga na hung piaah theihna diingun, nang un zong na lungtang uh hong lian un.
Gingloumite toh kituaahlouin ngawngkol pokhawmin um sih un. Ajiahchu dihtatna leh dihtatlouhna in bang kikopna anei ei? Huleh mial leh vaah in bang kithuahna anei viai?
Huleh Khrist leh Belial in bang kituaahna anei viai? Ahihlouhleh gingtu leh gingloumi in bang tankhawm anei viai?

Huleh Pathian biahinn leh milemte in bang kilemna anei viai? Ajiahchu nanguh chu Pathian hing biahinn na hi uhi. Pathian in, “Amahuh ah ka teeng diing a, amahuh lahah ka vaahleh diing a; huleh a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, amahuh ka mite ahi diing uh,” achih bangin.
Hujiahin, “A lahva kipan hung pawtdoh unla, atuamin um un, Lalpa’n achi. Huleh sil sianglou khoih sih un, huchiin ka hung pom thei diing hi.
Huleh nanguh diingin na Pa uh ka hi diing a, nanguh chu ka tapate leh ka tanute na hi diing uh, Bangkimbawlthei LALPA in achi,” achih bangin.
Hujiahin unau deihtahte, hi thuchiamte i neih jiahun, Pathian launa a sianthouna subukimin, tahsa leh hagau bolhhohna zousiah apat i kisusiangthou diing uhi.
Keiuh hung pom un. Koimah alam louin ka bawl sih uh, koimah ka suse sih uh, koimah ka heembawl sih uhi.
Nanguh siamlouh tansahna diinga hi thu ka soi ahi sih; ajiahchu i sih leh si khawm a, i hin leh hing khawm diingin ka lungtang vah na teeng uh chih tumain ka soita hi.
Nanguh lama thu ka soi ngam daan aloupi a, nanguh a ka kisuanna aloupi hi. Lungmuanna in ka dim a; ka gimthuaahna zousiah vah nasatahin ka kipaah ahi.
Ajiahchu Makedonia gam ka hung tun un, ka tahsa un khawldamna anei sih a, lehlam lehlam ah suhgimin ka um jaw uhi. Polam ah kihaunate aum a, sunglam ah launate aum hi.
Hizongleh lungkete hamuantu Pathian in Tita hungna jiahin ahung hamuanta hi.

Huleh amah hungna jiah chauh hilouin, ama’n nanguh a hamuanna aneih daan, nang un kei na hung ngaih daan uh, na hung hasiatpih daan uh, kei diinga na phattuamngaih daan uh ahung hilh phetin ahung hamuangsahta a, huchiin ka kipaah seemta hi.
Ajiahchu keima’n ka lehkhathot in hung sulungkham zongleng tuin ka kisiih sih hi, anakisiihta himahleng. Ajiahchu hu lehkhathot in nanguh tomtakhat sung chauh ahung sulungkham chih ka he hi.

Tuin chu ka kipaah ahi, suhlungkhama na um jiahuh hilouin, na lungkhamna un kisiihna ahung tutjaw jiahin ahi. Ajiahchu nang un kei uh jiaha manna bangma na tan louhna diingva Pathian deihjawnga suhlungkhama um na hi uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian deihjawnga lungkhamna in hutdamna umna diingin kisiihna atun a, huchu adahhuai sih hi; hizongleh khovel lungkhamna in chu sihna atun hi.

Ajiahchu ngai un, Pathian deihjawnga lungkhamna ngeei in nanguh ah bang atun ei en un: bang thanopnate, dihtatna deih jiaha bang lunghihlouhnate, bang launate, bang lunggulhnate, bang phattuamngaihnate, bang thudih bawl deihnate atun eimah! Hi silte zousiah ah na siang uh chih na suchianta uhi.

Huchiin na kawmvah gial zongleng, adihlou bawlpa jiah aha ahihlouhleh dihloutaha thuaahpa jiaha ka gelh zong ahi sih hi, hizongleh na tungva ka phattuamngaih daan uh Pathian mitmuh a na kawmva suhlat-a aum theihna diinga ka gelh ahijaw hi.
Hujiahin na hamuanna vah ka hamuangta uhi. Na bawnva Tita lungsim na tohhalhsah jiahun, amah kipaahna ah ka kipaah tungtuang uhi.

Ajiahchu Tita kawma nanguh ka hung kisuanpihna photmah ah suhzumin ka um sih hi. Hizongleh thutah a sil zousiah na kawmva ka soi bangun, nanguh tungtaang Tita ma a ka hung suanna uh zong thutah ahi ngeei hi.
Huleh nanguh na bawnva na thuman daante uh, lau leh kithing puma amah nana saan daante uh ageeldoh chiangin, a lungsung ah nanguh ahung lungsiatna azual deuhdeuh hi.
Hujiahin sil zousiah a na tungva muanna ka neih jiahin ka kipaah hi.
Huchiangleh unaute, Makedonia gam a kouhtuamte tunga Pathian hehpihna piaaha um chu ka hung hesah uut uhi:
huchu suhgimna je-etna nasatah laha a kipaahna uh kichindaan leh a jawn mahmahna va kiphalna ahauh daan uh ahi.
Ajiahchu ahihzoh bangun, huleh ahihzoh saangva zong nasajawin uuttahin apia uh chih ka heetpih hi.
Amah un hi hehpihna silpiaah chu pomsah diingin leh misiangthoute panpihna natohna a atel theihna diingun hah ngetin ahung ngeen uhi.
Huleh hichu ka na lamet bang uh hilouin, Pathian deihlamin amahuh mahmah Lalpa kawmah leh keiuh kawmah akipe masa phot uhi.
Huchiin tuma a apattaah banga hu hehpihna chu na lahva bawlzou diingin Tita ka ngeen uhi.

Hujiahin silbangkim a na hauh bangun, ginna ah, thusoitheihna ah, heetna ah, phattuamngaihna zousiah ah leh keiuh na hung lungsiatna va na hauh bangun, hi hehpihna ah zong na hauhna diing uh ngaihtuah un.
Thupiaah bangin chu ka soi sih a, midangte phattuamngaihna tungtawna na lungsiatna uh tahjia etna diingin ka soi jaw hi.
Ajiahchu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na he uh, a gentheihna jiaha na hung hauhsat theihna diingun, Amah chu hausa mahzongleh, nanguh jiahin ahung gentheita hi.
Huleh hitah ah ka ngaihdaan ka soi hi: Nang un kum khat paita a hikhu bawl diinga nana kipat uh chauh hilouin, bawl diing nana lunggulh him jiahun hichu nanguh diingin ahoih ahi.
Hujiahin tuin bawl taangtung un, uut diinga kipeihna aum banga, na neih bang jeelva na piaah kim theihna diingun.
