Ajiahchu uutna lungsim aum masat phot leh, mi a neihlouh daan dungjui hilouin a neih daan dungjuia pomsah ahi.
Ajiahchu midangte thadamtaha um a, nanguh gihtaha um diing hung chi ka hi sih;

hizongleh kibatgualna diingin ka chi ahijaw hi, huchia tu huntah a na neih vaal uh chu amahuh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih a, amahuh neih vaal zong nanguh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih theihna diingin ahi, huchia kibatgualna ahung um theihna diingin.
“Alakhawmtam in avaalin anei sih a, alakhawmtawm in lah atasam tuan sih,” chih gelh bangin.
Hizongleh nanguh diinga ka phattuamngaihna toh kibanga Tita lungtang a phattuamngaihna umsahtu Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
Ajiahchu keiuh ngetna apom chauh hilouin, amah mawnga phatuamngai a, amah uutthu a na kawmva hung ahi.
Huleh Tita toh unaupa khat, tanchinpha lam thu a kouhtuam zousiah in asoiphat uh, ka hung sawl uhi.

Huleh huchi chauh zong hilouin, amah chu kouhtuamte’n keiuh toh hi silpiaah toh zinkhawm diinga aguat uh zong ahi a, hu silpiaah chu Lalpa ngeei loupina diing leh na lungsim kipeih daan uh suhlatna diinga kei un ka guanggalh uh ahi a,
hi silpiaah tamtah ka hawmna vah koima’n ahung dem louhna diingin ka pilvaang uhi.
Lalpa mitmuh chauh ah hilouin, mihing mitmuh ah zong dihtaha bawl ka ngaikhawh uhi.
Huleh amahuh toh i unaupa uh ka sawl va, amah chu sil tampi a aphattuamngaihdaan tamveitah ka muchianta va, tu diahin na tungva tahsanna liantah aneih jiahin phatuam angai nasa seem ahi.
Tita tungtaang thu ahihleh, amah hi nanguh lam thu a ka kithuahpih leh ka natohpih ahi. Huleh i unaute uh ahihleh, kouhtuamte thupotute ahi va, Khrist loupina ahi uhi.
Hujiahin amahuh kawm leh kouhtuamte ma ah, na lungsiatna uh heetchianna leh nanguh ka hung suanna uh chu ensah un.
Ajiahchu misiangthoute diinga panpihna toh kisai na kawmva ka hung gelh angai sih hi.

Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh na lungsim kipeih daante uh ka he a, hu thu ah Akaia gam kipeihsa a aumna kum khat ahita, chiin Makedonia gam mite kawmah ka hung suang a, huleh na phattuamngaihna un mi tamjawte asuthathou hi.
Ahihvaangin hichilam thu a nanguh ka hung suanna athawn ahih louhna diingin unaute ka hung sawl hi; huchia ka soi bangtaha kipeihsa a na um theihna diingun;
huchilou inchu Makedonia gam a mi khatpouh kei toh hungin, nanguh kimansalouin hung muta leh ung, nanguh soi louh, keiuh zong nanguh ka hung suanna lamvah ka mualphou kha diing uhi.
Hujiahin tuma a nana chiamsa uh silpiaah chu laahsah thoh hilou a, phaltaha pe jaw a, mansa diama na koihna diingun, ahun main unaute chu na kawmva hung masa diingin hasot ngaiin ka ngaihtuah hi.
Hizongleh hichu ka soi ahi: Atheh tawm in a-at tawm diing a, atheh tam in a-at tam diing hi.
Phallou sasa a, ahihlouhleh piaahlouh theihlouha ngaia pelouin, mi chin in a lungtang a atup bangjeelin pia heh, ajiahchu Pathian in kiphaltaha petu chu alungsiat hi.
Huleh Pathian in hehpihna zousiah na tungvah ahung vuh thei hi, huchia nanguh bangchihlaipouha sil hoih zousiah a buchinga um zing a, nna hoih chinteng na toh theihna diingun.
“Ama’n ahawmjaah a, migentheite kawmah apia a, a dihtatna chu kumtuangin aum zing hi,” chih gelh bangin.
Huleh athehtupa kawma haichi petu leh neeh diinga tanghou hung pepa in, na haichi theh diing uh hung piain, apungsah diing a, huleh na dihtatna gahte uh akhangsah diing hi.
Na silphalna jiahun bangkim ah suhhauhsatin na umta va, hukhu ngeei in keiuh tungtawnin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soina aumsah hi.
Ajiahchu hi natohna in misiangthoute taahsap awng ahuhsah chauh ahi sih a, Pathian kawma kipaahthu soina tamtah ah aluangleet hi.
Hi natohna suhchetna tungtawnin, Khrist tanchinpha na phuanna va na thumanna jiah uh leh amahuh leh mi zousiah tunga na kiphalna jiahun, amah un Pathian apaahtawi uhi.
Huleh amah un zong nanguh diinga ahung haamteisahna jiahun, nanguh a Pathian hehpihna loupitah um khu jiahin ahung ngai mahmah uhi.
A silthawnpiaah soiseeng guallouh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um hen!
Huleh na lahva nunneem leh na um louhna va khauh kei, Paul in, Khrist nunneemna leh jaidamna in ka hung ngeen ahi.
Hizongleh tahsa daan banga gamta a keiuh hung ngaihtuah khenkhatte tunga khauh diing ahi chia ka ngaihtuah banga, na kawmva ka um chianga huchia ka khauh louhna diingin ka hung ngeen hi.
Ajiahchu tahsa in um mahleh ung, tahsa daan in ka dou sih uhi.
Ajiahchu ka gaaldouna gaalvan uh chu tahsa daan ahi sih a, kulhpi dettahte suhchimna diinga Pathian a silbawltheihna ahijaw hi.
Suangtuahnate leh Pathian heetna doudaala kisangkoihna chintengte ka supuuh va, ngaihtuahna chinteng Khrist thumanna suaahin ka pui uhi.
Huleh na thumanna uh suhbukim ahih chianga thumanglou zousiah gawt diingin kimansain ka um uhi.
Nang un sil apolama kilatdaan a en na hi viaimah? Mi koipouh in Khrist a hia amah leh amah akimuan a ahihleh, hichu ama’n ngaihtuah kiit heh, amah Khrist a ahih bangin keiuh zong Khrist a ka hi uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh suhsiatna diing hilouin, khantouhna diing jawa Lalpa hung piaah ka thuneihna uh neukhat suang deuh zong leng, ka zum sih diing hi,
huchia lehkhathonte a nanguh hung suhlau tum banga ka kilat louhna diingin.
Ajiahchu amah un, “A lehkhathonte jaw agihin akhauh a, hizongleh amun ah tahsa a aumna ah ajawngkhaal a, a thusoi zong amuhsithuai hi,” achi uhi.
Huchibang mi in hikhu ngaihtuah heh, na kawmva ka umlouh laiva lehkha thugelh a ka hihna bangbang un, na kawmva ka um chiangun zong natoh ah ka hi diing uhi.

Ajiahchu keiuh chu amah leh amah kiphatte lahah ka kisimtel ngam sih va, amahuh toh teh zong ka kitehkaah ngam sih uhi. Hizongleh amahuh chu amahuh leh amahuh kitehtuahin, huleh amahuh leh amahuh akitehkaah va, heetsiamna beiin aum uhi.
Hizongleh keiuh chu ka tehna hun vaal un ka kisuang sih diing uhi, hizongleh Pathian hung guatsah, nanguh zong huap diinga tehna hu bangjeelin ka kisuang jaw diing uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh kawm hung tungpha lou banga keiuh hung kigolhsau talua ka hi sih uhi; ajiahchu Khrist tanchinpha toh nanguh kawm tan ka hungta uhi.

Ka tehna vaal va kisuang hilouin, chih chu midangte tohsa a kisuang louin, hizongleh na ginna uh akhan dungjuiin na lahva ka kizatna bial uh nasatahin na hung keehletsah diing uh chih kinepna ka nei uhi,
huchia na gam kallam va tanchinpha ka soi theihna diingun, huleh midang bialsung a natohsa tunga ka kisuang louhna diingun.
Hizongleh, “Akisuang phot chu LALPA ah kisuang heh.”
Ajiahchu amah leh amah kisoipha chu pomin aum sih a, hizongleh Lalpa’n asoiphat mi chu pom ahijaw hi.
Ka ngol deuhna ah nang un na hung thuaah theih uh ka deih hi, huleh na hung thuaah thei ngeei uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thangsiatna in na tungvah ka thangsia hi. Ajiahchu Khrist kawma nungaah siangthou banga ka hung piaah theihna diingin na pasal diing uh khat ka hung hualsah hi.
Hizongleh guul in a doha zanga Evi aheem bangin, Khrist kawma na kipiaahna uh tahna leh sianthouna apat na lungsim uh suhsiatin aum kha diing chih ka lauthawng hi.

Ajiahchu koiaha khat ahung a ka soi louh uh Jesu dang asoi leh, ahihlouhleh na tan ngeilouh uh hagau dang na tan va, ahihlouhleh na tan ngeilouh uh tanchinpha dang na tanva ahihleh, na pom baih talua uh ahi!
Ajiahchu apostol lianpeente saanga nengtakhat a zong neujawin ka kingaihtuah sih hi.
Himahleh thusoi ah siam sih zong leng, heetna lamah chu ka huchi sih hi. Tahzetin huchu sil bangkim ah na lahvah ka sulangta uhi.
Na kawmva Pathian tanchinpha athawna ka soi jiaha, tawisanga na um theihna diingva ka kingaihngiamna ah sil bawlsual ka hiaimah?
Nanguh nna ka hung tohsah theihna diingin amahuh apat loh lain kouhtuam dangte chu a neih uh ka laahsah hi.

Huleh na kawmva ka um laia ka taahsapin koimah a diingin puaahgih ka hi sih hi, ajiahchu Makedonia gam apat hung unaute’n ka taahsap awng teng ahung huhsah uhi. Huleh sil bangkim ah nanguh puaahgih hilou diingin ka kibawl a, huchibangin ka kibawl jeel diing hi.
Khrist thutah keimah a aum bangin, Akaia gam sunga hi ka kisuanna chu koima’n ahung sutawp sih diing hi.
Bangjiahin? Nanguh ka hung lungsiat louh jiahin maw? Pathian in ahe hi!
Hizongleh a kisuanna silte va keiuh banga ngaiha aum theihna diingva hunlemtaang deihte apat hunlemtaang ka laahmang theihna diingin ka bawl chu ka bawl jeel diing hi.
Ajiahchu huchibang mite chu Khrist apostolte hia kibawlthuh, natongtu heemhaatte, apostol tahloute ahi uhi.
Huleh hichu alimdang sih hi, ajiahchu Setan ngeei zong vaah angel in akibawlthuh hi.
Huchihjiahin a natongtute zong dihtatna natongtute banga akibawlthuh uh leh, huchu sil limdang ahi sih hi. A tawpna uh chu a natoh bang dungjuiun ahi diing hi.
Ka soi kiit ahi, koima’n mingol in hung ngaihtuah sih heh. Ahihlouh vaanglah leh, keimah neukhat beeh ka kisuang theihna diingin mingol bangin hung pom un.
Ka thusoi chu Lalpa soi diing bangin ka soi sih a, hi kisahtheihna ah ngoltah bangin ka soi jaw hi.
Mi tampi tahsa lama akisuan jiahun kei zong ka kisuang diing hi.
Ajiahchu nanguh mipil na hi va, mi ngolte kipaahtahin na thuaah zou jeel uhi!
Ajiahchu mi khat in suaahin hung bawl leh, hung ne gam leh, amahuh lawhna diingin nanguh hung zang leh, amah leh amah kiliansah leh, na maai vah hung beeng leh, na thuaah zou jeel uhi.
Ka zumna diingin haatlou ka hi uh chiin ka soi ahi! Hizongleh mingol bangin ka soi ahi, midang hangsanna ah chu kei zong ka hangsan ahi.
Hebraimi ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi. Israelmi ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi. Abraham chihaahte ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi.

Khrist natongtute ahi uh maw? (Mingol bangin ka soi ahi.) Kei ka hi seem hi; tohgimna bang ah atamjaw seemin, vuaahna bang ah atuang avaalin, suangkul taanna bang ah mun seemin, sihna bang ah tampivei.
Judate lahah vuaahna sawmli chinna diing khat a sam ngaavei ka tuaah hi.
Thumvei chiangpum a jeepin ka um a, khatvei suang a sehin ka um a, thumvei kuang siatna ka tuaah a, jaan khat leh suun khat tuithuuh laiah ka um hi.

Khualzinna ah tampivei, tui tunga lauhuai ah, suamhaatte laha lauhuai ah, ka chipihte laha lauhuai ah, Jentelte laha lauhuai ah, khopi sung a lauhuai ah, gamdaai a lauhuai ah, tuilianpi a lauhuai ah, unau tahloute laha lauhuai ah,
tohgimna leh hahsatna ah, tampivei jaan ihmut louhna ah, gilkialna leh dangtaahna ah, tampivei an ngawlna ah, dap thuaahna leh saguaahna ah ka um hi.
Polam a hu silte chih louh zong kouhtuamte zousiah ka ngaihtuahna ni chin a hung net zing ka tungah aum hi.
Kua haatlouhna ka thuaahpih louh aum ei? Koi puuhna ka lungnatpih louh aum ei?
Kisuang diing mawng hitaleng, ka haatlouhna lam silte ka suang diing hi.
Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa, kumtuanga paahtawia um in ka juau sih chih ahe hi.
Damaska ah kumpipa Areta nuai a gamoptupa’n kei hung matsah tumin Damaskate khopi aveengsah hi.
Huleh kotta ah bawm in kulh pangah ahung khaikhesuh va, huchiin a khut apat ka suaahta hi.
Keiuh diingin kisuang phatuam sih mahzongleh, silmuh leh Lalpa kilaahna ka hung soi diing hi.
Kum sawmleli paita in Khrist a um mi khat ka he a, sapum in ahiai aum ka he sih a, sapumlou in ahiai aum ka he sih a, Pathian in ahe hi, huchibang mi khat vaan thumna tan ah laahtouhin aum hi.
Huleh huchibang mi khat chu ka he a, sapum in ahiai sapum louin ahiai aum ka he sih a, Pathian in ahe hi.
Amah chu Paradis ah laahtouhin aum a, soi guallouh thu avaja a, huchu mihing diinga soi phallouh ahi.
Huchibang mi chu ka suang diing hi; kei mah ka hihleh ka haatlouhna loungaal bangmah ka suang sih diing hi.

Ajiahchu kisuan uut mahleng, mingol ka hi sih diing hi, ajiahchu thutah soi diing ka hi ngaala. Hizongleh mi koiaha in ahung muhdaan bang leh ka thu ajaah bang saanga ahung ngaih loupi louhna diingin ka kideeh diing hi.
Huleh kilaahnate anasat beeh jaala ka kingaihsang taahluat louhna diingin Setan thupotu ahung sun diing ling khat ka tahsa ah ahung kipia hi, huchilou inchu ka kingaisang talua kha diing hi.
Kei apat achiahmangna diingin hi sil jiahin Lalpa kawmah thumvei ka ngeen hi.

Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Ka hehpihna chu nang a diingin ahuntawh hi, ajiahchu ka haatna chu haatlouhna ah suhbukimin aum hi,” achi hi. Hujiahin Khrist silbawltheihna ka tunga aum theihna diingin, kipaahtahin ka haatlouhnate ka suang jaw diing hi.
Hujiahin haatlouhnate ah, housiatnate ah, taahsapnate ah, suhduhdahnate ah, hahsatnate ah Khrist jiahin ka lungkim hi. Ajiahchu ka haatlouh huntah chiangin ka haat hi.

Kisuangna in mingol ka hung suaahta a, nang un huchilou theilouin na hung bawl uhi. Ajiahchu na hung soiphat jawh diing uh ka hi, ajiahchu bangma hi sih zongleng, apostol lianpeente ka phaah lelhna bangma aum sih hi.
Tahzetin apostol hihna chiamchihnate chu kuhkalna chinteng in, chiamchihnate in, silmahte in, silbawl loupite in na lahvah bawl ahi.
Ajiahchu kei nanguh diinga puaahgih ka hihlouh chih louhngaal, bang lamah ahiai kouhtuam dangte saanga nuainungjaw a na um uh? Hi suhkhelhna hung ngaidam un!

Ngai un, na kawmva hung diinga ka kipeihna a thumveina ahita hi. Huleh nanguh diingin puaahgih ka hi sih diing hi, ajiahchu na sil neih uh hawl ka hi sih a, nanguh hung hawl ka hijaw hi. Ajiahchu tate’n nulepa a diinga akholkhawm diing uh ahi sih a, hizongleh nulepate’n tate diinga akholkhawm diing uh ahijaw hi.
Huleh ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat seem a, nang un na hung lungsiat louh seem vaangun, ke’n chu na hinna uh diingin kipaahtahin ka neih chu ka seeng diing a, ka kiseeng bei diing hi.
Hizongleh ahi hi hitaleh, nanguh puaahgih ka hung guan sih hi. Ahihvaangin lungsim siama doha a ka hung mat na hi uhi!
Na kawmva ka hung sawlte laha koiaha zangin, nanguh apat punna ka siam kha eimah?

Tita chu na kawmva hung diingin ka ngeen a, huleh amah toh unaupa khat ka hung sawl hi. Tita in amah lawhna diingin nanguh ahung zang mawleh? Hagau kibangin ka gamta khawm sih viaimah? Kalsuan kibanga chiah hilou ka hi viaimah?
Na lahva keiuh leh keiuh dihna thu kisoi a hung ngaihtuah na hi uh maw? Khrist ah Pathian ma ah thu ka soi uhi. Hizongleh deihtahte, sil zousiah chu nanguh bawlhoihna diingin ka bawl uhi.

Ajiahchu ka hung chianga nanguh ka hung muh diing banga ka hung muhlouh khaah diing leh kei na hung muhlouh diing bangva na hung muhkhaah diing uh ka lau hi; huchilou inchu kinialnate, kithangsiatnate, thangtawmnate, kikhinnate, kisoisiatnate, kiguuhhounate, uanghaamnate leh buainate ahung um kha diing hi;

huchilou inchu, ka hung kiit chiangin ka Pathian in na lahva ahung sumualphou diing a, huleh tuma a anatasual a himahleh a sianglouhna uh leh a kingaih thaanghuaina uh leh a huuhna silchiinte vapat kisiihlou mi tampite ka lungngaihkhum kha diing hi.
Hichu na kawmva ka hung a thumveina diing ahi. “Heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum kam ah thu chinteng suhchetin aum diing hi.”

Tumain na kawmva ka um anihveina laiin ka soita a, huleh tuin umlou hizongleng malaia sil anabawlsualte leh midang zousiah kawmah ka hung gial ahi, huchia ka hung kiitin chu koima ka hawi sih diing hi,
nang un keimah a thusoi Khrist heetchianna na hawl jiahun, Amah chu nanguh lamah haatlou ahi sih a, hizongleh na lahvah silbawltheitah ahijaw hi.

Ajiahchu haatlouhna jiahin kilhbehin um mahleh, Pathian silbawltheihna in ahing zing ahi. Ajiahchu keiuh zong Amah ah haatlou ka hi va, hizongleh Pathian silbawltheihna in nanguh lamah Amah toh ka hingkhawm diing uhi.

Ginna ah na umna viai mah nanguh leh nanguh kienkhia unla, nanguh mimal kienchian un. Ahihlouhleh nanguh leh nang un Jesu Khrist nanguh ah aum chih kiheet lou na hi viaimah?– etkhiahna a chingzoulou tahzet na hih louhngaal uh leh.
Hizongleh keiuh chu etkhiahna a chinglou ka hi sih uh chih na he diing uh chih ka kineem hi.

Huleh silgilou na bawllouhna diingun Pathian kawmah ka ngeen hi, huchu keiuh etkhiahna a chinga ka kilat theihna diing uh ahi sih a, etkhiahna ah keiuh chinglou bangin kilang mahleh ung, a dih na bawl theihna diing uh ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu thutah a diinga bawl chihlouh chu thutah kalhin bangma ka bawl thei sih uhi.
Ajiahchu keiuh ka haatlouh va nanguh na haat chiangun ka kipaah uhi. Huleh na hoih bukimna diingun zong ka ngeen hi.

Hujiahin suse diing hilou a, bawlhoihna diing jaw a Lalpa hung piaah thuneihna dungjuiin na kawmva ka um chianga khauhtaha ka hung bawl louhna diingin, na kawmva ka umlouh laiin hi silte ka hung gial ahi.
Atawppeenin, unaute, kipaahtahin um un. Hoihbukimin um un. Hamuangtahin um unla, lungsim mun khat pua unla, kituaahtahin um un; huleh lungsiatna leh hamuanna Pathian na kawmvah aum diing hi.
Kitawpna siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un.
Misiangthoute zousiah in nanguh chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh Pathian lungsiatna leh Hagau Siangthou kipawlpihna na bawnva kawmah umta hen. Amen.
Paul, apostol in (mihing apat hilou, mihing vaanga zong hilou, hizongleh Jesu Khrist leh misi lah apat a Amah kaithoutu Pa Pathian vaanga hijaw in),
huleh ka umpih unau zousiahte’n, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte kawmah:
Pa Pathian leh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen,
Pathian leh i Pa uh deihdaan dungjuiin tulai hun giloutah lah apat ahung suahtaatsah theihna diingin Amah chu i sualnate uh luangin akipeta hi.
Pathian kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta hen. Amen.
Khrist hehpihna a nanguh hung koupa apat tanchinpha tuam a kintaha na kituan mei uh chu thumah ka sa hi,
huchu tanchinpha dang ahi sih; himahleh nanguh hung subuai leh Khrist tanchinpha ahilou jawnga hei uut mi hunkhop aum uhi.
Hizongleh keiuh hiin, vaan apat angel hitaleh, tanchinpha na kawmva ka soi uh loungaal tanchinpha dang mawngmawng na kawmva ahung soi aum leh, haamselohin um heh.
Tuma a ka soi mahbangun tuin zong ka soi jeel ahi, tanchinpha na muhsa peen uh loungaal tanchinpha dang mi koipouhin na kawmva ahung soi leh, haamselohin um heh.

Ajiahchu ke’n tuin mihing kipaahsah ahiai ka hawl, ahihlouhleh Pathian kipaahsah ahiai ka hawl? Ahihlouhleh mihing suhlungkim tum ka hiaimah? Mihing suhlungkim tum nalai hitaleng, Khrist suaah ka hi sih diing hi.
Hizongleh unaute, ka tanchinpha soi chu mihing deihdaan ahi sih chih ka hung hesah hi.
Ajiahchu mihing apat ka muh zong ahi sih a, mi hung hilh zong ka hi sih a, hizongleh Jesu Khrist hung kilaahna jiaha ka muh ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu bangtobanga Pathian kouhtuamte tehguallouha suduhdah a, ka suhbei veh tum daan tuma a Juda sahkhua a ka umlaiin ka tungtaang na jata uhi.
Huleh ka pulepate tawndaan a phatuam ka ngaih diaahkhol jiahin Juda sahkhua lamah zong ka chipihte laha ka khangual tampi ka na khuup hi.
Hizongleh ka nu gil sunga ka umlai apat hung koihtuamtu leh a hehpihna a hung koutu Pathian in,
Jentelte laha a tanchinpha ka soi theihna diinga a Tapa chu keimah a kilaahsah pha asah tahin; hulaiin mihing koima ka dong pah sih a,
Jerusalem a kei saanga apostol hi masate kawmah zong ka chiahtou sih a, hizongleh Arabia gam ah ka chiah jaw a, huin Damaska ah ka kilehkiitta hi.
Huin kum thum nungin Jerusalem ah Peter kimuhpih diingin ka chiahtou a, a kawmah ni sawmlengaa ka vaum hi.
Hizongleh Lalpa sanggampa Jakob chihlouh apostol dangte khatbeeh ka mu sih hi.
(Tua na kawmva ka thu gelhte, tahzetin, Pathian ma ah ka juau sih hi.)
Hu nungin Syria gamkaih leh Silisia gam ah ka chiahta hi.
Huleh Judia gam a Khrist a um kouhtuamte meelheetlouhin ka na um nalai hi.
Hizongleh, “Tuma a eiuh hung suduhdahpa’n khatvei laia asuhmang sawm ginna tanchinpha chu tuin ataangkoupihta,” chih thu chauh aja uhi.
Huleh amah un keimah jiahin Pathian apaahtawita uhi.
Huin kum sawmleli nungin Barnaba toh Jerusalem ah ka chiahtou kiit a, Tita zong ka pui hi.

Huleh kilaahna jiahin ka chiah tou a, Jentelte kawma ka tanchinpha soi chu a kawmvah ka hesah hi, hizongleh mi zahumte chu atuamin ka hilhchian a, huchilou inchu bangchi aha in athawna taai ka hi kha diing hi.
Hizongleh ka tonpih Tita chu Grikmi ahihvaangin zehtansah teeiteeiin aum sih hi.
Hi zehtanna thu ahung um jiah chu suaaha ahung taansah theihna diing va, Khrist Jesu a jaleenna i neih uh enkhe diinga guuhsima hung luut unau tahloute jiah ahi.
Tanchinpha thutah chu na kawmva aum zing theihna diingin daahkaal khat sung jiang zong a thu nuai va kipeluut lou ka hi uhi.
Hizongleh mizahumte chu bangtobang hitaleh uh kei diingin aphatuam sih; Pathian in koimah deihsah tuam anei sih, ajiahchu mi zahumte’n bangma ahung behlapsah tuan sih uhi.
Hizongleh huchih naah saangin, zehtante diing tanchinpha Peter kawma kepsaha aum bangin zehtanlouhte diing tanchinpha chu ka kawmah kepsahin aum chih ahe uhi.
(Ajiahchu zehtante apostol hi diinga Peter a sil nasataha bawltu ngeei in, Jentelte apostol hi diingin keimah ah sil nasatahin abawl a),

khuam chiha heet Jakob, Kepha leh Johan in ka kawma hehpihna hung kipia aheet phetun, Jentelte kawma chiah diingin kei leh Barnaba chu kipawlkhawmna khut jiatlam ahung pia uhi, huleh amahuh zehtante kawma chiah diingin.
Amah un migentheite ka heetzing diing uh chauh adeih va, huchu ke’n zong bawl ka tup zing mawng ahi.
Hizongleh Antiok a Peter ahung tun tahin amah chu dem abaang jiahin a maaitang ah ka na nial hi.
Ajiahchu Jakob kawm apat mi koite aha ahung maun, ama’n Jentelte kawmah an ane veu hi; hizongleh amahuh ahung tahun zehtante alauh jiahin anungtawl a, aumtuamta hi.
Huleh Judami dangteng zong huchibangin amah toh alepchiah va, huchiin Barnaba nasan zong a lepchiahna va puimangin aumta hi.

Hizongleh tanchinpha thutah dungjuiin aum sih uh chih ka muhin, a bawnva ma ah, Peter kawmah, “Nang Judami hinapi a, Judate um banga umlou a, Jentelte um banga na um ngaal leh, bang diinga Jentelte khu Judamite um banga umsah tum haam na hiaimah?
“Jentel misualte hilou a, keiuh pianken a Judami mawnga piangte in,

daan thute bawl jiahin mi siamtangin aum sih a, hizongleh Jesu Khrist gintaat jiah chauhin siamtangin aum chih ka he va, kei un zong daan silbawl jiah hilouin, Khrist ginna jiaha siamtanga ka um theihna diingin Khrist Jesu chu ka gingta uhi; ajiahchu daan juih jiahin koimah siamtangin aum sih diing hi.
“Hizongleh Khrist a siamtan ka sawm lai ngeei va zong misualte ka na hih uh leh, Khrist chu sualna natongtu ahiaimah? Hilou hial!
Ajiahchu keima’n ka sil suhsiatte bawlpha kiitta leng, kei leh kei daan botsetu a kisiam ka hi diing hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian lama ka hin theihna diingin, kei chu daan jiahin daan lamah ka sita hi.

Khrist toh kilhbehin ka umta a, keimah hing hi nawn louin, hizongleh Khrist keimah ah ahing ahijaw hi; huleh tua tahsa a ka hin chu ahung lungsiat a ka luanga kipepa, Pathian Tapa a ginna a hing ka hi.
Pathian hehpihna chu bangmalou ka suaahsah sih; ajiahchu daan jiaha siamtanna hung kuan ahihin chu, Khrist chu athawna si ahi diing hi,” ka chi hi.
Galatia mingolte aw, na lahva na mitmuh ngeeiva Jesu Khrist chu kilhbeha chiantaha suhlat hita a, hu thutah chu muanglou diinga koi in hung bumngol ahita ei?
Na lahva kipan hi chauh ka he nuam hi: daan thute bawl jiahin ahiai Hagau chu na muh uh, ahihlouhleh ginna thu na jaahva na gintaat jiahun?
Hichilawmin na ngol uh ahi maw? Hagau a pan zoutain, tahsa a suhbukim hi diing na hi uh maw?
Athawn ahih tahtah leh, sil huzahpi athawna thuaah na hi uh maw?
Huchiin daan na juih jiahva Pathian in Hagau hung pia a, na lahva silmah bawl ahi maw, ahihlouhleh na thujaah uh na gintaat jiahun?
“Abraham in Pathian agingta a, huchu amah diinga dihtatna a sehsah” ahih bangin.
Hujiahin ginna a umte chauh Abraham tate ahi uh chih he un.
Huleh Pathian Lehkhathu in, ginna jiahin Pathian in Jentelte siam atangsah diing chih helawhin, Abraham kawmah, “Nangmah ah nam zousiah vangpiaahin aum diing uh,” chiin tanchinpha anasoita hi.
Huchi ahih jiahin ginna a umte chu gingtu Abraham toh vangpiaah khawmin aum uhi.
Ajiahchu daan silbawlte a um photmahte chu haamse nuaia um ahi uh; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Daan bu a bawl diinga kigial zousiah juizing lou chu haamsiatin aum uhi,” chiin.
Hizongleh Pathian mitmuh ah koimah daan jaala siamtang aum sih uh chih alang chian hi, ajiahchu, “Midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing,” chih ahi.
Huleh daan thu chu ginna jiahin ahi sih a, hizongleh, “Huchibanga bawltu chu hute ah ahing diing hi,” chih ahijaw hi.
Khrist chu ei luanga haamsiat-a hung umin, daan thu haamsiatna apatin eite ahung tandohta hi, ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Singdawn a khailup photmah chu haamse thuaah ahi uh,” chiin,
huchia Abraham vangpiaahna chu Jesu Khrist jaala Jentelte tunga ahung um theih a, huchia eihaw in Hagau chiam chu ginna tungtawna i muh theihna diingun.
Unaute, mihing daan in ka soi ahi: Hichu mihing thuhun chauh hitamahleh, suhkip ahihin chu, koima’n aphel ngei sih a, beh zong abehlap ngei sih hi.
Huleh Abraham leh a chihaah kawmah thuchiamte chu anakipia hi. Ama’n tampite soina in, “Chihaahte kawmah,” achi sih a, mi khat tungthu soina in, “Na chihaah kawmah,” achi jaw hi, huchu Khrist ahi.
Huleh hichu ka soi ahi, Pathian in Khrist a asuhkipsa thuhun chu kum za li leh kum sawmthum nunga hung um daan thu in thuchiam chu bangmalou suaah diingin asumang thei sih hi.
Gouluah diing chu daan thu jiah hitaleh, thuchiam jiah ahita sih diing hi, hizongleh Pathian in thuchiam jiahin huchu Abraham anapeta hi.
Ahihleh bang diinga daan thu um ahiai leh? Hichu thuchiam kipiaahnate kawma Chihaah ahung masiah in bohsiatna jiahin behlapsahin aum hi, huleh hichu angelte zanga palai khat khut a suhkip ahi.
Huleh palai chu langkhat chauh luanga palai ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian chu khat ahi.
Ahihleh daan thu chu Pathian thuchiamte kalh ahiaimah? Hilou hial! Hinna pethei daan thu anakipia hitaleh, dihtatna chu daan thu jiahin aum ngeei diing hi.
Hizongleh Jesu Khrist gin jiaha thuchiam chu a gingtate akipiaah theihna diingin, Pathian Lehkhathu in mi zousiah chu sualna nuaiah akhaahkhumta hi.
Hizongleh ginna ahung tun main daan thu nuaia kolin i na um va, ahung kiphuanglang diing ginna ah khaahkhumin i naum uhi.
Huchiin ginna jiaha siam i tan theihna diingin daan thu chu Khrist kawma hung puitu diing eiuh hung hilhtu ahung hita hi.
Hizongleh ginna ahung tun nungin hilhtupa nuaiah i um nawnta sih uhi.
Ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ginna jiahin Pathian tate na hi uhi.
Ajiahchu Khrist a baptisma tang photmah chu Khrist a kithuam na hita uhi.
Hu ah chu Judami, Grikmi aum nawn sih a, saltaang leh jaleen zong aum nawn sih, huleh numei leh pasal zong aum nawn sih hi; ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ah pumkhat na hita uhi.
Huleh Khrist a na hih un chu, Abraham chihaah, thuchiam dungjui a gouluah diingte na hi uhi.
Huleh hichiin ka chi hi, gouluahtu diing chu bangkim neitu hizongleh naupang ahih laisiah, suaah toh kilimdanna anei tuan sih hi.
Hizongleh a pa hun guat atun masiahin a dontute leh a enkoltute nuaiah aum jaw hi.
Huchibangmahin ei zong naupang i hih laiun khovel lam kithuhilhna meimeite nuaiah suaahin i naum uhi.
Hizongleh ahun biching ahung tun tahin, Pathian in a Tapa chu ahung sawl a, daan nuaiah numei apat ahung piang hi,
daan nuaia umte tankhe diingin, huchia ta a pomna i tan theihna diingun.
Huleh tate na hih jiahun Pathian in a Tapa Hagau chu “Abba, Pa,” chia kikouin na lungtang sungvah ahung sawlta hi.
Hujiahin suaah na hi nawn sih a, ta na hijawta hi; huleh ta na hih leh, Khrist jaala Pathian gouluahtu diing zong nahi hi.
Huchi hitamahleh, hu hun laiin Pathian na heet maun, a pianken mawng va pathian hiloute nna nana tong uhi.
Hizongleh tua Pathian na hung heet nung va, ahihlouhleh Pathian heet mi na hung hihjawh nung va, bang diinga thubul jawngkhaal leh manlouhte suaah a luut kiit uut a, kiheikiit na hi viai?
Nite, hate, hunte leh kumte na tang veu uhi.
Bangchi ahain na tungvah ka tonggim thawn kha diing chih ka hung lausah hi.
Unaute, ka hung ngeen hi, keimah bangin um un, ajiahchu kei zong nanguh bangin ka um hi. Dihlouin na hung bawl kha het sih uhi.
Na kawmva tanchinpha ka soi masatnapeen chu ka tahsa haatlouhna tungtawnin ahi chih na he uhi.
Huleh ka tahsa a nanguh diinga je-etna um chu na musit sih va, nual zong na nual sih uh, hizongleh Pathian angel bang leh Khrist Jesu bang hialin na hung pom jaw uhi.
Ahihleh hampha na kisahna uh khoia um ahita ei? Ajiahchu hithei hileh bawn, na mit uh kheidohin na hung pe hial diing uh chih heetpihna ka hung nei hi.
Huchia thutah ka hung hilh jiahin na meelma uh hung hita ka hiaimah?
Amah un phatuamngaitahin nanguh ahung hawl va, hizongleh hoihna diingun ahi sih hi; nang un amahuh na hawl theihna diingva hung koihtuam tum ahijaw uhi.
Hizongleh bangchihtanin ahoih lama phatuamngaitaha hawla um zing chu ahoih hi, na kawmva ka um sung chauh hilouin.
Ka taneute aw, nanguh a Khrist siampichinga aum masiah nausuaah nat thuaahin ka hung thuaah kiit hi.
Tuin na kawmva um a, ka aw suah suhlimdang ka uut ngeei mei; ajiahchu na tung thu uh ka hung lauthawngpih hi.
Hung hilh un, nanguh daan nuaia um uutte, daan thu ngaikhe lou na hi viaimah?
Ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Abraham in tapa nih anei a: khat chu a suaahnu toh ahi a, huleh khatpeen chu a suaahlounu toh ahi.
Hizongleh suaahnu toh peen chu tahsa daan a piang ahi a, suaahlounu toh peen chu thuchiam jiaha piang ahi a,
hichu tehkhinna ahi. Ajiahchu hi numei nihte chu thuhun nihte ahi uh: khat chu Sinai Taang apat sala taang diinga ta neinu ahi a, huchu Hagar ahi.
Ajiahchu Hagar chu Arabia gam a Sinai Taang ahi a, tulaia um Jerusalem toh kibang ahi a, huleh a tate toh sala taang khawm ahi uhi.
Hizongleh tunglam Jerusalem chu ajaleen a, huchu i bawnva nu ahi.
Ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Nang, ta neiloua chiingnu, nuam in, nang nausuaah nat thuaahlou nu, ngaihtahin kikou doh in, ajiahchu pasal neinu saangin lungjuang nu in ta anei tamjaw hi.”
Huchiin unaute, eiuh chu Isak banga thuchiam tate i hi uhi.
Hizongleh hulaia tahsa daan a piang in Hagau daan a piang asuhduhdah bangin, tuin zong huchi ahi.
Ahihvaangin Pathian Lehkhathu in bang ahiai asoi? “Suaahnu chu a tapa toh delhmang un, ajiahchu suaahnu tapa in suaahlounu tapa toh gou aluahkhawm sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin unaute, suaahnu tate i hi sih a, suaahlounu tate i hijaw uhi.
Hujiahin jaleen diinga Khrist in ahung jaleensahta na ah dingkip unla, huleh suaah ngawngkol ah taang kiit nawn sih un.
Ngai un, zeh na tan uh leh, Khrist chu nanguh diinga bangma phatuam lou ahi diing, chiin kei Paul in na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
Ajiahchu zehtan zousiah kawmah daan thu zousiah jui diinga bat nei ahi uh, chih ka hesahkiit hi.
Nanguh daan a siamtan tum pouhmahte, Khrist toh khenin na umta uh; hehpihna apat na puuhta uhi.
Ajiahchu kei un Hagau jaalin ginna a dihtatna kinepna chu kilawptahin ka ngaah uhi.
Ajiahchu Jesu Khrist ah zehtan leh zehtan louhin bangmah phattuamna anei sih a, hizongleh lungsiatna jiaha ginna natoh chu aphatuam hi.
Hoihtahin na taai uhi. Thutah jui lou diingin koi in ahiai nanguh ahung daal?
Hi phuutna chu nanguh hung koupa apat ahi sih hi.
Tol tawmtakhat in tanghou beupi ajeelsuaah hi.
Nang un lungdang na geel sih diing uh chih Lalpa ah ka hung muang hi; hizongleh nanguh hung subuaitu in, koi hitazongleh, atunga vaihawmna chu athuaah diing hi.
Huleh unaute, ke’n zehtan thu soi nalai ka hih leh, bang diinga suhduhdahna thuaah nalai ka hiai? Huchi ahihleh kros a kipalpuuhna chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
Nanguh hung subuaite kisaatkhe hial mei leh uh ka uut hi!
Ajiahchu unaute, jaleen diinga kouh na hi uh; na jaleenna uh tahsa uutna diinga lemtaanna in zang sih unla, hizongleh lungsiatna in khat leh khat nna kitohsah jaw un.
Ajiahchu, “Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi,” chih thupiaah khat ah daan thu zousiah suhbukimin aum hi.
Hizongleh na kikeih va, na kineeh tuah uh leh, pilvaang un, huchilou inchu khat leh khat na kisuhmang tuah kha diing uhi!
Huleh hi ka soi ahi, Hagau ah um un, huchiin tahsa uutna na supiching sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsa uutna in Hagau adou a, Hagau in tahsa adou hi; sil na bawltumte uh na bawl theihlouhna diingun, hite chu akikalh tuah uh ahi.
Hizongleh Hagau puia na um un chu, daan nuaia um na hi sih uhi.
Huleh tahsa uutna silbawlte chu akilang chiang hi: hute chu, aangkawmna, kingaihna thaanghuai, thaanghuaina, huuhna kihdah huai,
milem biahna, dawi aisaanna, muhdahna, kihauna, thangsiatna, thangtawmna, mahni masialna, kikhenna, ginna dihloute,

deihgohna, tualthahna, zukhamna, eltol gualnop bawlna leh huchibang dang dangte ahi. Huchibang silbawltute’n Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uh, chih tuma a ka hung hilhtaah bangmahin, ka hung hilh khawl hi.
Hizongleh Hagau gah ahihleh lungsiatna, kipaahna, hamuanna, thuaahtheihna, jaineemna, hoihna, ginumna,
thunuaigolhna leh kisuumtheihna ahi. Hichibangte kalhin daan aum sih hi.
Huleh Khrist a hi mite’n tahsa chu a lunggulhna leh a uutna toh akilhbehta uhi.
Hagau a hing i hih leh, Hagau mah ah i um diing uhi.
Khat leh khat kilang leh kithangsiat a um louin, i kiloupisah sih diing uhi.
Unaute, mi koiaha a suhkhelhna a matdoha aum leh, nanguh hagau mite’n nanguh ngeei in zong heemna na tuaah kha diing chih ngaihtuahin, huchibang mi chu jaineemna lungsim neitahin tungding kiit un.
Khat leh khat na puaahgih uh kidawn chiat unla, huchiin Khrist daan juikim un.
Ajiahchu mi bangma hiloupi-a amah leh amah akingaihsang leh, amah leh amah akiheem ahi.
Hizongleh mi chin in amah natoh kietchian chiat jaw hen, huchiin midang tung hilouin, amah chauh tungah suan diing anei diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi chin in amah puaah chiat akipuaah diing hi.
Thu hilha umpa’n ahilhtu kawmah sil hoih zousiah hawm heh.
Heemin um sih un, Pathian chu muhsit gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu mi’n atuh phot uh, humah chu a-at kiit diing uhi.
Ajiahchu tahsa lama tuhpa’n tahsa lam apat siatna a-at diing a, hizongleh Hagau a tuhpa’n chu Hagau apat kumtuang hinna a-at diing hi.
Huleh sil hoih bawl i chimtaah sih diing uh, ajiahchu i lungkiaah louh leh, ahuntahin i aat diing uhi.
Hujiahin hun lemtaang i neih bangjeelin mi zousiah kawmah sil hoih i bawl diing uh, adiaahkholin ginna a i innkuanpihte kawmah i bawl diing uhi.
Keimah khut ngeei a na kawmva jeem gol pipi a lehkha ka hung gelh en un.
Tahsa a kilat hoih tum photmahte’n zehtan diingin nanguh ahung sawl teeiteei uhi; huchia Khrist kros jiaha suhduhdahna athuaah louhna diing jiah chauhun ahi.
Ajiahchu amahuh zehtante nasan in zong daan ajui tuan sih va, hizongleh na tahsa va suan diing aneih theihna diingun zeh tan leh uh chin chih adeih uh ahijaw hi.
Hizongleh ke’n chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kros loungaal ka suang het sih diing hi, Amah jiahin khovel kei diingin kilhbeh ahita a, huleh kei khovel diingin kilhbeh ka hita hi.
Ajiahchu Khrist Jesu ah chu siamthahna loungaal, zehtan leh zehtanlouh zong, bangmah aphatuam sih hi.
Huleh hi daan banga umte zousiah tungah hamuanna leh khotuahna um hen, huleh Pathian Israelte tungah zong.
Tua kipanin koima’n hung subuai nawn sih heh, ajiahchu ka tahsa ah Lalpa Jesu chiamtehnate ka pua hi.
Unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na hagau uh kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihjawng a Jesu Khrist apostol in, Ephesi khua a um misiangthoute leh Khrist Jesu a mi ginumte kawmah:
Pathian i Pa uh leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Vaan munte a Khrist a hagaulam vangpiaahna chinteng a vaang hung pepa i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian leh Pa chu phatin um hen.
Ama’n a ma a siangthou leh soiseelbeia i um theihna diinga leilung siam ma a lungsiatna a Khrist a ahung na teel dungjui in,
Amah hung deihsahna hoih deihjawng dungjuiin Amah a diingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna ta a eite hung bawl diingin ahung na guatlawhta hi,
a hehpihna loupidaan paahtawi diingin, hu hehpihna chu alungsiat mahmahpa ah athawnin ahung peta hi.
A hehpihna hauhdaan dungjuiin a sisan jaalin Amah ah tatkhiahna, i sualnate ngaihdamna i nei uhi,
hu hehpihna chu Ama’n pilna leh lemheetna zousiah ah eite tungah akiningchingsah a,
Ama’n ahung deihsahna hoih dungjuia Amah a bawl atup bangin a deihjawng thukiphual i kawmah ahung hesah hi,
huchia hunbi khenna kim ahung tun chianga vaan a sil umte leh leitung a sil umte Amah ah, a bawna Khrist a khat a asuhtuahkhawm theihna diingin.
Amah deihjawng lemguatna dungjui a sil zousiah bawlpa tup banga guatlawhsa i hihtaah jiahun, Amah ah gouluahtute zong i hita uhi,
huchia eiuh Khrist a anakineem masate chu a loupina paahtawina i hih theihna diingun.
Thutah thu, na hutdamna tanchinpha uh na ngaihkhiah nungun Amah ging zong na gingtata va; Amah na gingtaat nungun chiamna Hagau Siangthou a chiamchih na hita uhi,
Hagau Siangthou chu Pathian loupina paahtawina diinga gou leisa tatkhiahna hun masiah a diinga i gouluah diing uh khaamna ahi.
Hujiahin ke’n zong Lalpa Jesu a na ginna uh leh misiangthoute zousiah tunga na lungsiatna uh ka na jaahin,
ka haamteinate ah na min uh louin, nanguh jiaha kipaahthu soi ka tawp sih hi,
huchia i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian, loupina Pa in Amah heetna lam thu a pilna leh thuphuandohna hagau nanguh ahung piaah theihna diingin.
A kouhna kinepna bang ahiai chih leh misiangthoute a a goutan loupina hauhjia bang ahiai chih na heet theihna diingun, na lungsim mitte uh suhvaaha ahung um theihna diingin ka haamtei hi,
huleh a silbawltheihna haatna natoh dungjuia ei agingtate lama a silbawltheihna nasat daan bang ahiai na hung heet theihna diingun,
hu silbawltheihna chu Ama’n misi lah apat a Khrist akaihthoh a huleh vaan munte a a jiatlam a atousah laiin Khrist tungah azangta hi,
hi khovel chauh hilouin, khovel hung tung diing ah zong- lalnate, thuneihnate, silbawltheihnate, vaihawmnate leh min kiphuaah zousiah tunglam peh a Khrist atousah laiin azangta hi.
Huleh sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah Pathian in akoihta a, Amah chu sil zousiah tunga lutang hi diingin kouhtuam kawmah apeta hi,
hu kouhtuam chu a sapum ahi, Amah bangkim zousiah sudimpa taangchinna ngeei chu.
Huleh nanguh na bohsiatna uh leh na sualna vah na sita va,
hutah ah chu tuma laiin hi khovel daan bangin na um va, huihkhua a thuneitu lal, tua thumanglou tate a tong zingtu hagau daan bangin na um uhi.
Hute lahah eiuh zong tuma laiin i tahsa uutna ah, i tahsa leh i lungsim deihjawng supichingin i um va, huleh midangte banga pianken mawnga thangtawmna tate i na hi uhi.
Hizongleh Pathian khotuahna haupa’n, a lungsiatna nasatah a eite ahung lungsiatna jiahin,
sual a si i hih lai ngeeiun zong Khrist toh ahung suhing khawmta a (hehpihna a hutdam na hi uhi),
huleh Amah toh ahung kaithou khawmta a, vaan munte ah Khrist Jesu ah ahung toukhawmsahta hi,
huchia hun hung tung diingte ah Khrist Jesu jaala i tunga a chitna a a hehpihna hauh nasatdaan ahung etsah theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu hehpihna jiaha ginna jaala hutdam na hi uh, hu zong nanguh a suaah ahi sih; Pathian silthawnpiaah ahi,
natoh jiahin ahi sih, huchilou inchu mi’n asuang kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in malai peha i umna diinga anaguatkholh Khrist Jesu a nna hoih tong diinga siam, Amah khutsuaah i hi uhi.
Hujiahin nanguh tuma lam a, tahsa a Jentelte, tahsa khut a tan Zehtan achihte un Zehtanlouh ahung chihte uh,
huchih laia Khrist neiloua Israel khua leh tui toh kimat lou a, khovel a kinepna bei leh Pathian neiloua na um va, chiamna thuhunte laha mikhual a ana-um na hi uh chih hezing un.
Hizongleh tuin chu Khrist Jesu ah, nanguh ni danga gamlapi a umte, Khrist sisan jaalin suhnaiin na umta uhi.
Ajiahchu Amah hi i kilemna uh ahi a, i kikaal a kidaaidanna baang chu suchimin, nihte chu pumkhatin asiamta hi.
Ei mihing pawl nihte apat mihing thah khat Amah ngeei a asiam theihna diingin, kimeelmaatna umsahtu daan, a sung a thupiaahte leh thusehte zousiah a tahsa a sumangin, kilemna abawlta hi,
huleh huchia Ama’n anih va kros tungtawna sapum khat a Pathian toh akilepsah theih a, humah a kimeelmaatna chu asuhlup theihna diingin.
Huleh Amah chu hungin, nanguh gamlapi a umte leh naitakhat a umte kawmah zong lemna tanchinpha ahung soi hi.
Ajiahchu Amah jiahin eihaw in Hagau khat a Pa kawma luut theihna i nei tuaah uhi.
Hujiahin tuin chu mikhual leh gamdangmi na hi nawn sih va, hizongleh misiangthoute toh khualetui hihna neite leh Pathian innkuante na hijawta uhi,
huleh Jesu Khrist ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen hiin, apostolte leh zawlneite innbul phuh tunga lam na hi uhi.
Amah ah chu inn pumpi kituaahtaha suhtuaha umin, Lalpa ah biahinn siangthou in akhangtou a,
Amah ah nanguh zong Hagau a Pathian teenna diinga lepkhawm na hi uhi.
Hikhu jiahin kei, Paul, nanguh Jentelte diinga Jesu Khrist suangkul taang in,
nanguh diinga Pathian hehpihna keem diinga mohpuaahna piaah ka hi chih na jaahtaah ngeei uh leh,
huchu tuma a tomtakhat a ka gelh bangin thukiphual chu ka kawma Ama’n thuphuandoh tungtawna ahung heetsahtaah daan ahi a,
huchu na sim chiangun Khrist thukiphual ka heetdaan na hesiam diing uh;
huchu tulaia apostol siangthoute leh zawlneite kawma Hagau a heetsaha aum bangin, nidanglaiin mihing tate kawmah heetsahin aum ngei sih hi:
huchia Jentelte chu sapum khat a hiangtanpih gouluahpihte leh tanchinpha jiaha Khrist ah a thuchiam tanpihte ahih diing uh chu;
hukhu ah Pathian silbawltheihna natoh jiaha Pathian hehpihna silpiaah ka kawma hung kipeta khu dungjuiin kei chu hu tanchinpha natongtu a siam ka hita hi.
Jentelte kawma Khrist hauhsat daan hawldoh seeng guallouh thute soi diinga misiangthoute zousiah laha neupeen saanga neujaw kei kawmah hi hehpihna chu piaah ahi,
huleh kumtuang apat a Jesu Khrist manga sil zousiah siamtu Pathian a phuala um thukiphual kipawlkhawmna chu mi zousiah musah diingin;
huchia tua vaan munte a lalnate leh thuneihnate kawmah Pathian pilna chinteng kouhtuam tungtawna heetsaha aum theihna diingin,
Ama’n i Lalpa uh Khrist Jesu a asuhbuchingtaah a kumtuang silguat dungjuiin,
Amah ginna jiahin eihaw’n Amah ah haansanna leh muangtaha luut theihna i nei uhi.
Hujiahin nanguh diinga ka gimthuaahte jiaha lungke lou diingin ka hung ngeen hi, huchu na loupina uh ahi.
Hikhu jiahin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa ma ah ka khuupdin a,
lei leh vaan a innkuan chinteng in a min uh alaahnapa uh Amah ma ah,
huchia Ama’n a loupina hauhdaan bang jeela a Hagau jiaha mihing sungnung lama silbawltheihna a suhhaata nanguh ahung umsah theihna diingin;
huchia Khrist chu ginna tungtawna na lungtang va ateen theihna diingin; huleh huchia nanguh lungsiatna a zungha leh kiptaha um a,
misiangthoute zousiah toh a letdaan, a saudaan, a saandaan leh a thuuhdaante na heetchian theihna diing uh leh
Khrist lungsiatna heetphaah guallouh na hung heet va, Pathian taangchinna zousiah a suhdima na um theihna diingun ahi.
Huchiin eimah a tongjeel silbawltheihna dungjuia i nget leh i ngaihtuah saanga loupijaw a bawl theipa kawmah,
Khrist Jesu jiahin kouhtuam ah kumtuangin akhang akhang in loupina Amah kawmah umta hen. Amen.
Hujiahin kei, Lalpa a suangkul taang in kouha na umna uh toh kiphuutawha gamta diingin ka hung hasot ahi,
kingaihngiamna leh thunuaigolhna zousiah toh, thuaahtheihna toh, lungsiatna a khat leh khat kithuaahzoutuah chiat diingin,
lemna gui a kaan khawma Hagau kipumkhatna chu theihtawpsuaha vom tinten diingin.
Kouh na hih laiva kinepna khat a kouh na hih bangmahun sapum khat leh Hagau khat aum a;
Lalpa khat, ginna khat, baptisma khat,
bangkim tunga um leh bangkim a um, huleh nanguh zousiah a um Pathian khat leh mi zousiah Pa khat aum hi.
Hizongleh Khrist silthawnpiaah tehna dungjuiin hehpihna chu i kawm chiat ah piaahin aum hi.
Hujiahin, “Ama’n tunglam a akal touhin matte chu sal in apui a, huleh mihingte kawmah silpiaahte apia hi,” chiin asoi hi.
(Huchiin, “Amah akaltou,” chih chu lei mun ngiampeente ah amasain akumsuhta chihlouh bang dang chihna adiai?
A kumsuhpa chu sil zousiah asuhbukim theihna diinga vaan zousiah tungpeh a kaltoupa mah ahi.)
Huleh Ama’n khenkhatte chu apostol, khenkhatte zawlnei, khenkhatte sawlleh, khenkhatte pastor leh thuhilhtu hihna apia a,
huchu thunatohna diinga misiangthoute kithopna diing leh Khrist sapum bawlhoihna diing ahi a,
ginna lama kituaahna leh Pathian Tapa heetna lama pichingna, Khrist taangchinna dungtan i phaah chiat masiah va diinga hung kipia ahi;
huchia thuhilhna huih chinteng in amuutleeng lehleh, mihingte lepchiahna a doha jeheemna in amuutleeng lehleh naupang i hih nawn louhna diingun.
Himahleh lungsiatna a thutah soiin, sil zousiah ah Amah a i khantouh theihna diingun Amah chu lutang ahi, Khrist ngeei chu.
Amah apatin sapum pumpi, guhtuah chinteng in sahiang dangteng natohna hoihtah apiaah daan dungjuia zopkhawm leh khaikhawma umin, sapum chu lungsiatna a kibawlhoihna diingin akhangsah hi.
Hujiahin hi ka soi a, Lalpa ah ka hung hesah hi, lungsim umjebei pua a Jentelte ahin bangun um nawn sih un;
a heetsiamna uh suhmiala umin, amahuh a heetlouhna aum jiah leh a lungtang uh angon jiahin Pathian hinna apat khenin aum uhi;
amah un heettheihna mawngmawng aneih nawn louh jiahun sil sianglou chinteng huaihamtaha bawl diingin huuhna kihdahhuai ah akipumpiaahta uhi.
Hizongleh nang un chu Khrist thu huchibangin na jil sih uh,
Jesu a thutah aum banga Amah thu ja a Amah thuhilh a um na hih photmah uh leh,
na nidanglai umdaan va mihing lui, heemna duhgawlna dungjuia se deuhdeuh chu hawhkhia unla,
huleh na lungsim hagau uh suthah un;
huleh hu mihing thah, dihtatna dih leh siangthouna a Pathian batpiha siama um chu silh un.
Hujiahin juau soi tawpsanin, “Mi chin in a innveengte kawmah thutah soi chiat heh,” ajiahchu eihaw khat leh khat kihiangtuah chiat i hi uhi.
“Lungthah unla, sual chu sual sih un”: na lungthahna uh ni in tum khum sih heh.
Diabol zong mun ot sih un.
Guta in gu nawn sih henla, hizongleh tasam kawma piaah diing aneih theihna diingin a khut a sil hoih bawlin tonggim jaw heh.
Na kam vapat thusia pawt sih henla, hizongleh a ngaikhetute kawma hehpihna apiaah theihna diingin khantouhna diingin thuhoih pawt jaw heh.
Huleh Pathian Hagau Siangthou sulungngai sih un, tatna ni a diinga Amah a chiamchih na hi uhi.
Khaatnate, thangtawmnate, lungthahnate, haannate leh kisoisiatnate chu giitlouhna zousiah toh na lah vapat koihmangin umta heh.
Huleh khat leh khat kingaaina tuah chiat unla, lungneem unla, Pathian in Khrist a nanguh ahung ngaihdam bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kingaidam tuah chiat un.
Hujiahin ta deihtahte bangin Pathian entontute hi un.
Khrist in ahung lungsiat a eiuh diinga Pathian kawma silpiaah leh kithoihna namtuui diinga akilat bangin lungsiatna ah um un.
Hizongleh misiangthoute umdaan diinga kilawm him in, kingaihna thaanghuaite leh bolhhohna zousiah, huaihamna toh, na lahvah lohkhaahin um sih heh.
Zahmohthute, thu ngolhuai a houlimte, chiamnuih thaanghuaite na lahvah um sih henla, hute saangin kipaahthu soi jaw un.
Ajiahchu nulepa kaal a thaanghuaite, siangthouloute leh mihuaihamte’n (hu mi chu milem bia ahi) Khrist leh Pathian lalgam ah tan mawngmawng anei sih uh chih na he uhi.
Mi kuamah in thu meimei pouh in hung heem sih uh heh, ajiahchu hi silte jiahin Pathian thangtawmna chu thumanglou tate tungah atung hi.
Hujiahin amahuh kithuahpih sih un.
Ajiahchu nanguh tuma laiin mial na hi va, hizongleh tuin chu Lalpa ah vaah na hita uhi. Vaah tate bangin um un,
ajiahchu Hagau gah ahihleh hoihna chinteng leh dihtatna leh thutah ah ahi,
Lalpa deihjawng bang ahiai chih enchian un.
Huleh gah neilou mial natohte toh kithuah khawmna nei sih unla, hizongleh adihlouh daan uh taahlang jaw un.
Ajiahchu aguuha a silbawlte uh chu asoi zong azumhuai hi.
Hizongleh sil zousiah adihlouh daan uh vaah in ataahlat chiangin muhtheihin aum uh, ajiahchu sil sulang photmah chu vaah ahi.
Hujiahin Ama’n, “Nang ihmu khanglou inla, misi lah apatin thou in, huchiin Khrist in ahung salhvaah diing hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin na umdaan uh pilvaang un, mingolte banga umlouin hizongleh mipilte bangin um un,
nite ahoih louh jiahin hun chu aphatuam theipeenin zang un.
Hujiahin ngol sih unla, hizongleh Lalpa deihjawng bang ahiai chih hesiam jaw un.
Huleh zukhamin um sih un, hu ah chu kisuumlouhna aum hi; hizongleh Hagau a dimin um jaw un;
phatna late, Pathian late leh hagaulam late a nanguh leh nanguh kihouin, na lungtang vah Lalpa diingin ging kilawm toh la sa un;
bangkim tungah i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in Pathian leh Pa kawmah kipaahthu soi ngiitngeet un;
Pathian launa ah khat leh khat kituluut tuah chiat un.
Jite haw, Lalpa kawma bangin na pasalte chiat uh nuaiah kituluut un.
Ajiahchu Khrist chu kouhtuam lutang ahih a, sapum Hundampa ahih bangin, pasal chu ji lutang ahi.
Hujiahin kouhtuam chu Khrist nuaia akituhluut mahbangin, jite chu silbangkim ah a pasalte chiat uh nuaiah kituluut uh heh.
Pasalte haw, Khrist in kouhtuam alungsiat a, a luang a akipiaah bangin, nang un zong na jite uh lungsiat un,
huchiaAma’n a kouhtuam chu thu tungtawna tui a sawp a asawpsiang theihna diingin,
huchia kouhtuam buaahbaanglou, meelhemlou leh huchibang mawngmawng umlou, hizongleh kouhtuam siangthou leh soisiat bei loupitah chu Amah akipiaah theihna diingin.
Hujiahin pasalte’n chu amahuh sapum ngeei bangin a jite chiat uh alungsiat diing uh ahi. A ji lungsiatpa chu amah leh amah kilungsiat ahi.
Ajiahchu kuama’n amah tahsa ahaw ngei sih, hizongleh Lalpa’n kouhtuam achawm a adeihthoh bangin, achawmin adeihthoh jaw hi.
Ajiahchu eite chu Amah sapum leh tahsa leh guh hiangte i hi uhi.
“Hi jiahin pasal in a pa leh a nu anuse diinga huleh a ji ah abehta diing a, huleh anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh.”
Hichu thukiphual loupitah ahi, hizongleh ke’n chu Khrist leh kouhtuam thu ahi ka soi.
Banghitaleh na lahva koipouhin amah akilungsiat bangin a ji lungsiat heh, huleh ji chu a pasal zahtaat diingin pilvaang heh.
Naupangte haw, Lalpa ah na nulepate uh thu mang un, ajiahchu hichu sildih ahi.
“Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,” huchu chiam nei thupiaah masapeen ahi,
“huchiin nang a diingin ahoih diinga huleh leitung ah na damsawt diing hi.”
Huleh nanguh pate haw, na tate uh sulungthah sih un, hizongleh Lalpa thununna leh thuhilhna in keem piching jaw un.
Suaahte haw, Khrist thu na man bangun lau leh kiliing pumin lungsiangtahin tahsa lama na pute uh thu mang un;
mihing kipaahsah diinga mitmei chauh veeng hilouin, Khrist suaah banga lungtang apat Pathian deihjawng bawl jawin.
Mihing kawma hilouin, Lalpa kawma natong bangin thanuamtahin tong un,
ajiahchu mi chin in, suaah hiin suaahlou hitaleh, sil hoih abawl phot uh Lalpa kawm apatin humah amu kiit diing uh chih na he uhi.
Huleh nanguh pute haw, nanguh ngeei Pu zong vaan ah aum chih hein, huleh Ama’n mi deihsahtuam anei sih chih hein huchibangmahin a kawmvah bawl unla, vaubawl sih un.
Atawppeenin ka unaute, Lalpa ah leh a haatna silbawltheihna ah haattahin um un.
Diabol jeheemnate na douzoh theihna diingun Pathian gaalthuam bukim in kithuam un.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh i dou uh chu tahsa leh sisan ahi sih a, hizongleh lalnate, thuneihnate, hi khovel mial tunga vaihawmtute leh huihkhua a hagau gilou umte ahijaw uhi.
Hujiahin ni hoihlou a na douzohna diing uh leh na bawlzoh veh nungva zong na din theihna diingun Pathian gaalthuam bukim la un.
Hujiahin na kawng uh thutah a gaahin, dihtatna awmphaw silhin,
lemna tanchinpha kisahkhawlna chu na keeng va butin ding un.
Hi teng baanah, ginna lum la un, hukhu in giloupa thaltang kuang thei zousiah na sumit thei diing uhi.
Huleh hutdamna siihlukhuh la unla, huleh Hagau naamsau, huchu Pathian thu ahi a, la un.
Haamteina leh ngetna chinteng in bangchihlaipouhin Hagau a haamtei zinga umin, misiangthoute zousiah diingin thuaahhaatna leh ngetsahna toh ngaihsah zingin um un.
Huleh tanchinpha thukiphual hesah diinga hangsantah a ka kam ka kaah a, thusoitheihna piaaha ka um theihna diingin hung haamteisah un,
hu diinga palai siihkolbut ka hi ngaala, huchia hu lampang ka soi diing banga hangsantaha ka soi theihna diingin.
Hizongleh nang un zong bangchibanga ka um leh ka tanchin na heet theihna diingun, Lalpa a unau deihtah leh thunatongtu ginum Tikika in bangkim nanguh ahung hesah diing hi.
Ka tanchin uh na heetna diing uh leh na lungtang uh ahung hamuan theihna diingin amah na kawmvah ka hung sawl ahi.
Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist apat hamuanna, huleh lungsiatna toh ginna chu unaute kawmah um hen.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist chihtahtaha lungsiatte zousiah kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Paul leh Timothi, Jesu Khrist suaahte’n, Philippi khua a um Khrist Jesu a misiangthou zousiah kawma leh kouhtuam houtute leh dikonte kawmah:
I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Nanguh ka hung geeldoh chintengin ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Na bawnva diinga ka haamteina chinteng ah kipaahtahin ka hung haamteisah hi,
akipat ni apat tuni tanpha a tanchinpha a na hung kipawlkhawmpihna uh jiahin,
na sungva nna hoih pantu in, Jesu Khrist ni tanphain huchu abawl mualsuaah ngeei diing chih dettahin ka muang hi.

Na bawnva tungtaang thu a keima’n hichibang lungsim ka neih chu adih mawng ahi, ajiahchu nanguh ka lungtang ah ka hung vom zing hi, ka kolbuhna leh tanchinpha suhkipna leh kepna ah hehpihna ka tanpihte na hih vehtaah jiahun.
Ajiahchu Jesu Khrist lainatna in nanguh na bawnun ka hung ngai mahmah chih chu Pathian in ahung heetpih ahi.
Huleh heetna leh heetkhenna zousiah a na lungsiatna uh ahung tam seemseem theihna diingin ka haamtei a,
huchia sil hoih mahmahte na hung heet theih va, Khrist ni tana mi chihtah leh dembei na hung hih theihna diingun,
Pathian loupina leh paahtawina diinga Jesu Khrist jaala um dihtatna gah a na dim jiahun.
Hizongleh unaute, ka tunga siltungte hi tanchinpha dalh seemna diinga hung tung ahi chih na heet uh ka deih hi.
Huchiin Praitoriam veengtute zousiah leh midang zousiah kawmah Khrist a ka kolbuhna chu alangchianta hi.
Huleh Lalpa a unau tamtah in ka kolbuh jiahin lauloutah leh hangsantaha Pathian thu chu soi diingin kimuanna aneita uhi.
Khenkhatte’n chu thangsiatna leh kinialna jiahin Khrist ataangkoupih va, khenkhatte’n lungsim dihtah puain asoi uhi.
Amasate’n chu ka kolbuh a thuaahna behlapsah tumin lungsim dih toh hilouin, mahni masialna in Khrist ataangkoupih uhi.
Hizongleh anunungte’n chu tanchinpha gum diinga guat ka hihdaan hein, lungsiatna jiahin asoi uhi.
Bang akhawh ei? Lam chinteng ah aheem hiin atah hitaleh, Khrist chu taangkoupihin aumta himhim ahi. Huleh hutah ah chu ka kipaah hi. Ahi, ka kipaah diing hi.
Ajiahchu hikhuh in na haamteina uh leh Jesu Khrist Hagau panpihna jaalin ka suahtaatna ahung suaah ngeei diing chih ka he hi,

ka lamet mahmah leh ka kinepna dungjuiin bangma ah suhzumin ka um sih diing hi, hizongleh ka bawl zing bangmahin, tuin chu ka hin in zong, ka sih in zong, Khrist chu ka sapum ah hangsanna zousiah toh suhloupiin aum diing hi.
Ajiahchu kei diingin hin Khrist ahi a, sih chu punna ahi.
Hizongleh tahsa in hing leng kei diingin tohgimna gahsuahna ahi diing hi; ahiinlah khoipeen ka teel jaw diai chih ka he sih hi.
Ajiahchu nih saikaahin chih diing jaw saang helouin ka um hi, chiahmanga Khrist kawma um uutna ka nei a, huchu ahoihjaw mahmah hi.
Ahiinlah tahsa a um chu nanguh jiahin apoimoh jaw hi.
Huleh hi muanna neiin, na ginna uh khanletna diing leh na ginna va na kipaahna diingun nanguh zousiah toh ka um zing phot diing chih ka he hi.
Huchia na kawmva ka hung kiitna jiah a, kei diinga Jesu Khrist a na kipaahna uh atamseem theihna diingin.

Hunga nanguh ka hung muh ahiai, ahihlouhleh ka um louh a zong hagau khat a na dinkip daan uh leh lungsim khat nei a, tanchinpha thuginna a na pan daan uh tanchin ka jaah theihna diingin, na umdaan uh leh Khrist tanchinpha kituaahsah phot un,
huleh bangma ah na meelmate uh suhlauin um sih un, huchu amahuh diinga manthaaina chiamchihna ahi a, hizongleh nanguh diingin chu hutdamna ahi a, huchu Pathian akipan ahi.
Ajiahchu Khrist jiaha nang un Amah na gintaat chauh uh hilou a, Amah vaanga thuaah zong na thuaah diing uh ahi chih piaah na hi uhi,
keimah a hahsatna na muhsa bang uh leh tua keimah a hahsatna na jaah bang uh, nang un zong na nei uhi.
Hujiahin Khrist a kihehnepna bang, kilungsiatna hamuanna bang, Hagau a kipawlkhawmna bang, kilainatna leh kikhotuahna bang aum leh,
lungsim kibanga umin, lungsiatna kibang neiin, tup kibang leh lungsim mun khat neia umin ka kipaahna subukim un.
Kinialna aha, ahihlouhleh kiloupisahna jiah aha in bangmah bawl hi sih heh, hizongleh lungsim ngiamtahin mi chin in amah saangin midang hoihjawin ngai chiat heh.
Na lahva mi koipouh in amah lawhna diing chauh en sih henla, hizongleh midang lawhna diing zong en uh heh.
Khrist Jesu a zong um hi lungsim chu nanguh ah um heh,
Amah chu Pathian banga um hiin, Pathian toh kibanga um chu sil khiahlah huaiin angaihtuah sih a,
hizongleh Amah chu hung kikoihngiamin, suaah bangin ahung um a, mihing banga siamin ahung um hi.
Huleh mihing limlemeel bang hung puain, ahung kingaingiam a, sihna tanphain thu ahung mang hi, kros sihna ngeei chu.
Hujiahin Pathian in zong Amah chu nasatahin atawisangta a, min lahlah a min tungnungpeen apeta hi,
huchia vaan a umte, lei a umte leh lei nuaia umte khuup chinteng Jesu min a akhuupdin va,
huleh lei chinteng in Jesu Khrist chu Pa Pathian loupina diinga Lalpa ahi chih aphuan theihna diingun.
Hujiahin ka deihtahte, thu na man gige bangmahun, ka um peet chiang chauh hilouin, tua ka umlouh lai diaahkholin, lau leh liing pumin na hutdamna chiat uh tongdoh un,
ajiahchu Amah hung deihsahna hoih bawl diinga nanguh hung uutsahtu leh hung bawlsah diinga natongtu chu Pathian ahi hi.
Sil zousiah phun lou leh nial louin bawl un,
huchia khang paisual leh lungsim kawite laha khovel a vaahte banga na taannate uh laha dembaanglou leh poikhoihlou, soiseelbei Pathian tate na hih theihna diingun,
huchia Khrist ni chianga keimah in athawnin ka taai sih a, huleh athawnin ka tonggim sih chia ka kipaah theihna diingin, hinna thu chu tudet un.
Ahi, na ginna va hung tung sillat natoh tunga dawn diing sillat banga sunbuaahin um zongleng, ka nuam a huleh nanguh zousiah toh ka kipaah hi.
Hukhu jiah mahin nanguh zong kipaah unla, huleh kei hung kipaahpih un.
Hizongleh na tanchin uh ka heet chianga kei zong suhhaat-a ka um theihna diingin, Timothi na kawmva hung sawl pah diingin Lalpa Jesu ah ka kineem hi.
Ajiahchu lungsim munkhat pua huchibanga na umdaan uh hung ngaihtuah diing awm koima ka nei sih hi.
Ajiahchu mi zousiah in Jesu Khrist silte hawllouin amahuh a diing chiat ahawlta uhi.
Hizongleh tapa in a pa nna atoh bangin, ama’n chu tanchinpha ah kei ahung tohpih chih amah heetchianna na nei uhi.
Hujiahin bangchibanga ka um diing ka heetchian hunhun in amah hung sawlkhiah pah ka kineem hi.
Hizongleh keimah ngeei zong ka hung pah diing chih Lalpa ah ka gingta hi.
Ahiinlah ka sanggam leh natohpih leh sepaihpih, huleh na sawlleh uh leh ka taahsapna a hung kithuahpihtu Epaphrodita na kawmva hung sawl kiphamoh ka sa hi;
ajiahchu na bawnun ahung ngai mahmah a, huleh a damlouh thu na jaah jiahun alungkham mahmah hi.
Ajiahchu si dehtahin achina ngeei mah hi; hizongleh Pathian in ahehpih hi, huleh amah chauh hilouin kei zong ahung hehpih hi, huchilou hileh, lungkhamna tungah lungkhamna ka nei sawn diing hi.
Hujiahin amah na muh kiit chiangva na kipaah va, kei lungkhamna zong adaih deuhna diingin amah chu khawhsatahin ka hung sawl hi.
Hujiahin amah chu Lalpa ah kipaahtahin anapom unla, huleh hutobang mite chu zahna sangtah pia un,
ajiahchu kei diinga na hung tohsah khaahlouhte uh suhkimna diingin, Khrist natohna ah ama’n chu a hinna zong khawhsa louin anasi dehtah hi.
Atawppeenin, ka unaute, Lalpa ah kipaah un. Angeimah gelh chu kei diingin abuaihuai sih a, hizongleh nanguh diingin ahoihjaw hi.
Uite lahah kiveeng un, silgilou bawlte lahah kiveeng un, tahsa ki-atte lahah kiveeng un.
Ajiahchu eiuh chu hagau a Pathian bia zehtante i hi uh, huleh Khrist Jesu ah i nuam mahmah va, huleh tahsa ah chu suan diing i nei sih uhi,
tahsa lamah zong suan diing neithou himahzongleng. Midang koiaha in tahsa lama suan diing neia akingaihtuahin chu, ke’n ka nei seem hi:
ni giat ni a zehtan, Israel chi, Benjamin phung, Hebraite laha Hebrai tahzet, daan thu heetlama Pharisai,
phatuamngaih lama kouhtuam suduhdahtu; daan dungjuia dihtatna lama soiseelbei ka hi.
Hizongleh sil kei diinga lawhna zousiah chu Khrist jiahin manna in ka ngaita hi.

Ahi, tahzetin Khrist Jesu ka Lalpa heetna hoihtungtuang jiahin sil zousiah chu manna giapin ka ngai ahi, Amah jiahin sil zousiah ka taanta a, huleh hute chu Khrist ka tan theihna diingin eeh bang giapin ka ngai a,
huleh daan apat kimu keimah dihtatna mawng nei hilouin, hizongleh Khrist a ginna tungtawna hung kuan, ginna jaala Pathian apat hung kuan dihtatna chu neia Amah a muha ka um theihna diingin;
huchia a sihna toh kituaahtou jeel a, Amah leh a thohkiitna silbawltheihna leh a gimthuaahna kikoppihna bang ka heet theihna diingin;
bangchi jawng aha beeha misi lah apat thohkiitna ka tan theih khaah leh chiin.
Ka tang zouta ahi sih a, bukima um zouta zong ka hi sih; hizongleh Khrist Jesu’n kei ahung matna jiah khuh mah ke’n zong ka tanden theihna diingin ka delh ahi.
Unaute, kei chu man zoutain ka kisep sih; hizongleh hi sil khat chu ka bawl hi, nunglam a sil umte chu mangngilhin malam a sil umte chu delhin,
Khrist Jesu a Pathian kouhna sang kipaahman mu diingin phaahtawpna chu ka delh ahi.
Hujiahin eiuh a piching teng in hitobang lungsim i nei chiat diing uh; huleh sildang khat a lungsim dang na neih uh leh, hu zong Pathian in na kawmvah ahung hesah diing hi.
Ahiinlah i phaahna chiangchiang ah, hu daan mahin i gamta diingva, lungsim kibangin i um diing uhi.
Unaute, ka umdaan juite hung hi chiat un, huleh keiuh etton a na hung neihte uh banga umte chu chiamchih un.
Ajiahchu mi tampi aum uh, amahuh umdaan ka hung hilh veuta hi, tuin zong kap pumin ka hung hilh hi, amahuh chu Khrist kros meelmate ahi uhi.
A tawpna uh chu manthaaina ahi a, a pathian uh chu a gilpi uh ahi a, huleh a loupina uh zong a zumna uh ahi a, a ngaihtuahna uh chu leilam silte ah aum hi.
Ajiahchu eihaw khualetui hihna chu vaan ah aum a, hu apatin Lalpa Jesu Khrist, Hundampa chu ngaahleltahin i ngaah uh ahi.
Ama’n chu sil zousiah Amah thuthu a aumsah theihna natohdaan dungjuiin i tahsa bangmalou chu Amah tahsa loupitah batpihin ahung bawlthahsah diing hi.
Hujiahin ka unau deihtah leh ngaihtahte, ka kipaahna leh ka lallukhuhte, Lalpa ah huchiin dingkip un, deihtahte.
Lalpa a lungsim khat hi diingin Euodia ka hasot a huleh Sintiki ka hasot hi.
Huleh nang ka ngawngkol puaahpih muanum zong ka hung ngeen hi, tanchinpha a nna ka tohpih numei haw leh Klement zong, huleh Hinna Lehkhabu a min tuang, nna ka tohpih dangte teng panpih in.
Lalpa ah kipaah ngiitngeet un, ka chi jeel diing kipaah un!
Na chitna uh mi zousiah heet hi hen. Lalpa anai hi.
Bangma ah lungdonna nei sih unla, hizongleh sil bangkim ah haamteina leh ngetna in kipaahthu soina toh na sil ngette uh Pathian kawmah hesah un.
Huchiin Pathian hamuanna heetphaah guallouh in, Khrist Jesu jaalin na lungtangte uh leh na lungsimte uh ahung veensah diing hi.

Atawppeenin, unaute, thutah photmah, sil zahum photmah, sil dih photmah, sil siangthou photmah, sil pomtaah photmah, a hoihlama minthang photmah, hoihna bang aum a, paahtawi taah bang aum leh, hi silte ngaihtuah ngiitngeet un.
Keimah a na jilsa uh, na tansa uh, na jaahsa uh, na muhsa uh, hu silte chu bawl un; huchiin hamuanna Pathian in ahung umpih diing hi.
Hizongleh tua atawplama kei na hung ngaihtuahna uh ahung kilat jiahin Lalpa ah nasatahin ka kipaah ahi. Tuma in na hung ngaihsah mahmah va, hizongleh hun lemtaang na mu sih va ahi.
Taahsap jiaha hi thu ka soi ahi sih, ajiahchu bangchibangin um zongleng, hutah a lungkimtaha umdaan ka heta hi.
Tasamtaha umdaan ka he a, kiningchingtaha umdaan zong ka he hi. Mun chin leh sil zousiah ah gilvah leh gilkial a um theihna leh hautah leh tasam a umdaan hilhin ka umta hi.
Amah ahung suhaatpa Khrist jaalin sil zousiah ka bawl thei hi.
Ahihvaangin ka gentheihna a na hung kithuahpih jiahun na bawl hoih uhi.

Tuin nanguh Philippite’n tanchinpha hung um chiil a, Makedonia gam apat ka chiahdoh laiin, nanguh chihlouh kouhtuam dang koimah in piaah leh laah lam thu ah bangmah in ahung kithuahpih sih uh chih zong na he uhi.
Ajiahchu Thessalonika khua ngeei ah zong ka taahsap panpihna diing na hung thot kiit jeel uhi.
Silpiaah ka deih jiah ahi sih a, hizongleh nanguh hoihna a kisim diing gahsuahte hawl ka hijaw hi.
Hizongleh sil bangkim ka nei a ka hau hi. Nanguh apat hung kithot, gim namtuui, kithoihna pomtaah leh Pathian lungkimna silte chu, Epaphrodita khut apatin ka na muta a, ka kiningchingta hi.
Huleh ka Pathian in Khrist Jesu a loupina a a hauhsatna dungjuiin na taahsap zousiah uh ahung pe diing hi.
Tuin Pathian leh i Pa uh kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin loupina um hen. Amen.
Khrist Jesu a misiangthou zousiah chibai hung na buuhsah un. Ka kawma um unaute’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Misiangthou zousiah in, adiaahkholin Kaisar innsung mite’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva tungah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihjawnga Jesu Khrist apostol leh i unaupa uh Timothi in,
Kolosi a um, Khrist a misiangthoute leh unau ginumte kawmah, i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Nanguh diinga haamtei ngiitngeetin Pathian, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa kawmah kipaahthu ka soi uhi,
Khrist Jesu a na ginna uh leh misiangthoute zousiah tunga lungsiatna na neih daan uh ka jaah nungsiah un,
vaan a nanguh diinga kinepna hung kikoihsah jiahin hu kinepna thu chu tanchinpha thutah thu ah tuma laiin na jata va,
hu tanchinpha in chu khovel pumpi a agahsuah jeel mahbangin na kawmvah ahung tungta a, na jaah va thutah a Pathian hehpihna na hung heet ni vapatin na lahvah agahsuah jeel hi.
Epaphra, ka suaah tanpih uh ngaihtah, nanguh diinga Khrist natongtu ginumtah apat zong na heettaah bangmahun,
ama’n zong Hagau a na lungsiatna uh ka kawmvah aphuangdoh hi.
Hikhu jiahin keiuh zong hi ka jaah ni vapatin, nanguh diinga haamteisah leh pilna leh hagaulam heetchianna zousiah a Amah deihjawng heetna a na hung dimna diing uh ngetsah ka tawp sih uhi.
Huchia Lalpa diinga kilawmtawh leh sil zousiah a Amah kipaahna diinga na gamtat va, natoh hoih chinteng a hung gah a huleh Pathian heetsiamna lama na hung khantouhna diing uh leh
a silbawltheihna loupitah dungjuia kipaahna neia thuaahhaatna zousiah leh lungduaina lama silbawltheihna zousiah a suhhaata umin,
vaah a misiangthoute gou tankhawmpih diinga hung suchingtu Pa kawma kipaahthu soi in nanguh diinga ngetsah ka tawp sih uhi.
Ama’n chu mial silbawltheihna apatin ahung hundoh a, a Tapa deihtah lalgam ah ahung luutsahta a,
Amah ah a sisan jaalin tatdohna i mu hi, sual ngaihdamna ngeei chu.
Amah chu muhtheihlouh Pathian meelpua, silsiam zousiah laha tachiil ahi.

Ajiahchu Amah ah sil zousiah siam ahi a, vaan a umte leh lei a umte, muhtheihte leh muhtheihlouhte, laltouphahte aha lalgamte aha vaihawmnate aha thuneihnate hitazongleh; sil zousiah Amah tungtawna siam ahi a huleh Amah diinga siam ahi.
Huleh Amah chu sil zousiah um main aum a, Amah ah sil zousiah aum khawm hi.
Amah chu sapum lutang ahi, sapum chihchu kouhtuam ahi; sil bangkim a amasapeen hihna mun atan theihna diingin Amah chu kipatna bulpi, misi lah apat tachiil ahi.
Ajiahchu Amah a taangchinna zousiah aum chu Pa lemsah ahi,
huleh Amah jaala sil zousiah Amah toh kilemsah diingin, Amah tungtawna lei a sil umte hiin vaan a sil umte hitaleh a kros sisan jaala lemna bawl zouin.
Huleh nanguh nidanglaia na natoh giloute uh jiaha na lungsim va Amah apat khena um leh meelma anahi hizongleh uh chin, tuin Ama’n
chu sihna jaalin a tahsa pum ah ahung kilemsahta hi, a mitmuh a siangthou leh dembaanglou leh soiseelbei diinga ahung dinsah theihna diingin,

huchu ginna a na um zing va, kingahna neia na kip va, huleh tanchinpha na jaah uh kinepna apat na kitawlmang louh uh leh ahi diing hi. Hu tanchinpha chu vaan nuaia silsiam zousiah kawma taangkoupih ahi a, kei Paul, hu thunatongtu diinga siam ka hi.
Nanguh diinga ka gimthuaahnate ah tuin ka kipaah hi, huleh Amah tahsa a diinga, huchu a kouhtuam diinga Khrist gimthuaahna lama kisam nalai silte chu ka tahsa in ka sudim ahi.
Pathian thu chu bukimtaha ka heetsah theihna diingin, nanguh diinga Pathian apat ka kawma hung kipia enkoltu mohpuaahna dungjuiin hu kouhtuam thunatongtu diinga siam ka hi,
hu Pathian thukiphual chu akum akum leh akhang akhang a phual anahi a, hizongleh tuin chu a misiangthoute kawmah phuangdohin aumta hi.
Amahuh kawmah Jentelte laha loupina hauhsatna thukiphual khuh bang ahiai chih heetsah diing chu Pathian in lem asata hi: hu thukiphual chu Khrist nanguh a um, loupina kinepna chu ahi.
Mi chin Khrist Jesu a hoihbukima ka piaah theihna diingun, mi chin kiveeng diinga hilhin huleh pilna chinteng a mi chin thuhilhin, Amah tanchin ka phuang uhi.
Hukhu diingin ke’n zong, keimah a nasataha natong Amah silbawltheihna dungjuiin hahpana pangin ka tonggim ahi.
Ajiahchu nanguh leh Laudikia khua a umte leh tahsa a ka meel mu nailou photmahte diinga ka kihahbawl daan he leh uh chin ka uut hi,

lungsiatna a kaankhawma aum va, huleh heetsiamna kichetna bukim hauhsatna zousiah atan va, huvaanga Pathian, Pa leh Khrist thukiphual heetna chu aneih va, huchia a lungtangte uh hamuana aum theihna diingin,
hu Khrist ah pilna leh heetna gou zousiah phualin aum hi.
Huleh hichu koimah in kamsiam thu a ahung heem louhna diingun ka soi ahi.
Ajiahchu tahsa in na kawmvah um sih zongleng, na hindaan uh kituupdaan leh Khrist a na ginna kipdaan uh ka muhin ka kipaah a, hagau in na kawmvah ka um hi.
Hujiahin Lalpa Khrist Jesu na pomtaah bangmahun, Amah ah hing un.
Amah ah zungha leh lamtouha umin, hilha na um banga ginna a kiptaha umin, hutah ah chu kipaahthu soina a dimin um un.
Pilvaang un, huchilou inchu mi koiaha in Khrist thu bang hilouin, mihing thugousiah leh khovel kihilhna thubulte bang jaw in, khovel pilna leh heemna mei in gaallaahin ahung la kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Amah ah Pathian taangchinna zousiah sapum neiin ateeng hi;
huleh Amah ah nanguh suhbukim na hita va, Amah chu lalna leh thuneihna zousiah lutang ahi.
Amah ah nanguh chu khut a tan hilouin, Khrist zehtanna a tahsa sualna sapum tankhiah a zehtan na hi uhi.
Baptisma ah Amah toh vui na hita va, humah ah misi lah apat a Amah kaithoutu Pathian natoh gintaat jaalin Amah toh kaihthoh na hita uhi.
Huleh nanguh, na sualnate uh leh na tahsa va zehtanlouhna jiaha si chu, na bohsiatna zousiah uh hung ngaidamin, Ama’n Khrist toh ahung suhingkhawmta hi.
Ama’n daan thu, eiuh hung lang jawng leh ei toh kikalh lama gelh chu nawtmangin, kros dawn a kilhbehin alamangta hi.
Huleh lalnate leh thuneihnate susiain, Ama’n amahuh chu japi etnop a bawlin, a tungvah kros ah agualzouta hi.
Hujiahin mi koimah in, neeh thu aha, dawn thu aha, ankuang lui thu aha, ha thah thu aha, ahihlouhleh Sabbath ni thu aha in nanguh hung dem sih uh hen.
Hute chu sil hung tung diingte liim ahi a, hizongleh a tah chu Khrist ahi.
Mi koimah in, a silmuh ngeilouhte a kigolhluutin, a tahsamiitna lungsim a kimawhletsahin, kingaihngiamna dihlou leh angelte biahna zangin na kipaahman muh diing uh hung laahsah sih heh,
huleh hutobang mi’n chu hu Lutang, tahsa pumpi chawma huleh guhletaang kizopna leh thaguite kaankhawm a, Pathian apata khanna a akhangtouhna chu atudet sih hi.
Huchihjiahin, khovel kihilhna thubulte apat Khrist toh si na hihtaah uh leh, bang diinga khovel a hing banga daan thupiaahte nuaia kituluut na hi viai?
“Sukha sin, chiam sin, khoih sin,” chihte
(hite chu zat puma mangthaai veh diing ahi), hite chu mihing thupiaah leh thuhilhna ahi.
Hi silte chu bawltawm biahna leh kingaihngiamna dihlou leh khawhsa loua tahsa sawihnatna ah pilhuai abang na a, hizongleh tahsa uutna douna diingin bangma aphatuam sih hi.
Huchiin Khrist toh kaihthoh khawm na hihtaah uh leh, Pathian jiatlam a tou Khrist umna tunglam a sil umte chu hawl un.
Lei a sil umte a nga louin, tunglam a sil umte ah na lungsim uh nga un.
Ajiahchu na sita va, na hinna uh chu Khrist toh Pathian ah phual ahita hi.
Khrist, i hinna uh ahung kilat chiangin nanguh zong Amah toh loupiin na kilang diing uhi.
Hujiahin na pianken uh sualnate sulum un: kingaihnate thaanghuainate, bolhhohnate, kietlahna hoihloute, uutna giloute leh duhaamnate, duhaamna chu milem biahna ahi.
Ajiahchu hu silte jiahin Pathian lungthahna chu thumanglou tate tungah atung veu hi.
Nanguh zong tumalama hu silte a na hin laiun hute ah nana um uhi.
Hizongleh tuin chu nang un lungthahnate, thangtawmnate, huatnate, soisiatnate haw zousiah koihmang unla, huleh houlimna thaanghuaite na kam vapat koih mang un.
Mihing lui chu a silbawlte toh na hawhkhiahtaah jiahun, khat leh khat kiheemtuah sih un.
Huleh mihing thahin na kithuamta va, hu mi thah chu amah Siamtu lim bangngeei heetna ah siamthahin aum ahi.
Hu siamthahna ah chu Grikmi leh Judami, zehtan leh zehtanlouh, barbarimi leh Skuthiami, saltaang leh taanglou zong aum tuan sih hi, hizongleh Khrist chu bangkim ahi a huleh bangkim ah aum hi.
Hujiahin Pathian miteel, mi siangthou leh deihtahte bangin lainatna lungtangte, chitnate, kingaihngiamna lungsimte, jaidamnate leh thuaahtheihnate in kithuam un;
khat leh khat kithuaahthei tuah unla, khat in khat tunga thubuai bang aneih leh, kingaidam tuah un; Khrist in nanguh ahung ngaihdam bangin nanguh zong kingaidam un.
Huleh hi silte zousiah tungah lungsiatna silhthuah un, huchu bukimna kaankhawmna ahi.
Huleh Pathian hamuanna in na lungtang vah vaihawm hen, huchibang hi diingin sapum khat a kouh na hi uhi; huleh kipaahna taang zong he un.

Khrist thu chu nanguh ah pilna chinteng ah kichingtahin umsah unla, phatna late bang leh Pathian late bang leh hagaulam late bang in khat leh khat kijilsahin kithuhilh tuah unla, na lungtang va kipaahin Lalpa kawmah la sa un.
Huleh na bawl photmah uh, thusoi ah hiin natoh ah hitaleh, a bawnin Lalpa Jesu min in, Amah tungtawna Pa Pathian kawma kipaahthu soi kawmin bawl veh un.
Jite haw, Lalpa a akilawm bangin na pasalte uh kawmah kituluut un.
Pasalte haw, na jite uh lungsiat unla, a tungvah gilou sih un.
Tate haw, sil zousiah ah na nulepate uh thu mang un, huchu Lalpa kipaahpihjawng ahi ngaala.
Pate haw, na tate uh sulungthah sih un, huchilou inchu alungke kha diing uhi.
Suaahte haw, sil zousiah ah leitung a na houtute uh thu mang un, mit natonga mihing kipaahsah diing giap hilouin, hizongleh lungsim siangthoutahin leh Pathian lau kawm jawin.
Huleh na bawl photmah uh mihingte diinga bawl bang hilouin, Lalpa a diing bangin lungluuttahin bawl un,
Lalpa kawm apatin kipaahman diing gou chu na mu diing uh chih hein, ajiahchu Lalpa Khrist natohsah na hi uhi.
Hizongleh sil dihlou bawltu in chu a sil dihlou bawlman amu kiit diing hi, huleh kideihsahtuamna bangmah aum sih hi.
Houtute haw, nang un zong vaan ah Houtu na nei uh chih hein, na suaahte uh tungah adih leh tangin bawl un.
Haamtei zing unla, hutah ah chu kipaahthu soi kawmin kiveeng zing un.
Kaan a ka umna peen, Khrist thukiphual soi diinga Pathian in keiuh diinga thusoina kot ahung honsah theihna diingin keiuh diingin zong hung haamteisah un,
huchia ka soi diing bangtaha ka soi theihna diingin.
Hun chu a phatuam theipeen a zangin, polam mite lahah pilvaangtahin um un.
Mi chin bangchibanga dawn diing ahiai chih na heet theihna diingun na haam kamsuah uh chu hehpihna tel, chi kisoh hi zing hen.
Ka tanchin zousiah chu unau deihtah Tikika, natongtu ginum leh Lalpa a ka suaah hihpih in nanguh ahung hesah veh diing hi.
Hu diing mahin amah chu na kawmvah ka hung sawl ahi, na dinmun uh aheet a, na lungtang uh asuhhamuang theihna diingin.
Onesima, unau ginum leh ngaihumtah, nanguh laha mi mah toh ka hung sawl ahi. Amah un hilam sil umtan zousiah ahung hesah diing uhi.

Aristarka, ka suangkul taanpih in chibai ahung buuh a, huleh Mark, Barnaba sanggamnu tapa in zong chibai ahung buuh hi, amah tungtaang ah thupiaah na mu uhi, na kawmva ahung leh kipaahtahin anapom un.
Huleh Jesu, Jasta achih uh, zehtanmi in nanguh chibai ahung buuh hi. Hite chauh ahi uh zehtante lah apat hung kuan Pathian lalgam a diinga ka natohpihte; huleh amahuh chu kei hung hamuantute ahi uhi.

Na lahva mi, Epaphra, Khrist suaah in nanguh chibai ahung buuh hi, Pathian deihlam zousiah a hoihkim leh bukima na dindet theihna diingun amah chu haamteinate ah theihtawp suahin nanguh diingin apang hi.
Ajiahchu ama’n nanguh diing leh Laudikia leh Hierapoli khua a umte diingin phatuam angai mahmah chih ka heetpih hi.
Daktor deihtah Luk leh Dema in nanguh chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Laudikia khua a unau umte leh Nimpha leh a inn a kouhtuamte chibai hung na buuhsah un.
Huleh hi lehkhathot na lahva na sim zoh chiangun Laudikia kouhtuam ah zong na simsah unla, huleh nang un zong huchibangmahin Laudikia khua apat hung lehkhathot chu anasim veh un.
Huleh Arkippo kawmah, “Lalpa a natohna na muh chu na suhbukim theihna diingin pilvaang in,” anachi un.
Kei Paul in hi chibai buuhna chu ka khut ngeei a ka gelh ahi. Ka kolbuhte hezing un. Hehpihna na kawmvah um hen. Amen.
Paul leh Silvana leh Timothi in Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a um kouhtuamte kawmah: I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna um hen.
Ka haamteina va na min uh louin nanguh zousiah jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi zing uhi.
I Pathian leh Pa ma a na ginna natohte uh, na lungsiatna natohte uh leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist a kinepna jiaha na hahkatnate uh bang ka hezing uhi.
Ajiahchu unau deihtahte, Pathian teel na hi uh chih ka he uhi.

Ajiahchu ka tanchinpha uh thumeia na kawm uh hung tung ahi sih a, hizongleh silbawltheihna leh Hagau Siangthou leh heetchetna nasatah toh hung tung ahijaw hi, nanguh diinga na lahva mi bangtobang ka hi viai chih na heet bangun.
Huleh hahsatna tamtah thuaah pumin Hagau Siangthou a kipaah kawmin thu chu pomin, kei uh leh Lalpa juite na hung hita uhi.
Huchiin Makedonia leh Akaia gam a gingtu zousiah diingin etton na hung hita uhi.

Ajiahchu Makedonia leh Akaia gam chauh ah hilouin, hizongleh mun chinteng ah nanguh apatin Lalpa thu chu athangta hi. Pathian lama na ginna uh athangsuaahta a, hujiahin kei un bangma ka soi uh angai nawn sih hi.
Ajiahchu amahuh ngeei in bangtobanga nanguh laha hung luut ka hi viai chih leh milemte apat Pathian hing leh dihtah nna tong diinga na hung kihei daan uh ahung hilh va,
huleh misi lah apat Ama’n akaihthoh, vaan apat hung kuan a Tapa, lungthahna hung tung diing apat eite hung hunkhepa Jesu ngeei ana-ngaah diinga na kihei daan uh ahung hilh uhi.
Ajiahchu unaute, na lahva ka hung luutna uh athawn ahi sih chih nanguh ngeei in na he uhi.

Hizongleh na heetsa mahbangun ama a ka thuaahgim zoh un Philippi a zumhuaitaha bawlgawpa ka um nungun zong buai pumpumin Pathian tanchinpha na kawmva soi diingin ka Pathian vah ka na hangsan jaw mah uhi.
Ajiahchu ka hung hasotna uh chu dihloutaha kiheemna ahihlouhleh tupna sianglou apat ahi sih a, heembawlna in zong ahi sih hi.
Hizongleh tanchinpha kolsaha um diinga Pathian phatsah mi ka hih bang ngeeiun mihing kipaahsah diing bang hilouin, ka lungtang uh endihtu Pathian kipaahsah hi jawin thu ka soi jeel uh ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu bangchihmahin zong kimaaitangphatna leh duhaamna phual kawmin na kawmvah ka hung ngei sih uh chih na he uhi, Pathian chu ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Khrist apostolte ka hihna un thuneihna zang thei hi zongleh ung, mihingte apat aha, nanguh apat ahihlouhleh midangte apatin paahtawina ka hawl ngei sih uhi.
Hizongleh nu in a tate aduatbawl bangin na lahvah jaidamtahin ka um jaw uhi.
Huchiin ka deihtahte uh na hung hihtaah jiahun nanguh hung ngaina mahmahin Pathian tanchinpha chauh hilouin keiuh hinna tanpha hung piaah ka uut uhi.
Ajiahchu unaute, ka tohgimdaan uh leh ka tawldaan uh na he zing uhi; ajiahchu na lahva koima ka suhbuai louhna diingun suun leh jaan a tongin Pathian tanchinpha nanguh kawmah ka soi uhi.
Nanguh agingtate laha siangthoutah leh dihtah leh soiseelbeia ka gamtat daan uh hung heetpihtute nanguh na hi va, huleh Pathian zong ahung heetpihtu ahi.
Pa in a tate tunga abawl banga na bawnva ka hung hasot daan uh, ka hung hamuan daan uh, huleh thu ka hung piaah daan uh na he uhi,
huchia a lalgam leh a loupina a nanguh hung kou luutpa Pathian a diinga kilawma na hin theihna diingun.

Hi jiahin Pathian kawmah tawplouin kipaahthu ka soi uhi, ajiahchu Pathian thu keiuh apat a na jaah uh na pom laiun, mihing thu banga pom louin, thutah, nanguh agingtate a zong nasataha natong thei Pathian thu ngeei hiin na pom jaw uhi.
Ajiahchu unaute, Judia gam a Khrist Jesu a Pathian kouhtuamte umdaan entontute na hung hita uhi. Ajiahchu amah un Judate laha athuaah bangun, nang un zong na gam mite uh lahah na thuaah ve uhi.
Hu Judate’n chu Lalpa Jesu leh a zawlneite uh athat va, keiuh zong ahung suduhdah uh; huleh Pathian asulungkim sih va huleh mi zousiah akalh va;
Jentelte hutdam ahih theihna diingva a kawmva thusoi ahung khap va, huchu a sualna uh suhdim zingna diingin ahi. Hizongleh Pathian lungthahna chu akhawh theitawpin a tungvah ahung tungta hi.
