Hizongleh keiuh chu unaute, tomchakhat sung lungtang lam hilou a, meel lam chauha kikhena i um vaangun, kilawptahin na meel uh mu diingin ka hahpan seem uhi.
Huchihjiahin na kawmva hung ka tum ten va, kei Paul ngeei in zong anon nonin hung ka tumta a, hizongleh Setan in ahung daal hi.
Ajiahchu ka kinepna uh aha, ka kipaahna uh ahihlouhleh ka kipaahna lallukhuh uh bang ahiai? Ahung chianga i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ma ah nanguh ngeei na hi sih diviaimah?
Ajiahchu nanguh ka suan uh leh ka kipaahna uh na hi uhi.
Hujiahin ka thuaah zoh nawn louh phetun Athen khua ah keiuh chauh nuutsiatin um leh ung hoih ka sa uhi.
Huleh i unaupa uh Timothi, Pathian natongtu, Khrist tanchinpha lama ka tohpih uh chu nanguh hung sukip diing leh na ginna lamva hung hamuan diingin ka hung sawlta uhi,
huchia hi gimthuaahnate jiaha koima akiliin louhna diingin; ajiahchu hi silte thuaah diing mawnga guat i hi uh chih nanguh ngeei in na he uhi.
Ajiahchu na kawmva ka um laiun gimthuaahna thuaah diing i hi uh chih ka hung hilhlawhta uhi; huchibang ngeeiin atungta a, huchu na he uhi.
Hikhu jiahin, ka thuaah zoh nawn louh phetin, heemtu’n nanguh ahung heempuuh kha diing a, huleh ka tohgimna uh athawn kha diing chiin na gindaan uh he diingin mi ka hung sawl hi.

Hizongleh tua Timothi na kawm vapat ka kawm uh ahung tunin na ginna uh leh na lungsiatna thu uh, huleh kei un nanguh ka hung muh nuam mahmah bangun nang un zong keiuh hung mu nuam mahmahin na hung hezing uh chih tanchin kipaahhuaitah ahung puaah hi.
Hujiahin, unaute, ka thuaahgimna uh leh ka hahsatna zousiah vah na ginna jiahun na tungvah hamuangtahin ka um uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa a na dinkip phot uh leh, tuin ka hingta uhi.
I Pathian uh ma ah na tungva ka kipaahna zousiah uh jiahin nanguh lam thu ah Pathian kawmah bangtobang kipaahthu ka soi thei taphet diviai?
Na meel uh ka muh theihna diing uh leh na ginna lamva na taahsap uh ka hung suhbuchinsah theihna diingun suun leh jaan in nasataha haamteiin ka um uhi.
Tuin i Pathian uh leh i Pa uh ngeei, huleh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist in na kawm lamvah hung pui hen.
Huleh nanguh lama lungsiatna ka hauh bangun, Lalpa’n nanguh khat leh khat kilungsiat tuahna leh mi zousiah na lungsiatna uh hung supungin hung hausahta hen,
huchia i Lalpa Jesu Khrist a misiangthoute zousiah toh ahung chianga Pathian i Pa uh ngeei ma a na lungtangte uh sianthouna lama soiseelbeia ahung suhkip theihna diingin.
Huchiin atawppeenin, unaute, na umdaan diing uh leh Pathian na kipaahsah daan diing uh, ka kawmva kipan a na laah bangun na hauh seemna diingun Lalpa Jesu ah ka hung ngeenun, ka hung hasot uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa Jesu jaalin bangtobang thupiaahte ka hung piaah uh na he uhi.
Ajiahchu na sianthou diing uh chu Pathian deihjawng ahi: kingaihna thaanghuai na tawpsan diing uh;
mi chin in siangthou leh zahumtaha na beel chiat uh kepdaan na heetna diing uh,
Pathian helou Jentelte banga huuhna kihdahhuai lama kipe louin;

hulam thu ah chu koima a unau tungah tasualin ahihlouhleh alam louin gamta sih heh, ajiahchu Lalpa chu hutobang sil bawlte zousiah phubalatu ahih a, kei un zong ka hung hilhlawhta va huleh ka hung hesah zouta uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in sianglou diingin ahung kou sih a, hizongleh siangthou diingin ahung kou jaw hi.
Hujiahin anualtu chu mihing nual ahi sih a, a Hagau Siangthou hung petu Pathian nual ahijaw hi.
Hizongleh unau kilungsiat daan lam thu ah gelhsah na ngai sih uhi, ajiahchu kilungsiattuah chiat diingin nanguh ngeei Pathian hilhin na umta uhi.
Huleh Makedonia gam pumpi a unau um zousiah tungah huchu na bawl ngeei uhi. Hizongleh unaute, nasataha tong seem diingin ka hung hasot uhi;
thu ka hung piaah bangva kamtawm deuha um a, na natoh chiat uh kitoh a, huleh na khut ngeei va nna tong diingin,
huchia polam mite lama kilawmtaha na um theihna diingun, huleh bangmah taahsap na neih louhna diingun.
Hizongleh unaute, midang kinepna himhim neiloute banga na lungkham louhna diingun ihmute tungtaang na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi.
Ajiahchu Jesu asi a huleh athoukiit chih i gintaat leh, Jesu a ihmute zong Pathian in Amah toh ahung puikhawm diing hi.
Ajiahchu hichu Lalpa thu in na kawmvah ka soi uh ahi, huchu eiuh Lalpa hung pai donga hinga ana-um nalaite’n ihmute i makhelh sih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa ngeei chu kikou aw toh, angel tungnungpeen aw leh Pathian peengkuul ging toh, vaan apat ahung kumsuh diing a, huleh Khrist a site athou masa diing uhi.
Huzohchiangin eiuh hinga ana-um nalaite huihkhua ah Lalpa tuaah diingin amahuh toh meipi lahah laahtouhin i um diing va, huchiin kumtuangin Lalpa kawmah i umta diing uhi.
Huchihjiahin hi thute in khat leh khat kihamuan tuah chiat un.
Hizongleh unaute, a hun leh a ni lam thu chu ka hung gelhsah na ngai sih uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh mah in Lalpa Ni chu jaan a guta bangin ahung tung diing hi chih chiantahin na he uhi.
Ajiahchu, “Muanna leh bitna!” chia asoi laitahun numei nauvei bangin thakhatin manthaaina a tungvah atung diing a; huleh asuaahta hial sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh unaute, nanguh chu hu Ni in guta banga ahung phawn diingin mial ah na um sih uhi.
Na bawnun vaah tate leh suun tate na hi uhi. Jaan a mi i hi sih va, mial a mi zong i hi sih uhi.
Hujiahin midangte bangin i ihmu sih diing va, hizongleh hahin i kiging jaw diing uhi.
Ajiahchu ihmute chu jaan ah ahi a-ihmut uh, huleh zukhamte zong jaan ah ahi akham uh.
Hizongleh ei suun a mite’n chu ginna phaw leh lungsiatna silhin, hutdamna kinepna chu lukhuh a khuhin i kiging diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in lungthahna tuaah diing hilouin, hizongleh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist vaanga hutdamna tang diingin ahung guat ahijaw hi.
Amah chu i luangin asi ahi, i hahin zong, i ihmutin zong, Amah toh i hin khawm theihna diingin.
Hujiahin nana hih veu mahbangun kisuhamuang khawm chiat unla, kisuhaattuah chiat un.
Huleh unaute, na lahva tonggimte leh Lalpa a na houtute uh leh nanguh hung hilhtute paahtawi diingin ka hung ngeen uhi,
huleh a natoh jiahva amahuh nasataha lungsiatna a ngaisang diingin ka hung ngeen uhi. Khat leh khat kituaahtahin um un.
Tuin unaute, ka hung hasot uhi, daan bangloua umte hilh unla, lungkete hamuan unla, haatloute panpih unla, mi zousiah tungah thuaahthei un.
Koimah in koi giitlouh zong giitlouh a thuh lou diingin pilvaang un, hizongleh nanguh a diing hiin mi zousiah a diing hitaleh, ahoih taphot jui un.
Kipaah zingzing un;
tawplouin haamtei un;
sil bangkim ah kipaahthu soi un; ajiahchu nanguh diingin Khrist Jesu ah hichu Pathian deihjawng ahi.
Hagau sumit sih un.
Pathian thusoilawhte ngaineep sih un.
Sil zousiah enchian unla, ahoihlam photmah tudet un.
Sual a kilang zousiah apat kiheemkhia un.
Huleh hamuanna Pathian ngeei in na pum-un hung susiangthou heh; huleh na hagau uh leh na lungsim uh leh na tahsa uh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung chianga soiseelbei diingin huumbitin um hen.
Nanguh hung koupa aginum a, bawl zong abawl diing hi.
Unaute, hung haamteisah un.
Unaute zousiah tawp siangthou in chibai na buuh un.
Hi lehkhathot unau siangthoute zousiah kawma simsah diingin Lalpa min in thu ka hung pia hi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kawmvah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Silvana leh Timothi in, i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a um kouhtuam kawmah:
I Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna um hen.
Unaute, na ginna uh nasataha akhanlet a, na bawnva na kilungsiat tuahna uh apun seem jiahin, na tungthu vah hihtuaah ahih mahbangin, Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soi zing diing mawng ka hi uhi.
Huchiin mi’n nanguh ahung suhduhdahnate uh leh na gimthuaahna zousiah va na kuhkal daan uh leh na ginna jiahun Pathian kouhtuamte lahah ka hung suang uhi.
Hichu Pathian lalgam mi hitaaha guat na hih theihna diingva Pathian vaihawmna dihtah chiamchihna chiantah ahi a, hu diing maha zong thuaah na hi uhi.
Nanguh hung subuaite gimthuaahna a thuh chu Pathian a diinga sil dihtathuai ahi a,
huleh nanguh suhgima umte chu, Lalpa Jesu vaan akipan a angel haatte toh ahung kilaah chiangin, keiuh toh khawldamna ahung pia chu sil dihtathuai ahi a,
Pathian heloute leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist tanchinpha awiloute tunga meikuang a phuba ala chu sil dihtathuai ahi.
Amahuh chu Lalpa ma leh a silbawltheihna loupitah apatin kumtuang manthaaina ah gawtin aum diing uh,
a misiangthoute laia tawimawia aumna diing leh gingtu tengteng laia ngaihsanga um diinga Amah ahung Ni tahchiangin, ajiahchu ka heetsahna uh na laiva gingtaata aumtaah jiahin.

Hujiahin i Pathian un nanguh chu ahung kouhna toh kiphuttawh mawng ahungsah theihna diingin, huleh a hoihna hung deihsahna zousiah leh silbawltheihna toh ginna natoh zousiah ahung bukimsah theihna diingin, nanguh diingin zong ka haamtei zingzing uhi,
huchia i Pathian uh leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna dungjuia, i Lalpa uh Jesu min chu nanguh ah suhloupi-a aum a, huleh nanguh Amah ah suhloupia na um theihna diingin.
Tuin unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hung na diing leh a kawma i vakikhopna diing thu ah,
Khrist ni chu ahung tung zouta chia hagau in aha, thu in aha, keiuh min zanga lehkhathot in aha a na lungtang uh suhliinga um pah lou diingin, ahihlouhleh buailou diingin ka hung ngeen uhi.
Koima’n bangmah in hung heem sih heh; ajiahchu puuhsanna tah ahung tun masat a, sualna mipa, mangthaai tapa ngeei ahung kilat phot louh leh, hu Ni chu hung tung lou diing ahi.
Ama’n chu Pathian chiha um zousiah leh akibia zousiah adou a, a tungva um tumin akisuloupi diing a; Pathian biahinn a Pathian banga touin, Pathian in akibawl diing hi.
Na kawmva ka um laiin hi thute ka hung hilhta chih he nawn lou na hi viaimah?
Huleh tuin amah chu amah huntaha ahung kilat theihna diing, bang in daal ahiai chih na he uhi.
Ajiahchu daanbohsiatna thukiphual in atong panta hi, adaaltu Amah in chu lampi apat laahmang ahih masiahin adaal zing diing hi.
Laahmang ahih chiangin migiloupa chu ahung kilang diing a, Lalpa Jesu’n amah chu a kam a hu in akaangtum diing a, ahung kilaahna vaah in asumang diing hi.
Hu daanbotsepa hungna diing chu Setan natoh dungjuia silbawltheihna teng toh, chiamchihnate toh, huleh atahlou sillimdang zousiah toh,
huleh mangthaaite lahah dihtatlouhna heemna zousiah toh ahi diing hi, ajiahchu amah un hutdama aum theihna diingva thutah ngaihnatna apom louh jiahun.
Huleh hikhu jiahin juauthu agintaatna diingun Pathian in puimangna natoh haattah a kawmvah asawl diing hi,
huchia thutah gingta lou a, dihtatlouhna kipaahpih jawte a bawnva siamlouh tansaha aum theihna diingun.

Hizongleh unau Lalpa deihtahte, Hagau suhsiangthouna leh thutah gintaatna jaala hutdama um diinga atuung apat Pathian in nanguh ahung teel jiahin keiuh chu na tungthu vah Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soi zing diing mawng ka hi uhi.
Hu diing mawngin Ama’n ka tanchinpha uh tungtawnin nanguh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist loupina tang diingin ahung kou hi.
Hujiahin unaute, ding kip unla, thusoi in hiin ka lehkhathot un hitaleh, thugousiah nanguh hung kihilhte chu tukip un.
Tuin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ngeei leh Pathian, i Pa uh ngeei, eite hung lungsiat a, hehpihna jaala kumtuang hamuanna leh kinepna hoih hung pepa’n,
na lungtang uh suhamuangin thu hoih leh natoh hoih chinteng ah hung sukipta hen.
Atawppeenin unaute, Lalpa thu chu nanguh a aum banga akhang a huleh suhloupi-a aum theihna diingin,
huleh huchia mingongtatte leh migiloute laha ka bit theihna diingun hung haamteisah un; ajiahchu mi zousiah in ginna anei veh sih uhi.
Hizongleh Lalpa chu aginum a, Ama’n nanguh ahung sukip diing a huleh migiloupa apat ahung veeng diing hi.
Huleh ka hung thupiaahte uh na bawl va huleh na bawl jeel diing uh chu Lalpa ah ka hung muang uhi.
Huleh Lalpa’n na lungtangte uh Pathian lungsiatna ah leh Khrist diinga ngaah kuhkalna ah hung pui hen.
Huchiin unaute, keiuh apat a na muh uh thugousiah banga umlou a, daan bangloua gamta unaute zousiah laha kiheemkhe diingin i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in thu ka hung pia uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh ngeei in na hung juih daan diing uh na he uhi, ajiahchu na lahvah umdaan kilawmlouin ka gamta ngei sih va,
koima tanghou zong athawnin ka ne ngei sih va, na lahva koima puaahgih ka hihlouhna diingun suun leh jaan in tawltahin ka tonggim jaw uhi.
Huchu thuneihna ka neih louh jiah uh ahi sih a, hizongleh na hung juih diingva etton diingin ka kibawl uh ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu na kawmva ka um laiun zong hi thu ka hung pia uhi: Koipouh in nna atoh uut louh leh, ne zong ne sih heh.
Ajiahchu na lahvah daan bangloua gamta, nna mawngmawng tong lou a, phatuamloua mi tungtaang buaipihhaat khenkhat aum uh chih ka ja uhi.
Hutobang mite chu sipkhiana nna tong diing leh amahuh tanghou kineeh diingin Lalpa Jesu Khrist min in thu piain ka hasuan uhi.
Hizongleh unaute, nang un jaw sil hoih bawl chimtaah sih un.
Huleh koipouh in hi lehkhathot a ka thu uh azop louh leh, hu mi chu chiamchih unla, azum theihna diingin kithuahpih sih un.
Ahihvaangin chu meelma bangin bawl sih unla, unau bangin thuhilh jaw un.
Tuin hamuanna Lalpa ngeei in bang lam pouh ah, bangchihlaipouhin nanguh hamuanna hung pe zingta hen. Lalpa’n na bawnun hung umpihta hen.
Hi ka chibaibuuhna hi kei, Paul in ka khut ngeei a ka gelh ahi a, ka lehkhathot chin ah chiamchihna ahi a, hichibanga ka gelh veu ahi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na bawnva kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, i Hundampa Pathian leh i kinepna uh Lalpa Jesu Khrist thupiaah banga Jesu Khrist apostol in,
Ginna a ka tapa tahzet Timothi kawmah: I Pa Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kawma kipan hehpihna, khotuahna leh hamuanna umta hen.
Makedonia gam a ka chiah diing kuanin Ephesi khua a umzing diingin ka hung ngeen hi, huchia mi khenkhat in kihilhna dihlou ahilh louhna diing uh leh
amah un taangthu bulbaal neilou leh khangthu suutbei theihlouh pouh abuaipih louhna diingun hilh in, hite’n ginna jiaha Pathian natohna akhansah saangin kinialna asiam jaw uhi.
Huleh thupiaah kipiaahna jiah chu lungtang siangthou leh sialepha heetna hoih leh ginna dihtah apat lungsiatna neih ahi.
Hu apat mi khenkhatte apeetmang va, thulimlou houlimna lamah achiahta va,
a thusoi uh leh adih ahi chia apomte uh bang ahiai chih helouin daan hilhtute hih auut uhi.
Hizongleh daan chu mi’n dihtaha azatin chu ahoih chih i he hi.

Hichu hein: daan chu midihtat diinga bawl ahi sih a, daan poisalou leh kituluut uutloute a diing, Pathian ngaihsahloute leh misualte a diing, misiangloute leh Pathian zahloute a diing, pate thatte leh nute thatte a diing, mihing thatte a diing,
numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite a diing, tohuuhte a diing, mihing gute a diing, juau haatte a diing, juau a kihaahsialte a diing leh thugin dih toh kikalh sildang aum leh, hute a diingin ahi,
ka kawma kolsaha um phattaah Pathian loupitah tanchinpha dungjuiin.
Huleh ahung suhaattu Jesu Khrist i Lalpa un thunatongtu a ahung koih a, ginuma ahung sim jiahin Amah chu ka phat ahi.
Tuma laiin soisetu leh suduhdahtu leh sunatu ka na hi a, hizongleh ginlouhna a heloua anabawl ka hih jiahin khotuahna ka muta hi.
Huleh i Lalpa uh hehpihna chu Khrist Jesu a um ginna leh lungsiatna in adimleet ahi.
Khrist Jesu chu misualte hundam diingin khovel ah ahung hi chih thu hi gintaat um leh pomtaah mahmah ahi, hu misualte laha sualpeen ka hi.

Hijiangzongleh, hikhu jiahin khotuahna ka mu hi, huchia tunungsiaha kumtuang hinna diinga Amah hung gingta diingte kawmah etsahna diingin Jesu Khrist in a thuaahzohna tawplou keimah a asuhlat masat theihna diingin.
Tuin kumtuang Kumpipa, sitheilou, muhtheihlouh, Pathian pil chauh kawmah zahna leh loupina chu kumtuang kumtuangin umzingta hen. Amen.
Ka tapa Timothi, tuma a nangmah tungtaang thusoilawhte dungjuiin hi thupiaah chu ka hung pia ahi, hute zanga kidouna hoih na dou theihna diingin,
ginna leh sialephaheetna hoih chu tukip in, huchu mi khenkhatte’n apaaikhia va, ginna lamah kuang sia bangin akeehgawpta va,
amahuh lahah Humenai leh Alexandar ahi va, Pathian soisiat louh daan ajil theihna diingun amahuh chu Setan kawmah ka pekheta hi.
Hujiahin amasapeenin silngetnate, haamteinate, haamteisahnate leh kipaahthusoinate mi zousiah diinga bawlsah diing leh
kumpipate leh thuneihna mun a um zousiah a diinga zong bawlsah diingin ka hung hasuan hi, huchia Pathian ngaihsah leh zahumtaha hinkho thovengtah leh hamuanhuai i man theihna diingun.
Ajiahchu hichu i Hundampa Pathian mitmuhin ahoihin apomtaah hi.
Ama’n chu mi zousiah hutdama um diing leh thutah hung he diingin adeih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian khat aum a, huleh Pathian leh mihing kikaal ah Palai khat aum hi, Mihing Khrist Jesu chu.
Amah chu mi zousiah tatdohman diingin ahung kipia hi, huchu a huntaha heetsaha um diingin.
Hu diinga thusoitu leh apostol a guat ka hi. Khrist ah thutah ka soi a, huleh ka juau sih hi, ginna leh thutah a Jentelte thuhilhtu ka hi hi.
Hujiahin mun chin a pasalte’n khut siangthou jaahin, lungthah lou leh ginglel louin haamtei uh leh ka deih hi.
Huchibangmahin numeite chu puansilh kilawm hun leh uang lou leh pilvaangtahin kithuam uh henla, sam pheehkiil aha, sana aha, tuikepsuang ahihlouhleh sil mantam a kithuam louin um uh leh ka deih hi,
hizongleh Pathian ngaihsah numei kichite a diinga kilawm huntawhin, nasep hoih in kithuam uh leh ka deih hi.
Numei in thumangtahin sipkhianin jil uh heh.
Hizongleh numei in thu ahilh leh pasal tunga thu aneih zong ka phal sih hi, sipkhianin um jaw uh heh.
Ajiahchu Adam chu siam masat ahi a, hu nungin Evi chu siam ahi.
Huleh Adam chu heemin aum sih a, hizongleh numei chu heemin aum a, bohsiatna ah apuuhta hi.
Hizongleh ginna leh lungsiatna leh siangthouna neia kisuumtheitaha aum zing uh leh, naupaaina tungtawnin hutdohin aum diing uhi.
Hichu thu muanhuai ahi: mi koipouh kouhtuam houtu a pan uutin chu, natohna hoih adeih ahi.
Huchiin kouhtuam houtu chu soiseelbei, ji khat nei, kisuumthei, pilvaangtah, gamtathoih, zindousiam, thuhilh thei,
uain kham haatlou, kihaau haatlou, punna niin a huaiham lou, mijaidam, minial haatlou, een haatlou,
amah innsung hoihtaha vaihawmzou, zahumna teng toh a tate thununna nuaia koih mi ahih diing ahi.
Ajiahchu mi’n amah innsung bawn vaihawm daan aheet louh leh, bangchiin Pathian kouhtuam aenkol thei diai?
Gingthahmi ahihlouh diing ahi, huchilou inchu akisathei kha diing a, diabol bangin siamlouhtanna atang ve kha diing hi.
Hubaan ah zong amah chu polam mite soiphat ahih ngeei diing ahi, huchilou inchu soisiat-a umin diabol thaang ah a-awh kha diing hi.
Huchibangmahin, dikonte chu mi zahum, thusoi heng lehleh loumi, uain hailou, punna niin a huaiham lou,
sialephaheetna siangtah a ginna thukiphual keem mi ahih diing uh ahi.
Huleh hite chu etchian hi masa uh henla, huchia soiseelbei ahih uh leh, dikon nna tong uh heh.
Huchibangmahin a jite uh zong mizahum ahih ngeei diing uh ahi, miheehsiathaat lou, kisuumthei, sil zousiah a ginum ahih diing uh ahi.
Dikonte chu ji khat nei, huleh a tate uh leh a innsung uh kituuptaha vaihawmzou mi hi uh heh.
Ajiahchu kouhtuam dikon nna hoihtaha tongte’n dinmun hoihtah leh Khrist Jesu a um ginna lama hamuanna loupitah akimuh uhi.
Sawtlou kaala na kawma hung kineemin hi thute na kawmah ka hung gial hi.
Hizongleh ka hung um sawt khaah leh, Pathian inn sunga bangchibanga gamta diing na hiai chih na heetna diingin ka hung gial ahi, huchu Pathian hing kouhtuam, thutah khuam leh thutah kingahna ahi.

Huleh Pathian ngaihsahna thukiphual chu nial guallouhin aloupi ahi: Pathian chu tahsa in ahung kilang a, Hagau a siamtansah ahi a, angelte’n amu va, Jentelte kawma taangkoupihin aum a, khovel ah gintaatin aum a, loupina a puitouhin aumta hi.
Hizongleh hun nunung lam chiangin mi khenkhatte’n puimangna hagaute leh dawite thuhilhnate ngaihsahin, ginna chu atawpsan diing uh chih Hagau in chiantahin asoi hi;
lepchiahna a juauthu soiin, a sialephaheetna uh siih aam a biha umin,
kiteen khaamin, huleh thutah gingta a hete’n kipaahthu soia asaan mei diing uh, Pathian in asiam ante chu ne lou diingin thu apia uhi.
Pathian silsiam zousiah chu ahoih hi, huleh kipaahthu soia saan ahih phot leh, bangmah nual diing aum sih hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thu leh haamteina a suhsiangthou ahita hi.
Hi silte unaute na heetsah leh, nang chu Jesu Khrist thunatongtu hoih, ginna thute leh thugin hoih tutana na juih khu a vaahkhanga um na hi diing hi.
Hizongleh Pathian zahlouhna thu leh piteehte taangthu bulbaal neilou haw nual inla, Pathian ngaihsahna lamah kithunun in.
Ajiahchu tahsa kithununna ahihleh themkhat chauh aphatuam a, hizongleh Pathian ngaihsahna chu tua umzing leh hung um kiit diinga hinna thuchiam nei ahih jiahin sil zousiah ah aphatuam hi.
Hichu thu gintaathuai leh pomtaah mahmah ahi.
Ajiahchu huchia Pathian hing i muan jiahin i tonggim a, i pang teeiteei uh ahi. Amah chu mi zousiah Hundampa ahi a, a gingtate a ahi diaahkhol hi.
Hi thute chu pia inla, huleh hilh in.
Na naupanna koimah in musit sih heh, hizongleh haam kamsuah ah, gamtat daan ah, lungsiatna lam thu ah, hagaulam thu ah, ginna thu ah, sianthouna lam thu ah, gingtute etton diing hijaw in.
Ka hung masiah lehkhasim leh hasot leh thuhilh ngaihsah in.
Nangmah a um silpiaah, thusoilawhna a upate khut ngahna toh nang hung kipeta chu thahdah sin.
Mi zousiah a diinga na khantouhna alat theihna diingin hu silte ngaihtuah inla, hute ah kizangzou in.
Nangmah leh na thuhilh ah pilvaang in. Hu silte ah umzing in, ajiahchu huchibang hihna jaalin nangmah leh na thu jate na huumbit diing hi.
Pasal upate chu natahin taai sinla, himahleh pa bangin, akhanglai deuhte chu sanggampa bangin hasot in,
numei upate chu nute bangin, akhanglai deuhte chu sanggamnu bangin, siangthoutahin hasotin.
Meithaite, meithai tahzette chu zahbawl in.

Hizongleh meithai koipouh in tate aha, tute aha aneihin chu, amah un inn sungah Pathian ngaihsah daan leh a nulepate uh hoihna thuhkiit daan jil masa uh heh; ajiahchu Pathian muhin huchu ahoih a huleh apomtaah hi.
Huleh meithai tahzet, amah tanga um in chu Pathian amuang a, suun leh jaan a ngeenin ahaamtei zingzing hi.
Hizongleh tahsa nopsahna a hingnu chu a damlaiin zong asi ahi.
Huleh soiseelbeia aum theihna diingun hi thute pia in.
Hizongleh koipouh in amah innkote a diing, adiaahkhola amah innkuanpihte a diing apoimoh uh angaihtuahsah louh leh, ginna chu ajuausan a, ginglou mi saangin asejaw ahi.
Meithai kum sawmguup nuailam chu meithai in sim sinla, huleh pasal khat chauh ji anahi a,

sil hoih bawl lama mi paahtawia um a, tate khoilian a, mikhualte anazintun a, mi siangthoute keeng anasilta a, mi gimthuaahte anapanpihta a, sil hoih photmah a thanuamtaha anakipumpiaah ahihleh, meithai in sim in.
Hizongleh meithai khanglai deuhte jawh gial sin, ajiahchu tahsa uutna in Khrist lama akipiaahna uh azoh chiangin pasal neih auut veu uhi.
Huchiin a ginna masa uh apaih jiahun siamlouhtangin aum veu uhi.
Hubaan ah, inn chin ah avaahleh va, thasiat achiing va, huleh thasiat chauh zong hilouin mi tanchin soite leh phatuamloua mi tungtaang buaipihte ahung hi va asoi louh diing uh asoi uhi.
Hujiahin meithai khanglai deuhte’n chu pasal nei uh henla, talenau neiin, innsung keem hoihin soiseelna diing lemtaang mawngmawng meelma musah sih uh leh ka deih hi.
Ajiahchu tuin zong mi khenkhat Setan lamah apeetkheta uhi.
Gingtu numei aha pasal aha in meithaite aneih leh, somdawl heh, huchia meithai tahzette asomdawl theihna diingin kouhtuam chu puaahgih guanin um sih heh.
Kouhtuam upa vaihawm hoihte chu alehniha zahbawltuaaha seh hi uh heh, adiaahkholin thusoi leh thuhilhna lama tonggimte chu.
Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Bawngtal in buh achil laiin a muuh kaan sin,” huleh, “Natongtu chu loh mutaah ahi,” achi hi.
Kouhtuam upa heehna chu heetpihtu nih aha thum aha louin pom sin.
Misualte chu midangte’n zong alau theihna diingun mi zousiah ma ah taaihilh in.
Khentuam neia bangmah bawllou a, deihsahtuam neiloua hi thute jui diingin Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist leh angel teela umte mitmuh ah thu ka hung pia hi.
Mi koima tungah khut nga pahpah sinla, midangte sualna ah zong vatel sin, siangtahin kikoih zing in.
Na gilpi jiahin leh na damlouh veu jiahin, tui chauh dawn nawn sinla, uain them khatkhat zang veu in.
Mi khenkhatte sualna chu akilangchiang a, vaihawmna ah atung masa veu hi; hizongleh mi khenkhatte chu a sualna un anung vah ajui hi.
Huchibangmahin khenkhatte sil hoih bawl kilang masa aum a, huchibang loute zong phual theih ahi sih hi.
Pathian min leh a thugin soisiat-a aum louhna diingin suaah ngawngkol baat photmahte’n amahuh pute chiat chu bangkim ah zahbawltaahin ngai uh heh.

Huleh gingtu pute a neite’n unau ahih jiahun zahtaat louin um sih uh heh. Husaangmahin phattuamna mute chu gingtu leh deihtahte ahih jiahun a nna uh tohsah jaw seem uh heh. Hi thute hilh inla, hasot in.
Mi koipouh in thuhilhna dang ahilh a, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist thutah leh Pathian ngaihsahna diinga thuhilhna toh akituaah louh leh,
amah chu akisathei ahi a, bangma helou ahi. Heet malahin kinial leh thukalh lamah alungluut jawta a, huchibang apatin thangsiatna, kinialna, soisiatna, kiginmohna hoihloute,
lungsim gilou neia thutah neilou mite apat kinial haatna bang ahung suaah veu a, huchibang mite’n Pathian ngaihsah chu punna in angai uhi. Huchibang mi apat kiheemkhia in.
Hizongleh lungkimna toh Pathian ngaihsah chu punna nasatah ahi.
Ajiahchu khovel ah bangma i poluut sih a, bangma i podoh het sih diing uhi.
Huchiin neeh diing leh silh diing neiin hute ah i lungawi diing uhi.
Hizongleh hauhsat tumte chu heemna leh thaang ah, uutna ngolhuai leh susethei tampi bang ah apuuhluut veu va, hute’n chu siatna leh manthaaina ah mite asutum veu uhi.
Ajiahchu sum ngaihnat hi gilou zousiah bulpi ahi. Huchu khenkhat in adeihgoh va, ginna apaimangsan va, huleh amahuh leh amahuh lungkhamna tampi in akisunlet uhi.
Hizongleh, aw nang Pathian mipa, hi silte taaisan inla, dihtatna bang, Pathian ngaihsahna bang, ginna bang, lungsiatna bang, dohtheihna bang, thunuaigolhna bang delh jaw in.
Ginna kidouna hoih dou inla, kumtuang hinna chu tu in, hu tang diinga kouh zong na hi a, heetpihtu tamtah mitmuhin kiphuanna hoih chu na phuangta hi.
Sil bangkim a hinna petu Pathian leh Pontia Pilat ma a kiphuanna hoih phuangpa Khrist Jesu mitmuhin thu ka hung pia hi,
i Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung kilat masiah thupiaah chu siangthou leh soiseelbeia kol diingin,
hu kilatna chu ahuntah ah Ama’n ahung lah diing hi, Amah chauh chu ahamphapa leh Thuneipa, kumpipate Kumpipa, lalpate Lalpa ahi a,
Amah chauh sihtheihlouhna neipa, koima naih theihlouh vaah a umpa, koima muh ngeilouh leh muh theihlouhpa ahi a, Amah kawmah loupina leh kumtuang silbawltheihna um hen. Amen.
Hi khovel a mihausate chu kisatheilou diing leh hauhsatna kiplou a muanna ngalou a, sil zousiah i kipaahna diinga kichingtah meia hung petu Pathian tunga nga jaw diingin hilh in.
Sil hoih bawl diingin, sil hoih bawl hau diingin, silphal diingin, kihop uut diingin,
kumtuang hinna atuuhdet theihna diingva, hun hung tung diinga innbulkip hoihtah amahuh diinga kholkhawm diingin hilh in.
Aw Timothi, na kawma kolsaha um chu keembit in, Pathian zahlouhna thusoi meimei leh adihloua heetna anakichi nialkalhnate chu pumpelh in.
Huchu khenkhat in nei hiin akisoi va, ginna lamah apaikhialta uhi. Hehpihna na kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Khrist Jesu a um hinna thuchiam dungjuia Pathian deihjawnga Jesu Khrist apostol in,
ka ta deihtah Timothi kawmah: Pa Pathian leh Khrist Jesu i Lalpa uh kawm akipan hehpihna, khotuahna leh hamuanna um hen.
Suun leh jaan a ka haamteinate a tawplou a ka hung heetzingin, ka pulepate bawl banga sialephaheetna siangtah toh a nna ka toh ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi.
Kipaahna a ka dim theihna diingin na mittuite hezingin, nangmah hung muh ka uut mahmah hi.
Ginna dihtah nangmah a um chu ka ngaihtuah chiangin, hu ginna chu amasapeenin na pi Loisi ah aum a, na nu Euniki ah zong aum a, huleh nangmah ah zong aum chih ka hechiang hi.
Hujiahin ka khut ngah tungtawna Pathian silpiaah nangmah a um chu muutkuang diingin ka hung henonsah hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in launa hagau ahung pe sih a, hizongleh silbawltheihna leh lungsiatna leh lungsim kithuzohna hagau ahung pe jaw hi.

Hujiahin i Lalpa thu heetpihna chu zumpih sinla, ahihlouhleh Amah diinga mitaang kei zong hung zumpih sin; hizongleh Pathian silbawltheihna bang jeela tanchinpha jiaha gimthuaahna hung thuaahpihtu hijaw in.
Ama’n chu i silbawlte dungjui uh hilouin, hizongleh leilung pianma a Khrist Jesu a ahung piaah, Amah lemguat daan leh hehpihna dungjuiin ahung hundamta a huleh kouhna siangthou in ahung kouta hi.
Hizongleh ahung Hundampa Jesu Khrist kilaahna jiahin tuin suhlatin aumta a, Ama’n chu sihna sumangin, hinna leh sihtheihlouhna chu tanchinpha tungtawnin ahung sulangta hi.
Hu tanchinpha diinga kei chu thuphuangtu diing leh apostol diing leh Jentelte thuhilhtu diinga guat ka hi hi.
Hikhu jiahin hi silte zong ka thuaah hi; ahihvaangin ka zum sih, ajiahchu ka gintaatpa ka he a, huleh Amah kawma ka kolsah chu hu Ni tanin akolbit thei chih chiantahin ka he hi.
Khrist Jesu a um ginna leh lungsiatna ah, kei apat etton diing thu dih na jaahte chu tukip in.
Sil hoih na kawma kolsaha um chu i sunga teeng Hagau Siangthou tungtawnin keem in.
Asia gam a um zousiah in ahung nungheisan uh chih na he hi, a lahvah Phigela leh Hermogene atel uhi.
Lalpa’n Onesiphora innkuanpihte kawmah khotuahna pia heh, ajiahchu ama’n ahung suhalh jeeljeel a, ka khainiang buh zong azumpih sih a,
hizongleh Rom khua ahung tun tahin kuhkaltahin ahung hawl a huleh ahung mudoh hi.
Hu Ni chianga Lalpa kawma khotuahna amuh diing Lalpa’n phalsah hen! Huleh Ephesi khua a ka nna tampi ahung tohsah daan hoihtahin na he hi.
Hujiahin, nang ka tapa, Khrist Jesu a um khotuahna ah haattahin um in.
Huleh heetpihtu tampi laha ka kawma thu na jaahte, hute chu mi muanhuai midangte zong hilhsawn thei diingte kawmah keemsah in.
Huchihjiahin nang in Jesu Khrist sepaih hoihtah bangin gimthuaah hung thuaahpih in.
Sepaih hi diinga teelpa akipaahsah theihna diingin sepaih koimah hi damsung khosahnate in akisubuai ngei sih hi.
Huleh kidemna ah mi pang mah zongleh, daan banga abawl louh leh, kipaahman amu ngei sih hi.
Loubawlmi tonggimtah chu a gah tang masapeen ahih diing ahi.
Ka thusoi chu ngaihtuah in, ajiahchu Lalpa’n nang chu sil zousiah ah heetsiamna ahung pia hi.
Jesu Khrist, David chihaah a mi chu ka tanchinpha soi bangin misi lah apat kaihthohin aum hi chih hezing in.
Hu tanchinpha jiahin silgilou bawltu bangin kaanna tanpha hahsatna ka thuaahloh a; hizongleh Pathian thu chu kaanin aum sih hi.
Hujiahin Khrist Jesu a um hutdamna chu kumtuanga loupina toh amuh theihna diingun teelte jiahin sil zousiah ka thuaah ahi.
Hi thu chu agintaathuaiin adih ahi: Ajiahchu Amah toh sita i hih leh, Amah toh i hing khawm diing uhi.
I thuaah leh, Amah toh vai i hawm khawm diing hi. Amah i kiheetmohbawl leh, Ama’n zong ahung kiheetmohbawl diing hi.
Eite ginum sih zonglei, Amah chu aginum zing hi, ajiahchu Amah leh Amah akiheetmohbawl thei sih hi.
Angaikhetute diinga phatuamlou, beimangna hi giap thute a kinial lou diingin hi silte hesah zing inla, Lalpa ma ah thu pia in.
Thutah thu dihtaha khenin, zumna diing neilou natongtu bangin, Pathian kawma pomtaaha kipe diingin phatuamngaitahin um in.
Hizongleh Pathian zahtaatlouhna thusoi meimeite nungheisan in, ajiahchu huchibangte’n mite chu Pathian ngaihsahlouhna lamah apui gamla deuhdeuh uhi.
Huleh a thusoi uh chu meimasia bangin adalh deuhdeuh diing hi. A lahvah Humenai leh Phileta apang uhi.
Hute’n chu thohkiitna aum zouta chiin, thutah apaisan va, mi khenkhatte ginna asubuai veh uhi.
Ahihvaangin Pathian innbulkip chu ading zing a, hi chiamchihna anei hi: “Lalpa’n Amah-ate ahe hi,” huleh, “Mi chin Khrist min lou photmah in giitlouhna paisan heh,” chih chu.
Hizongleh inn loupi sungah sana leh dangka beelte chauh aum sih a, hizongleh sing beel leh lei beelte zong aum a, khenkhat zahum in aum va huleh khenkhat zahumlou zong aum hi.
Hujiahin mi koi hizongleh hi silte laha akikepsiangthou leh, beel zahum, siangthou leh a pu diinga zat taah, sil hoih chinteng a kipeihsa ahi diing hi.
Teilawl uutnate zong taaisan inla, himahleh lungtang siangthou a Lalpa min koute toh dihtatnate, ginnate, lungsiatnate, kilepnate delh jaw in.
Hizongleh ngolhuai leh pilhuailou kinialnate in kikhinna asiam chih hein, hute ah pang sin.
Huleh Lalpa suaah khat chu mi toh kinialhaat ahih diing ahi sih a, hizongleh mi zousiah tunga jaidam, thuhilhthei leh thuaahthei ahihjawh diing ahi.
Pathian in thutah a heetna diingva kisiihna apiaah khaah leh, chiin a kalhtute chu jaidamtahin athuhilh diing ahi,
huleh huchia diabol in amah deihjawng bawl diinga sal a amatte ahung kiphawh va, diabol thaang apat ahung suahtaat theihna diingun.
Huleh hi zong he in, ni nunung lamah hun hahsa tahtahte ahung um diing hi.
Ajiahchu mi amahuh kilungsiatte, sum ngainate, kiuangsahte, kisatheite, Pathian soisete, nulepa thumangloute, kipaahnataang heloute, siangthouloute,
iitna neiloute, kilep uutloute, juau a miheehte, kideehtheiloute, mi huhamte, hoih mawngmawng deihloute,
leptatte, ngongtatte, kingaisangte, Pathian lungsiat saanga tahsa nopsahna ngainajawte bang ahi diing uh,
Pathian ngaihsah batna anei diingva hizongleh a silbawltheihna atahsang sih diing uhi. Huchibang mite chu nungheisan in!
Ajiahchu huchibangte laha mite chu innte bang ah aluut va, sual gih in anet numei haatloute sal in aman va, uutna chinteng in apuimang uhi,
hute’n chu jil zing napiin thutah ahe thei het sih uhi.
Huleh Janne leh Jambre in Mosi akhin bangun, hite’n zong thutah adoudaal zing uhi, amahuh chu lungsim sesuaah mi, ginna lama Pathian deihlouh mi ahi uhi.
Hizongleh ma asawn thei sih diing uhi, ajiahchu Janne leh Jambre bangin angoldaan uh mi zousiah kawmah ahung kilang diing hi.
Hizongleh nang chu ka thuhilhna, ka hindaan, ka siltup, ka ginna, ka thuaahtheihdaan, ka lungsiatna, ka kuhkaldaan pilvaangtahin nana juita a,
suhduhdahna leh suhgimna Antiok leh Ikoniam leh Lystra khuate a ka tunga siltungte leh suhduhdahna ka thuaahte pilvaangtahin nana juita hi. Huleh hute zousiah ah Lalpa’n ahung hundohta hi.
Ahi, mi Khrist Jesu a Pathian ngaihsaha um tum zousiah in suhduhdahna athuaah diing mah ahi.
Hizongleh migilou leh miheemhaatte chu miheem leh heema umin asesuaah deuhdeuh diing uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu koi kawm apat na jil ahiai chih hein, na jilsa leh heetchiansaha na umna silte ah umzing in.
Huleh nang chu na naupan lai apat Khrist Jesu a ginna jiaha hutdamna mu khopa nang hung hilhpilthei Pathian Lehkhathu Siangthou he na hita hi.
Pathian Lehkhathu zousiah chu Pathian huhaihkhuma piaah ahi a, huleh hichu thuhilhna diing bang, kitaaihilhna diing bang, kisuhdihna diing bang leh dihtatna lama thuhilhna diing bangin aphatuam hi,
huchia Pathian mi chu nna hoih zousiah tong diinga kimtaha akithuam bukim theihna diingin.
Hujiahin Pathian ma leh Amah leh a lalgam hung kilat chianga mihing leh misite vaihawmsah diingpa Jesu Khrist ma ah thu ka hung pia hi:
Thu chu soi in! Ahun ah bang, ahunlou ah bang kimansain um in. Thuaahthei taha thuhilh pumin a siamlouh daan uh hesah inla, taaihilh inla, hasot in.
Ajiahchu thuhilhna dih angaihkhiah peihlouh hun uh hung tung diing ahi; hizongleh a bilte uh thu thah ja nuama athah het-het jiahin amahuh deihjawng bangin a kawmvah thuhilhtu akhawm diing uhi.
Huleh a bilte uh thutah lam apat aheimang diing va, taangthu bulbal neilou lam ngain adohta diing uhi.
Hizongleh nang chu sil zousiah ah pilvaang inla, gimthuaah inla, sawlleh tanchinphasoina nna tong inla, na thunatohna chu sutaangtung in.
Ajiahchu tuin kei chu dawn sillat banga sunbuaah ka hita a, ka chiahdohna hun anaita hi.
Kidouna hoih chu ka douta a, kitaaidemna chu ka zouta a, ginna chu ka keemta hi.

Tuin chu dihtatna lallukhuh kei diingin koihin aumta, huchu Lalpa, Vaihawmtu dihtah in hu Ni chiangin ahung pe diing hi; huleh kei kawmah chauh hilouin Amah kilaahna ngaina photmahte kawmah zong ape diing hi.
Kintaha ka kawma hung diingin theihtawp hung suah in.
Ajiahchu Dema in hi tulai khovel angaihnat jiahin ahung paisanta a, huleh Thessalonika ah achiahta hi; Kresen chu Galatia gam ah achiahta a, Tita chu Dalmatia gam ah achiahta hi.
Luk chauh ka kawmah aum hi. Mark jawn inla, hung tonpih in, ajiahchu thunatohna lamah amah kei diingin aphatuam hi.
Huleh Tikika chu Ephesi ah ka sawlta hi.
Na hung chiangin Troas khua a Karpo kawma puannaahtual ka nuutsiat khu lehkhabute toh hung pua in, adiaahkholin savun lehkhabute khu.
Alexandar, sumsungpa ka tungah agilou mahmah hi. Lalpa’n a natohte bangjeelin athuh diing hi.
Amah apat nang zong pilvaang in, ajiahchu ama’n i thute adou naah mahmah hi.
Ka siamna thu ka soi masatpeen laiin koima’n ahung dinpih sih a, mi zousiah in ahung taaisan veh uhi. A mohna uh chu a tungvah tun dah heh.

Hizongleh tanchinpha thusoi chu kei jiaha bukimtaha zoha aum a, huleh Jentelte zousiah in ajaah theihna diingun Lalpa’n ahung dinpih a huleh ahung suhaatta hi. Huleh huumpibahnei kam apatin suahtaatsahin ka umta hi.
Huleh Lalpa’n natoh gilou chinteng lah apatin ahung suaahtasah diing a, huleh a vaan lalgam ah bittahin ahung tut diing hi; Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin loupina umta hen. Amen.
Priska leh Akuila, huleh Onesiphora innkuanpihte chibai hung buuhsah in.
Erasta chu Korinth ah aum zing a, Trophima ahihleh Mileta ah damlouin ka nuseta hi.
Phalbi ma a hung teeiteei diingin na theihtawp suah in. Eubula in chibai ahung buuh a, Puden, Lina, Klaudia leh unaute zousiah in zong chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Lalpa Jesu Khrist chu na hagau kawmah um hen. Hehpihna na kawmah um hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian suaah leh, Pathian miteelte ginna dungjui leh Pathian ngaihsahna toh kituaah thutah heetna dungjuia Jesu Khrist apostol in,
hichu juau theilou Pathian in hun kipat ma peha achiamsa kumtuang hinna kinepna a kinga in,
hizongleh i Hundampa uh Pathian thupiaah dungjuia ka kawma kolsaha um a thu chu taangkoupihna tungtawnin ahuntahin asulangta hi.
Ginna kibatna thu a ka tapa dihtah Tita kawmah: Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist i Hundampa uh kawm akipan hehpihna, khotuahna leh hamuanna um hen.
Krit tuikulhgam a ka hung nuutsiat jiah chu sil bawlzoh louha umte na siamtuup theihna diing leh ka hung thupiaah banga khopi chin a upate na guat theihna diingin ahi;
kouhtuam upa diing chu dembaanglou, ji khat nei, a tate chu noptat leh thumangloua heeha um mi hilouin gingtu ahih diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu kouhtuam houtu chu Pathian goukeemtu bangin dembaanglou, thusuaah tumlou, lungthah baihlou, uain kham haatlou, mihuham lou, punna niin a huaihamlou,
hizongleh zindousiam, sil hoih deih, lungsim dih, midihtat, misiangthou, mikisuumthei,

huchia hi thuhilhna dih tungtawna midangte hasot thei a huleh amah nialkalhtute zong adihlouh daan uh aheetchiansah theihna diinga amah anakithuhilhtaah bangmaha thu muanhuai chu dettaha tukip zing mi ahih ngeei diing ahi.
Ajiahchu mi thununglou, jawt haam haat leh miheem haatte tampi aum uhi, amahuh chu zehtan haw laha mi ahi diaahkhol uhi.
Hute kam chu hupsah diing ahi. Punna niin deihmanin thu ahilh louh diing uh ahilh va, mi innkuan sung atohbuai veu uhi.
Amahuh laha khat, a zawlnei ngeei uh khat in, “Krit mite chu juau soi zingte, gamsa giloute, thase anhaite ahi uh,” chiin asoi hi.
Hi heetpihna chu adih ahi. Hujiahin ginna a ahung lamzan theihna diingun khauhtahin taaihilh in,
Judate bawltawm taangthute leh thutah apat peetmangte thupiaahte ngaihsah lou diingin khauhtahin taaihilh in.
Misiangthou a diingin sil zousiah asiangthou hi; hizongleh misianglou leh gingloute a diingin bangma asiang aum sih hi. A lungsim uh leh a sialepha heetna tanpha uh zong abuaah ahita hi.
Amah un Pathian ka he chiin a kam un aphuang va, hizongleh a silbawlte un Pathian anual va, akihdahhuai va, Pathian thu manglouin, huleh nna hoih chinteng tohna diingin chitna himhim anei sih uhi.
Hizongleh nang in chu thugin dih toh kituaah thute soi in.
Puteehte chu pilvaang diingin, zahum diingin, kisuumthei diingin, ginna leh lungsiatna leh kuhkalna a adihtah hi diingin thuhilh in.
Huchibangmahin piteehte zong sianthouna toh kilawma gamta diingin, dihloutaha misoisiat haatlou diingin, uain hailou diing leh sil hoih hilhtute hi diingin thuhilh in;
huchia amah un nupi khanglai lamte chu a pasalte uh lungsiat diing leh, a tate uh lungsiat diing leh,

pilvaang diing leh, siangthou a um diing leh, innsung nna tong diing leh, hoihtaha um diing leh a pasalte uh thu mang diinga ahilh theihna diingun, huchia Pathian thu chu soisiat-a aum louhna diingin.
Huchibangmahin pasal khanglai lamte zong pilvaang diingin hasot in.
Sil zousiah ah sil hoih bawlna lama etton diingin kimusah in; thugin a na det daan, na zahum daan leh na dih daan bang ensah in,
nangmah tungtaang ahoihloua genbaang aum louh jiaha alang a pangtute azumsuaah theihna diingun, soiseel guallouhin thusoi ah dih in.
Suaahte chu a pute uh thu mang diing leh mi kam dawng loua sil zousiah a akipaahna jawng va um diingin,
Pathian i Hundampa uh thuhilhna thu chu sil zousiah a acheimawi theihna diingva khutthem neilou a, ginumna hoih zousiah musah jaw diingin hasot in.
Ajiahchu hutdamna hung tut Pathian hehpihna chu mi zousiah kawmah ahung kilangta hi.
Huh in chu Pathian ngaihsah louhna leh khovel uutnate tawpsan a, tulai khang a pilvaang leh dihtattah leh Pathian ngaihsah a um diingin ahung hilh a,
kinepna kilawphuaitah ngaahin, huleh i Pathian loupi uh leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist loupitaha hung kilatna diing chu ngaahin i um diing uh ahi chih ahung hilh hi.
Ama’n chu daan poisahlouhna zousiah apat ahung tatkhiah theihna diing leh Amah a diinga nna hoih bawl diinga phatuamngai ateeltuam mite asuhsiangthou theihna diingin i luangun akipeta hi.
Hi thute soi inla, hasot inla, huleh thuneitahin taaihilh in. Koima’n nang hung musit sih hen.
Amahuh chu vaihawmtute leh thuneitute kawma kituluut diingin, huleh sil hoih taphot bawl diinga kigingsa a um diingin,
mi koima soise lou diingin, lemna deih diingin, nunneem diingin mi zousiah kawma kingaihngiamna zousiah ensah jaw diingin hilhpha in.
Ajiahchu eite ngeei zong malaiin mingolte, thumangloute, heema umte, tahsa uutna leh nopna chi tuamtuam natongtute, gilou leh thangse zinga umte, huathuai leh khat leh khat kimudahte i na hi uhi.
Hizongleh mihing tunga i Hundampa uh Pathian chitna leh lungsiatna ahung kilat nungin,
dihtatna natoh eiuh bawlte jiah hilouin, hizongleh pianthahna silna leh Hagau Siangthou siamthahkiitna in, Ama’n a hehpihna dungjuiin ahung hundamta hi.
Hu Hagau Siangthou chu Jesu Khrist i Hundampa tungtawnin i tungvah kiningchingtahin ahung leihbota hi.
A hehpihna a siamtansah a umin kumtuang hinna kinepna dungjuiin gouluahtu diinga siamin i um ngeei diing uhi.
Hichu thusoi ginum ahi, huleh Pathian gingtasate chu nna hoih sep sunzom diinga apilvaang diing uh ahi chia phuut zing diingin ka hung deih ahi. Hite chu mihing diingin ahoih a, huleh aphatuam hi.
Hizongleh thudoh ngolhuaite, khangthu suutte, kinialnate leh daan thu a kikalhnate chu kiheimangsan in, ajiahchu hute chu sil phatuamlou leh bangmalou ahi.
Kikhenna tuntu chu khatvei huleh nihvei na vauhilh nungin nual in,
huchibang mi chu amah leh amah siamlouh kitangsah ahih jiaha lammang leh asual ahi chih hein.
Artema ahihlouhleh Tikika na kawma ka hung sawl chiangin Nikopoli khua ah ka kawmah hung teeiteei tum in, ajiahchu hu mun ah phalbi sung um ka tum hi.
Daansiam Zena leh Apollo a khualzinna va bangmah ataahsap louhna diingun theihtawpsuahin hung pui in.
Huleh i mite zong gahloua aum louhna diingun apoimoh kinte uh awnghu diinga nna hoih seemtou zing diingin kijilsah in.
Ka kawma um zousiah in nang chibai ahung buuh uhi. Ginna a ei hung lungsiatte chibai anabuuh in. Na bawnva kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Paul, Jesu Khrist jiaha mitaang leh i unaupa uh Timothi in, ka lawm deihtah uh leh ka natohpih uh Philemon kawmah,
huleh ka deihtah uh Apphia leh ka sepaih hihpih uh Arkippo kawmah leh na inn a kouhtuam kikhawmte kawmah:
i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
Ka haamteinate a na min lou zingzingin ka Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi,
Lalpa Jesu lam leh misiangthoute zousiah lama lungsiatna leh ginna na neih daan jain,
huchia na ginna kikoppihna chu Khrist Jesu a nangmah a um sil hoih chinteng heetkimna lama ahung phattuam theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu na lungsiatna ah nuamna leh hehnepna loupitah ka nei uhi, ajiahchu unaupa, nangmah jiahin misiangthoute lungtang ahalhta hi.
Hujiahin akilawm hun bawl diinga thu hung piaah chu Khrist ah kingam mahmah zong leng,
lungsiatna jiahin keimah Paul, teehsepu leh tua zong Jesu Khrist jiaha mitaang in ka hung ngeen jaw ahi:
ka koltaanna a ka hinkhiah ka tapa Onesima a diingin ka hung ngeen hi.
Amah chu tuma laiin nang a diingin aphatuam sih a, hizongleh tuin chu nang leh kei diingin aphatuamta hi.
Amah chu ka hung sawl kiit hi. Hujiahin anapom in, amah chu ka lungtang peetmah ahi a,
ka tanchinpha koltaanna a nangmah luanga nna hung tohsah diingin ka kawma umdensah ka uut mahmah hi.
Hizongleh na lemsahna louin bangmah ka bawl uut sih, ajiahchu na sil hoih bawl chu phuutluih a bawl hilou a, uutthu a bawl ahihjawh theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu hun tomkhat sung hikhu diinga nang ahung kikhenpih chu kumtuanga amah na neih jawhna diing zong ahi meithei hi,
suaah banga hilouin, suaah saanga hoihjaw, unau deihtah bangin, adiaahin kei diingin chu deihtah ahi a, nang a diing seemin tahsa ah leh Lalpa ah abangchi hih diaahkholta diaimah?
Hujiahin na kithuahpih banga na hung geel leh, keimah ngeei bangin anapom in.
Na tunga bawlkhial aneih a, bat bangma aneih leh keimah batin anakoih in.
Keimah, Paul in hikhu ka khut ngeei a ka gelh ahi, keima’n ka ditsah diing hi, huchia nangmah ngeei zong kei kawmah na kiba ahi chih na kawma ka soi khel ngailouin.
Ahi, unaupa, nangmah apat phattuamna Lalpa ah hung neisah inla; Lalpa ah ka lungtang hung suhalh in.
Na thumanna a kimuangin leh ka soi saanga loupijawa na bawl diing gingtain na kawmah ka hung gial hi.
Huchibang kaal ah, kei diingin zong tunna inn khat hung na ngaihtuahsah in, ajiahchu na haamteinate uh tungtawna na kawmva piaaha ka um diing ka gingta hi.
Khrist Jesu a ka koltaanpih Epaphra in chibai ahung buuh hi,
huleh Mark, Aristarka, Dema leh Luk, ka natohpihte’n zong chibai ahung buuh uhi.
I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na hagau uh kawmah umta hen. Amen.
Pathian, nidanglaia i pulepate kawma lam tuamtuam leh je tuamtuam a zawlneite zanga thu anasoipa in,
hi ni nunungte ah a Tapa in i kawmah thu asoita a, Amah chu sil zousiah gouluahtu diingin aguat a, khovel zong Amah tungtawna siam ahi.

Amah chu Pathian loupina vaah leh Pathian hihna dihtah langsahtu hi in, sil zousiah a silbawltheihna thu a tudingin, Amah mah in i sualnate asilsiang zoh nungin, tunglam a Loupipeen jiatlam ah atouta hi.
Ama’n angelte saanga min phajaw gouluah a atan bang ngeeiin, amahuh saanga hoihjaw mahmah ahung hita him hi.

Ajiahchu angelte lahah khoipeen kawmah ahiai Ama’n hi thute soi khaahna ananeih ngei, “Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni in ka hung hingkheta hi”? chih leh, “Amah diingin Pa ka hi diing a, kei diingin Amah chu Tapa ahi diing hi”? chih chu.
Hizongleh tachiil khovel a ahung puiluut laiin, Ama’n, “Pathian angelte zousiah in Amah bia uh heh,” achi hi.
Huleh angelte tungtaang thu ah chu hichiin achi hi, “Ama’n a angelte chu huih asuaahsah a, huleh a natongte zong meikuang asuaahsah hi,” chiin.
Hizongleh Tapa tungtaang thu ah Ama’n, “Aw Pathian, na laltouphah chu kumtuang kumtuangin aum a, dihtatna lalchiang chu na lalgam lalchiang ahi.
Nangma’n dihtatna na deih a, daan poisahlouhna chu na hua hi. Hujiahin Pathian, na Pathian ngeei in, nang chu na lawmte tung daih ah kipaahna thau ahung nuhta hi,” chiin asoi hi.
Huleh, “LALPA, nangma’n achiil in leilung kingahna na phuumta a, huleh vaante zong na khutsuaah ahi.
Amahuh chu ahung mangthaai diing va, hizongleh nang chu na um zingzing diing hi; huleh amahuh chu a bawnun puansilh bangin ahung lui diing uh;
puan bangin na jial diing a, ahung kihengta diing uhi. Hizongleh nang chu angeingei na hi a, na kumte’n zong bei ni himhim anei sih diing hi,” chiin.
Hizongleh angelte laha khoipeen kawmah ahiai Ama’n hi thute soikhaahna ananeih ngei, “Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in”? chiin.
Hu angelte zousiah chu hutdamna gouluah diingte natohsah diinga sawldoh natongtu hagaute ahi sih viaimah?
Hujiahin i thu jaahsate uh tahzet-a i ngaihkhawh seem diing uh ahi, huchilou inchu i tolhmang kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu angelte zanga thu kisoi bawn anakip a, bohsiatna leh thumanlouhna chinteng in gawtna dihtattah amuh un chu,
huchilawma hutdamna loupi ngaihsah sih lei, bangchiin ahiai i suaahtaat diing uh? Hu hutdamna thu chu achiilin Lalpa’n anasoi pat ahi a, huleh a thu jatute’n i kawmah asukip uhi.
Pathian in zong chiamchihnate leh sillimdangte, silbawltheihna tuamtuam toh, huleh Hagau Siangthou silpiaah tuamtuamte in Amah deihdaan dungjuiin amahuh aheetpih hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n i na soi uh, tununga khovel hung um diing chu angelte nuaiah akoih sih hi.
Hizongleh mi khat in, mun khat ah, “Mihing bang ahi a huchilawma na ngaihtuah, ahihlouhleh mihing tapa zong bang ahi a na ngaihsah veu?
Nangma’n amah chu angelte saanga ngiamjaw deuhin na bawl a, loupina leh paahtawina na khuhsah a, na khut natohte tungah thu na neisah a,

sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah na koihta hi,” chiin anahesahta hi. Ajiahchu Ama’n sil zousiah a thuthu a um diinga a nuaia akoihna ah, a nuaia akoih louh bangma aum sih hi. Hizongleh tuin chu sil zousiah anuai a kikoihin i mu nai tadih sih hi.

Hizongleh Pathian hehpihna jaala Ama’n mi chin a diinga sihna achep theihna diingin angelte saanga nuainungjaw deuha koiha um, huleh sihna athuaah jiaha loupina leh paahtawina khuhsaha um Jesu chu i mu uhi.

Ajiahchu Amah a diinga sil zousiah um a huleh Amah tungtawna sil zousiah umpa diingin, ta tampite loupina a apuiluutna ah, gimthuaahna tungtawna a hutdamna uh siamtu suhbukim chu Amah diingin akilawm mawng ahi.
Ajiahchu susiangthoutu leh suhsiangthoute chu khat apat ahi va, hujiahin Ama’n amahuh chu unaute chih azum sih hi,
“Ka unaute lahah na min ka phuang diing a, kipungkhawnte lahah nangmah ka hung phat diing hi,” chiin.
Huleh, “Amah ah ka muanna ka nga diing hi,” achi kiit hi. Huleh, “En un, kei leh Pathian in ahung piaah naupangte,” achi kiit hi.
Huchiin naupangte chu tahsa leh sisan tangkhawm ahih jiahun, Amah ngeei in zong humahbang hung tangin, sihna jaala sihna thuneitu, diabol asuhmang theihna diingin leh
sih lau jiaha a damsung teng uh suaaha umte asuaahtaatsah theihna diingin.
Ajiahchu adihtahin Ama’n angelte apanpih sih a, hizongleh Abraham chihaahte apanpih jaw hi.

Huchihjiahin mite a diinga sual thuphatawina diinga, Pathian lam silte a mikhotuahthei leh ginumtah Siampu Lalpeen ahih theihna diingin, sil zousiah a a unaute bangbanga bawla ahung um chu Amah diingin apoimoh him ahi.
Ajiahchu Amah ngeei in zong heemna tuaahin anathuaahtaah jiahin, heemna tuaahte chu apanpih thei hi.
Huchihjiahin, vaan kouhna tang unau siangthoute haw, i thugin lemsahna thuphuan uh Apostol leh Siampu Lalpeen, Khrist Jesu chu ngaihtuah un.
Pathian innsung mite zousiah laha Mosi chu aginum mahbangin, Amah chu Amah guattu kawmah aginum hi.
Ajiahchu inn saanga asatu paahtawia aum jawh bang ngeeiin, Amah chu Mosi saanga loupijaw diinga sim ahita hi.
Ajiahchu inn chinteng chu mi koiaha khat sah ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah satu chu Pathian ahi.
Huleh Mosi chu khonunga thu hung kisoi diingte heetsahna diingin, Pathian innsung mite zousiah lahah suaah natongtu bangin aginum ngeei hi.
Hizongleh Khrist chu Tapa bangin Pathian innsung ngeei ah aginum hi; atawp donga i hahkatna va i kinepna kipaahna uh i tuuhdet phot uh leh a innsung mite i hi uhi.
Huchihjiahin Hagau Siangthou in, “Tunia a aw na jaahva ahihleh,
gamdaai a jeetna ni a na hel bangun, na lungtang uh khauhsah sih un.
Hu mun ah na pulepate un ahung je-et va, ahung fi ah va, huleh kum sawmli sung ka silbawlte amu uhi.
Hujiahin hu khang a mite tungah ka lungthahta a, huleh ‘A lungtang va paikhial zingte ahi va, ka lampite zong ahe sih uhi,’ka chi hi.
Huchiin, ‘Ka khawldamna ah aluut sih diing uh,’ chiin a tungvah lungthahin ka kihaahsialta hi,” chia asoi bangin.
Pilvaang un, unaute, huchilou inchu Pathian hing apat paikhe diingin, na lahva mi khattou sungah ginlouhna lungtang gilou ahung um kha diing hi.
Hizongleh “Tuni,” akichih laiin, nitengin khat leh khat kihasot tuah jaw un, huchilou inchu na lahva mi khattou heemna sual a suhtaahdenin na um kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu achiila i neih kimuanna atawpdonga i tuuhdet phot uh leh Khrist a tanneite i hita diing uhi,
“Tunia a aw na jaahva ahihleh, na hellai uh bangin, na lungtang uh khauhsah sih un,” chia soi ahih laiin.
Ja ngaala helte kuate ahi viai? Aigupta gam apata Mosi in ahung puidohte a bawnun hilou ahi viaimah?
Huleh kuate tungah ahiai kum sawmli sung lungthaha aum? Sil bawlsual, gamdaai a a luang uh lumte tungah hilou ahiaimah?
Huleh agingtaloute kawm loungaal, koi kawmah ahiai a khawldamna ah aluut sih diing uh chia Amah akihaahsial?
Huchiin gintaat louhna jiahin aluut theita sih uh chih i mu uhi.
Hujiahin i lau diing uh, huchilou inchu a khawldamna a luutna diing thuchiam umzing napiin, na lahva mi khattou chinglou bangin na um kha diing uhi.
Ajiahchu amahuh kawma soi ahihbangin, tanchinpha chu i kawmva soi ahi hi; hizongleh a thu jatute in ginna toh asaanlouh jiahun a thu jaahte uh chu amah un aphattuampih sih uhi.

Ajiahchu khovel siam chiil apat a nnate tohzohsa hitazongleh Ama’n, “Huchiin, ‘Ka khawldamna ah aluut sih diing uh,’ chiin a tungva lungthahin ka kihaahsialta hi,” achih mahbangin, ei agingtate chu hu khawldamna ah i luutta uhi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n mun khat ah ni sagih ni thu hichibangin asoi, “Huleh Pathian chu a ni sagih ni in a natoh zousiah apat akhawlta,” chiin.
Huleh hi mun ah, “Ka khawldamna ah aluut sih diing uh,” achi kiit hi.
Hujiahin mi khenkhat khawldamna a luut diing aum naahlai jiah leh ni dang a tanchinpha kisoi masatnate gintaatlouhna jiaha aluutlouh jiahun,
hun sawttah nungin David zangin, “Tuni,” chiin, ni khat Ama’n aguat kiit a, “Tunia a aw na jaahva ahihleh, na lungtangte uh khauhsah sih un,” chia kisoi bangin.
Ajiahchu Joshua in amahuh khawldamsahta hileh, hu nungin Pathian in ni dang thu asoi sih diing hi.
Hujiahin Pathian mite a diingin khawldamna khat aum nalai hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian a natohna apat akhawldam bangin, Pathian khawldamna a luutpa zong a natohte apat akhawlta hi.
Hujiahin hu khawldamna a luut diingin i hahpan diing uh, huchilou inchu mi khattou hutobang thumanlouhna ah apuuh kha diing hi.

Ajiahchu Pathian thu chu ahing a, sil abawl thei a, naamsau hiamtuah saangin ahiamjaw a, hinna leh hagau leh guhtuah leh chintuiguh khenthei khopin asun thei a, huleh lungtang a ngaihtuahnate leh tupte hekhentu ahi hi.
Silsiam khat mah Amah mitmuh a kilanglou mawngmawng aum sih a, hizongleh Amah i tanchin i tutna diingpa mitmuh ah chu bangkim saguaah leh kihongsa ahi.
Huchiin vaante a paisuaah Siampu Lalpeen loupitah Jesu Pathian Tapa i neih jiahin i thugin lemsahna thuphuan uh i tukip diing uhi.
Ajiahchu i haatlouhnate uh hung thuaahpih phalou Siampu Lalpeen nei i hi sih va, hizongleh eihaw banga lam chintenga heemna tuaahsa, ahihvaanga suallou, Siampu Lalpeen nei i hijaw uhi.
Hujiahin khotuahna i tan theihna diing uh leh taahsap hun chianga panpihna diinga hehpihna i muh theihna diingun, muangtahin hehpihna laltouphah chu i naih diing uhi.
Ajiahchu siampu lalpeen, mite laha kiteeldoh photmah chu sualnate jiaha silpiaahte leh kithoihnate alatkhawm theihna diingin, Pathian lam silte a mite thaheng a guat ahi uhi.
Ama’n chu bangma heloute leh lamkhialte chu dawmtahin abawl thei hi, ajiahchu amah ngeei zong haatlouhna a tuamveela um ahih jiahin.
Huleh hikhu jiah tahin mite a diinga sual sillatte alatsah bangin, amah a diing ngeei zong alat akiphamoh hi.
Huleh hi tawisangna chu, Pathian in Aaron akouh banga akouh louhngaal, mi koimah in amah diingin akilaah ngei sih hi.

Huchibangmahin Khrist zong Siampu Lalpeen ahihna diingin Amah leh Amah akitawisang sih a, hizongleh a kawma, “Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni in ka hung hingkhia ahi,” chia soitu in atawisang ahijaw hi.
Ama’n mun tuam khat ah, “Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,” chia asoi mahbangin.
Ama’n chu tahsa a aum lai nite in, sihna laha Amah hundam theipa kawmah naahpiihtaha kap leh mittui luang puma haamteina leh ngetnate laanin, Pathian alauh jiahin ngaihkhiahin aum hi.
Tapa hijiangzongleh a silthuaahte apatin thumandaan ajilta hi.
Huleh suhbukima hung umin Amah thumangte zousiah diingin kumtuanga hutdamna naah ahung hita hi,
“Melkizedek hihna daan banga,” Siampu Lalpeen hia Pathian kouhin aumta hi.
Amah tungtaang soi diing tampi ka nei va, na ngaihkhiah peihlouh jiahun ahilhchian zong ahahsa hi.
Ajiahchu a hun lam ngaihtuahin chu houtute na hih uh ahunta a, Pathian thubulte khat in ahung hilh kiit ngai na hung hijeelta va, huleh an gum hiloua nawitui kiphamoh bang na hung hijaw uhi.
Ajiahchu nawitui ne photmah in chu naungeeh ahih jiahin, dihtatna thu ah heetsiamna anei sih hi.
Hizongleh an gum chu mipiching, kijilna jiaha a ngaihtuahna uh asia leh apha hekhen thei diinga kijilsiamsaha umte haw a diing ahi.
Hujiahin Khrist toh kisai thubulte chu nusiain, pichin lam i manoh diing uh, silbawl sisa apat kisiihnate, Pathian lama ginnate,
baptismate tungtaanga thuhilhnate, khutngah thute, misi thohkiitna thute leh kumtuang vaihawmna lam thuhilhnate chu bulphuh kiit nawnlouin.
Pathian in pha asah leh, hichu i bawl ngeei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu khat vei suhvaaha um a, vaan silpiaah chiamta a, Hagau Siangthou tansaha um a,
Pathian thu hoih leh hun hung um diinga silbawltheihnate chiamta haw chu,
apuuh va ahihleh, hute chu kisiih diinga siamthah gual ahi sih uhi, ajiahchu amah un Pathian Tapa chu amahuh diinga kilhbeh thah leh langtangtaha sumualphou ahih jiahun.
Ajiahchu a tunga ju veu guahtui anadawntu leh leilettute diinga phatuam anteh louhing neehtheih hung piangsahtu lei in Pathian apat vangpiaahna amu ahi.
Hizongleh lingkung leh hampa lingnei suahdoh lei chu deihlouhin aum a, haamsedong phialin aum a, a tawpna chu mei a haal ahi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, huchibangin soi mahleung, nang un chu huchibang silte saanga hoihjaw leh hutdamna toh kithuahkhawm silte na bawl uh ka hung muang uhi.
Ajiahchu Amah min a na natoh uh leh na lungsiatna suhlat uh, misiangthoute nna na tohsah uh leh na tohzing uh chu mangngilh diingin Pathian chu dihtatlou ahi sih hi.
Huleh nanguh koipouh in kinepna heetchianna kim tang diingin, atawp dongin thanop suah chiat ulehchin ka hung deih mahmah uhi,
huchia na kithahdah louh va, hizongleh ginna leh kuhkalna jiaha thuchiam gouluahtute umdaan juitute na hung hih uh ka hung deih uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in Abraham kawma thu achiam laiin, minloh diing Amah saanga lianjaw aum louh jiahin Amah leh Amah in akihaahsial a,
“Tahzetin ka hung vangpiaah diing a, tahzetin ka hung supung diing hi,” chiin.
Huchiin ama’n kuhkaltaha athuaah mualsuaah nungin silchiam chu amuta hi.
Ajiahchu mihingte chu amahuh saanga lianjaw min louin akihaahsial va; huleh thu namdetna diinga kihaahsialna chu amahuh diingin kinialna zousiah suhtawpna ahi.
Huchibangin thuchiam gouluahtute kawmah a lunggeel kihenkiittheihlouh daan Pathian in kichianseema etsah tumin, huchu kihaahsialna in asukipta hi,
huchu Pathian diinga juausoi hitheilou ahihna ah, sil kihengtheilou nihte jaalin, eiuh kihuumbitna diinga i ma va kinepna kikoih tang diinga taaite’n hasotna nasatah i neih theihna diingun ahi.
Hu kinepna chu hinna long siihka kip bangin i nei a, hu kinepna chiantah leh kiptah chu puanjaah sunga luut chu ahi.
Hutah ah Jesu ngeei chu eiuh diinga mapuitu hiin analuut masata a, Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga Siampu Lalpeen ahung hita hi.
Huchiin hi Melkizedek, Salem kumpipa chu Pathian Tungnungpeen siampu ahi a; kumpipate vathat zoua Abraham ahung paikiit laiin, ama’n anadawn a, huin avangpiaah hi.
A kawmah Abraham in a gaallaah sil zousiah apat sawm-a-khat apia hi. A min umjia chu amasapeenin, “dihtatna kumpipa,” chihna ahi a, hubaan ah Salem kumpipa, huchu “lemna kumpipa,” chihna ahi a,
amah chu pa neilou, nu neilou, khanggui neilou, umpatni neilou, hintawpni zong neilou ahi a, hizongleh Pathian Tapa banga siam, tawploua siampu a um zing ahi.
Tuin nampa Abraham ngeei in gaallaah silte sawm-a-khat apiaahnapa, hi pa loupidaan chu ngaihtuah dihvua.
Huleh Levi haahte laha siampu natohna mu photmah in daan thu dungjuiin, Abraham khaala pawt himahleh uh, a unaute lah apat sawm-akhat laahna diing thupiaah amu ngeei uhi.
Hizongleh amah uh lah apat a a khanggui suuitela um loupa’n chu Abraham apat sawma- khat ala a, thuchiamte neipa chu avangpiaahta hi.
Huleh nial guallouhin aneujaw chu alianjaw in avangpiaahta ahi.
Huleh hitah ah chu a sithei mihingte’n sawma- khat atang va, hizongleh hutah ah chu amah ahing zing hi chia a tanchin heetsaha umpa in atang hi.
Huleh Levi, sawm-a-khat tangtu in zong Abraham tungtawnin sawm-a-khat apia hi, achih theih hi.
Ajiahchu Melkizedek in Abraham avalamtuaah laiin amah chu a pa khaal ah aum nalai hi.

Hujiahin Levite siampu hihna tungtawna bukimna muhtheih hitaleh (ajiahchu hi nuaiah mite’n daan thu anamu uhi), Aaron hihna daan banga chih hilou a, Melkizedek hihna daan banga siampu dang ahung um angaihna bang ahiai?
Ajiahchu siampu hihna ahung kihentaah jiahin, daan zong akihen ahung kiphamohta hi.
Ajiahchu a tungtaanga hi thute kisoinapa chu phung tuama mi ahi a, hu phung laha mi koimah maitaama natong aum ngei sih hi.
Ajiahchu i Lalpa uh chu Juda phung apat hung piang ahi chih chiantahin alang a, hu phung thu ah chu Mosi in siampu lam thu bangma asoi sih hi.
Huleh Melkizedek hihna daan banga siampu dang ahung um a ahihleh ka thusoi uh achiang seem hi,
Amah chu mihing hihna daan banga hung um hilouin, hintawp neilou silbawltheihna banga hung um ahijaw hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,” chiin aheetpih hi.
Ajiahchu alehlam ah thupiaah um masa chu haatlouhna leh phattuamna bei jiahin paihin aumta hi,
ajiahchu daan thu in bangmah asubukim sih a, alehlam ah chu kinepna hoihjaw chu ahung poluut a, hukhu tungtawnin eihaw in Pathian i naih uh ahi.
Huleh kihaahsialna umloua Amah chu siampu a siam ahi sih,

ajiahchu hu siampute chu kihaahsialna umloua siampu a siam ahi va, hizongleh Amah chu a kawma, “LALPA akihaahsialta a, a lungsim aheng sih diing, ‘Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,’” chia soitu in kihaahsialna in siampu in asiam hi.
Huchi saanga nasajaw thamin Jesu chu thuhun hoihjaw sukiptu a siam ahung hita hi.
Huleh amahuh chu sihna jiaha pandensah theihlouh ahih jiahun, siampu chu anatam ngeei uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu kumtuanga umzing ahih jiahin siampuhihna hentheihlouh anei hi.
Huchihjiahin Amah tungtawna Pathian kawma hungte chu amahuh diinga ngetsah diinga ahin zing jiahin, atawpkhawh tanin ahundam thei hi.
Ajiahchu huchibang Siampu Lalpeen, siangthou, poikhoihlou, buaah baanglou, misualte lah apat kituamkoih, huleh vaante saanga sangjawa tawisanga um chu eihaw a diingin akilawm mawng ahi.

Ama’n chu hu siampu lalpeente banga, ni chin a Amah sualna jiaha kithoihna laan masa zet a, huzoh chianga mite sualna jiaha alat angai sih hi, ajiahchu Ama’n hichu Amah leh Amah a kilatin setden diingin khatveiin anazouta hi.
Ajiahchu daan in haatlouhna nei mihingte siampu lal in aguat a, hizongleh kihaahsial thu, daan nunga hung um khu in chu, Tapa, kumtuanga diinga suhbukimsa chu aguat jawta hi.
Tuin i thusoite laha apoimohpeen chu hikhu ahi: Vaante a Loupipeen laltouphah jiatlam a tou, huchibang Siampu Lalpeen i nei uhi.
Mihing bawl hilou a, Lalpa bawl, mun siangthou leh biahbuuh dihtah a thunatongtu chu.
Ajiahchu siampu lalpeen zousiah chu silpiaahte leh kithoihnate laan diinga guat ahi uhi. Huchihjiahin hi Siampu Lalpeen in zong bang ahakhat lat diing aneih akiphamoh hi.
Amah leitung a um hita leh chu, daan thu bang jeela silpiaahte laantu siampute aumtaah jiahun, siampu in apang hial sih diing hi.

Mosi’n biahbuuh bawl diinga akisah laia, Pathian in akawhmuh bangin, hute nasepna mun chu vaan silte etsahna leh aliim ahi uhi. Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Taang tunga etton diinga ahung kimuhsah dungjuiin sil zousiah bawl diingin pilvaang in,” achi hi.
Hizongleh tuin chu thuchiam hoihjawte tunga siam thuhun hoihjaw Palai ahih bangjeelin Ama’n natohna hoihjaw anatangta hi.
Ajiahchu hu thuhun masapeen demnabei anahita leh, anihnapeen diing mun hawl ngailou diing ahi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n a tungva dihlouhna amuh jiahin, “Ngai un, Israel innkuante leh Juda innkuante toh thuhun thah ka siam hun diing nite hung tung diing ahita, LALPA’N achi hi.

“Aigupta gam apat a pulepate uh puidoh diinga a khut va ka tuuh ni a a kawmva ka thuhun peen bang hilouin; ajiahchu amahuh ka thuhun ah aum zing sih va, ke’n amahuh ka ngaihsah sih hi, LALPA’N achi hi.

“Ajiahchu hu hun nung chianga Israel innkuante kawma ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi, LALPA’N achi hi: A lungsim vah ka daan thupiaahte ka koih diing a, a lungtang vah ka gial diing hi; huleh amahuh diingin a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, amahuh chu ka mite ahi diing uhi.
“Huleh koimah in a innveengte leh a unaute thuhilhin, ‘LALPA he in,’ achi nawn sih diing uh, ajiahchu aneupeen apat alianpeen tanin a bawnun ahung heta diing uhi.
“Ajiahchu a dihtatlouhnate vah ka zahngai diing a, a sualnate uh leh daan poisaloua a gamtatnate uh zong ka hezing nawn sih diing hi,” chiin.
Ama’n, “Thuhun Thah,” chia asoi jiahin, amasapeen chu azattaah nawnlouh asuaahsahta hi. Huchiin jattaah nawnlouh leh hung luita chu amang dikuan ahita hi.
Huchiangleh thuhun masapeen in zong Pathian natohna daante leh hi khovel a mun siangthou chu ananei ngeei hi.
Ajiahchu biahbuuh bawl ahi a, pindan masapeen sungah chu thaumei tunna, dohkaan leh tanghousiah aum a, huchu mun siangthou kichi chu ahi.
Huleh puanjaah nihna sungah Mun Siangthoupeen, kichi biahbuuh pindan chu aum hi,
hutah ah chu gimtuui haalna sana bawm leh thuhun singkuang sana tui a luankhum, hu sungah manna umna sana beel leh Aaron chiang sel leh thuhun suangpeehte chu aum hi.
Huleh thuhun singkuang tungah chu khotuahna touphah liahin loupina cherubte aum uhi. Hute tungthu chu tuin a kimkeeiin i soi thei sih diing uhi.
Huleh hi silte hitobanga guatzoh ahih chiangin, siampute’n Pathian nna tongin biahbuuh pindan masapeen ah aluut veu uhi.
Hizongleh pindan nihna ah chu siampu lalpeen chauh kum khat in khatvei, amah leh mite’n heetlouha a khelhnate uh diinga alat diing sisan tawiin aluut veu hi.
Hitaha Hagau Siangthou in ahung heetsah chu biahbuuh pindan masapeen aum laisiah Mun Siangthoupeen a luutna lampi akilang nailou ahi, chih khu ahi.
Huchu tulai hun tehkaahna ahi a, hutah ah chu sialephaheetna lam thu a abetu hoih bukimsah theilou silpiaahte leh kithoihnate alaan uhi.
Hute chu neehte leh dawnte, kisuhsiangna tuamtuamte leh tahsa lam daante giap ahi a, siamphatkiit hun toh kaala zat diinga bawl ahi.
Hizongleh Khrist chu biahbuuh loupijaw leh bukimjaw khut a sahlouh toh sil hoih hung um diingte Siampu Lalpeen hi diingin ahungta a, huchu hi silsiam laha ahi sih hi.
Keeltalte leh bawngnoute sisan a hilouin, hizongleh Amah sisan ngeei a eite diinga kumtuanga tatkhiahna muin Mun Siangthoupeen ah setden diingin khatvei chauh aluutta hi.
Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keeltalte sisan leh bawngla vutvaam mi buaah tunga thehin bawn tahsa siang khopa asuhsiangthou inchu,
kumtuang Hagau jaala soiseelbeia Pathian kawma kilaan Khrist sisan in Pathian hing nna tong diingin, natoh sisate apatin na sialephaheetna uh bangchituhin asusiangthouta diai?
Huleh hikhu jiahin Amah chu thuhun thah Palai ahi, thuhun masa nuaia tatsualnate lah apat a tatkhiahna diinga a sihna jiahin, kouhte’n kumtuanga gouluah diing thuchiam chu atang thei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu thusiah umna phot ah asiahtu sihna zong aum ngeeingeei diing ahi.
Ajiahchu mite asih nungun thusiah in thu anei chauh hi, asiahtu damsung siahin thu mawngmawng anei sih hi.
Hujiahin thuhun masa zong sisan umlouin zatpat ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu Mosi in daan thu dungjuia thupiaah photmah mite kawma asoi zohin, bawngnou leh keeltal sisan, tui toh sawnsan toh hussop toh ala a, lehkhabu leh mipite zousiah chu atheh a,
“Hichu Pathian in na kawmva ahung piaah thuhun sisan chu ahi,” chiin.
Huleh huchibangmahin ama’n biahbuuh leh natohna vanzat zousiah chu sisan atheh hi.
Huleh daan dungjuiin sil zousiah sisan a suhsiangthouin aum veh phial hi, huleh sisan suah louhin ngaihdamna aum sih hi.
Hujiahin vaan a sil umte batpihte chu hihaw a suhsianga aum akuul hi, hizongleh vaan sil tahzet chu hite ngeei saanga kithoihna hoihjawte a suhsiangthou kuul ahi hi.
Ajiahchu atahtah etsahna, khut a bawl Mun Siangthoupeen ah Khrist chu aluut sih a, hizongleh tuin Pathian ma ah i luangva ding diingin vaan ngeei ah aluut jawta hi.
Siampu lalpeen kum chin a amah sisan hilou tawi kawma Mun Siangthoupeen a aluut bangin, Amah chu Amah leh Amah kilaan diingin aluut veu sih hi.
Huchi hilou hileh, khovel siam chiil apat tampivei athuaahta diing hi; hizongleh tu hun tawp ah Amah chu sualna suhbeina diinga Amah leh Amah a kithoihin khatvei ahung kilangta hi.
Huleh mihingte diinga khatvei sih diing guatsa, hizongleh huzohchianga vaihawmna um diing ahih bangin,

huchibangmahin Khrist zong mi tampite sualna pomang diinga khatvei latin aum hi. Huleh anihveina diingin Amah anangaahlahtute kawmah sualna toh kisai hilouin, hundam diingin ahung kilang kiit diing hi.
Daan thu chu sil hoih hung um diingte liim giap ahi a, a kibatpihtah ahihlouh jiahin, hu kum chin a kithoihna alat veute un avanaihtute abukimsah zou ngeingei sih diing hi.
Huchilou hileh, alat uh tawpta lou diing ahi viaimah? Ajiahchu a betute chu khatvei suhsiangthoua umin sual kiheetna anei nawn sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh hu kithoihnate ah chu kum chin in sualnate heetdoh kiitna aum hi.
Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keeltalte sisan a sualnate laahmangtheih gual ahi sih hi.
Hujiahin khovel a ahung laiin, Ama’n, “Kithoihna leh sillat na deih sih a, hizongleh sapum khat na hung bawlsah jaw hi;
Haalmang sillatte leh sualna kithoihnate ah nangma’n kipaahna na nei sih hi.
Huin keima’n, ‘Ngai in, lehkhabujial ah keimah thu gelh ahi, Aw ka Pathian, na deihjawng bawl diingin ka hung hi,’ ka chi hi,” achi hi.
Amalam ah, “Kithoihna leh sillat, haalmang sillatte leh sualna kithoihna na deih sih a, amahuh ah kipaahna zong na nei sih hi,” achih zohin (hute chu daan thu banga lat ahi),
huin Ama’n, “Ngai in, na deihjawng bawl diingin ka hung hi, Aw Pathian,” achi hi. Anihna atunding theihna diingin Ama’n amasapeen chu alamangta hi.
Hu deihna jaalin setden diinga Jesu Khrist sapum khatvei chauh akilatna tungtawnin eite chu suhsiangthouin i umta uhi.
Huleh siampu chinin nitenga nna tongin sualnate lamang theilou kithoihna ngeimah laanin ading zing uhi.
Hizongleh Amah chu kumtuanga diinga sualnate diinga kithoihna khat alat nungin Pathian jiatlam ah atouta hi.
Hunung siah chu a meelmate a keengngahna a bawl ahih masiah uh angaah zingta hi.
Ajiahchu Ama’n sillat khat in suhsiangthoua umsate chu kumtuanga diingin asubukimta hi.
Huleh Hagau Siangthou in zong i kawmah ahung hesah hi, ajiahchu Ama’n,
“Huh hun zoh chianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hih ahi, LALPA’N achi hi, a lungtang vah ka thupiaahte ka koih diing a, huleh a lungsim vah ka gial diing hi,” achih zoh nungin,
“A sualnate uh leh a tatleehnate uh chu ka hezing nawn sih diing hi,” achi tou nalai hi.
Tuin sual ngaihdamna umna phot ah sualna a diinga sillat aum nawn sih hi.
Hujiahin unaute, Jesu sisan jiahin Mun Siangthoupeen a luut ngamna i nei va,
huleh puanjaah, huchu a tahsapum, tungtawnin eiuh diingin Ama’n lampi thah leh hing ahung honsahta a,
huleh Pathian innkuanpihte tunga Siampu Lalpeen i neih jiahin,
sialephaheetna hoihlou apat i lungtang uh thehsianga umin, i sapum uh zong tui chiim a sila umin, ginna heetchianna lungtang dihtah toh i naih diing uhi.
Amah thuchiam hung petu chu aginum jiahin i kinepna thuphuan uh lawnglou keeiin i tudet diing uhi.
Huleh lungsiatna leh sil hoih bawlna lamah khat leh khat kitohthou diingin i kingaihtuah chiat diing uhi.
Khenkhatte hih veu banga i kikhopnate uh tawpsan louin, himahleh khat leh khat kihasot tuah jawin, huleh a Ni ahung nai hulhul chih na heetun kihasot tuah seem un.
Ajiahchu thutah heetna i neih nunga i sual teeiteei un chu, sualnate diinga kithoihna aum nawnta sih hi,
hizongleh vaihawmna tuaah diing lauhuaitah leh doutute kaangmang diing lungthahna mei aum jawta diing hi.
Mosi daan thu botsia mi chu heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum thu in zahngaihna beiin asi veu uhi.

Pathian Tapa tuandeen a, thuhun sisan amah suhsiangthouna chu sil siangloua ngai a, huleh hehpihna Hagau simmohbawltu in chu hu saanga bangchituha gawtna loupijaw thuaah leh kilawmin na ngaihtuah viai?
Ajiahchu, “Phubalaah chu kei a ahi, keima’n ka thuh diing hi,” Lalpa’n achi, chitu Amah chu i he uhi. Huleh abaan kiit ah, “LALPA’N a mite vai ahawmsah diing hi,” chitu zong.
Pathian hing khut a puuh chu sil lauhuaitah ahi.
Hizongleh tuma a, suhvaaha na um nungva, thuaahna hahsatahte na thuaah lai nite uh geeldoh kiit un,
thu khat ah chu muhsitna leh hahsatnate thuaahin etnop bawlna a siamin na um va, huleh thu khat ah ahihleh huchibanga bawla umte thuaahpihtute na hung hi uhi;
ajiahchu vaan ah gou hoihjaw leh umzing diing na neih uh kiheetin, nang un ka kolbuhnate ah na hung lainat va, huleh na neihlelam uh ahung laahsahte uh zong kipaahtahin na thuaah jawta uhi.
Hujiahin na muanna uh chu paaikhe sih un, huh in chu kipaahman loupitah anei hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian deihjawng na bawlzoh chiangva, thuchiam chu na muh theihna diingun na kuhkal uh angai hi:
“Ajiahchu tomkhat zohchiangin ahung diingpa chu ahung diing a, sawt ahal nawn sih diing hi.
Huchiin midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing, hizongleh anungtolh chu ka lungsim in amah ah kipaahna anei sih diing hi.”
Hizongleh eiuh chu mangthaai diinga nungtolh haw laha mi i hi sih va, hizongleh hinna huumbit diinga gingta haw laha mi i hijaw uhi.
Huleh ginna chu sil kinepnate heetchetna, sil muhlouhte um ngeeia heetna ahi.
Ajiahchu hi ah taanglai mite’n paahtaat aloh uhi.
Khovelte chu Pathian thu a suhtuah khawm ahi chih ginna jaalin i he a, huchiin sil kimute zong sil kilangte apat siam ahi sih hi.

Ginna in Abel in Pathian kawmah Kaina saangin kithoihna hoihjaw alaan a, hukhu jiahin midihtat ahi chih heetsahna aloh a, Pathian in a silpiaah thu ah aheetpih a, huleh hukhu jiahin sita hinapiin thu asoi nalai hi.
Ginna in Enok chu sihna mulou diingin laahtouhin aum a, “Pathian in alaahtouh jiahin muhin aumta sih hi”; ajiahchu laahtouha aum main Pathian akipaahsah hi chih heetsahna anei hi.
Hizongleh ginna louin chu Amah kipaahsah gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu Pathian kawma hungtu in chu Amah aum chih leh, Amah chu guntuhtaha Amah hawltute kawma kipaahman petu ahi chih agintaat diing ahi.

Ginna in Noah chu sil muh nailouhte thu a hilha aumin, Pathian launa neiin a innkuanpihte hutkhiahna diingin kuang abawl hi, hukhu in khovel siamlouh atangsahta a, ginna jiaha um dihtatna gouluahtu ahung hita hi.
Ginna in Abraham chu, anung chianga goua ahung tan diing mun a chiah diinga kouha aum laiin, athumang hi. Huleh achiahna diing mun zong helouin achiahdoh hi.
Ginna in gam chiam ah mi gam a taam bangin anateeng zing a, thuchiam kibanga agouluahpih diingte Isak leh Jakob toh puaninn a teeng khawmin,
ajiahchu ama’n innbul kiptah nei, Pathian sah leh bawl khopi chu angaah hi.
Ginna in Sarah in zong naupaai theihna anei a, achiamtu chu muanhuaia aseh jiahin ateeh nungin ta anei hi.
Huchiin asisa tobang mi khat apatin vaan a aahsite banga tam leh tuikhanglian geia piauneel banga tam simseenglouh suante ahung piangta hi.
Hute zousiah chu silchiamte tanglouin ginna in asita va, hizongleh gamlatah apat gaalmuha muangin apomkip va, leitung ah chu mikhual leh khualzin ahi uh chih anaphuangta uhi.
Ajiahchu hutobang thu soite’n chu gam tuam khat ahawl uh chih chiantahin asulang uhi.
Huleh amah un ahung pawtna gam uh lunggulh hi uh leh chu, kihkiitna hun lemtaang anamuta tham diing uhi.
Hizongleh gam hoihjaw deih anahi va, huchu vaangam ahi. Huchihjiahin Pathian chu a Pathian uh chiha kouh azum sih hi, ajiahchu amahuh diingin khopi khat guatsain akoihta hi.
Ginna in Abraham in, je-eta aumin, Isak alaan a, thuchiamte tangpa in a tapa tangkhat neihsun alaan hi.
“Isak ah na haahte akichi diing,” kichipa chu amah ahi.
Misi lah nasan apatin zong Pathian in akaithou thei hi chia geelin, hu apatin etsahna in muh zong amu kiitta ngeei hi.
Ginna in Isak in sil hung tung diingte thu ah Jakob leh Esau avangpiaah hi.
Ginna in Jakob in asih kuanin, Joseph ta tegeel avangpiaah a, a chiangphut dawn a kingain Pathian abia hi.
Ginna in Joseph in asih diing kuanin Israel tate pawtkhiah diing thu asoi a, huleh a guhte tungtaang ah thu apia hi.
Mosi chu apian laiin, naungeeh meel hoihtah ahi chih amuh jiahun, a nulepate’n ginna in kumpipa thupiaahte zong laulouin ha thum sung aphual uhi.
Mosi in ahung pichin nungin, ginna in Pharaoh tanunu tapa chiha kouh diing auut sih a,
tomchakhat sung sual nopna man saangin Pathian mite toh bawlgentheihna thuaah ateel jawta hi,
akipaahman muh diing chu aet zing jiahin, Khrist kimuhsitna chu Aigupta gam goute saanga hauhsatna loupijawin angai hi.
Ama’n kumpipa thangtawmna laulouin ginna in Aigupta gam anusia hi; ajiahchu muhtheihlouhpa chu muhtheih banga sepin athuaah mualsuaah hi.
Ginna in Chiahkaan Kuut leh sisan thehna abawl hi, huchilou inchu tachiil sulumpa in amahuh akhoih kha diing hi.
Ginna in amah un leigaw a pai bangin Tuipi San akaan va, Aigupta mite’n hubanga bawlve atup un, tui ah atum vehta uhi.
Ginna in Jeriko kulh baang chu ni sagih avelh nungun achimta hi.
Ginna in nohchijuaahnu Rahab zong ginglou mite toh amangthaai khawm sih, ama’n enkhetute hamuangtaha anazintun jiahin.
Huleh bang ahiai ka soi naahlai diing? Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson thute, Jephtha thute, David thute, Samuel thute leh zawlneite thu soi ning chileng, hun in ahung daih sih diing hi.
Hute’n chu ginna in lalgamte ala va, dihtatna nna atong va, thuchiamte atang va, huumpibahneite kam achihsah va,
mei silbawltheihna asudaai va, naamsau mahiam apeel va, haatlouhna apatin haatsahin aum va, kidouna ah ahaat tungtuang va, gamdang sepaihte adelhjaah uhi.
Numeite’n a misi uh thoukiit amu uhi. Huleh midangte chu gimthuaahsahin aum uh, thohkiitna hoihjaw amuh theihna diingun hutkhiahna apom sih uhi.
Huleh midangte’n chu nuihjaat bawlna leh vuaahna bang athuaah va, ahi, hulou zong kolbut leh suangkul a khumin aum uhi.

Amahuh chu suang a sehin aum va, tum nih suaha aattanin aum va, je-etin aum va, naamsau a saatlupin aum uhi. Belaam vun leh keel vun silhin neeh diing neilouin avaahvai va, gentheih thuaahin, gimthuaahin, gawtin aum uh;
amahuh a diingin khovel chu umnataah ahi sih hi. Amahuh chu gamdaaite leh taangte ah bang, kawl buuh leh leikohawm ah bang avaah lehleh uhi.
Huleh hite zousiah in a ginna jiahva phatna lohzouin, silchiam atang sih uh,
ajiahchu eihaw telloua amahuh suhbukima aum louhna diingin Pathian in eihaw diingin sil hoihjaw khat guatsain akoih hi.

Huchihjiahin eiuh zong heetpihtu meipi nasatah uum kiimveel a i um jiahun ahung gihsah photmah leh baihlamtaha hung awhsahthei sualte i koihkhe diing va, i ma a kitaaidemna um ah kuhkaltahin i taai diing uhi.
I ginna siamtu leh subukimtu Jesu lam enin, Ama’n chu a ma a um kipaahna jiahin zumnate zong poisa louin, kros a gimna athuaah a, huleh Pathian laltouphah jiatlam ah atouta hi.
Ajiahchu a tunga misualte nialkalhna thuaahzoupa chu ngaihtuah un, huchilou inchu na lungsim un na tawlun na lungke kha diing uhi.
Sual douin sisan pawt khopin na pang nai sih uhi.
Huleh hasotna thu, tate hilh banga na kawmva kisoi chu na mangngilhta uhi, “Ka tapa, LALPA sawina ngaineep sinla, ataaihilha na umin zong lungke sin;
Ajiahchu LALPA’N alungsiatte asawi a, huleh tapa adeih photmah chu ajeep veu hi.”
Sawina na thuaah uh leh, Pathian in tate bawla hung bawl ahi; bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh pa sawilouh tapa kua aum ngei ei?
Hizongleh tapa zousiah tan ngei sawina na thuaah louh un chu, jauta na hi va, tapa tahtahte na hi sih uhi.
Hubaan ah zong eihaw hung thununtu tahsa a pate i nei va, huleh amahuh chu i zahtaat uhi. Hu saanga hagaute Pa thuthu a i um jawh seem va, i hin diing uh hilou ahiaimah?
Ajiahchu amah un tomtakhat diinga hoih asah bang jeelva ahung sawi uh ahi a, hizongleh Ama’n chu eite phattuamna diinga a sianthouna i tan theihna diingun ahung sawi hi.
Sawina zousiah chu akithuaah laiin kipaahhuai abang sih a, hizongleh ana jaw hi. Ahiinlah anungchiangin chu huchia sawihzoia umte diingin dihtatna gah hamuan umtah asuaah hi.
