Huchihjiahin khut kaikhete leh khuup zoite chu phong tang un,
huleh keengbaite keeng kilawilou a, hizongleh adamjawhna diingun na keengte uh diingin lampite sial tang un.
Mi zousiah toh kilemna delh unla, huleh sianthouna delh un, hu sianthouna louin chu kuama’n Lalpa amu sih diing hi.
Pilvaang un, huchilou inchu mi khattou Pathian hehpihna ching zoulouin na um kha diing va, khaatna zung hung seldohin, hukhu in mi tampite suhbuaahin aum kha diing uhi;
huchilou inchu numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuai mi ahihlouhleh Pathian zahlou mi, Esau banga khatvei an neeh man diinga a tachiil hihna juaahpa tobang khat aum kha diing hi.
Ajiahchu anunglamin vangpiaahna gou chu luah tumin mit-hi luang pumin phatuamngaitahin hawl mahleh, kisiihna mun amuh louh jiahin nualin aumta chih na he uhi.
Ajiahchu nanguh chu taang khoihkhaah theih leh mei a kaang, vomna leh mialna leh huihpi nunna mun,
huleh peengkuul ging leh thusoi gingte umna a hung na hi sih uhi, hu aw ging jatute’n chu a kawmva hu thu akisoi kiit nawn louhna diingin angeen uhi.
Ajiahchu amah un, “Sa nasan jiang in zong hu taang chu asuhkhaah leh suang a sehlup aha, ahihlouhleh thal a kaplup diing ahi,” chih thupiaah chu athuaahzouta sih uhi.
Huleh hu silmuh chu alauhuai mahmah jiahin Mosi in, “Ka lau naah mahmah a ka kithing top hi,” achi hi.
Hizongleh nanguh chu Zion Taang leh Pathian hing khopi, vaan Jerusalem, sim seenglouh angel honpi toh na hung uhi,
kipaahna khawmpi leh vaan a min kigialta tachiil kouhtuam kawmah, huleh mi zousiah Vaihawmtu Pathian kawmah, huleh midihtat suhbukima umte hagaute kawmah,
huleh thuhun thah Palai Jesu kawmah, huleh Abel a saanga sil hoihjaw soi sisan thehna kawmah na hung uh ahijaw hi.
Thusoitu Amah chu na nual khaah diing uh pilvaang un. Ajiahchu leitung a thusoitu adeihlouh va bawn suaahta lou ahih uh leh, vaan apat a thu hung pepa i kiheisan un chu, i suaahta moh seem diing uhi.
Hu laiin a aw in lei asuliing a, hizongleh tuin chu, “Khatvei chu lei chauh hilouin, vaan zong ka suliing nalai diing,” chiin Ama’n thu achiamta hi.
Huleh hi thu, “Khatvei ka suliing kiit diing,” chih in, sil kiliingtheiloute aum zing theihna diingin sil kiliingtheite, silsiamte chu suanmangin aum diing chih ahesah hi.
Huchihjiahin, lalgam suhliing guallouh i tan jiahun, zahtah leh Pathian lau kawma pomtaahtaha Pathian nna i toh theihna diingun kipaahna lungtang i nei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu i Pathian uh chu kaahtum haat mei ahi.
Unau kilungsiatna umsah zing un.
Mikhualte kipaahpihsiam diing mangngilh sih un, ajiahchu huchibang bawlin mi khenkhatte’n heloupiin angelte anazintun kha uhi.
Suangkul a umte chu amahuh toh kaankhawma um bangin hezing un. Huleh bawlsiatna thuaahte chu nanguh zong sapum a um na hih jiahun hezing un.
Mi zousiah lahah kiteenna chu zahbawlin um henla, huleh lupna zong suhbuaahlouhin um heh. Himahleh numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite leh aangkawmte chu Pathian in vai ahawmsah diing hi.
Na umdaan uh chu eenhaatna tellou hi heh, na sil neih tungvah lungkim un. Ajiahchu Amah ngeeiin, “Bangchihmahin ka hung nuse sih diing a, taai zong ka hung taaisan sih diing hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin hangsantahin, “LALPA chu ahung panpihtu ahi a, ka lau sih diing hi. Mihing in bang ahung loh thei diai?” i chi ngam uhi.
Pathian thu na kawmva soi na lamkaite uh chu hezing un. A hinkhua vapat sil hung umdohte ngaihtuah unla, a ginna uh jui un.
Jesu Khrist chu jaanni, tuni huleh kumtuangin angeimah ahi.
Thuhilhna tuamtuamte leh limdangtahte puimangin um sih un. Lungtang chu neehletaah a hilouin, hehpihna a suhkip ahoih hi, ajiahchu neehletaah a suhkip diing ngaihtuahte’n phattuamna amu tuan sih uhi.
Biahbuuh natongtute’n aneeh theihlouhna uh maitaam i nei uhi.
Siampu lalpeen in sual thoihna diinga Mun Siangthoupeen a a sisan aluutpih ganta luang haw chu giahphual polam ah ahaalmang uhi.
Huchihjiahin Jesu’n zong, Amah sisan ngeei a mite asuhsiangthou theihna diingin kulh kotkhaah polam ah athuaahta hi.
Hujiahin Amah a muhsitna uh puain a kawmah, giahphual polam ah i chiahdoh diing uhi.
Ajiahchu hitah ah khopi det i nei sih va, hizongleh khopi hung um diing chu i hawl uh ahijaw hi.
Hujiahin Amah tungtawnin paahtawina kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah tawplouin i laan diing uhi, huchu Amah min phatna, i muuh uh gah ahi.
Hizongleh sil hoih bawl leh silphal chu mangngilh sih un, ajiahchu huchibang kithoihnate ah Pathian akipaah mahmah hi.

Na tungva lamkaite thu mang unla, huleh a thunuai vah kituluut un, ajiahchu amah un na tungtaang thu uh soi diingte bangin na hagau uh ahung veensah uh ahi. Lunggimna toh hilouin, kipaahna toh bawlsah un, ajiahchu lunggimtaha abawl uh chu nanguh diingin aphatuam sih hi.
Keiuh diingin hung haamteisah un, ajiahchu sil bangkim ah dihtaha gamtat uutin sialephaheetna hoihtah ka nei uh chih ka kimuang uhi.
Hizongleh kintaha na kawmva puikiit-a ka um theihna diinga anahaamtei diingin ka hung hasot diaahkhol hi.
Tuin kumtuang thuhun sisan jaala, misi lah apat i Lalpa uh Jesu, Belaampu loupitah kaithoupa hamuanna Pathian in,
Jesu Khrist jaala a mitmuh a adeihjawng photmah bawl diingin sil hoih chinteng ah nanguh hung subukim hen; Amah kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuangin umta hen. Amen.
Huleh unaute, hasotna thu ngai thei teeiteei diingin ka hung ngeen hi, ajiahchu thu tawmtakhat in na kawmvah ka hung gial hi.
I unaupa uh Timothi hahdohin aumta chih anaheta un, ahung pai pah leh amah toh nanguh ka hung mu diing hi.
Na lamkaite zousiah uh leh misiangthoute zousiah chibai hung na buuhsah un. Italy gam a mite’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
Na bawnva kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
Jakob, Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist suaah in kithehdalh phung sawmlenihte kawmah: Chibai.
Ka unaute, je-etna chi tuamtuam na tuaah chiangun kipaahna ngenin ngai un,
ajiahchu na ginna uh etkhiahna in thuaahtheihna asiam chih na he uhi.
Bangma tasamloua na bukim va, huleh na buching theihna diingun thuaahhaatna chu a bukimna tongdohsah un.
Na lahva koiaha in pilna ataahsap leh, mi zousiah kawma soiseellou leh phaltaha petu Pathian kawmah ngeen heh, huchiin amah chu piaahin aum diing hi.
Hizongleh ginglel het louin ginna in ngeen heh, ajiahchu ginglel mi chu tuikhanglian kinawh, huih muut leeng lehleh bang ahi.
Ajiahchu ginglel mi in chu Lalpa apat bangma muh kineem sih heh,
ama’n lungsim bulbaal anei sih a, a silbawl zousiah ah akip sih hi.
Unau kingaingiam chu tawisanga aumna ah kipaah heh.
Hizongleh mihausa chu suhngiama aumna ah kipaah heh, ajiahchu amah chu hampa paah banga mang diing ahi.

Ajiahchu ni in asatna toh ahung suaah chiangin hampa chu ahaaivul hi; hu paah chu akia a, huleh a kilawmna chu amangta hi. Huchibangmahin mihausa zong hampa bangin a sumlepaai hawlna ah avuai mang diing hi.
Je-etna kuhkaltaha thuaah mi chu ahampha hi; ajiahchu etkhiaha aum zoh chiangin Lalpa’n Amah lungsiattute kawma piaah achiam hinna lallukhuh chu amu diing hi.
Mi koimah in sual bawl diinga heema aum chiangin, “Pathian in kei ahung heem hi,” chi sih heh; ajiahchu Pathian chu giitlouhna a heem gual ahi sih a, huleh Pathian in koima aheem ngei sih hi.
Hizongleh mi chin chu amahuh uutna chiat in apuimang a, hiipa aum chiangin heemin aum ahijaw hi.
Huleh uutna hoihlou in nou apaai chiangin, sual ahung hingkhia hi; huleh sual in ahung pichin chiangin sihna ahung hingkhia hi.
Ka unau deihtahte, heemin um sih un.
Silpiaah hoih leh silpiaah bukim photmah chu tunglam apat ahi a, vaahte Pa kawm apat hung suh ahi a, Amah kawmah chu kihenlamdangna ahihlouhleh liim banga kiheina mawngmawng aum sih hi.
A silsiamte laha agah masa lawi khat i hih theihna diingun, Ama’n adeihbang ngeei a thutah a ahung hin i hi uhi.
Hikhu jiahin ka unau deihtahte, mi chin ngaihkhiah lamah kilawp henla, thusoi lamah kilawp sih henla, lungthah baih sih heh;
ajiahchu mihing lungthahna in Pathian dihtatna atun sih hi.
Hujiahin bolhhohna zousiah leh giitlouhna a dimleet chu koihmang unla, na hagau uh hundam thei nanguh a thu kituh chu kingaingiamtahin pom un.
Thu ngaikhetu chauh hia nanguh leh nanguh kiheemlouin, thu juitute hijaw un.
Mi koipouh thu ngaikhia chauh ahih a, ajuitu ahihlouhin chu, amah chu apianpih maai liimlang a kien mi bang giap ahi;
amah akien a, huleh achiahmang a, bangchibang mi ahih akimangngilh pah hi.
Hizongleh koipouh jaleenna daan bukim en a huh a um jomzing a, huleh mangngilhhaat thungaikhia mi hilou a hizongleh thu juitu hijaw chu, a natoh ah vangpiaahin aum diing hi.
Na lahva mi koiaha sahkhomi a kingai a, a lei aveen zohlouh leh, amah lungtang ngeei heem ahijaw a, hu mi sahkhua chu athawn ahi.
Pathian leh Pa mitmuh a sahkho siangthou leh buaahbaanglou chu hih ahi: tagahte leh meithaite a gimthuaah laiva veh, huleh khovel a dembaangloua mahni kikoih chu ahi.
Ka unaute, loupina Lalpa, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ginna chu mi deihsahtuamna toh neikhawm sih un.
Ajiahchu na kikhopna vah sana zungbuh but, puan hoihtah silh khat hung luut henla, huleh mijawng khat zong puan setah silhin hung luutta leh,

huchiin puan hoih silhpa chu na zahbawl va huleh a kawmah, “Nang hi mun hoih ah tou in,” na chi va, huleh mijawngpa kawmah chu, “Nang hutah ah ding in,” ahihlouhleh, “Hitah ah ka keeng ngahna nuaiah tou in,” na chi uhi.
Huchiin na lahva lungsim a khentuamna sulang a, huleh ngaihtuahna gilou nei vaihawmtu hung hita hilou na hi viaimah?
Ngai un, ka unau deihtahte, Pathian in hi khovel a mijawngte chu ginna a hausa diing leh Amah lungsiatte kawma achiam lalgam gou luah diinga ateel hilou ahi viaimah?
Hizongleh nang un mijawngte na musit uhi. Nanguh hung bawlsia a huleh vaihawmna a hung kailuutte khuh mihausate hilou ahi viaimah?
Amah un na kikouhna uh hu min zahumtah chu asoise sih viaimah?
Pathian Lehkhathu a, “Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi,” chia kigelh dungjuia lal daan na zopkim tahtah uh leh, na bawl hoih uhi.
Hizongleh mi deihsahtuamna na suhlatun chu, sil na hihsual va, huleh daan in botsetu bangin siamlouh ahungtan hi.
Ajiahchu mi koipouh in daan jui bukim henla, mun khat ah kipalpuuhta leh, a bawna botsia a mohtangin aum hi.
Ajiahchu, “Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,” chipa Amah in, “Tual na thah louh diing ahi,” zong achi hi. Huchiin aangkawm sih zonglechin, tual na thahin chu, daan bohsetu na hita thou hi.
Jaleenna daan a vaihawmsaha um diingte bangin thu soi unla gamta un.
Ajiahchu zahngaihna neilou mi chu zahngaihna beia vaihawmsahin aum diing hi. Zahngaihna in vaihawmna tungah gual azou hi.
Ka unaute, mi’n ginna ka nei chi henla, natoh nei sih leh, bang aphatuam diai? Huchibang ginna in amah ahundam thei diaimah?
Unaupa ahihlouhleh unaunu khat silhleteen tasamin um henla, ni chin an neeh tasamta leh,
huleh na lahva khat in, “Hamuangtahin chiah inla, lumtah leh vahtahin um in,” chi henla, sapum diinga sil poimoh pe tuan sih leh, bang aphatuam diai?
Huchibangmahin, ginna chu natoh beia amah chauh a aum leh, asi ahi.
Ahi, mi khat in, “Nang ginna na nei a, huleh ke’n natoh ka nei ahi,” achi thei hi. Na ginna chu natoh tellouin hung ensah in, huleh ka ginna chu ka natoh in ka hung ensah diing hi.
Nang Pathian khat aum chih na gingta hi. Na bawl hoih hi. Dawite’n zong agingta va, huleh lauin akiliing uhi.
Hizongleh nang mingolpa, ginna chu natoh tellouin asi ahi chih na he uut ei?
I pu uh Abraham in a tapa Isak maitaam tunga alat laiin silbawl jiaha siamtang hilou ahiaimah?
Ginna in a silbawlte toh atong khawm a, huleh ginna chu natoh a suhbukim ahi chih na mu hi.
“Abraham in Pathian agingta a, huchu amah diinga dihtatna a ngaih ahi,” chia Pathian Lehkhathu in asoi ataangtung hi. Huleh amah chu Pathian lawm chih ahita hi.
Mi chu ginna chauh hilouin, natohte in asiamtan ahi chih na mu uhi.
Huchibangmahin, kijuaahnu Rahab in zong, thupotute anazintun a, amahuh lamtuam a asawlkhiah laiin, natohte jiaha siamtang hilou ahi maw?
Ajiahchu hagau bei sapum chu asi ahih bangin, natoh bei ginna chu asi ahi.
Ka unaute, thuhilhtu in mi tampi hung pang sih un, ajiahchu ei thuhilhtute’n vaihawmna khauhjaw tang diing i hi uh chih i thei uhi.
Ajiahchu sil tampi ah i bawnun i kipalpuuh uhi. Mi koipouh thusoi lama akipalpuuh louh leh, hu mi chu mipiching ahi a, a sapum veeng thei mi zong ahi.
Ngai un, i thu ajuihna diingun sakolte kam ah siihbah i bah va, huleh a sapum uh apumin i kaihei thei hi.
En in, tuipi a longte zong alian mahmah va huleh huih haattah muut leengin aum na va, himahleh a heehtu in aheehna neutakhat in a uutna lamlam ah akiheisah hi.
Huchibangmahin lei zong sapum hiang neutakhat ahi a, hijiangzongleh nasatahin akiuangsah hi. En in, mei neutakhat in gammaang lianpi kang sethei hina mei e!

Huleh lei chu mei ahi a, giitlouhna khovel ahi. Lei chu sapum apumpi a subolhhohtu banga i sapum hiangte laha koiha um ahi a, huleh hi in pianken hinkhua zousiah akaangsah a; huleh hi chu gawtmun in mei a akaah ahi.
Ajiahchu sa chi chin, va chi chin, leitung a bohvaah chi chin, tuipi a ganhing chi chin, khawijual theih ahi a, huleh mihingte’n akhawijualta uhi.
Hizongleh lei chu koima’n akhawijual thei sih uhi. Hichu sual umkinken thei lou, sihna guuh a dim ahi.
Hi lei in Pathian leh Pa ngeei chu i phat va, huleh humah in Pathian batpiha siam mihingte i haamsiat jeel uhi.
Kamsung khat mah akipatin phatna leh haamsiatna apawtkhia hi. Ka unaute, hi silte chu huchibang diing hilou ahi.
Tuinaah khat in tui tuui leh tui kha apawt khesah ngei eimah?
Ka unaute, theipi kung ah Olive agah thei eimah, ahihlouhleh grep gui ah theipi agah thei eimah? Huchibangmahin tuinaah khat in tui al leh tui tuui apawtkhesah thei sih hi.
Na lahva koi ahiai pil leh silhesiam? A natohte chu pilna jaidam a bawl ahihdaan a umdaan hoih in ensah heh.
Na lungtang va thangsiatna nasatah leh kinialna na neih uh leh, uang sih unla huleh thudih kalhin juau soi sih un.
Hutobang pilna chu tunglam apat hung kumsuh ahi sih a, hizongleh khovel apat tahsa uutna leh dawi apat hung kipan ahi.
Ajiahchu thangsiatna leh kinialna umna phot ah, heetbuaina leh silgilou chinteng aum hi.
Hizongleh tunglam a hung kipan pilna chu amasapeenin asiangthou phot a, huzoh chiangin kilep auut a, anunneem a, akituluut a, khotuahna leh gah hoih in adim a, khentuam anei sih a, alepchiah sih hi.
Huleh dihtatna gah chu kilepna bawltute’n kilepna a atuh uh ahi.
Na lahva kidounate leh kihaunate khoi apat a hung kuan ahiai? Na sapum hiangte va kidou na tahsa uutnate vapat a hung pawt hilou ahi maw?
Na lunggulh va na nei tuan sih uhi. Tual na that va huleh na deihgoh va huleh na nei zou tuan sih uhi. Na kihau va huleh na kidou uhi. Ahiinlah na nei diaah sih uh, ajiahchu na nget louh jiahun.
Na ngeen va, na nget dih louh jiahun na mu sih uh, na tahsa nopsahna diingva zat na tup jiahun.
Nanguh aangkawmpate leh aangkawmnute! Khovel toh lawmhihna chu Pathian toh kimeelmaatna ahi chih he lou na hi uh maw? Hujiahin koipouh khovel lawm hih uut chu Pathian meelma in akisiam ahi.
“Eimah a teeng Hagau in thangsetahin ahung deih hi” chih Pathian Lehkhathu a kigial in amawh soi hi diinga gingta na hi uh maw?
Himahleh Ama’n hehpihna tamseem ahung pia hi. Hujiahin Ama’n, “Pathian in mi kisatheite adoudaal a, hizongleh mi kingaingiamte kawmah hehpihna apia hi,” achi hi.
Hujiahin Pathian kawmah kituluut un. Diabol chu doudaal un, huchiin ahung taaimangsan diing hi.
Pathian kawm naih un, huchiin Ama’n ahung naih diing hi. Nanguh misualte, na khut uh silsiang un; lungsim bulbaal neiloute, na lungtang uh susiangthou un.
Hahsa sa unla huleh lungdong unla huleh kap un; na nuihna uh lungdonna suaah henla huleh na nuamna uh dahna suaah heh.
Lalpa mitmuh ah kingaingiam un, huchiin Ama’n ahung tawisang diing hi.

Unaute, khat leh khat kisoise tuah sih un. Mi a unau soisia a huleh a unau vaihawm chu daan thu soisia leh daan vaihawmkhum ahi. Hizongleh daan na vaihawmkhum inchu, a juitu na hi sih a, hizongleh a tunga vaihawmtu na hijaw hi.
Daanpetu khat aum a, Ama’n chu ahundam thei a, huleh asuse veh thei hi. Midang vaihawm diingin nang koi na hiai?
Tuin hung un, nanguh, “Tuni ahihlouhleh jiingchiang in, hu khopi leh hi khopi ah i chiah diing va, hu mun ah kum khat i vataam diing va, leiin i juaah diing va, i pung diing uh,” chitute.
Ahiinlah jiing chianga bang ahung um diing na he sih uhi. Ajiahchu na hinna uh bang ahiai? Meilum tomtakhat hung kilang a, huleh mangkiit pah bang giap ahi.
Husaangin, “Lalpa’n pha asah leh, i hing diing a, hikhu ahihlouhleh hukhu i bawl diing,” na chi diing uh ahi.
Hizongleh tuin na kiuahsahna vah na kisuang uhi. Huchibang a kiuahsahna zousiah chu sual ahi.
Hujiahin sil hoih bawl diing he a, huleh bawl tuan lou mi chu amah a diingin sual ahi.
Nanguh mihausate, tuin hung un, na tungva mangbatna hung tung diingte jiahin kap unla maau un!
Na hauhsatnate uh amuatgawpta a, huleh na puante uh leikha in ane zouta hi.

Na sana uh leh na dangka uh atuieeh vehta a; hute tuieehsiatna chu nanguh kalhna a ahung heetpihtu ahi diing a, huleh na tahsa uh chu meikaah bangin ane zou diing hi. Hun nunung lamah gou na khol uhi.
Ngai un, na lou va buh aat kilohte loh, amahuh heembawla na piaah louh uh a lohte uh chu akikou va; huleh a aattute kikou aw chu sepaihte LALPA bil ah atungta hi.
Khovel ah nuamsatahin na um va, huleh na tahsa uh na kipaahsah uhi; sagoh ni a bangin na lungtangte uh na thausah uhi.
Midih chu siamlouh na tangsah va, na thatta uhi; ama’n chu ahung doudaal sih hi.
Hujiahin unaute, Lalpa hung masiahin kuhkaltahin um un. Ngai un, loubawlmi in lei gah luultah chu angaah a, guah masa leh guah nunung amuh masiah kuhkaltahin angaah hi.
Nanguh zong kuhkaltahin um un. Na lungtang uh sukip un, ajiahchu Lalpa hungna diing anaita hi.
Unaute, khat leh khat kiphunsan sih un, huchilou inchu siamlouh tansahin na um kha diing uhi. En un, Vaihawmtu chu kotkhaahbul ah ading hi!
Ka unaute, Lalpa min a thusoi zawlneite chu gimthuaahna leh kuhkalna lama etton diingin nei un.
Ngai un, athuaah mualsuaahtu chu hamphain i sep uhi. Job kuhkaldaan na ja va, Lalpa’n atawp a abawldaan na mu uhi. Lalpa chu lainatna leh khotuahna a dim ahi.

Hizongleh ka unaute, bangteng saangin, kihaahsialin kichiam sih un, vaan ahihlouhleh lei ahihlouhleh sildang bangmah min louin kihaahsial sih un. Hizongleh “Hi” na chih uh chu “Hi” hi heh, huleh “Hilou” na chih uh chu “Hilou” hi heh, huchilou inchu mileptat a seh na hi diing uhi.
Na lahva hahsatna thuaah aum ei? Haamtei heh. Kipaah aum ei? Phatna la sa heh.
Na lahva damlou aum ei? Kouhtuam upate kou henla, amah un Lalpa min a thaunuhin haamtei uh heh.
Ginna a haamteina in damlou chu adamsah diing a, Lalpa’n amah chu akaithou diing hi. Ama’n silsual anabawl a ahihleh, amah chu ngaihdam ahi diing hi.
Hujiahin suhdama na um theihna diingun na sualnate uh khat leh khat kiphuang tuah unla huleh khat leh khat kihaamteisah un. Midihtat guntuhtaha haamteina in sil abawlthei mahmah hi.
Elijah chu eimah pianken bangthou mihing ahi a, ama’n chu guah jutlouhna diingin phatuam ngaitahin ahaamtei a; huchiin kum thum leh ha guup sung lei tungah guah julouin aumta hi.
Huleh ahaamtei kiit a, vaan in guah ajusah a, huleh lei in a gahte ahung suahsahta hi.
Unaute, na lahva mi koipouh thutah apat anapeetmangta henla, mi khat in puikiitta leh,
koi hizongleh misual a lamkhelhna apat hung pui kiitpa’n sihna apat mi khat hinna ahundoh diing a, huleh sualna tampi akhuhmang diing hi chih hesah un.
Peter, Jesu Khrist apostol in Ponta, Galatia, Kappadosia, Asia leh Bithunia gamte a kithehdalh mivaithaamte kawm ah,
Jesu Khrist a thumang diing leh sisan theh tang diinga Hagau hihsiangthou jaala Pa Pathian heetlawhna dungjuia teelte kawmah: Hehpihna na kawmvah um henla huleh hamuanna suhkhangin umta hen.
Misi lah apat a Jesu Khrist thohkiitna tungtawna, a khotuahna kichingtah dungjuia kinepna hing tang diinga eiuh hung piangthahsah Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa chu phatin um hen,
goutan setheilou, buaahbaanglou leh mual theilou, vaan a nanguh diinga siit chu tang diingin,
hun nunung chianga kilang diing hutdamna mu diinga ginna jaala Pathian silbawltheihna a kep na hi uhi.
Hitah ah chu nasatahin na kipaah va, tuin tomkhat sung apoimoh leh, jeetna jaat tuamtuam in lungkham tadih mahleh uh chin,

na ginna uh adih kiheetchianna chu sana mei a etkhiah ahih nunga zong mangthang jeel saanga luuljaw chu, Jesu Khrist hung kilaah ni chianga paahtawina leh loupina leh zahbawlna a muha aum theihna diingin;
Amah chu mu sih zongleh uh chin na lungsiat uhi. Tuin Amah mu sih zongleh uh chin na gingta va, kipaahna soiguallouh leh loupina a dimin na kipaah uhi.
Ajiahchu na ginna uh buchinna na hagau uh hutdamna ngeei chu na mu uhi.
Hi hutdamna thu chu na kawmva hehpihna hung tung diing thu anasoilawh zawlneite’n nguntahin akan va asui uhi,
Khrist Hagau amahuh a um in Khrist thuaahgimna leh hu nunga hung jui diing loupina thu aheetsah malawh laiin, bangchibang mi leh bangtobang hun in ahiai chih heet tumin akan uhi.

Vaan apat a hung kisawl Hagau Siangthou zanga na kawmva tanchinpha soitute tungtawnin hu silte chu na kawmvah heetsah ahita hi. Hu mite’n chu amahuh diing hilouin, eiuh diingin nna atong jaw uhi chih a kawmvah heetsah ahi uhi. Hu silte chu angelte’n zong etveel auut uhi.
Huchihjiahin na lungsim un kisakhawl unla, pilvaang un, huleh Jesu Khrist hung kilaah chianga nanguh kawma hung kipe diing hehpihna chu kiptahin lamen un.
Ta thumangte bangin na heetlouh laiva malai a na uutnate uh bangin um sih un.
Hizongleh nanguh hung koupa asianthou bangin nanguh zong na gamtat daan zousiah vah siangthou un.
“Nanguh siangthou un, ajiahchu kei ka siangthou hi,” chih gelh ahihjiahin.
Huleh deihsahtuam neiloua mi chin a natoh dungjuia vaihawmsahtu chu Pa chia kou na hih uh leh, khovel a na vaithaam lai hun uh lau kawmin zang un.
Ajiahchu na pulepate vapat tawndaan a na muh uh na umdaan uh bangmah hilou apat sil sethei, dangka ahihlouhleh sana a tat na hi sih uh chih na he va,
hizongleh belaamnou demna bei leh niin baanglou sisan banga Khrist sisan luultah a tat na hijaw uhi.
Amah chu khovel kisiam mapehin guatlawhin aum ngeei hi, hizongleh hi hun nunungte ah nanguh diingin suhlatin aumta hi.
Amah tungtawnin misi lah apat a Amah kaithoupa leh loupina pepa Pathian na gingta uhi, huchia na ginna uh leh na kinepna uh Pathian a aumtheihna diingin.
Unaute tunga lungsiatna dihtah neihna diinga Hagau tungtawna thutah thumanna a na hagau uh na suhsiangthoutaah jiahun, phatuamngaitahin khat leh khat lungtang siangthou in kilungsiat tuah un.
Chi sethei apat hilouin, himahleh chi setheilou, Pathian thu kumtuanga hing zing leh um zing tungtawna piangthah na hijaw uhi.
Ajiahchu, “Mihing zousiah hi hampa bang ahi, Huleh mihing loupina zousiah zong hampa paah bang ahi. Hampa chu avul a, a paah zong apulh hi.
Hizongleh LALPA thu chu kumtuangin aum zing hi.” Huleh hichu na kawmva tanchinpha thu kisoi chu ahi.
Huchihjiahin giitlouhna zousiah, heembawlna zousiah, lepchiahnate, eennate leh kisoisiatna zousiah tawpsan unla,
na khantouh theihna diingun naungeeh suaahthahte bangin Pathian thu nawitui bangma toh hallouh lunggulh un,
Lalpa chu mi hehpihsiam ahi chih na heettaah jiahun.
Mite deihlouh hizongleh Pathian teel leh luul suangpi hing Amah kawmah na hung uhi.
Nanguh zong suang hingte bangin Jesu Khrist tungtawna Pathian pomtaah hagaulam kithoihna laan diinga siampuhihna siangthou leh hagaulam inn a lamtouh na hi uhi.
Hujiahin Pathian Lehkhathu ah zong, “Ngai un, Zion ah aning a suang poimohpeen, teel leh luultah ngeei chu ka lem hi, huleh Amah gingta phot chu amualphou sih diing hi”, chih gelh ahi.
Hujiahin nanguh agingtate diingin Amah chu aluul a, himahleh agingtaloute diingin, “Innlamtute suang deihlouh, hu ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen hung hi,”
huleh “Kipalpuuhna suang leh kipuuhna suangpi,” chu ahi. Amah un thu aman louh jiahun akipalpuuh uhi, huchibang diing him a guat zong ahi uhi.
Hizongleh a vaahna limdangtah a luut diinga mial apat a nanguh hung koudohpa hoihnate na phuandalh theihna diingun, nanguh chu chi teel, lal siampu, nam siangthou, Pathian mituam biihte na hi uhi.
Nidanglaiin Pathian mite na hi sih va, hizongleh tuin chu Pathian mite na hita uh, khotuahna tangloute na hi va, hizongleh tuin chu khotuahna na tangta uhi.
Deihtahte, mikhual leh khualzin bangin, hagau doudaal zing tahsa uutnate tawpsan diingin ka hung hasot hi.
Silgilou bawlte banga ahung soisiat chiang va, na natoh hoihte uh amuh jiahva vehna Ni a Pathian apaahtawi theihna diingun, Jentelte lahah na gamtat daan uh kilawmtahin um un.
Lalpa jiahin mihing daan bawl photmah nuaiah kituluut un, kumpi kawmah hitaleh athuneipeen nuaia bangin kituluut un,
ahihlouhleh gamoptute kawmah, kumpipa’n silgilou bawlte gawt diing leh sil hoih bawlte tawimawi diinga ahung sawl ahi va, anuai vah kituluut un.
Ajiahchu na sil hoih bawl va mingolte ngolna na suhdaih uh chu Pathian deihjawng ahi.
Mi jaleente bangin um unla, ahiinlah na jaleenna uh chu giitlouhna khuhkhumna diingin zang sih un; hizongleh Pathian suaahte bangin um un.
Mi zousiah zahbawl un. Unaupihte lungsiat un. Pathian lau un. Kumpipa zahbawl un.
Suaahte haw, zahtaatna liantah toh na pute uh nuaiah kituluut un, a hoihte leh a jaineemte kawm chauh ah hilouin, hizongleh mithulimloute kawmah zong kituluut un.
Ajiahchu Pathian lama sialephaheetna jiaha mi’n gimna leh dihloutaha bawlna athuaah leh, hichu paahtaat taah ahi.

Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh na dihlouhna jiahva vuaaha na um chiangun kuhkaltahin thuaah mahleh uh chin, bang paahtaat ahiai na loh uh? Hizongleh sil hoih na bawl va, hukhu jiaha na thuaahloh uh leh, kuhkaltahin thuaah leh uh chin, hichu Pathian ma a paahtaat taah ahi.
Ajiahchu hikhuh diing mawnga kouh na hi uhi, Khrist in eiuh luanga anathuaahtaah jiahin, nang un na juih theih diing uh a khaapnung etton diing ahung nuutsiat hi,
“Ama’n chu sual mawngmawng abawl sih a, huleh a kam ah zong heemthu akimu sih hi.”
Housiata aum laiin Ama’n ahousiat thuh sih a, athuaah laiin zong avau sih a, hizongleh dihtattaha vaihawmpa kawmah akikeemsah jaw hi.
Eiuh suallama si a, hizongleh dihtatna lama i hin theihna diingun Ama’n Amah sapum ah i sualnate sing dawn ah apua a, Amah vuaahna golhte jiahin suhdamin na umta uhi.
Ajiahchu belaam bangin nana lammangta va, hizongleh tuin chu na hagau uh Belaampu leh Veengtu kawmah na hung kihkiitta uhi.
Huchibangmahin, nanguh jite haw, na pasalte uh kawm chiat ah kituluut un, huchia koiaha in Pathian thu gingta sih mahleh, Pathian thu tellou a jite gamtat daan a zoha aum theihna diingin,
huchiin zahtaattaha na gamtat daan uh leh siangthoutah a na umdaan uh amuh chiangun zohin aum diing uhi.
Na kicheina uh chu polam kicheina sam pheehte leh sana a kicheinate, ahihlouhleh puansilh hoih a kithuamte hilouin,
hu saangin kilawmna setheilou lungsim nunneem leh chihnuam in sunglam mihing chu kithuam jaw heh, huchu Pathian mitmuhin amanpha hi.
Ajiahchu hutobangmahin malai a numei siangthou, Pathian muangtute’n zong, amahuh pasalte thuthu va umin anakichei uhi.
Sarah ngeei in Abraham chu lalpa chia koua a thu aman bangin, suhlauna jiah hiloua sildih na bawl uh leh, Sarah tanute na hi uhi.

Huchibangmahin, nanguh pasalte haw, na haamteina uh daala aum louhna diingin, na jite uh chu hinna hehpihna na tankhawmpih uh ahihjiahun, beel keehbaihjaw banga ngaiin paahtawina pia unla, heetsiamna toh umkhawm un.
Atawppeenin, khat leh khat lungsim munkhat pua unla, kilainattuah unla, unau banga kilungsiatin hehpihsiam unla, kingaingiam un;

giitlouhna chu giitlouhna a thuh louin, housiatna zong housiatna a thuh louin, hizongleh hu saanga vangpiaah jawin, ajiahchu huchi diing him a kouh na hi uhi, huchia vangpiaahna na tan theihna diingun.
Ajiahchu “Hinna deih leh ni hoihte muh uut in chu gilou apat a lei veeng henla, a muuh zong heemthu soina apat veeng hen.
Gilou apat kiheemkhia henla, sil hoih bawl heh; lemna hawl henla, delh jeel hen.
Ajiahchu LALPA mit chu midihtatte tungah atu a, huleh a bil zong a haamteina lamvah akidoh hi; hizongleh LALPA meel chu silgilou bawlte kalhin a tungvah atu hi.”
Huleh sil hoih juitute na hih uh leh, koi ahiai nanguh poi hung khoih diing?
Hizongleh dihtatna jiaha na thuaah uh leh, na hampha uhi. “Huleh ahung vauna uh lau sih unla, lung zong lungkham sih un.”
Hizongleh na lungtang un Lalpa Pathian chu zahtaat unla, huleh nanguh a um kinepna jiah hung dong photmahte chu jaineemna leh zahtaatna toh dawng diingin bangchihlaipouhin kipeih zing un;
huchia Khrist a na gamtat daan hoih uh dihloutaha hung demte chu ahung soisiatna va azum theihna diingun sialephaheetna hoihtah nei un.
Ajiahchu Pathian lemsah ahih inchu, silgilou bawl jiaha thuaah saangin sil hoih bawl jiaha thuaah ahoihjaw hi.
Ajiahchu Pathian kawma ahung pui theihna diingin Khrist in zong sualnate jiahin setden diingin khatvei athuaahta a, midih chu midihlou luangin, tahsa a suhlupin aum a, hizongleh Hagau in asuhhing hi.
Hu Hagau tungtawnin avachiah a, suangkul a um hagaute kawmah thu avaphuang hi.
Hute’n nidanglaia Noah damlaia kuang bawl sung teng Pathian thuaahzohna in angaah laiin athumang sih va, hu kuang ah mi tawmtakhat, huchu mi giat tui lahah hutdamin aum uhi.
Hu baptisma in aetsah chu Jesu Khrist thohkiitna jiaha tua i hutdamna uh ahi, huchu tahsa nitna koihmang hilouin, sialephaheetna siangtah neihna diinga Pathian lama ngetna ahijaw hi.
Amah chu vaan ah achiahta a, angelte leh thuneihnate leh silbawltheihnate a thu nuaia koihin Pathian jiatlam ah aumta hi.
Huchiin eiuh diinga Khrist in tahsa a hung thuaahta ahih jiahin nanguh zong huchibang lungsim in kithuam un, ajiahchu koipouh tahsa a thuaahsa in chu sual atawpsanta hi,
huchia tahsa a hun aneih laiteng a mihing uutna lam banga hingta lou a, hizongleh Pathian deihjawnga ahin jawhna diingin.
Ajiahchu huuhnate, uutnate, zuhainate, gualnop thaanghuai munte, zu dawnkhawmnate leh milem biahna kihdahhuaite a i umlai a Jentelte deihjawng bawlna ah i tumalai hinkhuate uh i zang huntawhta uhi.
Hi thu ah chu amahuh nopbawl luatna banga na bawlve louh uh thumah asa va, nanguh ahung soisia uhi.
Amah un mihing leh misite vaihawm diinga kipeihsa Amah kawmah a tanchin uh asoi diing uhi.
Hikhu jiahin tanchinpha chu misite kawmah zong soiin ana-um hi, huchia tahsa a um mite dungjuia vaihawmsah ahih theihna diingun, hizongleh Pathian deihlam dungjuia hagau a ahin theihna diingun.
Hizongleh sil zousiah tawpna diing chu anaita hi; hujiahin silngaikhawh unla, na haamteinate vah pilvaang un.
Huleh sil bangkim tungah phatuamngaitahin kilungsiat tuah chiat un, ajiahchu “lungsiatna in sualna tampi akhuhkhum hi.”
Phunchiaah louin khat leh khat kizintun tuah un.
Mi chin in silpiaah na muh bang jeelun, Pathian hehpihna chi tuamtuam keemtu hoihtahte bangin, hute in khat leh khat nna kitohsah tuah chiat un.

Mi koipouh in thu asoi leh, Pathian kam a thu pawt bangin soi heh. Mi koipouh in thunatoh nna atoh leh, Pathian in haatna apiaah bangjeelin tong heh, Jesu Khrist jaala Pathian chu sil bangkim a paahtawia aum theihna diingin, Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.
Deihtahte, nanguh je-et diinga na tungva je-etna hung tung chu sil limdang bang aha hung tung bangin ngaihtuah sih un.
Hizongleh Khrist thuaahnate kikoppih na hih jiahun kipaah un, huchia a loupina ahung kilat chiangin nanguh zong naahpiihtaha nuama na kipaah theihna diingun.

Khrist min jiaha soisiat na hih uh leh, na hampha uhi, ajiahchu loupina Hagau leh Pathian Hagau na tungvah aum hi. Amahuh lam thu ah Amah chu soisiat ahi a, hizongleh nanguh lam thu ah Amah chu paahtawiin aum ahi.
Hizongleh na lahvah koimah in tualthah jiahin aha, guuhtaat jiahin aha, silgilou bawl jiahin aha, ahihlouhleh midangte tungtaang phatuamloua buaipih ahihjiahin aha thuaah sih heh.
Ahihvaangin koipouh in Khristian ahihjiaha a thuaah leh zum sih heh, hizongleh hi tungtaang jiahin Pathian paahtawi jaw heh.
Ajiahchu Pathian innkuante lahah vaihawmna kipat hun ahung tungta hi; huleh eiuh toh kipan masa ahih inchu, Pathian tanchinpha gingtaloute tawpna chu bang ahita diai?
Huleh “Midihtat bawn hutdam ahih haamhaam inchu, Pathian ngaihsahloute leh misualte bang asuaahta diai?”
Huchihjiahin koipouh Pathian lemsah dungjuia thuaahte’n sil hoihbawl ah a hagau uh chu Siamtu ginumtah kawmah kolsah uh hen.
Na lahva upa umte chu kei na upa hihpih uh leh Khrist thuaahna heetpihtu leh loupina hung kilang diing zong tanpihtu in ka hasot hi.
Na lahva Pathian belaam pawl umte vaah unla, amahuh enkol un, hihlouh theihlouh ahihjiah hilouin, uut thu jawin, punna niin deih jiah hilouin, hizongleh lungsim kipeihsa kawm jawin;
etkol diinga hung kipete tunga kisulal lou a, himahleh pawlte etton diinga um jawin.
Huleh Belaampu Lianpeen ahung kilat chiangin loupina lallukhuh mualtheilou na mu diing uhi.

Huchibangmahin nanguh khanglaite haw, upate nuaiah kituluut un. Ahi, na bawnun khat leh khat kithumang tuah chiat unla, kingaihngiamna in kithuam un, ajiahchu, “Pathian in mikiliansahte adoudaal a, hizongleh mi kingaingiamte kawmah hehpihna apia hi.”
Hujiahin ahuntaha Ama’n nanguh ahung tawisang theihna diingin Pathian khut haattah nuaiah kingaingiam un.
Ama’n ahung ngaihsah zing jiahin, na lungkhamna zousiah uh a tungah nga un.
Sil ngaikhawh unla, kiveeng zingin um un; ajiahchu na khingpa uh diabol chu huumpibahnei hawh bangin aneeh theih diing mi hawlin avaah lehleh hi.
Na unau uh khovel a umte tungah huchibang thuaahnatnate atungve chih hein, ginna a kiptaha umin diabol chu dou un.

Hizongleh Khrist Jesu manga kumtuang loupina tang diinga eiuh hung koupa, hehpihna hau Pathian in, tomkhat sung na thuaah nungun, nanguh ahung subukimin, ahung sukipin, ahung suhaatin, ahung umdetsah diing hi.
Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.
Unau ginumtaha ka heet Silvana tungtawnin nanguh hasotna, huleh hichu Pathian hehpihna thutah i dinna uh ahi chih hesahin na kawmvah tomtakhatin ka hung gial ahi.
Nanguh toh teel khawm Babylon a umnu in chibai ahung buuh hi; huchibangmahin ka tapa Mark in zong ahung buuh hi.
Lungsiatna kitawp in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un. Nanguh Khrist Jesu a um zousiah kawmah hamuanna um hen. Amen.
Simon Peter, Jesu Khrist suaah leh apostol in i Pathian leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist dihtatna jaala ginna i tan bang tangte kawmah:
Hehpihna leh hamuanna chu na kawmvah Pathian leh i Lalpa Jesu heetna ah suhpungin umta hen.
Amah loupina leh hoihna a eiuh hung koupa heetna jiahin, a Pathian silbawltheihna in hinna leh Pathian ngaihsahna lam thu ah sil zousiah ahung pia hi.
Hu tungtawnin thuchiam manpha leh loupi mahmahte chu ahung pia hi, huchia uutna tungtawna khovel a um siatna apat suaahta a Pathian pianken umdaan kikoppihte na hung hih theihna diingun.
Hujiahmahin thanopna zousiah suahin, na ginna vah hoihna hal unla, na hoihna vah heetna hal unla,
na heetna vah kideehtheihna hal unla, na kideehtheihna vah kuhkalna hal unla, huleh na kuhkalna vah Pathian ngaihsahna hal unla,
na Pathian ngaihsahna vah unau kilungsiatna hal unla, huleh na unau kilungsiatna vah lungsiatna hal un.
Ajiahchu hite nanguh a aum a akhan jeelin chu, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist heetna lamah chiing leh gahlouin na um sih diing uhi.
Hizongleh hi silte nei lou chu mittaw ahi a, gamla amuthei sih a, huleh a malai sualte apat silsianga aumna zong amangngilhta hi.
Hujiahin unaute, nanguh hung kikouhna leh kiteelna suchian diingin thanop hung suah un, ajiahchu hite na bawl uh leh chu na kipalpuuh ngei himhim sih diing uhi;
ajiahchu huchiin Jesu Khrist i Lalpa leh Hundampa kumtuang gam a luutna chu nanguh kawmah kiningchingtahin ahung musah diing hi.
Hujiahin hi silte hein, na kawmva um thutah ah tundingkip hita mahleh uh chin zong, hu silte chu hung hesahkiit zing diingin ka kithahdah ngei sih diing hi.
Ahi, hi puaninn a ka um sung teng nanguh hung heetsah kiit jeela hung tohhalh zing hoih ka sa hi,
i Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung theihsah mahbangin, hi ka puaninn koihmangna ahung tung pah diing chih ka thei ngaala.
Hubaan ah ka paikhiah nung chianga hi silte na heetzingna diingun ka hahkat diing hi.

Ajiahchu i Lalpa Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna leh ahung paikiitna thu ka hung theihsah laiun, taangthu bulbaal neilou pillepchiahtaha phuahtawm meimeite juitute ka hi sih va, hizongleh a loupina mutute ka hijaw uhi.

Ajiahchu Ama’n chu Pa Pathian kawma kipatin paahtawina leh loupina amu a, huchihlaiin loupina tungtuang apatin hichibang aw a kawmah ahung tung hi, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah, ka kipaahna mahmah ahi,” chiin.
Huleh taang siangthou a Amah toh ka umlai un, hi aw chu vaan apat hung pawt keiuh ngeei in ka ja uhi.
Soilawhna thu kipjaw seem zong i nei uhi, khua ahung vaah a, na lungtang va jiingsol aahsi ahung suaah masiah, mun mial a vaah um na ngaihsah bangva na ngaihsah uh leh na bawl hoih uh ahi diing hi.
Pathian Lehkhathu a thusoilawh himhim chu mi khat mimal lehdohna apat hung um ahi sih chih he masa un.
Ajiahchu thusoilawh himhim nidanglaiin mihing deihdaan apat hung pawt ahi het sih a, hizongleh Pathian misiangthoute’n Hagau Siangthou phuut ahih bang jeelun anasoi uh ahijaw hi.

Hizongleh mite laha zawlnei tahloute zong ana-um mah bangin, na lahva zong thuhilhtu tahloute ahung um diing va, amah un chu amahuh leipa Lalpa hiilhial kiheetmohbawlin, mi susethei ginna dihloute aguuhin ahung luutpih diing va, amahuh leh amahuh tungah thakhatin siatna atungsah diing uhi.
Huchiin mi tampi in a zulhjauna uh ahung chiing diing va, amahuh jiahin thutah lampi chu soisiat ahi diing hi.
Huleh a huaihamna jiahun sumkawlveina a hung neiin juauthu in nanguh ahung heem diing uhi; nidanglai apat a tungva vaihawmna chu akhawl sih a, a siatgawpna uh zong a-ihmu sih hi.
Ajiahchu angelte’n sil asuhsual un Pathian in ahawi sih a, tartaras ah apaai a, vaihawmsaha um diinga asiit a kokhuuh mialte ah akhum jaw a,
huleh Pathian ngaihsahloute khovel ah tuijiin atungsah a, nidanglai khovel chu ahawi sih a, hizongleh dihtatna thusoipa Noah chu midang sagih toh akeembit a,
huleh Sodom leh Gomorrah khopite chu mohtangsaha susiain vutvai asuaahsah a, Pathian ngaihsahlou hung um diingte etsahna diingin abawl a,
huleh migiloute umdaan thaanghuaitah jiaha lungsim na mahmah midihtat Lot chu ahutkhiaha ahihleh
(ajiahchu hu midihtatpa’n a kawmva aum laiin, daanlou banga a silbawlte uh amuh a huleh ajaahin, hute’n a lungsim dihtat chu ani ani in asuna mahmah hi),
Lalpa’n amah ngaihsah mite chu heemna apat hutkhiah daan leh midihtatloute chu vaihawm ni a gawt diinga siit daan ahe hi,
huleh adiaahin uutna thaanghuai lama tahsadaan banga umte leh thuneitu simmoh mite chu. Amahuh chu ngolhaan leh chihhah ahi va, amah un loupina neite asoisiatun zong alau sih uhi.
Huchibang ahihlaiin, angel haat leh silbawltheite’n bawn, Lalpa ma ah a tungthu uh hahsoiin asoise ngam sih uhi.
Hizongleh hite’n ganhing ngaihtuahna neilou mat a thah diingte bangin, aheetsiam louh uh silte asoisia va, huchiin amahuh siatna ah abeimang veh diing uhi.
Huleh suun laia ankuang lui buai nuamsa mi ahih jiahun dihtatlouhna man amu diing uhi. Na kawmva ankuang alui laiun, amahuh kiheema ankuang lui ahih jiahun, buaah leh meelhem ahi uhi.
Aangkawmna mit a dim, sual tawpsan theihlouhte anei va, mi kiploute aheempuuh va, eenhaat lungsim apua va, huleh haamsethuaah tate ahi uhi.
Lampi dih ataaisan va, avaahmang va, dihtatlouhna loh ngainapa Beor tapa Balaam lampi ajuita uhi.
Hizongleh amah chu a giitlouhna jiahin taaihilhin aum a, sabiltung haamtheilou mihing haam a hung haam in zawlnei ngolna chu akhapta hi.
Hute chu tuikhuuh tui umlou, huih muut leeng lehleh meilum ahi va, amahuh diingin vom behbuh a mialna chu kumtuanga siit ahi.
Ajiahchu thumanlouh chiaahjeena soiin, giitlouhna apat suaahta haamhaamte chu tahsa uutna leh huuhna in aheempuuh uhi.
Amahuh chu siatna suaah hipumin mite suahtaatna thu achiam uhi; ajiahchu mi zoha aumna humah in amah chu suaahin asiam hi.
Ajiahchu Lalpa leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist heetna jiaha, khovel thaanghuainate anuutsiatsan nungva, humah a ataan kiit va zoha aum uh leh, a umdaan nunung uh chu achiila saangin asejaw hi.
Ajiahchu dihtatna lampi atheih nung va, thupiaah siangthou a kawmva kepsaha um chu anungngatsan saangun dihtatna lampi theilou anahi leh uh, amahuh diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
Hizongleh “Ui amah luaah mah ah akihkiit,” chih leh, “Vohpi kisilsiangsa buannawi a kibual diingin akiih,” chih thupil dihtah khu bangngeeiin a tungvah atung hi.
Deihtahte, tua na kawmva ka gelh hi lehkhathot anihna ahi. Hu tegeel hung hesahkiit jeelin na lungsim chiimtahte uh ka tohthou ahi,
huchu zawlnei siangthoute’n anasoi masat uh thute, huleh keiuh, Lalpa leh Hundampa apostolte thupiaah na heetzingna diingun ahi.
Hikhu he masa un, ni nunung lam ah simmohhaatte, amahuh uutna ngeei banga gamtate ahung um diing va,
“Ahung kiitna thuchiam khoiah ahiai? Ajiahchu silsiam chiil apat sil bangkim pulepate ihmut ni apatin aum ngeingei bangin aum zing,” achi diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian thu in nidanglaiin vaante ahung um a, lei zong tui apat leh tui lahah ana-um hi chihte tupmawngin akiheetmohsan va;
hu thu tungtawnin hulaia khovel um chu tui in atuum a, abeimangta hi.
Hizongleh vaante leh lei chu hu thu jiah mahin Pathian ngaihsahlou mite vaihawmna leh manthaaina ni a diinga siit-a umin mei a gawt diinga kholkhawm ahita hi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, hi sil khat theilouin um sih un, huchu Lalpa ngaihin ni khat chu kum saang khat bang ahi a, huleh kum saang khat zong ni khat bang ahi.
Mi khenkhat in zekaai asah bangun, Lalpa chu a thuchiam lamah azekaai sih hi, hizongleh koimah beimang deihlouin mi zousiah kisiih diing deihin eimah lamah athuaahzou ahijaw hi.

Hizongleh Lalpa Ni chu jaan a guta bangin ahung tung diing hi, huleh hu Ni chiangin vaante chu nasataha gingin amang diing va, huleh silbulte chu mei a haaitui ahi diing va, lei zong a sunga natoh umte toh haalmangin aum diing hi.
Hu silte zousiah chu huchia beimang diing ahi chih hein umdaan siangthou leh Pathian ngaihsahna lam phot ah bangchibang mi hi diing na hi viaimah?
Pathian Ni hung tung pah diing enkawmin, hukhu jiaha vaante chu mei a hung kaangmang diing leh silbulte zong mei a haaituia umta diing ahihjiahin.
Ahihvaangin ei un chu a thuchiam dungjuiin vaan thah leh lei thah, dihtatna umna chu i kineppih uhi.
Hujiahin deihtahte, hu silte kineppih na hih jiahun, niin baanglou leh dembeia hamuangtaha nana um uh Ama’n ahung muh theihna diingin thanop suah un.
Huleh i Lalpa thuaahtheihna chu hutdamna hiin ngai un, i unaupa deihtah Paul in Pathian in a kawma apiaah pilna dungjuia na kawmva agelh bangin,

a lehkhathot zousiah ah hi silte tungtaang asoi hi. Hu lehkhathotte ah thu heetsiam hahsate khenkhat aum a, hute chu mipillou leh mikiploute’n Pathian Lehkhathu dang akaihkawi bangun amahuh mah siatna diingin akaikawi uhi.
Hujiahin deihtahte, nang un hu thute na theihlawh jiahun pilvaang un, huchilou inchu migiloute khelhna a puimanga umin na kipna vapatin na puuh kha diing uhi.
Hizongleh i Lalpa leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh heetna ah hung khanglian un. Amah kawmah tu leh kumtuangin loupina um hen. Amen.
Achiil apata um, ka jaahsa uh, ka mit va ka muhsa uh, ka etchetsa uh, huleh ka khut un zong athamsa hu hinna Thu chu,
huleh hu hinna chu suhlat ahita a, hu kumtuang hinna Pa kawma um, ka kawmva suhlat-a um chu ka muta va, ka heetpih va, na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi;
huchia nang un zong na hung kipawlkhawmpih theihna diingun hu ka muhsa uh leh ka jaahsa uh chu na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi. Huleh tahzetin i kipawlkhawmna uh chu Pa toh a Tapa Jesu Khrist toh ahi.
Huleh na kipaahna uh abukim theihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka hung gial uh ahi.
Amah apat na kawmva hung phuan diinga ka na jaah uh thupuaah chu hikhu ahi, Pathian chu vaah ahi a huleh Amah ah mial mawngmawng aum sih hi.
Amah toh ka kipawlkhawm chi ngaala, mial a i um zing un chu juau i soi a, huleh thutah i bawl sih uhi.
Hizongleh Amah vaah a aum banga ei zong vaah a i um zing leh, khat leh khat kipawlkhawmna i nei va, huleh a Tapa Jesu Khrist sisan in sualna zousiah apat ahung silsiang hi.
Sualna ka nei sih i chih un chu, eimah leh eimah kiheem i hi va, huleh thutah eimah ah aum sih hi.
I sualnate i phuan un chu, i sualnate ngaidam diing leh dihtatlouhna zousiah apat hung silsiang diingin Amah chu amuanhuai in adihtat ahi.
Sualna ka nei sih i chih un chu, Amah mijuau i hisah va, huleh a thu zong eimah ah aum sih hi.
Ka tate haw, na sual louhna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Huleh mi koiaha asualtaah leh, Pa kawma hung soipihtu Jesu Khrist midihtat i nei uhi.
Amah chu i sualnate diinga thuphatawina ahi a, huleh eiuh sualna diing chauh hilouin, khovel pumpi sual thuphatawina zong ahi.
A thupiaahte i juihva ahihleh, Amah i he chih i he uhi.
Mi’n, “Amah ka he,” chi ngaala a thupiaahte juilou mi chu mijuau ahi a, huleh thutah amah ah aum sih hi.
Hizongleh koipouh a thu jui photmah chu, amah ah Pathian lungsiatna abukim tahzet ahi. Hikhu in Amah ah i um chih i he hi.
Amah ah ka um zing chitu chu Amah um bangin aum ve diing ahi.
Unaute, thupiaah thah na kawmvah ka hung gial ahi sih a, hizongleh thupiaah lui, achiil apat na neih uh ka hung gial jaw ahi. Thupiaah lui chu achiil apat na jaahsa uh thu chu ahi.
Huchiangleh thupiaah thah na kawmvah ka hung gial ahi, huchu Amah leh nanguh ah dihtahin aum hi, ajiahchu mial abeita a huleh tuin vaah dihtah ahung vaahta hi.
Mi vaah ah ka um chi a, a unau mudah chu mial ah aum nalai ahi.
A unau lungsiattu chu vaah ah aum zing a, amah ah kipalpuuhna diing himhim aum sih hi.
Hizongleh a unau mudah chu mial ah aum a, mial ah akhosa hi; mial in amit asuhtawtsah jiahin achiahna lam zong ahe sih hi.
Tate haw, Amah min jiaha na sualnate uh ngaihdam ahihtaah jiahin na kawmvah ka gial ahi.

Pate haw, achiil apat a um, Amah na heet jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi.Tangvaalte haw, giloupa chu na zohtaah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Tate haw, Pa chu na heettaah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi.
Pate haw, achiil apat a um, Amah na heettaah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi. Tangvaalte haw, na haat va, Pathian thu nanguh a aum zing a, huleh giloupa chu na zohtaah jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi.
Khovel lungsiat sih unla, khovel a sil umte zong lungsiat sih un. Mi koipouh in khovel alungsiatin chu, Pa lungsiatna amah ah aum sih hi.
Ajiahchu khovel a sil um zousiah, tahsa uutnate, mit uutnate leh damsung kisahtheihnate chu Pathian akipan ahi sih a, hizongleh khovel apat ahijaw hi.
Khovel chu a uutna toh abei zing ahi; hizongleh Pathian deihjawng bawl mi chu kumtuangin aum zing hi.
Tate haw, hun nunung ahita hi; huleh Khrist doudaalpa ahung diing chih na jaah bangun, tuin zong Khrist doudaal tampi aum zouta a, hikhu jiahin hun nunung ahita chih i he uhi.

Amahuh chu i lah vapat apawtdoh uh, hizongleh eiuh laha mi ahi sih uhi; ajiahchu eiuh laha mi anahita leh uh, i kawmva um zing diing ahi uhi; hizongleh a bawnun eiuh laha mi ahi sih uh chih kilatna diingin apawtdoh uh ahi.
Hizongleh nang un chu Misiangthoupa apat thaunuh na tang va, sil zousiah na he uhi.
Thutah na heetlouh jiahun na kawmvah ka gial ahi sih a, hizongleh na heet jiah uh leh thutah apat juau mawngmawng apawt louh jiahin ka gial ahijaw hi.
Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih kiheetmohbawl loungaal koi ahiai mijuau? Pa leh Tapa kiheetmohbawl mi chu Khrist doudaalpa ahi.
Mi koipouh Tapa kiheetmohbawl in chu Pa anei sih a, hizongleh Tapa pom photmah in chu Pa zong anei hi.
Hujiahin achiil apat na jaah uh chu nanguh ah umsah zing un. Hu achiil apat na jaah uh nanguh a aum zingin chu, nanguh zong Tapa ah leh Pa ah na um zing diing uhi.
Huleh hikhu ahi thuchiam Ama’n piaah diinga ahung chiam, kumtuang hinna ngeei chu.
Nanguh hung puimang tumte tungtaang thu ah hite ka hung gelh ahi.

Hizongleh Amah apat thaunuhna na tan uh nanguh ah aum zing a, huleh koima hung hilh na kiphamoh sih uhi; hizongleh hu thaunuhna mah in sil zousiah nanguh ahung hilh bangin, huchu thutah ahi a, juau ahi sih a, huleh hu in nanguh ahung hilh bang ngeeiin Amah ah na um diing uhi.
Huleh tuin, tate haw, Amah ahung kilat chianga kimuanna i neih theihna diing leh ahung chianga a ma a i zum louhna diingun Amah ah um zing un.
Amah chu midihtat ahi chih na heet uh leh, mi chin dihtatna bawl photmah chu Amah a piang ahi chih na he uhi.
Ngai un, bangchilawma lungsiatna Pa in eiuh hung pia atai mah, Pathian tate chiha i um jiang uh! Hujiahin khovel in ahung helou uh ahi, Amah aheet louh jiahun.

Deihtahte, tuin Pathian tate i hi va, huleh bangtobangin ahiai i um diing chih chu akilang nai tadih sih hi. Hizongleh Amah chu aum bangbanga mu diing i hih jiahun Amah ahung kilat chiangin Amah bangin i um diing uh chih chu i he uhi.
Huleh mi chin Amah a hi kinepna nei photmah chu Amah asianthou bangin akisusiangthou hi.
Mi koipouh sual bawl in daan zong abotsia hi, ajiahchu sual chu daanbohsiatna ahi.
Huleh Amah chu i sualnate uh lamang diinga hung kilang ahi chih na he va, huleh Amah ah chu sual himhim aum sih hi.
Mi koipouh Amah a umzing in chu sual abawl zing ngei sih hi. Koipouh sual bawl zing in Amah amu sih a, he zong ahe sih hi.
Tate haw, koimah in hung heem sih heh. Amah adihtat bangmahin, dihtatna bawltu chu midihtat ahi.
Sual bawl mi chu diabol a kuan ahi, ajiahchu diabol in achiil apatin sual abawl zing hi. Pathian Tapa ahung kilatna jiah chu diabol silbawlte asuhsiat theihna diingin ahi.
Mi koipouh Pathian a piang in sual abawl sih hi, ajiahchu Pathian chi amah ah aum hi; Pathian a piang ahihtaah jiahin sual abawl zing ngei sih hi.
Hikhu ah Pathian tate leh diabol tate akihe thei hi: Mi koipouh dihtatna bawllou chu Pathian a kuan ahi sih a, huleh a unau lungsiat lou zong Pathian a kuan ahi sih hi.
Ajiahchu achiil apat thupuaah na jaah uh chu hih ahi: Khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi.
Kaina bangin i um sih diing uh, amah chu giloupa apat ahi a, a sanggampa athat hi. Huleh bangjiaha a sanggampa athah ahiai? Amah silbawlte agilou a huleh a sanggampa natoh adihtat jiahin ahi.
Ka unaute, khovel in nanguh ahung muhdah leh, limdangsa sih un.
Unaute i lungsiat jiahin sihna apat hinna ah i luutta hi chih i he uhi. Mi koipouh a unau lungsiat lou chu sihna ah aum zing ahi.
Mi koipouh a unau mudah chu tualthat ahi a, huleh tualthat koimah amah a kumtuang hinna nei aum sih chih na he uhi.
Hikhu ah Pathian lungsiatna bang ahiai chih i he thei uhi: Ama’n eiuh diingin a hinna apekhia hi. Huleh ei un zong unaute diinga i hinna i piaah ve diing uh ahi.
Hizongleh mi koipouh in khovel silte nei a, a unau tasam a um mu a, amah lainat het lou mi chu, bangchiin Pathian lungsiatna amah ah aum diai?
Ka tate haw, thu chauh in ahihlouhleh kam chauh in i lungsiat sih diing uh, hizongleh silbawl leh thutah in hijaw hen.
Hikhu ah thutah apat i hi uh chih i he diing va, huleh Amah ma ah i lungtang uh i muangsah thei diing uhi.
Ajiahchu i lungtang un siamlouh ahung tansah leh, Pathian chu i lungtang saangin aloupijaw a, sil zousiah ahe hi.
Deihtahte, i lungtang in siamlouh ahung tansah louh leh, Pathian lamah kimuanna i nei uhi.
Huleh a thupiaahte i juih jiah leh a mitmuh a sil kipaahhuaite i bawl jiahin i nget photmah Amah apat i mu uhi.
Huleh a thupiaah chu hikhu ahi: eiun a Tapa Jesu Khrist min i gintaat va huleh ahung thupiaah banga khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi.
Huleh mi koipouh a thupiaahte jui chu Pathian ah aum a, Pathian zong amah ah aum hi. Huleh hikhu ah Amah chu eiuh ah aum zing chih i he uh, Hagau eiuh ahung piaah khu jaalin.
Deihtahte, hagau taphot gingta sih unla, hizongleh hagaute chu Pathian apat ahihleh hihlouh na heetna diingun chian jaw un; ajiahchu zawlnei tahlou tampi khovel ah apawtdohta uhi.
Hikhu ah Pathian Hagau na he diing uhi: Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung piang chih gum hagau photmah chu Pathian apat ahi.

Hizongleh Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung piang chih gumlou hagau photmah chu Pathian apat ahi sih. Huleh hichu Khrist doudaalpa hagau hung diing ahi chih na jaah uh chu ahi; huleh tuin zong khovel ah aum zouta hi.
Tate haw, nanguh chu Pathian a kuan na hi va, hute na zouta uhi, ajiahchu Amah nanguh a um chu khovel a umpa saangin alianjaw hi.
Amahuh chu khovel apat ahi uhi. Hujiahin khovel a bangin thute asoi va, huleh khovel in a thu uh angaikhia uhi.
Eiuh chu Pathian apat i hi uhi. Koipouh Pathian he phot in i thu angaikhia a, Pathian apat hilou in chu i thu angaikhe sih hi. Hikhu ah hagau dih leh hagau dihlou i he uhi.
Deihtahte, khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uhi, ajiahchu lungsiatna Pathian apat ahi. Huleh mi lungsiatthei photmah chu Pathian a piang ahi a, Pathian ahe hi.
Lungsiatna neilou mi’n Pathian ahe sih, ajiahchu Pathian chu lungsiatna ahi.
Hikhu ah Pathian in eiuh ahung lungsiatna akilangta hi, Amah jaala i hin theihna diingun Pathian in a Tapa tang neihsun khovel ah ahung sawl hi.
Hi ah lungsiatna aum, ei un Pathian i lungsiat chih ahi sih a, hizongleh Ama’n eiuh ahung lungsiat a, i sualnate jiaha thuphatawina hi diingin a Tapa ahung sawl chih ahijaw hi.
Deihtahte, Pathian in hichibanga ahung lungsiat leh, eiun zong khat leh khat i kilungsiat diing uh ahi.
Mi koimah in bangchimahin Pathian amu ngei sih hi. Eihaw khat leh khat i kilungsiat un chu, Pathian eimah ah aum zing a, a lungsiatna zong eimah ah suhbukim ahita hi.
A Hagau ahung piaahtaah jiahin, hikhu ah eiuh Amah ah i um a, huleh Amah eiuh ah aum chih i he uhi.
Huleh Pa in Tapa chu khovel Hundampa diingin asawl chih i muta va huleh i hesah uhi.
Mi koipouh Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chih gum taphot chu Pathian amah ah aum a, amah zong Pathian ah aum hi.
Huleh i tunga Pathian in lungsiatna aneih chu i he va huleh ging zong i gingta uhi. Pathian chu lungsiatna ahi; huleh koipouh lungsiatna a um chu Pathian ah aum a, Pathian zong amah ah aum hi.
Hikhu ah i tunga lungsiatna suhbukim ahita hi: vaihawm ni chianga hamuanna i neih theihna diingin, Amah um banga khovel a eihaw zong i um jiahin.
Lungsiatna ah launa aum sih hi; hizongleh lungsiatna bukim in launa adelhmang jaw hi, ajiahchu launa in thuaahgimna anei hi. Launa nei mi chu lungsiatna a suhbukim nailouh ahi.
Ama’n eiuh ahung lungsiat masat jiahin ei un Amah i lungsiat uh ahi.
Mi’n Pathian ka lungsiat chi ngaala, a unau amuhdah inchu, mi juau ahi; ajiahchu amuh gegu a unau bawn lungsiatloupi’n amuh louh Pathian bangchiin alungsiat thei diai?
Huleh Amah apat hi thupiaah i nei uhi: koipouh Pathian lungsiat in a unau zong alungsiat diing ahi.
Mi koipouh Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih gingta chu Pathian apat piang ahi a, huleh koipouh Pathian lungsiat inchu, Ama’n ahinte zong alungsiat hi.
Hikhu in Pathian tate i lungsiat uh chih i he uhi, Pathian i lungsiat va huleh a thupiaahte i juih chiangun.
Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh Pathian i lungsiatna uh chu a thupiaahte i juih uh khuh ahi. Huleh a thupiaahte chu puaahgih ahi sih hi.
Pathian a piang photmah in khovel azou hi. Huleh hikhuh ahi khovel tunga gualzohna chu: i ginna ngeei uh chu.
Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chih gingta mi chauh loungaal koi ahiai khovel tunga gualzou?
Hih ahi tui leh sisan tungtawna hung chu: Jesu Khrist ngeei; tui chauh a hilouin, hizongleh tui leh sisan in ahijaw. Huleh aheetpihtu chu Hagau ahi, Hagau chu thutah ahih jiahin.
Ajiahchu vaan ah heetpihtu thum aum hi: Pa, Thu leh Hagau Siangthou; huleh hi thumte chu khat ahi.
Huleh leitung ah heetpihtu thum aum hi: hute chu Hagau, tui, huleh sisan ahi a; huleh hi thumte chu khat bangin akituaah uhi.
Mihing heetpihna bawn i pom inchu, Pathian heetpihna aloupijaw hi; ajiahchu a Tapa tungthu ahung heetsah chu Pathian heetpihna ahi.
Koipouh Pathian Tapa gingta in amah ah heetpihtu anei hi; Pathian gingtalou mi in Pathian in a Tapa ahung piaah thu heetsahna agintaat louh jiahin Pathian chu mijuau ahisah hi.
Heetsahna chu hikhuh ahi: Pathian in kumtuang hinna ahung peta a, hu hinna chu a Tapa ah aum hi.
Koipouh Tapa nei in hinna aneita; koipouh Pathian Tapa neilou in hinna anei sih hi.
Kumtuang hinna na neita uh chih na heetna diing uh leh Pathian Tapa min na gintaat theihna diingun nanguh Pathian Tapa min gingtate kawmah hi thute ka gial ahi.
Huleh Amah a i kimuanna uh chu hikhuh ahi, Amah deihjawnga bangpuoh i ngetun chu, Ama’n ahung ngaikhia hi.
Huleh i nget photmah uh Ama’n ahung ngaihkhiahsah chih i heetun chu, a kawma i silnget uh i muta chih i he uhi.

Mi koipouh in a unau in sihna tungsahthei hilou sual bawl amuhin chu, angetsah diing a, huchiin Pathian in sihna tungsahthei hilou sual bawlte diingin hinna ape diing hi. Sihna tungsahthei sual aum a, hukhu diingin angetsah diing ka chi sih hi.
Dihtatlouhna zousiah chu sual ahi a, huleh sihna tungsahthei hilou sual zong aum hi.
Koipouh Pathian a piang chu asual zing sih chih i he hi; hizongleh Pathian a piang mi chu Pathian in akol a, migiloupa’n akhoih sih hi.
Eiuh chu Pathian apat i hi chih i he a, huleh khovel pumpi chu migiloupa thuneihna nuaiah aum chih i he uhi.

Huleh Pathian Tapa chu ahungta chih i he a, huleh Amah chu adihtah ahi chih i heet theihna diingun heetsiamna ahung peta hi. Huleh eihaw chu a dihtah Amah ngeei ah, a Tapa Jesu Khrist ah i um uhi. Amah chu Pathian dihtah leh kumtuang hinna ahi.
Tate haw, milemte apat kiheemkhia un. Amen.
Kei upa in, Pathian teel numei leh a tate, thutah a ka lungsiatte, huleh keimah chauh hilou a, hizongleh thutah he zousiahte’n zong alungsiatte uh kawmah ka gial hi,
eiuh a um leh kumtuanga zong i kawmva um diing thutah jiahin:
Pa Pathian akipan leh Pa Tapa, Lalpa Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna, khotuahna leh hamuanna chu thutah leh lungsiatna in na kawmvah um hen.
Pa kawm apat a thupiaah i muh banga na tate khenkhat thutah a um ka muh jiahin ka kipaah mahmah hi.
Huleh tuin, unaunu, thupiaah thah gial bang chu hilouin, achiil apat i neih uh gial jawin, khat leh khat i kilungsiat tuah diing uh chiin ka hung ngeen hi.
Huleh hikhuh ahi lungsiatna, huchia a thupiaahte banga i gamtat uh chu. Achiil apat na jaahtaah bangun thupiaah chu hikhuh ahi, humah a na um diing uh ahi.
Ajiahchu Jesu Khrist tahsa in ahung chih gumlou miheemtu tampi khovel ah aumdohta hi. Hutobang mi chu heemtu leh Khrist doudaaltu ahi.
I tohkhiahsate mangsahlou a, kipaahman akima i muh theih jawhna diingun kiveeng un.
Mi koipouh daan bohsia leh Khrist thuhilhna daan a umzing lou in Pathian anei sih hi. Khrist thuhilhna daan a umzing mi’n chu Pa leh Tapa anihun anei khawm hi.
Mi koipouh hi kihilhna thu keng loua na kawmva hung aum leh, na inn vah tungsah sih unla, kampha in zong vaidawn sih un.
Ajiahchu akipaahpihtu chu amah giitlouhna kikoppih ahi.
Na kawmva thu tampi hung gelh diing ka neih vaangin lehkhapuan leh lehkhatui in ka gial nuam sih hi, hizongleh hung a, i kipaahna uh abukim theihna diingin kimaaituaha hung soi ka kineem hi.
Teela um na unaunu tate’n chibai ahung buuh uhi. Amen.
Kei upa in, deih mahmah Gaia, thutah a ka lungsiat kawmah:
Deihtah, na hagau khantouh jeel banga sildang zousiah a na khantouh diing leh damtheihna diing deihin ka haamtei hi.
Ajiahchu unaute ahung va huleh nangmah a thutah um khu a thutah a na gamtat daan ahung heetsah tahun, ka kipaah mahmah hi.
Ka tate thutah ah aum uh chih ka jaah saanga kipaahna lianjaw ka nei sih hi.
Deihtah, unaute tung leh mikhualte tunga na bawl photmah ginumtahin na bawl hi.
Amah un na lungsiatna chu kouhtuamte ma ah aphuangta uhi. A khualzinna va Pathian ma a na hih diinga kilawm bang jeela na haahdoh leh, na bawl hoih diing hi,
Amah min jiaha achiahdohna va Jentelte apat bangma la lou ahih jiahun.
Hujiahin thutah a natong khawmtute i hih theihna diingun hutobang mi chu i vaidawn diing mawng uh ahi.
Kouhtuamte kawmah ka gial hi, hizongleh a lahva tungtuan uutpa Diotrephe in keiuh ahung vaidawn sih hi.

Huchihjiahin, ka hung leh chu, ka tungva thu gilou soia akamtam daan, a silbawlte ka hedohsah diing hi. Huleh hu zong hunsa louin, amah ngeei in unaute avaidawn sih a, huleh akipaahpih nuam unaute tanpha akhap a, kouhtuam apat anohdoh hi.
Deihtah, silgilou chu enton sinla, sil hoih enton jaw in. Sil hoih bawlmi chu Pathian apat ahi, hizongleh silgilou bawlmi in chu Pathian amu sih hi.
Demetria in mi zousiah apat leh thutah apat ngeei in paahtaat aloh hi. Ahi, kei un zong ka heetpih va, huleh ka heetpihna uh chu adih ahi chih na he uhi.
Gelh diing tampi ka nei a, hizongleh kolom leh lehkhatui in na kawmah ka gial sih diing hi.

Hizongleh sawtlou kaalin ka hung mu diing a, kimaaituahin thu i soi diing chih ka kineem hi. Hamuanna na tungah um hen. I lawmte’n chibai ahung buuh uhi. I lawmte minloh chiatin chibai hung na buuhsah in.
Jud, Jesu Khrist suaah leh Jakob sanggampa in, nanguh Pa Pathian in asuhsiangthoute leh Jesu Khrist a aveenbit leh kouha umte kawmah:
Khotuahna leh hamuanna leh lungsiatna na tungvah suhpungin um hen.

Deihtahte, i bawnva hutdamna thu toh kisai hung gial diinga theihtawp ka suah vaangin, misiangthoute kawma ginna setden diingin khatvei kipeta khuh a phatuamngaitaha na panna diingun hasotna thu hung gelh poimoh ka sa hi.

Ajiahchu mi khenkhat aguuha hung luut aum va, amahuh chu vaihawmna tuaah diingin achiil apatin chiamchihin aum zouta uhi. Amahuh chu Pathian ngaihsahlou mi leh Pathian hehpihna chu kisuumna umlou keeia huuhna suaahsah mite ahi va, huleh amah un Lalpa Pathian khat chauh leh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist chu akiheetmohbawl uhi.
Hujiahin hikhu khatvei anahe zouta mahleh uh chin, ka hung hesahkiit uut hi, huchu Lalpa’n a mite Aigupta gam apat ahutkhiah zou nungin zong agingta loute chu akhonungin asumangthaai hi.

Angel khenkhatte’n a thuneihna dinmun masa uh akeemden sih va, a teenna mun uh anusia uhi. Amahuh chu Pathian in kumtuang gaahna siihkhau a kaanin mial nuaiah koihin vaihawmna ni loupi a diingin asiit hi.
Huchibangmahin Sodom leh Gomorrah leh a kiimveel a teengte chu kingaihna ngeinadaanlou bangtaha kipawl thaanghuaina ah akipia va, Pathian in hute chu kumtuang mei a agawt diingte etsahna in azang hi.
Huchibangmahin hi mangmante’n a tahsa uh asubolhhoh va, thuneitute anual va, huleh loupina neite asoisia uhi.
Hizongleh angel tungnungpeen Mikael ngeei in zong Mosi luang tungtaang thu a diabol toh akituh va akinial laiun, soisiain amohpaih ngam sih a, husaangin, “Lalpa’n hung taai heh,” achi jaw hi.
Hizongleh hi mite’n chu asil heet louhte uh asoisia uhi; huleh amah un chu ngaihtuahna nei lou gamsate bangin pianken heettheihna in ahe va, hi silte ah amahuh leh amahuh akisusia uhi.
A tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu Kaina lampi ah apaita va, huleh lawhna deihgohna jiahin Balaam dihlouhna lampi ah lawptahin ataai va, huleh Korah helna ah amangthaaita uhi.

Hite chu na lungsiatna gualvaahna va nanguh toh an aneeh chiangva tuitup suang monghiam tobang ahi va, amahuh chauh akingaihtuah uhi. Amahuh chu tui paailou meilum huih muut leeng lehleh tobang ahi uhi; amahuh chu khokhaal hun a sing gah neilou, nihvei si, huleh a zung a kiphungkalh doh tobang ahi uhi.
Amahuh chu tuipi kifawn haattah tobang ahi va, a zumna uh chu tui phuan tobangin ahung umdoh a; aahsi leeng lehleh tobang ahi va, amahuh diingin mial vombehbuh chu kumtuanga diingin siit ahi.
Adam apat khang sagihnapa Enok in hi mite tungthu anasoilawh hi, “Ngai un, Lalpa chu a misiangthou saang tampite toh,

mi zousiah vaihawmsah diing leh Pathian ngaihsahlou tengteng in a Pathian ngaihsahlouhna natoh uh, Pathian ngaihsahlou jawnga abawlte uh leh Pathian ngaihsahlou misualte’n Amah kalha haam khauhtah azat tengteng uh mohpaih diingin Amah ahung hi,” chiin.

Hite chu phun haatte leh soiseel haatte ahi va, a tahsa uh uutna gilou in apui bangbanga gamtate ahi uh; huleh amahuh chu uangtahin akiphat va, lawhna diing deih manin midangte kamsiam in apaahtawi uhi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, nang un chu malai a i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist apostolte thusoite hezing un,
amah un hun nunung chiangin Pathian ngaihsahlouhna lama amahuh tahsa gilou uutna bangbanga puia um mi simmoh haatte ahung um diing thu asoi uhi.
Hitobang mite chu khovel mi, kikhenna siamtu leh Hagau neiloute ahi uhi.
Hizongleh deihtahte, nanguh chu na ginna siangthoupeen uh tunga kilamtouin, Hagau Siangthou a haamteiin,
kumtuang hinna tuntu i Lalpa Jesu Khrist khotuahna chu ngaah zingin Pathian lungsiatna ah kikoldet un.
Huleh khenkhat ginglela umte chu khotuah un.
Huleh lau pumin midangte hunkhia un, mei kuang lah apat kaidohin sual a suhbuaah a puan uh jiangzong kihdah kawmin.
Amah na puuh louhna diingva nanguh hung veengbit thei leh a loupina ma a nasataha nuamsa leh soiseelbeia nanguh hung koihtheipa,
i Hundampa uh Pathian pil chauh kawmah, loupinate, thupinate, vaihawmnate leh silbawltheihnate tu leh kumtuangin um zingta hen. Amen.
Sil hung tung pah ngeei diingte, a suaahte aheetsah diinga Pathian in Amah kawma apiaah, Jesu Khrist thuphuandoh. Huleh Ama’n huchu a suaah Johan kawmah a angel sawlin chiamchihna in ahesahta hi.
Ama’n chu Pathian thu leh Jesu Khrist heetpihna thu leh asilmuh zousiah ahesahta hi.
Hi soilawhna thute sim leh ngaikhete leh a sunga thu kigialte jui mi chu ahampha hi; ajiahchu ahun anaita hi.
Johan in Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah: Amah umzing leh umta leh hung um diingpa apat leh a laltouphah ma a um Hagau sagihte apat,

huleh heetpihtu ginum, misi lah apat tachiil leh lei a kumpipate vaihawmtu Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen. Amah ei hung lungsiat a i sualna apat Amah ngeei sisan a hung silsiangpa leh
Pathian leh a Pa kawma kumpite leh siampute a hung siamtu kawmah loupina leh thuneihna kumtuang kumtuangin umzingta hen. Amen.
En in, meipi toh Amah ahung kum diing a, mit chinteng in Amah amu diing hi, Amah suntute ngeei in zong. Huleh lei a nam zousiah Amah jiahin akap diing uhi. Huchi hihen, Amen.
“Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp ka hi,” Lalpa, “umzing leh umta leh hung um diing, Bangkimbawltheipa,” in achi hi.
Kei Johan, na unaupa uh leh Jesu Khrist a gimthuaahna leh lalgam leh kuhkalna a na tan neihpih uh chu Pathian thu jiah leh Jesu Khrist thu heetpihna jiahin Patmos kichi tuikulhgam ah ka um hi.
Lalpa Ni in Hagau in ka um a, ka nung lamah peengkuul ging bang aw ngaihtah ka ja hi.

“Kei Alpha leh Omega, Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi,” huleh, “Na sil muhte lehkhabu ah gial inla, Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah thot in: Ephesi khua ah, Smarna khua ah, Pergamos khua ah, Thiateira khua ah, Sardis khua ah, Philadelphia khua ah leh Laudikia khua ah,” chiin.
Huleh hu ahung houpih aw chu muh tumin ka kihei hi. Huleh ka kihei a ahihleh sana thaumei tunna sagih ka mu hi.
Huleh hu thaumei tunna sagihte lai ah Mihing Tapa tobang mi khat, a keengphaang tandong a puan silh, sana gui a a awm kigaah ka mu hi.
A lutang leh a sam chu belaam mul bangin akaang a, vuuh bangin angou a, a mit chu meikuang bang ahi.
A keeng chu sum-eng valtah, mei a haalsiang bang ahi a, a aw chu tui tampi luang ging bang ahi.
Ama’n a khut jiat lam in aahsi sagih atawi a, a kam akipanin naamsau a langniha hiamtah mei apawt a, huleh a meel chu ni asatnaah laitah tobang ahi.
Amah ka muh tahin a keengbul ah asi bangin ka puuhta hi. Huleh Ama’n a khut jiatlam ka tungah koihin ka kawmah hichiin, “Lau sin, kei Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi.
Ahing zingpa chu ka hi, huleh ka sita a, hizongleh ngai in, kumtuangin ka hing ahi. Amen. Huleh Misi Khua leh Sihna chabite ka nei hi.
Hujiahin na sil muhte leh sil umlaite leh tununga sil hung um diingte chu gial in.

Ka khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih leh sana thaumei tunna sagih na muhte thukiphual chu: aahsi sagihte chu kouhtuam sagih haw angelte ahi va, huleh thaumei tunna sagih na muhte chu kouhtuam sagihte ahi uhi,” achi hi.
“Ephesi khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘A khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih tawipa, sana thaumeitunna sagih laia vaah lehleh pa’n hi thute asoi hi:

“Na natohte, na tohgimnate, na kuhkal daante ka he a, huleh migiloute na thuaah theihlouh daan ka he hi. Huleh hiloupi a apostol ka hi uh kichite na etkhiah a, huleh mijuau ahih uh na matdoh daan zong ka he hi.
Na thuaahzoh a, na kuhkal a, huleh ka min jiaha na tohgim daan leh na chauh louh daan ka he hi.
Ahihvaangin demna khat ka hung nei hi, ajiahchu na lungsiatna masapeen na nuseta hi.
Hujiahin na puuhna hezing inla, kisiih inla huleh na natoh masapeente bawlkiit in. Na kisiih louh inchu, kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, na thaumeitunna chu a mun apatin ka suan diing hi.
Ahiinlah hichu na bawlhoih hi, Nikolaitan pawlte natoh na hua a, huchu ke’n zong ka hua hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa kawmah Pathian Paradis lailung a um hinna sing apat neeh diing ka pe diing hi,”’ chiin.
“Huleh Smarna khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen, sita a hing kiitpa’n hi thute asoi hi:
“Na natohte leh na gimthuaahte leh na jawn daan ka he hi, hizongleh na hausa hi. Huleh Judami hiloupia ka hi uh chi, hizongleh Setan sinagog hi ngaal, hute Pathian soisiatna ka he hi.

Sil na hung thuaah diingte lau sin. Ngai in, etkhiaha na um theihna diingun diabol in na lahva khenkhat chu suangkul ah ahung khum diing a, ni sawm sung gimthuaahna na nei diing uhi. Sih tanphain ginum in, huchiin hinna lallukhuh ka hung pe diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa chu sih nihna suhnatin aum sih diing hi.”’
“Huleh Pergamos khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amah naamsau alangnih a hiamtah neipa’n hi thute asoi hi:

“Setan laltouphah mun a na teenna a na natohte ka he hi. Huleh ka min na pom kip a, Setan teenna mun a na lahva ginna jiaha thaha umpa, ka mi ginum, ka heetpihtu Antipa hun laiin zong na ginna na tawpsan sih hi.

Hizongleh demna sil themkhat ka hung nei hi, ajiahchu Balaam thuhilhna juite na umpih hi. Ama’n Israel tate puuhna siam diing leh milem biahna sa ne diing leh numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina bawl diingin Balak athuhilh hi.
Huchibangmahin Nikolaitan pawlte thuhilhna jui mi khenkhat zong na nei a, huchu ka hua hi.
Hujiahin kisiih in, huchilou inchu kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, ka kam a pawt naamsau in amahuh ka dou diing hi.

Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa kawmah manna phualguuh aneeh diing ka pe diing hi. Suang kaang khat, hu suang tunga min thah kigial a tangtu loungaal midang koima’n aheet louh chu ka pe diing hi.”’
“Huleh Thiateira khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Pathian Tapa meikuang bangmai mit nei leh sum-eng valtah tobang keeng neipa’n hi thute asoi hi:
“Na natohte, na lungsiatnate, na ginna leh na kuhkalnate ka he a, huleh na silbawl masapeen saangin anunungpeen atamjaw hi.

Hizongleh hi thu ah ka hung dem hi, hu numei Jezebel amah leh amah zawlnei kichinu na thuaahtheih jiahin. A thuhilh in ka suaahte chu numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina bawl diing leh milem biahna sa ne diingin athuhilh a huleh aheemgawp hi.
Amahnu chu a numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina apat kisiih diingin hun ka pia a, himahleh auut sih hi.
Ngai in, amahnu chu gimthuaahna lupna tungah ka paai diing a huleh a silbawl uh akisiih louh uh leh a-aangkawmpih haw chu gimthuaahna nasatah ah ka paailuut diing hi.
A tate chu sihna in ka that diing a, huchiangin kouhtuam zousiah in kei chu lungsim leh lungtang hawlpa ka hi chih ahe diing uhi. Huleh na bawnun na natohte uh dungjuiun ka hung thuh chiat diing hi.
Tuin nanguh Thiateira khua a um, hi kihilhna neilou leh asoi uh banga Setan thugilte helou midang zousiah kawmah ka soi ahi, tunggihna dang na tungvah ka koih sih diing hi.
Hizongleh hu na neihsa uh chu ka hung masiah tukip un.
Agualzoupa leh a tawpdonga ka deihjawng keempa chu a kawmah namte tunga thuneihna ka pe diing hi.
Ke’n zong ka Pa apat a thuneihna ka muh bang ngeeiin, ‘Ama’n a tungvah siih chiang in vai ahawm diing a, beel kheengtu beel a hal hal a akeeh bangin amahuh ajeepkeeh diing hi.’
Huleh amah chu jiingsol aahsi ka pe diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’
“Sardis khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Pathian Hagau sagih leh aahsi sagih neipa’n hi thute asoi hi: “Na natohte ka he hi; hing min na pua a, himahleh asi na hi.
Kiveeng inla, sil um nalai si dikuante chu suhaat in, ajiahchu na natohte ka Pathian mitmuh ah bukimin ka mu sih hi.

Hujiahin na muhtaah leh na jaahtaah chu hezing in; tukip inla kisiih in. Hujiahin na kiveen louhin chu, guta bangin na kawmah ka hung diinga huleh bangchih hun a na kawma ka hung diing hun na he sih diing hi.
Ahiinlah Sardis khua ah a puante uh subuaah lou min tawmtakhat na nei hi; huleh amahuh chu kei toh puanvaam silhin aleeng diing uhi, ajiahchu amah un achin uhi.
Agualzoupa chu puanvaam silhsahin aum diing a, huleh Hinna Lehkhabu apat a min ka nawtmang sih diing a, himahleh ka Pa ma leh a angelte ma ah a min ka phuang diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’

“Philadelphia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amah, siangthou leh dih, “David chabi neipa in, ahon chianga koima’n akhaah theihlouh leh akhaah chianga koima’n ahon theihlouhpa in”, hi thute asoi hi:
“Na natohte ka he hi. En in, na ma ah koima’n akhaah theihlouh kot kihong ka koih hi; ajiahchu silbawltheihna neutakhat nei himahlehchin ka thu na keem a, huleh ka min na kiheetmohbawl sih hi.
Ngai in, Setan sinagog a Judami hia kisoi, lah hiloute chu mijuau ahi uh, amahuh chu na kawma hung paisahin na keengbul ah ka khupbohsah diinga huleh ka hung lungsiat ahi chih ka hesah diing hi.
Kuhkaltaha thuaah diinga ka hung thupiaah na juihzing jiahin leitung a um mite etkhiahna diinga khovel pumpi a hung tung diing jeheemna hun apat ke’n zong ka hung veengbit diing hi.
Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi. Koimah in na lallukhuh ahung laahsah louhna diingin na sil neihsa chu tudet in.

Agualzoupa chu ka Pathian mun siangthou ah khuam in ka pangsah diing a, apawtdoh nawn sih diing hi. Huleh a tungah ka Pathian min leh ka Pathian akipan a vaan apat a hung kumsuh ka Pathian khopi Jerusalem Thah min ka gial diing hi. Huleh a tungah ka min thah ka gial diing hi.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’
“Huleh Laudikia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amen, Heetpihtu Ginum leh Dihtah, Pathian silsiamte Bulpipeen in hi thute asoi hi:
“Na natohte ka he hi, huchia lum lah lumlou vot lah votloua na um chu; na lum ahihlouhleh na vot ka deih ahi.
Huchia lumpelhpulh a, lum lah lumlou vot lah votloua na um jiahin ka kam apatin ka hung sekhe diing hi.
Ajiahchu nangma’n, ‘Ka hausa a, ka neih apungta, bangmah ka tasam sih,’ na chi a, huleh mimuhsithuai, migenthei, mijawng, mittaw leh saguaah na hihlam na he sih hi.

Na hung hauhsat theihna diingin sana mei a haalchiim leh na saguaah zumhuaina akilat louhna diinga na silh diing puanvaam leh na muh theihna diing na mit na nuh diing mit damdawi ka kawm apat lei diingin ka hung thuhilh ahi.
Ka lungsiat taphot chu ka taai a, ka thunun hi. Hujiahin phatuamngai inla kisiih in.
Ngai in, kotkhaahbul a dingin ka kiu ahi. Mi koipouh in ka aw ajaah a kot ahonin chu, a kawmah ka luut diinga amah toh ka ne diing a, huleh ama’n zong kei toh ane diing hi.
Agualzoupa chu ka kawmah ka laltouphah ah ka tousah diing, kei zong ka gualzoh a ka Pa toh a laltouphah a ka tou mahbangin.
Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’”

Hi silte nungin ka en a, ngai in, vaan ah kot khat akihong hi. Huleh aw ka jaah masat chu peengkuul ging abang a, kei chu hichiin ahung houpih hi, “Hilam ah hung tou in, tunung a sil hung um diingte ka hung musah diing hi,” chiin.
Thakhatin kei chu Hagau in ka umta a, huleh en in, vaan ah laltouphah khat akitung a, laltouphah tungah Mi khat atou hi.
Huleh hu a toupa chu jaspar leh sardia suang bangmaiin akilang a; huleh hu laltouphah kiimveel ah chu sakhituihuup, et a emerald suang bangmeia kilang aum hi.
Hu laltouphah kiimveel ah laltouphah sawmnih leh li aum a, huleh hu laltouphahte tungah upa sawmnih leh li puanvaam silha tou ka mu a, huleh amah un sana lukhuh akhuh uhi.
Huleh hu laltouphah apatin kawlphete, awte, vaangingte ahung suaah uhi. Huleh hu laltouphah ma ah thaumei sagih akuang a, hite chu Pathian Hagau sagihte ahi uhi.
Huleh hu laltouphah ma ah kristal suang tobang tuikhanglian liimlang aum hi. Huleh hu laltouphah lailung leh laltouphah kiimveel ah a malam leh a nunglam mit a dim silhing li aum hi.
Silhing khatna chu huumpibahnei tobang ahi a, silhing nihna chu bawngnou tobang ahi a, silhing thumna in chu mihing meel bang apua a, huleh silhing lina chu mupi leenglai bang ahi.

Huleh hu silhing lite’n chu ha guup chiat anei va, a polam leh a sunglam uh mit in adim chiat hi. Huleh amah un chu suun leh jaan a tawlnga louin, “Siangthou, siangthou, siangthou, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, umta leh umzing leh hung um diing chu!” achi uhi.
Huleh hu silhing lite’n laltouphah tunga toupa, kumtuanga hing zingpa kawmah loupina leh zahbawlna apia va, kipaahthu asoi tengun,
upa sawmnih leh lite chu laltouphah tunga toupa ma ah abohkhup va huleh kumtuang kumtuanga hing zingpa chu abia va, huleh hu laltouphah ma a a lallukhuhte uh koihin,
“Aw Lalpa, nang chu loupina leh zahbawlna leh silbawltheihna tangtaah na hi; ajiahchu nangma’n sil zousiah na siam a, nangmah deihna tungtawna um leh siam ahi uh,” achi uhi.
Huin Amah laltouphah tunga toupa jiat lamah a sunglam leh a polam a kigial chiamchihna sagih a kichiamchih lehkhabujial khat ka mu hi.
Huleh angel haat khat aw ngaihtaha kikou a, “Koi ahiai lehkhabu chu hong a huleh hu a chiamchihna umte pheltaah?” chi ka mu hi.
Hizongleh vaan ah hiin lei ah hiin, hulouin lei nuaiah hitaleh, hu lehkhabujial hong thei leh a sung en thei mi koima aumta sih hi.
Huin huh lehkhabujial hong diing leh sim diing ahihlouhleh a sung en taah mi koimah akimuh louh jiahin naahpiin ka kap hi.
Huin upate laha khat in ka kawmah, “Kap sin. Ngai in, Juda nam Huumpibahnei, David Zungpi in hu lehkhabujial chu hong diing leh hu a chiamchihna sagihte phel diingin agualzouta hi,” achi hi.

Huleh ka en a, ngai in, laltouphah leh silhing lite lai ah leh upate lai ah thahsa hileh kilawm Belaamnou ka mu hi. Ama’n kii sagih leh mit sagih anei a, hute chu Pathian Hagau sagih, leitung pumpi a sawlkhiahte ahi uhi.
Amah chu ahung a huleh laltouphah tunga toupa khut jiatlam apatin lehkhabujial chu alata hi.

Huleh Ama’n lehkhabujial chu alaah tahin, silhing lite leh upa sawmnih leh lite chu Belaamnou ma ah abohkhup va, amah un kaihging leh gimnamtuui a dim sana kuang atawi chiat uhi, huchu misiangthoute haamteina ahi.

Huleh amah un la thah khat asa va, “Nang chu lehkhabujial la a, huleh a chiamchihnate pheltaah na hi; ajiahchu thahin na umta a, chi chin, haam chin, mi chin leh nam chin apat mite na sisan in Pathian a diingin na hung tanta a,
huleh i Pathian uh kawmah kumpite leh siampute in na hung siamta a; huleh leitung ah lalin i tou diing uhi,” chiin.

Huin ka et leh laltouphah leh silhingte leh upate kiimveel ah angel tampi aw ka ja a; huleh atamdaan uh chu asiing asiing leh asaang asaang ahi va, amah un laltouphah leh silhingte leh upate auum kiimveel va,
“Thaha um Belaamnou chu thuneihnate, hauhsatnate, pilnate, thahaatnate, zahumnate, loupinate leh paahtawinate tangtaah ahi,” chia aw ngaihtaha kikouin la asa uhi.

Huleh vaan a um leh lei a um leh lei nuaia um leh tuikhanglian a um chinteng in, “Laltouphah tunga toupa leh Belaamnou kawmah, paahtawinate leh zahumnate leh loupinate leh silbawltheihnate kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta heh,” achih uh ka ja hi.
Huin silhing lite’n, “Amen,” achi uhi. Huleh upa sawmnih leh lite’n bohkhupin kumtuanga hing zingpa chu abeta uhi.
Huin Belaamnou in chiamchihna sagihte laha amasapeen aphel lai ka mu a, huleh aw khat, vaanging bangmaia silhing lite laha khat in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.
Huin ka en a, ngai in, sakol kaang khat ka mu hi. A tunga tuangpa’n thalmung atawi a, a kawmah lallukhuh khat akipia a, amah chu gualzou leh gualzou jeel diingin akuankheta hi.
Belaamnou in chiamchihna nihna aphel zohin silhing nihna in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.

Huleh sakol dang, asan khat ahung pawtdoh a, a tunga tuangpa kawmah chu leitung apat hamuanna laahsah theihna leh mite khat leh khat akithah tuahna diing uh thuneihna piaah ahi a, huleh a kawmah naamsau thupitah piaah ahi.
Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna thumna aphel zohin silhing thumna in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi. Huin ka et leh, ngai in, sakol vom khat ka mu a, a tunga tuangpa’n a khut in buuhna atawi hi.
Huleh silhing lite lah apatin aw khat in, “Dinari khat a gehu dan khat, dinari khat a barley buh dan thum; huleh sathau leh uain chu suse sin,” achih ka ja hi.
Huleh chiamchihna lina aphel zohin silhing lina in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.

Huin ka et leh, ngai in, sakol daang khat ka mu a, a tunga tuangpa min chu Sihna ahi a, huleh Misi Khua in amah ajui hi. Huleh amah un leitung seh li suah seh khatte chu naamsau toh, kial toh, sihna toh, leitung a gamsate toh athah theihna diingun amahuh kawmah silbawltheihna piaah ahi.
