Chiamchihna ngaana Ama’n aphel zohin maitaam nuaiah Pathian thu jiah leh a heetpihna apom jiahva thaha umte hagau ka mu hi.
Huleh amah un aw ngaihtah a kikouin, “Aw Lalpa, siangthou leh dih, bangtan ahiai leitung a teengte tunga vaihawm lou leh ka sisan uh phuba la loua na um diing?” achi uhi.
Huin amahuh chu puanvaam akipe chiat a, huleh a suaah hihpihte uh leh a unaute uh, amahuh bangmah a thaha um diingte ahung thah zoh veh masiah uh tomkhat anakhawl tadih diinga hilh ahi uhi.
Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna guupna aphel zohin ka en a, huleh ngai in, jiil nasatahin akiliing a; huleh ni chu samul sai-ippuan bangin ahung vomta a, ha chu sisan bangin ahung umta hi.
Huleh vaan aahsite chu theipi kung huihpi haattah in amuut chianga agah puamte apulh bangin lei ah akia uhi.
Huleh vaan chu lehkhabujial a jial bangin akitawlkheta a, taang leh tuikulhgam chinteng aumna vapat suanmangin aumta uhi.
Huin leitung a kumpipate, mi liante, mi hausate, sepaih houtuliante, mi haatte, huleh saltaang leh taanglou mi zousiah chu kohawm leh taang a suangpite ah akibuta va,
huleh taangte leh suangpite kawmah, “Hung netkhum unla, Amah laltouphah tunga toupa ma apat leh Belaamnou lungthahna apat hung phual un!
Ajiahchu a lungthahna ni huaisia hung tung ahita, koi ahiai ding zou diing?” achi uhi.
Hi silte nungin angel li, leitung ah hiin tuikhanglian tungah ahihlouhleh singkung khatmah tunga zong huih anun louhna diinga lei a huih lite tutaang a, leitung ning li a ding chu ka mu hi.
Huin suahlam apat hung kuan angel dang, Pathian hing chiamchihna nei khat ka mu hi. Amah chu a kawmva leitung leh tuikhanglian suhsiat theihna diing kipia angel lite kawmah aw ngaihtahin akikou a,
“I Pathian suaahte chu a tal va i chiamchih zoh masiah leitung hiin tuikhanglian ahihlouhleh singkungte hileh suse sih un,” achi hi.
Huin chiamchiha umte phaahzah chu ka ja a, Israel tate phung zousiah apat nuai khat leh siing li leh saang li chiamchih ahi uhi:
Juda phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Reuben phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Gad phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Asher phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Naphtali phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Manasseh phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Simeon phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Levi phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Issakar phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
Zebulon phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Joseph phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; huleh Benjamin phung apat siing khat leh saang nih chiamchihin aum uhi.
Hite zohin ka en a, ngai in, koima sim seenglouh mipi nasatah, nam chin, phung chin, mi chin leh haam chin apat puan ngou silh a, tuum baa tawia laltouphah leh Belaamnou ma a ding chu ka mu a,
huleh amah uh chu aw ngaihtahin akikou va, “Hutdamna chu laltouphah tunga tou i Pathian uh leh Belaamnou a ahi!” chiin.
Angel zousiah chu a laltouphah kiimveel leh upate leh silhing lite kiimveel ah ading va, huleh laltouphah ma ah khupboh a puuhin,
“Amen! Paahtawinate, loupinate, pilnate, kipaahthusoinate, zahumnate, silbawltheihnate leh thahaatnate chu i Pathian kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta heh. Amen!” chiin Pathian abia uhi.
Huin upate laha khat in ahung houpih a, ka kawmah, “Hi puan ngou a kithuamte koite ahi viai, huleh khoi apat hung ahi viai?” achi hi.
Huleh ke’n a kawmah, “Pu, nangmah in na he hi,” ka chi hi. Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Hite chu gimthuaahna nasatah apat hung pawtdohte ahi va, huleh Belaamnou sisan a sawpin a puan uh angousahta hi.
Hujiahin amahuh chu Pathian laltouphah ma a umin suun leh jaan in a biahinn ah a nna atong uhi. Huleh Amah laltouphah tunga toupa chu a lahvah ateeng diing hi.
Amahuh agilkial nawn sih diing va, adangtaah kiit nawn sih diing uh; nisa in amahuh akaang nawn sih diing a, a satna in zong asugim nawn sih diing hi.
Ajiahchu laltouphah laia um Belaamnou in amahuh avaah diing a, tuihing luui luanna ah amahuh apui diing a, Pathian in a mit vapat mittui zousiah asiaah siang diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna sagihna aphel zohin daah kimkhat veel chu vaan asip kiikeei hi.
Huleh angel sagih Pathian ma a ding ka mu a, huleh amahuh chu peengkuul sagih piaah ahi uhi.

Huleh angel dang khat ahung a, gimtuui haalna sana bawm tawiin maitaam bul ah ading hi. Amah kawmah chu laltouphah ma a sana maitaam tunga misiangthoute haamteina toh alat khawm diingin gimtuui tampi piaah ahi.
Huleh gimtuui khuu chu misiangthoute haamteina toh kitonin angel khut apatin Pathian ma ah ajaamtouta hi.
Huin angel in gimtuui haalna bawm ala a, maitaam mei in athun dim a, huleh leitung ah apaaikheta hi. Huleh awte, vaangingte, kawlphete leh jiilliingte ahung umta hi.
Huin hu angel sagih peengkuul sagih neite chu muut diingin akisingsata uhi.

Angel khatna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh gial leh mei sisan toh kihal ahung umta a, hute chu leitung ah paihkhiahin aum uhi. Huleh singkung mun thum a khen mun khat akaangtum a, huleh hampa hing zousiah akaangtumta hi.
Huin angel nihna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh taang lianpi mei a kaang hileh kilawm tuikhanglian ah paihluutin aum a, huleh tuikhanglian mun thum a khen mun khat sisan ahung suaahta hi.
Huleh tuikhanglian a um hinna nei ganhingte chu mun thum a khen mun khat asita va, huleh longpite chu mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiatin aumta hi.
Huin angel thumna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh aahsi liantah khat meisel banga kuang vaan apatin ahung kesuh a, huleh luuidungte mun thum a khen mun khat leh tuinaahte tung ah atu hi.
Hu aahsi min chu Gamsai ahi. Huin tui mun thum a khen mun khat chu gamsai ahung suaahta a, huleh suhkhaat ahihtaah jiahin hu tuite apatin mi tampi asita uhi.

Huin angel lina in peengkuul amuut a, huleh ni mun thum a khen mun khat, ha mun thum a khen mun khat, aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiatin aumta a, huchiin hute mun thum a khen mun khat chu suhmial ahita hi. Suun mun thum a khen mun khat chu avaah nawn sih a, huleh jaan zong mun thum a khen mun khat huchibangmahin aum hi.
Huin ka et leh, angel khat vaanlaijawl a leenga aw ngaihtaha hichia kikou ka ja hi, “Angel thumte’n peengkuul amuut naahlai diing jiahun lei a umte tung agih hi, atunggih hi, atunggih hi!” chiin.
Huin angel ngaana in peengkuul amuut a, huleh aahsi khat vaan apata lei a kesuh ka mu hi. Amah kawmah kokhuuh tobei chabi piaahin aum hi.
Huleh ama’n kokhuuh tobei chu ahong a, huin hu kokhuuh apatin haaltuina mei nasatah khuu bangin meikhu ahung pawtdoh hi. Hu kokhuuh a meikhu jiahin ni leh vaan ahung mialta hi.
Huleh hu meikhu lah apatin khauphe leitung ah ahung pawtdoh hi. Huleh lei a momaaite a tobang silbawltheihna a kawmvah piaah ahi.
Amahuh chu a tal va Pathian chiamchihna neiloute chauh chihlouh, lei a hampa aha, sil hing aha, ahihlouhleh sing mawngmawng suse lou diinga thupiaah ahi uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu hute thah theihna diing thuneihna piaah ahi sih va, hizongleh ha ngaa sung sugenthei diinga phal ahi uhi. Huleh a suhgentheihna uh chu mom-aai in mi adeh chianga anat daan bang ahi.
Huleh hu hun chiangin mite’n sihna ahawl diing va, himahleh amu sih diing uh; sih auut diing va, huleh sihna in amahuh ataaimangsan diing hi.
Huleh hu khauphete meel chu gaal kuan diinga guatsa sakolte bangmai ahi uhi. A lutung vah sana tobang lallukhuh hileh kilawm akhuh va, huleh a maai uh chu mihingte maai bang ahi.
Amah un numei sam tobang sam anei va, a ha uh chu huumpibahnei ha tobang ahi.
Huleh amah un siih awmphaw hileh kilawm awmphaw anei va, a hajaap ging uh chu gaal a kuan sakol tampi kaangtalai ging bang ahi.
Amah un mom-aai bangin mei anei va, a mei vah gu aum hi. A silbawltheihna uh chu mihingte ha ngaa sung suhnatna diing ahi.
Huleh amah un kokhuuh tobei angel chu a tungvah kumpi in anei uhi. A min chu Hebrai haam in Abaddon ahi a, hizongleh Grik haam in a min chu Apollion ahi.
Tunggihna khat abeita hi; ngai in, tunggihna nihna ahung tung nalai diing hi.
Huin angel guupna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh Pathian ma a um sana maitaam kii lite apat aw ka ja a,
peengkuul nei angel guupna kawmah, “Euphrat luuipi lian a angel li kaana umte khu suut in,” chiin.
Huchiin a daah leh a ni leh a ha leh a kum huntaha mihingte mun thum a khen mun khat that diinga kikoih angel lite chu suutin aumta uhi.
Huleh hu sakol tungtuang gaalmite tam daan chu saang tampi ahi va; a phaahzah uh kisoi ka ja hi.

Huleh hichibangin kilaahna in sakolte leh a tunga tuang mei leh jasinth suangdum leh kaat awmphaw neite chu ka mu hi. Hu sakolte lutang chu huumpibahnei lutang tobang ahi a, huleh a kam vapatin mei leh meikhu leh kaat asuaahdoh hi.
Hi gawtna thum a kam vapat hung suaahdoh, mei leh meikhu leh kaat haw in mihingte mun thum a khen mun khat chu thahin aumta uhi.
Ajiahchu hu sakolte silbawltheihna chu a kam uh leh a mei vah aum hi; ajiahchu a mei uh chu guul tobanga lutang nei ahi a, hute in mite asuna uhi.

Huleh hi gawtnate a si lou midang tengteng a khut natohte vapat akisiih tuan sih va; huchiin dawite leh sana, dangka, sumeng, suang leh sing milem, mu lah mu theilou, ja lah ja theilou, pai lah pai theilou milem abiahte uh atawpsan tuan sih uhi.
Huleh a tualthah uh ahihlouhleh a dawi aisaan uh ahihlouhleh a numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina uh ahihlouhleh a guuhtaatna vapatin zong akisiih tuan sih uhi.
Huleh angel haat dang khat meilum a kithuama vaan apat hung kumsuh ka mu hi. A lutung ah sakhituihuup aum a, a maai chu ni abang a, huleh a keengte chu meikuang khuam bang ahi.
Huleh a khut ah lehkhabu neutakhat pheetsa atawi hi. Huleh a keeng jiatlam chu tuikhanglian tungah anga a, a keeng veilam chu leitung ah anga a,
huleh amah chu huumpibahnei humhaam bangin aw ngaihtahin akikou hi. Akikou zohin vaanging sagihte’n a aw uh asuahta uhi.

Huleh vaanging sagihte’n a aw uh asuah tahun gial diingin ka kisata hi. Huin vaan akipan aw khat in ka kawm ah hichia asoi ka ja hi, “Vaanging sagihte sil soi chu iim bihbeh inla, huleh gial sin,” chiin.
Huin angel tuikhanglian leh leitung a ding ka muh khu in a khut vaan lamah atung tou a,
huleh kumtuang kumtuanga hing zingpa, vaan leh a sunga sil umte, lei leh a sunga sil umte, tuikhanglian leh a sunga sil umte siamtu min louin, a hun jekaisah ahi nawn sih diing hi,
hizongleh angel sagihna in a peengkuul amuut diing kuan chiangin chu Pathian thukiphual chu a suaah zawlneite kawma Ama’n anasoisa bangin suhkim ahita diing, chiin akihaahsial hi.
Huleh vaan apat aw ka jaah khu in, “Chiah inla tuikhanglian leh leitung a ding angel khut a lehkhabu neutakhat pheetsa um chu vala in,” achi hi.

Huin angel kawmah ka vachiah a, a kawmah, “Lehkhabu neutakhat chu hung pia in,” ka vachi hi. Huleh ama’n ka kawm ah, “La inla ne in, hikhu in na gil akhasah diing a, hizongleh na kam ah chu khuaizu bangin ahum diing hi,” achi hi.
Huin angel khut apatin lehkhabu neutakhat chu ka ladoh a huleh ka ne hi, Huchu ka kam ah khuaizu bangin ahum a, himahleh ka neeh zohin ka gil chu akhata hi.
Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Mi tampite leh namte leh haamte leh kumpipate tungtaang thu na soilawh ngeei diing ahi,” ahung chi hi.
Huin tehna chiang tobang sialluang khat ahung kipia a, huleh angel chu ading a, ka kawmah, “Thou inla, Pathian biahinn leh maitaam leh a sunga abetute teh in.
Hizongleh Pathian biahinn polam a leitual chu nusia inla teh sin, ajiahchu hichu Jentelte kawma piaah ahita hi. Huleh amah un khopi siangthou chu ha sawmli leh ha nih atuandeen diing uhi.
Huleh ka heetpihtu nihte kawmah sil bawltheihna ka pe diing a, amah un sai-ippuan silhin ni saang khat leh za nih leh sawmguup sung thu asoilawh diing uhi,” achi hi.
Hite chu olive sing nihte leh leitung Pathian ma a ding thaumei tunna nihte ahi uhi.
Mi koipouh in amah uh asuhnat tum leh, a kam vapat a mei hung pawtdoh in a meelmate uh akaangtum hi. Huleh mi koipouh in amahuh asuhnat leh huchibangmahin thahin aum diing uhi.

Hite’n chu thu asoilawh hun sungva guahjut louhna diingin vaan khaah theihna silbawltheihna anei va; huleh tui sisan suaahsah theihna leh auut daandaan va leitung gawtna chinteng a gawt theihna silbawltheihna anei uhi.
Huleh a heetpihna uh azoh chiangun kokhuuh tobei apata hung pawtdoh gamsa in amahuh adou diing a, azou diing a, huleh athat diing hi.
Huleh a luang uh chu hagaulama Sodom leh Aigupta kichi, i Lalpa uh zong kilhbeha aumna khopi loupitah kotzing ah alum diing hi.
Huleh mi chin leh phung chin leh haam chin leh nam chin a mite’n ni thum leh akim a luang uh aen diing va, a luang uh chu vui diing aphal sih diing uhi.
Huleh leitung a teengte chu amahuh tungah anuam diing va, kipaahna abawl diing va, huleh silpiaahte akithot tuah diing uhi, ajiahchu hi zawlnei nihte’n leitung a teengte abawl gim mahmah uhi.
Huleh ni thum leh akim zouin Pathian akipan hinna hagau a sungvah aluut a, a keeng un adingta va, huleh amahuh mute tungah launa nasatah atungta hi.
Huin amah un vaan apat aw ngaihtaha, “Hi lam ah hung tou un,” chia a kawmva kikou aja uhi. Huleh amahuh chu meilum lahah vaan ah akaltouta va, a meelmate un amahuh amu uhi.

Huleh hu daahkaal mahin jiil nasatahin akiliing a, khopi mun sawm a khen mun khat achimta hi. Hu jiilliing ah mi saang sagih thahin aumta a, adang teng in chu alau mahmah va vaan Pathian kawmah loupina apeta uhi.
Tunggihna nihna abeita a, ngai in, tunggihna thumna chu hung tung pah diing ahi.

Huleh angel sagihna in peengkuul amuut a, vaan ah aw ngaihtah hichiin aging hi, “Khovel lalgamte chu i Lalpa uh leh a Khrist lalgam ahung hita a, Amah chu kumtuang kumtuangin lalin atou diing hi!” chiin.
Huin Pathian ma a a laltouphah va tou upa sawmnih leh lite’n khupboha puuhin Pathian abia uhi,
“Nang ka hung phat uhi, Aw Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, umzing leh umta leh hung um diingpa, ajiahchu nangma’n na silbawltheihna loupitah na lata a, vai na hawmta hi.

Namte chu athangtawm va, huleh na lungthahna chu ahung tungta hi. Misite vaihawmsahna diing leh na suaah zawlneite leh misiangthoute leh na min lau, aneu leh aliante kawmah kipaahman na piaahna hun leh leitung susetute na suhsiatna hun diing chu ahung tungta hi,” chiin.
Huin vaan ah Pathian mun siangthou akihong a, a mun siangthou sungah a thuhun bawm akimu hi. Huin kawlphe, aw ging, vaan ging, jiilliing leh gialkia nasatah haw ahung umta hi.
Huleh vaan ah chiamchihna loupitah ahung kilang hi: numei khat ni a kithuam, a keeng nuaia hapi um, huleh a lutung a aahsi sawmlenih tuang lallukhuh khuh ahung um hi.
Amahnu chu naupaai ahi a, nausuaah diinga natna thuaahin akap hi.
Huin chiamchihna dang vaan ah ahung kilang kiit hi: ngai in, dragon san lianpi lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei, a lutungte a lallukhuh sagih khuh ahung um hi.
A mei in vaan a aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat akai a, lei ah apaaikheta hi. Huleh a Nau asuaah phaatphaat anavalhzou pah diingin dragon chu numei nausuaah diing nu ma ah ading hi.
Huleh amahnu’n chu Nau pasal nam zousiah tunga siihchiang a vaihawmtu diing khat ahung neikheta a, huleh a Ta chu Pathian leh a laltouphah kawmah laahtouhin aumta hi.
Huleh numeinu chu ni saang khat leh ni za nih leh ni sawmguup achawm theihna diingun gamdaai ah Pathian in abawlsah mun ah ataaimangta hi.
Huin vaan ah kidouna aum a, Mikael leh a angelte’n dragon adou va, huleh dragon leh a angelte’n zong adou va,
himahleh azou sih va, amahuh diingin vaan ah mun muhin aum nawnta sih hi.

Huleh dragon lian chu paihdohin aumta hi, hu malai a guulpi, Diabol leh Setan kichi khovel pumpi heemtu chu; amah chu leitung ah paihkhiahin aumta a, huleh a angelte zong amah toh paihkhiahin aum uhi.

Huin vaan ah aw ngaihtah a hichia chi ka ja hi, “Tuin chu i Pathian uh hutdamna, thahaatna, leh lalgam, huleh a Khrist silbawltheihna ahung tungta hi, ajiahchu asuun ajaan a i Pathian ma a i unaute uh heehtu chu paihkhiahin aumta hi.
Huleh amah un Belaamnou sisan jiah leh a heetpihna thu uh jiahin amah chu azouta va, sih tanphain a hinna uh aiit sih uhi.

Hujiahin nanguh vaan leh a sunga teengte kipaah un! Leitung leh tuikhanglian a teengte tung agih hi! Ajiahchu hun tomtakhat aneita chih aheet jiahin diabol chu thangtawm mahmahin na kawmvah ahung suhta hi,” chiin.
Huleh dragon in leitung ah paihkhiah ahita chih akiheet tahin hu numei Ta pasal neinu chu agawtta hi.
Hu numei chu gamdaai ah hu guul muhphaah louha hun khat leh hunte leh hun kimkhat chawma aumna diing mun a aleen luut theihna diingin mupi liantah ha nih piaah ahi.
Huleh tuilian haattah a numei chu atohmang theihna diingin guul in hu numei nu nawhin a kam apat tuilian luang bangin tui aphihdoh hi.
Hizongleh lei in numeinu panpihnain a kam akaah a, hu guul in a kam apat aphihdoh tuilian chu avalh beita hi.
Huleh dragon chu numeinu tung ah alungthah mahmah a, huin Pathian thupiaah jui leh Jesu Khrist heetpihna pomtu, hu numei nu chihaah tengteng chu dou diingin akuanta hi.

Huin tuikhanglian piauneel tungah ka ding a, huleh tuikhanglian apat gamsa hung pawt khat, lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei, huleh a kiite tunga lallukhuh sawm nei, huleh a lutangte tunga Pathian soisiatna min nei ka mu hi.

Huleh hu ka gamsa muh chu gialbeem tobang ahi a, a keeng chu vompi keeng abang a, a kam chu huumpibahnei kam abang hi. Huleh amah chu dragon in a silbawltheihna leh a laltouphah leh thuneihna nasatah apia hi.
Huleh a lutangte laha khat chu sihpih diing khop hiala liam hileh kilawmin ka mu a, huleh sihna khopa a liamna chu suhdam ahita hi. Huleh khovel pumpi in thumah asa va huleh hu gamsa chu ajuita uhi.
Huleh amah un gamsa kawma thuneihna petu dragon chu abia va; huleh amah un, “Gamsa toh kibang koi aum ei? Amah toh kidou ngaap koi ahiai um?” chiin gamsa chu abia uhi.
Huleh sil loupitahte soina diing leh Pathian soisiatna diing kam a kawmah piaah ahi a, huleh ha sawmli leh ha nih sung thuneihna piaahin aumta hi.
Huleh ama’n Pathian soisiatna leh a min leh a biahbuuh leh vaan a umte soisiatna in a kam akaahta hi.
Huleh a kawmah chu misiangthoute toh kidou diing leh amahuh zou diingin thu piaah ahita hi. Huleh a kawmah phung chin leh haam chin leh nam chin tunga thuneihna piaah ahita hi.
Huleh leitung a teeng zousiah khovel siamchiil apat thahsa Belaamnou Hinna Lehkhabu a a min uh kigial loute’n amah abe diing uhi.
Mi koipouh in bil aneih leh, ja heh.
Koipouh sal a puiluuttu chu sal in ataang diing a, koipouh naamsau a that chu naamsau a thahin aum diing hi. Hitah ah misiangthoute thuaahkuhkalna leh ginna suhlatna aum hi.
Huin gamsa dang leitung apat hung pawtdoh khat ka mu a, huleh ama’n chu belaam bangin kii nih anei a huleh dragon bangin thu asoi hi.
Ama’n gamsa masapeen thuneihna zousiah a ma ah azang a, huleh leitung leh a sunga teeng haw chu gamsa masapeen, sihna khop hiala liam hung dam kiit chu abesah hi.
Huleh ama’n mihingte mitmuhin vaan apat leitung ah mei bang koukhe hialin chiamchihna nasatahte abawl hi.

Huleh ama’n hu gamsa mitmuh a chiamchihna bawl theihna a kawma piaaha umte zangin leitung a teengte aheem a, ama’n leitung a teengte chu gamsa naamsau a suhliam a um a, hing nalai khu lim siam diingin ahilh hi.
Huleh gamsa lim kawma haihna apiaah theihna diing leh huchia gamsa lim chu ahung haamtheih a, huleh gamsa lim be lou photmahte athah theihna diingin amah chu silbawltheihna piaah ahi.
Huleh ama’n mi zousiah, aneu leh alian, hausa leh genthei, saltaang leh taanglou hitaleh, a khut jiatlam vah ahihlouhleh a tal vah chiamchihna aneisah chiat hi,
huleh huchia chiamchihna ahihlouhleh gamsa min ahihlouhleh a min nambar neite chihlouh, mi koimah in alei theih louh va, juaah zong ajuaah theihlouhna diingun.
Hitah ah pilna apoimoh; koipouh heetsiamna nei in gamsa nambar chu ngaihtuah heh, ajiahchu hichu mihing nambar ahi, a nambar chu: za guup leh sawmguup leh guup ahi.
Huleh ka en a, Belaamnou chu Zion Taang a ding leh a Pa min a tal va kigial chiat mi nuai khat leh siing li leh saang li Amah toh ding ka mu hi.
Huleh vaan apatin aw khat tui tampi luang ging leh vaan ging nasatah bang ka ja hi. Huleh kaihging tumte kaihging tum ging ka ja hi.
Amah un laltouphah ma leh sil hing lite leh upate ma ah la thah hileh kilawm asa va; hu la chu leitung apat tatdoh hu mi nuai khat leh siing li leh saang li chihlouh koima’n ahe thei sih hi.

Hite chu numei a kisubuaah loute ahi uh, ajiahchu amahuh akikoih siangthou uhi. Hite chu Belaamnou a chiahna phot a juitute ahi uhi. Amahuh chu Pathian leh Belaamnou diinga gah masapeen hi diinga mite lah apat tatdohte ahi uhi.
Huleh a kam vah juauthu aum sih a, Pathian laltouphah ma ah soiseel beiin aum uhi.
Huleh angel khat vaanlaijawl a leeng ka mu a, ama’n leitung a teeng nam chin, phung chin, haam chin leh mi chin kawma taangkoupih diing kumtuang tanchinpha anei a;
aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Pathian lau unla, a kawmah loupina pia un, ajiahchu a vaihawmna hun ahung tungta hi. Huleh Amah vaan leh lei leh tuikhanglian leh tuinaahte siamtu chu bia un,” chiin.
Angel nihna in ajui a, “Numei leh pasal kaala a thaanghuaina uutna zu chu nam zousiah adawnsah jiahin hu khopi loupi Babylon chu achimta hi, achimta hi,” achi hi.
Huin angel thumna in amahuh ajui a aw ngaihtahin, “Mi koipouh in gamsa leh a lim abiah a, a tal ahihlouhleh a khut a chiamchihna aneih leh,

amah ngeei in zong Pathian lungthahna uain, a thangtawmna nou sunga ahaat theitawpa kisung chu adawn diing hi. Amah chu angel siangthoute mitmuh leh Belaamnou mitmuh ah mei leh kaat a suhnatin aum diing hi.
Huleh a suhnatna meikhu uh chu kumtuang kumtuangin ajaam tou a, gamsa leh a lim bete leh a min a chiamchihna nei photmahte’n chu suun leh jaan in khawldamna amu sih uhi,” achi hi.
Hitah ah misiangthoute thuaahkuhkalna suhlatna aum hi; hitah ah Pathian thupiaah juite leh Jesu a ginna neite aum uhi.

Huleh vaan apatin aw khat in hi chia asoi ka ja hi, “Gial in: ‘Tu apatin Lalpa a si, misite chu ahampha uhi!’” Hagau in, “Ahi, a tohgimnate uh apatin atawldamta diing uhi, ajiahchu a silbawlte un amahuh ahung juih diing jiahin,” achi hi.
Huin ka en a, huleh ngai in, meilum vaam leh hu meilum tungah Mihing Tapa hileh kilawm, a lutung a sana lallukhuh khuh a, a khut a kawite hiam tawi chu ka mu hi.

Huleh angel dang khat Pathian biahinn apat ahung pawtdoh a, aw ngaihtah a kikouin meilum tunga toupa kawmah, “Na kawite tawi inla aat in, nang diingin a aat hun atungta hi, ajiahchu leitung chu aat hun in aminta hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin hu meilum tunga toupa’n leitung chu a kawite in azam a, huchiin leitung chu aatin aumta hi.
Huin angel dang khat vaan a Pathian mun siangthou apatin ahung pawt a, ama’n zong kawite hiamtah atawi hi.

Huleh mei tunga thunei angel dang khat maitaam apatin ahung pawt a, aw ngaihtaha kikouin kawite hiam tawipa kawmah, “Na kawite zam inla, lei grep gahbomte khawm in, ajiahchu grep amin vehta hi,” achi hi.
Huchiin angel in leitung ah a kawite azam a, huleh lei grepte chu alakhawm a, huleh huchu Pathian lungthahna uain suuhna ah apaailuutta hi.
Huleh uain suuhna chu khogei lamah keeng a chilin aum a, uain suuhna apat sisan chu sakol kam kaih tanphain, farlong saang khat leh za guup sung ahung luangkheta hi.
Huin vaan ah chiamchihna loupi leh limdang, gawtna nunung sagih nei angel sagih ka mu hi, hute a Pathian thangtawmna abukimtaah jiahin huchu gawtna nunung ahi.

Huleh mei toh kihal tuikhanglian liimlang hileh kilawm, huleh gamsa tung leh a lim tung leh a chiamchihna tung leh a min nambar tunga gualzohna tangte Pathian kaihging tawi a tuikhanglian liimlang tunga ding ka mu hi.
Amah un Pathian suaah Mosi la leh Belaamnou la asa va: “Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, na silbawlte aloupiin athumah hi! Na lampite chu adihin atah ahi. Aw misiangthoute Kumpipa!

Kuan nang hung lau louin, Aw Lalpa, kuan na min apaahtawi lou ngam diai? Ajiahchu nang chauh na siangthou hi. Ajiahchu nam zousiah chu ahung diingva na ma ah ahung be diing uhi, ajiahchu na vaihawmna dihte suhlatin aumta hi,” chiin.
Huleh hi silte nungin ka en a, huleh ngai in, vaan ah Pathian biahinn heetsahna biahbuuh pindan sungnung chu akihong hi.
Huleh angel sagihte chu gawtna sagihte tawiin puan siangthou leh vaam a kithuamin leh a awm uh sana kawnggaah a gaahin Pathian mun siangthou apat ahung pawtdoh uhi.
Huin silhing lite laha khat in hu angel sagihte kawmah kumtuang kumtuanga hing zing Pathian thangtawmna a dim sana kuang sagih apeta hi.

Huleh Pathian mun siangthou pindan sungnung chu Pathian loupina leh a silbawltheihna apat meikhu in adimta a, huleh hu angel sagihte gawtna sagih haw akizoh masiahin Pathian mun siangthou sungnung ah koima aluut theita sih uhi.
Huin Pathian biahinn sung apatin aw ngaihtah khat in angel sagihte kawmah, “Chiah unla Pathian lungthahna kuang sagihte chu leitung ah sungkhia un,” achih ka ja hi.
Huchiin angel khatna chu achiah a, a kuang chu leitung ah asungkhia a, huleh gamsa chiamchihna neite leh a lim betute tungah meimasia nasatah mei ahung suaahta hi.
Huin angel nihna in a kuang chu tuipi tung ah asungkhia a, huchu misi sisan bangin ahung umta a, huchiin tuikhanglian a um hinna nei zousiah asita uhi.
Huin angel thumna in a kuang chu luuidungte leh tuinaahte ah asungkhia a, hute chu sisan ahung suaahta hi.
Huleh tuite tunga thuneitu angel in hichia asoi ka ja hi, “Aw Lalpa, hichi banga vai na hawm jiahin, nang, umzing leh umta leh hung um diing chu na dihtat hi.
Ajiahchu amah un zawlneite leh misiangthoute sisan anasuah va, huleh nang adawn diingun sisan amahuh na peta hi. Ajiahchu dawn taah mawng ahi uhi,” chiin.
Huleh maitaam apat adang khat in, “Ahi, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, na vaihawmnate chu adihin adihtat hi,” achih ka ja hi.
Huin angel lina in a kuang chu ni tungah asungkhia a, huleh amah kawmah chu mite mei a haaigawp theihna piaah ahi.
Huin mite chu mei nasatah a haaigawpin aum va, huleh amah un hi gawtnate tunga thuneitu Pathian asoisia va, huleh Amah kawma loupina pe diingin akisiih sih uhi.
Huin angel ngaana in a kuang chu gamsa laltouphah tungah asungkhia a, huin a lalgam chu ahung mial vehta a; huleh amah un na asah jiahun a lei uh apet uhi.
A natna uh leh a meimate uh jiahin vaan Pathian chu asoisia va, a silbawlte uh jiahin akisiih tuan sih uhi.
Huin angel guupna in a kuang chu Euphrat luuipi tungah asungkhia a, huchiin suaahlam a kumpipate diinga lampi bawl ahih theihna diingin a tui chu akang vehta hi.
Huleh ukeeng tobang hagau bolhhoh thum, dragon kam apat leh gamsa kam apat leh zawlnei tahlou kam apat hung pawt ka mu hi;
ajiahchu amahuh chu Bangkimbawltheipa hu Pathian ni loupi kidouna a puikhawm diinga leitung pumpi kumpipate kawma chiahdoh, chiamchihna bawl dawite hagau ahi uhi.
“Ngai in, guta bangin ka hung ahi. Kiging zing leh a puan teengsa a um chu ahampha hi, huchilou inchu saguaahin avaah diing a, a zumhuaina amu kha diing uhi.”
Huleh amahuh chu munkhat Hebrai haam a Armageddon kichi ah apuikhawmta uhi.
Huin angel sagihna in a kuang chu huihkhua ah asungkhia a, huleh vaan a Pathian mun siangthou apat leh laltouphah akipanin aw ngaihtah ahung suaah a, “Bawlzoh ahita!” achi hi.
Huleh awte leh vaan gingte leh kawlphete ahung um a; huleh jiil nasatahin aliing a, huchibang jiilliing nasa leh loupi chu leitung a mihing um apatin aum kha nai sih hi.
Huleh khopi loupi chu mun thum in akikhen a, namte haw khopite chu achimta hi. Huleh Pathian in Babylon khopi loupi chu ahezing a, huleh a lungthahna huaisia uain nou chu a kawmah apeta hi.
Huin tuikulhgam zousiah chu ataaimangta va, taangte zong muhin aum nawnta sih hi.
Huleh gial nasatah mei, atang khat talent khat tuha gih vaan apatin mite tungah akia a, mite’n gial suhgimna jiahin Pathian asoisia uh, ajiahchu hu suhgimna chu ahuaise mahmah hi.
Huin kuang sagih tawi angel sagihte lah a khat ahung a huleh ahung kihoupih a, “Hi lamah hung in, tui tampi tunga tou nohchijuaah thupitahnu tunga vaihawmna ka hung musah diing hi,
amahnu toh lei a kumpipate’n kingaihna thaanghuai a kipawlna abawl va, huleh amahnu kingaih thaanghuaina zu chu leitung a teengte dawnkhamsahin aum uhi,” achi hi.
Huchiin ama’n kei chu Hagau in gamdaai ah ahung pomangta hi. Huleh numei khat Pathian soisiatna min a dim, lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei gamsa sandup tunga tou ka mu hi.

Huleh hu numei chu puan sandup leh sandaang in akichei a, sana leh suangmantam leh tuikep suang in akijeem a, a numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina kihdahum leh bolhhohna a dim sana nou chu a khut in atawi hi.
Huleh a tal ah min khat, “THUKIPHUAL, BABYLON LOUPI, NOHCHIJUAAHTE LEH LEITUNG A KIHDAHHUAITE NU,” chiin akigial hi.
Hu numei chu misiangthoute sisan leh Jesu diinga martarte sisan dawn khamin ka mu hi. Huleh amahnu ka muh tahin, limdang leh thumah ka sa tahzet hi.
Huleh angel in ka kawmah, “Bang diinga thumahsa na hiai? Hu numei leh atuanna lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei gamsa thukiphual ka hung hilh diing hi.

Hu na gamsa muh chu aumzouta a, huleh aum sih a, huleh kokhuuh tobei apat ahung pawtkhe diing a huleh manthaaina ah achiah luut diing hi. Huleh khovel siamchiil apata Hinna Lehkhabu a a min uh kigial lou leitung a teengte’n hu gamsa aumzouta, huleh aum lou, huleh hung um nalai diing chu amuh chiangun limdang asa diing uhi.
Hitah ah pilna lungsim apoimoh hi; lutang sagihte chu numei touna taang sagihte ahi uhi.
Huleh kumpipa sagih aum a, ngaa chu apuuhta a, khat aum a, khat chu ahung tung nai tadih sih hi. Huleh ahung tun chiangin tomtakhat sung aum diing hi.
Huleh hu gamsa umzouta, huleh aum lou, amah ngeei chu agiatna ahi a, huleh sagihte laha mi ahi a, huleh manthaaina ah achiah hi.
Huleh hu kii sawm na muhte chu lalgam mu nai tadih lou kumpipa sawmte ahi va, hizongleh amah un gamsa toh daahkaal khat sung kumpipate banga thuneihna anei uhi.
Hite’n chu lungsim munkhat apua va, huleh gamsa kawmah a thuneihna uh leh a haatna uh ape diing uhi.

Hite’n chu Belaamnou akidoupih diing va, huleh Belaamnou in amahuh azou diing hi, ajiahchu Amah chu lalpate Lalpa leh kumpipate Kumpipa ahi; huleh Amah toh umte chu kouhte, teelte leh ginumte ahi uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Nohchijuaahnu touna, na tui muhte chu mite leh mipite leh namte leh haamte ahi uhi.
Huleh gamsa tunga kii sawm na muhte’n chu nohchijuaahnu ahaw diing va, tavai leh saguaahin abawl diing va, a sa ane diing va, huleh mei in ahaalmang diing uhi.
Ajiahchu Pathian in a thute ataangtunkim masiaha Amah siltup asuhbukim theihna diingin, a lungsim uh mun khat a umna diing leh a lalgam uh gamsa kawma apiaahna diing uh a lungtang vah akoihta hi.
Huleh hu na numei muh chu hu khopi loupi leitung a kumpipate tunga vaihawmtu chu ahi,” achi hi.
Hi silte nungin angel dang khat silbawltheihna loupitah neia vaan apat hungsuh ka mu a; huleh a loupina in lei ataanvaahta hi.

Huleh amah chu aw thupitahin naahpiihtahin akikou a, “Babylon loupi chu achimta hi, achimta a, huleh dawite umna leh hagau bolhhoh chinteng kulh leh tungleeng va sianglou leh kihdahum chinteng bawm ahung hita hi.

Ajiahchu nam zousiah in a kingaih thaanghuaina zu chu adawnta va, huleh leitung a kumpipate’n kingaihna thaanghuai in akipawlpihta va, amah noptatluatna jaalin leitung a sumkawlveite ahausa gawpta uhi,” achi hi.
Huleh vaan apat aw dangkhat ka ja a, “Ka mite haw, a sualnate a na tel louhna diing uh leh amahnu gawtnate na thuaahkhawm louhna diingun amah apat hung pawt un.
Ajiahchu a sualnate’n vaan asuta a, huleh a giitlouhnate Pathian in ahe zing ahi.
Ama’n ahung piaah bang ngeeiin amah pia unla, huleh a silbawl bangjeelin a kawmah alehnih in thuh un; a nou sun khawm ah amah diingin alehnih in sundimsah un.
Akiloupisah daan leh anoptatdaan bangjeelin bawlgim unla, sulungkham un; ajiahchu ama’n a lungtang in, ‘Kumpinu in ka tou a, meithai ka hi sih, ka lungkham ngei sih diing,’ achi hi.
Hujiahin ni khat thu in amah gawtna, sihna leh lungngaihna leh kialna ahung tung diing hi. Huleh amahnu chu mei in akaangtum diing hi, ajiahchu atunga vaihawmtu Lalpa Pathian chu ahaat ahi.
“Huleh leitung a kumpipa amahnu kingaihna thaanghuai a kipawlpihte leh amahnu toh nuamtah a ana-umte’n amahnu kaatna meikhu amuh chiangun kapin asuun diing va,
amahnu kibawlgimna lauh jiaha gamlapi a dingin, ‘Tameide, tameide, Babylon loupi, khopi kip, daahkaal khat sunga na tunga vaihawmna ahung tuntaah mei!’ achi diing uhi.
“Huleh lei a sumkawlveite’n amahnu chu kah in asuun diing uhi, mi koima’n a thuampua uh alei nawn louh jiahin;

hu thuampuate chu sanate, dangkate, suangmantamte, tuikepsuangte, puanmalngaatte, puansandaangte, puanneemte, puansandupte, sing gimtuui chintengte, saiha a kibawl van chituam zousiah, sing mantampeente a kibawl vante, sum-engte, siihte, suangkaang beel chi tuamtuam zousiah,
huleh siingthaalte leh sil gimtuuite, sathau namtuuite leh begawte, uainte leh olive thaute, taangbuangte leh gehute, gante leh belaamte, sakolte leh kaangtalaite, suaahte leh mite hinnate bang ahi.
“Huleh silgah lungsim a na lunggulhte’n nang ahung nuseta va, hinkhonopna leh hoih kilawm zousiah in nang ahung paimangsanta a, huleh hite haw chu na mukiit nawn hial sih diing hi.
Hi silte a sumkawlveite, amahnu jiaha hung hausate’n chu amahnu kibawlgimna lauh jiahin gamlapi a dingin kapin asuun diing va,
huleh, ‘Tameide, tameide, hu khopi loupi, puan malngaat leh puan sandup leh puan sandaang silh a, huleh sana leh suang mantam leh tuikepsuang a kijeem chu!

Ajiahchu daahkaal khat sung chauhin hibanga hauhsatna loupi bangmalou ahung suaahta,’ achi diing uhi. Huleh long houtu photmah leh long a tuang haw zousiah leh longpute leh tuikhanglian a sumkawlvei photmah chu gamlapi ah ading va,
huleh akaahna meikhu amuh tahun akikoukhia va, ‘Hi khopi loupi tobang khopi aum ei?’ achi uhi.

Huleh amah un a lutung va leivui kithehin akikou va, kap leh maau pumin, ‘Tameide, tameide, hu khopi hauhsatna jiaha tuikhanglian a long nei haw zousiah suhhauhsata um hi va! Ajiahchu daahkaal khat sungin suhsiat ahung hita hi,’ achi uhi.
Aw vaan, huleh nanguh misiangthoute, apostolte leh zawlneite, amahnu tungah nuam un, ajiahchu Pathian in na phuba uh a tungah ahung laahsahta hi!” achi hi.

Huleh angel haattah khat in suang sumheeh liantah tobang suang khat ala a, tuikhanglian ah apaailuut a, “Hichibangin Babylon khopi loupi chu thagumsuah a paihkhiah ahi diing a, huleh muh kiitin aum nawn het sih diing hi.

Huleh kaihging tumte tumging, lasiamte lasah ging, gosem muutte muut ging leh peengkuul muutte muut ging haw na sung ah akija nawn het sih diing hi. Khutsiammi, banglam pouha khutsiam mawngmawng na sungah akimu nawn sih diing a, huleh suang sumheeh gin mawngmawng zong akija nawn sih diing hi.

Huleh thaumei vaah zong na sungah ataang nawn het sih diing a, mou leh moupa aw zong akija nawn het sih diing hi. Ajiahchu na sumkawlveitute hi leitung a miliante ahi va, ajiahchu na bupsiamna in nam zousiah heemin aumta uhi.
Huleh a sungah chu zawlneite leh misiangthoute leh leitung a thaha um zousiah sisan muhin aumta hi,” achi hi.
Hi silte nungin vaan ah mipi tampi aw ngaihtah ka ja a, “Hallelujah! Hutdamna leh loupina, zahumna leh silbawltheihna chu Lalpa i Pathian uh a ahi!

Ajiahchu a vaihawmnate chu athutahin adihtat ahi, ajiahchu Ama’n nohchijuaahnu loupitah, numei leh pasal kaala a thaanghuaina jiaha leitung suthaanghuainu chu vai ahawmkhumta a, huleh a suaahte sisan phuba chu a tungah alaahsahta hi,” chiin.
Huleh amah un, “Hallelujah! Amahnu haalna meikhu chu kumtuang kumtuangin ajaamtouta hi!” achi uhi.
Huleh upa sawmnih leh lite leh silhing lite chu khupbohin apuuh va, “Amen! Hallelujah!” chiin laltouphah tunga tou Pathian chu abeta uhi.
Huchiin laltouphah apatin aw khat ahung gingdoh a, “Nanguh a suaahte zousiah leh nanguh Amah lau, aneu leh aliante’n i Pathian uh chu paahtawi un!” achi hi.
Huleh mipi tamtah aw ging bang, tui tamtah luang ging bang leh vaanpi ging nasatah tobang ka ja a, “Hallelujah! Ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa’n vai ahawm hi!
“Kipaahin i nuam diing va huleh Amah kawmah paahtawina i pe diing uh, ajiahchu Belaamnou ji neih hun ahung tungta a, huleh a ji zong akisa zoudiamta hi,” achi hi.
Huleh amahnu chu puan malngaat siangthou leh vaam a akijep diing phal ahi a, hu puan malngaat chu misiangthoute dihtatna ahi.
Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Gial in, ‘Belaamnou ji neihna ankuang uum diinga kouhte chu ahampha uhi,’” achi hi. Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hite chu Pathian thusoi dihtahte ahi,” achi hi.

Huleh amah be diingin a keengbul ah ka puuh hi. Himahleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hung be hial sin! Kei chu na suaah tanpih leh Jesu heetpihna thu nei, na unaute laha ka hi. Pathian bejaw in! Ajiahchu Jesu heetpihna chu thusoitheihna hagau ahi,” achi hi.
Huin vaan kihong ka mu a, huleh ngai in, sakol kaang khat; huleh a tunga tuangpa a min Ginum leh Thutah kichi ka mu a, Ama’n dihtatna in vai ahawm a huleh gaal abawl hi.
A mitte chu meikuang tobang ahi a, huleh a lutung ah lallukhuh tampi aum hi. Huleh Amah loungaal koima’n aheet theihlouh min kigial anei hi.
Huleh Amah chu sisan a kidiah puan in akithuam a, a min chu Pathian Thu akichi hi.
Huleh vaan a um sepaih hon in, puan malngaat vaam leh siangthou a kithuamin sakol kaangte tunga touin Amah ajui uhi.

Huleh namte asaatna diingin a kam apatin naamsau hiamtah apawtdoh hi. Huleh Amah ngeeiin amahuh chu siih chiang toh vai ahawmkhum diing hi. Amah ngeei in Bangkimbawltheipa Pathian lauhuaina leh thangtawmna uain suuhna chu atuanchilta hi.
Ama’n a puan tung leh a malpi tungah, KUMPIPATE KUMPIPA LEH LALPATE LALPA, chia kigial min anei hi.
Huin angel khat ni a ding ka mu a, amah chu aw ngaihtaha kikouin vaanlaijawl a leeng vate kawmah, “Hung unla Pathian ankuang luina loupitah ah hung kikhawm un,
kumpipate sa, sepaih houtuliante sa, mi haatte sa, sakolte sa leh a tungva tuangte sa leh mi zousiah, jaleen leh saltaang, aneu leh alian sa na neeh theihna diingun,” achi hi.
Huleh hu gamsa leh leitung a kumpipate leh a sepaih hon uh chu hu sakol tunga tuangpa leh a sepaihte dou diinga akipunkhawm uh ka mu hi.

Huleh hu gamsa chu matin aumta a, huleh amah toh zawlnei tahlou, a ma a chiamchihnate bawl a, hu chiamchihna a gamsa chiamtehna neite leh a lim bete heemzoupa chu gamsa toh matkhawmin aumta hi. Hi tegeel chu anih un kaat a kaang mei diil ah ahinga paihluutin aumta uhi.
Huleh amawh teng chu Amah sakol tunga tuangpa kam apat hung pawtdoh naamsau in thahin aumta uhi. Huleh amahuh sa in tungleeng va zousiah agilvahta uhi.
Huin angel khat vaan apat a hung kumsuh, a khut a kokhuuh tobei chabi leh khainiang golpi tawi ka mu hi.
Huleh ama’n dragon, hu malai a guulpi khu, Diabol leh Setan kichi chu aman a, kum saang khat sung diingin akaanta hi;

huleh kum saang khat achin masiaha namte aheem kiit louhna diingin kokhuuh tobei ah apaailuut a, akhaahkhum a, huleh chiamchihin asiindetta hi. Huleh hite zoh chiangin amah chu tomkhat sung hahkhiah ahi diing hi.

Huleh laltouphahte leh a tunga toute ka mu a, huleh a kawmvah vaihawmna piaah ahi. Huin Jesu aheetpihna jiah uh leh Pathian thu aheetpihna jiahva a ngawng uh tana umte hagaute leh gamsa ahihlouhleh a lim be ngeilou a, a tal uh ahihlouhleh a khut va zong chiamchihna nei ngeiloute haw chu ka mu hi. Huleh amahuh chu ahung hing va huleh Khrist toh kum saang khat vai ahawmta uhi.
Hizongleh misi dangte chu kum saang khat achin masiah ahing kiit sih uhi. Hichu thohkiitna masapeen ahi.

Thohkiitna masapeen a telte chu ahampha un asiangthou uhi. Hute tungah sih nihna in thu anei sih a, hizongleh amahuh chu Pathian leh Khrist siampute ahi diing va, huleh Amah toh kum saang khat vai ahawm diing uhi.
Hu kum saang khat achin chiangin Setan chu a taanna kul apat hahkhiahin aum diing a,
huleh leitung ning li a um namte, Gog leh Magog chu heema kidouna a puikhawm diingin achiahdoh diing hi, atam lam uh chu tuikhanglian piauneel bang ahi uhi.
Huleh amahuh chu lei vaailam daapin achiah tou va misiangthoute giahbuuh leh khopi deihum chu ahualkhumta uhi. Huleh Pathian a kuanin vaan apat mei ahung kesuh a, huleh amahuh akaangtumta hi.
Huleh amahuh heemtu diabol chu gamsa leh zawlnei tahlou umna mei leh kaat diil ah paihluutin aumta hi. Huleh amahuh chu kumtuang kumtuangin suun leh jaanin suhnatin aum diing uhi.
Huin laltouphah ngou loupitah leh a tunga toupa, Amah maai apat lei leh vaan ataaimangnapa chu ka mu a, huleh amahuh diingin mun mawngmawng muhin aumta sih hi.

Huleh misite, aneu leh alian, laltouphah ma a ding ka mu a, lehkhabute akihong a, lehkhabu dang zong akihong hi, huchu Hinna Lehkhabu ahi. Huleh misite chu hu lehkhabute a kigial bangin a natoh dungjui un vaihawmsahin aumta uhi.
Tuikhanglian in a sunga misi umte ahung pedohta a, huleh Sihna leh Misi Khua in a sunga misi umte ahung pedohta uhi. Huleh mi chin chu a silbawlte uh dungjuia vaihawmsahin aumta uhi.
Sihna leh Misi Khua chu mei diil ah paihluutin aumta uhi. Hichu sih nihna, mei diil chu ahi.
Huleh koipouh Hinna Lehkhabu a min kigial kha lou photmah chu mei diil ah paihluutin aumta uhi.
Huin vaan thah leh lei thah ka mu hi, ajiahchu vaan masa leh lei masa chu apaimangta hi. Huleh tuikhanglian zong aum nawn sih hi.
Huin kei Johan in khopi siangthou, Jerusalem Thah chu mou a pasal a diinga kichei banga bawl zohsa a Pathian apat vaan a hung kumsuh chu ka mu hi.

Huleh vaan apat aw ngaihtah khat in, “Ngai in, Pathian teenna chu mihingte lah ahita, huleh Amah chu a lahvah ateeng diing a, huleh amahuh chu a mite ahi diing uhi. Pathian ngeei chu a kawmvah aum diing a, a Pathian uh ahi diing hi.

Huleh Pathian in a mit vapat mittui zousiah asiaahsiangsah diing hi. Huleh sihna, lusuunna, leh kahna aum nawn sih diing hi. Hu ah natna aum nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu sil masate teng apaimangta hi,” achih ka ja hi.
Huleh laltouphah tunga toupa’n, “Ngai in, sil zousiah ka siam thah hi,” achi hi. Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Gial in, ajiahchu hi thute hi adihin aginum ahi,” achi hi.
Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Bawlzoh ahita! Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp ka hi. Dangtaah photmah kawmah hinna tuinaah tui athawnin ka pe diing hi.
Agualzoutu in chu sil zousiah aluah diing a, huleh a Pathian ka hi diing a, amah zong ka tapa ahi diing hi.

Hizongleh meidawite, gingtaloute, kihdahumte, tualthatte, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite, bumhaatte, milembete, juau haatte zousiah tan diing chu mei leh kaat a kaang diil ahi a, huchu sih nihna ahi,” achi hi.
Huin gawtna sagih nunungpeen a dim kuang sagih tawi angel sagihte laha khat ka kawmah ahung a, ahung houpih a, “Hi lamah hung in, mounu, Belaamnou ji chu ka hung ensah diing hi,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n Hagau in taang sang liantah tungah ahung puita a, hu khopi loupitah Jerusalem siangthou, Pathian a kuana vaan apata hung kumsuh chu ahung ensah a,.
Pathian loupina anei hi. A vaah chu suang mantampeen abang a, jaspar suang bangin, kristal suang tobangin aval ahi.
Huleh kulhbaang nasatah leh sangtah anei a, kot sawmlenih anei a, hu kotte ah chu angel sawmlenih aum uhi. Huleh hu kotte tungah min kigial aum a, hute chu Israel tate phung sawmlenihte min ahi.
Suahlam ah kot thum, maallam ah kot thum, simlam ah kot thum leh tumlam ah kot thum aum hi.
Huleh khopi kulhbaang in innbulphuh suang sawmlenih anei a, hute tungah Belaamnou apostol sawmlenihte min atuang hi.
Kei hung houpihpa’n hu khopi leh a kotte leh a kulhbaang tehna diingin tehna sana chiang atawi hi.

Khopi chu ning li kibang neiin aum a, a dunglam saudaan chu a vaailam toh akibang hi. Huleh ama’n hu chiang in khopi chu ateh a, farlong saang sawmlenih ahi a, a dunglam leh a vaailam leh a saanlam akikim uhi.
Ama’n kulhbaang chu ateh a mihing tehna a tehin fi t za nih veel ahi a, huchu angel tehna in zong ahi.
Kulhbaang chu jaspar suang a kibawl ahi a, a khopi chu sana siang a kibawl liimlang bang mei ahi.

Khopi kulhbaang innbulphuh suangte chu suangmantam chi chinteng a zep ahi a, huleh a innbulphuh suang masapeen chu jaspar suang ahi a, anihna chu sapphire suang ahi a, athumna chu kalsidoni suang ahi a, alina chu emerald suang ahi a,

angaana chu sardonix suang ahi a, aguupna chu sardia suang ahi a, asagihna chu krisolit suang ahi a, agiatna chu beril suang ahi a, akuahna chu topaz suang ahi a, asawmna chu krisopras suang ahi a, asawmlekhatna chu jasinth suang ahi a, asawmlenihna chu amethist suang ahi.
A kot sawmlenihte chu tuikep suang sawmlenih ahi a, a kot chin chu tuikep suang khat a bawl ahi. Huleh khopi kotzing chu sana siang a bawl, liimlang etpailet theih bang ahi.
Huleh hu ah chu Pathian biahinn mawngmawng ka mu sih a, ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa leh Belaamnou chu a biahinn ahi mei uhi.
Huleh hu khopi in chu ataanvaah diingin ni angai sih a, ha zong angai sih hi, ajiahchu Pathian loupina in hichu ataanvaah a, huleh Belaamnou chu a thaumei ahi mei hi.
Hutdama um namte chu hu vaah ah aleeng diing va, leitung a kumpipate’n a loupina uh leh a zahumna uh ahung tawi diing uhi.
A kotte chu suun in akikhaah ngei het sih diing, ajiahchu hu mun ah jaan aum sih diing hi.
Huleh amah un hu sungah namte loupina leh zahumna ahung poluut diing uhi.
Huleh hu sung ah chu bangchihmahin silbolhhoh ahihlouhleh kihdahhuai bawl, ahihlouhleh juau soi himhim aluut sih diing a, hizongleh Belaamnou Hinna Lehkhabu a min tuangte chauh aluut diing uhi.
Huin ama’n hinna luui tui chiimtah kristal suang banga val Pathian laltouphah leh Belaamnou apat a hung pawtkhia ahung ensah a,
hu khopi kotzing lailung leh a luuipang tuaah ah gah chi tuamtuam sawmlenih nei leh ha chin a gah hinna singkung aum hi. Huleh hu sing nahte chu namte suhdamna diing ahi.
Huleh hu ah haamsiatna mawngmawng aum nawn sih diing hi, hizongleh Pathian leh Belaamnou laltouphah aum jawta diing a, huleh a suaahte’n Amah nna atohsah diing uhi.
Amah un a meel amu diing va, a min chu a tal vah atuang diing hi.
Hu ah jaan aum nawn sih diing; huleh thaumei vaah leh ni vaah zong angai nawn sih diing uhi, ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian in amahuh ataanvaah diing a, huleh amah un kumtuang kumtuangin vai ahawm diing uhi.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hi thute hi aginumin adih ahi,” achi hi. Huleh zawlneite hagaute Lalpa Pathian in sil kibawl pah diingte chu a suaahte musah diingin a angel asawlta hi.
“Ngai in, kintahin ka hung ngeei diing hi! Hi lehkhabu thusoilawh thute jui photmah chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
Huleh kei Johan in hi silte ka muh a huleh ka jaah ahi. Huleh ka jaaha ka muh tahin hi silte hung musahtu angel keengbul ah be diingin ka puuhta hi.
Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Hung be hial sin, ajiahchu kei chu nang leh na unau zawlneite leh hi lehkhabu a thu kisoite jui na suaah tanpih ka hi. Pathian be jaw in,” achi hi.
Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hi lehkhabu a thusoilawh thute khaahkhum sin, ajiahchu a hun tung diing ahita hi.
Mi dihlou chu dihlouin um nalai heh, mi bolhhoh chu bolhhohin um nalai heh; huleh midihtat chu dihtatin um nalai heh; mi siangthou chu siangthouin um nalai heh,” achi hi.
“Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi, mi chin a silbawl bang jeela piaah diing ka kipaahman ka kawmah aum hi.
Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp, Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi.”
Hinna singkung a tan aneih theihna diing uh leh kotte a khopi sung aluut theihna diingva a thupiaahte juitute chu ahampha uhi.
Ajiahchu polam ah uite, bumhaatte, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite, tualthatte, milem bete, juau ngaina leh bawl photmahte aum uhi.
“Kei, Jesu in kouhtuamte diinga hi thute na kawma hung hesah diingin ka angel ka hung sawl hi. Kei David Zungpi leh a Chihaah, Jiingsol Aahsi Taang chu ka hi,” achi hi.
Huleh Hagau leh mou in, “Hung in!” achi uhi. Huleh aja taphot in, “Hung in!” chi heh. Huleh koipouh adangtaah chu hung heh. Huleh auut taphot in hinna tui athawnin la heh.
Ajiahchu koipouh hi lehkhabu thusoilawh thute ja taphot kawmah ka hesah hi: Mi koipouh in hi thute abehlapin chu, Pathian in hi lehkhabu a kigial gawtnate a tungah abehlap diing hi.
Huleh mi koipouh in hi thusoilawhna lehkhabu thute apat alaahmangin chu, hinna singkung leh khopi siangthou leh hi lehkhabu a kigial silte apat atan diing chu Pathian in alaahmangsah diing hi.
Hi thute hesahtu in, “Kintahin ka hung ngeei diing hi,” achi hi. Amen. Huchi hi heh, hungta in, Lalpa Jesu!
I Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na bawnva kawmah umta hen. Amen.
